column2: Taki̱da ki̱kuwang Yesu Masiya, buke Dauda, wu n ki̱n buke Yibrayime.
Yibrayim a bi̱u Yichaku,
Yichaku a bi̱u Yakubu,
Yakubu a bi̱u Yafuda n ti kebu ki̱mu,
Yafuda a bi̱u Feresa n ti Sera,
wu n neki̱n n Tamare.
Farisa a bi̱u Asruna
Asruna a bi̱u Arama,
Arama a bi̱u Aminadab,
Aminadab a bi̱u Nasun,
Nasun a bi̱u Salmuna,
Salmuna a bi̱u Bwas, wu n ne ki̱n n Rahab
Bwas a bi̱u Obed, wu n ne ki̱n n Rute,
Wabida a bi̱u Yesse,
Yesse a bi̱u Mai Dauda
Dauda a bi̱u Solomon wu n ne ki̱n a no naye Wuriya.
Solomon a bi̱u Rabwam,
Rabwam a bi̱u Abusa,
Abusa a bi̱u Asa,
Asa a bi̱u Yawuchafa,
Yawuchafa a bi̱u Yoram,
Yoram a bi̱u Asariya,
Asariya a bi̱u Yotam,
Yotam a bi̱u Asa,
Asa a bi̱u Yisakiya
Yisakiya a bi̱u Mannasa,
Mannasa a bi̱u Amon,
Amon a bi̱u Yochiya.
Yochiya a bi̱u Yekoniya n ti kebu
ki̱mu a ki̱swi ni̱bu a wo chi
a yikan ti̱m Babilame.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu a wo chi a yikan ti̱m Babila,
n Yekoniya a bi̱u Chatila,
Chatila a bi̱u Sarubabel,
Sarubabel a bi̱u Abidu,
Abidu a bi̱u Aliyaki̱m,
Aliyaki̱m a bi̱u Asura.
Asura a bi̱u Saduka,
Saduka a bi̱u Akim,
Akim a bi̱u Aliyuda.
Aliyuda a bi̱u Aliyasar,
Aliyasar a bi̱u Matana,
Matana a bi̱u Yakubu,
Yakubu a bi̱u Yusufu kwarta
Maryamu wu a bi̱u Yesu wu
ni̱bu ki̱yal ki̱nu ko Masiya.

Ti̱kalaniti kub chiri taana, chi a tatuwe di̱Yibrayime a lanta Dauda, yinu ti̱kalaniti kub chiri taana we di̱Dauda a lanta woku chi̱yangu a Babilangu. We woku chi̱yangu a Babilangu a lanta beku Yesu Masiyangu ti̱kalaniti kub chiri taana ti̱n.
Tiyangu bi̱be Yesu Masiya a fwengu, m Maryamu wu a bwa̱u na Yusufu we, m Maryamu a ma lur di̱du a Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam, yo a tibu na ki̱ne.
N Yusufu kwiye Maryamuwe ni wuyile, a kebu ka ni Maryamu dibwi we tibe ni̱be, a yo we ni̱r ki̱nu ka mari daan.
Yo n Yusufu we ti̱kuran ti̱te, naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a be ki̱mi̱ne a dwakam ko, “Yusufu, buke Dauda, nwedu tayi we, da̱u Maryamu tiyang nayemo, di̱ne luru a fur ki̱ni̱nu di̱du a Fi̱ki̱m Kwaman.
Maryamu ka bi̱u bwe, mwang yo ki̱mi̱n di̱nu n Yesu
Ti̱ti kwang a fwe di̱ne ke a ri chi n Tewuduwe a fwa a yii fa̱ku we ko,
“Di̱kan fwa̱n ka ma lur, ka bi̱u bwe, ka chaki̱mi̱n di̱nu ko n Yimanuwel.” Ki̱yungdu ko, “N Kwama ware n ti chir.”
Tiyangu n Yusufu a kaban we dumangu, a bunti̱ chi naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a fwa, a da̱u Maryamu a kau nayeko.
Aya Yusufu a daangbuwe ware n ti ki̱n, a lanta yo n ki̱n a bi̱u bweko. Yinu a yo ki̱mi̱n di̱nu n Yesu.

A kuteng ki̱ku a bi̱u Yesu a bi̱n Beti̱lami di̱du a ti̱m Yafudiya, we ki̱dangu n Yiridu nang mai ki̱chau mati̱ne. Bi̱kam ni̱bu yingki̱m chi a twiye a chire a bwa twa̱re a be Wurchalima, a ma di̱bi̱du ko,
“A bwa̱le Mai ni̱bu Yafudam wu fwiye ni̱bu a bi̱be? Di̱ne ni̱n kuwe ki̱swi ko we bwa twa̱re, ni̱n be nang sii ki̱nu.”
Yo m Mai Yiridu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, ni̱r ki̱nu a ti̱ren, a bwinbu nii we Wurchalima.
Yinu n ki̱n a mur bi̱dum fansetiye n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musantu, a bi̱u chi finu ni̱ba bi̱n Masiya.
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “A bi̱n Beti̱lami di̱du a ti̱m Yafudiya, nangki̱n fa̱ku a mwal ko,
‘M mun Beti̱lami bi̱n
di̱du a ti̱m Yafudan,
m mun n ke bi̱n di̱ti̱ri̱n we
bi̱bu ka ma mati̱n Yafudati̱mu.
Mai ka chiredu we di̱mune,
wu ka kau naba tore ni̱bu mi̱me,
ka nang chikiye Yisrela.’ ”
N Yiridu a yale ni̱bu yinki̱m twiyemu i daan a swe ware n ti chi n chikun, a bi̱u chi ki̱dangu n chi a kuun ki̱swiyangu.
N ki̱n a tum chi we Beti̱lami ko, “Yati̱ ta̱l miye ya̱m bwe wumu yinang. Kati̱ ya bi̱yili̱me, ti̱ki̱lawe be ti̱fwami, ke n ya, n sii ki̱n ti̱n.”
Yo n chi a nwe ya̱m maime, a yika ti̱n. Yo a yaki̱ yikadu we wa̱re, ki̱swi n chi a no ku a twa̱re, a fwetewe a kakku chiyang, n chi a nabu ki̱swi a lanti̱ fi a bi̱n bwe.
Yo n chi a ku ki̱swiye, a ma furi mwen.
N chi a le lo, a ya bwe n ti neki̱n m Maryamu. N chi a sung a sii ki̱n. Yinu a kwi kuli̱n chi̱nu, a ni ki̱li̱mang sinariyang n ti ti̱nungri ti̱ti fi̱rfi̱ri ti̱tu ki̱yalu ko luban n ti muri.
Yo n chi a yaki̱ ki̱la ti̱m chime, a bunti̱ wuka wa̱re di̱ne n Kwama a wu chimi̱n ki̱tele a dwakam ko a ki̱ladu bwa a di̱Yiridu se we.

Yo ni̱bu yingki̱m a yikane, wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a mwa Yusufu a dwakam ko, “Kun, da̱u bwemo n ti ne ki̱n, ti̱yika Masar yati̱ swe a bwako, ka lami̱nti̱ yo mang yal chi̱n ne, di̱ne m Mai Yiridu ki̱baddu ka chi̱u bwe.”
N Yusufu a kun we kum wuko a da̱u bwe n ti ne ki̱n a yikan Masar.
N ki̱n a swe we bwako a lami̱nti̱ yo n Yiridu a bwange. Ti̱tu a fwe yiko ke a ri chi n Tewuduwe a fwa a yii fa̱kubu ko, “N yale bwemi a Masar.”

Yo n Yiridu a swaan ko ni̱bu yingki̱m a buti̱ ki̱ne, ni̱r ki̱nu a kaiyan. Di̱ne ki̱fwiniye, n ki̱n a na yilang ko ni̱bu a chiben bwesi̱m bi̱bari̱mu a lam swa̱ti turabi̱mu n ti bi̱bu a lambi̱mu we Beti̱lami n ti bi̱bu a ki̱dire Beti̱lamimu ki̱ni kwang. N ki̱n a bunti̱ chi ni̱bu yingku chi a twiyemu a fwa ki̱mi̱n we bi̱be bwetu.
Nang ki̱swi wu ya̱m Fa̱ku n Yirmiya a ri mi̱ne ko,
“N nwe keme a Rama,
wii furi ki̱liki̱li di̱dune.
Rayila ki̱kii wii
di̱ne bwesi̱m ki̱mu,
A kebu wuka nii ka kire ki̱mi̱nu,
di̱ne n chi a bwa.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yiridu a bwangu, naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a mwa Yusufu a dwakam we Masar ko,
“Kun, da̱u bwe ti neki̱n ti̱yika Yisrela, di̱ne ni̱bu ki̱baddu ka chi̱u Bwemu a bwaran.”
Yinu a kun a da̱u loko a yika ti̱m Yisrela.

Yinangu n ki̱n a nwe ko n Arkilayu bwe Yiridu ki̱chau kula te ki̱ne we mati̱n Yafudiya tangu, tayi a tau ki̱n di̱ne bwe Yiridu. N Kwama a wu ki̱mi̱n ki̱tele a dwakam, yinu n ki̱n a twa̱ng a yika ti̱m Ka̱lili.
N ki̱n a ya swe a di̱kan bi̱n di̱du ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Nasa̱reti̱n, di̱ne ke a ri chi fa̱ku Kwama a fwa ko, “Ka yal ki̱nu ko naba Nasa̱rete.”
We ki̱dang kangu n Yowana naba Batisma a beki̱ma di̱mwar ya̱m Kwamanu a di̱si̱lachangi̱n Yafudiya,
ko, “Ti̱wo ki̱ti̱m, di̱ne Yaa Kwama a mwatawe!”
N ki̱n nang wu n Fa̱ku Yichaya a fwaan ya̱m feredi ko,
“We di̱chi̱lachangi̱nu wuka nii ki̱ma di̱yal ko,
‘Ti̱do Tewuduwe mi̱n wa̱re,
ke n ki̱n a yawe wa̱re tibeni ture.’ ”
N Yowana a do luke wu a ma ki̱ni ri ta twalumiye. N ki̱n a mu tar ki̱nu ki̱ni ki̱biyang di̱ba̱la̱ng. Chabtu kitu ki̱kwiti n ti mwe rwiye.
Ni̱bu Wurchalimamu n ti bi̱bu a yaa Yafudiya mi kwang n ti bale La Wurdune ki̱rwaa bwa a di̱ki̱ne kutukutu.
Ki̱wo ki̱ti̱mu, n ki̱n ki̱ma chimi̱nti̱ batisma we La Wurdune.
Yo n Yowana a ku ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu Sadukiyamu ki̱bedu ka ma batisma, a yi chi ko, “N ti̱n soti yi bwilaiyu, n wure a mwa chi̱n ko ti̱wul we ki̱fwini Kwama ki̱bede?
Ti̱ma nangang ki̱ku ka yungdu ti̱wo ki̱ti̱mang.
Ti̱da̱ngdu we ti ta fwadu we yi chiyu ko Yibrayim n te chi̱ne. Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu n Kwama ki̱ni da ka kuku kali, ka kau bwesi̱m Yibrayim.
Ki̱ka̱ngu a tu a yo yii twa̱ne we ki̱yineng tiyange; Kanang ki̱ki̱le tiyang ki̱ku a tubu chi ti̱yiliyange, ka ki̱sedu, ka twidu a ki̱rang.”

“Mi̱n ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni mwe, ke a yung ti̱wo ki̱ti̱m, aya wu ki̱bedu a kuteng mange, a la mi̱n ki̱ni dwiyentu. Kasi no ki̱wami kiyu mang lwebu mang tadu. N ki̱n ka ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam n ti ki̱rang.
Nii wu ki̱ni kwefi̱ra we fa̱la̱ng kangu, ka chaku ki̱nuti chaam we tuitu, ka kur ki̱nutiyu a bi̱ne, ka yaa furitu n ti tuitu ka twidu a ki̱rang ki̱ku a ne dumedu dumeneng.”
We ki̱swi wuko n Yesu a kune we Ka̱lili, a ya bwana di̱Yowana we La Wurdune, fiki̱mang batisma ko ke a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma.
N Yowana a no kebu ka ma ki̱mi̱n batisma, a yi ki̱n ko, “M mi̱n wu mi̱n baddu mwang ma mi batisma, nang wu ki̱la mwang bedu mwi m ma mi̱na?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “A kabi yiko ki̱ka̱ngu, di̱ne wu nang wa̱re niing riin yile Kwama.” Yinu n Yowana a ke fal.
Yo n Yesu a chire we mwe wu n ki̱n a mang batisma, bi̱nabi̱na dii a wuden, a ku Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu ki̱suwedu we dii yinang ki̱kube a be sung we di̱ki̱ne.
Yinu ker a chire we dii ko, “Wu nang Bwe Ni̱re mi, m mi̱lan, mi̱n nwe ta̱ma̱ng ki̱ni ki̱n.”
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a di̱si̱lachangi̱n ko ke n Setan a swe ki̱n.
A kuteng ki̱ku a da̱u dimwen diti wan taana, kum n ti kukongu, chun a bu ki̱n.
Fakware, naba swa̱ka̱ke, a be we di̱ki̱ne ko, “Ka mun nang Bwe Kwama, yi kali yiyu mwi a kau ki̱danne.”
N Yesu a ke ko, “A mwal ko,
‘Chi ki̱nii ti̱kuriye n ke kana chabtu.
Aya ka nang di̱di̱le di̱kwa̱l
di̱du ki̱chiredu a di̱Kwamane.’ ”
Yinu n Setan a ki̱la yal Yesu, a yika Wurchalima, a fi a suu a la chi we Kan Kwama di̱duna Wurchalimanu.
A yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mun nang Bwe Kwama, rii sutubu we ti̱mu, di̱ne a mwal ko,
‘N Ki̱n ka yi ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu ya̱m.
Ka konu ki̱ni fa̱li chi
Ko ke ngaudu bewure.’ ”
Yinu n Yesu a yiti̱ ki̱n ko, “A mwalmwale, a ne mwang swe Tewuduwe Kwama mo!”
N Setan a ki̱la yal ki̱n a di̱kun di̱swa̱mi̱n, fi a ya yungi̱n ki̱n yaati ti̱ti̱niyu n ti dwiyen chi̱tu kwang.
Yinu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka n sung, n siiye, mang ni̱nu ki̱ni kwang.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Setan, yika mi̱n a fi! A mwal ko, ‘Dela Tewuduwe Kwama, sii ki̱n ki̱kun!’ ”
Yinu n Setan a du ki̱n. Ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu a be, a dela ki̱n.
Yo n Yesu a nwe ko n Yowana a le di̱bi̱nti̱le, a kun a yika Ka̱lili.
N ki̱n a du Nasa̱ret a ki̱la Kafanawu wu a ki̱ti̱ku La wurdune, wu a ki̱dire ti̱m Chabulum n ti Nafi̱taliye.
Ke a ri chi fa̱ku Yichaya a fwaatu ko,
“Ti̱nwei, ni̱bu Chabulum n ti ni̱bu Nafi̱talimu,
n ti̱n bi̱bu ta da a wa̱re
la wurduni̱mu n ti kangu
ba̱la̱ng we ki̱ti̱ku Wurduni̱mu,
n ti kuu Ka̱lili bi̱bu ni̱bu
n ke ni̱bu Yafudam a dawemu.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a no swe
a da ki̱liyemu, a ku yiiki̱ku,
Bi̱bu a no swe a ki̱liye ki̱letiyemu,
a ya yiiki̱ku.”
A mwetuwe ki̱dang kangu, n Yesu ki̱ma di̱mwaru ko, “Ti̱wo ki̱ti̱mu, di̱ne Yaa Kwama a mwatawe.”

Aya n Yesu ki̱yadu a ki̱ti̱ku la Ka̱liliyang, a ku kebu chi burau ki̱ tau chi̱ngi, n Simun wu ki̱yalu ko m Biti̱r n ti keko n Andi̱riya. N chi ki̱mau dwa̱kai chiyu a far di̱dun di̱ne n chi ki̱tabachi̱ngiye.
N Yesu a yal chi ko, “Ti̱bumite, mang miya chimi̱nu tani̱n yale ni̱bu ka bumiti̱ni̱m.”
Bi̱nabi̱na bi̱ki̱mu a kaibu ki̱swi a du kuli̱n chi̱nu, a bunti̱ Yesu.
Ki̱du fikoye, a ku bi̱kam kebu chi burau, n Yakubu bwe Sa̱badi n ti keko n Yowana. N chi a fi̱l kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱do dwa̱kai chiyu n ti te chi n Sa̱badi, n Yesu a yalti̱ chi we fiko.
Bi̱nabi̱na n chi a du te chi we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a bunti̱ Yesu.
N Yesu ki̱bwa̱lu we Ka̱lili ki̱miyadu we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu, ki̱mwa ya̱m bi̱li̱m bi̱bu a Yaa Kwamamu, ki̱bera buri̱n ti kwang n ti bi̱bu bwiyu a li̱mbi̱mu.

Ya̱m Yesumu a ti̱ran we ti̱m Suriyami kwang. Ni̱bu a le ki̱be ki̱mi̱nedu ki̱ni ni̱bu buri̱ni̱mu nabwen n ti bi̱bu bwiyu a li̱mbi̱mu n ti ni̱bu ki̱nwe riyemu n ti ni̱bu ki̱fi̱bti n ti bi̱bu ki̱kuli ki̱madi̱mu n ti bi̱ngi̱rmani̱mi kwang, a ya beku.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen a bunti̱ ki̱n we Ka̱lili n ti Dikafoli, n ti Wurchalima n ti Yafudiya n ti ti̱mu a wuka ki̱swi la Wurdune.
Yo n Yesu a ku ki̱tuu ni̱be, a fi̱l bale kunne a swe we, miyari̱m ki̱mu a swe ki̱mi̱ntuwe,
a mwe ki̱miya chi mi̱nu.
“Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu a yim ki̱taku chiyangi̱mu,
Yaa Kwama n wu chi.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m, bi̱bu ni̱tu chitu a kaiyani̱mu,
n Kwama ka kire chi mi̱nu.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu
a kukubu dutu chiti̱mu, ka chau ti̱ti̱nitu.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ni̱tu chitu
ki̱baddu ka tum chi
n Kwama ki̱badde,
n Kwama ka ri chimi̱ndi chib.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ki̱nwe ki̱bunemu,
n Kwama ka nwe ki̱bune chi ti̱n.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ni̱tu
chiti wa̱la̱k,
Nangki̱n, n chi ka ku Kwama.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ki̱yo kunkaki̱mu
ka yal chidu ko bwesi̱m Kwama.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ki̱nwe
riye di̱ne yilemu
Yaa Kwama n wu chi.
“Ni̱bu delaki̱m n ti̱n bi̱bu ni̱bu ki̱mi̱ki̱ chi̱nu, ki̱fumachi̱nu, ki̱mwe chimi̱n kasi no bi̱bi̱le ki̱duum ti̱kwanim di̱ne mi̱ni̱mu.
Ti̱ma ti̱mi̱lan ki̱ni furi mwemwe di̱ne ki̱ti̱me chi̱n wuduwe we bwa diye, di̱ne a lakanbu n ti kangu n chi a ma ki̱ni fa̱kubu feredimu.
“N ti̱n nang bum ti̱ti̱nimu. Aya ka li̱mang bumangu a riye, yili̱me ko ka ki̱lawedi yire? Bwa kake a ne chi ni madi ki̱ne we, ka n ke ni fwalu a bwa, ni̱bu ka fabadi naniye.”
“N ti̱n nang yiiku ti̱ti̱niyangu. Yinang bi̱n di̱du a di a kunni tasi̱n.
Sunti̱du kwefi̱ra we fiti̱la mo! A la chi ni yodu a ti̱du, ko ke a yii ka nang bwa̱le kwang.
A fiwine, ti̱yung yiiku changu, ke ni̱bu a ku, a swaan nangi̱ri chi̱ntu, a dela Kwama wu a diye.”
“Ti̱kamaduwe ti kanodu m be mang kwi yili̱n Musatu n ti chi fa̱kubu a miyanitu, mang bebu kwiku aya m be ke n ri ya̱m bi̱bu.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, ka dii n ti ti̱ti̱nitu we ki̱yade, a ne chi a ne ride we. Ka ki̱kwi ya̱me, ka ti̱tu ni̱bu ki̱kudu ko n ke ti̱kan chite.

Di̱ne yiko, nii wu ka ki kaang yilang kasi no nang ki̱ti̱rangu we yili̱n ti̱tu yinu ka miya bi̱kam mi̱nu ko a ma ti̱ni yiko, ka kau wuti̱re we Yaa Kwama. We yiko, wu ka bunti̱ yilangu ka miya ni̱bu mi̱nti̱nu ko a nang bunti̱ne, ka ya dwiyen ti̱dui we Yaa Kwama.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a dakan yile chi̱n ka la wu ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musati̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu. Ka a newe yiko, a ne ta le yaa wu a diye ko bayim.”
“Ti̱nwe ni̱bu a yi tukebu chi̱remu ko, ‘Chidu ni we. Wu ka chi̱u niye, ka ya mwataku.’

Aya m mi̱n, mi̱n yi chi̱nu mi: Ni ki̱ma ki̱fwini n ti ke ko ka ya mwataku. Ti̱nti̱ne, wu ka yi keko ko, ‘M mun nii wu kuse,’ ka ya kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱n. Yinu wu ka tu keko ko, ‘Di̱rre,’ ka wuran bwi ki̱ni far ki̱ran.”
Di̱ne yiko, ka mun yadu mwang ma niku a se Kwama, yinu n kur chi mwang ma ke mo mi̱ne,
du niku mwangu we se Kwama, yan doka we ti kemo didin, yinu m be ni niku mwangu.

“Do tibe mo datu n ti fakwaremo wu ki̱yadu ka yali̱nu a kan kabaki̱ fanseti. Ti̱doka we wa̱re yo ta tibu lam kan kabaki̱ ne, ka newe yiko, ka dunu n ti Mai kabake, wuko ka dunu n ti di̱karan, di̱karanu ka mari̱nu a di̱bi̱nti̱l.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa mi̱nu, a ne mwang chiredu ka mwang febu di̱si̱nu ki̱ni kwange.”
“Ti̱nwe a fwa chimi̱n ko, ‘Madu ti̱kuli we.’
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ‘Ka nii a da̱ng naye ri̱i̱ng, a kubene, a tu a ma ti̱kulitu n ti naye wuko we ni̱r ki̱nu.’ ”
Di̱ne yiko, “Ka nu wu a kang ki̱yilange ki̱yonu ki̱ni ki̱lenge, chaku n mau a bwa, a la chi mwang kwala balangi kiin we bwiyu n ti ki̱ku bwiyi kwang ka le ki̱rangangu.
Ka fa̱la̱ng ki̱yilangu nang ki̱ku ki̱bedu ki̱ni ki̱lenge, chaku n mau a bwa. Ka la chi mwang kwala balangi kiin n ti ki̱ku bwiyi kwang ka le ki̱rangangu.”
Ni̱bu a fwa chimi̱n ti̱n ko, “Ni ka chi̱u naye ko mi̱n ki̱na, ka nii naye ko lwangi̱n chiku ki̱nanu.
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ‘Ni ka chi̱u ki̱na we naye ko, ka n ke di̱ne yariye, a yo naye ki̱ni sulai.’ Aya wu ka yiu naye, ki̱ma ti̱kuli.”
Yinu ti̱ nwe a yi tukebi̱ chi̱remu ko, “A twa̱ndu ti̱kwanitu we, aya ri chi mwan bwa̱u mwang ni Tewuduwe.
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ti̱twandu chi we, ko bayim ka ki̱ni bwa diye, di̱ne kweer Kwama.
Ka ki̱ni ti̱ti̱niye, di̱ne nang fi ki̱fwali̱n naniye. Ka ki̱ni Wurchalima di̱ne nang bi̱n Mai Wuduwenu.
Twa̱nduwe ki̱ni dur mun di̱ne kasi no ki̱riyangi kiin a ne mwang medu mwang sutedi tweng ka ki̱liye.
A dakan ya̱m chimu kanodu ‘ngo’ ka ‘ngango.’ Ka a su ti̱te n ti̱u fakware.”
Ti̱nwe a fwa ko, “Kwalange di̱ne kwalange, nuum di̱ne nuum.
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ti̱yeduwe ka nii a ngan a di̱dane, yo ki̱mi̱nti̱ di̱kanu a ngau ti̱n.
Ka wuka nii a mar keme di̱ne ke a yiti̱n belukemo, chaku wuduwe niti̱ ki̱n.
Ka wuka nii wu ki̱ni dukane a mwintuwe ko ti̱ya yayu wu a si̱re wiine, ti̱ya wu a si̱ri yurabu.
Nii wu a bi̱n chiye, ni. Wu a be ki̱bau di̱si̱ne, dangduwe we.”
Ti̱nwe a yi chi ko, “Mi̱la kemo, ko fakware mo.
Aya mi̱n yi chi̱nu mi, mi̱la fakwarbu mumu, twa̱ba̱ bi̱bu ki̱fumani̱mu mi̱n.
Ke ti̱kau bwesi̱m Te wu a diye, n ki̱n ki̱yo dii ki̱fwe kuko we ni̱bu bi̱yili̱m n ti̱ bi̱bwilamu. Ti̱nti̱ne, ki̱tume mwe we ni̱bu yilemu n ti bi̱bu a tumbu yilemu.
Ka ti̱mi̱la kana bi̱bu ki̱mi̱la chi̱ni̱me, ta ya wuwule ki̱ti̱me? Bi̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu ki̱ma ti̱ni yiko?
Ka ti̱si kana kebu chime, ti̱lakan a file n ti bi̱kamu? N ke chi bi̱bu a yimbu Kwamamu ki̱ma ti̱na?
Ti̱buli̱m yichiyu ki̱ni yile, ti̱ri ki̱ni yile yinangu Te chi̱n wu a diye a ri ki̱nangu.”
“Ti̱ma daan ki̱ni nangi̱n ti̱yili chi̱ntu, di̱ne a ne kuki̱ku durang we nangang ki̱yilangu. Ka a kabi yiko, a ne ta ya ki̱ti̱me we Te chi̱n wu a diye.

“Di̱ne yiko, ka mun ma nike, ri̱kadu yimwiyu we chi mwang maatu, tiyangu ni̱bu di̱bebelin a kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu n ti neti̱ loyu ko ke ni̱bu a wer chiyangu. Bi̱yili̱mu nang bi̱bu, n chi a tu a yiu sure chi kwang.
Aya ka mwang maka wuka niye, kedu wuka nii a yindu chi mun maditu we.
Chi ti̱yilitu mun maditu, ma n lailaye. Te wu a diye wu ki̱ku ka ti̱ti̱le chi mun madite, ka ni̱n ki̱ti̱me mo.

“We ya̱m twa̱ba̱ku buniyangi̱mu, ti̱kaduwe tiyang ni̱bu di̱bebelin bi̱bu ki̱twa̱ba bunitu a fi tiye we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu n ti neti̱ loyu ko ke ni̱bu a ku chi. Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a tu a yiu ki̱ti̱me chi.
Ka ya mun twa̱ba̱ bunite, yinge dur munu a kan, twa̱ba̱ bunitu we di̱Tewuduwe, n ki̱n wu niyang kube, wu ki̱ku ti̱lairite, ka ni̱n ki̱ti̱me mo.
Ka yati̱ twa̱ba̱ bunite, ti̱bwidu ya̱muwe tiyangu bi̱bu a yimbu Kwamamu ki̱madangu, n chi ko kate ka nwe chidu di̱ne nabwe ya̱me.
Ti̱maduwe nang chi, di̱ne Te chi̱n a yim chi ti̱baditu kasi no nang ki̱dangu ta tibu fwa ya̱ma̱ngu.
“Ti̱twa̱ba̱ buniti ying,
Te ni̱n wu a diye,
di̱n muni wauwadu.
Yaa mo a be,
yo ni̱n ma we ti̱ti̱nitu, tiyangu wenga bwadiyangu.
Ni ni̱n chabtu ti̱ditu.
Du ni̱mi̱n ki̱leti niyu,
tiyangu ni̱n du bi̱bu
ki̱ma ni̱mi̱n ki̱letimu.
Yo ni̱n ledu sweki̱ku we,
aya yu ni̱n we bwila.
“Ka ti̱du bi̱bu a ma chimi̱n ki̱letimu mi̱n ki̱leti chiye, n Te chi̱n wu a diye ka du chimi̱n ti̱nu.
Ka ta du ni̱bu mi̱nbu ki̱leti chiye. N Te chi̱n wu a diye a ne du chimi̱n ti̱nu.”

“Ka yati̱ da̱u dimwene, ti̱kaiyu kabi̱ni we tiyangu ni̱bu di̱bebelinu ki̱madangu yo ki̱ da̱u dimwene. N chi ki̱kai kabi̱ni chiyu di̱ne ke chi yung ni̱bu ko chi ma dimwen. Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, n chi a yiu sure chi di̱mbi̱ri̱m.
Aya ka mun ma dimwen, fu kabumo, wa ti̱ki̱nung we dur munu Yinangu mun madi kwadangu.
Di̱ne ke ni̱bu a yinduwe ko mun ma dimwen. Te wu mwang kube, wu a yim chiti kwange ka ni̱n ki̱ti̱me mo.”
Ti̱mur yichiyu mi̱nu kuliti we ti̱ti̱nitu, fi ki̱bwa̱ta n ti fi sa̱ngre a ne ka kaiye n ti fi dabi̱kum a ne ka wure.
Aya ti̱mur yichiyu mi̱n kulitu a bwadi, fi ki̱bwa̱ta n ti sa̱ngre a ne ka kaiyinde n ti fi dabi̱kum a ne ka wure.
Di̱ne fi kuli mwitu we mi̱ne, nang fi ni̱r munu wetuwe.
“Nu nang yiiku bwiyangu, ka nu mo ki̱ni li̱mange, bwiyi kwang ka ya yiiku.
Aya ka numo a ne li̱mang wenge, bwiyi kwang ka kwala yiiki̱ku. Ka yiiku bwiyangi ki̱liye, ki̱liye ka su ki̱nati̱ng.”
A ne nii ka sii ni̱bu lomi burabe we. A mwintuwe n ki̱n ka ko wuka, ka ke wuka, ka ka nii dukan ki̱nu a wu wiine, ka du wuka. A ne da we mwang bunti̱ Kwama n ti ka̱mbi̱r ki̱da kiin.
Di̱ne yiko mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ti̱kuradu chiwe chabti̱tu ta chaditu n ti chi ta node, ka kuli̱n di̱du ta dodu a bwiyine. Ti̱kuritu a labu chabti̱ta? Yinu bwiyu a labu kuli̱n di̱dori̱na?
Ti̱da̱ng ki̱ni̱biyu, n chi a fibu chi, a kabbu chi, a murbi̱ chi we bi̱ni chiyu. N Te chi̱n wu a diye ki̱chadu ki̱ni chi. N ti̱n ta labu ki̱ni̱biya?
N wure we tibe chi̱n di̱ne ti̱kuran kitu ka suddu ka awa wiine?
Yinu a mayire ta kai ni̱ru we chi ta dodite? Ti̱da̱ng fili̱ntu we di̱kiru tiyangu ki̱dwiyedu, n chi a mabu nangang ka̱mbi̱rang a kubuti̱bu kuli̱n.
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, kasi no m Mai Solomon n ti dwiyen kitu, a doonbu kuli̱n leran di̱du we tiyang fili̱ntu.
Ka n Kwama ka ywa̱ta swa̱ki̱ku a di̱kirinu mi̱ndiye, ti̱tu diwu ki̱ni ti̱kuri fi̱nenang ki̱le ki̱rangite, a ne ma chimi̱n ti̱tu a la Yeta, n ti̱n bi̱bu keku bi̱yili̱mang changu a ki̱tani̱mu.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱kuradu chiwe tiko, “Nang chau wureni, ka nang no wureniye, ka niing do wureniye?”
We kuu ni̱bu bi̱bu a yimbu Kwamamu, ti̱tu nang chi a mabu ti̱kali ki̱ne. Aya Te chi̱n wu a diye a yim ti̱badu.
Aya a la chi ti̱bau Yaa Kwama n ti yile ko, ti̱tu chi kwang ka nii chi̱nu.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱kuradu chiwe ya̱m fi̱nenangi̱mu, di̱ne fi̱nenangu n wu Kwama. Kanang wuwule diye ki̱ni wuko riye.
“Ti̱nidu ka wuwule niye ki̱lewe, ke a ni ti̱nu chi̱n ki̱lewe.
Nangki̱n, tiyangu ti̱mwata ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱ma̱ngu, ka mwata chimi̱n ti̱ni yiko. Kwele mun swende, nang wu ka swemi̱n ti̱ni ki̱ne.
Wule yo mun da̱ng be di̱fi̱li̱n ki̱tinu a nu ke monu, mwang kurbu ki̱takulangu a numonge?
Mwang medi yire, mwang chaku ke mo mi̱n di̱fi̱li̱n we nuko, yo ki̱takulang we wumo nuwe.
Naba di̱bebeline, mwe n chaku ki̱takulangu we nu mo, yinu mwang chaku ki̱yilang swa̱ka̱n a nu ke monu.
“Ti̱nidu kadatiyu ti̱yili Kwamatu we, yinu ti̱nidu sulti̱kumiyu kali ka̱mbi̱riyi wuli̱bi̱wuli̱biyu we, ke ki̱la nwe chimi̱n burang.
“Ti̱bi̱u ka nii chi̱nu, ti̱bau ta yadu, ti̱bu kwa̱ru ka wudu chimi̱nu.
Kanang wuwule niye wu ki̱bi̱de, ki̱yiddu, wu ki̱badde ki̱yadu yinu n ki̱n wu ki̱bu kware, ka wudu ki̱mi̱nu.
N wure we tibe chi̱n wu bwe ko ka bi̱u ki̱danne n ki̱n ka nii kale?
Ka a bi̱u chi̱nge, ka nii so?
Ka n ti̱n, n ti̱n bi̱bwilamu, ti̱yim ti̱ni bwesi̱m chimu chi ti̱yiliye, kano Te chi̱n wu a diye a ne ni bwesi̱m ki̱mu ki̱li̱mangu we bi̱bu a bi̱u ki̱ni̱ma?
“Kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye, ma ni̱bumi̱n ti̱n yinangu no mun baddu n chi ka mami̱ndangu. Ti̱tu a dal yili̱ntu n ti chi fa̱kubu a fwaatu di̱mbi̱ri̱m.
“Lenga kwa̱ri kuddi̱nu, di̱ne wa̱re wuti̱le ka yo nii a twiyaku, nang wa̱re lantange. Ni̱bu nabwen ki̱tau wa̱re wuko.
Aya kwa̱ri kuddu, nang wa̱re burinching wu a ti̱kuriye, ni̱bi bayim bi̱bu ki̱yaduwemu.
“Ti̱ma daandaan ki̱ni fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu. Bi̱bu ki̱be fi a di̱chi̱ne ki̱ni di̱ba̱l kwamin we bwi chiyinu, aya n chi bawuti, chun a lwe bwi chiyu.
Ni swaan chidu we a nangari chitu, ni ya ti̱kulan sinangitu we kwa̱da? Ka ti̱tu a ki̱selangitu we siinanga?
Di̱ne yiko, ka ki̱ki̱le tiyang ki̱yilange ki̱ tu ti̱kulan ti̱yili aya tiyang ki̱bwilangu ki̱tu ti̱kulan ti̱bwilai.
“Tiyang ki̱yilangu a ne tu ti̱kulan ti̱bwilai, tiyang ki̱bwilangu a ne tu ti̱kulan ti̱yili.
Kanang ki̱ki̱le tiyang ki̱ku a tubu ti̱kulan ti̱yiliyange, ni̱bu ka swidu ka maru a ki̱rang.
Yiko, we nangi̱n chitu ta swaan chidu.
“N ke ka nang wuwule niye wu ki̱yalu ko ‘Tewuduwe, Tewuduwenge we!’ Ka le Yaa Kwama ka n ke wu ki̱tum ki̱ke Temi wu a diye.
Nibu nabwen we diko beka fwadu ko, Tewuduwe, Tewuduwe, mare ni̱n ma fa̱kui ki̱ni di̱n mun, we di̱n munu ti̱nti̱n ni̱n chaka ki̱fi̱bti ni̱n mati̱ chi ka̱ta̱kitu nabwen.
Mi̱n fal mang yi chidi tas mi, ‘Mang yinchi̱nbu. Ti̱yika mi̱n a fi ni̱bu bi̱bwilam!’
“Nii wu a nwe ker mi̱nu, yinu a ma nangang ki̱ne, ka kadu yinang naba yingku wu a mu loko a kwame.
Yo mwe a swi, latiyu a riye, ki̱fi̱be a kune a ngau lo, lo wu a yarbu, di̱ne a mu lo a kwam.
Yinu wu a nwe ya̱m mi̱mu, a mabu nangang ki̱ne, ka kadu nang di̱r di̱du a mu loko a yane.
Yo mwe benge, latiyu a ri, ki̱fi̱be a kun a ngau lo, lo a yar ki̱ni keru dukan ko, kuuum!”
Yo n Yesu a ri fwaku ya̱m bi̱be, tayi a tau ni̱bu a muran we fikomu.
Di̱ne ki̱n ki̱miya chimi̱nu tiyang nii wu ki̱ni dukane a newe tiyang ni̱bu yungku yili̱n chimu.
Yo n Yesu a suwe we kunne, ni̱bu nabwen a bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱n.
Yinu wuka naba mwa̱liye a be fi a di̱ki̱ne a sung we kakku Yesungu a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, Ka mwang kenge, yo m be.”
N Yesu a kuku fa̱la̱ng kangu a twai ki̱n ko, “N ke, ya beku. Bi̱nabi̱na, naba mwa̱liye a ya beku.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, kedu fwa wuka ni minduwe, aya yika bwa fansetiye n yung yimwiyu, ya ma ni ki̱ku m Musa a fwangu a kau chimi̱n di̱mwar.”
Yo Yesu a le Kafanawu we, wuka naba tikake ni̱bu ki̱rang Roma a be fi a di̱ki̱ne a wannan ko,
“Tewuduwe, ni wuki̱mami nangange a ngi̱rmane we lo a bu ki̱ni dukan.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Mang yadu, man be ki̱nu.
Naba ki̱range wu, a yi ki̱n ko, Tewuduwe mang lwebu mwang be lomi, fwa ya̱mu, bwe mi ka ya beku.

N mi̱n ti̱n ki̱ni bi̱seli̱m bi̱bu ki̱tum mi̱ni̱mu, yinu m min, ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱rangmu mi̱n tundi̱mu. Mi̱n yale bi̱bi bwa, mi̱n tum bi̱bi bwa, ki̱mati̱nu. Mi̱n yi bwe nangange mi, a ma ti̱tu, ki̱mati̱nu.”
Yo n Yesu a nwe bi̱be, a ya̱r yii, yinu a yi ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱ni̱mu ko, “N fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, mang yabu wuka ni we Yisrela ki̱nii keku bi̱yili̱mang ki̱ku.”
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ni̱bu nabwen ka bedu kasi no a wuwule fwiti̱ne ti̱ti̱niye, ka swedu n ti Yibrayim n ti Yichaku n ti Yakubu we yiye Yaa Kwama.
Aya bi̱bu a no ka kau ni̱bu Kwamamu a ki̱la komu, ka mar chidu a ki̱liki̱liye wu kwane, fi n chi ka ki̱wi kani̱n ki̱rti̱ti̱ nuume.
Yinu n Yesu a yi tikake ni̱bu ki̱rang Roma ko, “Yikan! Ka fwedu yinangu mwang ke ka fwedangu. Burangu a be we naba nangange ki̱dang kangu.”
Yo n Yesu a le lo Biti̱r, n ki̱n a ku nela Biti̱r a dada di̱ne ki̱kwam a ngau ki̱n.
A twai fa̱la̱ng nayengu, ki̱kwam a be ti̱n. N ki̱n a kun a do ki̱mi̱n chabtu.
Ki̱ni me, ni̱bu a be Yesu mi̱ne ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱fi̱btimu nabwen. N ki̱n a chaka ki̱fi̱btiyu ki̱ni di̱kwa̱l yiin, a beti̱ ni̱bu buramu nabwen.
Ti̱tu a fwe ying ke a ri chitu fa̱ku Yichaya a fwaatu,
A da̱u nimi̱n bwini chiyu,
“A beti̱ buri̱n chi̱retu.”
Yo n Yesu a ku ki̱tuu ni̱be a bwa̱l ki̱ni di̱bi̱re, n ki̱n a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko a yabu wuka bale wu a far di̱dune.
Wuka naba ni̱bu yungku yili̱ne a be, a yi ki̱n ko, “Naba yungke, mang bumi̱n ti̱nu kasi no mwang yadi bwa̱le.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Wuba futu ki̱ni bwartu chi ti̱tu ki̱daandi, ki̱ni̱biyu ki̱ni ki̱kuli. Aya Bwe Nii a newe ki̱ni fi.”
Wuka we miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe yam n ya, n fure temi didin.”
Aya Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bumite, du kwa̱miyu a fur kwa̱mi chiyu.”
N Yesu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, miyari̱mu a nabi̱ ti̱n.
Ki̱fi̱be wuduwe a kun we mwe la wu a yo labi mwetu a fi̱l kwa̱mbi̱re mwe. Aya duum a da̱u Yesu.
N chi a rung ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, yanang twiyadu!”
A yi chi ko, “A mayireti̱ nwe taye? N ti̱n bi̱bu keki̱ bi̱yili̱mang changu a ki̱tani̱mu. Yinu n ki̱n a kun, a wela ki̱fi̱be n ti labi mwetu, a tii si̱k.”
Chitu a ya̱r ni̱bu yii. N chi ki̱bi̱du ko, “Wuwule ki̱duum niim wu ki̱fi̱be ki̱nweti̱ ya̱m ki̱me?”
Yo n Yesu a yabu wuka bale we ti̱m Ka̱ra̱siname, ni̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btimi burau a chire a bwa fute. Ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btimu ti̱nti̱n di̱ne bwila chi ni̱bu a tabu ware wuko.
Bi̱nabi̱na a bwe keme ko, “Lwangang mwang wule n ti ni̱n Bwe Kwama? M be mwang ni ni̱n riye yo ki̱swi a tibu landa?”
We ki̱twalang kangu, sulti̱kumi loi we, a mabu kutan n ti chi, ki̱chau cham.
Ki̱fi̱btiyu a wana Yesu ko, “Dub ni̱n le ki̱ran sulti̱kumiyu ka n chaku ni̱ne.”
A yi chi ko, “Ngo, ti̱ya!” N chi a yikan, a le sulti̱kumiyu. Ki̱ran sulti̱kuminu a bulan a wul a le far di̱dunu a bwaran.
Ni̱bu ki̱to sulti̱kumimu a wulan a yika bi̱n, a ya, a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n chi a fwe ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱fi̱btime.
Ni̱bu bi̱ni̱mi kwang a chire be ka da̱ng Yesu. Yo n chi a be kuwe, a wana ki̱n ko a du ti̱m chimu.
Yo n Yesu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a yabu far di̱dunu, a yika bi̱n ki̱n,

we ki̱dang kangu, bi̱kam ni̱bu a da̱a̱ nii wu a ngi̱rmangi̱rmane, a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱n a chi ti̱dari. Yo n Yesu a ku keki̱ bi̱yili̱mang chiyange, a yi nii wu a ngi̱rmangi̱rmane ko, “Kuradu chi we bwe mi, n du mi̱n ki̱leti mwiyu.”
We bi̱bu, bi̱kam ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱m a fwa we yichiyu ko, “Nii wu a swa̱ba Kwama.”
Kangu n Yesu a yim ti̱kuran chitangu, a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱kuran chi̱ntu a lebe?
Ti̱ti̱le a la chi, ka ni a yiko, ‘N dumi̱n ki̱leti mwiye,’ n ti ka nii a yi ko, ‘Kun, ya yayuwe?’
Aya ke ti̱yim ti Bwe Nii ki̱ni dukan we ti̱ti̱nitu ka du ki̱letiyu. A yi wu ngi̱rmane ko, ‘kun, da̱u kwa̱mbi̱re mwemo yika lo, burang mwangu a be.’ ”
Nii wu a kun, a yikati̱ loko.
Yo ni̱bu a muran a fikomu a ku ti̱te, tayi a tau chi. N chi a dela Kwama wu a ni ni̱bu dukan di̱dun di̱de.
Tiyangu n Yesu a chakakku ki̱ni yayuwangu, n ki̱n a ku wuka nii wu ki̱yalu ko m Matta, a swe ki̱yiu sangkal, n Yesu a yi ko, “Bumite.” N ki̱n a kun a bunti̱n.
Yo n Yesu a yaki̱ chau chabtu metu a lon Matta, ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu nabwen n ti ni̱bu ki̱letiyimu a be a swe a chau chitu ware.
Yo Farisawa a kuwe, a yi Miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Wureni a yo naba lo chi̱n ki̱chau chabtu n ti ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱m n ti ni̱bu ki̱letime?”
Kangu n Yesu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, a yi ko, “Nii wu ki̱ni li̱mange a babu nabari, kana wu a bubuwe.
Yati̱ ta̱l chi ti̱tu ki̱yungde, mi̱n bau nweki̱ ki̱buneng n ke niku ki̱tumang. Mang bebu di̱ne ni̱bu yilem aya di̱ne ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m.”
Yinu Miyari̱m Yowanamu a beki̱ bi̱u Yesu ko, “Wure ni a yo n ni̱n n ti ni̱bu Farisamu ni̱n da̱u dimwen aya Miyari̱m mumu a da̱bbe?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Fate wutabre ka ma furi ki̱liki̱lin we ki̱dangu bwele ki̱yiu naye we ware n ti chiyanga? Ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu bwele ki̱yiu naye ka du chide. Nang ki̱dangu n chi ka da̱u dimwen.
“A ne nii ka tal luke wuka̱re ki̱ni di̱lukten di̱fwine we, di̱ne ka di̱lukten di̱fwinu a wubi ti̱ri̱me ka kai luke, ti̱nti̱ne ka su ngi̱raki̱ku.
A ne nii ka kur mwe yili̱me we bechi wuka̱re ni̱bu Yafudame. Ka a kure, besii ka fwedu, yimu ka kura bwa, besi a kaiyan. Ka la chi a kur, a besi ni̱bu Yafudam wu fwiye, besi n ti yimu a ne kaiyadu.”
Yo n Yesu we ki̱fwa ya̱me, wuka tikake kan muraki̱ne a be fi a di̱Yesuwe a sung we a kakki̱ Yesuwangu a yi ko, “Fwa̱n mi̱nu a bwa a mabu ki̱twalang. Aya be yo ki̱mi̱n fa̱la̱ng, n yim ka kunnu.”
N Yesu a kun n ti Miyari̱m ki̱mu, a bunti̱ nii wu.
Wuka naye wu a ma swa̱tu kub chiri turab ki̱kur ki̱tume, a kanengi kuteng a twai ki̱ti̱ku luke wu n Yesu a do.
N ki̱n a yi we yikiyu ko, “Ka no n twayin ka luke ko, mang bedu.”
Kangu n Yesu a sabran a da̱ngangu a yi ko “Ma furi mwe mwe, fwa̱n mi̱n, keku bi̱yili̱mang mwangu a been. We fiko naye wu a be.”
Yinu n Yesu a le lo naba tikake a ku ni̱bu ki̱kura chimu n ti bi̱bu ki̱kira winimi kuuu!
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱kun mi̱n a fi. Fwa̱n di̱du a bwabu, ki̱da kana dum,” N chi a nu Yesumi̱n di̱nur swa̱baki̱n.
Yo ni̱bu a chir fi̱lange, n Yesu a le a tau fa̱la̱ng fwanangu, fwa̱nu a kun ti̱n.
Ya̱m bi̱bu a ti̱ra ti̱mi kwang.
N Yesu ki̱du fikoye, ki̱dubi burau a nabu ki̱n, ki̱yalti̱ chitu ko, “Bwe Dauda, nwe ki̱bune ni̱n.”
Tiyangu n Yesu a le wuka longu, ki̱dubi̱bu a be fiko, n Yesu a bi̱u ko, “Ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu mang medu mang be chi̱na?” N chi a ke ko, “A ne twayaku we Tewuduwe.”
Yinu a twai kwalangi chiyu a yiko, “Ti̱be, di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mang changu.”
Yinu kwalangi chiyu a wuden. We fiko, n Yesu a wu ki̱teli chiyu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Tifwa wuka mi̱nu chi a fwetu we.”
Aya n chi a chir, a ti̱r ya̱m Yesumu we yaa wuko n ti ti̱m bi̱ki̱mu ki̱ni kwang.
Yo n chi yaki̱ chirede, ni̱bu a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni wuka nii wu ki̱fi̱bti a la bwiyu n ki̱n a yimbi̱nang fwaanti̱ ya̱me.
Ki̱dangu ki̱fi̱bti a chirangu, di̱fun di̱du a fwa ya̱m. A ya̱r ki̱tuu ni̱be yii. N chi a yi ko, “Nang kuunbu ti̱tu chi we ti̱m Yisrelamu.”
Aya bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisamu a yi ko, “Ki̱ma nangangu ki̱ni dukan tikake Mai ki̱fi̱btiye.”
N Yesu a bunti̱n bi̱nti̱tu n ti beti̱ bi̱ntiyu ki̱miya ni̱bu mi̱nu we kambi muraki̱ chitu, ki̱fwa ya̱m bi̱li̱m Yaa Kwamamu, ki̱berati̱ buri̱ntu.
Yo n ki̱n a ku ki̱tuu ni̱be, a nwe ki̱bune chi, di̱ne n chi ki̱nwe riye yinang kwanti yiyu a ne naba toke wei.
Yinu a yi Miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Nangang kakkangu nabwe aya ni̱bu nangangmi bayim.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱twa̱ba̱ buni, ke Tewuduwe a tume ni̱bu nanganmu ke a kau.”
N Yesu a yal miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu a ni chi dukanu ka chaku ki̱fi̱bti, ka beti̱ buri̱ntu.
Ti̱tu nang di̱mbi fandubi̱bu kubchiri burab, n Simun wu ki̱yalu ko Biti̱r n ti Andi̱riya keko n ti Yakubu bwe Sa̱badi n ti Yowana ke ko.
N Filibu n ti Bartolomi n ti Toma n ti Matta wu ki̱yiu Sangkale n ti Yakubu bwe Alfiyus n ti Tadiyu.
N ti Simun naba Kanana, yinu n ti Yafuda Yiskariyoti wu n ki̱n a kwa̱l Yesuwe.
N Yesu a tum Miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu a ngau chimi̱nti̱ ki̱kure ko, “Ti̱yaduwe ni̱bu a yikayu kuuti. Ti̱nti̱ne ti̱ledu di̱kan bi̱n we Samariya.
Ti̱tibe bwa kwanti yi lairi ni̱bu Yisrelame.
Yati̱ mwa chi tiko, Yaa Kwama a mwatawe.”
Ti̱be bi̱bu a bubuwemu, ti̱kuku bi̱bu a bwarani̱mu, ti̱swar ni̱bu mwa̱limu, ti̱chaki̱ti̱ ki̱fi̱bti. Ta ta̱nbu ta̱ne, ti̱ ni ti̱miduwe miye.
Ti̱da̱du ti̱kan chi we yinang ka̱mbi̱r di̱du ta tani̱n chiin.
Ti̱da̱du wuka swe we n ti luke yurau n ti ka ki̱wamiye ka dwamenge, naba nanga a dakan ka ya chabtu kitu.
Kanang di̱di̱le bi̱n di̱du ta ledi̱ne, ta bau nii ki̱nwe tai Kwamaye, ti̱swe we lo wuko a lami̱nti̱ yo ta du fiko.
Ka yata le lo niye, ti̱si chi.
Lo a yiu chi̱ne, ti̱yo chimi̱n delaku, wu a ko chi̱ne, ti̱chir ti̱n ki̱ni li̱mang changu.
Lo a ne yiu chi̱ne ka, ka siti̱bu ki̱tele we ya̱m chime, Ti̱bu kuru we nani chiyu yo kano ti̱chiru, ti̱du lo wukonge.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, n Kwama ka nwe ki̱bune bi̱n Sodom n ti Komara we di kabaku Kwama ka la bi̱nti̱ ti̱tu a ko chinitu.
Da̱ng, mi̱n tumchi̱nu yinang kwanti a tibe bawutiye, di̱ne yiko, ti̱kasan yinang soti, ti̱tau bwanu yinang ki̱kubti.
Ti̱ma daandaang, di̱ne ni̱bu ka le kan kabaki̱nu ki̱ni chi̱n, ka twalachi̱nu we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu.
Di̱ne mi̱ne, ni̱bu ka yadi ki̱ni chi̱n a kakku bi̱duum n ti mati̱m, di̱ne di̱mwar di̱yili̱nu ta ma a kakku chiyanu n ti yikayu kuuti ti̱n.
Yo ka yadu ki̱ni chi̱n a kakke, ni̱tu chi̱ntu a kaiyaduwe chi ta fwaditu, di̱ne n ki̱n ka ni chi̱n chi ta fwaditu we ki̱swi wuko.
Di̱ne nii ka fwa ya̱me n ke chi̱n, Fi̱ki̱m Te chi̱n wu a diye ka fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu.
Ke ka ni keko ko ni̱bu a chi̱u, te ti̱n ka ni bweko, bwesi̱mu ka yaradu n ti bi̱bu a bi̱u chimu, ka yodu ni̱bu ka chi̱u tebu chimu.
Ni̱bu a yimbu Kwamamu ka ko chi̱nu di̱ne di̱n mi̱ne. Aya wu ka tidi ki̱ri̱ng ka lami̱nti̱ di swan kute, ka swidu.
Ka n chi a ni chi̱n riye we di̱kanu bi̱nne, ti̱wulti̱ di̱kan bi̱n. Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a ne ta ri kanaku kuti Yisrela, Bwe Nii ka bedu.
Miyare a labu naba yungke ko, ka̱be a labu naba loko.
Miyare ka nwe ta̱ma̱ng ka ka kadu yinang naba yungke ko, yinu ka̱be yinang naba loko ti̱n. Ka a yal teloko Bayalsebul we, yinu ka yal ni̱bu lomu ko wule?
Nangki̱n, ti̱wulu tayi chiyu we. A ne chi ti̱yingeri ti̱tu a ne wudeditu we. A ne ti̱lairi ti̱tu a ne kwa̱ladituwe.
Chitu mang fwa chimi̱n a bura tu, ti̱fwa yi kwa̱rikwa̱ri, ti̱lairitu mang fwaatu, ti̱fwa a fi̱lang yinang yilang.
Ti̱wulu bi̱bu ki̱chi̱u bwiyumu we, aya a ne chi̱u ti̱kuritu. Aya ka la chi ta wul Kwama ka chi̱u bwiyu n ti ti̱kuritu a far ki̱rane.
Ni̱bu ka medu ka ta̱n kwa̱la ki̱ni kobo wiina? A bwin yiko a ne wuka wu ka swidu we ti̱mu n Te chi̱n a yimbe we.
Kasi no nang ritu a duriti kwang n Kwama a yim.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱nwedu tayi we di̱ne n ti̱n ti̱la kwa̱la ki̱ni ki̱siyangu nabwen.
Kanang wuwule niye wu ka yung yikiyu ko n ki̱n wu mi̱n we kakku ni̱bange, mang yungti̱ ki̱nu we kakku Temi wu a diyengu.
Aya wu ka koyu we kakku ni̱bangi kwa̱rikwa̱riye, mang koti̱ ki̱nu we kakku Temi wu a diye.
Ti̱kamaduwe ti kanodu m be ti̱ti̱nitu mi̱ne ki̱ni li̱mang. Mang bebu di̱ne li̱mange aya di̱ne bi̱ngai.
Aya m be di̱ne, ke n yo di̱kulan we tibe te n ti bweko fwa̱n n ti neki̱n, yinu yire n ti nelaki̱n,
Fakware kawure ka kadu ni̱bu lokom.
Wu ka mi̱la teki̱n, ka n neki̱ne, ka la mi̱ne a lwebu ka kau miyare mi. Bi̱bu a mi̱la bwesi̱m bi̱bari̱m chimu, ka bi̱wuti̱m chimu a la chiye, a lwebu ka kau miyare mi.
Aya wu a ne da̱u ki̱tiyang bwang kangu ka bumiti̱ne, a lwebu ka kau miyare mi.
Wu ka mi̱la ti̱kuri kite, ka kwaladu. Wu ka kwala ti̱kuri kitu di̱ne mi̱ne, ka yadu.
“Wu ka yiu chi̱ne, a yiu mi̱n, aya wu a yiu mi̱ne, a yiu wu a tum mi̱ne.
Wu a yiu fa̱ku di̱ne n ki̱n fa̱kuwe, ka yiu sure fa̱kuwe. Yinu wu ka yiu naba yile di̱n n ki̱n naba yile, ka ya sure naba ni̱ri diine.
Aya wu ka nii wuka win we bi̱ti̱ri̱m bi̱bu, kasi no be kwa̱se wiin wu a mwe wu ki̱ri̱me, di̱ne n ki̱n miyare miye, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu a ne kwala ki̱ti̱me ko.”
Yo n Yesu a ngau Miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱n ki̱kure a riye, a du fiko, a yika miyaku n ti di̱mwar a bi̱ntu Ka̱lili.
Yo n Yowana we di̱bi̱nti̱lu a nwe chi m Masiya ki̱madite, a tum Miyari̱m ki̱mu we bwa di̱ki̱ne.
Yo n chi a lam bwako a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Fwa ni̱mi̱n, m mun nang wu ki̱beda, Ka wuka we ka beda?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ki̱lan ti̱fwa Yowana mi̱n chi ta kuutu n ti chi ta nweetu,
Bi̱bu a dwiyeni̱mu ki̱ku di, ki̱kubti̱mu ki̱ya yayyu, ni̱bu mwa̱limu ki̱bedu. Ti̱funitu ki̱nwedi, bi̱bu a no bwamu a kuntuwe, ti̱lusanitu a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mu.
N Kwama ka dela nii wu a katabu chi we keku bi̱yili̱m kangu a dur mi̱ne.”
Yo Miyari̱m Yowanamu a kun ki̱ki̱lade, n Yesu a fwa ki̱tuu ni̱be mi̱n ya̱m we dur Yowananu ko, “Yati̱ da̱nge wure we di̱chilachangi̱nu, yati̱ da̱nge ki̱fi̱be yinangu ki̱wile kwalunga?
Ka a newe yiko, yati̱ da̱nge wure? Nii wu a do kuli̱n di̱yili̱na? Kwako, bi̱bu ki̱do kuli̱n di̱yili̱ni̱mu a lo maiye.
Yinu fal yati̱ da̱nge wule? Fa̱kuwa? We yiko, n fwa chimi̱n, a lati̱ kasi fa̱ku.”
N Yowana nang wu tatti̱ki̱dai yika̱ri a mwal a dur ki̱n ko,
“N tume naba di̱tumbi̱re
mi a ti mi̱n kakku,
wu ka do mi̱n wa̱re ke m be mi̱ne.”
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, we bi̱bu a ya bi̱be nayemu, we ti̱ti̱nitu a bi̱nbi̱ wuka we yinang Yowana naba Batisma ki̱ni dwiyentu. Aya ki̱ni yiko, wuti̱re we Yaa Kwama, a la ki̱n ki̱ni dwiyentu.
A mwetewe ki̱dangu n Yowana a ya ki̱ma Batisma a lanta ki̱ka̱ng, Yaa Kwama ki̱fi̱rsi̱du ki̱chakakku, aya ni̱bu muli̱ni̱mu ki̱fi̱rsi̱du ki̱ni dukan.
A lami̱nti̱ ki̱dang Yowanangu fa̱kubu n ti yili̱n Musatu a fwa ya̱m we Yaa Kwama;
Ka ta ke bi̱yili̱m we ya̱m bi̱be, n Yowana nang Yiliya wu a no ka bede.
Wu ki̱ni ki̱teliye, a nwe.
Ki̱ka̱ngu mang swe ki̱dang ki̱ku ki̱ni wureni? N chi yinang bwesi̱mu a kwa̱mari̱m, bi̱bu ki̱yita ya̱m a bwiti chi ko,
“Ni̱n ngau chimi̱n ki̱kunti,
ta yibbu were;
Ni̱n yi̱ngla chimi̱n wi bwa,
ta kiti̱bu wi.”
Nangki̱n, n Yowana a be, a chabu, a nobu, n chi a yi ko ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti.

Bwe Nii a be ki̱chadu, ki̱nodu. N chi a yi ko, kwa̱ri̱m a lala ki̱chadu ki̱no ti̱du. Ki̱ bwa̱lu n ti ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱m n ti ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m. Ni̱bu ki̱swaanu ko n Kwama ki̱ma chi a da yo ni̱bu ki̱ku wa̱ri yingku ni̱bu ki̱miye.
Yinu n Yesu a mwe ki̱ wela bi̱nti̱tu n ki̱n a mwe mi̱ne chi ka̱ta̱kitu, di̱ne n chi a wobu ki̱ti̱m.
Yinu a yiko, “A no chi̱n Korasinu n ti Betsaida kano nangi̱n ti̱dui ti̱tu a chi ka̱ta̱kitu man ma a di̱chi̱nengu, a Taya n ti Sidome a no yadu a wo ki̱ti̱m feredi ki̱ni buken ka do tiyaksani kuli̱ni.
Aya mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, we dimwatake ka nwe ki̱bune Taya n ti Sidon ka la ti̱chintu.
Aya m mun Kafanawu, mwang ma wureni wu delaki̱ mwangu ka lan diye? Ko bayim, mwang ngau duru a far ki̱rang. Ka no chi ka̱ta̱kitu mang ma a di̱chi̱netu m ma a Sodome, a no lanta di a ne kaiyadu.
A dakan ta yindu ko dimwatake ka nwe ki̱bune Sodome ka la di̱chi̱nu.”

We ki̱swi wu n Yesu a yi ko, “Mi̱n delanu Tete, Tewuduwe wu a dii n ti ti̱me, mwang mabe di̱ne mwang lai ni̱bu ko chi kasani̱mu n ti bi̱bu ko chi yim chimu ti̱te, mwang mabe ti̱n di̱ne mwang yung bi̱ti̱ri̱mu mi̱ne.
Nangki̱n Tete, ti̱tu nang chi mwang da̱ng a le mi̱n a ni̱re.
“N Temi a ni chiti kwang. A ne wu a yim Bwe we ka n ke Te. Ti̱nti̱ne a ne wu a yim Te we ka n ke Bwe n ti bi̱bu Bwe a ke ka yung chi̱di̱mu.
“Ti̱be bwa a di̱mi̱ne, n ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang, n ti̱n bi̱bu ta twibwi we da̱ku kuli̱n turengmu, ma ni chi̱n fi̱kaku.
Ti̱yiu nangangu mang ni chi̱nangu yinangu tangka ka da̱u ki̱tiyang Ka̱rmangu, ti̱miyan a di̱mi̱ne, m mi̱n ki̱ni bwanu mang kukki̱bu dur mi̱nu, yinu ta ya fi̱kaku we dutu chi̱ntu.
Ki̱tiyang Ka̱rma mangu a ne bwar we, chi mang yi mi ti̱ma a swe bunge.”
We diko, n Yesu a suwe kuni alkamayu a difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame. Di̱ne chune, miyari̱m ki̱mu a le ki̱kiya ti̱changri alkamaitu ki̱kudu.
Yo ni̱bu Farisamu a ku ti̱te, n chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Da̱ng miyari̱m mumu ki̱ma chi yilang a ko makitu difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam.”
A ki̱nta chi ko, ta kibu chi n Dauda a ma ki̱dangu n ki̱n n ti fati̱bu ki̱mu a nwe chunanga?
N Dauda n ti fati̱bu ki̱mu a le Kan Kwama na Wurchalimanu ki̱dangu chun a buwangu, a chau ki̱danne wu a nike we,
Ka ta kibu we yilang Musangu yinangu fanseti ki̱ki yilang difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame we Kan Kwama di̱duna Wurchalimanu, ki̱chiru a ne ki̱lewenga?
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, nii wu a la kan Kwamane n we fi.
Ka no ti̱yim chi ti̱kwa̱liyi ti̱tu ki̱yungditu ko, “Mi̱n bau ni̱r ki̱bune n ke niku ki̱tumangite.” A no ta swa̱babu bi̱bu yinang Kwamamu.
Nangki̱n, Bwe Nii nang Tewuduwe difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam.
N Yesu a du fiko a le di̱kan kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudam.
Wuka nii we fiko wu fa̱la̱ngu a ngi̱rmane, yade n chi ki̱bau wa̱re wu ka tan Yesu ki̱ni ki̱le, a bi̱u Yesu ko, we yilangu, “A le ni ma nangang bekangu we difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ka wukane chi̱n ki̱ni kwamiye, yinu a yar a bwir difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam, fangko a ne chakeda?”
Nii a la kwami ki̱da yile? A le ni ma chi ti̱yilitu difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam n ti ki̱ku ni lekadu a lireku yili̱nangu.
Yinu a yi nii wuko ko, “Tare fa̱la̱ngu. Nii wu a tar fa̱la̱ngu, fa̱la̱ngu a yati̱ li̱mangu yinang kangu fa̱la̱ng no wemi̱nang.”
Aya ni̱bu Farisamu a chir, a yikan yaka dokadu yinangu n chi ka medu ka chi̱u Yesuwangu.
Tiyangu n Yesu a swaan chitangu, a du fiko, ni̱bu nabwen a bunti̱ ki̱n we bwa a ya mi̱ne, n ki̱n a bera ni̱bi kwang.
A ngau chimi̱nti̱ ki̱kure ko, “Ti̱fwaduwe ka m mi̱n n wure.”
Ti̱tu a fwe ke a ri chitu fa̱ku Yichaya a fwaatu ko,
“Bwe nangangemi,
nang wu mang mi̱lane,
wu a le ni̱r mi̱ne,
mang ri ki̱nu ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m mi̱mu,
yinu mang mwata
kuuti mi̱n bi̱yili̱mu.
A ne kwila chi, a ne kukku keer ki̱nu.
A ne le nelo ki̱ni didi̱kuni̱n.
Bi̱bu a ki̱tani̱mu n ki̱n ka
tau chidu ki̱ni bwanu,
yinang swa̱ku ki̱ku a bwa wuri̱mang.
N ki̱n ka maka bi̱bu keku bi̱yili̱mang
chiyangu ki̱bwadimu ka tidi ki̱ri̱ng,
ka lami̱n ti̱n yo yile ka chau ki̱la we bwila.
Di̱n ki̱nu ka kadu n nang
fi kuuti ka yoon ni̱re.”
Yinu n chi a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni wuka nii wu ki̱fi̱bti a tau a kubudi ki̱lwa̱bi̱dulwa̱be, n Yesu a be nii wu, ki̱kudi, ki̱fwati̱ ya̱mu.
Ni̱bi kwang a ya̱r yii, ki̱fwadu ko, “Wu nangki̱ bwe Dauda?”
Aya yo ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a yi ko, “N ki̱n ki̱chaku ki̱fi̱bti di̱ne tikake Mai chi n Bayalsebul a ni dukan ko a ma ti̱te.”
Aya n Yesu a swan ti̱kuran chitu, a yi chi ko, “Ka bi̱ngai a le ti̱m ni̱bu me, yare a be we ti̱m bi̱ki̱mu. Ti̱nti̱ne, ti̱mu ki̱ma bi̱ngai mu, a ne ti kwiru.
Ka n Setan ki̱ kaka Setane, a yung n chi a newe fiwiine. Yaako ka tidi yire?
Ka mi̱n chaku ki̱fi̱bti ki̱ni dukan Bayalsebul ne, bi̱chimu ki̱chaki̱di dukan wuren? N chi ka mwata ya̱m chimu.
Aya ka mi̱n chaki̱ ki̱fi̱bti ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame, a yung Yaa Kwama a be chimi̱ne.”
A ne wu ka le lo naba dukane ka ma kuute we, ka a mwebu a kwababu nii we, yinu ka ya da ka ma kuuti̱te?
Nii wu a ne we ware n ti mi̱ne, fakware mi, nii wu a makaibu murke ki̱yaiyuyaiye.
Di̱ne yiko mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka nang wuwule ki̱le n ti swa̱bane, n Kwama ka du ni̱bu mi̱nu aya a ne du wu a swa̱ba di̱n Fi̱ki̱m Kwamane.
Kanang wuwule niye wu a tu Bwe Nii, ka du ki̱mi̱nu aya a ne du wu a swa̱ba Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame mi̱nu ki̱diya kwadu.
“Do tiyangu a le ka mun bau ti̱kulan ti̱yiliye. Ka tiyangu a lebe a ne tu chi ti̱yili. Ni swaan tiyangu a ti̱kulan ki.
Ti̱n soti yikwaniyu, ta medu ta fwa ti̱yiliti yire, kangu n ti̱n bi̱bwilamangu? Di̱ne ya̱mu bi̱bu a ni̱ri̱mu nang bi̱bu ki̱chire fi̱langi̱mu.
Nii wu yile, ki̱fwa chi ti̱yili ti̱tu n ki̱ni ki̱n a ni̱ritu. Wu bwila yiko ti̱n, ki̱chake ti̱bwilai ti̱tu a ni̱r ki̱ni.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a mwintuwe ka nang bi̱bi̱le ya̱m bi̱kusum bi̱bu ni̱bu ki̱fwadi̱me, ka le kabaku we kakku Kwamangu.
Ti̱kwa̱liyi mwitu nang chi ka chaki̱nu, yinu n nanti̱ chi ka kaiyine.”
Yinu bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisa n ti ni̱bu yungku yilangmu a yi ko, “Naba yungke, ni̱n baddu mwang yung ni̱n chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu ka kau ni̱mi̱n di̱mwali.”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Di̱kalan di̱bwilan di̱du ki̱ma ka ti̱kuli n ke ni̱bu ni̱ri diini̱m we kakku Kwamangu! A ne di̱kan di̱mwal we di̱du a la di̱du a fa̱ku Yunanangu.
Yinangu n Yunana a ma ditiyi yitta kuko n ti kum we fur chi̱nge wuduwengu, we yiko ti̱n Bwe Nii ka ma ditiyu yitta kuko n ti kum we ni̱r ki̱ti̱mi̱nu.

“We dimwatake ni̱bu Ni̱ni̱bemu ka kunu ware n ti di̱kalan di̱du. N chi ka mwata ni̱bu di̱kalan di̱di̱nu mi̱nu ko n chi bi̱bwilam, di̱ne n chi a wo ki̱ti̱m we di̱mwar Yunanangu. A ya wu a la Yunana ki̱ni dwiyene n nang wu.

We dimwatake, Cheba wuwiye Mai a ne kedu ki̱ni di̱kalan di̱du, ka yung chidu ko n chi bi̱bwilam, di̱ne n ki̱n a chire a bwa twa̱re ke be ki̱nwe dukan ya̱m yingku Mai Solomon. Aya mi̱n fwa chi mi̱nu wu a la Solomone we fi.
“Yo ki̱fi̱be wu bwila a chir we bwi niye, ki̱bwa̱ladu we fantiyu ki̱bau fi̱kaku. Ka a yaabe,
“N ki̱n ki̱yidu ko, ‘Mang ki̱lati̱ nii no mang swe mi̱ne we.’ Ka a be aya lo nga̱ra̱nge.

Ka ki̱ladu ka ka̱re yikai ki̱fi̱bti yi̱di̱bi̱n yiyu a la ki̱n ki̱ni bwilayu, ka le lo wu n ki̱n a fi̱rene ka sweduwe. We ki̱ku ki̱dang, da nii we ka kaiyadu ka la wu kake. Nang tiyangu ka fwedu ki̱ni di̱kalan di̱dangu.”
Yo a lekan ki̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱me, kebu ki̱mu a lam fi̱lang. N chi a ke ka fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱m.
Wuka we ni̱bu a fikomu a yi ki̱n ko, “Da̱ng! N ne mun n ti kebu mumu a fi̱lang. N chi ki̱baddu ka fwa ya̱m n ti mun.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “N Nemi nang wure? Kemi nang wure?”
A yung miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “N nemi n ti kebu mi̱mu nang bi̱bu n ni̱n waremu!
Nangki̱n, wu ki̱tum ki̱ke Temi wu a diye, nang kebumi̱m n ti nemi.”
We diko n Yesu a chir we lo, a ya swe a ki̱ti̱ki̱ laang.
Di̱ne ki̱tuu ni̱be a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe, n ki̱n a fi̱l kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a swe we, a du ni̱bu we ki̱ti̱ki̱ laangu.
N ki̱n a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱mu nabwen ki̱ni baltaku, a yi chi ko, “Wuka naba kuwe a yaki̱fiye duum.
Yo yaki̱ wau dume, bi̱kamu duum a twakan a wa̱re, ki̱ni̱biyu a be sibati̱n.
Bi̱kamu a yar a fi a kaliye wu a ne ki̱ti̱m we nabwene, a ki ti̱ni datu. Aya di̱ne a ne ki̱ti̱m we nabwene,
yo kuko a fwe, a twi ti̱n. Di̱ne a ne ki̱ti̱mu ka swe kiyineng mi̱n we.
Bi̱kamu a yar a fi a kwa̱da, kwa̱da a li̱ngke dumu a kiyemu a yimbu dwiyedu.
Bi̱kamu a yar a ti̱m bi̱yili̱m, a chir ki̱kutiyu kulitu wan turukun turukun, bi̱kamu wan ti̱ta ti̱ta.
Wu ki̱ni ki̱teliye a nwe.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a be a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “A mayire mun fwa chi mi̱n ya̱mu ki̱ni baltake?”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, kana chi̱n bi̱bu a ki̱nta chii̱mu ti̱yim ti̱laiyiri ti̱tu a Yaa Kwamatu, aya bi̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱mi̱mu a yimbu.
Aya wu ki̱ni chiye ka yiddu we nabwen, ke n ki̱n a ri chibu. Aya wu a ne we ki̱ne, kono nang ti̱tu a fa̱la̱ng kangitu n ki̱n ka kwalati̱nu.
Nang chi a yo mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu ki̱ni baltake.
Kasi ki̱ku ki̱kudangu,
a kubu chi.
Kasi ki̱ku ki̱nwedangu,
a swaanbu.
Ya̱m fa̱ku Yichayamu a ri a di̱chiye ko,
“Tani̱n nwedu,
aya a ne ta swaanu.
Tani̱n da̱ngdu, aya a neta ku chiki.
Di̱ne ni̱tu ni̱bu bi̱bitu a ma kuli̱n
ki̱teli chiyu a nwebu di.
A sume kwalangi chiyu,
Ko ke chi swaanu we ki̱ni kwa̱la̱ngiyu.
Yinu ke chi nwe ti̱nuwe ki̱ni ki̱teli chiyu.
Di̱ne ke chi swaanu we ni̱tu chitu,
Ko ke chi ki̱ladu bwa di̱mi̱ne we, n be chi.”
“Aya we di̱chi̱ne! kwa̱la̱ngi chiyu ki̱kudu yinu ki̱teli chiyu ki̱nweti̱nu.
N fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, fa̱kubu nabwen n ti ni̱bu ni̱ri dini̱mu a bau ka ku ti̱tu ta kuutu, aya n chi a kubu, a bau ka nwe chitu ta nwetu, aya n chi a nwebu.
“N Yesu a fwa chi baltaku ki̱yungde.
N ki̱n a yi ko, ka ni a nwe ya̱m Yaa Kwamamu a swaanbe, fakware ki̱ful ki̱nu ka yiti̱tti̱ ya̱m Kwamamu a no a ni̱ri̱mu.
Ya̱m duumu a yar a kalimu, a ti we wu a nwe ya̱mu, a yiu, a kwar ti̱n kani yurabe.
Aya yade ya̱mu a mabu ki̱yineng we ni̱re, a baki̱swi bayim, yo riye n ti fumaku a kune di̱ne ya̱m Kwamame, n ki̱n ki̱ki̱ladi kuteng.
Wu a yar a kwa̱da, nang wu a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu, aya ti̱ti̱nitu n ti kuli kitu a da̱u ti̱kuran kitu, a kwaba ki̱n, a yimbu ma nangang Kwamangu.
Aya duumu a yar a ti̱m bi̱yili̱mu, ki̱fwa nii wu a yiu ya̱m Kwamamu a swaan ti̱ne, duum ki̱mu ki̱chir chabti̱tu kuul, wani turukun, bi̱kamu wani ti̱ta.”
N Yesu a fwa chimi̱n kaang baltaku ko: Yaa diye ni swe ti̱nu ki̱ni wuka nii wu a ya fiye dum bi̱yili̱m a kuu ko.
Aya yo ni̱bu a dara duumi ki̱ni kume, fakware ko a ya fiti̱ ki̱kweri we duum bi̱yili̱m ki̱mu a yika ti̱n.
Yo chaam a mwe ki̱yo fili̱ntu we dutu chite, ki̱kweri a kwa̱la̱n.
Ni̱bu nangangmu a yi ki̱n ko, “Tete, mare n fi duum bi̱yili̱m we kuu, ki̱kweri a taa bwa̱le?”
N ki̱n a yi ko, “Fakware a ma nangang ki̱ku.” Naba nangange a bi̱u ko, “Ni ya, ni kub, ni kur a bwa?”
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Kwako,” ka ni kub ki̱kweri, ni kai duumi ki̱n.
Ti̱du a dwiye ware a lami̱nti̱n ki̱swi kakke, we ki̱swi kakke, mang yi ni̱bu ki̱swidi̱mu mi, ti̱mur bi̱yili̱mu n ti ki̱kweri dangdang. Ti̱twi ki̱kweriyu aya bi̱yili̱mu ti̱kur a bi̱ne.
N Yesu a fwa chimi̱nti̱ kaang baltaku ko, “Yaa wu a diye ni swedii ki̱kwi ki̱si̱raiye wu nii a wau a kuu ko.
Kasi ki̱ku ki̱kwi wuti̱rengu aya ka a dwiyene, ki̱kau tiyang ki̱duwang we lambu, ki̱ni̱biyu beki̱ mati̱ ki̱kuli we ki̱yangtikiyu.”
N Yesu a fwa chimi̱nti̱ kaang baltaku ko, “Yaa wu a diye yinang yis wu naye a se n ti miim a lami̱nti̱ yo a fuwe.”
N Yesu a fwa ki̱tuu ni̱be mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bi kwang ki̱ni baltaku. A ne bi̱kam ya̱m we bi̱bu n ki̱n a fwa chi mi̱nbu ki̱ni baltakumu we.
Ti̱tu a ri chitu fa̱ku Kwama Yichaya a fwaatu ko,
“Mang fwa ya̱mu
ki̱ni baltaku,
Mang fwa ti̱tu a lai feredi yo
n Kwama a mwe a yo ti̱ti̱nite.”
N Yesu a du ki̱tuu ni̱be a le lo, miyari̱m ki̱mu a nabu a yi ki̱n ko, “Fwa ni̱mi̱n chi baltaku a ki̱kweri chami ki̱yungde.”
A yi chi ko, “Nii wu a fi duum bi̱yili̱me nang Bwe Nii.
Kuu nang ti̱ti̱nitu, duum bi̱yili̱mu nang bwesi̱m yaamu, yinu ki̱kweri nang bwesi̱m fakwaremu.
Fakware wu a fi ki̱kweriye nang Setan. Ki̱swi kake, nang kunki̱ ti̱ti̱niyangu, ni̱bu swiki̱mu nang ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu.
“Yinangu a swi ki̱kweri a twiyangu, yiko we di swan kute.
Bwe Nii ka tume ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu, n chi ka chaku ki̱kweri we yaa ko n ti chi ki̱yo ki̱letiye n ti ni̱bu ki̱ma ki̱leti mu.
Ka mar chidu a ki̱rang ki̱bwilang we bwanu n chi kani̱n kira wiini, n ti ki̱rti̱ku numang.
We ki̱swi wuko, ni̱bu ni̱ri dini̱mu ka yiidu yinang kuko we yaa Te chiye. Nii ka nwede, a nwe.
“Yaa diye yinang kuli ti̱lairi a wuka kuu. Nii a ya, a ki̱la laituwe. Aya di̱ne ti̱mi̱lane a yikan, a ya feku kuli̱n ki̱ni kwang a be tani̱n kuu wu.
“Ti̱nti̱n, Yaa Kwama yinang ni wu ki̱feku kuli̱n a kwa̱mba̱r ki̱ babba kaliyi wulbi̱wulbiye.
Yo n ki̱n a ya wu a la chiye, a yikan, a ya feku ti̱tu n ti̱u ki̱niti kwang a be a ta̱n kale wu.
“Ti̱nti̱ne, Yaa Kwama yinang ni̱bu ki̱tau chingi yo a mai dwa̱ka we laa a woo chingiyi nabwen.
“Yo a riye, fangimchi̱m a chake, a ki̱ti̱ku laang. Yinu n chi a swe we ki̱ti̱ku laang, a chaku yiyiliyu a yo a ki̱ti̱ng, a kur yiyu a lebiyu a bwa.
Ka kadu yiko we kunku di swan kutengu. Ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu ka bedu ka chaku bi̱yili̱mu we bi̱bwilamu.
Ka kur chidu a far ki̱rangin, fi n chi ka kiin wii ka ki̱rti̱n numme.
“Ti̱swaan ti̱ta?” N chi a ke ko, “Ngo,”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Kanang chikiye ti̱tu a yung ka nang wuwule naba yungku yili̱ne, yinang fangko lo wu a wo kuli̱n di̱ka̱ri̱nu n ti di̱fwinu we kan ki̱ne.”
Yo n Yesu a ri fwaku ya̱mi yiye, a du fiko a chakakku,
Yo a yika bi̱n ki̱ne, a mwe ki̱miya chimi̱nu we kambi muraki̱ Kwamatu, n chi a ya̱r yii ki̱yidu ko, “Nii wu a ya yingki̱ku n ti dukan chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu a fi̱re?”
Wu n ke bwe kafinta? N ke wu n neki̱n m Maryamuwa? Kebi̱ ki̱mu n ke Yakubu n ti Yusufu n ti Simun n ti Yafuda?
Bi̱wuti̱m ki̱mu, n ke bi̱bu n chi̱ni ware kwadi̱ma? N ki̱n a ya bi̱bu ya̱m a fi̱re?
N Yesu a yi chi ko, Fa̱ku Kwama ki̱ni ki̱siyang kasi no a fi̱re a bwin bi̱n ki̱nu n ti loko.
Di̱ne n chi a kebu bi̱yili̱me, n ki̱n a mabu chi ka̱ta̱kitu we bwako nabwen.
We ki̱swi wuko, m Mai Yiridu a nwe ya̱m Yesumu.
A yi ni̱bu ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n nangangmu ko, “Wu nang Yowana naba Batisma, wu a kuntewe fure. Nang chi a yo ki̱ni dukanu ki̱mang chi ka̱ta̱kite.”
Nangki̱n m Mai Yiridu a tau Yowana a kwau a di̱bi̱nti̱l di̱ne n ki̱n a da̱u Yirudiya naye ke ko n Filibu.
Di̱ne n Yowana a tau ki̱mwa Yiridu ko, “We yilangu, a dakabu mwang bau Yirudiya.”
N Yiridu ki̱baddu ka chi̱u Yowana aya n ki̱n ki̱nwe tayi ni̱biyu, di̱ne n chi a da̱u Yowana fa̱ku Kwama.
Aya yo di ni̱bu a bi̱n Yiridu a kanenge, fwa̱n Yirudiya a yiu chimi̱n yilang. Ti̱tu a li̱ma Yiridu ni̱r.
N ki̱n a mwe ki̱ni di̱twa̱mbi̱r ko, “N twa̱m mi̱n, chi mun badditu mang ni̱nu.”
N ki̱n a ma nangangu ki̱ni ya̱m ne ki̱ni̱mu a yi ko, “Yo miye dur Yowana naba Batisma a kwa̱se ki̱ka̱ng we fi.”
M Mai a kai ni̱r, aya di̱ne di̱twa̱mbi̱ru n ki̱n a tu a manu, a yi ni̱bu ko a ma befwa̱ne mi̱n chi ki̱badditu.
N ki̱n a yo ni̱bu a biye dur Yowana we di̱bi̱nti̱lu.
A be ki̱ni dur Yowana a kwa̱se a ni fwa̱nu, wuko a yiu, a ya niti̱ neki̱n.
Miyari̱m Yowanamu a be, a da̱u kwa̱me a ya fur, a yikan a ya fwa Yesu mi̱n.
Yo n Yesu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a fi̱l kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a du fiko, a yika wuka fi n ki̱kun. Yo ki̱tuu ni̱be a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a duwe bi̱nti̱ chitu a bunti̱ Yesu ki̱ni nani.
Yo n Yesu a su we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a ku muraki̱ ni̱bangu nabwene. A nwe ki̱bune chi, yinu a bera chi mi̱n buri̱ntu.
Ki̱ni me, miyari̱m ki̱mu a be fi a di̱ki̱ne a yi ko, “Fi a ma di̱kir, di a le. Yai ki̱tuu ni̱be, yo ni̱bu a yika bi̱ntu chi ke a ya ta̱n chabtu.”
Yesu a yi chi ko, “A dakabu ka ki̱ladu, ti̱ni chabti̱tu.”
N chi a yi Yesu ko. “A ne chabtu we kana ki̱daniyi yunuyu n ti chingiyi yurau.”
“A yi chi ko, ti̱be miye ki̱n.”
A yi ki̱tuu ni̱be ko, ti̱sweswe we swa̱ki̱ku. A da̱u ki̱daniyu n ti chingiyu, a kuku kabu a dii, a wana Kwama, a wulan a ni miyari̱m ki̱mu, bi̱ki̱mu a kera ni̱bu mi̱n.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a chau a lwe. A mur ti̱bukentu a rii ti̱ti̱ngriti kub chiri turau.
Bi̱bu a chabi̱mu kwartabu kuniriti tunu a bwin nati̱bu n ti bwesi̱mu.
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yabu wuka bale. A du ki̱n we fiko ka yo ki̱tuu ni̱be a ya li̱mang.
A kuteng ki̱ku a yo ki̱tuu ni̱bengu, a fi̱l kun n ki̱kun, a twa̱ba̱ bunitu we. Di a le ki̱n we bwako.
We ki̱swi wuko, kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a tibe laa, labi mwetu ki̱yingledu, ki̱fi̱be a nibu chi da suku di̱ne ki̱ni dukan.
Ki̱ni kunsin, n Yesu a fwadu miyari̱mu mi̱ntuwe ki̱bedu a di a mwe.
Yo miyari̱mu a ku ki̱n ki̱faduwe mwe, ni̱tu chitu a ti̱ren. N chi a bwe kemi ko, “Waa butu!”
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Kwako! Ti̱wulu we, m mi̱n.”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, ka nang mune, ke n ya bwa di̱mune we di a mwe.”
Yesu a yi ko, “Be.” M Biti̱r a su we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ki̱yadu we dii a mwe, ki̱yika bwa di̱Yesuwe.
Yo n ki̱n a ku ki̱fi̱be la, ni̱ru a ti̱ren, n ki̱n a mwe ki̱su mure mwe. N ki̱n a bwe keme ko, “Tewuduwe! Yui.”
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a tar fa̱la̱ngu a tau. A yi ko “M mun wu keku bi̱yili̱m mwangu a ki̱tane, mun kama wule?”
Yo n chi a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ki̱fi̱be a ti ti̱n.
Bi̱bu we mure kwa̱mbi̱re mwemu a sii ki̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, m mun Bwe Kwama.”
Yo n chi a yabu la, a si̱ka ti̱m Chanesa̱ret.
Kangu ni̱bu a bi̱ni̱mu a swan ko n Yesuwangu, n chi a na yilang we ti̱m chimu a da̱u ti̱na ki̱dire. Ni̱bu a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni bi̱bu a burani̱mu.
N chi a wana ki̱n ko a du bi̱bu a bubuwemu a twai kasi no nang luke ko, bi̱bu a twayimi kwang a be.
Bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisa n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musantu a be a Wurchalima a bi̱u Yesu ko,
“Wureni a yo miyari̱m mumu a bunti̱bu da seli̱be? A nurabu fa̱li chiyu yo n chi yaka chau chabti̱tu we da chi̱re.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Yinu a mayire n ti̱n tiko yili̱n Kwamatu di̱ne da tukebu chime?
Di̱ne n Kwama a yi ko, ‘Bunti̱ ya̱m temun n ti ne muni̱mu. Wu ka tu Teki̱n ka n neki̱ne, a lwe ka bwadu.’
Aya ti̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱nu ko, nii wu ki̱ni chii ka maka te ki̱n ka ne ki̱ne, ki̱yidu ko, ‘Chi no ta yadu we di̱ mi̱ne n yo Kwama mi̱n.’ A yung a nibu tebu ki̱mu dwiyentu ti̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱nu.
A dabu yiko n ki̱n ka ni teki̱n n ti neki̱n dwiyentu. Kanang chikiye, ya̱m Kwamamu a kau bi̱kusum di̱ne dati chiyu.
Ni̱bu di̱bebelin! N Yichaya a ma fa̱kuitu a yi ko,
‘Ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱delayu ka yii,
ni̱tu chitu kutan n ti mi̱n.
N chi ki̱sii mi̱nu kwako,
di̱ne ki̱miya yili̱n ni̱bii
n ke ti̱tu a Kwamai.’ ”
N Yesu a yale ki̱tuu ni̱be a yi ko, “Ti̱nwe, ti̱swaan ti̱n.
Chi ki̱leda yiye n ke chi ka kai niye, aya chi ki̱chiredu a yiitu, nang chi ka kaiyinu we kakku Kwamange.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a be a yi ki̱n ko, “Mwang yim mwi ni̱bu Farisamu a kai ni̱r ki̱ni ya̱m muma?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Kanang ki̱ki̱le tiyang ki̱ku n Temi a fibange, ka kukki̱nu a ti̱yini̱n.
Ti̱du ki̱dubi̱bu ki̱twa̱ki̱ ki̱dubi̱mu. Ka ki̱du ka twa̱ku keko ki̱duwe, n chi kwang ka fi̱tadu a kee.”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Fwa chi baltaku ki̱yungde.”
N Yesu a bi̱u chi ko, “N ti̱n we di̱ti̱ti chika?
Ka chitu a le yiiye, a bunti̱ fur, a chirti̱bu a bwa?”
Aya chi ki̱chiredu a yiiye, ki̱chiredu a ni̱r, nang chi ki̱kai nii we kakku Kwamange.
Chitu ki̱chiredu a ni̱ritu nang ti̱tu; ti̱kuran ti̱bwilai, chikku, ti̱kuli, kuutu, ti̱kwani n ti swa̱ba ku nii.
Ti̱tu nang chi ki̱kai ni̱ritu we kakku Kwamangu, aya chaku chitangu ki̱ni kaniyu a nurabunurane yinangiyu a kaibu ni̱ru we kakku Kwamangu.
Yo n Yesu a du fiko, a yikan Taya n ti Sidon.
Wuka naye Kananiya a be a fwa ya̱m ki̱ni dukan ko, “Nwe ki̱bune mi Tewuduwe, Bwe Dauda! Wuka ki̱fi̱bti ki̱ni fwa̱n mi̱nu riye.”
N Yesu a fwabu ya̱m. Yinu miyari̱m ki̱mu a be a fuma ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, naye wu ki̱fun ni̱mi̱n ki̱teli.”
A yi chi ko, “A tum mi̱ne a kwanti yilairi Yisrela.”
Naye wu a be, a sung we kaki̱kku ko, “Makai, Tewuduwe.”
A ke ko, “A ne ka ledu ni da̱u chabtu bwesi̱mitu niing ni kadati.”
Naye a ke ko “Yiko Tewuduwe, aya kasi no nang kadatiyu, ki̱ chiba ti̱buken ti̱tu ki̱twakadu a fi ni̱bu ki̱chan chabte we naba lo chi.”
N Yesu a ke naye mi̱n ko, “Nelo, keku bi̱yili̱mang mwangu nabwen. Chi mwang bi̱be n ya. Fwa̱n ki̱nu a be ti̱n we ki̱dang kangu.”
N Yesu a du bwako, ki̱bunti̱ bale a la Ka̱liliye. A ya, a fi̱l bale kunne a swe we.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen a be we di̱ki̱ne. Bi̱ba ngi̱rmani̱mu n ti ki̱dubi̱bu n ti ki̱kubtiyu n ti ti̱funitu n ti bi̱kamu nabwen, a yo chi we kakku kangu, a be ki̱ni chi.
Ni̱bu nabwen a ya̱r yii kangu a ku ti̱funitu ki̱fwa ya̱m, ki̱kubtiyu a swa̱r, bi̱bu a ngi̱rmani̱mu ki̱ya yayu, ki̱dubi̱bu ki̱ku diyangu. N chi a dela Kwama Yisrela.

N Yesu a yale miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi chi ko, mi̱n nwe ki̱bune ni̱bu bi̱be, n chi we ware n ti mi̱n we diti yiyu a ne chi ka chaditu we. Mang kebu ka ki̱ladu ki̱ni chunu ke ki̱la wuka nii a ki̱taduwe wa̱re.
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Fi a ne nii we, nang ya ki̱danniyu a fi̱re, wu ka lwe ki̱tuu ni̱be?”
N Yesu a bi̱u chi ko, n Ti̱ni ki̱ni ki̱danniyi yile? N chi a yi ko, “Yi̱di̱bi̱n, n ti beti̱ chi̱ngi bayim.”
N Yesu a yo ni̱bu a sweran a ti̱m.
A da̱u ki̱danniyu n ti chingiyu, a twa̱ba̱ buni a di̱Kwama, yinu a wulan a ni miyari̱mu, bi̱ki̱mu a kera ni̱bumi̱n.
N chi kwang a chau a dutuwe. A kuteng ki̱ku, miyari̱mu a ke ti̱bukentu a dubitu ti̱ti̱ngriti ti̱dibin.
Ni̱bu a chabi̱mu kuniriti taana, a bwin nati̱bu n ti bwesi̱mu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a yo ni̱bangu, a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika ti̱m Maka̱da̱m.
Ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu Sadukiyamu a be ka swe Yesu ki̱ni di̱bi̱du ko, “Yung ni̱n di̱mwal di̱du a chi ka̱ta̱kiin di̱du a chire a bwadi.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Wuka yo ki̱ni me, dii kwa̱didi, ti̱yidu tiko fi̱nenang ti̱mu ka woradi nga̱ra̱ng.
Ki̱ni si̱n ka ti̱ku twiye a dili ki̱liye, ti̱yidu ko, ‘Yaka swi mwe.’ Ti̱yim dwadi wu, a chi nui chiyu a kuuwe, aya ta yimbu tiyangu ta fwa chi ki̱fwedu a ki̱dang ki̱kitu.
Ki̱dang ki̱bwilang ki̱ku ti̱kuli a ni̱bu a yimbu Kwamam, ki̱baddu ka ku chi ka̱ta̱ki, aya a ne chi ka̱ta̱kitu ka yung chi̱nitu we, ka a su ti̱ttu a di̱Yunanatu.” Yinu n Yesu a du chi a yikan.
Yo miyari̱mu a lam wuka bale we nabwe fare, yinu a kur, a tabu a yikabu ki̱ni ki̱danne.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ma daandaan ki̱ni yis ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu Sadukiyamu.”
N chi a ta̱l ya̱m bi̱bu we yichiyu a bi̱u ti̱n ko, “Di̱ne niyang bebu ki̱ni ki̱danniya?”
Di̱ne n Yesu a yim chi n chi ki̱twayadite, a bi̱u chi ko, “N ti̱n bi̱bu keku bi̱yili̱mang changi bayimi̱mu, wureni a yo ti̱twayadu we yichiyu tiko a ne ki̱danne we!
A lanta ki̱kang ta swaanba? Ti̱tabu kangu mang chabi ki̱ni ni̱bu kuniriti tunu ki̱ni ki̱danniyi yunuya? Ti̱tabu ti̱ti̱ngritu ta ri ki̱ni ti̱bukenita?
Ka ta tabu ki̱ni ki̱danniyi yi̱di̱bi̱n yiyu ni̱bu kuniriti taana a chabiya? Ti̱tabu ki̱ni ti̱ti̱ngri ti̱bukenitu ta karita?
Wule a yo ta swaanbu tiko ya̱m mi̱mu n ke bi̱bu a ki̱dannime? Aya ti̱ma yi daan ki̱ni yis ni̱bu Farisamu n ti Sadukiyamu.”
Yinu miyari̱mu a swaan fal ko, ya̱m yis n Yesu kiyi chidu ko a ma daani̱mu, n ke yis wu a ki̱danne, aya ki̱fwa ya̱m ti̱kwanimu ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu Sadukiyamu ki̱miyadi̱mu.
Yo n Yesu a lam bale Kaisariya Filibu, a bi̱u Miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ni̱bu ki̱yidu ko Bwe Nii n wure?”
N chi a ke ko, “Bi̱kamu ki̱yidu ko Yowana naba Batisma, bi̱kamu ko n fa̱ku Yiliya, bi̱kamu ko fa̱ku Yirmiya, ti̱nti̱ne bi̱kamu ko wuka fa̱ku Kwama.”
Yinu n ki̱n a ki̱la yi chi ko, “N ti̱nde, ti̱yidu ko m mi̱n, n wure?”
N Simun Biti̱r a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “M mun nang Masiya, Bwe Kwama wukure.”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n a yi ko, “M mun naba delake Simun bwe Yunusa, n Kwama wu a diye nang wu a yungi̱n ya̱m bi̱be, n ke nii wu a ti̱ti̱niye.”
Aya mi̱n fwa mi̱nu ki̱ka̱ngu m mun Biti̱r, “Kanang chikiye m mun kwam, we kwam wu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ mi̱mu ka rudu we yi ki̱ri̱ng. Kasi no bwa a newe ki̱ni dukan ka yingle chi.
Mang ni̱n mangsoli yaa wu a diye, chitu mwang bwa̱u a ti̱ti̱nitu a bwa̱u we bwa diye aya ti̱tu mwang kwi we ti̱ti̱nitu, ka kwiyadu we bwa diye.”
Yinu a wu miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱n ki̱tele yinang ko, a fwadu wuka nii mi̱nu we didiin ko n ki̱n nang Masiya.

A mwetuwe ki̱dang kangu, n Yesu ki̱fwa Miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱nu ko, a mwintuwe ka ya Wurchalima, ka nwe riye nabwen we fa̱li tikaketi n ti wuduwe fansetiye n ti Ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu. A yi chi ko ni̱bu ka chi̱u ki̱nu, aya ka kunnu ki̱ni ti̱kuri we wu tare di.
M Biti̱r a ti ware a ki̱ti̱ku ki̱kwabu ki̱nu ko, “A bwin mun, Tewuduwe!” A yi ko, “Ti̱chitu wu a ne ka fwenduwe!”
N Yesu a sabran, a yi Biti̱r ko, chimi̱n a fi, m mun Setan! M mun ki̱twakulang we kakku mangu. Ti̱kuran mwitu ti̱tu a nangang ti̱bwiyangi n ke ti̱tu a di̱Kwamai.
Yinu n Yesu a yi miyari̱mu ko, “Nii a ke ka bumiti̱ne, a kuru yikiyu we, a da̱u ki̱tiyang bwang kangu, a bumiti̱ne ti̱n.
Nangki̱n, wu ki̱bau ti̱kuri kite, ka kwaladu aya wu a kwalan ti̱kuritu di̱ne mi̱ne ka yadu.
Ta̱ma̱ng kangu wureni ka n ya ti̱ti̱nitu n kwala ti̱kuri mwite? Ti̱nti̱ne, nii ka ni wureni, wu ka suten ti̱kuri kite?
Nangki̱n, Bwe Nii ki̱yikadu, ka ki̱ladu ki̱ni dwiyen Te ki̱nitu, ki̱ni ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu, yinu n ki̱n ka ni ka nang wuwule niye ki̱ti̱me ko. Kanang wuwule niye yinang ka n ki̱n a ma nangangu.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱mu, bi̱kam chimu we fi a ne ti bwadu ka ku ki̱laku Bwe Nii a mati̱nki.”
A kuteng ditiyi yurukunangu, n Yesu a bungan n ti Biti̱r n ti Yakubu n ti ke Yakubuwe n Yowana, a yika di̱kan kun di̱swa̱mi̱n, n chi chikun we bwako.
N Yesu a sute bwikiyu we fiko, kabuko ki̱yillu tiyang kuko diye, kuli̱n ki̱nu a fwiyeni mwe.
Bi̱nabi̱na, miyari̱mi bi̱tamu a ku Musa n ti Yiliya ki̱fwa ya̱mu n ti Yesu.
M Biti̱r a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe, a le tiyangu n chi̱ni a fiyangu. Ka mwang kede mang ti ti̱kubiti ti̱tta di̱kanu n di̱mun, di̱kanu n di̱Musa, di̱kanu n di̱Yiliya.”

Yo m Biti̱r a yaki̱ fwa ya̱me, di̱kan di̱twin mwe a be yinge chi we fiko. Bi̱nabi̱na di̱kan ker a chire we di̱twin di̱du ko, “Wu nang Bwe mi, wu mang mi̱lane, mi̱n nwe ta̱ma̱ng kangu yinang, ti̱ nwe ki̱n!”
Kangu miyari̱m ki̱mu a nwe ker di̱dangu, tayi a tau chi, a yaran a swara kabi̱ni chiyu a ti̱m.
N Yesu a be a twai chi a yi ko, “Ti̱kun, ti̱nwedu tayuwe we.”
N chi a kukki̱ kabuni chiyu a kubu wuka nii we fiko, kana Yesu n ki̱kun.
Yo n chi yaki̱ suwedu we kunne, n Yesu a wu chimi̱n ki̱teli ko, “Ti̱fwa wuka nii mi̱nu chi ta kuutu we ka lami̱nti̱ yo Bwe Nii ka kunnu we fure.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Di̱ne wule ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu ki̱yidu ko, a kabi ki̱ng, n fa̱ku Yiliya ka mwe beke?”
A ki̱nta chi ko, a mwintuwe n Yiliya ka bedu, ka do ka ti̱ti̱le chiye.
Aya mi̱n fwa chi mi̱nu, n Yiliya a tu a be, n chi a swaanbu, n chi a ma ki̱mi̱n ka ti̱ti̱le chiye yinang kangu a kur we ni̱tu chitangu. A lakanbu, Bwe Nii yaka nwe riye yiko we Fa̱li chiyu.
Yinu fal miyari̱m ki̱mu a swaan ko ki̱fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu a dur Yowana naba batisma.
Tiyang ka n chi a lam fi ni̱bu a mura mi̱nengu, wuka nii a be a sung we kakku Yesungu, a yi ko,
“Tewuduwe, nwe ki̱bune bwemiye, ki̱nwe riye nabwen we ki̱kuliyu. Wuka yo ki̱yar ti̱nu a ki̱rang ka a mwe.
N ya miyari̱m mumu mi̱ni ki̱n mi ka we bedi ki̱ne, a yabu dawe.”

N Yesu a ke ko, “Ki̱ku ki̱dang! A mayire ta kebu ki̱ni mi̱n, ti̱kur ka ya̱m bi̱kwani̱me? Ti̱badu mang swedu n ti chi̱ni yire, wu we ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ mi̱ne? Bwanumi ka lanti̱ fere? Ti̱be ki̱ni bwe a fi.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱fi̱bti ko, “Chir!” Ki̱fi̱btiyu a chir a dutu bwe. We ki̱swi wuko bwe a be ti̱n.
A kuteng ki̱ku, miyari̱m ki̱mu a be, a ya ki̱n, yo a ne ni̱bu we, a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Wureni a yo n ni̱n nang yimbu chaku ki̱kuliye?”

N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mang changu, a mwan, a ki̱tane. N ki̱n a chakakku ko, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka n ti̱n ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mangu yinang ki̱kwi ki̱si̱raiye, ta yi kun di̱du ko, kun we fi, yikani bwa, kunnu ka yika ti̱nu.” A ne chi ka bwa chi̱ne we.
[Aya ki̱duum ki̱fi̱bti̱m bi̱bu a chirbu we ni, ka n ke ka twa̱ba̱ku n ti da̱kku dimwene.]
Wuka di yo n ki̱n a swe ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a Ka̱lili, n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Fakwarbu mi̱mu yaka ni Bwe Nii a fa̱li ni̱bii.”
N chi ka chi̱u mi̱nu, aya n Kwama ka yodu mang kunu we wu tare di. Ya̱m bi̱bu a kai ni̱tu miyari̱m ki̱mitu.

Ki̱daangu n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a lam Kafanawu mangu, ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱mur sangkalu ka nang di̱di̱le swa̱re we ni̱bu Yafudam kwang di̱ne ke a dong Kan Kwamani̱mu, a ya we di̱Biti̱r, a bi̱u ko, “Naba lomo we ki̱fe sangkal Kan Kwamana?”
M Biti̱r a ke ko, “Ngo, ki̱fedu,” Yo m Biti̱r a ki̱la lo, n Yesu a mwe a ma di̱bi̱du ko, “Simun, we da̱ngku mwangu, mati̱m mu ki̱yiu sangkalu a di̱wure, a bwesi̱m chima, ka a bi̱bu n ke bi̱chima?”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “A bi̱bu n ke bwesi̱m chim.” Yinu n Yesu a yi ko, “A kau bwesi̱m chimu a swi we feku sangkalangu.”
Di̱ne ke ni kai chi mi̱nu ni̱r we, “Di̱ne yiko, ya n mar kolo we mwe nabwe fare, tau chi̱nge ka mwe leke, wudu yii ko, mwang ya ka̱mbi̱r we wu ka lwe sangkale. Fe sangkal munu n ti di̱mi̱ni ki̱n.”
We ki̱swi wuko, miyari̱mu a be we di̱Yesu we, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “N wure a mwang a la chi we Yaa diye?”
Yinu a yale wuka bwe wuti̱re a ti we tibe chi,
a yi ko, bi̱yili̱m n fwa chimi̱nu, ka ta sutebu dati chiyu, ta kabu yinang bwesi̱m bi̱ti̱ri̱me, a ne ta le Yaa Kwama ko bayim.
Di̱ne yiko, ni wu ka mar durki̱nu yinang bweti̱re, nang sele we Yaa Kwama.
Ti̱nti̱ne, nii wu a yiu bweti̱re yinang wu a di̱n mi̱ne, a yiu mi̱n.
Ti̱nti̱ne nii ka yo wuka bwe wuti̱re wu a ke bi̱yili̱m we di̱n mi̱nu mi̱n yare, a ma ki̱le. Ka la chi ni kwau ki̱mi̱n neer we kwiir ki̱nu, ni mar ki̱nu a ki̱sule fare.
A no ti̱ti̱nitu di̱ne chi ki̱yo ni̱bu ki̱ma ki̱letiye, a kabbi ki̱n ki̱chiti̱ wu ka bedu, aya a no nii wu chitu ka bedu a di̱ki̱ne.
Ka fa̱la̱ng n ti nang mwangu ki̱yonu ki̱ni ki̱letiye, mwatu n mar a bwa, ka la mi̱n chi mwang ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi ki̱ni ti̱kubi n ti ki̱ku fa̱la̱ng ka nange ka yodu mwang le far ki̱rang.
Ka kwalangemo ki̱yodu mun ma ki̱lenge, chaku n mar a bwa, ka la chi mwang ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu ki̱ni nu wiin n ti ki̱ku mwan le far a ki̱ranu ki̱ni nuyi yurau be.
“Ti̱kedu ti̱swa̱badu bi̱bu a rubu we bunti̱ki̱mu we. Mi̱n yi chi̱nu, di̱ne ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri chimu ki̱dang kabu Temi wu a diye.
[Di̱ne Bwe Nii a be ka yu bi̱bu a laiyimu.]
“Ti̱kuri yire? Ka ni ki̱ni kwanti kuule, yinu wuka wiin we tibe chi a laiye, n ki̱n a ne ka du yiyu wan turkubu chiri turkubiyu we nachangu yaka babba wu a laiya?
Yinu ka yange, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka mi̱ladu we ni̱r ki̱nu ka la yiyu wan turkubu chiri turkubu a laibiyu.
A fi wine, Te chi̱n wu a diye a kebu wuka we bwesi̱m bi̱bu ka laiyu.
“Ka kemo a ma mi̱n ki̱le, yung ki̱n ki̱le ko, ti̱fwa ti̱ni burau, ka a nwene, m marti̱ ki̱n we wa̱re.
Aya ka nwen be, bau wuka nii wiin ka burabe yati̱ dokan di̱ne ya̱mu a yiini ni̱bi burabi̱mu ka bi̱tange ki̱ti kwiir.
Ka ni wu a nwebu chiye, fwa ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m min, ka a nwebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱me, ti̱da̱u ni wu a yimbu Kwama, ka yinang ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱me.
“Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, chitu ta bwa̱u we ti̱ti̱nitu, a bwa̱u we bwadi.
“Ti̱nti̱ne mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka ti̱ni burau we ti̱ti̱nitu ti̱kekan a ti̱kan chi ti̱tu ti̱badu a di̱Kwamate, n Temi wu a diye ka ma chimi̱nu.
Aya fi ni̱bi burau ka bi̱ta a muran mi̱n we di̱n mi̱ne, n mi̱n we ware n ti chi.”
Yinu m Biti̱r a be a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe, kemi ka mami ki̱le ki̱da yile mang du ki̱mi̱nu, ki̱da yidibina?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “N ke ki̱da yibidin aya yi̱di̱bi̱n wanti̱di̱bin.
Di̱ne yiko, ni swe Yaa Kwama ki̱ni Mai wu ki̱baddu ka ta̱l chi a fa̱li ka̱bi kiye.
Yo n ki̱n a mwe ki̱ta̱lle chide, ni̱bu a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni wuka nii wu n ki̱n ki̱bunti̱ ka̱mbi̱riye.
Kangu a yimbu fe di̱si̱nangu, naba loko a yo ni̱bu ko a feku ni wu n ti naye ko n ti bwesi̱m ki̱mu n ti kwali̱n chi̱n ki̱nu ki̱ni kwang a fen ka̱mbi̱ru.
Yinu ka̱be a sung we kakku kangu ki̱wanadu ko, temiya, ma bwanu, mang fedu ki̱ni kwang.
Yinu naba lo a nwe ki̱bune ka̱be, a du ki̱mi̱n di̱si̱n di̱du. A yi ko, a yikan.
“Kangu ka̱be wu a chirengu, a tekan n ti wuka fate nangange ko, wu n ki̱n ki̱bunti̱ di̱si̱n ka̱mbi̱r surine, a sa ki̱n a kwiru ko, ‘Feyi di̱si̱n ka̱mbi̱r mi̱nu suriyu kuul.’
Yinu n fate nangange ko a sung ki̱wana ki̱nu ko, ‘Ma bwanu, we mang fenu.’
Aya ka̱be a ko, a yikan ki̱ni ni wu a di̱bi̱nti̱l, a lami̱nti̱ yo a fe di̱si̱ne.
Yo bi̱kamu fati̱bu nangam a kuye, ni̱tu chitu a kaiyan, a yikan a fwa naba lo chi mi̱n chi a fweti kwang.
“Yinu naba loko a yalle ka̱be wu, a yi ki̱n ko, ‘M mun ni wu kwane! N dumi̱n di̱si̱n munu di̱ne mwang kiimi wiye.
A mayire ne mwang nwe ki̱bune fate nangange mo tiyangu mang nwe ki̱bune monge?’
Ki̱chiti̱ wu a fwi naba loko mi̱n ni̱r, a yo ni̱bu a ni ki̱n riye, a lami̱nti̱ yo n ki̱n a fe di̱si̱ne.”
Yinu n Yesu a swa̱n ya̱mu ko, “Nang yinangu Te wu a diye, ka madu ki̱ni chi̱nangu, ka nii a dubu ke ko mi̱nbu ki̱leti kiye.”
Yo n Yesu a ri fwaku ya̱mbi̱bange, a du Ka̱lili a yika bale Yafudiya, wu a kangu ba̱la̱ng we La Wurdune.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a bunti̱ ki̱n, a n ki̱n a bera chi we bwako kwang.
We fiko, bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisamu a be ka swe ki̱nu, n chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “We yilangu a dakan nii ka chi̱u naye ko mi̱n ki̱na kasi no a wuwule ki̱lenga?”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ta kiba? We tile bi̱rke, n Kwama a yo wubare n ti wuwiye?”
Yinu a yi ko, ni ka du te ki̱n n ti ne ki̱n, ka tabadu n ti naye ko. N chi ki̱ni burako, a kabbi wiin!
A lanta bwa kakke, n chi a neka kadi burau a ya ka kaddi wiin. We yiko, chi Kwama bwa̱be, wuka ni a yarkadu chi we!
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Yinu a mayire m Musa a ru yilangu ko ni a ni naye ko lwangi̱n chiku ki̱nangu a kakane?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Di̱ne ni̱r chi̱ni ki̱ngki̱ngi̱nu, m Musa a ki̱nta chi ko ti̱chiu ki̱na aya a newe yiko we tile bi̱rke.
A mwintuwe mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, nii wu ka chi̱u naye ko mi̱n ki̱nange, ka n ke a di̱ne ti̱kuliye, ka yiu wuka naye, ki̱ma ti̱kuli ware.”
Yinu miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka chiti ye we tibe kwarta n ti naye ko, a bunge ni a yidu naye we.”
Yinu a yi chi ko, ya̱m bi̱bu n ke ka nang wuwule niye ka da̱du, kana bi̱bu n Kwama a ke chi mi̱ni̱m.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ya̱m bi̱bu n ke bi̱bu a ni̱bi kwangi̱m di̱ne n Kwama a bi̱u bi̱kamu bi̱rabine, bi̱kamu bi̱bu a yangi fa̱la̱ng. Bi̱kamu a ke ka kau bi̱rabine di̱ne nangang Kwamang.”
Ni̱bu a be ki̱ni bwesi̱mu a di̱Yesuwe ko ke a yo bwesi̱mu mi̱n delaku a twa̱ba̱ chimi̱nti̱n bunitu aya miyari̱m ki̱mu a kwabu ni̱bu a be ki̱ni bwesi̱mu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱du bwesi̱m bi̱ti̱ri̱mu a be bwa di̱mi̱ne. Ti̱nabaduwe, di̱ne Yaa Kwama n wu chi.”
Yo a yo chimi̱n delake, a yikan ti̱n.
We fiko bwele wu ki̱ni kuliye a be we di̱Yesuwe a yiko, “Naba yungke, mang ma ti̱ti̱le chi, ti̱tu ka yodu mang ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadite?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “A mayire mun ma di̱bi̱du we chi ti̱yiliye? A ne chi ti̱yili we, ka n ke Kwama n ki̱kune. Ka mun baddu mwang ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadite, mwang buntu yili̱ntu.”
N ki̱n a yi Yesu ko, “Ti̱ti̱le yili̱n?” N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Chidu ni we, madu ti̱kuliwe, madu kutuwe, mwedu ti̱kwani we,
Ni te mun n ti ne mun dwiyentu. Mi̱la bi̱bu ti̱swedu waremu tiyangu mwang mi̱la yimwiyangu.”
Yinu bwele a yi ki̱n ko, “M Bunti̱n yili̱nti kwang, a dumi wureni?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mun baddu mwang kau wu yile niye, yang feku kuli mwiti kwang, nika ti̱lusanitu mwan ya kulitu we bwa diye. Yinu bumite.”
Yo bwele a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a yikan ki̱ni kaiyan ni̱re, di̱ne n ki̱n ki̱ni kulitu nabwen.
Yinu n Yesu a yi mi̱yari̱n ki̱mu ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka kadu bawi naba kuli ka le Yaa Kwama.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ti̱nu ki̱da, ka la chi twali̱m ka le bwang li̱bra n ti ki̱ku naba kuli ka le Yaa Kwamangu.”
Yo miyari̱m a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a ya̱r yi, a yiko, “Ka chitu ka fwediye n wure ka ya swiki̱ku.”
N Yesu a da̱ng chi ri̱i̱ng a yiko, “We ni̱bu a ne fwedu, aya we di̱Kwama chitu kwang ka fwedu.”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Yinu Ki̱ka̱ngu nang du chitu kwang ke ni̱n bumi̱ti̱nangu, kano nang ya wureni?”

N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu we ki̱dangu ki̱bedangu, we ki̱swi Bwe Nii ka swedu we yaako wuduwe n ti̱n bi̱bu ta buntu mi̱ni̱mu, nang bi̱bu ta swedu a ki̱di̱ng mwataki̱mu, ta mwata kutiyi kub chiri yurabu a Yisrela mi̱nu.”
Yinu ni wu a du loko n ti kebu ki̱mu bi̱bari̱mu, ka bi̱wuti̱me, ka n te ki̱ne, ka n ne ki̱ne, ka bwesi̱me ka kuniye di̱ne mi̱ne, ka ya chi a la kulite, yinu ka yati̱ ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu.
Aya bi̱bu ki̱kudu ko n chi, chi la chimu ka kau bi̱ti̱ri̱m, yinu bi̱bu ki̱kudu ko n chi bi̱ti̱ri̱mu ka kau bi̱bu a la chiim.
Yaa diye a chirkami̱n n ti telo, wu a kun ki̱ni si̱n ki̱bau ni̱bu ka ma ki̱mi̱n nangang we ku yinabe.
Kangu n chi a doka ka̱mbi̱r surenangu, a tung chi we ku ko.
A ki̱la chirtewe yo ki̱swi turkubu a lame, a ku bi̱kam we fi a kwa̱ma̱re a mabu chi.
A yi chi ko, ti̱yati̱ ku yinabe mi, mang fe chi a dakanitu. Yo bi̱bu a yikane,
A ki̱la chirtewe ki̱ni kuko yo awa a fi yitta a yal bi̱kam ni̱bu nangam.
Yo ki̱swi a fi yunuwe a chirtewe ti̱n, a ku bi̱kam a tiran a mabu chi, a yi chi ko, “A mayire ta mabu chiye?”
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “A ne nangang we.” A yi chi ko, “Ti̱ya ku yinabe mi.”
Yo di a le, naba lo kuu yinabe a yi wu ki̱da̱ng ki̱mi̱n nangang kuwange ko yale ni̱bu nangangmu, fe chi sure chi, mwetuwe wu a ya kutenge n swanti̱n a wu a mwe beke.
Bi̱bu a be we ki̱swi yunuwemu, n kawure yiu sure ko chi a tabe.
Yo bi̱bu a be kaki̱mu a kuwe, a da̱u ko kate chi ya chi a la ti̱te, n chi a ya a lakanbu.
Yo a yiu di̱chi̱ne, a fwireni ki̱ni telo.
Ki̱yidu ko, “Bi̱bu n chi a be kutemu a awa wiin, a mayire ka yadu a fi wiine n ti ni̱n bi̱bu nang di kuko kwadu we sureme.”
Aya a ke wuka ni mi̱ni wiin we tibe chi a yi ko, fate mang suli̱nbu, di̱ne ni dokan kangu mang fenu we ka̱mbi̱r surenangu.
Yiu ti̱mwitu yika lomo. N ke mang ni bi̱bu a talawemu a fiwine ware n ti mun.
N ne dawe mang ma chi mang ku diye ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱r mi̱na, ka mun ma ki̱fwini ki̱ni ki̱li̱mang manga?
“We yiko, bi̱kaki̱mu ka swan kuteng, bi̱bu a kutemu ka ti kakku.”
Yo n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu kub chiri burabi̱mu yaki̱ fi̱l bwa Wurchalima, a ti a ki̱ti̱ku a yi chi ko,
“Kangu ni yika Wurchalima yangu, Bwe Nii yaka le Fa̱li wuduwe fansetiye n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱m, n chi ka mwata ki̱mi̱n ya̱m bwam.
N chi ka tau ki̱nu ka ni kuuti, n ke ni̱bu Yafudamiyu, n chi ka ma ki̱mi̱n ki̱fiye, ka twalati̱ ki̱nu, yinu ka kuti̱ ki̱nu a ki̱tiyang bwangu, we di wu tare ka kukku ki̱nu we furu.”
Yinu ne bwesi̱m Sa̱badime a be we di̱Yesuwe n ti bwesi̱m ki̱mu, a sung we kakku kangu a bi̱u makaku.
N Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mun bau wureni?” A ke ko, “Ke mi bwesi̱mi burabi̱mu ka swedu wuka a kang ki̱yilang, wuka a kwantakwelang we yamo.”
Aya n Yesu a yi bwesi̱mu ko, “Ta yimbu chi ti̱bi̱ditu, we ta yin no ki̱dangu mang nodanga? N chi a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, Chi medu.”
A yi chi ko, “Ta yin no ki̱dangu aya sweki̱ku a kang ki̱yilangu ka kwatakwelange n ke ti̱tu m mi̱n mang nidi. Aya n Temi a tu a do chi mi̱n.”
Yo bi̱kamu miyari̱mi kubu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be a fwiren ki̱ni kebu bi̱bi burabi̱mu.
N Yesu a yale chi ki̱ni kwang a yi ko, ti yim mati̱m yikayu kuuti ki̱ni dukan we dur chi̱nu, yinu tikaketi chiyu ki̱yung ti̱nu we dutu chiitu.
We di̱chi̱ne, a newe yiko aya ka nang wuwule niye wu a ke ka kau wuduwe we di̱chi̱ne, ka kau bwe nangang change.
Aya wu ki̱baddu ka kau wuduwe we tibe chi̱ne, ka kau ka̱be chi̱n.
Yinangu Bwe Nii, a bebu ko ke ki̱yiu dwiyen, aya ke ki̱kau bwe nangang, ka ni ti̱kuri kitu di̱ne ka tu ni̱bu nabwen.
Yo n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a chir we Yeriko, ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen a bunti̱ ki̱n.
Bi̱kam ki̱dubi burau bi̱bu ki̱swedu a wa̱remu. Yo a nwe ko n Yesu ki̱sude, n chi a yal chitu ki̱ni keru dukan ko, “Tewuduwe, Bwe Dauda, nwe ki̱bune ni̱n.”
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a kwabu chi ko a lemi̱n. Aya n chi a su keru sube ki̱yalu ko, “Tewuduwe, Bwe Dauda nwe ki̱bune ni̱n!”
N Yesu a ti a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱bau wureni?”
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, ni̱n baddu na kudi.”
Di̱ne ki̱bune, n Yesu a twai kwalangi chiyu. Bi̱nabi̱na n chi a kuti̱di, a bunti̱n ki̱n.
Yo n chi a lam Wurchalima a ya be bi̱ne Betafachi wu a Kun di̱du ki̱ni tini Setuniye, n Yesu a tum miyari̱m ki̱mi burabu.
A yi chi ko, ti̱ya be bi̱ne wu a kakku change, ta ya kuri̱nge n ti be le kurunge we, ti̱kwimiye, ti̱be miyengi ki̱n.
Ka wuka nii ka yi chi̱n ya̱me, ti yi ko, “N Tewuduwe ki̱baddu, a ne kai ki̱swi ka ni chi̱nu.”
Ti̱tu a fwe ke a ri chi fa̱ku a fwaatu ko,
“Ti̱yi ni̱bu Siyona ko,
‘Da̱ng Mai chi̱n ki̱be bwa di̱chi̱ne,
ki̱n naba bwanuwe a fi̱le kurunge
ki̱bedu a le kurunge.’ ”
Miyari̱mu a ya mati̱ chi n Yesu a fwa chi mi̱nitu.
Yo n chi a be ki̱ni kurunge n ti le ko, a mau lukei chiyu we kurungetiyu. N Yesu a fi̱l a swe we le.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be ki̱mau lukei chiyu we wa̱re, bi̱kamu ki̱kiya lwangi̱ntu we ki̱yangtiyu ki̱madu we wa̱re.
Ki̱tu ni̱be a kakke n ti bi̱bu ki̱nabi̱di̱mu ki̱ngau kwa̱ki̱ru ko,
“Dwiyentu n ti̱u Bwe Dauda!
Naba delake wu ki̱bedu
a di̱n Tewuduwe ne!
Wa diye a lwe delaku.”
Yo n Yesu a le Wurchalima, ni̱bu ki̱ni kwang a kun a titiye, ki̱yidu ko, wu n wure?
Ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ Yesumu a ke ko, “Wu nang Yesu fa̱ku wu a chire a Nasa̱ret wu a bi̱n Ka̱lili.”
N Yesu a le Kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu a kaka ni̱bu ki̱feku chi n ti bi̱bu ki̱ta̱n chimu we mure Kan Kwamane, n ki̱n a yila teburitu ni̱bu ki̱suten ka̱mbi̱ritu n ti ti̱tu a ni̱bu ki̱feku ki̱kubtitu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “A mwalmwale, ‘Ka yal lomi ko lo twa̱ba̱ke,’ aya ti̱yo a kau lon dabi̱kume.”
Yinu ki̱dubi̱bu n ti ki̱kubtiyu a be we Kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu. N ki̱n a bera chi.
Aya yo wuduwe fansetiye n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu a ku chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱te, n chi a kai ni̱r aya bwesi̱mu ki̱dela Kwama ko, “Bwe Dauda yiu dwiyentu ki̱diya kwadu.”
A yi ki̱n ko, “We mun nwe chitu bi̱bu ki̱fwadita?” N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ngo, ta kiba, taki̱da Kwama yinang a fwa ko, ‘N miya kana bwesi̱m bi̱ti̱ri̱mu n ti bwesi̱m ki̱lwiyimu mi̱n delaka?’ ”
A du chi we bi̱nu a yika Betani, a ya da bwako.
Ki̱ni si̱n yo a kun ki̱ki̱lade, chun a bu ki̱n.
N ki̱n a ku tiyang sinangu we wa̱re, a tubu chi, a yi tiyangu ko, “Ne mwan tu ti̱kulantu ki̱diya kwadu.” Bi̱nabi̱na lwangi̱n tiyangitu a bwa wuri̱m.
Yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a ku chitu a fweete, a ya̱r yii, a yi ko, “A mayire tiyang sinangu a bwa dati̱date?”

N Yesu a ki̱nta chi a yi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka n ti̱ni ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mang ta kamabu chiye, ta ma chi a la ti̱ta tiyang sinangu kutan. Ta medu ta yi kunnu tiko, yikan, fi̱tana nabwe la, ka fwe ti̱nu.
Ka ti̱ke bi̱yili̱me, chi ta bi̱diti kwang we twa̱ba̱ku, ta yadu.”
Yo n Yesu a le Kan Kwamane, tikaketi fanseti n ti seli̱bu a yi ko, “Mun ma nangri ti̱ti ki̱ni di̱di̱le dukan, n wure a ni̱n dukan di̱du?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “Mang ma chimi̱n di̱bi̱du, ka ti̱ni di̱ki̱li̱ne, mang fwa chimi̱nu ka mi̱n ma nangri ti̱ti ki̱ni di̱di̱le dukane.
N Yowana a ya dukanu ki̱mang batisma nu a fi̱re? A di̱Kwamanga ka a ni̱ba?” N chi a twayan we yichiyu ki̱yidu ko, “Ka ni yiko a di̱Kwama, ka yidu ko a mayire ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yowana?
Aya ka ni yi ko a niye, ni le fi̱re we ni̱bu, di̱ne n chi a ke ko n Yowana fa̱ku.”
A yi Yesu ko, “Nang yimbu.” Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n ne mang fwa chimi̱nu ka mi̱n ma nangri ti̱ti ki̱ni di̱di̱le dukane.”
Yesu a chakakku ko, “Ti̱da̱ngi yire? Wuka ni ki̱ni bwesi̱mi burau bi̱bari̱m, a ya we wu kakke a yi ko, ‘Bwemi, ya ma nangangu we ku yinabe diwu.’
Bwe a yi ko, ‘Mang yabu.’ A kuteng ki̱ku a kun a ya.
Yinu te a ki̱la bwa wu robe a yi ti̱n wuko yiko ti̱n. Wuko a ke ko, ‘Mang yadu tete.’ A kuteng ki̱ku a yabu.
We tibe chi wuwule a ma chii n te ki̱n ki̱badditu?”
N chi a ke ko,
“Nang wu kakke.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, bi̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu n ti ti̱banitu ka tu chi̱nu we Yaa Kwama.
Aya n Yowana a be ka yung chi̱n wa̱re yile, ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne aya ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu n ti ti̱banitu a ke bi̱yili̱mu. Ki̱ni yiko, ta wobu ki̱ti̱mu ta keti̱bu bi̱yili̱mu.

“Ti̱nwe ki̱ku baltaku, wuka nii we wu a fi ku yinabe, a kwa̱r kuu ko ki̱ni kali, a yoti̱ di̱kulenu kani̱n yammi̱n yinabi we kuu n ti tiyangu kani̱n ton ya̱ma̱ngu. A ni bi̱kam ni̱bu kuu ko a nang sudu, a yika ti̱n.
Yo ki̱swi kakke a lame, a tum kabi kiyu we ni̱bu ki̱sudumu ko a yiu ki̱mi̱ne ti̱kulantu.
Bi̱ki̱mu a tau kabi yiyu, a ngau wuka, a chi̱u wuka, a kwelati̱ wu tare.
N ki̱n a ki̱la tumti̱ bi̱kam ka̱bi a la bi̱kaki̱mu ki̱ni nabwentu. Bi̱ki̱mu a ma chimi̱nte yinanga ma bi̱kamangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, a tum chi mi̱n bwe ko si̱ne ko, ka ku ki̱siyang bwe miyangu.
