Yo ni̱bu sukumu a ku bwe, a fwa we bwiti chiyu ko, ‘Bwe ka chau kula nau, yani chi̱u ki̱n ni chati̱ kula ko.’
N chi a tau ki̱n, a mau ki̱n, a kuteng yaa kwale ku yinabe, a chi̱u ki̱n.
“Ka naba lo kuu yinabe a benge, ka ma ni̱bu suki̱m bi̱bi yire?”
N chi a yi ko, “N ki̱n ka chi̱u ni̱bu bi̱bwilam bi̱bu. N ki̱n ka ni bi̱kam ni̱bu kuu yinabe bi̱bu ka ni ki̱n ki̱ti̱me yoko ka mur chabti̱te.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ta kibuwe tattiki̱dai Kwamanga?
‘Kale wu ni̱bu mukki̱m a konge,
nang kale a da a la chiye.
N Tewuduwe a ma ti̱tu,
a kau chi ya̱r yii, we di̱chire.’
“Di̱ne yiko, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, kuuti ka yitu chi̱n Yaa Kwama, ka ni ni̱bu ki̱ma nangang ki̱yilangu.”
[Wu ka yaru we kale ka wuredi bi̱si̱l, aya wu kwam ka yarti̱nuwe, ka kwa ki̱nu yinang kur ki̱ti̱n.]
Yo tikaketi fanseti n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe ki̱ku baltaku Yesunge, a yim ko ki̱fwa ya̱mu a dur chi̱n.
N chi a bau wa̱re ka tan ki̱ne aya ki̱nwe tayi ki̱tuu ni̱beyu, di̱ne a ke ko n Yesu fa̱ku.
N Yesu a ki̱la fwa chimi̱n ti̱n ya̱mu ki̱ni baltaku, a yi ko.
Yaa diye a chir kami̱n ti wuka mai wu ki̱badu ka ma bweko mi̱n ye ki̱nai.
A tum kabi kiyu ko a yala ni̱bu bi̱bu a ya di̱yal we ki̱namu, n chi a ko a bebu.
A ki̱la tum ti̱n bi̱kam kabi a yi ko, “Ti̱fwa bi̱bu ni̱bu a ya di̱yalmu mi̱n ko, ‘N tu n do chabti̱tu, n bita tanti̱kai yiyiliyu, n do chiti kwang ti be fi a ki̱na!’ ”
Aya n chi a swa̱ba ki̱n, n ka wure a tau wuko wa̱re a yika ti̱n, wuka a yika kuko, wuka a yika kwa̱ma̱r.
Bi̱kamu n chi a tau ka̱biyu a ngau, a chiti̱ chi.
M mai a kai ni̱ru nabwen. A tum ni̱bu kuni̱mu ko a chiben bi̱bu ki̱kau duti̱mu, a twiti̱ bi̱nchinu kwang.
Yinu a yi kabiki̱yu ko, doku ki̱nangu a ri aya bi̱bu a ya di̱yalmu a lwebu.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱bunti̱ wa̱riyu, ni wu ta yade kwang, ti yale a be ki̱na.
Ka̱biyu a yikan we wa̱riyu a mure ka wuwule niye bi̱yili̱mu n ti bi̱kwani̱mi kwang, ki̱na a ri ki̱ni rungko chib.
Kangu m mai a le ki̱da̱ng ki̱nangu a ku wuka nii we mure wu a dobu luke ki̱na.
A yi ni wu ko, fate a mayire mwan le mure mwang dowebu luke ki̱nange? Aya ni wu a kwalla chi ka fwaditu.
Yinu m mai a yi ka̱biyu ko, ti kwau nii wu we Fa̱liyu n ti nani kiyu, ti̱mar ki̱n a ki̱liki̱liye wu kwane, we bwako ka ki wii ti ki̱rtiki̱ numang.
Ni̱bu nabwen a ya di̱yalu, bi̱suti̱ri̱mi bayim.
We fiko ni̱bu Farisamu a yikan, n chi a do kangu n chi ka si ki̱mi̱n la̱n we ya̱m ki̱mangu.

N chi a tum miyari̱m chimu n ti bi̱kam ni̱bu Yirudu ko a yi ki̱n ko, “Tete ni̱n yim mun tum bi̱yili̱m, mun yungti̱ bi̱yili̱mu we wa̱re Kwama, ni̱bi kwang a fi wiin we di̱mune, di̱ne mwang swabu ni̱bu swabe.
N fwa ni̱mi̱n, a dakan nang ni kaisar sangkala, ka ni̱n nidu wenga?”
Aya n Yesu a swaan muli̱n chi̱nu a yi ko, “A mayire ti sweyu n ti̱n ni̱bu di̱bebeli̱me?
Ti̱yungi ka̱mbi̱ru ti feen sangkali̱nu.” N chi a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni ki̱nu ka̱mbi̱re.
A yi chi ko, ki̱wulang ki̱ku n ti di̱n di̱du n di̱wure?
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, n di̱kaisar, yinu a yi chi ko ti̱tu n ti̱u Kaisaritu ti̱ni Kaisar aya ti̱tu n ti̱u Kwamatu ti̱ni Kwama.
Kangu n chi a nwengu a ya̱r yii, n chi a du ki̱n a tau ware chi a yikan.
We di wuko, bi̱kam ni̱bu Sadukiyamu, bi̱bu ki̱yidu ko a ne kungku kwa̱miyang wengu, a be we di̱Yesuwe, a bi̱u ki̱n.
N chi a yi ko, “Tete, m Musa a yi ko, ‘Ka nii a bwa a ne bwe wenge, keko ka na naye ko ke a bi̱u ki̱mi̱n bwesi̱m!’
Yinu bi̱kam kebu we bi̱dibiin bwesi̱m nii wiini̱m. Wusele a yiu naye, n ki̱n a bwa a yobu duumu, keko a be ki̱na naye.
A fwe yiko ti wu robe, ti wu tare, a lanti̱ wu ni̱bine.
A kutengu n chi a bwaranangu, naye wu a bwa ti̱n.
We kabaku kwa̱mingu naye wu ka kau wu wure we tibe chi wu bi̱di̱bine. Di̱ne n chi ki̱ni kwang a na naye wu.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi a yi ko, “Ti̱lele we ti̱kuran chi̱ntu, di̱ne ta yimbu ya̱m Kwamamu n ti dukan ki̱nu.
Di̱ne we kunki̱ kwamiyangu, kwartabu a ne ka ma ki̱na, nati̱bu a ne ki̱na we ti̱nti̱n aya chi ka chirkadu ti ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamam.
Aya we kunki̱ Kwa̱miyangu, ta kibu chi ya̱m Kwamamu a fwa chimi̱ni̱nta? A mwal ko,
Mi̱n nang Kwama wu Yibrayime, Kwama wu Yichaku n ti Kwama Yakubu we. N ki̱n Kwama ni̱bu ti̱kurime n ke wu a kwa̱miye.”
Kangu ni̱bu a nwe yikongu, n chi a ya̱r yii we yungku kangu.
Yo ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe n Yesu a rii ki̱ni ni̱bu Sadukiyamu, n chi a mur dutu chitu.
Wuka naba yungku yilange we tibe chi, a swe Yesu ki̱ni di̱bi̱du.
A yiko, “Tete, ki̱ki̱le yilang a la chi we yili̱ntu?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “ ‘Mi̱la Kwama Tewuduwe ki̱ni ni̱r muni kwang n ti ti̱kuri mwitu n ti yingku mwangi kwang’
Ki̱ku nang yilang ki̱ka̱ra̱ngu, nang ki̱duwangi kwang.
Ki̱robangu yilang tiyang ki̱kakkangu ti̱n, mi̱la kemo tiyang yimwiyu.
Aya yili̱n ti̱tu n ti miyaku fa̱kuti kwang a swe we yili̱n ti̱ti turabitu.”
Yo ni̱bu Farisamu a muran a fiwiine, n Yesu a bi̱u chi.
A yi ko, “Ti̱kuran chi̱ntu m Masiya bwe wure?” N chi a yi ko n ki̱n Bwe Dauda.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, yire wu n Dauda a yal ki̱n we Fi̱ki̱m Tewuduwe mu? A yi ko,
N Tewuduwe a yi Tewuduwe mi ko, “Swenga kan ki̱yilang mangu, ka lami̱nti̱n yo fakwarbu mi̱mu ka kau ka̱bi mwiye.”
Ka n Dauda ki̱yal ki̱nu ko, Tewuduwe, a mayire n ki̱n ka kau bweko?
We dii wuko a ne nii a ki̱l ki̱mi̱n ya̱me we. A ne nii a ki̱la ma ki̱mi̱n ti̱n di̱kan di̱bi̱de we.
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱tuu ni̱be n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu ko,
“Ni̱bu yungku yilangmu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu nang bi̱bu ki̱ni dukan di̱du ka miya yili̱n Musati̱mu.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱ma chitu a yi chinitu, ti̱bunti̱ yili̱ntu, aya ti̱madu nangi̱n chitu we, di̱ne n chi a mabu chi ki̱fwaditu.
N chi ki̱yo ni̱bu ki̱ma chi ki̱ni bware, aya n chi a kebu ka madu kasi no ka twayu ki̱ni bewure.
N chi ki̱ma nangi̱n chi̱ntu ko ke ni̱bu a ku ko we chi madu, ki̱bwa̱ba ti̱labti̱ri ya̱m Kwamami we kabi̱ni chiyu ki̱ dorati̱ lukeyu ki̱yung dwiyeni.
N chi ki̱bau kana fanti sweri yidui we fi a yeniye n ti fanti yidui we kambi muraki̱ Kwamatu,
ki̱bau di̱siir dwiyeni̱n kasi no a kwa̱ma̱r, ki̱badu ni̱bu a nang yal chidu ko, ‘Tete, naba yungke.’
“Aya ti̱kedu ni̱bu a yal chi̱nu we ko ‘naba yungke,’ di̱ne Tete chire wiin, ti̱ni kwang kana kebu.
Ti̱yalu wuka nii we ti̱ti̱nitu ko ‘Naba yungke,’ di̱ne Te chire wiin, n ki̱n nang wu a diye.
Ti̱keti̱nu di̱yalu ko ‘naba yungke,’ di̱ne wu kake chi̱ni wiin nang Masiya.
Wuduwe we tibe chi̱n ka kau ka̱be chi̱n.
Kanang wuwule niiye wu ka ri̱ka yikiye, ka kwala ri̱kaki̱ku, wu ka si̱ku dur ki̱ne, ka ya ri̱kaku.
“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱nmu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin! Di̱ne ti yinge ni̱bu mi̱n Yaa Kwama. N ti̱n ta leti̱bu, ti̱dangti̱ bi̱bu ki̱baddu ka ledi̱mu.

[A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱nmu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin, di̱ne ti̱da̱u nati̱m buni̱mu mi̱n chitu n chi ki̱nitu, twa̱ba̱bune chi̱n a lebu ni̱ru, riye n Kwama ka ni chi̱ne ka la bi̱kamu.]
“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱nmu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin, ti̱yabbu Wima, ti̱ya fantiyu kutani ke ti̱ya wu ka wo ki̱ti̱me. Yo ta yange ti̱ mul ki̱nu a la chi̱n ki̱ni bwila kwang.

“A no chi̱n, tikaketi ki̱dubu! Ti̱yidu ko, ‘Ka ya wu ka twa̱m chi ki̱ni Kan Kwamana Wurchalima ne, a ne ki̱lewe, aya wu a twa̱m chi ki̱ni si̱nariya a Kan Kwama ne, a mwintuwe kama chi n ki̱na twa̱mitu.’
N ti̱n di̱bu ki̱dubi̱mu! Ti̱ti̱le a la chi, si̱nariya ka Kan Kwamanu a yo wauwade si̱nariyana?
Ti̱fwa ti̱n ko, ‘Wu ka twa̱m chi ki̱ni se Kwama a mabu chi, aya wu a twa̱m ki̱ni ni ki̱ku a se Kwamange, a kau di̱twa̱mbi̱r di̱tabi̱ri̱n.’
“N ti̱n ki̱dubi̱bu! Ti̱ti̱le a la chi, niki̱ka, ka se Kwama wu a ni ki̱ki wauwada?
Di̱ne yiko, wu a twa̱m ki̱ni se Kwama, a twa̱mi ki̱ni chi a dur ki̱nitu ti̱nti̱n.
Aya wu a twa̱m ki̱ni Kan Kwamane, a twa̱mi ki̱n, a twa̱m ti̱n ki̱ni Kwama wu ki̱sweduwe mure.
Aya wu a twa̱m ki̱ni diye, a twa̱m ki̱ni dwiyen Kwamatu n ti wu a swe we.

“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku ti̱ka yili̱ni̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin. Ti̱ni wu wiine we kube we kuli̱n di̱du ki̱ni lwangi̱n yinang kwekwe. Aya ti̱du bunti̱ku kasi yilang ti̱duitu yinang bi̱yili̱m n ti ki̱bune n ti bwanu. A no dakan ta ma ti̱tu, a ne ti̱kati kwang.
N ti̱n bi̱bu ki̱wuba ki̱dubi̱mu! Tadubu ki̱yunge a subu kwa̱ri̱m we nori̱ntu aya ti̱mi twali̱m!
“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin. Ti̱nura kuteng kwa̱sengu ka chibenge, aya we bwa mure a rii ki̱ni ka ki̱fule ti bwila.
Ki̱dubu ni̱bu Farisamu! Ta mwedu ta nura mure kwa̱se yinang, ke bwa kute a le.
“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin! N ti̱n yinang futu ti̱tu a lelei we bale fi̱lange aya mure a ri ki̱ni ti̱kutu kwa̱mi n ti dutu dangtidangti.
Yinu yiko ti̱n, we a tibe ni̱be, ti̱yungdu tiko n ti̱n ni̱bu yilem aya we bwa mure ti ri ki̱ni di̱bebelin n ti muli̱n.
“A no chi̱n, ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, ni̱bu di̱bebelin! Aya ti̱muba fa̱kuti mi̱n futu, ti̱dosa futu ni̱bu yile.
Ti̱yidu tiko, ‘Ka a no ni̱n we ki̱swi tukebu ni̱me a no nang chibebu fa̱kubi̱bu!’
We yiko, ti̱yung tiko n ti̱n nang bwesi̱m ni̱bu bi̱bu a chiben fa̱kubu.
A ri fal, ti̱swan nangitu tukebu chimu a mwentu!
“N ti̱n sotiyu! N ti̱n beti̱ soti bara̱ka̱m! Ka madi yire ta swidu we far ki̱rangi̱ne?
Di̱ne yiko, mi̱n tum chimi̱ne fa̱kubi̱bi n ti ni̱bu yungki̱m n ti ni̱bu mwataku. Bi̱kamu ta chidu ta kuda ki̱yang bwang, bi̱kamu ta twaladu we kambi muraku chitu yinu ta bunti̱du we binti̱tu.
“Di̱ne yiko, ti̱welan ki̱tum ni̱bu yile mi kwang ka ki̱la dutu chi̱n, ka mweti̱nuwe ki̱tum Abila naba yile ka lanti̱na Sakariya bwe Barakiya, wu ta chi̱u a tibe fi wauwade n ti se Kwama wa twike.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu ti̱welan ni̱bu bi̱bu a kau dutumu ka wuran bwi ki̱ni di̱kalan di̱du.”
“Wo, Wurchalima! Ti̱chibe fa̱kubi̱bu, ti̱kwelati̱ bi̱tumbi̱ri̱mu n Kwama a tum chimi̱nemu. Ki̱da yile mi̱n baddu mang mur chi̱nu yinangu na yibbe ki̱mur bwesi̱m ki̱mu a ti̱ki̱ni kiyangu aya ta kebu.
Kan Kwamana Wurchalima ka di̱ngledu, kano a ne ni we!
N fwa chimi̱n, a mwetuwe diwu, a ne ta kui ti̱nu ki̱da ka lami̱nti̱ yo ta yidu ko, ‘Kwama a dela ki̱n wu ki̱bedu a di̱n Tewuduwe ne.’ ”
N Yesu a chir we Kan Kwamanu ki̱yikadu, miyari̱m ki̱mu a yal ki̱n, a yung leran mukku a Kan Kwamanitu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱da̱ng leran mukku Kan Kwamanu. Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a ne du wuka kale a di a keko, ka wuredu ki̱ni kwang.”
Yo n Yesu a swe a Kun setune, miyari̱m ki̱mu a be n chikun a yi ko, “Fwa ni̱mi̱n, ti̱tu ka fwedi fere? Wureni ka kau di̱mwal beki̱nu n ti di̱du a di swan kuten.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ma daan, wuka ni a buti̱du chi̱n we.”
Ni̱bu nabwen ka bedu a di̱n mi̱n, ka ni̱n yi chi̱nu ko, “Ni̱n nang Masiya.” Ka butu ni̱bu nabwen.
Ta nwe ya̱mi kumbiyu n ti dirdi kunin ya̱mi kumbiye n ti yo kumbitu yaka fwede, ti̱wulu tayi we, a mwituwe ti̱tu ka fwedu, aya n ke di swan kute ti̱ti̱niye.
Kuu ka kuladu n ti kuu, yaa ti yaa, chun ka ma ni̱bu, ti̱mu ka mi̱kadu a fantiyu dangtidangti.
Aya ti̱tu mweku, riye siine a tibu bedu.
Ka ni chi̱nu a fa̱li ni̱bi, ke a ni chi̱n riye, ka chi̱u chi̱nu, kuuti nabwen ka ko chi̱nu di̱ne mi̱n.
We ki̱dang kangu, nabwen ka ki̱ladi kuteng we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu, ka kwa̱l yichiyu, ka koti̱ yichiyu.
Fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu nabwen ka chiredu, ka butu ni̱bu nabwen.
Di̱ne nabwe muli̱ne, nabwen ka du mi̱laku kebu chimangu.
Aya wu ka mu ni̱ri ki̱ri̱ng ka lami̱nti̱ di swan kute, ka swidu.
Ti̱nti̱ne, ya̱m bi̱li̱m bi̱bu a Yaa Kwama, ka le ki̱teli kuuti ni̱bi kwang, yinu di swan kute ka bedu.
Ta ku chi danduri ti̱bwilai ti̱tu fa̱ku Kwama n Daniyal a fwaatu, a ti we fi wauwade, ni ki̱kide a swaan.
Bi̱bu a Yafudiyamu a wul kunni.
Wu a fi̱lang ki̱fi̱kadu a kane, a lewedi̱ lo we ko be ka da̱u chi a tarre.
Wu a kuuwe, a ki̱ladu we ko beka da̱u luke ko.
A no nati̱bu ki̱ni lubimu n ti bi̱bu ki̱bwa̱u bwesi̱m mi̱mu we ki̱swi wuko!
Ti̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu ke bananiyu a kaduwe sa̱na̱ng ka difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam.
Di̱ne we ki̱swi wuko, riye wu a fweenbuwe yo ti̱ti̱nitu a mwe lanta ki̱kang, duum ki̱mu a ne fweenti̱nu we.
Ka no n ke di̱ne a ki̱tu ditikiye, a no a ne ni wu a ti̱m ka swide we. Aya di̱ne bi̱kamu bi̱suti̱ri̱m Kwamam ka ki̱ti̱n diti chiyu.
We ki̱swi wuko, ka wuka ni ka ya̱nu ko, “Da̱ng Masiya, nang we! Ti̱keduwe.”
Nangki̱n, ni̱bu Masiya ti̱kwanimu n ti Fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu nabwen ka chiredu, ka yung chi ya̱r yiitu nabwen, ke chi butu ni̱bu kono nang bi̱suti̱ri̱mu, ka no medu ka fwede.
Ti̱da̱ng, n fwa chimi̱ni fi̱la.
“Di̱ne yiko, ka bi̱kam ka yi chi̱nu ko, Masiya nang wu a di̱kire a bwa, ti̱keduwe. Ka, ka yidu ko, a bunge, ti keduwe.”
Nangki̱n, tiyangu ki̱yile a yile we bwa twa̱re ki̱swanati̱nu a ki̱twalengu, nang tiyangu Bwe Nii ka ki̱la mi̱nedangu.
Fi kwa̱me we mi̱ne, nang fi ki̱sungti̱ kwasi ki̱murande.
A kuteng riyengu, bi̱nabi̱na dii a ne yii kuko, swangu a ne ka fwiyedu. Ki̱switiyu ka twakadu we dii, dukan kwali̱n chi̱nu a twiyenu ka mi̱kadu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, Bwe Nii ka fwedu we twiye. Ni̱bu we kuuti ti̱ti̱ni yi kwang ka ma furi ki̱liki̱li. N chi ka ku Bwe Nii ki̱bedu a di̱twin ki̱ni dukan n ti dwiyen ti̱dui.
Ka tume ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu ka ku sum ki̱ni dukan, n chi ka mure bi̱suti̱ri̱m Kwamamu we twa̱ru n ti ki̱twale n ti twa̱r wuli̱nu n ti kir kulanu.
Ti̱miyan we tiyang sinangu. Yo ki̱yange a mwe ki̱sutedu, ki̱twaba lwangi̱n ti̱fwiye. Ti̱yin ti̱nu tii didi̱be a lame.
We yiko, ka ti̱ku ki̱chiti̱wu mang fwa chimi̱ne, ti yim ki̱swi a mwatawe, a tu a lame kwa̱r.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, di̱kalan di̱du a ne sudu, ki̱chitu wu kwang a mwintuwe ka fwedu.
Dii n ti ti̱mu ka sudu, aya di̱kwa̱l yii mi̱nu a ne yara ti̱m.
A ne nii a yim dii n ti awa wu ti̱tu ka fweende we, kasi no nang ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimu, kasi no nang Bwe, kana Te n ki̱kun a yim.
A lakanbu n ti ki̱dang Nufuwangu, beki̱ Bwe Nii kanodi yiko.
Yinang ki̱dang kangu, yo mwe bambi̱li̱me a tibu bede, ni̱bu ki̱chadu, ki̱nodu, kwartabu ti nati̱bu ki̱ma ki̱nati a lami̱nti̱ yo n Nufu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe.
N chi a yimbu chi ki̱fweditu, mwe bambi̱lake a be a wo chi kwang. Nang tiyangu di Bwe Nii ka ki̱lade kanodu we mi̱nangu.
We ki̱swi wuko, ni̱bi burau kanodu a kuu, ka da̱di wiin ka dudi wiin.
Nati̱bi burau kani̱n kwa chaam ware, ka da̱du wiin, ka dudi wiin.
Di̱ne yiko, “Ti̱swe ki̱ni doku bwiyang di̱ne ta yimbu di Tewuduwe chi̱n ka ki̱la mi̱nede.
Aya ti̱yim, ka naba lo a no yim yo daaku ka bedu ki̱ni kume, a no neka da duum ki̱ni kum ka ma ki̱yolang, a ne dudu ko daaku a le lo.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱swe ki̱ni doku bwiyang, di̱ne a ki̱swi ta yimbe Bwe Nii ka ki̱ladu.”
N wure ka̱be wuyile ki̱ni yingku, wu Tewuduwe a yo ka to lo, yinu ki̱ni bi̱kamu ka̱bi chabti̱tu a ki̱swi a dakane?
Naba delake ka̱be wu Tewuduwe ko beka ya ki̱nu we yii nange di ka ki̱lade.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka yo ka̱be wu kani̱n da̱ng ki̱mi̱n kuli̱n ki̱ni kwang we lo.
Aya ka ka̱be wubwila, a kur we ni̱r ki̱nu ko, Tewuduwe ko a ne ki̱ladi datu.
N ki̱n a le ki̱basu kal ki̱nu ni̱bu nangangi̱mu, ki̱chadu, ki̱nodu n ti ni̱bu ti̱norani̱mu.
Ka n ki̱n a ma yiko, Tewuduwe ko ka bedu a di n ti ki̱swi n ki̱n a yimbe.
Naba loko ka ngau ki̱nu ka mwata ki̱mi̱nu n ti ni̱bu di̱bebeli̱ni̱mu. We fi n chi ka kiwii n ti ki̱rti̱ku numang.
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Ni swe Yaa Kwama ki̱ni, ti̱kan fwa̱ni kubu ti̱tu a chir ki̱ni ti̱nungri we fiti̱lati chiyu yaka tekadu n ti bwele ki̱yiu naye.
Bi̱bi bunumu a kasabu, bi̱kami bunumu ki̱ni kasantu.
Bi̱bu a kasa̱bi̱mu a chir ki̱ni fiti̱lati chiyu, a da̱u ti̱bu kaang ki̱nung we belure.
Aya bi̱bu a kasani̱mu a da̱u ti̱nungritu a beti̱lureti chiyu.
Bwele ki̱yiu naye a bebi̱ datu, di̱ne yiko n chi a le ki̱dara dumi.
“Ki̱ni kum n chi a nwe di̱yalu ko, ‘Bwele nang wu,’ ti̱chire ni yiu ki̱n.
Fwa̱ni ti̱tu a kun ki̱do fiti̱ti̱lati chiyu.
Bi̱bu a kasa̱bi̱mu a yi bi̱bu a kasani̱mu ko, ‘Ti̱ni ni̱mi̱n ki̱nung, fitilati niyu ki̱dumedu.’
Aya bi̱bu a kasani̱mu a yi chi ko, ‘Ki̱nungu a ne ka lwe ni̱nu n ti chi̱n. Bunge ti̱ya ti̱ta̱ne we bwa ni̱bu ki̱miinde.’
Yo n chi a yikan yaka ta̱ne ki̱nunge, bwele ki̱yiu naye a be. Bi̱bu we fiko a do bwimu n chi a le lo ni̱bu ki̱mulen tiniye ware, a yingeti̱ kwa̱ru.
“A kuteng ki̱ku bi̱bu a kasa̱bi̱mu a ki̱lawengu, a yi ko, ‘Tewuduwe, wudu ni̱mi̱n kwa̱ru.’
Aya a ki̱nta chi ko, ‘Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, mang yin chinbu.’
“Di̱ne yiko, ti̱ma ki̱yolang, di̱ne ta yimbu, dii ka ki̱swi Bwe Nii ka bemi̱nede.”
Yinu n Yesu a chakakku ko, “Yaa Kwama ni swedu tiyang ni wu yaka chir di̱bwale, a yal ka̱bi kiyu, a kera chimi̱n kuli kitu.
A ni wuka ka̱mbi̱ru swa̱ngi yunu, a ni wuka ka̱mbi̱ru swa̱ngi yurau, a niti̱ wuka ka̱mbi̱ru swe wiin. A ni ka wuwule niye yinang kangu a dakanang. Yinu a yikan.
Bi̱nabi̱na, n ki̱n wu a yiu ka̱mbi̱ru swa̱ngi yunuwe a yikan a ya ma di̱be ki̱n a yawe yikai swa̱ngi yunu we mure.
Wu a yiu ka̱mbi̱r swa̱ngi yurabe, n ki̱n a ya ma di̱be ki̱n a yawe yikai swa̱ngi yurau ti̱nti̱n.
Aya n ki̱n wu a yiu swe wiine, a ya wu bwang a lai ka̱mbi̱r Tewuduwe konu we.
“A kuteng ki̱ku niyang dami̱ni bayimangu, Tewuduwe ka̱biye a be, ka yiu chi ka nang wuwule niye a mange.
Wu a yiu swa̱ngi yunuwe a be ki̱ni yikai swa̱ngi yunu ko, ‘Tewuduwe n nii swa̱ngi yunu, n yate yikai yi yunu.’
Tewuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, ‘Kwele bwe wu yile, n mun ka̱be wu yile, muni ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱r we ti̱ti bayimitu. Mang yonu a ti̱tu nabweni. Be ni ma furi mwenu ware.’
“Yinu wu a yiu swa̱ngi yurabe, a be a yi ko, ‘Tewuduwe, swa̱ngi mwiyi yurau, n yati̱ yikai swa̱ngi yi yurabu.’
Tewuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, ‘Kwele! M mun ka̱be wu yile, wu ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re. Muni Ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱r we ti̱ti bayimitu. Mang yonuwe ti̱nabwenitu. Be ni ma furi mwemwe n ti mun.’
“Yinu wu a yiu swe wiine a be a yi ko, ‘Tewuduwe, n yim damo a ma bwar. Mun kau chi mwan fibe, mun kubeti̱ ti̱ta fa̱li ni̱bii.
N nwe tayi, n lai swe mwang niye a bwang. N nang wu mang bemi̱ne ki̱ne.’
“Tewuduwe a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, ‘Mun kasi nii wu bwila, fwiti a la mi̱n la! A mwang yim mi̱n kada fi mang fibe, mi̱n chati̱ Fa̱li ni̱bi.
Ngo, a no mwang yo midu a bi̱ne ka̱mbi̱re. Yo no mang be ye a no mang yadu a bwi a la fiko.
Di̱ne yiko ti̱yiu we di̱ki̱ne, ti̱ni wu ki̱ni swa̱ngiyi kube.
Wu ki̱ni chiye, ni su ki̱mi̱nu, ka kadu nabwen. Aya wu a newe ki̱ne, kasi no nang ti̱ti bayimitu, ka yiti̱du.
Ti̱mar nii wu bwila wu a ki̱liki̱liye wu kwane. We bwa ki̱kii wii ka ni̱n ki̱rti̱ti̱ num.’
“Aya yo Bwe Nii ka bedu ki̱ni dwiyen kite n ti ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimi kwange, ka swedu we ki̱di̱ng mati̱ne wu a yaa ko.
Ka mur kuuti ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu we kakku kangi kwang. Ka kera chidu yinangu naba toke ki̱kera kwanti n ti sitiyang.
Ka yo kwantiyu a kan ki̱yilang aya sitiyu a kwanta kwelang.
“M Mai ka yi bi̱ba kangki̱yilamu ko, ti̱be ni̱bu bi̱bu n Temi a yo chimi̱n delaku, ti̱chau kula yaa n Kwama a do chimi̱n yo a tibu yo ti̱ti̱nite.
Di̱ne yo chunu ki̱buye, ti̱nii chabti̱tu n chau, dimwen a dai, ti̱nii mwe n no, m be rungkoi, ti̱yii fa̱li yurau.
Mi̱ni twatwadu, ti̱swe mi bwi. N bubuwe, ti̱be ti̱da̱ngi. Mi̱n a di̱bi̱nti̱l ti̱be ti̱sii ti̱n.
“Yinu ni̱bu ni̱r dini̱mu ka ke ki̱mi̱nu ko, ‘Tewuduwe, ni̱n kuun a fi̱re mun nwe chuun, yinu nang ni̱n chabte? Ka dimwene yinu nang ni̱n mwe mwang no?
Ti̱nti̱n, ni̱n kuun a fi̱re m mun rungko, yinu nang yin fa̱li yurabe? Ni̱n kuun a fi̱re m muni twatwadu yinu nang swemi̱n bwiye?
Yi fere na kuun m bubuwe ka a di̱bi̱nti̱l, yana siine.’
“M Mai ka ke chi mi̱nu ko, ‘Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, kasi no ti̱ti̱le chi ta ma bi̱ti̱ri̱mu mi̱ne, ti̱mami.’
“N ki̱n fal ka yi bi̱bu a kwatakwelamu ko, ‘Ti̱yika mi̱n a fi, n ti̱n bi̱bu ni̱bu kaiyimu, ti̱le ki̱rangu ni̱bu a do Setan mi̱n n ti ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu.
Di̱ne, n nwe chun, ta niibu chabtu. N nwe dimwenu, ta niibu mwe mang node.
M ma rungkoi, ta yiibu. Mi̱ni twatwadu, ta swemibu bwi. N bubuwe, n le di̱bi̱nti̱l, ta siibu.’
“Yinu n chi ka ke ki̱mi̱nu ko, ‘Tewuduwe ni̱n kuun a fi̱re ki̱ni chun, ka ki̱ni dimwene, ka a rungkoye, ka muni twatwade, ka a lo di̱bi̱nti̱lenge, nang ma mi̱nbu chiye?’
Yinu ka ke chi mi̱nu ko, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, yo ta mabu wuka mi̱nbu we bi̱ti̱ri̱m bi̱bu ko wiine bi̱bu a mwan a tami̱mu, a yung ta ma mi̱mi̱nbu.
Bi̱bu a tau wa̱re ki̱yika faru a ki̱rangin, fi ka le nwe riye wu ki̱diya kwade, aya ni̱bu yilemu ka ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi.”
Yo n Yesu a ri ya̱m bi̱bi kwange, a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko,
“Ti̱yim Yiye yabake a du ditiyi yurabu, wu ka ni Bwe Nii ka le fa̱li ni̱bi, ke a kuka ki̱n.”
Yinu tikaketi fansetiye a muran a lon tikake fanse, wu di̱n ki̱nu n Kayafa.
N chi a do ka tau Yesu daan, ka chi̱u ki̱nu.
Aya n chi a yi ko, “N ke a ki̱swi Yiye, di̱ne ke ni̱bu a madu di̱kulan we.”
Yo n Yesu we Betani didine, we lo Simun naba mwa̱liye,
Wuka naye a be fi a di̱Yesuwe ki̱ni lure ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱range, ki̱ni kwa̱ti̱rang. A kur we dur ki̱nu, yo n ki̱n a swe ki̱chau chabte.
Aya yo Miyari̱m ki̱mu a ku yiko, a fwi chi mi̱n ni̱tu, a bi̱u bwiti chiyu ko, “Ti̱tu n ke ki̱yaiya?
Ki̱nungu a no chir ka̱mbi̱ru nabwen, ni ni babumbu.”
Kangu n Yesu a swaan chi a ni̱tu chitangu, a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱kwa̱ma naye wuwe? A ma chitu a da̱mi.
Ka wuwule diye babumbi̱bu we ware n ti chi̱n, aya n ti̱newe n ti mi̱ni kwadu.
Ki̱nung ki̱ku a kur mi a bwiyangu a ma di̱ne ki̱ do furem mi̱me.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, we ti̱ti̱niti kwang, fi ka mang di̱mware, ya̱m bi̱bu ka chiredu di̱ne kurku chitu naye wu a maatu.”
Wuka wiin we miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu, wu di̱n ki̱nu n Yafuda Yiskariyoti, a ya we tikake fansetiye.
A yi ko, “Ta nii wureni ka n ni chi̱n ki̱ne?” N chi a ki ka̱mbi̱r asurfanu wani ti̱ta a ni.
A mwetuwe ki̱dang kangu, n Yafuda ki̱babba wa̱re ka kwa̱li̱n Yesuwe.
We di wu kake wu a ki̱danne wu a ne yis we, miyari̱mu a be bwa di̱Yesu ki̱bi̱du ko, “Mun baddu nang do fi ki̱danni Yiye yabake a fi̱re?”
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱le bi̱nu, ta ya wuka ni we, ti̱yi ki̱n ko, ‘Naba yungke a fwa ko, ki̱swi ko a mwatawe, ka chau Yiye yabake a lomo n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu.’ ”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a ma kangu n Yesu a fwa chi mi̱nangu, a doti̱ Yiye yabake.
Yo ti̱ma senge, a swe ki̱chau chabti̱tu n ti Miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu.
Yo n chi we ki̱chau chabti̱te, n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu wuka we tibe chi̱n ka kwa̱liyu.”
N chi a nwebu ta̱ma̱ng ya̱m Yesumu. N kawure ki̱yidu ko, “Ka m mi̱na, Tewuduwe.”
A ki̱nta chi ko, “Wu a di̱ku fa̱la̱ng we kwa̱se ware ti mi̱ne, nang wu ka kwa̱liye.
Bwe Nii ka bwadu kangu ni̱bu a mwal we di̱ki̱nengu, a ya a no nii wu ka kwa̱l Bwe Nii! Bunge no a bi̱bu nii wu.”
N Yafuda wu a kwa̱l Yesuwe, a yiko, “Tete n mi̱na?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “A mwang fwa.”
Yo n chi a yaki̱ chau chabti̱te, n Yesu a da̱u ki̱danne, a wana Kwama a wula ki̱daniyu, a ni miyari̱m ki̱mu, a yi ko, “Ti̱ngang, ti̱chau, ti̱tu nang bwimiyu.”
Yinu a da̱u kwa̱se mwe wu ki̱ni mwe ki̱danne a wana Kwama, yinu a ni chi a yi ko, “Ti̱no Ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang.
Ti̱tu nang bwa̱ki̱ ki̱tum mi̱mangu, bi̱bu mang kur di̱ne ni̱bu nabwen a duku ki̱letimu.
Aya mi̱n yi chi̱nu, a ne mang no ti̱n wuka mwe yinab we ki̱da, ka lantu di wu mang no wuka wu fwiye n ti chi̱n we a yaa Temiye.”
Yo n chi a kau tee, a chir a yika Kun setune.
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang, ta wullu ta dwiyu, we kum wu, di̱ne we chi ka fwedu n ti mi̱nitu, a mwal ko,
‘Ka ngau naba tore,
ki̱ran kwantinu ka yaradu.’ ”
“Aya a kutengu mang kunu we furangu, mang tu chi̱nu we Ka̱lili.”
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka n kawure ka wule, a bwin mi̱n.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa mi̱nu, we kum wu mwang kwilayu da̱a̱ yitta, yinu kware ka ta̱r chi.”
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Kasi no mang bwadu n ti mun, a ne mang kwilanu.” Bi̱kamu miyari̱m ki̱mi kwang a fwati̱ni yiko.
Yinu n Yesu a yika wuka fi wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko, Kesemani, a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱swe a fi mi̱n yika bwanu yamang twa̱ba̱ buni we.”
A yika n ti Biti̱r n ti bwesi̱m Sa̱badimi burabi̱mu, n Yakubu n ti Yowana, n ki̱n a mwe ki̱ma furi ki̱liki̱lin.
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n ma furi ki̱lin tiyangu mang bwadang. Ti̱swe a fi, ti̱ma ki̱yolangu ware n ti mi̱n.”
Yo n ki̱n a ya kakki bayi̱me, a sung a swa kabu a ti̱m, a twa̱ba̱ bunitu, a yi ko, “Tete, ka ka fwede, dami ki̱dang ki̱ku. Aya bunti̱nu ki̱ke mi we, bunti̱n wumo ki̱ke, chi mwang ke.”
A ki̱la fi a Miyari̱m ki̱me, a be a ya n chi ki̱da duum, a yi Biti̱r ko, “A ne ta ma ki̱yolangu ware ti mi̱n kasi no awa wiina?
“Ti̱ma ki̱yolang n ti twa̱ba̱ku, di̱ne ke ti̱yaruwe swaka̱ki̱ku. Aya Fi̱ki̱m a ke, bwiyu a ne dukan we.”
A ki̱la yikatuwe ki̱dang robang, a twa̱ba̱ bunitu, a yi ko, “Tete, ka riye wu a mwintuwenge, yam ki̱kemo a ri yiko.”
Yo a ki̱latewe a be ya chi ki̱da duum, di̱ne duumu a la nui chiyu.
A duti̱ chi ki̱da a yika twa̱ba̱ku ki̱tarang, ki̱fwa ka bi̱biini̱m.
A ki̱la fi a Miyari̱m ki̱me, a yi chi ko, “Lanta ki̱ka̱ngi chik ti̱da duuma? Dang awa a lam wu Bwe Nii ka le Fa̱li ni̱bu ki̱letime.
Ti̱kun, ni yikan! Nii wu ka kwa̱liye nang wu a lame ki̱dwan.”
Yo n ki̱n we ki̱fwa ya̱me, n Yafuda wu we Miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱me n ti ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen, a be ki̱ni kuli n ti dwami. Tikaketi fansetimu n ti selebu a tume chi.
Wu ka kwa̱liye a tu a ni chi di̱mwal swaanki̱n ko, “Wu mang kwarre nang ki̱n ti̱tau.”
Bi̱nabi̱na a be fi n Yesu we mi̱ne, a yi ki̱n ko, “Mun Tete naba yungke.” A kwar ti̱ni ki̱m.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Fate, ma chitu mwang be mwang maditu.”
N chi a ki̱re a tau ki̱n.
We fiko, wuka ni we bi̱bu ware n ti Yesumu, a chake kul ki̱nu a mwatu ki̱tele ka̱be tikake Fanse wad.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Di̱ki̱ti̱ kuluwe le ko, wu a da kulle, kul ka chi̱u ki̱nu.
Ta yimbu ko, mi̱ni ki̱ni dukanu mang bi̱u Temi, kasi no ki̱kang ka tumiye kwa̱li ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimi kub chiri turaba?
Ka a mabi yiko, ka rii chitu lwangi̱n Kwamanu a fwatu yire, a mwintuwe ka fwedi yiko.”
We ki̱swi wuko, n Yesu a yi ni̱bu ko, “Ti̱chire ki̱ni kuli n ti dwami ke be ti̱tan mi̱n yinang dakuwa? Ka wuwule diye mi̱n swedu we yifi̱la Kan Kwamane mi̱n ma miyaku, ta taibu.
Aya ti̱tu a fwe yiko kwang ko ke chi fa̱kubu feredimu a mwalitu a rii yinang ka a mwal we tati̱ki̱dai yika̱riyangu.” Yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a nwe yiko, a yara ti̱ni kwang.
Yinu bi̱bu a tau Yesumu a yikan bwa di̱Kayafa Wuduwe fansetiye, fi ni̱bu yungku yili̱n n ti seli̱bu a muran mi̱ne.
Aya Biti̱r a bunti̱ chi a kuteng, yo a lam lo wuduwe Fansetiye, a le a swe n ti ti̱karani, ko ke ki̱ku kangu n chi ka madangu.
Tikake Fanseti n ti kwa̱l kabaki̱n a le ki̱bau wa̱re ti̱kwaniye ka chi̱n Yesu.
Aya n chi a yabu ki̱ni ki̱le. Kasi ki̱ku ni̱bu nabwen a chire ki̱mwe ti̱kwanitangu. Ki̱ni kutengu bi̱kami burau a chirte.
N chi a yiko, “Nii wu a yi ko, mi̱ni ki̱ni dukan mang wur Kan Kwamanu, mang muddu a diti yitta.”
Yinu Wuduwe fansetiye a kun a titiye a yi ko, “Mun newe ki̱ni di̱ki̱li̱n yiina? Mwang fwadu ko wule we ya̱miyu ni̱bu ki̱fwadu a dur muniyu?”
N Yesu a fwabu chi. Tikake Fanse a yi ki̱n ko, “Fwa bi̱yili̱m tibemo n ti Kwama, m mun nang Masiya Bwe Kwama?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “N fwa tas. Aya mi̱n yi chi̱nu we bwa kake ta ku Bwe Nii ka swedu we kang ki̱yilang Naba Dukane, ki̱bedu a ti̱twini we bwa diye.”
Tikake Fanse, a ngi̱ra lukei kiyu, di̱ne kaiya ni̱re, a yi ko, “Ya̱mu a ri! A swa̱ba Kwama!
Ti̱ku yire?”
N chi a ke ko, “A dakan ka bwadu.”
N chi a ti̱bu ki̱ni ki̱tumu we kabu ki̱ngau ti̱nu, bi̱kamu a ngabbi wanti̱teli.
N chi ki̱yidu ko, “Ma nimi̱n fa̱kuitu, ka mun nang Masiya! Fwa ni̱mi̱n ni wu a nganne!”
We ki̱swi wuko, m Biti̱r a swenga tarre lo, di̱kan fwa̱n ka̱be wu ki̱ma nangang we fiko a be bwa di̱ki̱ne a yi ko, “Mun ti̱n no ware n ti Yesu naba Ka̱lili.”
Aya m Biti̱r a kwila we kakku chiyangu a yi ko, “Mang yimi̱nbu chi we dur nii wunu!”
Yo a chir a yika sa̱ngka, wuka ka̱be fwa̱ne wu ki̱ma nanga we lo, a ku ki̱n a yi bi̱bu we fikomu ko, “Nii wu a no we ware n ti Yesu wu a Nasa̱ret!”
M Biti̱r a ki̱la kwilati̱ ki̱da ki̱ni di̱twa̱mbi̱r ko, “Mang yimbu ni wu!”
A kuteng ki̱ku a ri̱keti̱ni bayimangu, bi̱bu a tiwe fikomu a yi Biti̱r ko, “Ki̱kumang, mun a no we n ti Yesu banasarete. Ki̱swi mun fwaan ya̱me a kwa̱li̱n.”
N ki̱n a mwe ti̱turantu ki̱twa̱mati̱ chitu ko, “Mang yimbu ni wu!”
Ki̱ri ya̱miye, kware ta̱r ti̱n.
M Biti̱r a kur ya̱mu n Yesu a fwa ki̱mi̱ni̱mu ko, “Mwang kwilayu ki̱da yitta, kware ka ta̱rti̱ chi.” N ki̱n a kiwii ki̱ni dukan.
Yo ti̱ma kwiyane, wuduwe fansetiye n ti seli̱bu bi̱ni̱mu, a di̱ka yii ko chi chi̱u Yesu.
N chi a kwau ki̱n, a yikani ki̱n, a ya ni kwabna Bi̱latu.
Yo n Yafuda wu a kwa̱l ki̱ne, a ku ya̱mu a mwatan ni̱bu yaka chi̱u Yesuwe, a ma furi ki̱liki̱li, a ki̱la bwana wuduwe fansetiye n ti seli̱bu, a niti̱ chi ka̱mbi̱r asurfanu wani ti̱tanu we.
A yi ko, “M ma ki̱le, kangu mang ni wu a mabu ki̱le ke a bwangu.”
Aya n chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Lwangang nang wule we ti̱tu? Ti̱tu lwangang mwang.”
N ki̱n a kur ka̱mbi̱r asurfanu we Kan Kwamanu, a chir ti̱n. A yikan a ya di̱ku dwaku.
Aya wuduwe fansetiye a wo Asurfa a yi ko, “A dakabu ka̱mbi̱r di̱du ni yangdu a Kan Kwaman di̱ne ka̱mbi̱r ki̱tumi̱n.”
N chi a ki̱ka yii, ka tani̱n ku naba kubiye ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱ru ke a nang furen rungko.
Di̱ne yiko, a yal fiko ko, “Ku ki̱tume.”
Yiko, a ri chitu fa̱ku Yirmiya a fwa ko, “N chi a da̱u ka̱mbi̱r asurfan wani ti̱ta, chi a kekan ka fedu a dur Yisrelane.
A ta̱n ku naba kubiye ki̱n, kangu n Tewuduwe a fwangu.”
N Yesu a ti we kakku kwabnangu, kwabna a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “M mun nang Mai ni̱bu Yafudama?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “N fwa tas.”
Aya yo wuduwe fansetiyeyu n ti Seli̱bu, ki̱fwa ya̱m a dur ki̱ne, a yibu chi ya̱m.
M Bi̱latu a yi ko, “Mwang nwebu chi ni̱bu ki̱fwadu a dur munita?”
Aya n Yesu a ki̱l ki̱mi̱nbu di̱kwa̱l, kono we ya̱m bi̱bu ni̱bu a yi ki̱ni̱mu. Ti̱tu a ya̱r kwabna yii.
We ki̱swi wu a Yiye yabake, n kwabna ki̱mar ni̱bu mi̱n naba ki̱le wiin wu n chi ki̱badde.
We ki̱swi wuko, wuka nii we wu ni̱bu a yim n ki̱n naba ki̱letiye. Nii wu di̱n ki̱nu m Barabas a di̱bi̱nti̱l.
Yo ni̱bu Yafudamu a murane, m Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱badu m kwiye wure? M Barabas, ka n Yesu wu ti̱yalu ko Masiya?”
Di̱ne n Bi̱latu a yim ko, n chi a ko Yesu di̱ne kati̱ne.
Kangu m Bi̱latu a swe we ki̱di̱ng mwatakangu, naye ko a yi ki̱n ko, “Chirmi̱n we ya̱m naba ni̱ri dini̱mu, di̱ne diwu kumi kwad n nwe riye we dur ki̱nu a dwakam.”
Tikaketi fansetiyu n ti seli̱bu a kukan ki̱rangu we ni̱bu ko, a mar Barabas, a chi̱u Yesu.
Kwabna a bi̱u chi ko, “M mar chimi̱ne wure, we ni̱bi burabi̱mu? N chi a yibi kuuu ko ‘Barabas.’ ”
M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Mang madi yire ki̱ni Yesu wu ti̱yalu ko Masiya?”
N chi a yibi kuuu ko, “Ti̱kukan!”
M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Di̱ne wule, a ma ti̱ti̱le chi ti̱kwani ti̱tu a lwe bwaatu?”
N chi a su kemiyi kuuu ko, “Ti̱kukan!”

Kangu m Bi̱latu a ku ya̱mu a la dukan ki̱nangu, yinu kusi̱ru ki̱laan fikongu. A bau mwe a nura fa̱li kiyu we kakki̱ ni̱bangu, a yi ko, “Lwangang mang a newe ki̱tum nii wumu. Lwangang chang, ki̱tum ki̱mu a dur chi̱n.”
Ni̱bi kwang a ke ko, “Ki̱tum ki̱mu a swe a dutu ni̱n n ti bwesi̱m ni̱m!”
Yinu a kwi chimi̱ne Barabas. Aya n ki̱n a yi ni̱bu ko, a twala Yesu, yinu n chi a yikani ki̱n a ya kukan.
We fiko ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a lo kwabna, n chi a murti̱ kwa̱l chi̱nu we di̱ki̱ne,
N chi a suku ki̱mi̱n luke ko, a yau ki̱mi̱n wuka luke wurwur ki̱duum bi̱bu mati̱m ki̱yadi̱mu.
N chi a ma ki̱mi̱n salasala wa kwa̱da, a do ki̱mi̱n we duru a niti̱ ki̱twalang we kang ki̱yilang kangu, n chi ki̱chungdu we kaki̱ku kangu, ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n ki̱fiye ko, “Ni̱n siinu Mai ni̱bu Yafudam!”
N chi a ti̱bu ki̱ni ki̱tumu, a yitu ki̱twalang, a twali ki̱n we duru.
Yo n chi a ri ki̱fiyenge, a suku ki̱mi̱n luke wurwure, a do ki̱mi̱nti̱ lukei kiyu we, a yikan ni ki̱n ko ke chi kuka ki̱n.
Yo n chi we wa̱re ki̱yikade, n chi a tekan n ti wuka naba Sairin, di̱n ki̱nu n Simun, n chi a yo nii wu ki̱ni dukan ko a da̱u ki̱tiyang bwa Yesungu.
Yo n chi a lam wuka fi wu ki̱yalu ko, “Kolkota” ka nang chikiye fi wu a kasire.
N chi a ni wuka mwe yinabi wu a se n ti dwamang ko a no. A ya yo n ki̱n a twaiye a ko a nobu.
Yo n chi a kuka ki̱ne, a kera ti̱n lukei kiyu we bwiti chiyu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a swe we fiko ki̱da̱ngdu.
We fi a dur Yesu ne, n chi a mwal chitu ko, “WU NANG Mai NI̱BU YAFUDAME.”
N chi a kukan n ti bi̱kam dabi̱kumi burau wuka a kang ki̱yilang, wuka a kwatakwelang.
Bi̱bu ki̱sudumu, ki̱swa̱ba ki̱nu n kawure ki̱mi̱ki̱tini dur.
N chi ki̱yidu ko, “Mun wu mwiko mwang wur Kan Kwamanu, mwang muddu a ditiyu yitta, yu yimwiyu, suwe we ki̱tiyang bwangu ke ni̱n yim ko m mun nang Bwe Kwama!”
Yiko tikaketi fansetiyu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱nmu n ti seli̱bu ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n ki̱fiye ko,
“N ki̱n a yu bi̱kamu, a yimbu yu yikiyu. Ka n ki̱n nang Mai Yisrela, a suwe we ki̱tiyang bwangu, nang ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne.
A ki̱na yo ni̱ru we di̱Kwama. Yam n Kwama a yu ki̱n ki̱kangu, ka we ki̱mi̱la ki̱ne, di̱ne a yi ko n ki̱n Bwe Kwama.”
A fiwine, dabi̱kum bi̱bu a kukan chi waremu, n chi ki̱ti̱buti̱ ya̱m bi̱bwilam bi̱bu.
Ki̱ni tibe kuko, ti̱mu a ma ki̱li.
Yo ki̱swi a fi yitta, n Yesu a bwe wi, a yal chitu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Eli, Eli lama sabatani.” Kanang chikiye “Wa Kwama mi, Kwama mi, a mayire mwang mariye?”
Bi̱kamu a tiran we fikomu, kanga nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, n chi a yi ko, “Nii wu ki̱yal Yiliya?”
Bi̱nabi̱na wuka we bwiti chiyu a wul a da̱a̱ soso, a di̱ka mwe wi bwangbwange, a yab we kwalu a kuku a ni ki̱n ko a no.
Bi̱kamu a yi ko, “Yam didiin ni da̱ng ka Yiliya we bedu ka yu ki̱ne.”
N Yesu a ki̱la kiti̱ wii ki̱da, ki̱ni dukan, yinu ti̱kuritu a chir.
We ki̱dang kangu wule luke wu a yau ki̱swen fi wu wauwade, a ngi̱ran ti̱me yurau, a mwe we dii a fwe ti̱na bale ti̱me. Ti̱mu a mi̱kan, kwantiyu a wulan.
Futi̱tu a wuden, bi̱bwari̱mu bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu nabwen a kun we futi̱tu ki̱ni ti̱kuritu.
N chi a chiran we futi̱tu. A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a kun we furangu, n chi a le bi̱ni wauwadi̱nu, ni̱bu nabwen a ku chi.
We ki̱swi wuko, tikake ni̱bu ki̱rang Roma n ti bi̱bu ki̱da̱ng Yesumu, kanga ku mi̱kaku ti̱mu n ti chi a fwetangu, n chi a nwe tayi, a yi ko, “Ki̱kumang wu Bwe Kwama.”
Nati̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a bunte Yesu we Ka̱lili ke chi ma Yesu mi̱n nangangmu. N chi a ti kutan ki̱dange chi ki̱fweditu.
We tibe chi, m Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala we n ti Maryamu ne Yakubu n ti Yusufu n ti ne bwesi̱m Sa̱badime.
Yo me a lame, wuka naba kuli, wu a be a Arimatiya, di̱n ki̱nu n Yusufu. N ki̱n we Miyari̱m Yesumu.
A ya bwa di̱Bi̱latu, a bi̱u kwa̱me Yesu we. N Bi̱latu a ni ki̱n kwa̱me.
N Yusufu a da̱u kwa̱me Yesuwe, a dal ki̱ni luke wu a ne der we.
A yo a di̱kan fur di̱fwin, di̱du a tu a swa̱ba kwami̱n. A bi̱le wuka kale wuduwe, a yinge furi ki̱n, a yika ti̱n.
M Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti Maryamu wuka a swetuwe kakku furangu.
Bafi̱nenangeko, wu kuteng diwu ni̱bu ki̱do bwi di̱ne di sabwi ni̱bu Yafudamu, tikaketi fansetiyu ti ni̱bu Farisamu, n chi a muran we kakku Bi̱latu.
N chi a yi ko, “Tewuduwe diti yiya suyu, ni̱n kur chi naba di̱buti̱re wu a fwa yo we ki̱ni ti̱kuriye ko, ‘A kuteng ditiyi yitta ka kunu we furu.’

Di̱ne yiko, mwang yo ni̱bu ka to furu ka lanti̱n di wutare, di̱ne ke miyari̱mu a be da̱du kwa̱me ko we ki̱ni kutu, a kuteng ki̱ku beka yi ni̱bu ko a kun we furu. Ki̱ku buti̱ku nang ki̱ku niing nwedi ki̱nangu.”
M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ya ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱rangmu, yati̱ to tiyangu ta medangu.”
N chi a yikan yaku to furu, n chi a ma kale mi̱n di̱mwal maiyin we furu, a yo ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ko a nang to furu.
Yo difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam a suwe, we di wu kake ki̱ni si̱n, m Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti wuka Maryamu a ya yaka da̱nge furu.
Bi̱nabi̱na ti̱mu a mi̱kan we ti̱ti̱nitu, wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a suwe we dii, a bi̱l ne kale wu a no yinge fure, a swe we diiko.
N ki̱n yinang ki̱yile, lukei kiyu a fwiyeni tweng yinang fi̱bi̱n.
Yo ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a ku ki̱ne, tayi a tau chi yinang, bwiyu a mi̱kan, n chi a yaran a ti̱m yinang bi̱bwari̱m.
Aya naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi nati̱bu ko, “Ti̱wulu tayi we, n yim ti̱ba Yesu wu ni̱bu a kukane.
A ne we fi. A kun we furu kangu a fwangu. Ti̱be ti̱da̱ng fi Tewuduwe a no dami̱ne.
Ti̱ya fwebu, yati̱ fwa Miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱n tiko, a kun we furu. Aya ka tu chi̱nu we Ka̱lili, ta ku ki̱nu we bwako. Nang chi mang be mang fwa chimi̱nditu.”
Nati̱m bi̱bu a kaibu ki̱swi a du furu a yikan ki̱ni tayi n ti furi mwemwenu nabwen. N chi a wul ko ke ya chi mwa Miyari̱m Yesumu.
N Yesu a ngaban n ti chi, a yi chi ko, “Mang la̱n chi̱n.” N chi a be ki̱dwang a kwar nani kiyu a sii.
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱nwedu tayi we, yati̱ fwa kebu mi̱mu mi̱n tiko a yika Ka̱lili, n chi ka kuyu we bwako.”
Yo nati̱bu ki̱yi̱kade, bi̱kamu we ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a lewe bi̱nu, a fwa wuduwe fansetiye mi̱n chitu a fweti kwang.
Yinu fansetiyu n ti seli̱bu a muran a da̱ng chi we mure, n chi a ni ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ka̱mbi̱r nabwen.
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱yi ni̱bu tiko Miyari̱m ki̱mu a barawe ki̱ni kum a da̱u ki̱n yo ta da dume.
Ka ya̱m bi̱bu a lam kwabna, ni̱n we nang fwa ya̱mu n ti ki̱n, nang yu chi̱nu we riye.”
Ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a yiu ti̱n ka̱mbi̱ru, a ma ti̱n chitu a fwa chi mi̱ni̱ntu. Ya̱m bi̱bu a lanta dii, a ti̱ra ti̱mu ki̱ni kwang, ni̱bu Yafudam ki̱fwadu.
Miyari̱mi kub chiri wiini̱mu a yikan Ka̱lili ki̱ni kwang, n chi a ya di̱kun di̱du n Yesu a yi chi̱nu.
Yo n chi a ku ki̱ne a sii ki̱n, aya bi̱kamu, a le chimi̱nbu we bwiyu ko nang ki̱n.
N Yesu a be ki̱dwan, a yi ko, “A ni mi̱n dwiyentu we dii n ti ti̱mi kwang.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱yikan yati̱i mwa kuuti kwang we ti̱ti̱nitu tiko a bumiti̱n, ti̱nang ma chimi̱n batisma we di̱n Tenun ti di̱Bwenu n ti di̱da Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
Ti̱yung chi chitu mang fwa chimi̱niti kwang a nan bunti̱n yilangu. Ti̱yim ka wuwule diye, mi̱n we n ti chi̱n ka lami̱nti̱ di fi̱rke.”
Ya̱m bi̱li̱mu a dur Yesu Masiya, Bwe Kwamamu a mwengi ying;
We fa̱ku Yichaya, Kwama a fwa ko,
“Da̱ng, mi̱n tum chimi̱n naba di̱tumbi̱re
a kakku chang,
ka do chimi̱n wa̱re.”
“N ki̱n Ker di̱du ki̱chiredu
a di̱kir;
Do wa̱re di̱ne Tewuduwe!”
Yinu n Yowana naba batisma a chire a di̱kir, ki̱mwa ni̱bu ko a wo ki̱ti̱m, a ma batisma ke n chi a ya duku ki̱letiyangu.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a ti̱m ni̱bu Yafudiya n ti ni̱bu bi̱bu a bi̱n Wurchalimamu a rau bwa a di̱ki̱ne, ki̱fwa ki̱leti chiyu, ki̱woti̱ ki̱ti̱mu, ki̱mati̱ batisma we laa Wurdune.
N Yowana a do di̱ba̱l di̱du ni̱bu a ku ki̱ni rii ta̱li̱miye, a mu tar ki̱nu ki̱ni di̱ba̱l, chabtu ki̱ntu ki̱kwiti n ti mwe rwi.
N ki̱n a ma di̱mwaru ying; “A kuteng mangu, wuka ni wuduwe wu a la mi̱ni dwiyene ka bedu, kasi no ki̱wami kiyu mang lwebu mang sungdu mang kwi ki̱mindu.
Mi̱n ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni mwe, aya n ki̱n ka ma chimi̱nu ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.”
We ki̱swi wuko, n Yesu a chire a Nasa̱ret wu a yaa Ka̱lili. N Yowana a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma a laa Wurdune.
Yo n Yesu a chire wuchak we mwe, a ku di a wuden, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a sub yinang ki̱kube a sung we di̱ki̱ne.
Yinu di̱kan ker a chire a bwa diye ko, “Mun nang Bwemi wu mang mi̱lane, mi̱n nwe ta̱ma̱ng mwangu.”
Bi̱nabi̱na Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a twa̱ku Yesu a len di̱kir.
N ki̱n a ma ditiyu wan taana we di̱kiru, Setan ki̱ swa̱ka̱ ki̱nu. N ki̱n we n ti nai di̱kiri. Ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimu a ya lweka ti̱ ki̱n.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu a mar Yowana a lo di̱bi̱nti̱lengu, n Yesu a yikan ti̱m Ka̱lilimu ki̱ma di̱mwar we yaa Kwama,
“Ki̱swi a lam, Yaa Kwama a mwatawe, ti̱wo ki̱ti̱mu, ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu!”
Kangu n Yesu a yaki̱sudu we ki̱ti̱ku la Ka̱lili, a ku Simun n ti ke ko n Andi̱riya, ki̱fwal dwa̱kai chiyu a mwe, n chi ni̱bu ki̱ taba chi̱ngi̱m.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱bunmite, mang yo chi̱nu tani̱n be miyedu ki̱ni ni̱bu ka wo ki̱ti̱mi̱m.”
Bi̱nabi̱na n chi a du dwa̱kai chiyu, a nabu Yesu.
Kanga ki̱r ki̱ti̱ki bayimangu, a ku Yakubu bwele Sa̱badi n ti ke ko n Yowana a kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱ do dwa̱kai chiyu.
Bi̱nabi̱na n ki̱n a yal chi. N chi a du techi n Sa̱badi we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti ni̱bu suremu a nabu Yesu.
N Yesu n ti miyari̱mu a yika Kafanawu. We difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam, n Yesu a le kan muraki̱n ki̱ma miyaku.
Ni̱bu a ya̱r yii ki̱ni miyaku kangu, di̱ne ni̱bu yungku kangu a ma dukan, a newe yinang ni̱bu yungki̱ yili̱n Musamu.
Bi̱nabi̱na wuka nii ki̱ni ki̱fi̱be wu bwila we kan muraki̱n a ngau keme.
Ki̱fwadu ko, “Lwangan mwangu wule n ti ni̱n, Yesu naba Nasa̱ret? M be mwang chi̱u ni̱n na? N yim m mun, wu wauwade Kwama.”
N Yesu a wela ki̱n ko, “Le mi̱n, chir mi̱n we bwiyu!”
Ki̱fi̱be wu bwila, a ngau ki̱ni fi̱m, ki̱ni keme, a chir.
Chitu a ya̱r ni̱bu yii, n kawure ki̱bi̱u fate ko, “Ti̱tu wureni? Miyaku ki̱fwiyang, niyang kuunbuwe. Ki̱ni dukan, ki̱chaku ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu, bi̱ki̱mu ki̱bunti̱ ya̱m ki̱mu.”
Bi̱nabi̱na ya̱m bi̱bu a ti̱ran we yaa Ka̱lili kwang.
Yo n chi a chir we kan muraki̱ne, a le lo bi̱u Simune n ti Andi̱riya ware n ti Yakubu n ti Yowana.
N Nela Simune bwi a mi̱kami̱kane, n chi a fwa Yesu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu.
N Yesu a ya we ki̱dwan, a sung a tau fa̱la̱ng kangu, a kuku. Bwi kiyu a be, a kun, a ma chimi̱nti̱ nangang.
Ki̱ni me, kangu dii a lengu, n chi a be ki̱ni ni̱bu a bubuwemu n ti ni̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btimu.
Bi̱nu ki̱ni kwang a muran a kwa̱r lonu.
Yinu n Yesu a be ni̱bu buramu nabwen. A chaku ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu nabwen a dubu chi ko a fwa bi̱kam ya̱m, di̱ne n chi a yim ka n ki̱n n wure.
Ki̱ni kunsin yo ti̱mu a fi̱rebe, a kun, a chir, a yika wuka fi wu a ne ni we, a twa̱ba̱ buni we bwako.
Yinu m Simun n ti bi̱bu n chi waremu a yikan, ki̱ babba ki̱nu.
Yo n chi a ya ki̱ne, a yi ko, “Ni̱bi kwang ki̱ babbanu.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ni yika bi̱nti̱tu a kakitu mang ma di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱m we bwako ti̱n. Nang chi a yo mang betu.”
A kanan ti̱m Ka̱lilimu ki̱ni kwang ki̱mwa ya̱m bi̱li̱mu we kambi murakitu, ki̱chaki̱ti̱ ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu we ni̱bu.
Wuka naba mwa̱liye a be sung ki̱ wana ki̱nu ko, “Tete, ka mwang kede, n lwe mwang be burang mangu.”
Di̱ne ki̱bune, n Yesu a tar kangu a twai ki̱n a yi ko, “N ke, mang benu.”
Bi̱nabi̱na mwa̱liyu a be, ni wu a ya beku.
A ngau ki̱mi̱n ki̱kure ko, “Yikan.
Kedu fwa wuka ni mi̱nduwe, ya wuka fanseti a da̱ngi̱n. Yang ma niku ki̱tumang di̱ne beku mwangu, yinangu yilang m Musa a fwa chimi̱nangu ke ni̱bu a swaan ko m be.”

Kasi ki̱ku n Yesu a yi ki̱ni yikongu, n ki̱n a yikan ki̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱mu, ki̱fwa chimi̱nu, ki̱ni kangu ka bengu. Ti̱chitu wu a yo n Yesu a lebu di̱kan bi̱n ni kwa̱rikwa̱ri, ki̱swedu a kuteng bi̱nang fi a ne nii we, ni̱bu ki̱bedu we di̱ki̱ne ka nang ki̱ki̱le ba̱la̱nge.
A kutengu ditiyi bayimangu, n Yesu a ki̱latewe Kafanawu, ni̱bu a nwe ko a ki̱la loko.
Ni̱bu nabwen a muran we kwa̱ru, a ne fi wu lere we. N ki̱n we mure ki̱fwa chi mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu.
Yinu bi̱kam ni̱bu, n chi baana a da̱a̱ wuka nii wu a ngi̱rmane.
Yinangu n chi a kwala kangu ka le fi a di̱Yesuwe ki̱n di̱ne nabwen ni̱bengu, n chi a fi̱l dii kanne, a wum fi a tiben n ti Yesuwe, a mare nii wu ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mweko a kakku kang.
Yo n Yesu a ku keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyange, a yi wu ngi̱rmane ni ko, “Bwemi, n du mi̱n ki̱leti mwiyu.”
Ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu we fiko a swe ki̱ma ti̱kuran we ni̱tu chitu,
ko, “A mayire ni wu ka fwadi ye? Ti̱tu ka swa̱bban! N wure ki̱ni dukan di̱du ka du nimi̱n ki̱letiye, ka n ke Kwama ki̱kune?”
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a swaan ti̱kuran ti̱tu a ni̱tu chitu. A yi chi ko, “Di̱ne wule ti̱ma ti̱kuran ti̱tu we ni̱tu chinte?
Bi̱bi̱le ya̱m a lachi, bi̱bu ni ka yi naba burange ko, ‘N du mi̱n ki̱leti mwiyu, kuni̱n da̱u chi ti̱dari mwitu, n ya yayuwa?’
Aya mi̱n baddu ke ti̱yim tiko Bwe Nii ki̱ni dukan di̱du we ti̱ti̱nitu ka du ni̱bu mi̱n ki̱letiyu.” A yi wu ngi̱rmane ni ko,
“N fwa mi̱n, kun, da̱u kwa̱mbi̱re mo, ya yayu.”
Bi̱nabi̱na a kun a da̱u kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ko we a nui ni̱biyu, a yikan. Ti̱tu a ya̱r ni̱bu yii, n kawure a ni Kwama dwiyentu ko, “Nang kuunbi̱ ti̱tu chi we.”
N Yesu a ki̱lati̱ ki̱ti̱ku la Ka̱liliyangu we, ni̱bu nabwen a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe di̱bi̱l, yinu n ki̱n a mwe ki̱miya chimi̱nu.
Yo yaki̱sude, a ku lawi bwele Alfa, a swe we fi ni̱bu ki̱yin sangkale. N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bumite.” A kun a bunti̱ ki̱n.

Wuka di n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱chau chabtu ki̱ni me a lo Lawiye. Ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu n ti ni̱bu a bunti̱bu yili̱n Kwamati̱mu we fiko nabwen ki̱chau chabti̱tu n ti chi. Di̱ne ni̱bu nabwen we mure bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱ni̱mu.

Ki̱dangu ni̱bu Yungku yili̱n Musamu, bi̱bu n chi Farisamu a ku ki̱chau chabti̱tu n ti ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m n ti bi̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu, a bi̱u miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “A ma yire ki̱chau chitu n ti ni̱bu ki̱letime?”
Yo n Yesu a nwe ya̱me, a yi chi ko, “Ni̱bu li̱mamu a babu naba yinenge, ka n ke naba di̱buwe. Mang bebu di̱ne mang yal ni̱bu yilem we kakku Kwamangu, aya di̱ne ni̱bu a tumbi̱ yilem.”
Miyari̱m Yowanamu n ti bi̱bu a Farisamu, ki̱da̱u dimwen. Bi̱kam a be bi̱u Yesu ko, “Di̱ne wule miyari̱m Yowanamu n ti bi̱bu a Farisiyawamu ki̱da̱u dimwenu aya bi̱mumu a da̱bbe?”

N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Fate wutabi̱re ka da̱u dimwen we ki̱dangu bwele ki̱yiu naye we ware n ti chiyanga? Ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu bwele ki̱yiu naye ka du chide. N chi a ne da̱u dimwenu yo n we ware n ti bwele ki̱yiu naye.
Ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu bwele ki̱yiu naye ka du chide we, n chi ka da̱u dimwen we ki̱dang kangu.
“A ne ni wu ka tal luke wu ka̱re ki̱ni di̱bal di̱fwine we. Ka a kabi yikonge, di̱bal di̱fwinu ka ngi̱r di̱ka̱ri̱nu, ngi̱raki̱ku ka la ki̱ferediyangu ki̱ni kayaki̱ku.
A ne ni ka lwa̱u mwe yinabi a swagi yika̱ri we, ka ni a lwa̱bbe, swa̱ngi yika̱riyu ka fweradu, mwe yinabi wu fwiye niin lwa̱du a swagi yifwi.”
Wuka difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu yaki̱sudu a kuni chami, miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱ kiya ti̱changri ki̱kudu.
Ni̱bu Farisamu a yi ki̱n ko, da̱ng miyari̱m mumu, “A ma yire ki̱ma chi yilang a kebitu we di difi̱kare chire?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Yoye ta kiinbu chi n Fa̱ku Dauda a ma we se Kwama yo n chi a nwe chunu n ti fati̱bu ki̱mu we yayu chiya?
A ki̱dangu n Abiyata nang tikake Fansetiye, n Dauda a le se Kwama a chau chabtu ti̱yangritu, yinu a niti̱ fati̱bu ki̱mu chabtu ti̱tu a dakan kana fanseti ka chaditu.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “A yo difi̱kare di̱ne ni aya a yobu ni di̱ne difi̱kare.
Di̱ne yiko, Bwe Nii, nang Tewuduwe wu a difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam ti̱n.”
Yo n Yesu a le kan murakangu, a ya wuka nii wu fa̱la̱ngu a ngi̱rmane ne we kannu.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu a kurti̱ nuiyi chiyu we di̱Yesuwe ko ka, ka be ni wu we difi̱kare, ke chi ya fi̱li wu chi tan ki̱ne.
Yinu n Yesu a yi ni wu ko, “Chire, tii tas.”
N Yesu a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱ti̱le a da ni madu we yilang Musangu, ni ma chi ti̱yili we difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudama ka ni tum bwila? Ni yu ti̱kuriya ka ni chi̱u ti̱kuriya?” Ni̱bi wudidi, a yibu ki̱n ya̱m.
N Yesu a da̱ng chi ki̱ni ki̱fwini, di̱ne ki̱ngki̱nge ni̱tu chiye aya ki̱nweti̱ ki̱bune chi we ki̱leti chiyu. N ki̱n a yi nii wu ko, “Tare fa̱la̱ng mwangu,” fa̱la̱ngu a be ti̱n.
Kangu ni̱bu Farisamu a chirengu, bi̱nabi̱na n chi a di̱ka ya̱mu ti kwa̱l Yirudu we dur ki̱nu yinang kangu chi chi̱u Yesungu.
N Yesu a kun ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a du bi̱nu a yika ki̱ti̱ku la Ka̱liliyang. Ki̱tu ni̱be nabwen bi̱bu a chire a Ka̱lili n ti Yafudiya a nabi̱ ki̱n.

Kangu n chi a nwe chitu n Yesu ki̱maditangu, bi̱bu a Wurchalimamu n ti bi̱bu a ba̱la̱ng Yudiyamu n ti bi̱bu a yabu la wurduni̱mu n ti bi̱bu a Tayamu n ti bi̱bu a Sidon mu. Ni̱bu nabwen a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe ke chi nwe, chi kuti̱ chi ki̱maditu.
Di̱ne ki̱wulu ko ke ni̱bu a fumadi̱ ki̱n we, a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱be ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wuti̱re wiin ke ti̱fumantu a swe bunge.”
A ma ying di̱ne n ki̱n a be ni̱bu nabwen. Ni̱bu buri̱ni̱mu nabwen ki̱bedu we di̱ki̱ne ke chi twai ki̱n, chi ya beku.
Yo ni̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btimu ki̱ku Yesu we, ki̱yaru we ti̱mu ki̱ni kemi ko, “M mun Bwe Kwama!”
N Yesu a ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure ki̱ni dukan ko, “A yidu ni̱bu we ka n ki̱n n wure.”
Yinu n Yesu a fi̱l kunu, a yale bi̱bu n ki̱n ki̱baddi̱mu n chi a be fi a di̱ki̱ne.
A sutu ni̱bi kub chiri burau, bi̱bu n ki̱n kani̱n tundi̱mu ka nang chikiye fandu, a yi chi ko, “N sutu chi̱n niing swedu ware.” Ma ni̱n tum chi̱nu we a di̱mwaru.
A ni chi dukan, ka chaku ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu.
N ki̱n a sutu Simun, wu n ki̱n a ni di̱nu ko Biti̱r.
N ti Yakubu bwele Sa̱badiye wu ke ko n Yowana, a chau ki̱mi̱n di̱nu ko Buwarnachis ka nang chikiye, bwesi̱m ki̱yalem,
n Andi̱riya, n ti Filibu, n ti Bartolomi, n ti Matta, n ti Toma, n ti Yakubu, bwele Alfiyus, n ti Tadiyu, n ti Simun naba Kana.
n ti Yafuda Yiskariyoti wu a mii ki̱ne.
Yinu n Yesu a le lo. Ki̱tu ni̱be nabwen a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe ti̱nti̱n. N ki̱n n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yabi̱ da tiyangu ka chau chabti̱tangu.
Yo kebu ki̱mu a nwe ya̱me, n chi a ya, yaka taa ki̱nu, di̱ne ni̱bu ki̱yidu ko, “N ki̱n a newe li̱mang.”
Ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱m bi̱bu a be a Wurchalimamu a yi ko, “Bayalsebul we bwi kiyu, tikake Mai ki̱fi̱btiye nang wu a ni ki̱n dukan di̱du ki̱chaki̱n ki̱fi̱btinu.”
N Yesu a yal chi, a swe chimi̱n ko, “Setan ka chaku Setani yire?
Ka bi̱ngaiyu a le ti̱mu ki̱kula bwiti chiye, ti̱m bi̱ki̱mu a ne ya dukanu.
We yiko, ka bi̱ngaiyu a le di̱kur lone, lo wuko a ne dukan we.
Ka yaa Setane a le bi̱ngaiye, yaa a ne yin tidu, yare a be chimi̱ne, wu yaa ko ka fi̱ri̱nde.
A ne ni ka le lo naba dukane yinang Setane, ka kaar kuli̱n ki̱ne we, ka n ke ka tau ki̱nu ka kwadu, yinu ka yindu ka le lo ka wur nii we.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, Kwama ka du chimi̱n ki̱letiyu n ti swa̱ba ku Kwamangu.
Aya wu a swa̱ba Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame, a ne du ki̱mi̱n ki̱leti kiyu, bwila ko a swe ki̱diya kwadu.”
N ki̱n a fwa bi̱bu di̱ne n chi ki̱yidu ko n ki̱n ki̱ni ki̱fi̱be wu bwila.
Yinu n ne Yesuwe n ti kebu ki̱mu a be, a ti a fi̱lang. A tum chitu ko a yale Yesu.
Aya ki̱tuu ni̱be a di̱bi̱l ki̱n. N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “N ne mun n ti kebu mumu a fi̱lang, ki̱yali̱nu.”
Yinu n ki̱n a ke chi mi̱n ko, “N wure nang nemi, m bi̱wure nang kebu mi̱mu?”
N ki̱n a da̱ng ni̱bu bi̱bu a bwa̱l ki̱ni di̱bi̱li̱mu, a yi chi ko “N nemi nang wu n ti kebu mi̱mu!”
“Kanang wuwule niye, wu ki̱ma chi n Kwama a keete, n ki̱n nang kemi wubare, n ti wuwiye, n ti nemi.”
N Yesu a mweti yungki̱ku we ki̱ti̱ku laangu, tuule ni̱bu nabwen a mura we kakku kangu, yinu n ki̱n a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a swe we mure a mwe. Ni̱bu nabwen a muran we ki̱di̱ngu a ki̱ti̱ki̱ laangu.
A yung chi chitu nabwen ki̱ni baltaku, yinu we yungki̱ kangu a yi chi ko,
“Ti̱nwe, wuka nii a ya yaka fiiye cham.”
Yo a yaki̱ fii dume, bi̱kamu cham a twakan a wa̱re, ki̱ni̱biyu a be chiba cham bi̱bu.
Bi̱kamu a twakan a nani kwanti a ne ki̱ti̱m we nabwen, bi̱nabi̱na n chi a kiye, di̱ne ki̱ti̱mu a newe nabwene.
Yo kuko a fwenge, a twi chi a kusu, di̱ne ki̱ yinange tiyangu a subu kutan.
Bi̱kamu cham a twakan a kwa̱da, kwa̱da a kwaba chi a yobu ki̱nuti.
Bi̱kamu a twakan a ti̱m bi̱yili̱m, n chi a dwiyen a yo ki̱nutiyu, yikayu sungi chamiyu a yo ki̱nutiyu wan ti̱ta bi̱kamu wan turukuun, bi̱kamu kuul.
Yinu n Yesu a yi ko, “Wu ki̱ni ki̱tele a nwe.”
Yo n Yesu a swe n ki̱kune, bi̱kamu ni̱bu n ti miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu, a bi̱u ki̱n ko a fwa chi baltaku ki̱yungditu.
Yinu a yi chi ko, “N ti̱n, a ni chi̱n da ta swan ti̱lairi Yaa Kwamatu, aya bi̱bu a newe ti chini̱mu, chiti kwang ka baltaku.
Nang chi
‘A yo n chi ka ni̱n da̱ngdu,
aya a neka swiru,
n chi ka nwedu aya a neka swaanu,
ka n chi a swane, ka wo ki̱ti̱mu,
ka ya duku ki̱letiyangu.’ ”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Aya ta swaanbu ki̱ku baltaka? Yinu ta medi yire ta swaan yikayu baltaku?
Nii wu ki̱wau duume, ki̱wau ya̱m Kwamam.
Duum bi̱bu a twakan a wa̱remu, a ti we ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu, aya yo n chi a nwenge, bi̱nabi̱na, n Setan a be a yitu ya̱m bi̱bu we a ni̱tu chitu.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu yinang ki̱nutiyu a yar a fi a kwantiyemu. Ka n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱me ki̱yidu ki̱ni furi mwe mwe.
Aya a lebu ni̱tu chitu yinang yinang, a ne ti ke, ka riye fumake a ya chi di̱ne ya̱m Kwamame, n chi ki̱ki̱la kuteng.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu yinang duum bi̱ba swi a fi kwa̱da, n chi nang bi̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mu.
Aya ti̱kwa̱ma̱n ti̱ti̱nitu n ti baku kulitangu, n ti kubeku chitangu a ri bwi kiyu a yitu ya̱m bi̱li̱mu, a mabu nangang ki̱yilang.”
Aya bi̱kamu ni̱bu a tiwe duum bi̱bu a fi wu yilemu. N chi a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu, a yiu, ki̱ma nangangi ki̱n, bi̱kamu ki̱ya sukku wan ti̱ta, bi̱kamu wan turukun, bi̱kamu kuul kuul.
N Yesu a ki̱la yi chi ko, “Niin da̱u fiti̱la ni sunti̱ kwa̱se, ni di̱ki̱du a bwang kwa̱mbi̱ranga? Ne ni yo fiti̱la a dii, a ti̱dda?
Chi ti̱yingeritu be ka kwa̱la̱du, ti̱nti̱ne, ti̱tu niyang lailaiyetu ka chire dii kwa̱rikwa̱ri.
Ka ni ki̱ni ki̱tele, a nwe.”
Yinu a ki̱la yi chi ko, “Ta̱l chi mun nweditu yinang, kwa̱se mun swe ni̱bu mi̱ndi ki̱ne, n Kwama beka swe mi̱ndi ki̱n. Wuko ka bu mi̱ndi di̱bi̱l.
Wu ki̱ni chiye ka bu ki̱mi̱n ti̱duwe, wu a ne chi we, ka yitu ti̱tu n ki̱ni ki̱ni bayimitu.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Yaa Kwama kanodi yinang; Ni a wau duum we kuu ko.
Kum n ti kuko, a yimbu ki̱dangu duum bi̱bu a kiye a dwiye ti̱nangu, ka a ma yire, n ki̱n a yimbu.
Ti̱mu ki̱yo tiniyu ki̱dwiyedu ki̱tu ti̱kulan. Cham ki̱mwedu we ti̱mwaritu, yinu ka chir duru, yinu fal ki̱nutiyu ka chiredu ti̱changri tu.
Yo chama biye, ni ka da̱u too ka bidu, di̱ne ki̱swi a lam wa kakke.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ni swe Yaa Kwama ki̱ni wureni? Ni ma nangangu ki̱ni ki̱ki̱le baltaku ke ni swe mi̱n?
Yinang ki̱kwi ki̱si̱raiye, ki̱kwi wu a mwan a tamme, nii a fi a kuu ko.
A baki̱swi bayim, a dwiyen a kwam a lati̱ yikayu beti̱ tini we kuu lambu. A ma ki̱yange tiyu nabwen, ki̱ni̱biyu ki̱sungdu we ki̱wulang kangu ki̱ma ti̱ki̱kuli we.”
We ki̱ku sweku, n ki̱n a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu yinang kangu chi ka swani̱n ya̱m Kwamamu.
N ki̱n a yung chi chiti kwang ki̱ni sweku, aya yo n ki̱n ki̱ni ki̱kun n ti miyarri̱m ki̱me, ki̱fwa chi mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bi kwa̱rikwa̱ri.
We diko ki̱ni me, n Yesu a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ni yabu, nii ya ba̱la̱ng ka bwanangu.”
Yo n chi a du ki̱tuu ni̱be, miyari̱mu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n chi a yikan ki̱ni ki̱n we mure, yikayu kwa̱mbi̱ri n wetuwe.
Yinu wuka ki̱fi̱be wuduwe a kune, labi mwetu ki̱baddu ka ri kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱ni mwe.
N Yesu we kuteng we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱da duum ki̱ni filo, miyari̱m ki̱mu a kukku ki̱n a yi ko “Naba yungke, mwan twarbu mwiko yanang bwarada?”
N Yesu a kaban, a kwabu ki̱fi̱be, mwe laange ko, “Tii wudidi.” Ki̱fi̱be a ti, fantiyu kwang, a da wudidi.
A yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “A mayire ta mwan ta ka̱ta̱ni ye? Ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu a lanta ki̱ka̱nga?”
N chi a nwe tayu nabwen, yinu n chi a fwa we bwiti chiyu ko, “N wure wu ki̱fi̱be n ti mwe la ki̱nwe ya̱m ki̱me?”
N Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yabu la wu a ti̱m Ka̱rasina.
Yo n Yesu a chire we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, wuka naba ki̱fi̱btiye a chi̱reng a bwa fute, a mwati̱ ki̱n.
Nii wu ki̱swedu a futu, a ne nii ka kwau ki̱ne we, kasi no ki̱ni maklan.
Kasi no ni̱bu ka kwau ki̱nu ki̱ni maki̱lan ka dwatte, ki̱ti̱reti̱du we. A ne wuka nii we ki̱ni dukan di̱du ka tami̱n ki̱ni̱nu we.
Kum n ti kuko ki̱bwa̱ladu we futi̱tu, ki̱fi̱la kunnitu ki̱bwa̱ka kemi, ki̱rura bwikiyu ki̱ni kali.
Yo n ki̱n a ku Yesu ki̱dwan n ti ki̱ne, a kunni ki̱ni ka banang, a ya sung we kakki̱kangu,
a bwe keme ki̱ni dukan ko, “Lwangang mwangu wureni n ti mi̱n, Yesu Bwe Kwama wuduwe? Mi̱n ka̱li̱nu, ki̱ni di̱n Kwama, niyu riye we.”
A fwa di̱ne n Yesu a tu, a yi ki̱n ko, “Chir mi̱n, ki̱fi̱bti yibwilai, chir mi̱n we nii wu!”
N Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Di̱n munu n wure?” Nii wu a ke ko, “Di̱n mi̱nu n Tuule, di̱ne n ni̱n nabwen.”
Yinu n chi a da Yesu mi̱n ki̱ti̱m ko a chaki̱du chi we bale ti̱mme wu.
Ki̱dwan n ti fiko, di̱kan ki̱ran sulti̱ki̱mi loi ki̱chau cham a tile bange.
Ki̱fi̱btiyu a wana Yesu ko, “Du ni̱n le sulti̱ki̱mi loi yiyu.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi, yinu ki̱fi̱bti a chir a le sulti̱ki̱mi loi. Ki̱ranu ki̱ni sulti̱ki̱mi loi yu kunniyi yurabu, n chi a kiyani ki̱ti̱bu, a wul a fi̱tan we ki̱di̱ng laangu a bwaran we mwe.
Kangu ni̱bu toki̱mu a ku chiti yangu, n chi a wul a ya fwa ni̱bu a bi̱ni̱mu mi̱n chitu a fwetu. Ni̱bu a dalawe beka da̱ng chi a fwetu.
Yo n chi a be fi a di̱Yesu we, a ku ni wu a no ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btiye a swe sobu ki̱ni kuli̱n. N chi kwang a nwe tayi.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu we fikomu a fwa chitu nui chiyu a kuutu we naba ki̱fi̱btiye n ti sulti̱kumi loiyu.
Yinu ni̱bu a le ki̱wana Yesu ko a yikan a du yaa chi.
Yo n Yesu a yaki̱ le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, nii wu a no ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btiye a bau ko chi bungadu ware.
Aya n Yesu a ko. N ki̱n a yi nii wu ko, “Ki̱la lo, fi a kebi̱ mume, ya n fwa chimi̱n nangangu n Tewuduwe a ma a dur munangu n ti li̱me mwang ya a di̱Kwama.”
Nii wu a yikan a mwe ki̱mwa ni̱bu a Dikafoli chi n Yesu a ma a dur ki̱ne. Kanang wuwule niye wu a nwe, ki̱ya̱r yii.
Yo n Yesu a yabti̱ ki̱ti̱ku langu we ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, muraki̱ ki̱duwang a kang ki̱n a tibe we ki̱ti̱ku laangu.
Yinu wuka sele we seli̱bu kan muraki̱ni̱nu di̱n ki̱nu n Yayiru, a ya bwa di̱Yesuwe, a ya sung we kakki̱kangu.
A da ki̱mi̱n ki̱ti̱mu yinang ko, “Befwa̱ne mi yaka bwadu, mi̱n wananu be twai ki̱n ke a be a ya ti̱kuritu.”
Yinu n chi a bunga ware. Ni̱bu nabwen ki̱tungadu ki̱funkatu bwitichiyu.
Wuka naye we fiko a ma swa̱ti̱ti kub chiri turabu, ki̱kur ka ki̱tum.
A nwe riye nabwen we a fa̱li ni̱bu yini̱ni̱mu. A chi̱u ka̱mbi̱r ki̱nu ki̱ni kwang, a mwintuwe li̱mangu a yabu.
Yo n ki̱n a nwe ya̱m Yesume, a le tibe ni̱be a bale kute, a twai luke ko,
ki̱kuradu we ni̱r ki̱nu ko, “Kasi no mang twai ka luke ko mang bedu.”
Yo a twaiye, bi̱nabi̱na ki̱tumu a ti, n ki̱n a nwe we bwikiyu ko ki̱ya ta̱ma̱ngu.
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a nwe yo dukan a chir we bwikiye, n ki̱n a sabran a bi̱u chitu ko, “N wure a twai luke miye?”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Wule! Mwang kubu kangu ni̱bu ki̱fumananga? Ni yim wure a twayine?”
Yo n Yesu ki̱da̱ngadu ka n wure twai ki̱ne,
naye wu kanga yim chi a fwetangu, tayi a tau ki̱n. A be fi a di̱Yesuwe ki̱ni bwiyu ki̱yiu ka yilang, a sung we kakku kangu, a fwa chi n ki̱n a maatu.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Fwa̱n mi̱n, n ya beku di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mang mwange, ya li̱mang, burang mwangu a be.”
Yo n Yesu we ki̱fwa ya̱me, bi̱kam ni̱bu a be a loon Yayiru, tikake wu a kan muraki̱ne a yi ko, “Fwa̱n munu a bwa, kwa̱ma̱du naba yungke we.”
Aya n Yesu a mabu nangang ki̱ni ya̱m chimu a yi wu sele kan muraki̱ne ko, “Wulu tayuwe, ke bi̱yili̱mu.”
N Yesu a dubu ni̱bu ko a bunki̱mi̱nti̱n ka n ke Biti̱r n ti Yakubu n ti Yowana ke Yakube.
Yo a lam lo Yayiruse, n Yesu a ku ni̱bu a kaiya ni̱tu, ki̱kira wiini bwa, ki̱bwa̱kati̱ kemi.
N ki̱n a le a yi chi ko, “Di̱ne wule ti̱kira wini ti̱bwa̱ka̱ti̱ kemiye? Be fwa̱ne a bwabu, ki̱da duum.”
N chi a ma ki̱mi̱n di̱nur di̱kusi̱n, n ki̱n a chaku chi kwang a fi̱lang, a yal te n ti ne n ti bi̱bu ware n ti ki̱ni̱mu, a le finu be fwa̱ne we mi̱ne.
A tau fa̱la̱ng kangu, a yi ki̱n ko, “Talita kumi!” Ka nang chikiye, “Be fwa̱ne kuun.”
Bi̱nabi̱na befwa̱ne a kuun ki̱ya yayu (swa̱tu kitu kub chiri turabu) Yo ti̱chituwu a fwe, n chi a ya̱r yii.
Aya n Yesu a wu chi mi̱n ki̱tele yinang ko, wuka nii a nwedu ya̱m bi̱bu we. Ti̱ni chabti̱tu a chau.
N Yesu a du fiko a ki̱la bi̱n ki̱nu a Nasa̱reti̱nu, miyari̱m ki̱mu a yikan ware n ti ki̱n.

Yo difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame a lame, n ki̱n a mwe ki̱yungdu we a kan muraki̱nu, ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a nwe ya̱m ki̱mi̱mu a ya̱r yii we miyaki̱ kangu ko, “Kano niwu a ya yingku ki̱ku n ti dukan ya̱m chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu a fi̱re?
Kano nii wu n ke kafinta, bwele Maryamu, ke Yakubu n ti Yusufu n ti Yafuda n ti Simun? Bi̱wuwiye ki̱mu n ke bi̱bu n chi̱ni ware ma?” N chi a nwe ki̱fwini a ko a kebu bi̱yili̱m we ya̱m ki̱mu.
Yinu n Yesu a fwa chimi̱n ko, “Fa̱ku Kwama a newe ki̱ni dwiyen we ti̱m ki̱mu n ti kebi̱ki̱mu n ti loko.”
N Yesu a yabu da a mabu chi ka̱ta̱kitu we bwako aya a yo fa̱la̱ng kangu a bi̱kam ni̱bi bayim bi̱bu a bubuwem, a be chi.
Aya a ya̱r Yesu yii we kwalan keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyange.
N Yesu a kun fal a kana beti̱ bi̱ntiyu ki̱ma miyaku.
N Yesu a yal miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu, a tum chi burau burau, a niti̱ chi dukanu ka chaku ki̱fi̱bti.
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱da̱ddu chi we, kasi no chabtu, ka swe, ka ka̱mbi̱re. N kawure a da̱u kana ki̱twalang.
Ti̱do ki̱wamiyu aya ti̱da̱du wuka luke we ka n ke wu a bwiye.
Kanang wuwule lo wu ta si̱ki̱nde, ti̱swe we fiko ka lami̱nti̱ ki̱swi ta dun bi̱n di̱ki̱ne.
Kanang wuwule fi wu ni̱bu a yibu chi̱n, a ko a nwe ti̱bu chi̱ne, ka yata yikade, ti̱musu kuru we nani chiyu ke a kau di̱mwal we di̱chiye.”
N chi a yikan a mwa ni̱bu ko a woki̱ti̱m.
N chi a chaka ki̱fi̱bti nabwen, a wa ni̱bu mi̱n ki̱nung olifang a be chi we buri̱ntu.

Yinu m Mai Yiridu a nwe ya̱mu yinangu di̱n Yesunu a ti̱ra ti̱mu yinang yinangangu. Nangki̱n bi̱kamu ni̱bu ki̱yidu ko, “N Yowana naba batisma a kuntuwe fure, nang chi a yo a ya dukan di̱du ki̱mang chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱te.”
Aya bi̱kamu a yi ko, “N fa̱ku Yiliya.” Bi̱kamu ko, “Wuka fa̱ku dang, we bi̱bu feredimu.”
Yo n Yiridu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a yiko, “N Yowana, wu mang mwati̱ dur ki̱ne, a kuntuwe furu.”
Aya ki̱dangu ferediyangu n Yiridu a tum ni̱bu ko a tau Yowana, a yingen a di̱bi̱nti̱l. N Yiridu, a ma yiko di̱ne Yirudiya, naye ke ko n Filibu, wu n ki̱n a yiu a mang nayeko.
Di̱ne n Yowana kiyi Yiridu ko, “A dabu n ki̱n ka yiu naye ke ko.”
Di̱ne yiko, n Yirudiya a le ki̱nwe ki̱fwini Yowana we a ni̱r ki̱nu, ki̱bau wa̱re ka chi̱u Yowana a yabi̱ da.

Di̱ne n Yiridu ki̱nwe tayi Yowanangu, di̱ne n Yowana ni wu ki̱tum yile we kakku Kwamange, nang chi a yo n Yiridu ki̱so Yowana. Kasi ki̱ku ya̱m Yowanamu ki̱twai ni̱r ki̱nangu, ki̱nwe ta̱ma̱ng siiku ki̱telengu we ya̱m ki̱mu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Yurudiya a be ya da a di kurku bi̱be Yiriduse. N Yiridu a yal mati̱m ki̱mu n ti bi̱duum ni̱bu kuni̱m ki̱mu n ti ki̱kati Ka̱lilimu.
Yo fwa̱n Yirudiya a lewe a yiu yilange, a li̱ma mai Yiridu ni̱r n ti rungko ko. N ki̱n a yi fwa̱nu ko, “Fwa chi mun badditu mang ni̱nnu.”
A bwa̱u ya̱mu ki̱ni di̱twa̱mbi̱r ko, “Kasi no mun bau wule mang ni̱nnu, kono ba̱la̱ng we yaa mati̱ne mi.”
Fwa̱nu a chir a bi̱u neki̱n ko, “Mang bi̱u wureni?” N neki̱n a yi ko, “Dur Yowana naba Batisma.”
Bi̱nabi̱na n ki̱n a le we kakku mai yangu, a yi ki̱n ko, “Mi̱n bau dur Yowana naba Batisma ki̱ka̱ng ki̱kang a kwa̱se.”
Yo Mai a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a ma furi ki̱lin, aya di̱ne di̱twa̱mbi̱r ki̱nu n ti ni̱bu ki̱mu, a ne kangu ka sute ya̱ma̱ngu we.
M Mai a tum naba toke ko a ya be ki̱ni dur Yowananu, nii wu a yikan a ya swiye dur Yowananu we lo di̱bi̱nti̱le.
A be ki̱ni duru a kwa̱se, a ni fwa̱nu, n ki̱n a ya, a ni neki̱n.
Yo miyari̱m Yowanamu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a be, a da̱u kunti̱le bwiye, a ya fur.
Fandubu n Yesu a tumi̱mu a ki̱lawe, a fwa Yesu mi̱n ki̱ni kwang tiyangu chi a mawengu n ti yinangu n chi a yungengu.
Di̱ne ni̱bu nabwen ki̱ledu, bi̱kamu ki̱chiru, a ne da wu n chi ka chau chabte we. A yi fandubu ko, “Ti̱be ni swe a wuka fi ke ti̱fi̱kan.”
N chi a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika wuka fi wu a ne wuka nii we, n chi chikun.
A mwintuwe ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a ku yikaku chiyamu, a wulani nani a bunti̱ ki̱ti̱ki̱ laangu, a tu chi we bwako.
Yo n Yesu a swe a ku muraki̱ku nabwene a ki̱la nwe ki̱bune chi, di̱ne n chi yinang kwanti yiyu a ne naba toke we. Yinu a mwe ki̱miya chimi̱n chitu nabwen.
Yo di a mwatan ki̱lede, miyari̱m ki̱mu a be we di̱ki̱ne, n chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Finu a ne niwe, dii ki̱ldue.
Du ni̱bu a le kibitu n ti beti̱ bi̱nti̱tu ki̱dwanyu ke a ta̱n chabti̱tu n chi ka chaditu.”
Aya n Yesu a yi chi ko, “N ti̱nde, ti̱ni chi chabti̱tu a chau.” Yinu n chi a yi ko, “Ya ni̱n kaiye nabwe ka̱mbi̱r suriyu kuulitu turau we ki̱daniyu ke ni̱bu a chaba?”
A yi chi ko, “Ki̱daniyu yile we di̱chine? Yati̱ da̱nge,” Yo n chi a da̱nge, a yi ko, “Ni̱n yangi yunu n ti chingiyi yurabu.”
Yinu n ki̱n a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱yo chi a swengi kwa̱li we a swa̱ki̱ ki̱ribangu.”
Yinu ni̱bu a swe ki̱ni kwa̱litu kuulikuuli, ti̱kantu kwa̱li wan tunutunu.
N ki̱n a da̱u ki̱danniyi yunuyu n ti chingiyi yurabiyu, a kukku kabuko a dii, a wana Kwama, a kera chi mi̱n ki̱danniyu. A ni miyari̱m ki̱mu ko a keran yinu a mati̱ chi̱ngi yiko ki̱ni kwang.
N chi kwang a chab a lwe.
We fiko miyari̱m ki̱mu a mur ti̱buken ki̱dannitu n ti chingiyu a ri ti̱ti̱ngriti kub chiri turau.
Kwartabu a chau ki̱dannimu, kuniyi yunu.
Bi̱nabi̱na n Yesu a yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱yabi̱ la ki̱yika kakku bwana Betsaida yo n ki̱n we kutengu ki̱yo ni̱bu ki̱yaradi̱me.
Yo n ki̱n a yo ni̱be, a fi̱l kun n ki̱kun ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni.
Yo di a lenge, a ya kwa̱mbi̱re mwe tibe la, n Yesu a swe n ki̱kun we ki̱di̱ng langu.
Yo a ku chi ki̱nwe riye a siku kwa̱mbi̱re mwe di̱ne ki̱fi̱be ki̱yingle chide, a ya bwa di̱chiye ki̱ni kunsiin, n ki̱n a ya fi a di̱chiye ki̱fadu a mwe yinangu ka su chi dang.
Aya yo n chi a kuu ki̱n ki̱fadu we mwe, n chi a da̱u ko kano butu, n chi a bwe keme.
Di̱ne n chi kwang a ku ki̱n a nwe tayi.
Bi̱nabi̱na a fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu a yi ko, “M mi̱n, ti̱nwedu tayuwe.”
Yinu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti chi, ki̱fi̱be a ti ti̱n. N chi kwang a ya̱r yii.
Di̱ne n chi a swaanbu kangu n ki̱n a chabi ki̱ni ni̱bu kuniyi yunuwangu, n chi a swaanbu chi ti̱chitu wu ki̱yunde.
Yo n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yabu la, a le ti̱m Chanesa̱ret, finu n chi a kwau kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ki̱ti̱ku laange.
Yo n chi a chire we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ni̱bu a swaan Yesu.
Kanga a swaan mi̱n ko n Yesuwangu, n chi a kiyani ki̱ti̱bu, a ki̱lan yaki̱ da̱a̱ ni̱bu chimu a buraburanemu ki̱ni fanti dari chiyu, ki̱ya ki̱mi̱ndi ki̱n kasi no bwa̱le.

Kasi no n Yesu ki̱yadi wuwule ki̱swi, we bi̱nu n ti beti̱ bi̱nti̱tu n ti kuniyu, n chi ki̱ti̱u ki̱mi̱n ni̱bu a bubuwemu we wa̱re ki̱ni chi ti̱dari chitu, ni̱bu ki̱wana ki̱nu ko, kasi no nang twai kana lukeko a lwe, di̱ne bi̱bu a twaiyimi kwang a be.
Wuka di bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musanimu, ba a be a Wurchalimame,
chi a ku bi̱kamu miyari̱m Yesum, ki̱chau chabti̱tu ki̱ni Fa̱liyu a nurabu nurane, yinang kangu da seli̱bu wemi̱nangu.
(Ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu Yafudam kwang a chabu chitu ka a nurabu Fa̱li chiyu yinangu da seli̱bu wemi̱nange.

Ka a ki̱lawe a Kwa̱ma̱re, a ne chau chabti̱tu di̱ne a mwintuwe ka nura fa̱liyu didiin. Aya yikayu dati seli̱bi̱ we nabwen yiyu n chi ki̱ nabi̱diyu. Yinang nuraku beti̱ sa̱ni n ti satti n ti beti̱ chii.)
Yinu Farisawa n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Di̱ne wule miyari̱m mumu a bunti̱bu da seli̱bu, aya n chi ki̱chau chabti̱tu ki̱ni Fa̱liyu a nurabi̱ nurane?”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “N Yichaya a ma fa̱kuitu we dutu chi̱ntu yo a yi ko,
‘N Ti̱n ni̱bu di̱bebeline. Yinanga mwal ko,
Ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱rikayu ki̱ni kana yii,
ni̱tu chitu a kurbu mi̱n.
Ki̱sii ti̱kwani aya ki̱miya yili̱n ni̱bi,
ko n nang ya̱m Kwamamu.’
“A le chimi̱n, ti̱du chi Kwama a fwatu, ti̱bunti̱ daati ni̱bi.”
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱yo yili̱n Kwamatu a ki̱swi tiko keti̱ bunti̱ daati chiyu.”
Nangki̱n, m Musa a fwa ko, “Ni te mun n ti ne mun dwiyentu, nii ka tu te ki̱n ka n ne ki̱ne a lwe bwa.”
Aya n ti̱n ti̱yo ni̱bu ki̱du bi̱bu a bi̱u chimu we tiko, ka ni a yi te ki̱n, ka n ne ki̱ne ko, “Chi no ta yadu a di̱ mi̱ne n yangyange, mang ma Kwama mi̱n ki̱li̱mangi ki̱n.
We yiko, ta dubu nii wu a maka teki̱n ka neki̱ne.
We ki̱ku ba̱la̱ng ti̱kai ya̱m Kwamamu a ne ki̱kwi we di̱ne dati chiyu ti̱miya bwesi̱m mi̱niyu, a bwin yiko, ti̱mana chitu nabwen tiyang ti̱tu.”
Yinu n Yesu a ki̱la yalte ni̱bu we, a yi chi ko, ti̱nwei n ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang, ti̱swaan yinang.
“Chi ki̱le fur niine a kaibu yile ni we kakku Kwamangu, aya chi ki̱chiredu we ni̱r niine, n nang chi ki̱kai yile ni we kakku Kwamange.
Di̱ne ying, nii ki̱tele ki̱nwe diye, a nwe.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a yaran n ti muraki̱ kangu, a le lo. Miyari̱m ki̱mu a bi̱u ki̱n bi̱bu ki̱dum baltaki̱m.
A yi chi ko, “Yoye ta swaanbu ya̱m bi̱ba? Ta swaanbu ko chi ki̱le fur nii ne a kaibu yile ni we kakku Kwamangu?”
Di̱ne ti̱tu a yabu bwa ni̱re, aya ki̱le bwi, ti̱nti̱ne ka chiru we bwiyu (We bi̱bu ya̱m n Yesu a yung chabti̱tu a kaibu yile nii.)
A chakakku ki̱fwadu ko, “Ya̱mu ki̱chiredu a fur ni̱ni̱mu n nang chi ki̱kai yile ni we kakku Kwamange.
Di̱ne we mure ni̱r niine, ti̱kuran ti̱bwilai ti̱tu ki̱chiredu we, yinang yari, n ti kutu, n ti chiku durang n ti, ti̱kuli
mi̱ka kwiye n ti kubeku bwiyang, n ti bwila, n ti di̱buti̱r, n ti kubeki̱ ki̱bwilang, n ti kataku, n ti swa̱ba ku, n ti kukuki̱ durang n ti kwalan ti̱kurane.
Bwila wu ki̱ni kwang ki̱chiredu a ni̱r niin, be ki̱kai ni we kakku Kwamangu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a kun a yika bale a ti̱m Taya n ti Sidon a le wuka lo wu a no babu nii ka yindu, aya a fwebi yiko.
Wuka naye wu befwa̱ne ko ki̱ni ki̱fi̱be wu bwila, kanga nwe ya̱m ki̱mangu, a be sung ki̱mi̱n a kakku.
Naye wu na Yelenamu. A bi̱u ki̱n a bale ti̱m Finikiyam we ti̱m Suriyamu. N ki̱n a wana Yesu ko a chaki̱ befwa̱ne mi̱n ki̱fi̱bti.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yam ni̱bu Yafudam a chau a ri funi chiyu didin n chi bwesi̱m lomu, di̱ne a dakabu mang da̱u chabtu bwesi̱mitu mang ni kadatiyu.”
N ki̱n a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “we yiko Tewuduwe,” “kasi no n nang kadatiyu, mare ki̱chau ti̱buken ti̱tu ki̱twa̱kadu we kwa̱se bwesi̱metu.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Di̱ne ya̱m bi̱bu mwang fwamu, Ki̱la lo, ki̱fi̱bti a chir a du bwe fwa̱nemo.”
N ki̱n a ki̱la lo, a ya fwa̱nu a da kwa̱mbi̱re mwe. Ki̱fi̱bti a chir we di̱ki̱ne.
Yinu n Yesu a chir we bale Taya, a yika Sidon a bale far di̱dun Ka̱liline, a bale Dikafoli.
We bwako, ni̱bu a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni waka nii di̱fun di̱du a yimbu fwa ya̱mi̱n. N chi a wana ki̱n, ko a yo fa̱la̱ngu we nii wu ke a ya beku.
N Yesu a yal di̱funu a ki̱tiki̱, fi a ne ni̱bu we, yinu a di̱ki̱ beti̱ wuri kiyu we ki̱teli kiyu, a ti̱bu ki̱tum ki̱mu, yinu a twai ben ki̱nu ki̱ni ki̱tumu.
N ki̱n a kuku nui kiyu a dii, a ma ko “Mmm,” yinu a fwa ko,
Yo a fwa ya̱m bi̱be, ki̱teli ni wuyu a wuden. Ben ki̱nu a kwiran, a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu yinang.
N Yesu a ngatti̱ ki̱kure ko a fwa wuka nii mi̱nuwe, aya ni̱bu ki̱fwadi chik, kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n we ki̱ngau ki̱kurengu.
Chi a fwetu, a ya̱r ni̱bu yii. N chi ki̱fwadu ko, “Nii wu ki̱ma kana chi ti̱yiliye.” Ko a yo ti̱funitu ki̱nwedu yinu bi̱bu ki̱lwa̱bu ya̱mi̱mu ki̱fwa ya̱mi der.
We diti yikiyu wuka ki̱tuu ni̱be a muratewe. Yo ni̱bu a ne chi ka chade we, n Yesu a yale miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi chi ko,
“Mi̱n nwe ki̱bune ki̱tuu ni̱be, di̱ne wu diye yitta n chi ware n ti mi̱n a yabu chi a chabu.
Ka n du chi a yikane, chunu ka chi̱u bi̱kamu we wa̱re di̱ne bi̱kamu a be kutan.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yinu ni ya chabti̱tu a fi̱re we di̱kir di̱du, ni ni chi ka chade?”
N Yesu a bi̱u chi ko, “N ti̱ni ki̱ni ki̱daniyi yile?” N chi a yi ko,
“Yi̱di̱bi̱n.”
N ki̱n a yi ki̱tuu ni̱be ko a swe a ti̱m. A da̱u ki̱daniyi yidibiniyu a wana Kwama, yinu a dwa̱kan a ni miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱kera ni̱bu mi̱n.” Bi̱ki̱mu a kera ti̱n.
Aya n chi ki̱ni beti̱ chi̱ngi bayim. N ki̱n a wana Kwama yinanga ma we ki̱danniyangu, a ni miyari̱mu ko a keran, bi̱ki̱mu a kera ti̱n.
Ni̱bu a chau n kawure a ri furu. Miyari̱m a mur ti̱bukentu a ri ti̱ti̱ngriti ti̱dibin.
Ni̱bu a fikomu a lam kuniriti taana, a kuteng ki̱ku a yo ni̱bu n chi a yara ti̱n.
Bi̱nabi̱na a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu, a yika ti̱m Dalmanuta.
Kangu ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe ko n Yesu a bengu, a mure ka tukadu n ti Yesu. N chi a swe Yesu ki̱ni di̱bi̱du ko, yung ni̱n chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu ka chiredu a twiyetu.
N Yesu a ma ki̱fwile ki̱ni dukan yinu a fwa ko, “Di̱ne wule di̱kalan di̱du ki̱bau ka chi ti̱ka̱tariye? Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chi mi̱nu, a ne chi ti̱ka̱ta̱ri ti̱tu ki̱dang ki̱ku ka kuditu we.”
N ki̱n a du chi a leti̱ kwa̱mbi̱re mwe we, a yabu kangu ba̱la̱ng we.
Miyari̱m Yesumu a kur chi tabu chiya bebi̱ ki̱ni ki̱danniyu aya kana ki̱danne wiin, wu n we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe.
N Yesu a ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure ko, “Ti̱ma daan, ti̱ma daandaan ki̱ni yis ni̱bu Farisamu n ti wu Yiridu se.”
N chi a twaiyan bi̱bu we yichiyu yinu a fwa ko, “Di̱ne n chi̱ni ni newe ki̱ni ki̱danniyu.”

N Yesu a swaan ti̱kuran chitu, yinu a bi̱u chi ko, “A mayire ti̱kuran chi̱ntu a kana ki̱danniye? Lanta di ta kubu di ta swaanti̱ba? A mwintuwe ki̱ka̱ngu ta swaanbu ta twar ti̱ba? Ni̱tu chinti ki̱ngki̱nga?
N ti̱ni ki̱ni kwalangi ta kuba? N ti̱ni ki̱ni ki̱teliyu ta nweba? Ta kurti̱bu chi ko bayim?”
Yo mang kera ni̱bu kuuniyi yuunu mi̱n ki̱danniye, “Ti̱ti̱ngriti ti̱ta a ri ki̱ni ti̱bukenitu tiile?” N chi a ke ko, “Kub chiri turau.”
Yinu yo mang kera ni̱bu mi̱n ki̱daniyu kuniyi yaana, “Ti̱ti̱ngriti tiile, ti̱tu a ri ki̱ni ti̱bukenitu?” N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Ti̱dibin.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “A lanta ki̱ka̱ng ta swaanbu ya̱m mi̱ma?”
Yo n chi a be Betsaidange, bi̱kam ni̱bu a twa̱ke ki̱du, a wana Yesu ko a twai ni wu ke a be.
N Yesu a tau fa̱la̱ng ki̱duwangu, a chir kuteng bi̱nangi ki̱n. Yo a ti̱bu ki̱tumu we nui ni wuye, yinu a yo ki̱mi̱n fa̱la̱nge, n Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “We mun ku diya?”
Ki̱du a kukku duru a yi ko, “Mi̱n ku ni̱bu yinang tiyang ki̱yadi dila̱ng dila̱ng.”
Yinu n Yesu a twaiti̱ nuiyu ki̱da, yinu nuiyu a wuden, dukan kuku diyangu a ki̱lawe, n ki̱n ki̱ ku kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye yinang.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yika lo, ledu bi̱nu we yo kano mun yika lo.”
N Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yika beti̱ bi̱ni yiyu a kwati̱na Kaisariya Filibu. We wa̱re n ki̱n a bi̱u miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ni̱bu ki̱yidu ko n mi̱ni̱n wure?”
N chi a ke ki̱mun ko, “Bi̱kamu ko n Yowana wu ki̱ma Batisma, bi̱kamu ko n Yiliya, bi̱kamu ko m mun wukane we fa̱kubi̱bu.”
Yinu a bi̱u chi ko “N ti̱n de, ti̱ yidu ko m mi̱ni̱n wure? Yinu m Biti̱r a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, ‘M mun nang Masiya, naba yuke wu n Kwama a tume.’ ”
N Yesu a wu chimi̱n ki̱tele ko a fwadu wukane nii mi̱n duwe ka n ki̱n n wure.

We ki̱dang kangu, n Yesu a mwe ki̱yung chidu ko, a mwintuwe Bwe Nii ka nwe riye dangtidangti. Tikake seli̱bu, n ti bi̱duumu fanseti n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musati̱mu ka ko ki̱nu, ka chi̱u ki̱nu. We kuteng bwakongu, ka kunu we di wu tare ki̱ni ti̱kuri.
A fwa chi mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bi kwa̱rikwa̱ri. M Biti̱r a yal ki̱n a ki̱ti̱ku, a kwabu ki̱n ko a fwadu ya̱m bi̱bu we.
Aya yo n Yesu a ki̱l kabu ki̱dang miyari̱me, a kwabu Biti̱r ko, “N da̱n bwi a fi, Setan! Ti̱kuran mwitu ti̱tu a bwi, n ke ti̱tu a di̱Kwamatu.”
Yinu a yal ki̱tuu ni̱be n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi chi ko, “Nii wu ki̱baddu ka bumitede, a mwintuwe ka ko yikiyu, ka da̱u ki̱tiyang bwang kangu ka bumitedu.
Aya wu ka yidu ko ka to ti̱kuri kite, ka kwaladu. Aya wu ka kwala ti̱kuri kitu di̱ne mi̱n n ti ya̱m bi̱li̱m mi̱me, ka yu ti̱kuri kitu.
Li̱mang kangu wule, ka ni a ya ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni kwang a kwala ti̱kurikite?
Ti̱nti̱ne, mwan ni wureni ke n yu ti̱kuri mwite?

A mwintuwe ni wu ka nwe dibwi mi n ti dibwi ya̱m mi̱me we ki̱dang ki̱ku ni̱bu a bunti̱bu Kwama yinange, ki̱ma kana ti̱kuli n ti ki̱letiye, Bwe Nii ka nwe dibwi ko we di ki̱lake ko wu n ki̱n ka bedu ki̱ni dwiyen Te ki̱nitu n ti bwesi̱m ti̱tumbi̱ri bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, bi̱kam bi̱bu a tiran a fini̱mu a ne ka ku bwa aya ka ku Yaa Kwama yo ka fwadedu ki̱ni dukan ki̱ne.”
A kuteng diitiyi yurukunangu n Yesu a da̱u Biti̱r n ti Yakubu n ti Yowana, a fi̱l ti chi a kun we bwako n chikun, we bwako bwikiyu a suten we kakku chiyangu.
Lukei kiyu ki̱yiladi mwe, a ne kuli̱n di̱du ni ka yindu ka twa̱di yikonu we ti̱ti̱nitu.
N fa̱ku Yiliya n ti fa̱ku Musa a fwe chi mi̱ntuwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu n ti Yesu.
M Biti̱r a yi Yesu ko “Tete, a le yinangu n ni̱n we finangu, du ni̱n ti ti̱kubiti ti̱ta, di̱kanu n di̱mun, di̱kanu n di̱Musa, yinu di̱kanu n di̱Yiliya.”
M Biti̱r n ti bi̱kamu tayu a tau chi nabwen. M Biti̱r a kwala chi ka fwaditu.
Yinu di̱kan di̱twin a yinge chi, n chi a nwe di̱kan ker a chire we di̱twin di̱du, ki̱fwadu ko, “Wu nang Bwemi, wu mi̱n mi̱lade, ti̱ nwe ki̱n.”
A tibuke n chi a da̱ng finu n chi we mi̱ne, a kuti̱bu wukane nii, kana Yesu we ware n ti chi.
Yo n chi yaki̱ suwedu we kune, n Yesu a wu chi mi̱n ki̱tele ko a ti a fwadu wukane nii mi̱nu we, n chi, n chi a kuwe we, aya ka lami̱nti̱ yo Bwe Nii ka kunu we furangu.
Di̱ne yiko, n chi a du bi̱bu ya̱m, a ki̱lanki̱bi̱u yichiyu ko kano “Kunku furangu” ki̱yung wureni?
Yinu n chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Wureni a yo ni̱bu yungku mu a yi ko fa̱ku Yiliya ka tiye kakku yinu m Masiya ka buntede?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m fa̱ku Yiliya ka tiye kakku, beka do ka ti̱ti̱lle chiye. Aya a mwalbu ko Bwe Nii ka nwe riye nabwen, ni̱bu ka ko ki̱na?
Aya mi̱n fwa chi mi̱nu n Yiliya a tu a be, ni̱bu a ma ki̱mi̱n chi, n chi a kuditu, yinang ka mwal ko, ka fwedangu.”
Yo n chi a ki̱la fi a bi̱kamu miyari̱me, n chi a ya ki̱tuu ni̱be a di̱bi̱r chi yinu ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu ki̱tukadu n ti chi.
Yinangu n chi a ku Yesuwangu, ki̱tuu ni̱be a ya̱r yii nabwen, n chi a kiyani ki̱ti̱bu ki̱yadu ka sii Yesu.
N Yesu a bi̱u miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱tuka wureni n ti chi?”
Wukane nii we ki̱tuu ni̱be a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Naba yungke, da̱ng n be ki̱ni bwemi wu ki̱fi̱bti yibwilai a kwau ben ki̱ne, ki̱lwa̱bu ya̱mu lwa̱be.
Yo burang ki̱ku a kunenge, ki̱fi̱u ki̱nu a ti̱m, yii ko ki̱chir ka ki̱fwiye, ki̱ki̱rti̱ti̱ numu, bwi kiyu ki̱ni ka dukan. N yi miyari̱m mumu mi a chaku ki̱fi̱fti yiyu, aya n chi a bwal a yabu dawe.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ni̱bu ki̱dang, ki̱ku a newe ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mange, ti̱badu mang swedu n ti chi̱ni yire? Ka lanti̱ fere ma ni̱n yung chi̱nu. Ti̱be ki̱ni bwe.”
Yinu n chi a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni bwe. Yo ki̱fi̱bti yiyu a ku Yesuwe, bi̱nabi̱na a ngau bwe bwikiyu ki̱mi̱ka kana mi̱ka ku a mau ki̱n we ti̱mu ki̱bi̱nti̱ledu, yiiko ki chire ka ki̱fwiye.
Yinu n Yesu a bi̱u te bwe ko, “Ti̱chitu wu a mwe ki̱ni fere? Te bwe a yiko, a mwe yi bwesi̱n.”
“Ki̱fi̱btiyu ki̱yo ki̱nu ki̱yaru a ki̱rang ka mwenge, ko ke a bwa, aya ka mwang mede, nwe ki̱bune ni̱n, maka ni̱n.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, mwi mang meda? “Kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ka fwedu we ni a ke bi̱yili̱me.”
Bi̱nabi̱na te bwe a yi ko, “N ke bi̱yili̱mu, Temiya makai n tituwe di̱kwa̱l di̱du.”
Yo n Yesu a ku ki̱tuu ni̱be ki̱wulede, a wela ki̱fi̱bti ko, “Ki̱fi̱be lwa̱bke, mi̱n ya̱nu chir we di̱ki̱ne, ki̱lateduwe.”
Ki̱fi̱be a bwe keme, a yingle bwe yinang, yinu a chir. Bwe a yar we ti̱mu yinang kwa̱me, bi̱kamu ni̱bu a da̱u ko kanodu a bwa.
Aya n Yesu a tau Fa̱la̱ng bwengu a kuki̱ ki̱n, n ki̱n a kun a ti ki̱ni naniki.
Yo n Yesu a le mure longe, miyari̱m ki̱mu a bi̱u ki̱n a bura ko, “A mayire nang yimbu chaki̱de?”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Ki̱dum bi̱bu a chirbu ka n ke ki̱ni twa̱ba̱ku.”
Yinu n ki̱n n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a du fiko a chakakku ki̱ni yayu chi a bunti̱ bi̱n Ka̱lili. Aya n Yesu a kebu ko wukane ni ka yim finu n chi wemi̱ne,
di̱ne n ki̱n miya miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ka ni Bwe Nii a fa̱la̱ng ni̱bang, n chi ka chi̱u ki̱nu, a kutengu ditiyi yittayu ka kunti̱nu.”
Aya n chi a swaanbu chi ki̱miya chimi̱ne, n chi ki̱nwe tayi yinangu ka bi̱u ki̱nangu.
N chi a lam Kafanawu. Yo n Yesu a le lo, a bi̱u miyari̱m ko, “No ti̱tuka wureni we wa̱re?”
Aya n chi a le si̱ng, di̱ne n chi a no ki̱tukadu we wa̱re ko wu a la chiye n wure we tibe chi.
Yo n ki̱n a swe, a yal bi̱bi kub chiri burabi̱mu a yi chi ko, “Wu ki̱baddu ka ti kake, a mwintuwe n ki̱n na wu ka swan kutenge, ka kau ka̱be ni̱be kwang.”
Yinu n Yesu a yo wuka bwe wuti̱re a ti we tibe chi. Yinu a da̱u bwe a kwar kware, a yi chi ko,
“Nii wu a mar yikiyu yinang bwe wuti̱re ye, nang wu ki̱ke yiye, aya wu a ke yiye, ki̱bau wu a tuiyenge.”
N Yowana a yi ki̱n ko, “Naba yungke, ni̱n kuu wukane nii ki̱chaku ki̱fi̱bti ki̱ni di̱n mun, ni̱n ki̱l ki̱n di̱ne n ki̱n a newe n ti chir.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ ki̱lu ki̱n we, di̱ne a ne ni ka ma chi ti̱ka̱ta̱ri ki̱ni di̱n mi̱n yinu bi̱nabi̱na ka tuye we.
Aya ka nang wuwule niye, wu a kobu chiniye n wu chir.
“Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, ka nang wuwule ni wu a ni chi̱n mwe wu nore a kwa̱se, di̱ne n ti̱n m bi̱u Masiya, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu a ne kwalan ki̱ti̱me ko we.
“Ka kau chi ki̱bunei we ki̱n wu a yo wuka we bwesi̱m bi̱ti̱ri̱mu a ke bi̱yili̱mu mi̱n yare, ka la chi ni̱bu ka kwau ki̱mi̱n ner a kwiir, ka mar ki̱na la.
Ka fa̱la̱ng mwangu ki̱yonu a ki̱lenge, mwatu. Ka la mi̱n chi mwang le Yaa Kwama ki̱ni fa̱la̱ngi kiin n ti ki̱ku bwi mwiyi kwang ka le far ki̱ranu, fi ki̱ranga dumebudumene.”
Rwa̱ti yiyu ki̱wudiyu a bwabu we fiko, yinu ki̱rang ki̱ku a dume ti̱bu.
Ka nang mwangu ki̱yonu a ki̱le, mwatu. Ka la mi̱n chi mwang le Yaa Kwama ki̱ni nangi kiin n ti ki̱ku bwi mwiyi kwang ka le far ki̱ranu.
Rwa̱ti yiyu ki̱wudiyu a bwabu we fiko, yinu ki̱rang ki̱ku a dume ti̱bu.
Ti̱nti̱ne, ka numo ki̱yonu a ki̱le, chaku. Ka la mi̱n chi mwang le Yaa Kwama ki̱ni nu wiin n ti ki̱ku nuyi kwang ka le far ki̱ranu.
Rwa̱ti yiyu a fikoyu a bwabubwa, yinu ki̱rangu we fikongu a dumebudumene.
“Kanang wuwule niye, ka sii ki̱nu ki̱rang, tiyangu nibu ki̱si bumangu.”
“Bumu chi ti̱yili aya ka bumu a kwala li̱mang ka̱nge, ka madi yire li̱mang kangu ka ki̱lade? Yinu ti̱kau yinang bum we lwekaki̱ changu. Ti̱ma fiswe li̱mang n ti kawure.”
Yo n Yesu a du fiko, a yika bale Yafudiya, a yabu la Wurdune. Ki̱tu ni̱be a ki̱la mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe, n ki̱n a miya chimi̱n yinangu ki̱madi kwadangu.
Bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisamu a be fi a di̱ki̱ne be ki̱swe ki̱nu ko “Kanodu a dakan ni ka mar naye konga?”
A yi chi ko, “M Musa a fwa chimi̱n ko wureni?”
N chi a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “M Musa a ni ni̱n da ko ni̱n mwal lwangi̱n chikku ki̱nanu, ni̱n du naye a yikan.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “M Musa a mwal chimi̱n ki̱ku yilang di̱ne kuli̱ne chi̱n.
Aya we tile bi̱rke, n Kwama a muni, kwarta n ti naye.
Di̱ne ye, nii ka du te ki̱n n ti ne ki̱n ka swedu wa̱re n ti naye ko,
N chi ki̱ni bura ko, ka kaddi wiin. A kau ki̱ka̱ngu chi a newe burau.
Di̱ne yiko, chi n Kwama a kwarkane ni a yarkaduwe.”
Yo n chi a ki̱la lo, miyari̱mu a ma Yesu mi̱n di̱bi̱du we ya̱mu n ki̱n a fwamu.
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Kanang wuwule nii wu a mar naye, a yiu wukane naye ki̱ma ti̱kuli n ti ki̱n.
Ti̱nti̱ne ka naye a mar kwarta ko, a yikan a na wukane niye, n ki̱n ki̱ma ti̱kuli ti̱n.”
Ni̱bu ki̱bedu ki̱ni bwesi̱m bi̱ti̱ri̱mu a di̱Yesuwe ko ke a yo chimi̱n delaku. Aya miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱kwabu ni̱bu
Yo n Yesu a ku ye, a ma ki̱fwini ki̱ni miyari̱mu. A yi chi ko, “Ti̱du bwesi̱mu a be fi a di̱mi̱ne, ti̱kwabi̱duwe di̱ne Yaa Kwama n wu ki̱dum bi̱bu.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, ni wu a ne ka yiu Yaa Kwama yinangu bwesi̱mu ki̱madangu, a ne ka le Yaa Kwama.”
