Yinu a da̱u bwesi̱mu a kwar chi, ki̱twai chidu, ki̱yo chimi̱n delaku.
Yo n Yesu a kun ki̱yikadu a wa̱re, wuka nii a wule ki̱ni banang a be sung we a kakku kangu, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Naba yungku yile, kanodu mang madi yire mang ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadite?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Di̱ne wule mun yaliyu mwiko naba yile? Aya a ne naba yile we ka n ke Kwama n ki̱n ki̱kune.
‘A mwang yim yili̱ntu. Chidu nii we, madu ti̱kuli we, madu kutu we, mwedu ti̱kwanitu we, fulu ni we, ni temun n ti ne mun dwiyentu.’ ”
Nii wu a yi ki̱n ko, “Naba yungke, n mwe mi̱n tum yili̱n ti̱tu yo mi̱ni bwesi̱ne.”
Yinu n Yesu a da̱ng ki̱n, ki̱ni mi̱laku ko, “A du mi̱n chiti wiin. Ya feku chi muni ki̱niti kwang ni babumbu, mwang ya delaki̱ku nabwen we bwa diye. Ki̱lawe be bumite.”
Yo a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, nii wu a kai kabu ko a yikan ki̱ni kaiyan ni̱re, di̱ne n ki̱n ki̱ni kulitu nabwen.
Yinu n Yesu a da̱ng miyari̱m ki̱mu, a yi chi ko, “Ka kadu ki̱ni bwar yinangu naba kuli ka le Yaa Kwamangu!”
Ya̱m bi̱bu a yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a ya̱r yii. Aya n Yesu a yiti̱ chi ki̱da ko, “Bwesi̱mi̱m, ka kadu ki̱ni bwar yinangu naba kuli ka le Yaa Kwama.
Ka bungdu twali̱m ka le bwang libra n ti ki̱ku naba kuli ka le Yaa Kwamangu.”
Yo miyari̱m ki̱mu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a ya̱r yii a laan fiko. N chi ko ka yiko “N wure ka ya swike?”
N Yesu a da̱ng chi a yi ko, “We da̱ngku niyangu a ma bwar, ka n Kwama a newe; aya we di̱Kwama a ne bwar we.”
Yinu m Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Da̱ng, ni̱n ni̱n duwe chiti kwang, ni̱n bumi̱n te.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, a ne niwu ka du loko ka kebu ki̱m bi̱wuwiye ki̱me, ka n neki̱ne, ka n teki̱ne, ka bwesi̱m ki̱me, ka kunikiye, di̱ne mi̱n n ti ya̱m bi̱li̱me,

chi ka yadu we ki̱dang ki̱ke, ka la kuulu, we loniyu n ti kebi̱bu bi̱bari̱mu n ti bi̱wuwiye ki̱mu n ti ne ki̱n n ti te ki̱n n ti bwesi̱mu n ti kuniyu aya ki̱ni delaki̱ku ta nwe riye, ka kadu we ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱beditu, ta ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi.
A ya ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a tiye kaki̱mu ka kau swang kuteng. Yinu swang kuten ka kau bi̱kaki̱m.”

Yo n chi a yaki̱ fi̱lu ki̱yika Wurchalimange, n Yesu a ti kakku, miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu ki̱nabu ki̱nu ki̱ni ya̱r yii. Bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱nu a kutemu a nwe tayi. A fwa chi mi̱nti̱ ki̱da, chi yaka fwedu n ti ki̱nitu,

a yi ko, “Ki̱ka̱ngu ni ya Wurchalima ni̱bu ka tau Bwe Nii ka nidu a fa̱li wuduwe fansetiye n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱m, n chi ka ma ki̱mi̱n mwataku chikkang, ka ni kuuti bi̱bu n chi n ke ni̱bu Yafudam.
N chi ka swa̱ba ki̱nu, ka tibi̱ ki̱nu ki̱tuum, ka twala ki̱nu, ka chi̱u ki̱nu, we kuteng ditiyi yittangu, ka kunti̱nuwe.”
Yinu n Yakubu n ti Yowana bwesi̱m Sa̱badimu, a be fi a di̱Yesuwe, n chi a yi ko, “Naba yungke, ni̱n baddu nang bi̱n ti̱kan chi.”
Yinu a yi ko, “N ti̱n ti̱badu mang ma chimi̱n wureni?”
N chi a yi ko, “We yaamo, yo wuka a kang ki̱yilang mwang, yinu wuka wiine a kantakwelang mwang.”
Aya n Yesu a yi chi, “Ta yimbu chi ti̱bi̱ditu, we ta yindu ta nwe riye mi̱n yadu mang nwedenga? We ta yindu ta ma batisma wu a riye yamang mada?”
N chi a ke ko, “Ngo, nang medu.” N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ta nwe riye wu yamang nwede? Ka ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni ki̱dum batismamu ka mamida?
Aya mi̱n n ke wu ki̱ni dukanu mang yo wuka chi̱n a kang ki̱yilang ka a kantakwelange. Fanti yiyu n bi̱u ni̱bu a tu a do chi mi̱ni̱mu.”
Yo bi̱kamu miyari̱m bi̱bi kubi̱mu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a nwe ki̱fwini Yakubu n ti Yowana.
N Yesu a yale chi a fi wiine ko, “Ti̱yim, we kuuti n ke Yafudamu, bi̱bu ni̱bu a yim chi ki̱ni mati̱ni̱mu, ki̱yung ni̱bu chimu mi̱n dukan. Ti̱nti̱ne bi̱duum chimu ki̱yung ni̱bu chimu mi̱n dukan.
Aya a ne ka kadi yiko n ti chi̱n. Ka n wure wu ki̱baddu ka kau tikake we tibe chi̱ne, n ki̱n ka kau naba nangang bi̱kamu ni̱be.
Ti̱nti̱ne wu ki̱baddu ka kau tikake a tibe chi̱ne, ka kau ka̱be ni̱be.
Aya Bwe Nii a bebu di̱ne ke ni̱ba nang sii ki̱nu, aya ke ki̱kau ka̱be, yinu ka ni ti̱kuri kitu di̱ne ke ni̱bu nabwen aya yuki̱ku.”
Yinu yo n chi a lam Yerikonge, n ki̱n n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu, n ti ni̱bu nabwen, a ya wukane ki̱du a swe a ki̱ti̱ku wa̱reng ki̱ka̱la chi, di̱n ki̱nu n Bartimawus bwe Timawuse.
Yo a nwe ko n Yesu Banasa̱rete nang wu ki̱sude, a mwe ki̱yalu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Waa Yesu bwe Dauda, nwe ki̱bunemi!”
Bi̱kamu a kwabu ki̱n ko a lemi̱n. Aya n ki̱n a su keru ki̱yalu ko, “Waa! Bwe Dauda, nwe ki̱bune me!”
N Yesu a ti a yi ko, “Ti̱yal miye ki̱n.” N chi a yale ki̱du, a yi ki̱n ko, “Nang mi̱ladu, ki̱yali̱nu.”
M Batimawu a kaibu ki̱swi, a suku luke a mau a bwa, yinu a kuni ngi̱rtu, a yika fi a di̱Yesu we.
N Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mun baddu mang ma mi̱n wureni?” Ki̱du a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Naba yuke, mi̱n baddu mang ku di.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yikan, keki̱ bi̱yili̱mang mwangu a been.” Bi̱nabi̱na a ku di, a nabu Yesu, a bunga ti̱n ware.
Yo n chi a be ki̱dwan n ti Wurchalima, n chi a tau Betafachi n ti Betani, a bale Kun tini Setuniye, n Yesu a tum miyari̱m ki̱mi burau,
a yi chi ko, “Ti̱le bebi̱ne wu a kakku change, ka ti̱lenge, ta ku wukane bekurunge ni̱bu a kwau ki̱n wu nii ni a fili̱n be we. Ti̱kwi ti̱be ki̱n.
Ka wukane ni a bi̱u chi̱n ko di̱ne wule ti̱kwide? Ti̱yi ki̱n ko, ‘Tewuduwe ki̱baddu, ka ki̱ladi ki̱n a ne tike.’ ”
Yo n chi a yikane a ya bekurunge ni̱bu a kwau ki̱dwan n ti wa̱re, a fi̱lang a wuka lo,
Yo n chi a mwe ki̱kwide, ni̱bu we fikomu a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱kwidu a mayire, kurunge wu chi̱na?”
N chi a yi ni̱bu yinangu n Yesu a yi chiyangu, yinu ni̱bu a du chi a yikani ki̱n.
Yo n chi a be Yesu mi̱ne ki̱ni kurunge, a mau lukei chiyu we kurunge, yinu n Yesu a fi̱l a swe we.
Ni̱bu nabwen a mau lukei chiyu we wa̱re, bi̱kamu ni̱bu nabwen a switawe lwangi̱n ti̱kweni a mau we wa̱re.
Bi̱bu a kakku chiyamu n ti bi̱bu a kuteng chiyamu ki̱kukku kebitu ki̱yidu ko,
“Delaku a di̱Kwama!
Delaki̱kku a wu, ki̱bedu
a di̱n Tewuduwe ne,
N Kwama a dela yaa te
chire n Dauda wu ki̱bede.
Di̱wanu n di̱Kwama!”
Yo n Yesu a le Wurchalima, a le Kan Kwaman di̱duna Wurchalimanu, a da̱ngan ka ti̱tti̱le chiye, aya di̱ne dii a lenge a chir a yika Betani n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu.
Bafi̱nenangeko, yo n chi ki̱du Betani, n Yesu a nwe chun.
N ki̱n a ku tiyang sinangu ki̱ni lwangi̱nti ki̱li, a yawe ko kano ki̱ni ti̱kulan. Yo a lam fiko a ya a ne ti̱kulan we tiyangu, a yabu chi we ka lwangi̱n di̱ne n ke ki̱swi ko.
N ki̱n a ma Sinangu mi̱n yii ko, “Wuka nii a ne chati̱du we di̱mune ki̱da.” Miyari̱m ki̱mu fal a nwe chi n ki̱n a fwatu.

Yo n chi a le Wurchalimange, n Yesu a le Kan Kwamanu, a mwe ki̱naba ni̱bu ki̱tana chimu, n ti bi̱bu ki̱mi chi a fikomu. N ki̱n a tunga tebi̱ritu n chi ki̱suten ka̱mbi̱ritu, n ti fanti sweri ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱feku ki̱kubti̱mu yi kumkuum.
A dubu ni̱bu ko a su we tanti̱lange yifi̱la Kan Kwamane ki̱ni kuli̱nitu.
Yinu n ki̱n a miya ni̱bu mi̱n ko, “Ta yabu we ya̱m Kwamamu yinangu a mwal ko,
‘Ka yal lomi ko, kan twa̱ba̱ku
di̱ne kuuti ki̱ni kwanga?’
Aya ti̱yo a kau fi dabi̱kuum ki̱laiyande.”
Tikaketi Fansetiyu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musayimu, kangu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, a mwe ki̱bau wa̱re wu ka chi̱n ki̱ne, aya n chi ki̱yar yii we yungku kangu, di̱ne ki̱tuu ni̱be ki̱nwe miyaki̱kangu.
Ki̱ni me, n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a chir we bi̱nu.
Bafi̱nenangeko yo n chi yaki̱sudu ki̱ni si̱nne, a ku tiyang sinangu n Yesu a ma ki̱mi̱n yiiyangu a kusu ki̱ni ki̱ yinang kangu kwang.
M Biti̱r a kur chi n Yesu a ma tiyang sinangu mi̱n baki̱darenge, a yi Yesu ko, “O! Tete, da̱ng Sinangu mwang ma ki̱mi̱n yiiyangu a kusu.”
N Yesu a yi miyari̱mu ko, “Ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Kwama.

Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka nii ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mang we di̱Kwama a kamabu chiye, ka medu ka yi kunnu ko, ‘Kun fi̱tan a far mwen,’ ka a ne kamaku we chi n ki̱n a bi̱u we ni̱r ki̱ne, Ka ma ki̱mi̱nti̱nu.
Di̱ne yiko mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ti̱tu ta bi̱du a twa̱ba̱ku buniyangitu, ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu tiko ti̱ya, ti̱kitu a kau ti̱chin.
Yo kano ti̱twa̱ba̱ buniye, ka ta tau wuka ni a ni̱re, ti̱kur ki̱mi̱n a ki̱ti̱m, ke techi̱n wu a diye a du chimi̱n yichiyu ki̱leti ti̱n. [
Ka ta du ni̱bu mi̱nbu ki̱leti chiye, yi yiko ti̱n, n Techi̱n wu a diye a ne du chimi̱n ti̱nu.”]
N chi a ki̱late Wurchalima we. Kangu n Yesu yaki̱ kana Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu, tikaketi fanseti̱mu, ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musayimu n ti bi̱kamu seli̱bu a be fi a di̱ki̱ne. A bi̱u chitu ko,
“N wure a ni̱n dukanu mwang kakan ni̱bu kwa̱ma̱ri̱mu we kan Kwamana Wurchalimane?” Ti̱nti̱ne, “N wure ni̱n dukanu ko n ma ti̱tu.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mang ma chimi̱n di̱bi̱du, ka ti̱ni mi̱n di̱ki̱li̱n yiine, mang fwa chimi̱nu ka mang ma ti̱tu ki̱ni dukan wurene.”
Ti̱fwami, “N wure a ni Yowana dukan maku batisma? N Kwama ka ni̱ba.”
N chi a twaiyan we yichiyu ko, “Ka ni yiko a di̱Kwama, ka yidu ko a mayire niyang kebu bi̱yili̱me?
Aya we ni medu ni yidu ko, ‘A be a nii ya?’ ” N chi ki̱nwe tayi ko ka yo kulangkulange di̱ne ka nang wuwule niye a keko n Yowana Fa̱ku Kwama.
Di̱ne yiko, n chi a yi Yesu ko, “Nang yimbu.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “M mi̱n ti̱n a ne mang fwa chimi̱n ti̱nu ka mi̱n ma ti̱tu ki̱ni dukan wurene.”

Yinu n Yesu a chakakku ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni baltaku, “Wuka ni a fi ku yinabe, a kana kuu ki̱ni yakwale, a swa̱nti di̱kulen di̱du kani̱n ya̱mi̱n ti̱kulan mwe yinabiyentu, a buti̱ kweeru kani̱n mwata mi̱n ya̱mi̱nu. A ni bi̱kam ni̱bu suku ku, ko a nang sudu a yikati̱ di̱bwal.
Yo ki̱swi yakku ti̱kulan we ku yinabe a lame, a tum wuka naba nanga ko we ni̱bu nanganmu ko a yiu ki̱mi̱ne ti̱kulantu.
Yo naba nanga a be, ni̱bu bi̱bu a tau a ngau, a yo ki̱n, a yikan fa̱li kwako.
Nii wu a tum chi mi̱nte wuka naba nanga, n chi a ngau wuko a dur, a ni ti̱n ki̱n riye.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ki̱n a tungte wuka. N chi a ngau wuko, a chi̱u.
A du naba kuu mi̱n kana bweko, wu n ki̱n a mi̱lan yinange. A kuteng ki̱ku naba kuwe a tume ki̱n we di̱ chiye, ‘Ki̱kuradu ko ka ni bwe ko dwiyentu.’
Yo ni̱bu ki̱su kuumu a kuwe, a yi ko, ‘Bwe ka chau kula nang wu, ti̱be, ni chi̱u, ke ni chatti̱ kula!’
N chi a tau bwe a chi̱u, a da̱u bwe a mar a kuteng yakwaleng we ku yinabe.
“Kanodu Tewuduwe a kuu yinabe wu ka ma chidi yire? N Yesu a bi̱u chi. Chi ka maditu, ka bedu ka chi̱be ni̱bu suremu, ka da̱u ku wu ka ni bi̱kam ni̱bu.
Yoye ta kiinbu ya̱m Kwamam bi̱bu wenga?
‘Kale ni̱bu muki̱mu a konge,
nang kale ki̱la da̱u tureng kanne.
Ti̱tu nangang Tewuduwe,
a kau chi ya̱r yii we da̱ngku chirengu.’ ”

Bi̱duum tikaketi ni̱bu Yafudamu a bau wa̱re ka tau ki̱ne, di̱ne n chi a swaan ko baltaki̱ku a dur chi̱n. Kanang chikiye, n chi nang ni̱bu ki̱suu bi̱bwilamu we ya̱m bi̱bu. Aya a tabu ki̱n di̱ne n chi ki̱nwe tayi ki̱tu ni̱be, n chi a du ki̱n, a yarati̱n.
Yinu n chi a tung ki̱mi̱ne ni̱bu Farisa n ti ni̱bu Yirudumu ko ke a yo ki̱mi̱n la̱ta̱ yii, ke chi tau we ya̱mu ka fwadi̱mu.

Yo n chi a benge, a yi ki̱n ko, “Naba yungke, ni̱n yim m mun, mun fwa ya̱mi der, mwang wulbu tayi ni̱biyu mwang da̱ngti̱bu dwiyen ni̱tu. Aya mun yung ka ya̱m bi̱yili̱m bi̱bu n Kwama fwamu. Kanodu a dakan nang fe Mai wuduwe Kaisar sangkala? Ni̱n fenga, ka ni̱n feduwenga?”
Aya n Yesu a swaan bwila chi, a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱ sweye? Ti̱niye ka̱mbi̱ru ti̱fen sangkali̱nu.”
N chi a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱n. A bi̱u chi ko, “Wu kabu wure?”
N chi a ke ko, “Kabu Kaisare.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ni Kaisar ti̱tu, n ti̱u Kaisaritu. Ti̱ni Kwama ti̱tu n ti̱u Kwamatu.” Chitu a ya̱r ni̱bu yii nabwen.
Yinu ni̱bu Sadukiyamu, bi̱bu a kebu ki̱ni kunki̱ kwa̱mimu a be fi a di̱ki̱ne a bi̱u ki̱n ko,
Naba yungke, m Musa a mwal ni̱mi̱n ko, “Ka kemo a bwange, a du naye ko a ne bi̱be wenge, a mwintuwe keko ka ni̱n na naye ko, ke a ya ki̱mi̱n bwesi̱mu ka chau kulamu.”
Bi̱kam kebu we chi bi̱dibiin. Wu sele a ti kake, a yiu naye, a bwa a bi̱bu bwe.
Wu robe a bunti̱ ki̱ne, a da̱u naye ki̱nadu, n ki̱n a be bwa ti̱n a ne bi̱be we. Wu tare yiko ti̱nti̱n.
N nang kangu n chi ki̱ni bi̱dibiin, a twiya mi̱nangu. A ne wu a bi̱u bwe wa̱re n ti naye we. We kuteng ki̱ku naye wu a bwa ti̱n.
We di kunki̱ kwa̱miyange, ka kau naye wure we tibe chi? Yo n chi kwang a na naye we.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱kuran chi̱ntu n ke ti̱yili di̱ne ta swanbu ya̱m Kwamamu, yinu ta swanti̱bu dukan Kwamanu.”
We di swan kute, a ne ya̱m ki̱natim we bwadiye. Ni̱bu kwang ka kadu yinang ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamam.

Ki̱ka̱ngu we ya̱m kunku kwa̱miyamu, ta kibu we tati̱ki̱dai Musa? Ta kibu chi a mwal ki̱dangu a be di̱ki̱ di̱lukene ki̱ tau ki̱ranga yinangu Kwama fwa ko, “M mi̱n nang Kwama Yibrayime, n ti Kwama Yichaku, n ti Kwama Yakubu we.
N ki̱n n ke Kwama bi̱bwari̱m. N ki̱n wa bi̱kuri̱me. N ti̱n ni̱bu Sadukiyamu ti̱le nabwen.”

Wuka ni we ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musantu a be nwe yinangu n chi ki̱tukadu we yichiyangu, kangu n ki̱n a swan ko n Yesu a nii chi di̱ki̱li̱n di̱yili̱nangu, a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Yilang ki̱ku a la chiyangu n nang ki̱ki̱le?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yilangu a la chiyangu n nang ki̱ku ‘Ti̱nwe ni̱bu Yisrelamu, Kwama Tewuduwe, Tewuduwe wiin ki̱kumang.
Mi̱la Kwama Tewuduwe mo ki̱ni ni̱r muni diin, ki̱ni ti̱kuri mwiti kwang, ki̱ni ti̱kuran mwiti kwang, yinu ki̱ni dukan muni kwang.’
Ki̱ku ki̱bunti̱dangu n nang ki̱ku, ‘Ke kemo yinang yimwi.’ A ne yilangu a la ki̱kangu we.”
Yinu naba ni̱bu yungku yili̱ne a yi Yesu ko, “N fwa bi̱yili̱m, naba yungke, n Kwama wiin, a ne wukane we.
Ke ki̱ni ni̱ru kwang, ki̱ni ti̱kuri mwitu kwang, ki̱ni dukan munu kwang, yinu mi̱la kemo yinang yimwi. Ti̱tu a la ti̱niriti kwang n ti niku ki̱tumang.”
Kangu n Yesu a yim ko nii wu ki̱ni yingkangu, a yi ki̱n ko, “N kwatuwe yaa Kwama.” A kuteng ki̱ku a ne ni a ma ki̱mi̱n di̱kan di̱bi̱de we.
Yinangu n Yesu yaki̱ ma yungki̱ku we Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu, a ma di̱bi̱du ko, “Kanodu ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu ki yidu ko m Masiya bwe Dauda n wure?
N Dauda n ki̱fwan, we dukan Fi̱ki̱m Kwamami̱nu a yi ko,
‘Tewuduwe a yi Tewuduwe mi ko,
N swe a kang ki̱yilamangu
ka lammi̱nti̱ ki̱dangu mang chau ki̱la ki̱ni fwakwarbu mumu
we nani mwiyangu.’ ”
Yo n Dauda ki̱fwan, a fwa ko, “M Masiya Tewuduwe, yinu ka kaddi yire m Masiya ka kau bwe we di̱Dauda?” Ni̱bu nabwen a ma furi mwemwen, ki̱ni ya̱m Yesumu.
We yungki̱ku, n Yesu a yi ko, “Ti̱ma dandan ki̱ni ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱nmu, n chi ki̱do lukei yiswa̱mi, ki̱bwali ki̱n, ki̱baddu ni̱bu ka ni̱n sii chidu a kwa̱ma̱ri.
Ki̱bau fanti yiyili we kambi murakitu, ti fanti yiyili we yo ni̱bu ki̱ma yeniye.
N chi nang bi̱bu ki̱chau kuli̱n nati̱bu kwartabu chimu a bwaran ni̱mu. Ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni chitu swa̱n swa̱n ko ke ni̱bu a yim chi. Aya n chi ka ya mwataku ki̱duwang.”
N Yesu a swe we Kan Kwama di̱dunu, a kwatuwe finu ni̱bu ki̱kurin ka̱mbi̱r. Ki̱da̱ngdu yinangu ni̱bu ki̱kur kambi̱ritangu, kuli̱nmu a kur ka̱mbi̱ru nabwen.
Yinu wuka nabune a bete, a kur ki̱nuti ka̱mbi̱ri yurabu, ka nang chi kiye a ni̱ni yurau.
Yinu, n Yesu a yale miyari̱n ki̱mu, a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, min fwa chimi̱nu, chi nabune wu a kure a la ni̱bi kwang.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a chake we kuli chitu a ni, aya nabune wu, a chake we kwalan kiti kwang a ni.”
Yo n Yesu a chire we Kan Kwama di̱dune, wukane we miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko, “Naba yungke, da̱ng ki̱duum kalim bi̱bu ti yinang ku ti̱mubanta lengu!”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka we ti̱ku ti̱muban ti̱yili ti̱te? Ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu a ne kale ka swedu a di a keko we, ka tungadi kwang.”
Kangu n Yesu a swe we Kun di̱du a tini Setuniye, di̱du ki̱da̱ng Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu, m Biti̱r, n ti Yakubu, n ti Yowana, n ti Andi̱riya a bi̱u ki̱n a bura ko,
“Fwa ni̱mi̱n, ti̱chitu wu ka fwedi fere? Nang ku di̱mwal di̱du i yire yoko ti̱tu kanodu yaka fwede?”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱twar, wuka ni a buti̱du chi̱n we.
Ni̱bu nabwen ka bedu ki̱ni di̱n mi̱n, ka yidu ko n chi nangki̱n, ka butu ni̱bu nabwen.
Ka ti̱ nwe ya̱mi kumbiyu n ti ya̱mi ki̱ngasiyu a kunniye, ti̱wulu we. A kau ti̱chitu wu ka fwedi yiko. Aya di swa̱n kute a lanbu didin.
Kuu ka makadu n ti kuu. Yaa ka kuladu n ti yaa. Ti̱mu ka mi̱kadu we fantiyu dangtidangti, sunu ka ma ni̱bu. Aya ti̱tu n ke riye siine. Ti̱tu mweku riyeng.
“Ti̱ma dandan ki̱ni dur chi̱nu, ni̱bu ka tau chi̱nu ka yikan kambi mwataki̱, ka twala chi̱nu we kambi murakitu, ni̱bu ka yikadu ki̱ni chi̱n a kakku mati̱m, we fiko ta kau chi mi̱n ni̱bu di̱mwari̱m.
Aya di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱nu ka mwedu ka le ki̱teli ni̱biyu didiin we kuuti ki̱ni kwang.
Yo ni̱bu ka tau chi̱nu ka yikan bwana kan mwataki̱ne, ti̱wulu tayi we, ti ta fwadu ko wule. Chi ka chiredu a yii chi̱ne ti̱fwa, di̱ne n ke bi̱chim, ya̱m Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
“Ke ka ni keko ni̱bu ka chidu. Te ka madi yiko n ti bweko, bwesi̱mu ka makadu n ti tebi̱bu ka nebe, ka yo bwa chi.
Ni̱bu ka ko chi̱nu di̱ne di̱n mi̱ne. Aya nii wu ka mu ni̱ru ka lami̱nti̱ di swan kute, ka swidu.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Ki̱swi ki̱bedu yo ta ku chi danduriye ti̱tu ki̱bedu ki̱ni kaiyakitu we fi a no dakabe. (Nii ki̱ kii ya̱m bi̱be a swaan) bi̱ba ti̱m Yafudiya a wul a fi̱l kuni.
Nii wu a ya, a fi̱l kwere a yifi̱la, a ki̱ladu lo we ko da̱a̱ ti̱kan chi.”
Nii wu a ya, a chir kuuwe, a ki̱ladu lo we ko beka da̱u luke.
A no chi̱n! Nati̱m lubimu n ti bi̱bu ki̱ka̱r bwesi̱mu we ki̱swi wuko.
Ti̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu, ti̱chitu a fweduwe yi sa̱nang.
Nangki̱n, riye diti yikiye ka bwiladu, a ne ni swe ki̱nu ki̱ni wuka riye yinangu n Kwama a yo mi̱ne ti̱ti̱nitangu. A neka fwenti̱nuwe ki̱da.
Ki̱kumang ka n ke, n Tewuduwe ka ki̱tu ki̱swi riye, kuuti ti̱ti̱niyu ki̱ni kwang ka twiyadu. Aya di̱ne bi̱suti̱ri̱m ki̱mu, n ki̱n ka ki̱tu ditiyu a dubi bayim.
“We ki̱swi wuko, ka ni a ya̱n ko, ‘Da̱ng m Masiya nang wuwe, Ka ka yidu ko da̱ng n nang wu a bwa, ti̱kedu we.’
Nangki̱m Masiyati ti̱kwaniyu n ti fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu ka chiredu ka yung di̱mwal chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ti chi ya̱r yiitu ke a butu ni̱bu, kasi no nang bi̱suti̱ri̱m Kwamamu ka, ka kadde.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱ti yinang! Di̱ne n tu n fwa chimi̱n yo ki̱swi a tibi̱ lande.
“Aya we diti riye yikiyu, a kuteng riyengu,
Dii ka madi chitu,
swangu a ne yii ti̱mu
Ki̱switiyu ka twakadu,
kwali̱n chi̱n di̱du a dii twiyenu
ka mi̱kadu.
“Yinu ka nang wuwule niye ka ku Bwe Nii ka fwedu a ti̱twini ki̱ni nabwe dukane n ti dwiyen.
N ki̱n ka tum ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu ka mure bi̱suti̱ri̱mu Kwamamu we fwiti̱neti ti̱ti̱niyu, we bwa ti̱ti̱nitu a kur mi̱ne n ti bwa ti̱ti̱ni twiyetu a kur mi̱ne.
“Ki̱ka̱ngu ti̱miya chi we tiyang sinangu; ka ki̱yange ti kiyu a mwe ki̱sute yikiye, yinu lwangi̱n kitu a mwe ki̱twa̱de, ti̱yindu tiko didi̱be a mwatawe.
We yiko, ka ti̱ku ki̱chitu wu a mwe ki̱fwede, taswan ti̱nu tiko ki̱laki̱ kangu a mwatawe, a lam kwa̱r.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, yo ki̱dang ki̱ku a tibi̱ sude, ki̱chitu wu kwang ka fwedu.
Dii n ti ti̱mu ka twiyadu. Aya ya̱m mi̱mu a ne ka twiyadu ki̱diya kwadu.
“A ne nii a yim di n ti ki̱swi ki̱lake we, kono nang ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu, ka Bwe Kwama, aya kana Kwama Te n ki̱kun.
Aya yo ta yimbu yo ki̱chitu wu ka fwede, ti̱swe sobu ti̱nang ma ki̱yolang.”

“Ni swe ki̱laki̱ Bwe Nii yangu ki̱ni nii wu a du loko a yika di̱bwale. Yo yaka yikade, a kera ni̱bu nanganmu mi̱n nangangitu n kawure ka madangu. Yinu a yi naba nii ki̱to kwa̱re ko a ma ki̱yolang we di ki̱lake ko.
“Di̱ne yiko, ma ki̱yolang yinang, di̱ne ta yimbu ki̱swi Tewuduwe ka ki̱lade, ka menge, ka kume, ka ki̱tangti̱lang kumange, ka kunsine ka si̱ne.
A yanuwe mun da duum, di̱ne ka ki̱ladu a ne di̱mwar we.
Chi mi̱n mang fwa chimi̱ne, n fwa ka nang wuwule niye mi̱n ti̱n. Ti̱ma ki̱yolang!”
Yo du ditiyu yurabu ni̱bu ka ma Yiye Yabake n ti Yiye ki̱dani yiyu a fubufuweye. Tikaketi fansetiyu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musayimu, ki̱babba fi̱li wu ka tan Yesu ka chide.
N chi a kekan ko, “A bwin ki̱dang Yiye Yabakengu, di̱ne ke ki̱la yo kulangkulange.”

Ki̱dangu n Yesu a lon Simun a Betani, ni wu ki̱ni burang mwa̱liye. Yo n Yesu ki̱chau chabte, wuka naye a be ki̱ni ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng, wa tiyang nardiyang, ki̱ku ki̱ni kwa̱ti̱rang a lure wu ni̱bu a mubbi ki̱ni kale alabasta. N ki̱n a wur lure ki̱nunge a kur ki̱mi̱n we duru.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu n chi ware we fikonmu a kai ni̱r ko, “A mayire ki̱kai ki̱nunge?
A no ka midu a sure kuuliti ti̱ta, a no ni ti̱lusani.” N chi a kai ni̱r ko a mayire ka kai ki̱nun yi ki̱n kwa̱ti̱riye.
Aya n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱du bwe naye, ti̱yidu ya̱m we. Naye wu a mami chi ti̱yili.
Ti̱n ware ti ti̱lusaniti kwadu, ta medu ta maka chi we ki̱dangu ti̱baddangu. Aya a ne tike, ne mang swedu n ti chi̱ni kwadu.
N ki̱n a ma chi ka maditu, a wa bwimiyu mi̱n ki̱nung ki̱ku ki̱doyu di̱ne furemang.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, bwa ni̱bu ka mwan ya̱m bi̱li̱m mi̱me we ti̱ti̱niti kwang, ni̱bu ka kur chi naye wu a maatu.”
Yinu n Yafuda Yiskariyoti wu we miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱me, a ya we tikaketi fansetiyu di̱ne ke ki̱ni Yesu.
N chi a nwe ta̱ma̱ng ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱bu, n chi a dokan we yichiyu ka ni Yafuda ka̱mbi̱r. A ri, n ki̱n a le ki̱babba da ka niin Yesu we.
We di wu wiine wu a yiye ki̱daniye, di wu ni̱bu ki̱ma niku ki̱ni kwani we Yiye Yabake, miyari̱m Yesumu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mun baddu nang do mi̱n Yiye Yabake a fi̱re?”
Yinu n ki̱n a tum miyari̱m ki̱mi burau ko, “Ti̱le bi̱n Wurchalimanu, ta tekandu n ti wukane nii ki̱ni suur mwen a dur ti̱bungan n ti ki̱n.
Lo wu ka lede, ti̱le ti̱yi naba loko, ‘Naba yungke ki̱bi̱du ko, a bwa̱le kan rungkonu, di̱du Mang chan, Yiye Yabake n ti miyari̱m mi̱mi̱nu?’
N ki̱n ka yung chi̱n di̱kan kan di̱duun di̱du a tu a do ki̱ni fantiyi sweri. Ti̱do chabtu Yiye Yabaketu a fiko.”
Yinu miyari̱mi burabi̱mu a kun, a le mure bi̱ne, a ya ya̱mu we yinangu n Yesu a fwa chimi̱nangu. N chi a do chabtu Yiye Yabake a fiko.
Ki̱ni me, n Yesu a ya lo wu n ti miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu.
Yo n chi a le ki̱chau chabti̱te, yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, wuka nii we tibe chi̱n ka miyu, wu ni̱n chau chabti̱tu ware ti ki̱ne.”
Miyari̱mu a kai ni̱tu, n kawure ki̱yidu ko, “M mi̱na?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Wiin we tibe chi̱n, n ki̱n nang wu a di̱ku falang we kwa̱se ti mi̱ne.
Bwe Nii ka yikadu yinang ka a mwal we dur ki̱nangu. Aya a no nii wu ka mii Bwe Nii! A no la ki̱mi̱n chi ka ni̱bu a no bi̱bu ki̱ne.”
Yo n chi a le ki̱chau chatti̱te, n Yesu a da̱u ki̱dane a wana Kwama, a dwa̱kan a ni miyiri̱m ki̱mu a yi ko, “Ti̱yiu ti̱tu nang bwimiyu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku, a da̱u kwa̱se wu a mwe yinabi a ma di̱wan we di̱Kwama, a ni chi, n chi kwang a no we mure.
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱bu nang ki̱tum bwa̱ki̱ mi̱mu, bi̱bu mang kuru di̱ne ni̱bu nabweni̱mu.”
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱m, nemang noti̱ mwe yinabe wu we ki̱da, ka lami̱nti̱ di wu mang no wu fwiye a Yaa Kwama.
Yinu yo n chi a kau tee, a chir a fi̱l Kun di̱du ki̱ni tini Setuniye.
N Yesu a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “N ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang ta wulu ta dwiyu we. Yinangu a mwal we ya̱m Kwamamu ko,
‘Mang chi̱u naba toke
Kwantiyu ka yaradu.’
Aya we kuteng ki̱ku n Kwama ka kukiyu we furangu, mang tu chi̱nu we yikaku Ka̱lili yangu.”
M Biti̱r we fiko kabdu ko, “Kasi no n chi kwang ka yaradu, m mi̱n ne mang dunnu.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa mi̱nu Biti̱r, a ne lami̱nti̱ yo kware ka ta̱ru ki̱da yurabe, mwang kwilayu ki̱da yitta mwi mwang yimbu mi̱n.”
Aya m Biti̱r ki̱fundu ki̱fwadu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Kasi no ni̱bu ka chiyu ware n ti mun nemang kan yinku mwangu ko bayim.” Bi̱kamu miyari̱m ki̱mu a fwa ti̱ni yiko.
N chi a yika wukane fi ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko, “Kesemani.” Yinu n Yesu a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱swe a finu Yamang twa̱ba̱ buni.”
N ki̱n a bungan n ti Biti̱r, n ti Yakubu n ti Yowana. Ni̱r ki̱nu a mwe ki̱kaiyadu, bwiyu a fwi kangu n ki̱n a yim chi yaka fweditangu.
Yinu a yi chi ko, “Ki̱lliye wu a ni̱r mi̱ne ka medu ka chiyu, ti̱swe a finu ti̱ma ki̱yolang.”
Yo a yika kakki bayi̱me, a sung a ti̱m a twa̱ba̱ buni ko ka mwang kenge, yo n nwedu riye we. Aya n ke di̱ne ki̱ke mi, ma ki̱kemo.
A yi ko, “Wa, Tete, a ne chi ka bwane we, ka mwang kede, da̱mi kwa̱se riye wu. Aya bunti̱ ki̱ke mo, n ke wumi.”
Yo n ki̱n a ki̱lawe, a be ya miyari̱m ki̱mu a da duum. N ki̱n a yi Biti̱r ko, “Simun, mun da duuma? Wule yo wu a ne ta medu ta swedu kasi no awa wiine?
Ti̱ma ki̱yolang, ti̱twa̱ba̱ buni ke ti̱yaru we, yo fwakware ka swe chi̱ne. Kasi ki̱ku fi̱ki̱mu we ki̱ni dukanangu aya bwiyu a fwi.”
Yinu a ki̱latuwe ki̱da, a twa̱ba̱ bunitu, ki̱fwa ya̱mu ka bi̱biini̱m.
Yinu a ki̱lawe, a be ya chi a dati̱ dumuwe. kwalangi chiyu a yi̱lteni ki̱ni duumu. N chi a kwala chi ka fwa ki̱mi̱nditu.
N ki̱n a yikatuwe yinu a ki̱lawe ki̱dang tarang, a yi chi ko, “A lanta ki̱kang n ti̱n we duma, n ti̱n we ti̱fi̱kada? A ri! Ki̱swi a be, ni̱bu a ni Bwe Nii a fa̱li ni̱bu bi̱bwilame.
Ti̱kun, ni yikan! Wu ka miye nang wu a lam fiye.”
Yo n Yesu we ki̱fwa ya̱me, n Yafuda wu we miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱me n ti ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen wu ki̱ni kuli n ti dwamiye. Tikaketi fanseti n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ne a tume chi.
N Yafuda, wu ka mi Yesuwe a tu a dokan n ti chi ko, “Nii wu mang sidu ki̱ni kwarke, n nang wu ta tadde, ti̱tau ti̱yikani ki̱n, ti̱to yinang.”
Yo n ki̱n a lam fi a di̱Yesuwe, a kwar Yesu ko, “Tete, naba yungke!” A kwar ti̱n.
Bi̱nabi̱na ni̱bu a tau Yesu, a tituwe ki̱ri̱ng.
Aya wuka ni a chaku kul ki̱nu, a swi ka̱be wuduwe fansetiyeye mi̱n ki̱tele wad.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱chire ki̱ni kulitu n ti dwamiyu be ta tayu yinang dakuwa?
Kanang wuwule diye n mi̱n we ti chi̱n we Kan Kwaman Wurchalimanu mi̱n ma yungki̱ku ta taibu, aya ti̱tu a fwe ke a ri chitu a mwal we ya̱m Kwamamitu.”
We fiko miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱ni kwang a du ki̱n a yarani yak.
A ya wuka bwele we fiko n ti bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ Yesumu, n ki̱n a ne luke we bwikiyu kana kwadu. Yo ni̱bu a tau ki̱ne,
m bwele a wuli ti̱ri̱m a du kwadu ki̱nu we a fa̱li chiyu.
N chi a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a kakku wuduwe fansetiyeyu. Tikaketi fansetiye n ti seli̱bu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musayimu a muran we fiko.
M Biti̱r a bunti̱ Yesu, aya a marti̱ ki̱twalang a le mure tare lo wuduwe fansetiyeye. A swe we fiko n ti bi̱bu ki̱to Kan Kwama di̱dunu ki̱wul ki̱rang.
Tikaketi fansetiye n ti kwa̱l yili̱nu a muran ki̱bau nii wu ka mwe ti̱kwanitu a dur Yesunu ko a ma ki̱le ko ke chi chi̱u Yesu, n chi a yabu fi̱li ka mang ti̱te.
Ni̱bu nabwen a mwe ti̱kwanitu we dur ki̱nu. Aya ya̱mi chiyu dangtidangti.
A kuteng ki̱ku, bi̱kam a kun a fwa bi̱chimu ya̱m ti̱kwanimi ying;
“Ni̱n nwe a fwa ko, ‘Mang wur Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu ni̱bu a mubbi̱nu, a ditiyi yitta mang mu di̱kan di̱du n ke nangang Fa̱liyang.’ ”
Ki̱ni ye ya̱m chimu a beba fi wiine.
Yinu wuduwe fansetiyeye a kun a ti we tibe chi, a bi̱u Yesu ko, “M mun n ne di̱kan di̱ki̱li̱n yiin wenga? We a ya̱miyu ni̱bu a fwa dur muniya?”
N Yesu a yibu ya̱m.
Yinu tikake Fansetiye a bi̱ti̱ ki̱n ki̱da ko, “M mun nang Masiya Bwe Kwama naba delaka?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “M mi̱n nang ki̱n. Aya ta ku Bwe Nii ka swedu we kang ki̱yilang Kwamangu, ki̱ni dukan Naba Wuduwenu wu ti̱ti̱nitu a fa̱la̱ng kange, ka suwedu a dii, a ti̱twini we twiye.”
Tikake fansetiye a ngi̱ra luke ko, a kur a bwa yinu a yi ni̱bu ko, “Ni bau di̱di̱le di̱kwa̱l, we ya̱m bi̱bu?
A ta nwe yinang kangu a swa̱ba Kwamangu, ti̱kama wureni?”
Ni̱bi kwang a ke ko, “A lwe bwa.”

Bi̱kamu bidum fanseti fal, a mwe ki̱tibe ki̱nu ki̱ni ki̱tum, a bwa̱u ki̱mi̱n kwalangi kiyu, ki̱ngaddu ki̱ni fa̱la̱ng yinu ki̱bi̱du ko, “N ma fa̱kuitu we chi a fwe.” Yinu ni̱bu toki̱mu a yikani ki̱n ki̱twaladu.
M Biti̱r a ki̱ti̱bang we lo, yinu wukane be fwa̱ne wu ki̱ma nangang we lo wuduwe fansetiyeye a be fiko.
Yo n ki̱n a ku Biti̱r ki̱wul ki̱range, a da̱ng ki̱n yinang, a yi ko, “A mi ka n mun we wa̱re n ti Yesu Banasa̱rete?”
Aya m Biti̱r a kwilan ko, “Mang yimbu chi mun fwaditu fal! Mang swanbu ki̱n!” Yo a fwa ye, a yikati̱ sa̱ngka, bi̱nabi̱na, kware a ta̱r chitu.
Yo fwa̱n ka̱be wu a ku ki̱n we bwako, a fwa ni̱bu bi̱bu a tirana fikomu mi̱n ko, “Wu wetuwe tibe chi.”
M Biti̱r a kwila ti̱n ki̱da.
We kuteng ki̱ku bi̱bu a ti we fikomu a mwe ki̱fwati̱nu, ko, “A mwintuwe m mun we ti chi, m mun naba Ka̱liliye ti̱n.”
Aya m Biti̱r a mwe ki̱ni ka ti̱turan ki̱twa̱mati̱ chitu we kakku chiyangu, ko, “Mang yimbu chi ti̱fwaditu.”

Bi̱nabi̱na kware a ta̱r ki̱dang robang yinu m Biti̱r a kur ya̱m bi̱bu n Yesu a fwa ki̱mi̱ni̱mu ko, “Yibe a neka ta̱ru ka lam ki̱dang robangu, mwang kwilayu ki̱da yitta.” Yo a kur ya̱m bi̱be a mwe ki̱ni wi.

Ki̱ni kunsin, tikaketi fansetimu n ti bi̱kamu seli̱bu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu n ti kwa̱l yili̱nu kwang a do ya̱m chimu we dur Yesunu. N chi a kwaba Yesu, a yikan kakku Bi̱latu wu ki̱chau mati̱n Romate.
M Bi̱latu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “M mun nang Mai ni̱bu Yafudama?” N Yesu a ke ko, “A mwan fwa.”
Tikaketi fansetiyu a le ki̱swita ki̱nu.
Yinu n Bi̱latu a bi̱ti̱ ki̱da ko, “A ne mwang fwa ya̱mma. Mwang nwebu nabwe ya̱miye, ni̱bu ki̱fwadu a dur muniya?”
We chik, n Yesu a fwabu chi. Ti̱tu a ya̱r Bi̱latu yii.
We da chi, m Kwabna Bi̱latu ki̱maiye naba di̱bi̱nti̱le wiin wu n chi ki̱bade we ka nang wuwule ki̱swi Yiye Yabake.
We ki̱dang kangu, wuka nii we di̱n ki̱nu n Barabas wu ni̱bu a kwau a di̱bi̱nti̱le n ti bi̱bu a chi̱u ni̱bu a ki̱dang bi̱ngaiyimu.
Ki̱tu ni̱be a bulawe bwa di̱Bi̱latuwe ko a mar chimi̱ne ni wiin yinangu n ki̱n ki̱madi kwadangu.
M Bi̱latu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Ti̱badu mang mai chimi̱n Mai ni̱bu Yafudama?”
Di̱ne n ki̱n a swan ko tikaketi fansetiyu a tau Yesu di̱ne kati̱ne.
Tikaketi fansetiyu a suu ni̱bu ko a yi Bi̱latu a mare Barabas, a bwin Yesu.
Yinu n Bi̱latu a bi̱u chi ko, “Yinu fal, mang ma wu ti̱yidu ko n ki̱n Mai ni̱bu Yafudame yire?”
N chi a yibi kuuu ko, “Ti̱kukan ki̱n!”
M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Di̱ne wule? A ma ki̱le wureni?” N chi a su keru ki̱yidu ko “Ti̱kuka ki̱n!”
Di̱ne m Bi̱latu ki̱baddu ka li̱ma ni̱bu mi̱n ni̱te, n ki̱n a mar chimi̱ne Barabas. A yo ni̱bu a twala Yesu yinu a ni ni̱bu Yesu ko a ya kukan.
Ni̱bu kuni̱mu a lengi ki̱ni Yesu a lon Kwabna. N chi a yo kwa̱l di̱dun ni̱bu kuni̱mu we fiko.
Yinu a do ki̱mi̱n wuka luke wu wurwure ki̱duum bi̱bu mati̱m ki̱yadi̱mu. A bwa̱u ki̱mi̱n di̱ki̱ri̱n kwa̱da, a do ki̱mi̱n we duru.
Yinu n chi a le ki̱fita ki̱nu, ki̱sidu ko, “Saki Mai ni̱bu Yafudame.”
N chi ki̱twalu ki̱twalang we duru ki̱dati kwang, ki̱ti̱bi̱ti̱nu ki̱ni ki̱tum, a sung ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n di̱siir ti̱kwani̱n.
Yo n chi a ri ki̱fiye, a suku ki̱mi̱n luke mati̱ne wurwure, a do ki̱mi̱n luke ko, a chir ki̱ni ki̱n yaka kukadu.
Yo n chi we wa̱re ki̱yikade, n chi a tekan n ti Simun naba Sairin, n te Aleksanda n ti Rufu. N chi a yo ni wu mi̱n ki̱tiyang bwangi ki̱ng ko a da̱u.
N chi a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a finu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Kolkota ka nang chikiye finu a kasire.
We fiko ni̱bu a ni ki̱n mwe yinabe a se ti mur. Aya a ko a nobu.
Yinu n chi a kuka ki̱n we ki̱tiyang bwangu. N chi a keran luketi kiyu, n chi a ma suti̱ku we bwiti chiyu ko ke chi yim, ki̱ti̱me wu n kawure ka yade.
N chi a kuka ki̱ni si̱n yo ki̱swi a awa turkube.
N chi a mwal ki̱le wu n chi a yo Yesu mi̱ne we di a ki̱tiyang bwange ko, “Mai NI̱BU YAFUDAME.”
N chi fal a kuka ki̱n ware n ti dabi̱kuumi burau, wu wiine a kang ki̱yilang kang, yinu wukane a kwatakwelang kang.
Ya̱m Kwamamu a ri, bi̱bu a fwa ko, “A ki ki̱n a ni̱bu bi̱bwilam.”
Ni̱bu ki̱sudu we fikomu ki̱ swa̱ba ki̱nu ki̱fwara ki̱mi̱n ya̱mi yi kwani, n kawure ki̱mi̱ku duri ko, “Kwele, m mun wu mwang wur Kan Kwaman mwang muti̱nu we diti yittange,
mwang yu dur munu n suwe kaang.”
Yinu ti̱nti̱ne, wuduwe fansetiyemu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu ki̱fitati̱ ki̱nu ko, “A yu bi̱kamu, a yimbu yu yikiyu.
M mun Masiya suwe ki̱ka̱ngu. Suwe Mai Yisrela we ki̱tiyang bwangu, ke ni̱n yim ni̱n ke bi̱yili̱mu.” Dabi̱kumu ni̱bu a kuka ware n ti ki̱ni̱mu, a le ki̱fwarati̱ ya̱mi yi kwaniyu.
Yo tibe kuko a lame, ki̱liye a yinge ti̱mi kwang a lami̱nti̱ yo ki̱swi a awa yitta wu menge.
Yo ki̱swi a awa yitta a lame, n Yesu a kuku keru ki̱ni dukan a yi ko, “Eli Eli, lama sabatani?” Kanang chikiye “Kwama mi, Kwama mi, di̱ne wule mwang mariye?”
Yo bi̱bu we fikomu a nwenge, a yi ko “Ti̱nwe, ki̱yale fa̱ku Yiliya.”

Wuka we tibe chi a wul a da̱u soso a di̱ku we mwe yinabe wu bwa̱ngbwa̱nge, yinu a da̱u ki̱twalang ki̱kwale a kuku soso ki̱n a di̱ku ki̱mi̱n we yi. A yi ko, “Ti̱yam ni da̱ngdu ka n Yiliya we beka yu ki̱ne.”
Yinu n Yesu a bwe wi ki̱ni keru dukan yinu a bwa.
Wule luke wa Kan Kwamana Wurchalimane, a ngi̱ran bali̱ntii turau, a mwe we dii a fwe ti̱na bale ti̱me.
Yo tikake ni̱bu kuni̱nmu ki̱ma toki̱mu, wa ti̱ya kakku Yesungu a ku yinangu a bwange, a yi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, ni wu Bwe Kwama!”
Bi̱kamu nati̱bu we fiko a tiye kutan ki̱da̱ng chi ki̱fweditu. M Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti Salomi n ti Maryamu ne Yakubu wuti̱re n ti Yose.
Yo n ki̱n we Ka̱lili, nati̱m bi̱bu a nabu ki̱n ki̱maka ki̱nu ki̱ni chabti̱tu. Bi̱kamu nati̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a bungan n ti ki̱n ti̱n we Wurchalimamu wetuwe fiko.
Diko di sabwi ni̱bu Yafudam, ki̱ni me ni̱bu ki̱do bwi di̱ne Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudamu a mwatan ka mwedu.

Wuka nii we wu di̱n ki̱nu n Yusufu Arimatiya, n ki̱n we ni̱bu ki̱ni ki̱siyangmu we kwa̱l yili̱nu, wu n ki̱n ki̱yandu yo Yaa Kwama ka bede, a ya bwa di̱Bi̱latu a ne tayi we, a bi̱u ko a ni ki̱n kwa̱me Yesu we.
M Bi̱latu a ka̱ta̱n yinangu a nwe ko n Yesu a tu a bwangu. N ki̱n a yale tikake naba kune a bi̱u ko n Yesu a bwa a ma ki̱twalanga?
Yo n ki̱n a nwe we yi naba ki̱range ko a bwange, a ni Yusufu da ko a ya fur kwa̱me.
Yinu n Yusubu a ta̱ne luke fureme wu mwemwe, yinu a si̱ke ki̱n we ki̱tiyang bwangu, a dal ki̱n we luke mwemwe, a di̱ku a furu a swa̱ba kwaminu. A bi̱le ne tii kale a fi̱rtuwe yaku furangu.
M Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti Maryamu ne Yose a ku fi a furi̱n ki̱ne.
Yo difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam a suwe, m Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti Salomi n ti Maryamu ne Yakubu a ta̱ne ki̱nung furem,
We di wu kake we difi̱kare, ki̱ni si̱n ki̱dangu dii a yongu, n chi a yawe furu.
We wa̱re n chi ki̱twayadu ko, “N wure ka maka ni ka bi̱l kale we yaku furi̱nu?”
Aya yo n chi a lam fikonge, a da̱ng furu aya nabwe ti kale a bi̱len we yaku.
Yo n chi a le fure, a ku wukane bwele a swe a ba̱le kang ki̱yilange, ki̱ni luke mwemwe we bwi kiyu, n chi a nwe tayi nabwen.
Yinu nii wu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱nwedu tayuwe, m yim ti̱ba Yesu Banasa̱rete wu ni̱bu a kukane? A newe finu, a kun, Ti̱da̱ng fi a no ti̱n ki̱ne nang wu.
Aya ti̱yikan ti̱fwa miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱n n ti Biti̱r tiko n Yesu a kakku chang ki̱yika Ka̱lili, ta ku ki̱nu a bwako, yinangu a fwa chimi̱nangu.”
Nati̱m bi̱bu a chir we furu kana banani, n kawure bwiyu ki̱yiu yilang di̱ne taye a ne wu ki̱fwa ya̱me we. Yinu chi a fwa Biti̱r mi̱n n ti ni̱bu ki̱mu a kutengu n Yesu a tum chi̱n we fwiti̱netingu.
[Yo n Yesu a kun we fure ki̱ni kunsin we difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame, a mwe a tekan n ti Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala a chaku ki̱mi̱n ki̱fi̱bti yidibine.
Naye wu a yikan a ya fwa bi̱bu no n chi waremu mi̱n, a ya n chi a le furi ki̱lin ki̱ni wiini.
Aya yo bi̱ki̱mu a nwe naye a yi ko ki̱ku Yesu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye, n chi a kebu bi̱yili̱mu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a fwadu miyari̱m ki̱mi burabu mi̱ntuwe ki̱ni wuka kabu, yo n chi a chire ki̱yika bi̱ne.
Bi̱bi burabi̱mu a ki̱lan, a ya fwa bi̱kamu mi̱nti̱n. Aya a lanta ki̱ka̱ng n chi a kebu bi̱yili̱mu ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱bu.

A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a yung yikiyu a kakku miyari̱m bi̱bi kub chiri wini̱mu yo n chi yaki̱ chau chabte, a wela chi di̱ne kwalan keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyange, n ti ni̱tu chiti ki̱ngki̱ngi ti̱tu a yo n chi a kebi̱ ki̱ni bi̱bu a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m kunku kangimitu.
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱ya ti̱ti̱niti kwang, ti̱mwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱li̱m mi̱mi kwang kasi no fi̱re.
Kanang wuwule niye wu a ke bi̱yili̱me, a mati̱ batisma ka ya yuku. Aya wu a ko keku bi̱yili̱mange ka twiyadu kwako.
Ti̱mwalitu ka nabu ni̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mi̱mu: N chi ka chaku ki̱fi̱bti a di̱n mi̱n. N chi ka fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yiini yifwi.
N chi ka tau sootiyu ki̱ni fa̱li chi. Ka n chi a no yi̱neng ki̱ku ni̱n bwa̱di ki̱nangu, a ne ma chimi̱n chi. N chi ka yo fa̱li chiyu we bwi naba burangeyu, ka ya beki̱ku.”
We kuteng ki̱ku n Tewuduwe Yesu a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bangu, yinu a da̱u ki̱n a fili̱n bwa diye, a swe a kang ki̱yilang Kwama.
Yinu miyari̱mu a chir, ki̱ma di̱mwaru ka nang file, n Tewuduwe we ware n ti chi, ki̱yung bi̱yili̱m ya̱m chimu we a chi ka̱ta̱kitu n chi ki̱maditu.]
Nii wuduwe Tiyofi̱la, ni̱bu nabwen a funti̱bwi ko chi mwal chitu a fwe we tibe chire.
N chi a mwal chi nang nwe we ni̱bu bi̱bu n chi a ku ki̱ni nui chiitu we tile bi̱rke, n chi nang fanseti bi̱ba fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ti̱n ya̱m ki̱mi̱mu.
Di̱ne yiko, nii wuduwe Tiyofilu, m mi̱n m mi̱fwan, n ta̱l ya̱m Yesumi daan we tile bi̱rke, n da̱ng a le mang mwal mi̱nu kangu dakanangu.
M ma yiko ke n yim kasi bi̱yili̱mu ya̱m we ka ti̱ti̱le yinang ka ni̱bu a miya mi̱nengu.

We ki̱dangu m mai Yiridu ki̱chau mati̱n Yafudiya tangu, wuka we fansetiyu, di̱n ki̱nu n Sa̱kariya, wu a chire a ba̱la̱ng Fanse Abisa. Di̱n nelokonu n Alisabatu, n ki̱n a chirte ti̱n a ki̱kuwang bi̱u Arunang.
N chi ki̱ni burako, a ma da wu yile yinang kangu n Kwama ki̱badangu. N chi a bunti̱ yili̱n Tewuduwe n ti datiyu a dakaniyu.
Aya n chi a ne bwe we di̱ne Alisabatu ki̱twa̱ne, n ki̱n ti kwartako n Sa̱kariya a ka̱ra̱ni kuu.
Wuka ki̱di n Sa̱kariya ki̱ma nanga we Kan Kwama na Wurchalimanu.
We da wu a fansetiye, n chi a sutu Sa̱kariya ke a le mure kan Tewuduwe a twi ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng.
We ki̱dangu n ki̱n ki̱twi ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu, ni̱bu a mura na fi̱lang ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a fwe Sa̱kariya mi̱ntuwe, a bale kang ki̱yilange we see we fi ki̱twing ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱range.
Yinangu Sa̱kariya a ku Naba di̱tumbi̱rengu, ni̱r ki̱nu a ti̱ren, tayi a tau ki̱n.
A ya Naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi ko, “Nwedu tayi we Sa̱kariya! N Kwama a yiu twa̱ba̱ki̱ mwangu, n ne lomo Alisabatu ka bi̱u mi̱n bwe. Mwang chau ki̱mi̱n di̱nu n Yowana.
Ka a bi̱u ki̱ne, mwang ma furi mwen n ti ti̱mi̱lantu yinang, ni̱bu nabwen ka ma ti̱mi̱lantu n ti chi̱n we bi̱beko.
Bwe wu ka kau ni wuduwe we kakku Tewuduwe. A ne no mwe yinabiye aya ka ridu ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
N ki̱n nang wu ka yo ni̱bu Yisrelamu ka ki̱la bwa Tewuduwe Kwama.

N ki̱n ka tu Tewuduwe we beki̱ku, n ki̱n kanodi ki̱ri̱ng ki̱ni dukan Fi̱ki̱m yinang Yiliya, n ki̱n ka bedu ki̱ni fiswe li̱mange we tibe bwesi̱me n ti tebu chimu. Ka yo bi̱bu ki̱ko Kwamamu ka ki̱la wa̱re wu bi̱bu ni̱ri dini̱mu a tabe, ka do ni̱bu ke a yiu Tewuduwe.
N Sa̱kariya a yi naba di̱tumbi̱re ko, “Mang medu, mang yindi yire mi ti̱tu bi̱yili̱me? M mi̱n mang ka̱ra̱n, yinu nayemi a ka̱ra̱ti̱ne.”
Naba di̱tumbi̱re a ke ko. “M mi̱n nang chibrelu wu mi̱n tidu a kakku Kwamange, n ki̱n a tuiye ko n fwami̱n ya̱m bi̱li̱mu.
A ya mwang kebu ya̱m mi̱mu, wu ka kau bi̱yili̱me we yo ki̱swi ko a lame. Di̱ne mwang kebu bi̱yili̱me, a ne mwan yim fwa ya̱m, ka lami̱nti̱ di bwa̱ki̱ mangu ka ride.”
We ki̱swi wuko, ni̱bu a swe ki̱yam Sa̱kariya ka chiredu, n chi ki̱kuradu ko, kano nii wu ki̱ma wule wu ki̱ti̱kadu we mure Kan Kwamane.
Yo n ki̱n a chi̱renge, a yimbu fwa chi mi̱n ya̱m, ni̱bu a swaan ko kano ni wu a tekan n ti naba di̱tumbi̱re we mure kane, di̱ne n ki̱n ki̱swe chimi̱n ya̱mi fa̱la̱ng a yimbu fwadu.
Yo diti nangang kangu we Kan Kwamanu a riye, a ki̱lati̱ lo.
We kuteng ki̱ku a dami̱ni bayimangu, neeloko n Alisabatu a ma lur, a lai dur ki̱nu swarti tunu a chirebu we lo.
Alisabatu a yi ko, “N Tewuduwe a makai, n ki̱n a twiremi ti̱mwenitu, a ne ni ka swa̱ba mi̱ne we.”
We swa̱ngi turukunangu, n Kwama a tume Naba di̱tumbi̱re ko wu di̱n ki̱nu n Chibrelu a bwa Nasa̱rete, di̱du a yaa Ka̱lili.
A tum ki̱n a di̱kan fwa̱n, di̱da bwa̱u fati̱n n ti Yusufu, wa ki̱fi̱ku Mai Daudange. Di̱n fwa̱ni̱nu m Maryamu.
Yo naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a be bwa di̱ki̱ne a yiko, “Li̱me a swe ti mun, n Tewuduwe we ware n ti mun, a yo mi̱n ti̱delaku.”
Yinangu m Maryamu a nwe di̱siir di̱dangu, chitu a bwa ki̱n, ki̱kuradu ko kanodu di̱siir wulen di̱du.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi ki̱n ko, “Nwedu taiyuwe, Maryamu, n Kwama a yo mi̱n delaku.
Ya mwang ma lur, mwan bi̱u bwe, mwan chau ki̱mi̱n di̱nu n Yesu.
N ki̱n ka kau ni wuduwe, ti̱nti̱ne n ki̱n Bwe wa la chi kwange. N Tewuduwe Kwama ka ni ki̱n mati̱ntu yinang kangu tuke ki̱n n Dauda a mangu.
N ki̱n ka ma mati̱ntu we lo Yakubu we ki̱diya kwadu, ti̱m Yisrelamu ki̱diya kwadu, Yaa ko a ne riduriye!”
M Maryamu a yi Naba di̱tumbi̱re ko, “Ka medu yire ki̱chitu wu ka fwede, ki̱ka̱ngu mang daanbuwe n ti niyangu?”
“Naba di̱tumbi̱re a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, Fi̱ki̱m ka bedu a di̱mune, dukan Kwamanu ka sumi̱nu. Di̱ne yiko, Bwe wu mwang bi̱dde wuduwe wu wawade, ni yal ki̱nu Bwe Kwama.
Ko no nang kemo Alisabatu, ki̱twa̱ne a ne bi̱u bwesi̱me, a ma lur swarti turukun, kasi ki̱ku a ka̱ra̱nangu.
A ne chitu ki̱bwa Kwamatu we.”
Maryamu a yi ko, “M mi̱n ka̱be Tewuduwe, n ke chi mwang fwaatu a fwe yiko.” Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re a du ki̱n.
Yo a ri̱keti̱ni bayi̱me, m Maryamu a funti̱bwi, a ya bi̱n di̱da bangri Yafuda.
We bwako n ki̱n a le lon Sa̱kariya, ka si Alisabatu.
Yo Alisabatu a nwe di̱siir Maryamune, bwe a fur ki̱ne, a fa̱kta̱ bwi. Alisabatu a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.
N Alisabatu a kuki̱ keru dukan ko, “ki̱mwangu delaku a la ki̱ka nati̱bangi kwang. Delaki̱ku we bwe wu mwan bi̱dde.
“M mi̱n, n wure, wu mang ya chi ti̱dui ti̱te, wu ne Tewuduwe ka be miye sirame?
Yo mang nwe ker di̱siir mune, bwe wa fur mi̱ne a fa̱kta̱bwi ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan.
N ya delaku di̱ne mwang ke bi̱yili̱mu mwi chi n Tewuduwe a bwa̱u ka ma mi̱nditu ka fwedu ki̱kumang!”
M Maryamu a yi ko, “Mi̱n dela Kwama Tewuduwe we ni̱r mi̱nu
Ni̱r mi̱nu a rii ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lantu nabwen di̱ne n Kwama Tewuduwe naba yukemi,
di̱ne n ki̱n ki̱kur mi̱nu, wuti̱re ka̱beko! A ne fi̱rufi̱re, we bwa kake kutiyu kwang kani̱n yidu ko Kwama a dela mi̱n.
“A fwe ying di̱ne n Kwama naba dukane kwang, a ma chi ti̱dui di̱ne mi̱n, n ki̱n ti̱n wu wauwade.
N ki̱n ki̱nwe ki̱bune ni̱bu ki̱nwe tayi kiyimu we ti̱kalani yinang ka saki̱mi̱nangu.
“N ki̱n ki̱ma chitu nabwen ki̱ni dukan fa̱li kiyu. N ki̱n a yai ni̱bu ki̱kukku dutu chiti̱mu n ti bi̱bu ki̱yungdu ko n chi, chi la chiti kwangi̱mu.
“A chaku mati̱m bi̱duum we sa̱ngka mati̱n chite. N ki̱n a ya bi̱bu ni̱bu ki̱swa̱badi̱mu a ni chi dwiyentu.
“N ki̱n a ni bi̱bu chun ki̱budi̱mu li̱me. Aya n ki̱n, a yo kuli̱mu ki̱ni fa̱li kwako.
“N ki̱n a maka ka̱be yisrela, yinu a tabi̱bu ki̱nwe ki̱bune chi,
we di̱ Yibrayime n ti di̱kur lon ki̱nu ki̱diya kwadu.”
Maryamu a swe ti Alisabatu swarti ti̱tta, yinu a ki̱la loko.
Yo ki̱swi bi̱be Alisabatu a lame, n ki̱n a bi̱u bwe kwarta.
Fati̱bu ki̱mu n ti kebu ki̱mu a nwe chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱yilitu n Tewuduwe a ma we di̱ki̱netu, n chi a ma furi mwemwen n ti ki̱n.
We di wu nari̱be, ni̱bu a be ka bii bwe mi̱n laaru, n chi a no ki̱baddu ka chau bwe mi̱n di̱nu ko sa̱kariya, di̱n teki̱ni̱n.
Aya n ne ki̱n, a yi ko, “Ngango! ni yal, di̱n bwenu n Yowana.”
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Aya a ne ni a chau di̱n di̱de we ki̱kuwang chiyangu!”
Yinu n chi a swe te bwemi̱n, ko a fwa chimi̱n yinang ka ni yal bwengu.
Sa̱kariya a swe chimi̱n ko a be ki̱ni chi mwalki yinu a mwal, “Di̱n bwenu ko Yowana.” Ti̱ta ya̱r ni̱bu yii!
Bi̱nabi̱na yii Sa̱kariya a wuden, n ki̱n a le ki̱ dela Kwama.
Ti̱ta kau ni̱bu mi̱n chi tayi we fi̱langu, ya̱m bi̱bu we chitu a fwetu a ti̱ran we a kun di̱da yaa Yafudiya mi kwang.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱fwadu ko, “Wu ki̱dum bwem kanodu beka kau wureni?” N chi ki̱fwadi ying, di̱ne dukan Tewuduwe n we n ti ki̱n.
Yinu n te ki̱n, n Sa̱kariya, a ri ki̱ni fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu, a ma fa̱kuitu ko:
“Ni dela Tewuduwe,
Kwama wa Yisrela!
N ki̱n a be ka maka ni̱bu ki̱mu
ka tuti̱ chidu we ka̱bitu.
N Ki̱n a tum ni mi̱ne
wuduwe naba Yuke,
a ki̱fi̱ku Dauda ka̱beko.
Tiyangu n ki̱n a fwa a yiini
fa̱kubi̱bu ki̱mi wawadi̱mu.
A yu ni we fa̱li fakwarbu chi̱remu,
n ti ni̱bi kwang bi̱bu ki̱ ko chini̱mu.
N ki̱n a fwa ko ka nwe
ki̱bune tukebu chi̱remu
yinu ka kuru ki̱ni
di̱twa̱mbi̱r bwa̱ki̱n.
Di̱du nang di̱twa̱mbi̱r di̱du a ma
n ti tuke chire Yibrayime.
A yuni we fa̱li fakwarbu chi̱reme
ke ni si Kwama a ne tayi we,
ki̱ni wauwade n ti yile
we diti chireyi kwang.
“M mun bwemi,
mwang kau fa̱ku Kwama wuduwe.
Mwang ti Tewuduwe mi̱n kakku,
mwang do wa̱re di̱ne beki̱ kangu.
Mwang mwa ni̱bu ki̱mu mi̱nu tiyangu
n chi ka ya yuki̱ku,
we duku ki̱leti chiyu.
Di̱ne we ki̱bune Kwama,
wuka ni ka chiredu
yinang yo kuko ki̱fi̱lede,
a bwa diye beka yii nidu.
N ki̱n ka yii ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱yadu a ki̱liyemu
n ti bi̱bu a swe a yii bwamu.
N ki̱n ka yadu ki̱ni chi̱ni
a wa̱re da wa li̱mange.”
Yo n Yowana a dwiyene, a ri ki̱ni dukan Fi̱ki̱mi̱nu. N ki̱n a swe, a di̱kir, a lami̱nti̱ di n ki̱n a chirengi kwa̱rikwa̱riye we ni̱bu Yisrelamu.
We ki̱swi wuko n Kaisar Akustu a na yilang ko, ni̱ba ki ka nang wuwule niye wu a ti̱m Romammu, n ki̱n ki̱chan mati̱ni̱mu.
Ki̱ku nang mweku ki̱kang, ni̱ba ma yo n Kiriniyu, a tau ba̱la̱ng ki̱ku a Suriyange.
Kanang wuwule niye a yika bi̱n chi̱n, ko ke ya chi di̱ke di̱mbi chiitu.
N Yusufu ti̱n a chir we Nasa̱ret wu a ba̱la̱ng Ka̱lili a yika Beti̱lami wa Yafudiya, bi̱n Mai Daudanu. N ki̱n a ma yiko di̱ne n ki̱n a chire a ki̱kuwang Mai Dauda.
N ki̱n a yika Beti̱lami n ti Maryamu yaka di̱ke di̱nbi chitu. M Maryamu a tu a bwa̱u fati̱ntu n ti Yusufu, ti̱nti̱ne n ki̱n a ma lur.
Yo n chi a tibu du Beti̱lamiye, luru a lam ka bi̱du.
N ki̱n a bi̱u bwe wu kake, bwe kwarta, a dal bwe ki̱ni ti̱lukteni, a yo a chuki̱r. Di̱ne a ne kan we, di̱du n chi ka si̱ki̱ndi̱nu.
Bi̱kam ni̱bu toku kwantim we ki̱twalang kaangu ki̱to kwanti ki̱ni kum.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a chir chimi̱ntuwe fwad, ki̱ni dwiyen ti̱tu a be ki̱n a Tewuduwe we fiko, a yii ti̱mi ki̱chichi. Ni̱bu toki̱mu a nwe tayi.
Yinu Naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi chi ko, “Ti̱nwedu tayuwe, m be chimi̱ne ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱li̱m
Diwu we Beti̱lami, a bi̱n Dauda, ni̱bu a bi̱u chimi̱n naba yuke, n ki̱n nang Masiya
Chi ka̱ta̱kitu ta kuditu n ti̱u: Ta ya bwe ki̱lwi, a daal ki̱ni ti̱lukteni, a yo ki̱n a chuki̱r di̱du kwanti ki̱ chan chabti̱n.”
Bi̱nabi̱na, kwa̱l ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri a dimu a fwete n ti naba di̱tumbi̱re, ki̱dela Kwama ki̱yidu ko:
“Dwiyentu n ti̱u Kwama wu a diye.
We ti̱ti̱nitu li̱mangu a swe ti
bi̱bu n Ki̱n ki̱nwe ki̱bune chimu.”
Yo ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimu a du chi a ki̱la diye, ni̱bu tori̱mu a fwa we yichiyu ko, “Ni ya Beti̱lami yani da̱nge chi a fwetu, ti̱tu n Tewuduwe a mangitu.”
N chi a kwanti̱n a ya, a ya Maryamu n ti Yusufu n ti bwe wu n chi a ti̱u a chuki̱re.
A kutengu n chi a kuwangu, n chi a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n chitu Naba di̱tumbi̱re a fwa a dur bwenitu.
Ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bumi kwang we ni̱bu tori̱me, a ya̱r yi.
M Maryamu a tabi̱bu chitu a fwetu. N ki̱n a chakakku ki̱ma ti̱kurantu nabwen we dur ki̱nu.
Ni̱bu tori̱mu a ki̱lati̱ nachangu we ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan nabwen, ki̱dela Kwama ki̱ni ki̱n dwiyentu we chi a nwe ti ti̱tu a kuutu. Yinangu naba di̱tumbi̱re a fwa chimi̱nangu.
We wu nari̱be di, wu a biku laarange, ni̱bu a chau ki̱mi̱n di̱nu ko n Yesu. Nang di̱nu Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a fwa yo a tibu ma lur ki̱ne.
Yo da chi wa nurake a suwe yinang ka yili̱n Musangu a fwangu, n Yusufu n ti Maryamu a yika Wurchalima ki̱ni bwe a se Tewuduwe.
N chi a ma ying di̱ne yilang Kwamangu a fwa ko, “Ka naye a bi̱u bwe wu kake ko, a ni Tewuduwe.”
N chi a ya, ke chi ri, chi yilang a fwa we ya̱m Tewuduwe. N chi a ka ma niku ki̱ni ki̱kubtiyi yurau ka ki̱luti yurabe.

We ki̱swi wuko, a ya wuka nabani ki̱swedu we Wurchalima, di̱n ki̱nu n Simun. N ki̱n nii wu yile, wu ki̱buntu Kwama, n ki̱n ki̱yandu ka kudu yinangu n Kwama ka tume naba yuke Yisrela, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu we di̱ki̱ne.
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a yung ki̱n ko, n ki̱n a ne ka bwadu, a ya ka ku
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam a twai Simun, a yo ki̱n a le Kan Kwamanu yo n Yusufu n ti Maryamu a be ki̱ni Yesu we fi ko, ko ke a ri ki̱ke yili̱ne.
N Simun a kwar bwe we fa̱li kiyu ki̱ dela Kwama ko:
Tewuduwe, ka̱bemo
a ku bwa̱ki̱ mwangu,
yo ti̱kuri mitu a ya li̱mang.
Di̱ne nui miyu
a ku yuku mwangu.
Yuku mwangu ki̱ku
mwang do a kakku ni̱bi kwangangu.
“N ki̱n yiiku we
yikayu kuuti yinu,
ka bedu ki̱ni ri̱kaku
we ni̱bu Yisrelamu.”
Te n ti ne bwe, a ya̱r yi di̱ne taye we chitu n Simun a fwa a dur bwenitu.
Yinu n Simun a yo chimi̱n delaku, a yi Maryamu ne bwe ko: “N Kwama a chake bwe wu di̱ne ka kau chi yarki we bi̱kamu ni̱bu Yisrela. N ki̱n ka kau di̱mwal a di̱Kwama di̱du ni̱bu nabwen a ne kedi̱n.
We yiko n Kwama ka kwa̱l ti̱kuran ni̱ri kawuretu. Ti̱tu ka yoni kayan ni̱re yinang yo kul a kuri̱n a ni̱re.”
Wukane fa̱ku Kwama we, di̱n ki̱nu n Anatu. N ki̱n fwa̱n Fanuweli̱n, wu a ki̱kuwang Acher. N Anatu fa̱ku, n ki̱n a ma swa̱tu ti̱dibin we ki̱nako.

A tatuwe ki̱dangu kwartako a bwangu, n ki̱n a swe nabunitu swa̱ti̱tu wan nari̱bu chiri taana. N ki̱ni kwad ki̱ya Kan Kwamanu ki̱ sii Kwama ki̱ twa̱ba̱ti̱ bunitu kum ti kuko, wuka yo ki̱ma dimwen, yo ki̱twa̱ba̱ buniye.
We Ki̱dang kangu n ki̱n a ki̱re ki̱dwan we fi a di̱Yusufu n ti Maryamuwe, a wana Kwama di̱ne bi̱be Yesuwe. N ki̱n a fwa ni̱bu ki̱yam yuku Wurchalimamu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu.
Yo n Yusufu n ti Maryamu a ri chitu yilang Tewuduwe a fwaate, n chi a ki̱late Nasa̱ret bi̱n chi̱nu a yaa Ka̱lili.
Bwe a dwiyen, a ma dukan, ki̱miyadu, ka ridu ki̱ni kassantu nabwen. Li̱me Kwama we ti ki̱n.
Kanang di̱di̱le swa̱re, te n ti ne Yesuwe, ki̱ya Wurchalima di̱ne Yiye Yabake.
Yo n Yesu a lam swa̱ti̱ti kub chiri turabe, n chi a yika Yiye, yinang ka da chi wemi̱nangu.
Yo Yiye a riye, Yusufu n ti Maryamu a tau wa̱re ki̱ki̱la lo, a yimbu ko chi duwe Yesu we Wurchalima.
N chi a da̱u ko kanodu n we ki̱nabu chiyedu n ti ni̱bu, n chi a di kuko diko a kana yayu, yinu n chi a mwe ki̱babba ki̱nu we tibe kebu ki̱mu n ti fati̱bi̱bu chimu.
Yo n chi a kubi̱ ki̱ne, a ki̱lati̱ Wurchalima we ki̱babbadu we bwako.
N chi a ya ki̱n, a di wu yitta, a swe a Kan Kwaman, a swe ti ni̱bu yungki̱mu, ki̱nwe chidu, ki̱ma chimi̱nti̱ ti̱bi̱di̱ritu.
Ni̱bu ki̱nwe ki̱ni̱mi kwang, a ya̱r yii we yingki̱ku bwe yi ki̱nangu n ti kangu ki̱ni di̱ki̱li̱n yinangu.
Yo n Teki̱n n ti neki̱n a ya ki̱ne, a ya̱r bi̱ki̱mu yii. N neki̱n we fiko ko, “Bwemi, a mayire mwang ma ni̱niye? M mi̱n n ti temun ni̱n babbanedu.”
Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Wule yo ti̱baba mi̱ne? Ta yinbu tiko m mi̱n, mang swedu a lon Temiya?”
Aya n Yusufu ti Maryamu a swaanbu chi bwe ki̱fwaditu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ki̱n a kun a nabu chi a yika Nasa̱ret ware, a kwilabu chi. N ne ki̱n a le ki̱kura ya̱m bi̱bu.
N Yesu a dwiyen we bwiyu n ti ti̱kuran ti̱yilitu, n Kwama n ti ni̱bu ki̱mi̱la ki̱nu.

We swa̱r di̱di kub chiri tunu di̱du n Tiberiya Kaisar wu ki̱chau mati̱n a Romamu, ki̱dangu m Babuntu Bi̱latu kwabna Yafudiyangu, n Yiridu nang wu ki̱chau mati̱n a Ka̱lili ye, ke ko n Filibu ki̱chau mati̱n Yituriyatu n ti Tarakunita. Ti̱nti̱ne, Lisaniya ki̱chau mati̱n Abilenes,
We ki̱dangu Anana n ti Kayafa tikaketi fansetiyu, n Kwama a fwa ya̱m n ti Yowana bwe Sa̱kariya we di̱kiru.
N Yowana a le ka nang wuwule fiye we ti̱m chimu, a kana laa Wurdunu, ki̱mwa ni̱bu ko, “Ti̱wo ki̱ti̱m, ti̱ma batisma ke n Kwama a du chimi̱n ki̱leti chiyu.”
Yinang ka a mwal we ti̱kwa̱liyi fa̱ku Yichaya ko,
Ker niin ki̱ma
di̱mwar we di̱kiru ko,
“Ti̱do ni̱tu chi̱ntu
ke Tewuduwe a be swe we,
ti̱ma nangang ki̱yilang.
Kanang wuwule la ka ridu.
ka nang ki̱ki̱le bange ti kunitu
ka dadi wam.
wa̱ri yi kanariyu, ka yadi der.
Wa̱ri yi cha̱ki̱li cha̱ki̱liyu ka dadi twai.
Kuu ti̱me ki̱ni kwang
ka ku yuku Kwamangu.”
N Yowana a yi muraki̱ ni̱bangu ki̱bau ki̱nu ka ma chimi̱n batismamu ko, “N ti̱n bi̱kwani̱m, yinang soti yi kwaniye! N wure a rung chi̱ne, ko ti̱wul mi̱n we ki̱fwini Kwama ki̱bede?
Ti̱ma nangang ki̱ku ka yungdu ti̱wo ki̱ti̱mang. Ti̱yidu tiko n te chi̱n nang Yibrayim, n ni̱ni wauwadu. N Kwama ki̱ni dukan kasi no nang kali yiyu, ka yodu ka kau Yibrayim mi̱n Bwesi̱m.

N Kwama a tu a do bwi ka swita tini we ki̱yineng tiyang kangu ka fwalu a ti̱m. Ka n chi a ki̱labu a duwebu ki̱letiye, n Kwama ka wela chidu nabwen, yinang ni wu ki̱swita tini yiyu a tubuchiyu ki̱twida ki̱range.”
Ni̱bu a bi̱u Yowana ko, “Yoye nang ma wureni wu ka yung duku ki̱letiyange?”
N ki̱n a ki̱nta chi ko, “Ka nii ki̱ni lukei yurabe, a keran n ti wu a newe ki̱ne. Yinu nii wu ki̱ni chabte a maka wu a newe ki̱ne.”
Ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu a be ki̱baddu ka ma batisma, n chi a bi̱u Yowana ko, “Naba yungke, yoye nang ma wureni, ka yungdu ni̱n wo ki̱ti̱me?”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱yiddu sangkal di̱du a la yilangnu we.”
Bi̱kam ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ti̱nti̱n a bi̱u ko, “N ni̱n ti̱n nang ma wureni ka yungdu ni̱n wo ki̱ti̱me?”
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱yidu ka̱mbi̱ru we ni̱bu ki̱ni dukan, ti̱mwedu ti̱kwanituwe a dur niin, ti̱ma bwanu ki̱ni chi ni̱bu ki̱fe chi̱ne.”
Ni̱bu ki̱yam beku Masiyamu, n chi ki̱kamadu ko ka kano n Yowana nang ki̱ne.

N Yowana a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni mwe, aya wukani ki̱bedu wu mang mwatanbu chi n ti ki̱ne, mang lwebu mang chuku ki̱wami kiyu, wu dwiyen kitu a su ti̱tu ni̱bu ka swe mi̱nu warete. N ki̱n ka ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam n ti ki̱rang.

N ki̱n ki̱bedu ki̱ni swaye ka chaku bi̱yili̱mu ni̱bu we bi̱bwilamu, kanodu yinang yo nii ki̱chaku ki̱nuti a furi chaam n ti tui kiye. Ka yo bi̱yili̱mu ni̱bu a fi wu yile, yinang ka ni̱bu ki̱yang ki̱nuti baliyang. Aya ka ni bi̱bwilamu riye yinang ka ni̱bu ki̱twi furitu n ti tuitu a ki̱rang ki̱ku a dumebudumene.”
N Yowana a ma nangangu ki̱ni wa̱riyu nabwen, ko ke ni̱bu a swaan, a yiu ya̱m bi̱li̱mu.
Aya n kwabna Yiridu wu n Yowana a wela ki̱n di̱ne a da̱u Yirudiya, naye ke ko n ti ti̱kantu chi ti̱tu n ki̱n ki̱madu a lebite.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Yirudu a su bwila, a yi ni̱bu ko a tau Yowana a mar a di̱bi̱nti̱l, ni̱bu a mati̱n.
Aya yo n Yowana a tibu le di̱bi̱nti̱le, n ki̱n a ma ni̱bu mi̱n batisma, yinu a ma Yesu mi̱n ti̱n. Yo n Yesu a le twa̱ba̱ ke, di a wuden.
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam yinang ki̱kube a sub we dur Yesunu, yinu di̱kan ker a chire a bwadi ko, “M mun nang bwemi, wu mang mi̱lane, mi̱n nwe ta̱ma̱ng mwangu yinange.”
Ki̱dangu n Yesu a mwe nangang kangu, a ya swa̱tu kitu wan ti̱ta. Ni̱bu ki̱yal Yesu ko bwe Yusufuwe, n Yusufu, bwe Yeliye.
Yeli bwe Mattat, bwe Lawi, bwe Malki, bwe Yana, bwe Yusufu,
Matatiya, bwe Amos, bwe Nawum, bwe Asaliya, bwe Nachaya.
N nachaya bwe Maata, bwe Matatiya, bwe Chimeyen, bwe Chosek, bwe Yafuda.
Yoda bwe Yonana, bwe Refaya, bwe Sarubabel, bwe Chatila, bwe Neri,
N Ni̱ri bwe Malki, bwe Adi, bwe Kosama, bwe Almada, bwe Er.
N Yer bwe Chochuwa, bwe Yeliyeseer, bwe Yorim, bwe Mattat, bwe Lawi.
N lawi bwe Simiyon, bwe Yafuda, bwe Yusufu, bwe Yonam, bwe Yeliyakim.
N Yeliyakim bwe Malaya, bwe Mainana, bwe Matata, bwe Natan, bwe Dauda.
N Dauda bwe Yesse, bwe Obed, bwe Bwas, Bwas bwe Salmon, bwe Nasun.
N Nasun bwe Aminadab, bwe Aram, bwe Yesruna, bwe Feresa, bwe Yafuda.
N Yafuda bwe Yakubu, bwe Yichaku, bwe Yibrayime, Bwe Tera, bwe Nangor.
N Nangor bwe Seruk, Seruk bwe Reyu, bwe Felek, bwe Eber, bwe Chela.
N Chela bwe Kenan, bwe Arfacha, bwe Chem, bwe Nufu, bwe Lamek,
n Lamek, bwe Metusela, bwe Yenok, bwe Yareb, bwe Malalel, bwe Kenan.
N Kenan bwe Enosi̱k, bwe Chetu, Chetu bwe Adamu, Adamu Bwe Kwama.
N Yesu a ki̱lawe la Chodan ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a rii ki̱ni chib. Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu, a twa̱ku ki̱n, a yikan di̱kir.
N Setan a swe ki̱n ditiyu wan taana we bwako. We ditiyu wan taanayu, n ki̱n a chabu chi, yinu a nwe chun we kuteng ki̱ku.
N Setan a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mun nang Bwe Kwama, yo kale wu a kau ki̱dane.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta ki̱n ko, “Ya̱m Kwamamu a mwal ko, ‘Chi ka yu ti̱kuriye n ke ka chabtu.’ ”
N Setan a twa̱ku ki̱n, a yikan fi, a su, a la chiye, yinu a yung ki̱n kutiyu a ti̱ti̱niyu, a ki̱swi bayim.
N Setan a yi Yesu ko, “Mang ni̱n mati̱n kitu n ti dwiyen kiti kwang. Kuli̱n di̱du a fa̱la̱ng mang, ni mang ke, mang nidu ka tadu.
Di̱ne yiko, ka n sung, n siiye, mang ni̱nu, mwang tadu.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta ki̱n ko, “A mwalmwale ko, ‘N Kwama Tewuduwe nang naba siike, ni sii ki̱nu n ki̱kun.’ ”
Yinu Setan a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a Wurchalima, a ti a fi wu swa̱me, we Kan Kwamanu, a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mun nang Bwe Kwama, kun we fi, ri a ti̱m.
Ya̱m Kwamamu a fwa ko, ‘N Kwama ka yi ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu ka a koonu ke nwedu burang we.
N chi ka koonu we fa̱li chiyu, ko ke n nwedu burang we kasi no a nang.’ ”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “A mwal ko, ‘Swedu Kwama Tewuduwe mo we.’ ”
Yo n Setan a ri swa̱ka̱ku Yesungi kwange, a yikan, a du Yesu, ka lami̱nti̱ yo ka ya wuka da, wu beka sween ki̱ne.
N Yesu a ki̱la Ka̱lili, dukan Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu we ware n ti ki̱n. Ti̱nti̱ne, ya̱m ki̱mu a ti̱ran we bi̱ntu ti̱duitu n ti ti̱ti̱riti kwang.
N ki̱n ki̱miyadu we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu, ka nang wuwule niye wu a nwe ya̱m ki̱me, ki̱weru.
N Yesu a ki̱la Nasa̱ret bwa n ki̱n a dwiye mi̱ne. We difi̱kare, n ki̱n a le kan muraki̱n ni̱bu Yafudame yinang ka n ki̱n a meki̱madi kwadangu, a kun ka kii ya̱m Kwamam.
Ni̱ba ni ki̱n Taki̱da fa̱ku Yichaya. N ki̱n a wudu, a ya fi, a mwal ko,
“Fi̱ki̱m Tewuduwe
we ti mi̱n,
di̱ne n Ki̱n a suti.
Ko, n fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱li̱m,
N Kwama a tum mi̱ne ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱bu,
ke a chaku bi̱bu a le di̱bi̱nti̱li̱mu.
Ke ki̱dubi̱bu a ku di.
Ke bi̱bu ki̱nwe riyemu a ya chirku.
Ke n fwa ni̱bu mi̱n mi, a ne ti ke,
n Tewuduwe ka yu ni̱bu ki̱mu.”
Yo n ki̱n a ri kiki̱ke a dal taki̱da Kwama, a niti̱ wuduwe fanseti wu ki̱to kan muraki̱ne we, a ya sweswe. Ni̱bu we fikomu n kawure a kur ka nui ki̱da̱ng ki̱nu.
Yinu n ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ya̱m Kwamam bi̱bu a ri di, yinang ka ti̱nwedi yangu.”
Kanang wuwule niye, wu a nwe ya̱m ki̱me, a ya̱r yi a fwa chi a dakane we dur ki̱nu, di̱ne ti̱kwa̱li yiikitu ta li̱mangi. N chi ki̱bi̱du ko, “Wu n ke bwe Yusufuwa?”

N Yesu a yi ni̱bu ko, “N yim ta fwami ya̱m seli̱bi̱m bi̱bu ko, ‘Nabari, be yimwiyu didiin, ke ni̱n yim ko m mun nabariye,’ ti̱nti̱ne ta yi mi̱nu tiko, ‘Mati̱ chi ka̱ta̱kitu we bi̱n munu, yinang kangu nang nwe mwang ma we Kafanawu mangu.’ ”
Yinu n ki̱n a yi chi ko, “A ne fa̱ku Kwama ni̱bu ka yiddu kani yurau, a bi̱n ki̱ne we.”

“We bi̱yili̱mu, nati̱m buni̱mu nabwen we Yisrela, we ki̱dang fa̱ku Yiliyangu. We ki̱dang kangu, a ma swa̱tuti ti̱ta ki̱ni swarti turukun a swibu mwe, a kuteng swa̱tu ti̱tangu, chun a ma ti̱m Yisrelami kwang.
Aya, n Kwama a tumbu fa̱ku Yiliya we nati̱m buni̱m bi̱bu ko wiin we Yisrela. N ki̱n a tum, a kana nabune wiin, wa bi̱n Serifan di̱du a ti̱m Sidoni̱ne.
Ti̱nti̱ne, we ki̱dang fa̱ku Yelichangu, ni̱bu mwa̱limu we Yisrela nabwen, aya a ne wa ya beke we, ka n ke Naman naba ti̱m Suriyam n ki̱kune.”
Kangu ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bu we kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudame, n chi a fwiren.
N chi a kun, a yo Yesu ko a du bi̱nu. N chi a yikani ki̱ni Yesu a bwa a kun di̱du n chi a mun Nasa̱reti̱nu. N chi a no ki̱baddu ko, ya chi tungda, ke a bwa.
Aya n ki̱n, a sabran, a letuwe tibe chi, a yikan.
Yinu n Yesu a yika bi̱n di̱du ki̱yalu ko Kafanawu, di̱du a ya Ka̱lili. Ki̱miyadu we ka nang wuwuwle difi̱kare.
Miyaku kangu, a ya̱r ni̱bu yii, di̱ne ya̱m ki̱mu ki̱ni dukan.
Wuka nabani wu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti wu bwila, we mure kan muraki̱n ni̱bu Yafudamu, a kuku ker ki̱nu dukan ko,
“Wa Yesu naba Nasa̱rete! Lwanga mwangu wule we ti ni̱n? Be mwang chi̱u ni̱na? Mun wu wauwade wu Kwama!”
Yinu n Yesu a wela ki̱fi̱be wu bwila ko, “Lemi̱n! Chirmi̱n we nii wu!”
Ki̱fi̱bti a yo nii wu, a yar, a ti̱m, a chir, we kakku ni̱bangu, a nwe ki̱mi̱nbu burang.
Ya̱m bi̱bu a ya̱r ni̱bu yi, n chi ki̱bi̱be yichiyu we fiko ko, “Bi̱bu ki̱dum ya̱m wulem bi̱bu? N ki̱n kiyi ki̱fi̱be ki̱ni dukan ko a chir, ki̱chir ti̱ni̱mu.”
Ya̱m Yesumu, a ti̱ran ka nang bwa̱le we yaa wuko.
N Yesu a chir we kan muraki̱n ni̱bu Yafudamu, a le lon Simune. Nela Simune a bubuwe, bwiyu a sireni bud, we mure lo. Miyari̱m Yesumu a yi Yesu ko, a be naye wu.
Yinu n Yesu a ya, a ti ki̱dwang n ti chi ti̱dari kitu, a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan, a yo sireku bwiyangu n ti burangu a du naye wu. Bi̱nabi̱na naye wu a kun, a sii chimi̱nti̱ chabtu.
Yo di a lenge, ni̱bu a be Yesu mi̱ne ki̱ni ni̱bu buri̱ni̱mu, a bwinbu bi̱kam duum. N ki̱n a yo chi mi̱n fa̱la̱ngu, a be ka nang wuwule niye mi̱n burangu.
Ti̱nti̱ne, a kakan ki̱fi̱bti, n chi a chir we ni̱bu nabwen. Ki̱bwe keme ko, “M mun Bwe Kwama.” Aya n Yesu a dubu chi ko a wudu yii, a fwati̱ bi̱kam ya̱m, di̱ne n chi a yim ko n Yesu Masiya.
Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, n Yesu a du bi̱nu, a yika fi, a ne ni̱bu we. Ki̱ni yiko, ni̱bu ki̱babba ki̱ni chiku. Yo n chi a ya ki̱ne, n chi a funti̱bwi ka yo ki̱nu a neka du bi̱n chi̱nu.
Aya n ki̱n a yi chi ko, “A mwintuwe mang fwa ya̱m bi̱li̱mu mi, n Kwama Mai we ni̱bu a ti̱kan bi̱nti̱mu ti̱nti̱n, di̱ne nang chi a yo n ki̱n a tuyenge.”
Yinu n Yesu a yikan, a chakakku ki̱ni di̱mwaru we kanbi muraku ni̱bu Yafudam ti̱tu a yaa Yafudiya.
Wuka ki̱di n Yesu a ti, a ki̱ti̱ku la Sanesa̱retang, ni̱bu a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe ki̱nwe ya̱m Kwamamu.
N Yesu a ku kwa̱mbi̱ri mwei yurau, yiyu ni̱bu ki̱ ta̱n chi̱ngi, a yo, a ki̱ti̱ku laang, yo a yaki̱ nura dwa̱kai chiye.
N ki̱n a le wuka kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wu, n wu Simun Biti̱r, a yi ki̱n ko, “Sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, le mwe, a dudu ki̱tattake we nabwen. N ki̱n a swe we Kwa̱mbi̱re, a miya ni̱bu mi̱n.”
Yo n ki̱n a ri yungke, a yi Simun ko, “Yika fi a ki̱sulle ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, mar dwa̱kamo we, ke n tau chingiyu.”
N Simun a yi ki̱n ko, “Nii wuduwe, kumi kwadu ni̱n ti̱rtadu we fi nang tabu chi. Aya di̱ne mwang fwa yiko, mang bunti̱ ya̱m mumu, mang mar dwa̱ka.”
Kangu n chi a ma yikongu, n chi a tau chingiyu nabwen, yiyu a yo dwa̱ka chi yakani̱n ngi̱radu ki̱ni chingiyu.

Di̱ne yiko, n chi a ma di̱yal we kebuchimu ni̱bu taku chi̱ngi, a wuka kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ko, a be maka chi. Bi̱ki̱mu a be, a maka chi, a ri Kwa̱mbi̱ri mweyu ki̱ni chingiyu. Di̱ne turenangu, kwa̱mbi̱riyu ki̱su mure.
Yo n Simun Biti̱r a ku chitu a fweete, a sung we kakku Yesungu, a yi ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, du mi̱n, m mi̱n naba ki̱letiye.”
N ki̱n n ti ni̱bu a fikomi kwang a ya̱r yii, di̱ne nabwe chingiyu n chi a tabiyu.
N Yakubu n ti Yowana bwesi̱m Sa̱badi fati̱bu Simun mu a ya̱r yii ti̱nti̱n. N Yesu a yi Biti̱r ko, “Nwedu tayi we, bwa kake mwang ni̱n bedu ki̱ni ni̱bu ka bumiti̱ni̱m.”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n chi a chake Kwa̱mbi̱ri mweyu, a yo, a ki̱ti̱ku laang, n chi a du kuli̱ni ti̱ti kwang, a bunti̱ Yesu.
Ki̱dangu n Yesu n ti Miyari̱m ki̱mu a ya di̱kan bi̱nangu, wuka nii wu mwa̱li
N Yesu a tar fa̱la̱ng kangu a twai ni wu, a yi ko, “N ke mang benu, ya li̱mang n ya nuraki̱ku.” Bi̱nabi̱na mwa̱liyu a du nii wu.
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ya, fwa nii mi̱nu we, yung dur munu we fanseti, yang ma niku m Musa a fwangu, ki̱ku a dakan we burang ki̱ka̱ngu mwiko, n ya beku.”
Ni̱bu bi̱ba nwe ya̱m Yesumu a ti̱r ya̱mu, a yo ni̱bu nabwen ki̱be bwana di̱Yesuwe ko ke chi nwe ya̱mu, chi yati̱ beku we buri̱n chiitu.
Aya wuka yo n Yesu, ki̱yika fanti yiya ne ni̱bu weyu yaki̱ twa̱ba̱ bunitu we.
Wuka ki̱di yo n Yesu a yaki̱ ma miyake, bi̱kam ni̱bu Farisamu
We ki̱swi wuko, bi̱kam ni̱bu a be ki̱ni wu ngi̱rmane ni a chi ti̱dari, n chi a ma, ka le lo, ka ni Yesu, ke a be ki̱n.
Yo n chi a yabu wa̱re, di̱ne ni̱bu a ma nabwene. N chi a ku, a ne dawenge, a fi̱l dii a kane, a wum swa̱mu, a si̱ke ki̱n ki̱ni chi daritu we kakku Yesuwangu.
Kangu n Yesu a ku keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu, a yi ni wu a bubuwe ko, “Bwa̱le, n dumi̱n ki̱leti mwiyu.”
Ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musantu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu, n kawure a mwe ki̱fwadu ti keko ko, “N wure ki̱fwa ya̱m swa̱ba̱ni̱me? N Kwama, n ki̱kun ki̱ni da, ka du nimi̱n ki̱letiyu.”
N Yesu a swaan chi, n chi ki̱kurade, yinu a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱kuran chi̱ntu ki̱twa̱ng wa̱re?
Ti̱ti̱le a la chi, ti̱tu a yi ko, ‘N dumi̱n ki̱letita’, ka ti̱tu a yi ko, ‘Kun, ya yayu ta?’
N ke mang ma ti̱tu, ke ti̱yim ti
Yinu a yi nii wu ngi̱rmane ko, “Mi̱n ya̱nu, kun, da̱u chi ti̱dari mwitu n yikan.”
Bi̱nabi̱na nii wu, a kun we kakku ni̱bangu, a da̱u chi ti̱dari kitu, a yika lo, ki̱dela Kwama.
Kanang wuwule niye we fiko a ya̱r yii, tayu a tau chi, n chi a dela Kwama ko, “Diwu ni̱n ku nangang Kwamang!”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a ku Lawi, wu ki̱yiu sangkale, a swe a kan sangkali̱n, n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bumite.”
N lawi a kun, a du kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ki̱ni kwang, a bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱n.
N lawi, a sii Yesu mi̱n Yiye wuduwe we loko. Ki̱tuu ni̱be nabwen, wu a ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱me n ti bi̱kami kwang ki̱chau chabti̱tu ware.

Aya ni̱bu Farisamu n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musati̱m bi̱bu a kwa̱l chi̱nu, a be a ma Miyari̱m Yesumu mi̱n ki̱mwiti̱mwi ko, “Di̱ne wule tani̱n chau chitu n ti ni̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu n ti ni̱bu ki̱letime?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Ni̱bu ki̱ni li̱mamu a babu nabari, kana ni̱bu di̱buum ki̱bau nabari.
Mang bebu di̱ne ni̱bu ki̱tum yilem aya m be di̱ne ni̱bu ki̱letimu, ke a wo ki̱ti̱m, a yiu Kwama.”
Bi̱kamu a yi Yesu ko, “Miyari̱m Yowana naba batismamu ki̱ bwa̱ladu we dimwen n ti twa̱ba̱ku buniyangu, miyari̱m ni̱bu Farisamu ki̱ma ti̱ni yiko ti̱n, aya bi̱mumu ditiyu ki̱dang ki̱chadu ki̱noti̱du.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Kano fati̱bu bwele ki̱yiu nayemu, ka ma dimwen yo bwele we ware ti chiya?
Aya ki̱swi ka bedu yo ni̱bu ka da̱u bwele ki̱yiu naye we di̱chiye, yinu n chi ka ma dimwen we diti yikiyu.”

N Yesu a fwa chimi̱n kaang baltaku ko, “A ne ni wu ka bi di̱fi̱tan luke wufwiye ka tali̱n luke wuka̱re we. Ka fwe yiko, kuli̱n di̱fwinu a kaiyan, di̱fi̱tan luke wufwiyenu ti̱n a ne bikadu n ti kuli̱n di̱ka̱ri̱nu.
We da ni̱bu Yafudame, a dakabu ni̱bu ka kur mwe yinabi wufwiye we swe wuka̱re, di̱ne ka a fwe yiko, swe wuka̱re ka fwedu yo mwe yinabiye ka fwide, mwe yinabiye ka yudu a ti̱m.
A dakan ni̱bu ka kur mwe yinabiye wufwiye a swe wufwiye.
A ne ni ka kedu ka no mwe yinabi wufwiye we, a kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a no wu ka̱rengu, aya ni̱bu ki̱yidu ko, wuka̱re a la chi ki̱ni li̱mangu.”
Wuka difi̱kare n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱sudu we kuni alkamayu. Miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱kiya ti̱changri alkamaitu ki̱muddu ki̱ni fa̱li chiyu ki̱ku ki̱nutiyu.
Bi̱kamu we ni̱bu Farisamu a bi̱u chi ko, “A mayire ti̱ma chitu a dakabu ta madu we difi̱kare?”
Yesu a ni di̱ki̱li̱n ko, “Kano ta kibu chitu n Dauda a maata, we ki̱dangu n ki̱n a nwe chun n ti ni̱bu ki̱mangu.
N Dauda a le mure Kan Kwamanu, a da̱u ki̱danne wu a ya doku wauwade, wu a da kana fanseti ka chade, a chau, a niti̱ bi̱bu n ki̱n waremu.”
Yinu n ki̱n a chakakku, a yi ko, “Bwe Nii nang Tewuduwe difi̱kare.”
Wuka difi̱kare n ki̱n a le kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudamu yungku. We fiko, wuka nii we, wu fa̱la̱ng ki̱yilangu a ngi̱rmane.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musati̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu bi̱bu a no ki̱bau chi wu n chi ka ta̱n Yesuwe, a fwal nui ki̱da̱ng ki̱nu, ko ka kano n ki̱n we be ni wu difi̱kare.
Kangu n Yesu a yim ni̱tu chitangu, a yi nii wu fa̱la̱ng a ngi̱rmane ko, “Kun, be ti a kakku.” N ki̱n, a kun, a ti ti̱n.
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n bi̱u chi̱nu, Yilang chirengu a fwa ko wule we difi̱kare: Ni ma ti̱yilita, ka ni ma ti̱ta lebiya? Ni yu ti̱kuriya, ka ni chi̱u ti̱kuriya?”
N ki̱n a da̱ng ka nang wuwule niye, yinu a yi nii wu ko, “Tare fa̱la̱ngu.”
Nii wu a tar ti̱n, fa̱la̱ng kangu a be ti̱n.
Ni̱bu yungki̱mu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu ni̱tu chitu a kayan. N chi a mwe ki̱twaiyadu we yichiyu, yinang ka, ka madu ki̱ni Yesuwangu.
We diti yikiyu, n Yesu a fi̱l di̱kan kun ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni. N ki̱n a di kum ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni a di̱Kwama.
Yo ti̱ma kwiyane, a yal miyari̱m ki̱mu, a swabbi kub chiri buramu, ko fandubu.
Ni̱bu bi̱bi kub chiri burabi̱mu n Simun, wu n Yesu a yo ki̱mi̱n di̱nu ko, m Biti̱r n ti ke ko Andi̱riya n ti Yakubu n ti Yowana n ti Filibu n ti Bartolomi.
N ti Matta n ti Toma n ti Yakubu bwe Alfiyus n ti Simun wu a yal ko Salote n ti.
Yafuda bwe Yakube n ti Yafuda Yiskariyoti, wu a feku Yesuwe.

N Yesu a suwe n ti fandubu, a ti̱ya tanti̱lange wu a tile kune. Ni̱bu n ti Miyari̱m ki̱mu nabwen we fiko a ya beku, bi̱ba be a Yafudiya n ti Wurchalimamu n ti bi̱bu a be, a ki̱swatti la wuduwe, wu a ti̱m Taya n ti Sidone.
Bi̱kamu a be ka nwe chi ki̱miyaditu, yinu bi̱kamu ko ke chi ya beku we buri̱n chitu. Bi̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu a yati̱ beku.
Ni̱bu we fikomi kwang ki̱funti̱bwi Ka twai Yesu, di̱ne dukan beki̱nu ki̱chiredu a di̱ki̱ne, ki̱be chidi kwang.
Kangu n Yesu a da̱ng miyari̱m ki̱mangu, a yi ko,
N ti̱n bi̱bu ta kwala chimu
n Kwama ka yo chi̱mi̱n delaku,
Di̱ne ta chau mati̱n
bwaditu we bwa kake.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m n ti̱n bi̱bu ti̱nwe chuni̱mu,
fur chi̱nu ka ridu we bwa kake.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m n ti̱n bi̱bu ti̱kira wiinimu,
ta nura chi we bwa kake.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m yo ni̱bu ki̱ko chi̱nu,
ki̱chaku chi̱nu we tibe chi,
ki̱mi̱ku chi̱nu,
ki̱ko chi̱nu ko n ti̱n bi̱bwilam
di̱ne ta buntu Bwe Nii.
“Ti̱ma furi mwen kasi no ti̱chitu wu a fwe fere. Ti̱ma furi mwen. Ki̱ti̱me chi̱n wuduwe we bwa diiye. N fwa bi̱bu di̱ne tukebu chimu a ma fa̱kubu Kwamamu mi̱ne yiko.”
Yinu ka kau chi ki̱bune
we bi̱bu ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱r
nabwen ki̱ka̱ngi̱mu,
di̱ne a ne kaang ta̱ma̱ng
we bwa kake.
A no chi̱n, n ti̱n bi̱bu
ti̱chadu ti̱kur ti̱nu a ti̱mi̱mu,
we bwa kake ta chau chun.
A no chi̱n n ti̱n bi̱bu
ti̱nura ka chi ki̱ka̱ngi̱mu,
we bwa kake ta wu be wure.
“A no chi̱n, n ti̱n bi̱bu ni̱bu kwang ki̱wer chini̱mu. Tukebu feredimu a ma fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu mi̱ne yiko.”
Aya, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, n ti̱n bi̱bu ti̱nweyimu: Ti̱mi̱la fakwarbu chimu, ti̱ma fakwarbu chimu mi̱n chi a dakani,
Ti̱yo ni̱bu ki̱ma chimi̱n yii mu mi̱n delaku. Bi̱bu n chi ki̱nwe riye mu, twa̱ba̱ chimi̱n buni.
Ka nii a ngan we di̱dane, sabi̱r ki̱mi̱n di̱kanu di̱dan a ngan ti̱n, ka wukane nii a yiti̱n luke wuduwenge, chaku wuti̱re nii ti̱n.
Niwu a be ka̱li̱ne, da̱ngdu we. Wu a kaar mi̱n kuli̱ne, yiti̱duwe.
Nang ma ni̱bu mi̱n chi mun baddu n chi kani̱n mami̱nde.
Ka ti̱mi̱la ka bi̱bu a mi̱la chi̱ni̱me, wer ki̱ku ka bedu a file? Di̱ne bi̱bu a yili̱n Musati̱mu ki̱mi̱lati̱ bi̱bu a mi̱la chimu.
Ka ti̱ma ka bi̱bu ki̱ma chimi̱n chi a lelete mi̱n chi ti̱yilite, ta ya werki̱ku a file? Di̱ne kasi no n nang ni̱bu ki̱letimu ki̱mati̱ni yiko.
Ka ti̱ni di̱si̱nu a ka ni̱bu ka medu ka fe chi̱ni̱me, ta ya werki̱ku a file? Kasi no nang ni̱bu ki̱letimu, ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱letimu di̱si̱nu ko ke a fe chi yinang ka a dakanang.

Aya ti̱n, ti̱ke ni̱bu ki̱ko chini̱mu, ti̱ma chimi̱n chi ti̱yili, ti̱ni chi di̱si̱nu, n ke di̱ne a mwintuwe ka fe chi̱nu. Yinu fal ki̱ti̱me ka kadu nabwen, ti̱nti̱ne, ni kau bwesi̱m Kwama wuduwe a la chiye. Di̱ne n ki̱n naba li̱me we bi̱bu a ne di̱wan wemu n ti bi̱bwilamu.
Ti̱kau ni̱bu ki̱bunem, tiyangu n Te chire naba ki̱bunengu.

Ti̱yodu ka nang wuwule niye mi̱nu ki̱lewe, a ne nii ka yo chimi̱nti̱ ki̱lewe ti̱nti̱n. Ti̱kaiyu di̱n ni̱nu we, ke ni̱bu a kai ti̱nu di̱chi̱nu we. Ti̱du ni̱bu mi̱n ki̱leti chiyu, ke ni̱bu a du chimi̱n yichiyu.

“Ti̱ma ni̱bu mi̱n li̱mangu, ta yati̱ li̱mangu yinang ka a dakanang. N Kwama ka ni̱n chitu nabwen, ka n ki̱n a ku mun ni ni̱bu chite. A tiwe nii ki̱feku chiye, wu ki̱mi̱ksu chitu mi̱kse we kwa̱se sweke ko ke a rii, a twaka ti̱ni bubu yo kano ki̱ni wu ki̱ta̱ne.”
N Yesu a ki̱la fwa chimi̱nti̱ kaang baltaku ko, “Kano ki̱du we medu ka twa̱ku keko ki̱duwa? Ka fwe yiko, n chii kwang, a ne fi̱tadu a kenga?
Miyare a labu naba yungke, aya wu a ya miyake, kanodu yinang wu a yung ki̱ne.”
“A mayire, mun da̱ng ka be di̱fi̱li̱ne a nu ke mo, mun tabu ti̱nu ki̱ni ki̱twakulangu we nu monge?

Mwang medi yire mwang yi kemo mwiko, kemi, be ki̱ni di̱fi̱li̱nu n chaku mi̱ne, yo m mun mwang kubu ki̱twakulangu we nu monge? M mun naba di̱bebeline! Chaku ki̱twakulangu we numo didiin, ke n ya da mwan ku be di̱fi̱li̱ne a nu ke mo, n chaku ki̱mi̱n.”
“Tiyang ki̱yilangu, a ne tu ti̱kulan ti̱tu a lebii. Ti̱nti̱ne, tiyang ki̱ku a lebangu a ne tu ti̱kulan ti̱tu a lelei.
Ni yim tiyangu a ki̱duum ti̱kulani̱mu n ki̱n a tumu. Di̱lukene kwa̱da a ne tu ti̱kulan siniyitu, ti̱nti̱ne, rwabichai a ne tu Yinabi.
Nii wu yile ki̱fwa ti̱yili ti̱tu n ki̱n a yo we ni̱ritu, ti̱nti̱ne, nii wu bwila ki̱fwa ka ti̱bwilaitu n ki̱n a yo we ni̱ritu. Yii ki̱chake chi a ni̱ritu.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱yaliyu ti ‘Tewuduwe,’ yinu n ti̱n ta mabu chi ma yi chi̱nite?
Kanang wuwule niye, wu ka nwe ya̱m mi̱mu, ka ma nanga ki̱ne, kanodi ying:
Yinang nii wu ki̱mu lo, wu a ru tamme ko a kwam we mure ti̱me, yo mwe la a bulmawe ti̱me, a mi̱ku lo, a yabu dawe di̱ne lo a ti, a ya tamme wu yile.
Aya wu a nwe ya̱m mi̱mu yinu a kur ti̱na bwa, a lakanbu n ti nii wu a ru lo, a ne tamme we. Ki̱dangu mwe ka bulmawe ti̱mangu, lo ka yari kuum! Ka wuredu a ne dutu chi we.”
Ki̱dangu n Yesu a ri miyaku ti̱ti kwang we ki̱teli ni̱biyangu, a yikati̱ Kafanawu.
Wuka ka̱be tikake ni̱bu ki̱rang Roma we bwako, a bubuwe, yaka bwadu. Tikake wu ki̱mi̱la bwe yinang.
Nii wu a nwe ya̱m Yesumu, a tum seli̱bu ni̱bu Yafudamu ko a yal ki̱mi̱ne Yesu, ke a be a be ki̱mi̱n bwe wu.
Seli̱bu a ya bwanu a di̱Yesu we, a ya da ki̱mi̱n ki̱ti̱m yinang ko, “Nii wu a dakan mwang makadu.
Di̱ne n ki̱n, ki̱mi̱la kuu ni̱bu Yafudam, a mu ni̱mi̱nti̱ kan muraki̱n.”
N Yesu a ke, a yikan ware ti chi. Ki̱dangu n Yesu a mwata lo tikakengu, naba ki̱range a tum bi̱kam fati̱bu ki̱m ko, a ya yi ko, “Tewuduwe, nwedu riye wu kuse we, mang lwebu wu mwang be lomiye.
Nang chi a yo ma yabu bwa a di̱mune di̱ne mang lwebu. Fwa kana ya̱m, ka̱bemi ka bedu.

M fwa bi̱bu di̱ne m mi̱n ti̱n, mi̱ma nangangu ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱kaki̱mu. M mi̱n ti̱n, ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ki̱ma nangangu ki̱ni ya̱m mi̱mi̱mu. Mi̱n yi wu mi a ya, mi̱n yi wu mi a be, n chi ki̱ma ti̱nu. Mi̱n yi ka̱biyu a di̱mi̱neyu mi a ma ying, n chi ki̱ma ti̱nu.”
Kangi̱n Yesu a nwengu, a ya̱r ki̱n yi. N ki̱n a sabran, a yi ni̱ba kuteng kangi̱mu ko, “N fwa chimi̱n, ma yabu wuka we Yisrela ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mangi ying.”
Ni̱bu nii wu a tumemu, a ki̱la lo, aya ka̱be tikake a be we burang kangu.
Bafi̱nenangeko, n Yesu a yika di̱kan bi̱n di̱du ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Nayin. Miyari̱m ki̱mu n ti ni̱bu nabwen a bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱n.
Kangu n chi a lam kwa̱r bi̱nangu, ni̱bu ki̱chiredu ki̱ni wuka kwa̱me yaka furu. Nii wu a bwange, n ki̱kun we a nabune. Ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a chire a bi̱ni̱mu, we ware n ti ne naba niye.
Yo Tewuduwe a ku naye we, a nwe ki̱bune ko, a yi ki̱n ko, “kiidu wii we.”
Yinu n ki̱n, a ya twai kwa̱mbi̱re kwa̱me a da mi̱ne, ni̱bu a da̱a̱ kwa̱memu a ti ti̱n. Yinu n Yesu a yi ko, “Bwebwe, mi̱n ya̱nu, kun!”
Bwe a bwange, a kun, a sweswe, yinu a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu. N Yesu a tab a ni neki̱n.
Ni̱bu kwang a ri ki̱ni tayi Kwamayu, n kawure ki̱ri̱ka Kwama ko, “Wuka fa̱ku wuduwe a be nimi̱ne.”
N chi ki̱yidu ko, “Kwama a be ka maka chidu.”
Bi̱bu ya̱m Yesum a ti̱ran we ti̱m ni̱bu Yafudiyamu n ti ti̱ntiya kwaka wareyi kwang.
Miyari̱m Yowana naba batismamu a fwa ki̱mi̱n nangi̱ntu n Yesu ki̱maditu. Yinu Yowana a yal miyari̱mi burau,
a tum chi a di̱Tewuduwe, ko a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mu nang nii wu n Kwama ka tumeda? Kanang yo nu a wukane niya?”
Yo ni̱bu bi̱bu a lam bwa di̱Yesu we, a yi Yesu ko, “N Yowana naba Batisma a tum ni̱ne ko ni̱n bi̱n, m mun nang ni ki̱beda, ka wuka nii we wu ki̱beda?”
We ki̱daang kaangu, n Yesu a be ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu ki̱ni buri̱ni̱mu a chaki̱ti̱ ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu. Ki̱dubi̱bu nabwen nuyi chiyu a wuden ki̱ku di.

N Yesu a ki̱l ni̱bu Yowanamu ko, “Ti̱ki̱lan, yati̱ fwa Yowana mi̱n chi ta nwe n ti chi ta kuutu. Ki̱dubi̱bu ki̱ya kuku diyang, ki̱kubtiyu ki ya yayu, ni̱bu mwa̱limu a be, ti̱funitu ki̱nwe ya̱m, bi̱bwari̱mu a kabatuwe, ti̱lusanitu a ya ya̱m bi̱li̱m.
Kwama a yo delaku we ni̱bu bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱ mi̱nemu.”

A kuteng ki̱ku miyari̱m Yowanamu a yikanangu, n Yesu a mwe ki̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m we dur Yowananu ko, “Yo ta ya bwa a di̱Yowana we di̱si̱lachangi̱ne, a no ti̱badu ta ku wureni? Swa̱ku ki̱fi̱be ki̱mi̱danga?
Ka a newe yiko yati̱ da̱nge wureni? Nii wu a do kuli̱n ka̱mbi̱ri̱n di̱yili̱na? Ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱ni kuli̱n di̱yili̱ni̱mu n ti chi ka nwen ta̱ma̱nge a kwa̱tu mati̱mi a newe a di̱kir.
Yoye wuwule ki̱dum niim bi̱bu yata da̱nge a di̱kir. A no ti̱badu ta ku fa̱kuwa? Bi̱yili̱m ti̱ku wu a la fa̱kuwe.”
N Yowana nang wu n Kwama a fwa ya̱m a dur ki̱n ko,
Ti̱nwe, mi̱n tume
Naba di̱tumbi̱re a kakku mwan,
n ki̱n ka do chimi̱n
wa̱re ta yaande.
“Mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ni̱bu a tibu bi̱u nii wu a la Yowana naba batisma. Aya wuti̱re we Yaa Kwama a la Yowana naba batisma.”
Ni̱bu kwang, kono nang bi̱bu ki̱yiu sangkali̱mu, a nwe Yesu, a ke ko wa̱re Kwama a da. We yiko di̱ne n Yowana a ma chimi̱n batisma.
Aya ni̱bu Farisamu n ti naba yungku yili̱n Musanti̱mu a ko ti̱kuran Kwamatu we dur chi̱nu. Di̱ne n Yowana a ma chi mi̱nbu batisma.
N Yesu a chakakku, a yi ko, “Kano mang swe ni̱bu a ki̱swi wumi yire? N chi a chirkan n ti wule?”
N chi yinang bwesi̱mu a swe a kwa̱mma̱r, bi̱bu ki̱yitta ya̱m a bwiti chi ko,
Ni̱n ngau chimi̱n ki̱kunti,
ta yibbu;
ni̱n kau chimi̱n tee bwa,
ta kiibu wii.
“N Yowana naba Batisma a be, n ki̱n a chabu chabti̱tu, a norabu chi, di̱ne yiko, ‘Tiko ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti.’
Aya yo m mi̱n Bwe Nii mang be, n chau chabti̱tu n noti̱n, di̱ne yiko ti̱yi mi̱n tiko, mi̱n chau chitu nabwen naba ti̱norane. Fate ni̱bu sangkali̱me n ti ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m.
Aya ni̱bu ki̱swedu we yingku Kwamamu ki̱yungdu a le.”
Wuka naba Farisa a yal Yesu, ko a be chau chabtu a loko, n Yesu a ya swe ti̱n, ka chau chabti̱tu.
We bi̱n di̱du, wuka naye we wu a no ma da ti̱kuliye, kanga nwe ko n Yesu ki̱chau chabtu we lon naba farisangu, a ta̱ne be lure ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng ki̱ku a ma kwa̱ti̱rang.

A be, a ti a kuteng Yesuwang, a kwatuwe nani kiyu, ki̱ki wii. Ti̱mweni kitu a mwe ki̱yaradu we nani Yesuyu. Naye wu a musu Yesu mi̱n ti̱mwenitu ki̱ni rii kitu, a wa ti̱ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu, ki̱yubadu we nang Yesuwangu.
Yinang kangu naba Farisa a kuwangu, a kuran ko nii wu, ka no fa̱ku Kwama wuyile, a no yim ki̱dum nayemu ki̱twai ki̱ni̱mu.
N Yesu a yi naba Farisa ko, “Simun, mi̱n baddu mang ya̱n ya̱m.”
Wuko a ke ko, “Naba yungke, fwawe.”
N Yesu a mwe ya̱mu ko, “Wuka nabani we, ki̱bunti̱ ni̱bi burau ka̱mbi̱r.
N ki̱n a du chimi̱n di̱chi̱nu, yinu we da̱ngki̱ mwangu, wure nang nii wu ka kenu yinange?”
Simun a ke ko, “Nang wu di̱chin ki̱nu nabwene.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “N fwaa deer.”
A da̱ng na wu, a yi Simun ko, “Mwang ku nawa? N lewe lomu, mwang niibu mwe mang nuri̱n naniye, aya na wu a nur naniyu ki̱ni ti̱mwenitu a musu ti̱n ki̱ni rii dur ki̱nitu.
Mwang kwaribu, yinangu mang lewe lomongu, aya yinangu mang lemi̱ne longu, na wu a dubu kwarku mangu.
Mwang wamibu ki̱nung we durmi̱nu, aya naye wu a wami ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng we nani miyu.
Mi̱n yi chi̱nu, n da̱u ki̱mi̱n ki̱leti kiyu nabwen niyu, n ki̱n a yung mi keki̱ku yinang yinu nii wu mang du ki̱mi̱n ki̱leti kiyu bayim me a milayi ti̱n bayim.”
Yinu Yesu a yi naye wu ko, “N dumi̱n ki̱leti mwiyu.”
“Ni̱bu n ki̱n ki̱chau chabtu waremu a mwe ki̱ti̱ksi̱du ko, n wure ki̱niko, wu ki̱du ni̱bu mi̱n ki̱letiye?”
N Yesu a yi naye wu ko, “Keku bi̱yili̱mang mwangu a yun, ya li̱mang.”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Yesu ki̱ya bi̱nti̱tu, ki̱yati̱ ti̱tiritu, ki̱ma di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱nu we Yaa Kwama. Miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burab a ya ware n ti ki̱n.
Ti̱nti̱ne bi̱kam nati̱bu a be we buri̱n chitu, a chaki̱ti̱ ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu. Nati̱m bi̱bu we kwa̱l di̱di̱mu nang Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala wa chaku ki̱mi̱n ki̱fi̱bti yidibine.
Yowena naye Kusa wu n Yiridu ki̱tun ki̱ne, wetuwe, n Susana we n ti nati̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a maka ki̱n ki̱ni kuli̱n chinu.
Ni̱bu nabwen ki̱bete bwa di̱Yesuwe ka beku we bi̱nti̱tu dangtidangti, yinu n Yesu a ni chi ki̱ku baltaku:
Ki̱n a yiko, wuka nii a yikan yaka fiye duum chaam a kuuko. Yo ki̱n a yaki̱ wadde, yikayu ki̱nuti a yar a wa̱re. Ni̱bu a faba duum bi̱ki̱mu, ki̱ni̱biyu a si̱ban we ti̱mu.
Yikayu ki̱nuti a yar a nani kwantim. Yo a kiye, a mwibu kuko di̱ne a ne ki̱ti̱mu we nabwen ka yo ki̱mi̱n lame, a kusu ti̱n.
Yikayu ki̱nuti a yar a tibe kwa̱da. Kwa̱da a dwiyen ware n ti duumu aya ki̱seliyu a kai chamu.
Yikayu ki̱nuti a yar a ti̱m bi̱yili̱m, a dwiyen, a le, ka nang wuwule susange, ki̱ni ki̱nutiyu kuul. A kuteng ki̱ku a ri baltakangu, a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Wu ki̱ni ki̱tele, ka nwe de, a nwe!”
Miyari̱mu a bi̱u Yesu ko a fwa chimi̱n chii baltaku ki̱yungde.

N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “N Kwama a ni chi̱n swaangku chi a yaako aya bi̱kamu ki̱nwe ka baltaku di̱ne n chi kono da̱ng a ne kudu, kasi no nwe a ne swaanu. Bi̱bu n ke miyari̱m mi̱mi̱mu, mi̱n fwa chimi̱ndi baltaku ke a swaan chi ki̱yungde, kasi ki̱ku n chi ki̱ku chitu mi̱n maditangu. Kasi ki̱ku n chi ki̱nwe ya̱m mi̱mangu a ne swaan chi ki̱yungditu.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Duum bi̱bu mang fwa chini̱mu, nang ya̱m Kwamamu.

Duum bi̱bu a yar a wa̱remu, a tiwe ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu aya n Setan a nibu chi da ka ma ti̱kurantu we ya̱m Kwamamu ko ke chi swaan. N Setan ki̱madi ying ko ke n chi a swaanu ya̱m Kwamamu ka yo chidu ka swidi̱mu we.

Yinu duum bi̱bu a yar, a ti̱m kwanti̱mu, a tiwe ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu, a yiu fa̱li yurau, a baki̱swi bayim, aya keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu a tibu kwir, aya yo riye a be chimi̱ne, a ki̱lan ti̱ni kuteng.
Duum bi̱bu a yar, a kwa̱da ki̱selimu, a tiwe ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu aya riye n ti baku kuli n ti nwe ta̱ma̱ng ti̱ti̱niye a yo, n chi a rubbu we ya̱m Kwamamu.

Aya duum bi̱bu a yar, a ki̱ti̱m bi̱yili̱mu, a tiwe ni̱bu, a nwe ya̱m Kwamamu a tau yinang, ki̱ma kwa̱mbi̱ri ki̱n we ni̱tu chiiti̱mu. Di̱ne bwanu chi, n chi a tau ya̱m Kwamame, chi ti̱yili ki̱ chiredu we ni̱tu chitu.”
“A ne nii ka mwa fiti̱la ka sunti̱ chi, ka ka di̱ki̱du a bwang kwa̱mbi̱range. Ka la chi, ka yo fiti̱la a ti̱du di̱ne ke ka n wure ka lewede, ka ku yiki̱ku.
Ka nan ti̱ti̱le chi ti̱lairiye, ka kwa̱la̱du we bwa kake yinu a ne chi mwang madu a ne chire tametuwe, aya ya̱m mi̱mu ni̱bu a swaanbi̱mu beka swaan ti̱nu we bwa kake.

A dakan mwang sii ki̱tele yinang kangu mwang swaani̱ndangu. N Kwama ka suu wu a tum yile, a swaanti̱ chi we yaako mi̱n swaanki̱ku aya wu a newe ki̱ni swaanku ki̱yilange, n ki̱n ka kwala swaan ki̱ku n ki̱ni ki̱nangu.”
N ne Yesuwe n ti kebu Yesumu a ya bwa di̱Yesuwe, aya n chi a lebuwe bwa di̱ki̱ne di̱ne ni̱bu a ma nabwen.
Wuka nii a yi Yesu ko, “N ne mun n ti kebu mumu a ti, a fi̱lang, ki̱baddu ka ku numo.”
N Yesu a yi ni̱bu a fikomu ko, “Ni̱bu ki̱nwe ya̱m Kwamamu, ki̱tunti̱numu, nang nemi n ti kebu mi̱mu.”
Wuka ki̱di n Yesu a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Chi yabu wuka bale we far di̱dunu.”
N chi a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a yabu far di̱dunu a Ka̱lilinu.
