M Kwabna Bi̱latu a yi wuduwe fansetiye n ti ni̱bu ko, “Ma yabu nii wu ki̱ni wuka ki̱le.”
Aya ni̱bu a mwe ki̱fungka ki̱nu ko, “N Ki̱n a tau ki̱miyadu ki̱yo bi̱ngaiyu kasi no bwa̱le we ti̱m Yafudimu. A mwe a Ka̱lili, nau a lam ti̱n Wurchalima.”
Yo n Bi̱latu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a bi̱u ko, “Nii wu naba Ka̱lili ya?”
Yinang ka nwe ko Yesu a le mati̱n Yiridusangu, a tung ki̱n a di̱Yiridu wu we Wurchalima.
Yo m Mai Yiridu a ku Yesuwe, a nwe ta̱ma̱ng di̱ne a da yurau n ki̱n ki̱baddu ka ku Yesu di̱ne ya̱mu a nwe a dur ki̱ni̱mu. N ki̱n a yo ni̱ru ka ku chi ka̱ta̱ki.
N Yiridu a ma ki̱mi̱n ti̱bi̱di̱ritu nabwen, aya Yesu a ni ki̱nbu di̱ki̱li̱n yiin.
Tikake fansetiye n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱ni̱mu a be kakku Yiridusangu, a fuku ki̱fwara chi n Yesu ki̱madu a lebitu.
Mai Yiridu n ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a fiita ki̱n, a swa̱ba ki̱n, n chi a do ki̱mi̱n kuli̱n mati̱n a ki̱latuwe ki̱n we di̱ kwabna Bi̱latu.
We diko n Yiridu n ti Bi̱latu a kau fati̱bu kasi ki̱ku n chi a no fakwarbu ferediyangu.
Bi̱latu a yale tikaketi fansetiyu n ti mati̱mu n ti ni̱bu.
A yi chi ko, ti̱be miye ki̱ni nii wu tiko ki̱yo yaram we ni̱be, aya ki̱ka̱ngu n ma ki̱mi̱n di̱bi̱du we kakku changu, man yabu nii wu ki̱ni ki̱letiyu ta yi tiko a dur ki̱niyu.
N Yiridu a ya ti̱bu ki̱le. Nang chi a yo, a ki̱l te nii wu we a di̱chine. A ne chitu nabani wu a matuwe, wu a lwe bwange.
Di̱ne yiko, mang twal ki̱nu, mang mar ti̱nu.
[N chi a yo ki̱n a chaku chimi̱n nii wiin.]
N chi ki̱ni kwang a yibi kemi ko, “Ti̱chi̱u nii wu ti̱mar nimi̱ne Barabas!”
Barabas wu n chi ki̱fwade nang wu a le di̱binti̱l a kuku di̱kulan we bi̱nu a chi̱u nii wiin.
Yade m Bi̱latu a no ki̱baddu ka chaku Yesu we a fwa chimi̱nti̱ ya̱mu ki̱da.
Aya n chi a chakakku ki̱ni kemiyu ko, “Ti̱kukan, ti̱kukan!”
Bi̱latu a ki̱lan ki̱tarang ko, “A mayire? Naba ni wu a ma wuwule ki̱le? Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ma yabu ni wu ki̱ni ki̱le a lam chike. Ma yodu ni̱bu ka twala ki̱nu, ka mayi ti̱du.”
N chi ki̱su kemiyu ko, “Ti̱kukan, ti̱kukan.” Kemiyu a lala.
A kuteng ki̱ku, m Bi̱latu a ki̱nta chi ka ma chi, n chi ki̱badde,
Aya Bi̱latu a kwi chimi̱n nii wu a no a di̱bi̱nti̱le di̱ne ri̱ki̱ne ko n ti kakku durangu n ki̱n a chi̱bi̱nu, yina ni chi Yesu.
Yo ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a yikani ki̱ni Yesuwe, n chi a tau wuka ni we ware di̱n ki̱nu n Simun naba Sairine, a ni ki̱tiyang bwangu ko a da̱u, a nang nabu Yesu.
Muraku ni̱bangu nabwen a bun chimi̱nti̱n ware n ti nati̱bu ki̱bwe wii bwa ki̱ki wiimu.
Aya Yesu a sabran a yi chi, ko, “Nati̱m Wurchalima, ti̱kidu wii we di̱ne mi̱n aya ti̱ki di̱ne dutu chi̱n n ti Bwesi̱m chimu.
Wuka di ni̱bu ka yidu ko, ‘Nati̱bu a ne bwesi̱m wemu a ma ki̱ti̱me.’
Yinu n chi ka yi kunitu ko,
‘Da ni̱mi̱ntuwe,
yinge ni̱n.’
“Ka ni̱bu ka ma ti̱chitu yo tini a kusube, ka kadi yire yo ka kusude?”
Bi̱kam Ni̱bu bi̱bwilami burau a yati̱ kukaku ware n ti Yesu.
Yo n chi a lam fi ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko kasire, n chi a kuka ki̱n a fiko n ti ni̱bu bi̱bwilam, wuka a kang ki̱yilang, wuka a kangtakwelang.
Yinu Yesu a yi ko, Tete, du chimi̱n di̱ne n chi a yimbu chi ki̱maditu.
Yinu n chi a ma kuriya we a luke.
Ni̱bu a ti ki̱da̱ndi̱mu n ti tikaketi mati̱mu ki̱fi ki̱nu, ki̱yidu ko, “A yu bi̱kamu, a mayire a ne yu yikiye ka nang Masiya wu suture wu Kwama.”
Ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a ma ki̱mi̱n di̱fiir ti̱n. N chi a ni ki̱n chi bwangbwange, ko a no.
Ki̱yidu ko, “Ka mun nang Mai ni̱bu Yafudame, yu dur munu!”
We dii a di̱ki̱ne a mwal ya̱mu ko, “WU NANG Mai NI̱BU YAFUDAME.”
Wuka we ni̱bu bi̱bwilamu ki̱ swa̱ba ki̱nu kiyi ti̱n ki̱nu ko, “Mun m Masiya? N yu dur munu n ti ni̱n.”
Wukane a wela keko ko, “Mwang nwebu tai Kwama ya? Mare m mun a fi wiine n ti ki̱n.
Chi ni̱bu ki̱ma nimi̱de ki̱ma ni̱mi̱n chi a dakane, di̱ne chi niyang maatu aya n ki̱n a mabu ti̱kan chi ti̱tu a lebi.”
Yinu a yi ko, “Yesu kurti̱ mi̱n we yaamo.”
Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Mi̱n fwa mi̱nu diwu mang swedu ti mun we Yaa Kwama.”
A bwana tibe kuko, ki̱liye a sum ti̱mu, a lanti̱ yo di a kau yinang ki̱swi yitta.
Dii a du yiiku ti̱mangu. Labule a swe fi wauwade we Kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu a ngi̱ran ti̱nti yurau.
Yinu Yesu a kuki̱ keru dukan a yal ko, “Te! Mi̱n ni ti̱kuri mitu a di̱mune.” Nanga fwa bi̱bangu, a mar duri kwa̱klak a bwa.
Tikake naba ki̱range wu we fiko ki̱dangu chitu a fwenge, a dela Kwama ko, “Bi̱yili̱m ni wu a ne ki̱lewe!”
Ni̱bu no a tirana fikomu kangu a ku chitu a fwetangu, n kawure ki̱ngau kwiye ki̱yikati̱nu di̱ne kaiyan ni̱re.
Aya ni̱bu ki̱ni kwang bi̱bu a yim Yesumu n ti nati̱bu a bunga ware we Ka̱lilimu a tiye kutan ki̱da̱ng ti̱chitu wu.
Wuka nabani we di̱n ki̱nu n Yusufu Arimatiya, ki̱n we bi̱duum bi̱bu a ni̱bu Yafudamu, n ki̱n nii wu yile, ki̱tum bi̱yili̱m.
N ki̱n a kebu ki̱ni mwataku ya̱ma̱ngu n ti chi ni̱bu a maatu, n ki̱n a be a bi̱n Yafudan wu a Arimatiya, n ki̱n a ti a yam Yaa Kwama.
N ki̱n a ya bwanu a di̱kwabna Bi̱latu, a bi̱u kwa̱me Yesu ko ka furu.
N ki̱n a si̱ke kwa̱me, a bwa̱bani ki̱ni ti̱lukteni ti̱ti mwemwen, a di̱ku a wure kwa̱me wu ni̱bu a swa̱uswa̱be. Ni̱bu a furi̱nbu ni we fiko.
Diko di sabwi ni̱bu Yafudam, ni̱bu ki̱do bwi di̱ne Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam a mwatan ka mwedu.
Nati̱bu bi̱bu a bungan n ti Yesu a Ka̱lilimu a nabu Yusufu, a ya kuwe furu n ti kangu a ti̱n bwiyangu.
Yinu n chi a ki̱la lo, a da̱u ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu n ti ki̱warangu. Aya n chi a fi̱kan difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam ke chi bunti̱ yili̱ntu.
We a di wu kake wu a difi̱kare, ki̱ni kunsiin, nati̱bu a yika furu ki̱ni ki̱nungi fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng.
N chi a ya kale a bi̱len we furu.
Aya yo n chi a le mure, a kubu kwa̱me Tewuduwe Yesu we furu.
Yo n chi we ki̱kura ti̱te, Bi̱nabi̱na bi̱kam ni̱bi burau a tiye ki̱dwang ti chi, a do lukeyi mwemwei ki̱yiladu yinang kali yili.
Di̱ne taya tau chiye, nati̱bu a swa kabi̱ni chiyu a ti̱m. Aya ni̱bu bi̱bu a yi chi ko, “A mayire ti̱baba wu kure a bi̱bwari̱me?”
N ki̱n a newe fi, a kun! Ti̱kur chitu a fwa chimi̱nitu we ki̱dangu n ti̱n no ware a Ka̱lili yangu ko.
“Ni̱bu ka ni Bwe Nii a kani ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m, ka kuka ki̱nu aya we wu tare di ka kunu.”
Yinu n chi a kuri ki̱ni ya̱m Yesumu.
Yo n chi a ki̱la we bwana fure, n chi a fwa bi̱bi kub chiri wiini̱mu mi̱n n ti bi̱kami kwang.
Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala n ti Yowena n ti Maryamu ne Yakubu n ti bi̱kamu nati̱bu n ti chi bi̱bu a fwa fanduti mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bumu.
Aya n chi a kebu ki̱ni ya̱m nati̱bi̱mu. Di̱ne ya̱m chimu ki̱madu yinang ti̱kwani.
M Biti̱r a tababu bwi, a kun, a wul, a yika bwa fure. Yinu yo n ki̱n a lam kwa̱r furune, a sung, a da̱ng, a ku kana luke kwa̱me. Yinu a ki̱lawe, chitu a fwetu a ya̱r ki̱n yi.
We ka di wu wiine, burau we miyari̱m Yesumu ki̱ya wuka be bi̱ne ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Yimi̱wasu. Yimi̱wasu a lam Siriyu kub chiri wiin we Wurchalima.
N chi ki̱fwadu we yichiyu kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ti̱tu a fwetu.
Kangu n chi a chakakku ki̱ni twayakangu, n Yesu a fwadi chi mi̱ntuwe, ki̱bungadu ware n ti chi.
Aya n chi a swaanbu ki̱n di̱ne n Kwama kwa̱l chi mi̱nbu.
A bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱twaya wureni we a yayu chi̱n ti̱yade wu.”
N chi ki̱ni burako a ti we fiko yi ki̱ni kaiyan ni̱re.
Wiin we mure chi, wu di̱n ki̱nun Kiliyobase, a bi̱u ko “N mun nang rungko a Wurchalima wu mwang yimbu chitu a fwe we diti yitta?”
Yinu a yi chi, “Wule fwe.”
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Chi a fwe n ti Yesu Banasa̱rete. N ki̱n fa̱ku wu ki̱ni dukan we nangaritu n ti ya̱mu we kakki̱ Kwamangu n ti ni̱bu ki̱ni kwang.”
Wu tikaketi fanseti n ti mati̱mu a ni ki̱n ko ni̱bu a chi̱u, ni̱bu a kukan a ki̱tiyang bwang.
Ni yo ni̱ru ko ki̱n nang nii wu ka yu Yisrela! Aya ki̱ka̱ngu a lam ditiyi yitta kangu ti̱chitu wu a fwe mi̱nangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku bi̱kamu nati̱bu a ya̱r ni̱n yii, n chi a ya furu ki̱ni kunsiin wu.
Aya n chi a yabu bwikiyu, Yo n chi a ki̱lawe, a be yi ni̱n ko, chi ku Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama wu a yi chi ko n we ki̱ni ti̱kuriye.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu ni̱m we tibe ni̱n a ya bwa fure, a ya a lakanbu n ti ya̱mu nati̱bu a fwa chimi̱ni̱mu aya n chi a kuwebu ki̱n.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “A mayire ta kasabu kassane, ta ki̱tan we keku bi̱yili̱mang change we chitu fa̱kubu Kwamama fwaatu.
Tayimbu tiko a mwintuwe m Masiya ka nwe riye, yinu ka le dwiyen kita?”
Yinu n Yesu a fwa chimi̱n chitu ki̱ni kwang ti̱tu a mwal a dur ki̱nitu we taki̱da Kwama, a mwetuwe yilang Musangu a lanti̱ tati̱ki̱dai fa̱kubu Kwamamu kwang.
Yo n chi a mwatawe be bi̱ne wu n chi ki̱yade, n Yesu a ma yinangu ka sudang.
Aya n chi a wana ki̱n ki̱ni dukan ko, “Swe ti ni̱n, a ya me a lam, dii a mwatan ka ledu.” Yinu n ki̱n a ya swe ware ti chi.
Yo n chi a yaki̱ chau chabte, yinu a da̱u ki̱danniyu, a wana Kwama, a wulan a nika chi.
Bi̱nabi̱na nui chiyu a wuden, n chi a swaan ti̱n ko n Yesu. N chi a bau ki̱ni si̱ng.
N chi ki̱bi̱be yichiyu ko, “Ni̱tu chi̱retu a li̱mbu we wa̱re ki̱dangu n ki̱n yaki̱ fwa ni mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamma?”
N chi a du fiko a ki̱la Wurchalima, a ya bi̱bi kub chiri wiini̱mu, a swe ware ti bi̱kam ni̱bu.
Ki̱yidu ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, Tewuduwe a kun! A fwe Simun Biti̱r mi̱ntuwe.”
Yinu n chi bi̱bi burabi̱mu a fwa chi a fwetu we wa̱re, n ti yinangu n chi a swaan Yesu a kuteng ki̱ku a kera ki̱danniyangu.
Ki̱daangu n chi a le ki̱fwa ya̱m bi̱bangu, n Yesu a fwetuwe tibe chi fwadu, a yi chi ko, “Li̱mang a be chimi̱ne.”
Taiyi a tau chi, bwiyu chiyu ki̱mi̱kadu, n chi ko kano chi ku butu.
A yi chi ko, “A mayire ta mi̱kane, a mayire ti̱ma ti̱kaman we dutu chinte?
Ti̱da̱ng fa̱li miyu n ti nani miyu, m mi̱n, m mi̱fwan. Ti̱twaiyi, ti̱da̱ng, buti̱tu a newe ki̱ni nam bwiye ka ti̱kute, yinangu ta kuiyangu.”
Yo n ki̱n a fwa bi̱be, a yung chi fa̱li kiyu n ti nani kiyu.
Kangu n chi a tibu kebi̱yili̱mu didinangu di̱ne nabwe furi mwemwenu n ti ya̱r yii chi a bi̱u chi ko, “N ti̱ni ki̱ni chabtu we fi ta chadda?”
N chi a ni ki̱n chi̱nge wukere.
N ki̱n a yiu, a wu, we kakku chiyangu.
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱tu nang chi mang fwa chimi̱n we ki̱dangu mi̱n no we ti chi̱nangu. Kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ti̱tu ni̱bu a mwal a dur mi̱n we yilang Musangu n ti fa̱kubi̱bu n ti Sa̱bura.”
Yinu n ki̱n a wudu chimi̱n ki̱kwa̱mi chiyu ke n chi a swaan ya̱m Kwamamu.
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱tu nang chi a mwale ko, ‘M Masiya ka nwe riye, we di wu tare, ka kunti̱nuwe furu.’
Yinu di̱mwar woki̱ ki̱ti̱mangu we ki̱leti ni̱biyu ka mwadu we dinkinu we kuuti kwang, ka mweti̱nu we Wurchalima.
N ti̱n ti̱ku ti̱chitu wu ki̱ni nui chi̱n.
Mi̱n yikadu yamang tum chimi̱ne chi n Temi a bwa̱bitu. Aya Ti̱swe we bi̱n di̱du ka lami̱nti̱ yo ta ya dukan Kwamane.”
Yo n ki̱n a ya ki̱ni chi a tanti̱lange Betani, a kuku fa̱liyu a yo chi mi̱n delaku.
Yo n ki̱n we ki̱yo chimi̱n dela ke, a da̱u ki̱n, a yikan di, a du chi.
Yinu n chi a si ki̱n a kun a ki̱la Wurchalima ki̱ni furi mwemwenu yinang.
N chi a da̱u ki̱swi we Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu ki̱ dela Kwama.
We tile bi̱rke, Di̱kwa̱l we. Di̱kwa̱l di̱du we ware n ti Kwama, Di̱kwa̱l di̱du n Kwama.
We tile bi̱rke, n ki̱n we ware n ti Kwama.
Kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye, a fwe a di̱ki̱ne. A ne chi a kau, n ki̱na yim be we.
Ti̱kuri we di̱ki̱ne, ti̱kuri ti̱tu a kau ni̱bu mi̱n yiiku
Yiiki̱ku ki̱yiidu we ki̱liye.
N Kwama tume wuka nii, di̱n ki̱nu n Yowana.
N ki̱n a be ka ma di̱mwaru we yiiku ki̱ku, ko ke ka wuwule niye, a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱kwa̱l di̱du.
N ki̱n n ke yiiki̱ku. N ki̱n a be ka ma ka di̱mwaru we yiiki̱ku.
Yiiku ki̱yilangu we, ki̱ku ki̱lewe ti̱ti̱ni kiyi ka wuwule niyengu.
N ki̱n we ti̱ti̱nitu, kasi ki̱ku n Kwama a yo ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni Di̱kwa̱l di̱dangu, ti̱ti̱nitu a yimbu ki̱n.
A be ti̱m ki̱mu, ni̱bu ki̱mu a ko, a yiubu ki̱n.
Aya ka nang bi̱bi̱le ni̱be, bi̱bu a yiu ki̱n, a ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱ki̱nemu, a ni chi dwiyen, a kau bwesi̱m Kwamamu.
Bi̱be wu robe n ke wu a nii n ti nii a mange, n ke wa ki̱ke bwiye, n ke wu kwarta a mange. N Kwama ki̱fwan a yung dukan ki̱nu.
Di̱kwa̱lu a swe n ti ni̱bu, ni ku dwiyen kitu, dwiyen ti̱tu a Bwe Kwama n ki̱kuni. A ri ki̱ni li̱me n ti bi̱yili̱mu.
N Yowana a fwa ya̱mu a dur ki̱n. A kuku keru a yi ko, “Wu nang wu mang fwa mi, ki̱bedu a kuteng mange, tikake miye. N ki̱n we feredi yo a tibu biiye.”
Di̱ne nabwe li̱me ko, n kawure a ya delaki̱ku a riburiye.
N Kwama a tume yilangu a kang Musa, aya li̱me n ti bi̱yili̱mu a be a di̱Yesu Masiya.
A ne ni a kuun Kwama we, ka ke Kwama n ti kana Bweko n ki̱kun. Wu a bale Te, n ki̱n a yo ni yim Kwama.
Bi̱duuma ni̱bu Yafudamu we Wurchalima, a tum Fanseti n ti Lawiyawa ko, a ya bi̱u chimi̱ne Yowana, n ki̱n n wure?
N Yowana a duti̱bu chi we, a fwa chi mi̱n bi̱yili̱mu ko, “M mi̱n n ke Masiya.”
N chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Yinu mu yal yimwiyu ko n wure? N Yiliya fa̱ku Kwama?”
N chi a yi ko, “Mun nang fa̱ku wu n Kwama a yi ko ka beda?”
A yi ko, “Ngango.”
N chi a yi ko, “Yinu yoye fal m mun, n wure? Ke ni̱n ya di̱ki̱li̱n yiinu, we ni̱bu a tum ni̱nemu. M mun, n wure?”
N Yowana a yi chi ko, “M mi̱n ker wuka nii a di̱kir, ker di̱du ki̱fwadu ko, ti̱tau wa̱re der, yinang kangu n Yichaya fa̱ku Tewuduwe a fwawengu.”
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu Farisa bi̱bu bi̱duum Yafudamu a tumemu,
a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Di̱ne wule mu ma batisma, ka mun n ke Masiya, n ke Yiliya, n keti̱ fa̱ku Kwama ki̱bede?”
N Yowana a yi chi ko, “M mi̱n fal mi̱n ma batisma ki̱ni mwe, a ya wuka nii we a tibe chi̱n, wu ta yim be,
n ki̱n nang ni ki̱bedu a kuteng mange, mang lwebu ma kwi ki̱mi̱n ki̱wame ko.”
Ti̱ti kwang a fwe a Betanya, a ki̱ti̱ku nabwe la wurdune, a bale twa̱re, fi Yowana ki̱mang batisma.
Bafi̱nenangeko, n Yowana a ku Yesu ki̱be bwa a di̱Ki̱ne. A yi ko, “Ti̱da̱ng be Kwane Kwama wu ki̱da̱u ki̱leti ti̱ti̱niye.
N ki̱n nang ni mang fwa mi, ka bedu a kuteng mange. N ki̱n Tikake mi, di̱ne n ki̱n we feredi, yo m mi̱n, ma ti̱bu kau niye.
Mang ying ki̱mbu didin, aya m be mi̱n ma batisma ki̱ni mwe ke Yisrela a ying ki̱n.”
Yinu n Yowana a fwa ko, “N ku Fi̱ki̱m Kwama, ki̱suwedu yinang ki̱kube, we di, a be a swe, a dur ki̱n ko.
‘No ma yimbu mi, n nangki̱n, aya n Kwama wa twiye, mi̱n ma batisma ki̱ni mwe,’ a fwami ko, wu mang ku Fi̱ki̱m, ka suwedu, ka swedu, a dur ki̱ne, nang wu ki̱ma batisma ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame.
Yo mang kuwe fal, yinu m ma di̱mwaru mi, wu nang Bwe Kwama.”
Bafi̱nenangeko, aya n Yowana a ti n ti miyari̱m ki̱mi burabi̱mu.
Yinang ka n ki̱n, a ku Yesu ki̱sudangu, a yi chi ko, “Ti̱da̱ng be Kwane Kwama.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mi burabi̱mu a nabti̱ Yesu, ki̱dangu n Yowana a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bangu.
N Yesu a da̱ng kutengu a ku n chi ki̱ nabi̱ ki̱nedu, a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱bau wule?”
Bi̱ki̱mu a yi ko, “Tete” ka nang chikiye, naba yungke, “Mun sweda fi̱re?”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Ti̱be ti̱da̱ng.”
N chi a yikana da̱nge fi ki̱swende, a dite kuko we bwako n ti ki̱n. Ti̱ta fwe ki̱swi a fiya yaana wi me.
Andi̱riya ke Simun Biti̱r, we bi̱bi burabu a nwe ya̱m Yowanamu, yinu a bunti̱ Yesumu.
Andi̱riya a mwe a yawe ke ko n Simun, a yi ki̱n ko, “Ni̱n ya Masiya.”
Yinu Andi̱riya a be ki̱ni Simun a di̱Yesuwe.
N Yesu a da̱ng Simuni ri̱i̱ng, a yi ko, “Mun nang Simun bwele Yowana? Ka ni̱n yali̱nu ko, Kefas.” di̱nu ka di̱dini̱n n ti Biti̱r, ka nang chikiye kale.
Bafi̱nenangeko, n Yesu a kur ka ya ti̱m Ka̱lili, a ya Filibu a yi ki̱n ko, “Bumite.”
N Filibu, naba Betsaida, bi̱n Andi̱riya n ti Biti̱r.
N Filibu a ya Nataniyel a yi ki̱n ko, ni̱n ya nii wu m Musa a mwal ya̱m ki̱mu a tati̱ki̱daiyu ferediye, wu fa̱kubu Kwamam a mwal a dur ki̱ne.
N Yesu bwe Yusufu naba Nasa̱rete.
N Nataniyel a yi ki̱n ko, “Nasa̱ret a lwe fi chi ti̱yili ka chirmi̱nedea?”
N Filibu a yi ki̱n ko, “M be da̱nge.”
N Yesu a ku Nataniyel ki̱be bwa a di̱ki̱ne, a fwa ya̱m a dur ki̱n ko, “Ti̱da̱ng naba Yisrela siine, a newe ki̱ni setayii.”
N Nataniyel a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “N Swani a fi̱re?” N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ki̱dangu n Filibu a tibu yali̱nangu, yo no mwang swe a tile tiyang sinangu, n kuun.”
N Nataniyel a ke ko, “Tete, m mun Bwe Kwama, m mun Mai Yisrela.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Di̱ne mang ya̱n mi n kuun a durti̱n tiyang sinangu, mun ke bi̱yili̱ma? Ko a mwintuwe mwang ku chi a la ti̱te.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ki̱kumang, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu ta ku bwa diye a wuden, bi̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu ka ni̱n fi̱lu ki̱suwedu we dur Bwe Nii.”
We wu tare di, ti̱kali ki̱nai we Kana wa yaa Ka̱lili. Aya n ne Yesu we we fiko.
Ni̱bu a yal Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu ti̱n we ki̱na wu.
Yo mwe yinabi a riye, n ne Yesuwe a yi Yesu ko, “Mwe yinabi a ri.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Nene, mun yaliyu ko wule? Ki̱swi mi a lambu.”
N ne ki̱n a yi ni̱bu nanganmu ko, “Ti̱ma chi ka yi chi̱ne.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam ki̱ni da wa nurake, ti̱kan sebi we, ti̱ta swa̱ba kwantii, ki̱yiu subiti turukun.
N Yesu yi chi ko, “Ti̱ri sebi mwetu ki̱ni mwe.”
N chi a ri sebiti bel ki̱ni mwe.
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱dwe, ti̱ni fate wutabare ti̱kali ki̱naiye

Kangu fate wutabare ti̱kali ki̱naitu a twai mwegu, aya mwe a kau mwe yili̱me. N ki̱n a yimbu ki̱dangu ki̱chitu wa fwengu. Aya ni̱bu nanganmu a dwe mwemu a yim. Fate wutabare ti̱kali ki̱naiye a yale bwele ki̱yiu naye,
A yi ki̱n ko, “Ka wuwule niye ki̱mwedu, a mwe yili̱me wa li̱n li̱me didin, ka ni̱ba noo, a lwenge, yinu ka bedu ki̱ni bi̱bu a li̱mbi̱mu. Aya m mun, n lai mwe yili̱me wa li̱nli̱me, n be ki̱ni kuteng.”
N Yesu a mwe chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ki̱n a subbi bwa Kafanawu me. A ya n ti ne ki̱n n ti kebu ki̱mu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu. N chi a swe a dabi̱ ditiyu nabwen we bwako.
Ki̱dangu Yiye yabake wa ni̱bu Yafuda a mwatanangu, n Yesu a yika Wurchalima.
We Kan Kwamanu, n ki̱n a ya ni̱bu ki̱feku tanti̱kai n ti kwanti n ti ki̱kubti n ti bi̱bu ki̱sute ka̱mbi̱ri̱mu, a yii nangange chi.
Yinu n ki̱n a kwa̱r ki̱swi, a kaka ni̱bi kwang we Kan Kwamanu. N ki̱n a yai kwantiyu n ti tanti̱kayu. A ya ka̱mbi̱r ni̱bu suteki̱nu, a kurana bwa, a tungati̱ teburitu.
A yi chi bi̱bu ki̱feku ki̱kubti̱mu ko, “Ti̱wora kuli̱ni ti̱tu, long Temiye a kadu kwa̱ma̱r we.”
Miyari̱m ki̱ma kur chi ni̱bu a mwal we tatti̱ki̱dai yika̱riyu ko, “Mi̱laku Kan Kwamana a chau ni̱r ki̱nu.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam a bi̱u Yesu ko, “N yung ni̱n dukan di̱du mun rikandi̱nu, ni̱n baddu nang ku chi ka̱ta̱ki.”
N Yesu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Ti̱wur Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu, mang muddu a ditiyi yitta.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam fal a yi ko, “Kan Kwamanu ni̱ba mu swa̱ti̱tu wan taana chiri turukununu, nang wu mwiko ni̱n wur mwang muddu, a ditiyi yitta?”
Aya n Yesu a fwabu Kan Kwaman di̱du n chi ki̱kuradi̱nu, ki̱fwa bwiki.
A kute ki̱ku n Kwama a kukku Yesu we furangu, miyari̱m Yesumu a kur ya̱m bi̱bu n Yesu a fwamu. N chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu we ya̱m Kwamamu, ni̱ba mwali̱mu n ti bi̱bu ni̱ba fwamu.
Ki̱dangu Yiye yabake a lamengu, aya n Yesu a yika Wurchalima. Ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne, di̱ne chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ki̱n a yaki̱ maditu.
Aya n Yesu a kebu ki̱ni chi, di̱ne n ki̱n, a yim chi a ni̱tu ni̱biye.
Wuka nii, a ne fwa ki̱mi̱n ni̱r ni̱nu, di̱ne n ki̱n a yim ni̱tu niibitu.
Wuka nii we di̱n ki̱nu n Nikodimu. N ki̱n we tikaketi a kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu. N ki̱n wuduwe we Yafuda.

Nii wa be bwa di̱Yesuwe, ki̱ni ki̱tati̱lang kuma̱ng, a yi ki̱n ko, “Tete, ni̱n yim, m mun naba yungke, wu n Kwama a tume, di̱ne a ne nii ka ma chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱te we, ka n ke wu, n Kwama we ware ti ki̱ne.”
Yinu n Yesu, a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwami̱nu, nii a ne we ki̱ni dukan di̱du ka le ya Kwamanu, ka n ke ka ya bi̱be wu robe.”
N Nikodimu a bi̱u ko, “Ka bi̱u nii wa ka̱ra̱ne yire?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka a bi̱bu nii, a mwe ti Fi̱ki̱me, a ne ya dukanu ka le ya Kwamanu.
Aya nii ki̱bi̱u nii, Fi̱ki̱m ki̱bi̱u Fi̱ki̱m.”
Ka̱ta̱duwe mwi widu n yi mi, a mwintuwe ta ya bi̱be wu robe.
Ki̱fi̱be ki̱sudu, ki̱ya bwanu n ki̱n a ku diye, mun nwe diru, mun kudu yinang ka ki̱yingle chitangu, aya niyang yimbu bwa ki̱chir mi̱nede n ti bwa ki̱yaande. A ti we nii wa bi̱u a Fi̱ki̱me.
Nikodimu a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Ti̱tu ka fwedi yire?”
Yinu n Yesu a yi ko, “Mun naba yungke wuduwe we a ti̱m Yisrelamu, a mayire mwang swaanbu ki̱chitu wuwe?”
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa mi̱nu, ni̱n fwa chitu nang yimi, ni̱n mwa chitu nang kui, aya a mwintuwe ta yibu di̱mwar ni̱nu.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu, we chi a ti̱ti̱niye, ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu, ta ke bi̱yili̱mi yire, ka n fwa chimi̱n chi a bwadite?
A ne ni a fili̱n bwadiye we, ka n ke Bwe Niye. N ki̱n n ki̱kun wa be we bwako.
Tiyangu m Musa a kukku so ki̱ni ki̱tiyang we di̱chilanchangi̱n, a mwintuwe ni̱bu ka kuku Bwe Nii.
Ke ka nang wuwule niye, wu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱ki̱ne, a ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu.
N Kwama a mwan, a mi̱la ti̱ti̱nitu, a ni Bwe Ni̱re ko, ko ke nii a ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱ki̱ne, aya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu, a twiyaduwe.
N Kwama a tumebu Bweko ko ke a mwata ti̱ti̱nitu mi̱n ya̱m, aya ko ke ti̱ti̱nitu, a ya yuku a di̱ki̱ne.
A ne mwataku we bi̱bu a tu a ke ki̱ni̱mu, aya bi̱bu a ko ki̱ni̱mu, ka ya mwataku, di̱ne n chi a kebu bi̱yili̱mu, we Bwe Kwama n ki̱kune.
Ya̱ma mwatana fi. Yiiki̱ku a be ti̱ti̱nitu, ni̱bu a ki̱la mi̱la ki̱liye, a la chi, di̱ne nangi̱n chitu ti̱bwilai.
N chi a ko yiiki̱ku, ko ke chi chakakku ki̱ni ki̱leti we ki̱liye. Di̱ne taye, n chi a kwati̱bu we yiiki̱ku, ko ke chi kwaladuwe.
Aya nii wu ki̱tum bi̱yili̱me, a wulbu chi, ki̱ya fi a yiike ko ke ni̱bu a ku nangi̱n ti̱yili kitu n ki̱n ki̱maditu, a yim ko n ki̱n ki̱bunti̱ chi Kwama ki̱badde.
A kute ki̱ku n Yesu ti miyari̱m ki̱mu, a du Wurchalima a yika bale Yafudiya. A da diti we bwako, ki̱ma batisma.
We ki̱swi wuko, n Yowana ki̱ma batisma a Yinon wa kwati̱na Sali̱me. Mwe we nabwen, ni̱bu ki̱ti̱kedi kutukutu, we a di̱ki̱ne yaki̱ ma batisma.
Ki̱chitu a fwe, yo n Yowana a tibu le di̱bi̱nti̱le.
Wuka naba ni̱bu Yafudiya
Miyari̱m Yowanamu, a be, a yi ki̱n ko, “Tete, nii wu, a no ti̱n ware, a ki̱ti̱ku la wurdune, wu mwang ma di̱mwar a dur ki̱ne, ki̱ma batisma we bwa, ni̱bu kwang ki̱ki̱la bwa a di̱ki̱ne.”
N Yowana a yi chi ko, “N kawure ki̱ma kana chi n Kwama a tum ki̱ne ko a be maatu.
A mang tu, mang fwa chimi̱n mi, m mi̱n n ke Masiya aya n Kwama a ke ma tiye kakku.”

We ti̱kali ki̱naitu, fwa̱nu n di̱u bwele ki̱yiu naye. Fate bwele ki̱yiu naye a mabu kana chi bwele ki̱yiu naye kiyi ki̱nitu. N fate ki̱n ki̱nwe ta̱ma̱ng, ka ya̱m bwelemu ki̱chirede, fur ki̱ni mwe di̱ne yiko.
A mwintuwe, n ki̱n ka ya ri̱keku, yinu m mi̱n ma ya ki̱taku.
N ki̱n a be a dii, n ki̱n a la ka nang wuwule niye. Bi̱bu a chire a ti̱ti̱nimu m bi̱u ti̱ti̱ni, ya̱mi chiyu yiya ti̱ti̱ni. Wu a be, a bwadiye a la ka nang wuwule niye.
Ki̱kumang, ki̱fwa chi n ki̱n a kuwe n ti chi n ki̱n a nwe. A mwintuwe, a ne ni a ke di̱mwar ki̱ne we.
Aya ka nang wuwule niye, wa yiu di̱mwal ki̱ne, a tau kwari̱lle ko, n Kwama naba bi̱yili̱me.
Nangki̱n wu n Kwama a tume, ki̱fwa ya̱m Kwama mu, di̱ne n Kwama a ri ki̱n ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m.
N Kwama a mi̱la Bwe ko, a du chiti kwang a fa̱la̱ng kang.
Kanang wuwule niye wu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱m we Bwe we ki̱ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi ti̱tu a ne ridii, aya wa ko Bwe we, a ne ya ti̱kuri ti̱tu, ka wuran bwi ki̱ni kana ki̱fwini Kwama, a dur ki̱n.
Ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe ko n Yesu ki̱ya miyari̱mu ki̱ma chi mi̱ntu batisma a lati̱ Yowana.
Aya wu ki̱ma batisma n ke Yesu, miyari̱m.
Yo Tewuduwe a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a chir we Yafudiya a ki̱la Ka̱lili.
A ne wa̱re ka tadde we, a mwintuwe ka tau Samariya.
N ki̱n a be di̱kan bi̱n a Samariya, bi̱n di̱du ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Saikar, a kwati̱na finu n Yakubu a ni bweko n yusufu ferediye.
Bwir Yakubu we fiko. Kangu n Yesu a tibwi we yayuwangu, a ya swe we ki̱ti̱ku bwirangu ki̱fi̱kadu. Ti̱tu a fwe tibe kuko.
Wuka na Samariya a fwadu ki̱mi̱ntuwe beka dwe mwe. N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko “Niye mwe mang nodu.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a tu a le bi̱n yaka ta̱ne chabtu.
Na Samariya a yi Yesu ko, “Wule a fwe wu m mun naba Yafuda mwan bi̱u mwe wu nore a na Samariya?” Di̱ne ni̱bu Samariyamu a yitabu chi ti ni̱bu Yafudamu.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka no n yim ki̱li̱mang Kwamangu n ti nii wa ya̱n ya̱m ko n dwe ki̱mi̱ne mwe ka node, a no mwang bi̱u ki̱nu ka ni̱n mwe ti̱kuriye.”
Naye a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe muni̱n newe ki̱ni chi dweku mwei, yinu bwiru a ma swa̱n, mwan ya mwe wu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye a fi̱re?
Ka mwang la tenu n Yakubu wa du ni̱mi̱n bwiru a kute ki̱ku n ki̱n n ki̱fwan n ti bwesi̱m ki̱mu n ti chi yo kangi kitu a no wenga?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Dimwenu a ne du nii wu ki̱no mwe a bwir di̱de.
A ya ka nang wuwule niye, wu ka no mwe ma ni ki̱ne, a ne nwetu dimwenu we ki̱da ki̱diya kwadu. Mwe ma ni ki̱ne ka kau nebwi wu kani̱ng fwadu ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwade.”
Naye a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, niye mwe wu, ke n nweti̱du dimwenu we ki̱da. Mang fi̱kati̱du we yaki̱ bwirangu, miyadi kwadu mi̱n dwe mwengu.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ya, yale kwartamo, tibe ware.”
Naye wa yi Yesu ko, “Mi̱n n newe ki̱ni kwarta.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “N fwa bi̱yili̱m, mwiko muni̱n newe ki̱ni kwarta.”
We bi̱yili̱mu, ki̱nati mwiyu a lami yunu. Di̱ne yuko, kwarta m mun we ware ki̱ka̱nge n ke wumo.
Naye wa yi ko, “Tewuduwe, a mun fa̱ku Kwama.”
Tukebi̱ ni̱mu a sii Kwama a kun di̱du aya n ti̱n ni̱bu Yafudam tiko a dakan ni si Kwama a Wurchalima.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Naye, ke bi̱yili̱mu we chi mi̱n fwa mi̱nditu. Ki̱dangu ki̱bedu ki̱ku ni̱bu a ne sii Kwama we kun di̱du ka a Wurchalima.
N ti̱n ni̱bu Samariyamu ta yimbu chitu ti̱siditu. Aya ni̱n ni̱bu Yafudamu ni̱n yim chitu ni̱n siidetu. Wa̱re yuke a chire a ni̱bu Yafudam.
Aya ki̱swi ki̱bedu, a tu a lam, wu ni̱bu ki̱si Kwama ki̱ni ni̱ri dini̱mu ka sii ki̱nu a Fi̱ki̱m ti bi̱yili̱m, di̱ne Te ki̱bau dum bi̱bu a nang si ki̱nu.
N Kwama Fi̱ki̱m, bi̱bu ki̱sii ki̱ni̱mu kani̱ng sii ki̱nu a Fi̱ki̱m ti bi̱yili̱m.”
Naye a yi Yesu ko, “N yim Masiya wu ki̱bede, Ka benge ka yung ni̱n chiti kwang.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Mi̱n wu mi̱n fwa ya̱m ti mune n nangki̱n.”

N chi ki̱ri ya̱miye, miyari̱mu a ki̱lawe. N chi a ka̱ta̱n yinang ka ku n Yesu ki̱fwa ya̱m ti nayengu. Aya a ne nii a yi naye ko, “Mun bau wule? A ne wa bi̱u ki̱n ko, a mayire mun fwa ya̱mu ti naye we.”
Naye a du suuru we fiko a le bi̱nu a yi ni̱bu ko,
“Ti̱be ti̱da̱ngmi wu nii. A fwami chitu mang mangweti kwang. Ka kano nang Masiya?”
Ni̱bu a kiyawe ki̱ti̱bu a mau kwala a ya bwa a di̱Yesu we.
We ki̱twalang ki̱ku, miyari̱m ki̱mu a bwal ki̱n ko “Tete ki̱chau chabtu.”
Aya n ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱kan chabtu we ti̱tu ma chaditu, n ti̱n ta yimbu.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a ki̱la bi̱u Yichiyu ko, “Kano wuka nii a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni chabta?”
Aya n Yesu a yi ko, “Mang ma chi wu a twiyenge, nang chabtu mitu, mang ri nangang kangu.
Ka ti̱yidu ko chuwang a du swarti taananga? Aya mi̱n yi chi̱nu mi ti̱da̱ng kuniyu a bi a lam kakku.
Wu ki̱kadde ki̱ya ki̱li̱mang, ki̱mur kuli̱nu kani̱n chadu ki̱diya kwadu nang ti̱kuritu. Di̱ne wu ki̱fide ti wu ki̱kadde ke a ma furi mwemwen.”
We finu fal, Ya̱m bi̱bu ko wuka nii ki̱fidu, wuka ki̱kadi̱mu bi̱yili̱m.
N tum chi̱n ti̱kau chi ta mabu riye we. Bi̱kamu a nwe riye we aya n ti̱n ti̱nwe ta̱ma̱ng riye chiyangu.
Ni̱bu Samariyamu nabwe we bi̱n di̱du a ke bi̱yili̱mu ko nang Masiya di̱ne chi naye wa fwaatu ko, “A fwami kwang chitu mang mangwetu.”
Kangu ni̱bu Samariyamu a be fi a di̱Yesuwengu, a wana ki̱n ko a swe ti chi, n Yesu fal a swe ti chi ditiyi yurau.
Ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we a di̱Yesuwe di̱ne ya̱m ki̱mu.
Yinu ni̱bu Samariyamu a yi naye ko, “Ki̱ka̱ngu fal ni̱n ke bi̱yili̱mu, n ke di̱ne kana chi mwang fwaatu aya di̱ne ni̱n nwe n ni̱fwan ni̱n ke ti̱n ko a mwintuwe nii wu nang naba yuke wa ti̱ti̱niye.”
A kuteng ditiyi yurabangu, n Yesu a chir we ti̱m Samariyamu a yika Ka̱lili.
Nangki̱n, n Yesu n ki̱fwan a fwa ko, “Fa̱ku Kwama a newe ki̱ni dwiyen we ti̱m ki̱mu.”
Kanga lam Ka̱liliyangu, ni̱bu Ka̱lilimu a yiu ki̱n kani yurabu, di̱ne n chi a yatuwe Yiye yabake a bale ni̱bu Yafudam a Wurchalima, n chi a kuute chitu n Yesu a mawetu.
Yinu n Yesu a ki̱lati̱ bi̱n di̱da Kana wa ti̱m Ka̱lili we ka nang chikiye, finu n ki̱n a suten mwe a kau mwe yili̱me, wuka Fandu wa lo mati̱me we Kafanawu, bweko a bubuwe.
Yo nii wa nwe ko n Yesu a ki̱lawe Yafudiya, a be Ka̱lili, a yikan a ya wana ki̱n ko, “A Beki̱mi̱n bweko yaka bwadu.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka ta kubu di̱mwale ti chi ka̱ta̱kite a ne ta ke bi̱yili̱mu we ko bayim.”
Fandu fal a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe ni yikan, ke ki̱la bwe a bwami.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yikan bwemo a ne bwadu.” Nii wa ke bi̱yili̱mu we a ya̱m Yesumu a yika ti̱n.
Kangu n ki̱n we a wa̱re ki̱yikadangu, ka̱bi kiyu a be teka mi̱n n ti ki̱n, a yi ki̱n ko, bwiyu a be we bwemo.
N ki̱n a bi̱u chi ko, “Bwiyu a be ki̱swi yire?” N chi a yi ko, “Ki̱dangu bwiyu a bengu, di a fiya wiine wa kuko.”
Te bwe a yim ti̱n ko nang ki̱swi n Yesu a yiin ki̱n ko, “Yikan bweko ka bede.” Nii wu a kaibu ki̱swi. N ki̱n a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yesuwe n ti di̱kulon ki̱ni kwang.
Ti̱tu nang ti̱robitu chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu n Yesu a tu a ma a kuteng ki̱ku a du Yafudiya a yikan Ka̱lili.
A kute ki̱ku n Yesu a yika Wurchalima di̱ne Yiye ni̱bu Yafudam.
Di̱kan far we Wurchalima, ki̱dwan n ti kwa̱r kwanti di̱du n chi ki̱yalu ko Betasdan
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a bubuwemu ki̱daradu we ti̱kubi ti̱ti kwadu. [We fiko ki̱dubi̱bu ti ki̱kubtiyu n ti bi̱bu a ngi̱rmani̱mu n we.
Wuka Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama ki̱bedu beki̱ luku mwe a fare, naba burange ka mwedu, ka le mwe wa lukune ki̱be ti̱du kono a ki̱ki̱le ki̱dum burame.]
We fiko, wuka naba bura we wa ma swa̱ti̱tu wan ti̱ta chiri nari̱bu ki̱ni burang kange.
N Yesu a da̱ng ni wu, a yim ti̱n ko burang ni wangu ki̱ka̱ra̱ng. N Yesu a bi̱u ni wu ko, “Mu baddu mwang beda?”
Naba burange a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Tewuduwe mi̱ni ki̱ni wure wu ka makayu ka di̱ki̱yu we faru yo mwe a lukene. Ka n yo mi mang kune, wuka nii ki̱tui ti̱nu.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Kun, da̱u chi ti̱dari mwitu, yikan.”
Bi̱nabi̱na nii wu a be, a da̱u chi ti̱dari kitu a yikan. Ti̱tu a fwe difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam, ka nang chikiye Disabwi.
Ni̱bu Yafudam a ku ye, a yi nii wu a benge ko, “Di wu difi̱kare, we yili̱n musatu a dakabu mwang da̱u kwa̱mbi̱re mwemo mwang yikadu.”
Nii wu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Nang chi nii wu a beye a fwaatu, a yi ko, ‘N da̱u chi ti̱dari mwitu yikan.’ ”
N chi a bi̱u ko, “N wure ki̱niko wa ya̱n ko n da̱u chi ti̱darimitu, n yikane?”
Nii wa benge a yimbu ka n wure a be ki̱ne, di̱ne ki̱chitu wa fwe a fina ki̱tuu ni̱be. N Yesu a setuwe ni̱bu.
A kutengu ki̱ku n Yesu a ya ki̱n a Kan Kwaman, a yi ki̱n ko, “Da̱ng, a mwang be. Dang, du ki̱letiyu, ke ki̱la chi a la ti̱te a fwe.”
Kangu n ki̱n a swaan Yesungu, a yikan a ya yi bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu ko n Yesu nang ni a beki̱ne.
Di̱ne yiko, ni̱bu Yafuda a mwe ki̱fuma Yesu ko a mayire kani̱n ma ki̱chitu wu difi̱kare.
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “N Temi ki̱ma nangangu a lanta ki̱ka̱ng, m mi̱n ti̱n mi̱n ma ti̱du.”
Ya̱m bi̱bu a ni ni̱bu Yafudam dukan di̱du ki̱baddu ka chi̱u Yesunu. N chi a yi ko, “N ke di̱ne a ki yilang difi̱kare, aya a ki̱la yi ti̱n ko Kwama n Teki̱n. N ki̱n a mar yikiyu yinang Kwama.”
Yinu n Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, ki̱kumang mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, bwe a ne ma chitu n ki̱fwan ka a kubu Teki̱n ki̱made, di̱ne chi Te ki̱maditu ki̱ni kwang nang chi bwe ki̱ma ti̱ne.
Nangki̱n, Te ki̱mi̱la Bwe, ki̱yungti̱ chi n ki̱ni ki̱fwan ki̱maditu. Ka yungti̱ nangi̱n ti̱tu a la ti̱titu. Ka kau chimi̱n chi ka̱ta̱ki.
Ti̱nti̱n, tiyangu Te ki̱kukku kwa̱miyu ki̱ni ti̱kuriyangu yiko. Bwe ki̱ni wu n ki̱n a ku diye ti̱kuritu.
Te a kaba ni̱bu mi̱nbu ya̱m aya a ni Bwe dukan di̱du kani̱n mwata ya̱mi̱nu.
Di̱ne ke ni̱ba ni Bwe dwiyentu tiyangu n chi ki̱ni Tengu. Kwang nii wa nibu Bwe dwiyente, a niti̱bu wa tume ki̱ne.

“Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka nang wuwule niye wu ki̱nwe ya̱m mi̱me, wu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱m we nii wa twiye, ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu. Mwataku ya̱ma̱ng a ne we di chiye, n chi a yabi̱ bwa, a ya ti̱kuri.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ki̱swi ki̱bedu, a tu a be wu ni̱ba bwamu ka nwe ker Bwe Kwama. Bi̱bu a nwe mu fal ka ya ti̱kuri.
Nangki̱n, tiyangu Te n ki̱fwan nang dur ti̱kurinu, yiko a yoti̱ Bwe ko dur ti̱kuriin.
A ni ki̱n dukan di̱du a mwata ki̱nu di̱ne n ki̱n Bwe Nii.”
“Ti̱ka̱ta̱du ya̱m bi̱bu we, di̱ne ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu ni̱ba futumu ka nwe ker Bwe Kwamane.
Ka chiredu, bi̱bu a ma chi ti̱yili̱mu ka kunu, ka kadu aya bi̱bu a tumbu bi̱yili̱mu, ka kunu, ka wuran bwi ki̱ni ki̱fwini Kwama.
Mang mebu mang mabu chi mi̱ni mi̱kun, mi̱mwata ya̱m mi̱mu yinangu Kwama fwamiyangu. Di̱ne yiko, kabaku mangu ki̱yilang di̱ne ma bunti̱bu chitu mi̱n kuri, kana chitu wa twiye ka badditu.”
N Yesu a chakakku a yi ko, “Ka m ma di̱mwaru a dur mi̱ne, di̱du n ke di̱mwar di̱yili̱n.”
Aya wukani we ki̱ma di̱mwaru we dur mi̱nu, n yim ki̱ma di̱mwar di̱yili̱n we dur mi̱nu.
Ti̱tum ni̱bu we di Yowana wu ki̱ma batisma, n ki̱n ti̱n a fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱mu.
A ya a bwin yiko, mang bunti̱bu di̱mwar niin. N fwa ying ke ti̱ya yuku.
N Yowana fiti̱la wu ki̱takira, wu ki̱yii chiye, ti̱n fal ti̱ke ti̱n ta ma furi mwen ki̱ni yiiku kangu a baki̱swi bayim.
Aya m mi̱n ki̱ni di̱mi̱n di̱mwar we dur mi̱nu di̱du a lati̱ di̱du n Yowana a mwa a dur mi̱ni̱nu. Chitu mi̱n maditu, a wu n Temi a ni ko m ma, chitu a kau di̱mwar mi̱nitu a yung Te a twiye.
Ti̱nti̱n, Te wa twiye n ki̱fwan a kau di̱mwar mi̱n. Ta nweembu ker ki̱nu we, ta kuun ti̱bu we yinangu n ki̱n wemi̱nangu.
Ya̱m ki̱mu a swebu we ni̱tu chi̱ntu di̱ne ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we wa tum ki̱ne.
Ti̱lekan we a tatti̱ki̱dai Kwamayu ni̱ba mwa̱liyu di̱ne we kuraku changu, ta ya ti̱kuri ki̱diyatu a di̱chiye. Yiyu tatti̱kiki̱dai Kwamai fal nai yiyu ki̱ma di̱mwar a dur mi̱niyu.
Aya a mwintuwe tiko tiyangu ta be bwan di̱ mi̱ne ke ti̱ya ti̱kuritu.
“Mang yibu dwiyen we ni̱bu.
Aya n yin chi̱n, ti̱nti̱n n yim ta mi̱labu Kwama we ni̱tu chi̱ntu.
M be a di̱n Tenu, ta yiibu, aya ka wuka ni a be a di̱n dur ki̱ne ta yiu ki̱nu.
Ta ke bi̱yili̱mi yire kangu ti̱funti̱ bwi ta ya delaki̱ku a bwiti chiyangiyu, aya ta funti̱bu bwi ta ya delaki̱ku ki̱chiredu a bwanu a di̱Kwama ki̱ku n ki̱kunangu?”
“Ti̱kamadu we ti ma Mai keme chi̱n a bwa Te, nii ki̱mai keme chi̱ne nang Musa, wu ti̱kuradu ti ka maka chi̱ne.
Ka no ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Musa, no ta ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne. Di̱ne m Musa, a mwal ya̱mu a dur mi̱n.
Aya ka ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we chi n ki̱n a mwale, yire ta ke bi̱yili̱mu we ya̱m mi̱me?”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Yesu a yabu far di̱dun Ka̱lili, di̱du ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko far Tiberiya.
Ni̱bu nabwen a bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱n di̱ne n chi a ku chi ka̱ta̱kitu, n ki̱n ki̱madu a ni̱bu ti̱buramitu.
N Yesu fal a fi̱l kun a swe ware ti miyari̱m ki̱mu.
Ki̱swi Yiye yabake ni̱bu Yafudame a mwatawe.
Kangu n Yesu a kuku nuiyu a ku ni̱bu nabwen ki̱be bwa a di̱ki̱nengu, a yi Filibu ko, “Ni ta̱nne chabti̱tu a fi̱re wu beka lwe ni̱bu bi̱be?”
N Yesu a ma di̱bi̱du di̱du, ko ke ki̱nweeng chitu n Filibu ka fwaditu. Di̱ne Yesu a tu a yim chitu ka madite.
N Filibu a ke ko, “Kano chabtu ti̱tu muraki̱ ki̱duwang kani̱n chadu a sure diti kuliti turabitu a ne lwedu yinangu n kawure, ka yadi bayi̱m bayi̱mangu.”
We miyari̱m ki̱mu wuka wu di̱n ki̱nu n Andi̱riya, ke Simun Biti̱r, a yi Yesu ko,
“Da̱ng be bwele wu ki̱ni ki̱daniyi yunu yiyu a miim seyire, ti chingiyi yurau. Aya ki̱chitu wu ka ma nabwe ni̱be mi̱n wureni?”
N Yesu a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱yi ni̱bu tiko a sweswe.” Fiko ki̱ni fili̱nu n ti swa̱ki̱ku nabwen kana kwartabu bi̱bu a swemu a mwatan kuniyi yunu.
N Yesu a da̱u ki̱danniyu a twa̱ba̱ bunitu we di̱Kwama, yinu a wulan a kera ni̱bu mi̱n, n kawure a yiu yinangu ka lwe ki̱nangu, a mati̱ chingiyi yiko. N kawure a ya yinang kangu n ka ki̱badangu.
Yo n chi a chab a lwenge, a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ti̱mur ti̱buken ti̱tu a kulenitu ke chitu a kaiyaduwe kwang.”
Ti̱buken ti̱tu miyari̱m ki̱m a muritu a ri ti̱ti̱ngriti kub chiri turau. Kanang chikiye, ti̱buken seyire ti̱tu ni̱bu a chau we ki̱danni bali yunu a dubitu.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu, a ku chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu n Yesu a mangitangu, n chi a yi ko, “Ki̱kumang, wu nang fa̱ku Kwama
Yinangu Yesu a swaan ko ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱baddu beka tau ki̱ni dukan ka ni ki̱n maiyangu, a kun a ki̱lati̱ kunnuwe, n ki̱kun.
Yinangu di a lengu, miyari̱m ki̱mu a suu bwa fare.
Ti̱mu a mwe ki̱sedu we ki̱swi wuko, aya n Yesu a tibu be fi a di̱chiye. Miyari̱m ki̱mu a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ki̱yabu faru ki̱yika Kafanawu.
Ki̱dang kangu, ki̱fi̱be fare a bwilan, ki̱fi̱be wuduwe a mikku faru.
N chi a si kwa̱mbi̱re mwe yinang siriyi
Aya n Yesu a yi chi ko, “M mi̱n! Ti̱nwedu taiyu we.”
Yinu fal n chi a ke ko a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a lam bwanu n chi ki̱yade.
Bafi̱nenangeko, ni̱bu a swe a ki̱ti̱ku fari̱mu, a swaan ko kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a be fiko win, n chi a twar miyari̱m Yesumu a lewe kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, n chi, n chikun. N Yesu a lebu.
Aya yikai kwa̱mbi̱ri mwei a benga bi̱n di̱du a Tiberiyanu, a be ti ki̱dwang n ti finu ni̱bu a chan ki̱danniye a kuteng ki̱ku, n Tewuduwe a twa̱ba̱bunitangu.
Tiyangu ni̱bu a ku a ne Yesu we fiko ka miyari̱m ki̱mangu, n chi a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika Kafanawu ki̱babba Yesu.
N chi a ya Yesu a ki̱ti̱ku lang, n chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Tete, naba yungke, m be fi fere?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m tibaiyedu di̱ne ta chau ki̱danniyu ta riin fure. Aya n ke di̱ne ta ku chi ka̱ta̱kite.”

Ti̱madu nangang baku chabtu ti̱tu ka kaiyadu kaiyanetuwe. Ti̱ma nangang baku chabtu ti̱tu a ne kaiyadu kaiyadi, ti̱tu ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi. Ti̱tu nang chabti̱tu Bwe Nii ka ni chi̱nitu. N Kwama a tu a ma di̱mwar di̱du ka swani̱n Bweko wu n ki̱n a ke ki̱ne.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Nang ma wule ke a ri ki̱ke Kwama?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “Chitu n Kwama ki̱baddu ta maditu nang ti̱tu. Kanang chikiye, ti̱ke bi̱yili̱m we wu n ki̱n a tumme.”
Yinu ni̱bu bi̱bu a bi̱ti̱ Yesu ki̱da ko, “Yoye chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu mwang madu ke ni̱n ku ni̱n ke bi̱yili̱mitu nang ti̱ti̱le? Mwang ma wureni?
Kanang chikiye, Tukebi̱ ni̱mu feredimu, a chau manna
Yinu n Yesu a ke chi mi̱n a yi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu nii wa ni chi̱n chabtu bwadite n ke Musa, aya Temi nang wu ki̱ni ki̱danniyu siiniye yiyu a bwadiyu.
Ki̱danni Kwama nang ki̱n wa suwe a dii ki̱ni ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu ti̱kuriye.”
N chi a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, nang ni ni̱n ki̱dum chabti̱m bi̱bi kwadu.”
N Yesu a ke chi mi̱n a yi ko, “Mi̱n nang chabtu ti̱tu ki̱ni ti̱kuritu. Wa be a bwan di̱mi̱ne a ne nwetu chunu we ki̱ki̱da. Wu a ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne, a ne ka nweeng dimwenu we.
Aya tiyangu ma fwa chimi̱nangu, ti̱kui aya ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ mi̱ne.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu n Kwama a niiyimu kwang ka be bwa a di mi̱ne, wa be bwa a di̱mi̱ne nemang koonduwe.
N suwe a bwadi, n ke di̱ne mang ma ki̱ke miye aya mang ma ki̱ke wa twiye.
Chi wa twiye a ketu, n laiyu bi̱bu a niimu we ko win, aya ke n kuku chi we di swan kute.
Chi n Temi ki̱ badditu nang ti̱tu: Ni ki̱da̱ng Bwe, ki̱keti̱ bi̱yili̱m we di̱ki̱ne ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu mang kukku ki̱nu we a di swan kute.”
Yinu ni̱bu Yafudam a le kungakunga ki̱ni Yesu di̱ne a yi ko, “Mi̱n nang ki̱danne wa suwe a bwadiye.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam a yi ko, “Nii wu n ke Yesu, bwele Yusufu wu n ne ki̱n n ti Teki̱n niyang yima? A mayire ka yidu ko ki̱suwe bwa a diye?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi a yi ko, “Ti̱madu kungakunga we bwiti chiyu.
A ne nii ka be fi a di̱mi̱ne we, ka n ke wu Te a tume a di̱mi̱ne, mang kukku ki̱nu we di swang kute.
A mwal we tatti̱ki̱dai fa̱ku Kwamayu ko, ‘N Kwama ka miya chimi̱nu, n chi ki̱ni kwang,’ aya wa nwe ti wa miyawe Te, ki̱be bwa a di̱mi̱ne.
A ne ni a kuun Te we, kana ki̱n wa be we bwa di̱Kwama. N ki̱n n ki̱kun a kuun Te we.”
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka n wure wa ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱ mi̱ne ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu.
“Mi̱n nang ki̱danne wu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye.
Tukebu chi̱remu feredimu a chau manna we di̱kiru, aya a mwintuwe n chi a bwa.
Aya chabtu ti̱tu ki̱suwedu a diitu nang ti̱tu, nii ka chau ki̱danni Yiye, a ne bwadu.
M mi̱n nang chabtu ti̱kuri ti̱tu a suwe a bwaditu. Ka wuwule nii wu ka chau chabtu ti̱te, a ne bwadu ki̱diya kwadu. Chabtu ti̱tu nam bwimiye wu mang nidu ke ti̱ti̱nitu a ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadite.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam a le ki̱tuka ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱ni dukan we bwiti chiyu ko, “A mayire nii wu ka yidu ko ka ni chi̱ni nam bwikiye ni wude?”
Yinu n Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka ta wubu nam Bwe Nii, ta noti̱bu ki̱tum mi̱me, ti̱newe ki̱ni ti̱kuri we bwi chiyu.
Kwang ka nang wuwule niye wu ki̱wu nam miye ki̱ noti̱ ki̱tum mi̱me ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu, ma kuku ki̱nu fal.
Di̱ne nam bwi miye nang chabti̱tu siinitu, ki̱tum mi̱mu nang chi ti̱noriti siinitu
Nii ki̱wu nam bwi miye, ki̱noti̱ ki̱tum mi̱me, ki̱swedu we bwi miyu m mi̱n wetuwe a yikiyu.
Wu kure Te a twiye, mi̱nkadu di̱ne ki̱ne. Yiko wa wu mi̱n a kau chabtu kiye, ka swedu di̱ne mi̱n.
Wu nang ki̱danne wa suwe a bwadiye. A newe yinang ki̱danne wu tukebi̱ chim a chau, a bwarane. Aya ka nang wuwule niye wa chau ki̱danne we, ka kaddu ki̱diya kwadu.”
N Yesu a fwara ya̱mi yiyu a ki̱swi wu n ki̱n a yaki̱ miyadu a kan muraku di̱du a Kafanawu.
Kangu n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, nabwen we miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ko, “Ya̱m bi̱bu a ma bwar wure ka kedu.”
Yinangu n Yesu a ku kungakunga a le tibe miyari̱m ki̱mangu. A yi chi ko, “Chi mang fwa a kai chimi̱n ni̱ra?
Yinu ta ma wule ka ti̱ku Bwe Nii ki̱fi̱lu ki̱yika bwanu n ki̱n a bemi̱ne?
Fi̱ki̱mu nang ti̱kuritu. Nam a nibu ti̱kuri. Chi mang fwa chimi̱ne Fi̱ki̱m n ti ti̱kuri.
Aya bi̱kam chimu we bi̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱li̱mu.”
N Yesu a tu a yim bi̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱mu feredi n ti ki̱n wu ka kwa̱l ki̱ne.
Yesu a ki̱la fwa chimi̱n ko, “Nang chi a yo ma fwa mi, a ne ni ka medu ka be fi a di̱ mi̱ne we, ka n ke wu Te a ke ki̱mi̱ne.”
Di̱ne ya̱m bi̱bu Yesu a fwamu, nabwen we miyari̱mu a du ki̱n a bun ki̱mi̱nti̱bu.
Yinu n Yesu a bi̱u miyari̱m ki̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu ko, “N ti̱n ti̱badu ta yika ti̱na?”
Simun Biti̱r a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, nang ya bwa a di̱wure? Mun nang nii ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi̱me.
Ni̱n fal ni̱n ke bi̱yili̱mu, ni̱n yinti̱n ko m mun nang wu wauwade wu Kwama.”
Yinu n Yesu a ke ko, “N sutu chi̱ni kub chiri burau, aya wuka chi̱n n Setan.”
Kanang chikiye, ki̱fwa Yafuda, bwele Simun Yiskariyoti, di̱ne nang nii yaka kwa̱l ki̱ne, kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n wetuwe miyari̱mi kub chiri burabi̱mu.
A kute ki̱ku, n Yesu a bwa̱lan a Ka̱lili yangu, aya a babu ka ya Yafudiya, di̱ne ni̱bu Yafudam we bwako, ki̱baddu ka chi̱u ki̱nu.
Yiye tukubiye ni̱bu Yafudam a lame ki̱dang kangu.
Kebu Yesumu a yi ki̱n ko, “A dakan mwang du fi mwang yika Yafudiya ke miyari̱m mumu a ku chitu mu maditu.
Nii ki̱baddu ni̱bu ka ying ki̱nu yinange, ki̱madi kwa̱rikwa̱ri. Ka mun ma ti̱chituwe, mwang yung dur munu we ti̱ti̱nitu ke ni̱bu a swaani̱n.”
N chi kebu Yesumu ti̱n, a kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yesuwe.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ki̱swimi a lambu, aya n ti̱n ka nang ki̱ki̱le ki̱dange a le chimi̱n.
Ti̱ti̱nitu a ne medu ka ko chidu, aya ki̱ko mi̱nu di̱ne mi̱n mwa chidu we chi ti̱bwilaitu n chi ki̱maditu.
Ti̱yika Yiye, mang yabu diidin,
A kute ki̱ku n Yesu a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bangu, a sweti̱ ki̱da we Ka̱lili.
A kuteng ki̱ku kebu ki̱mu a yika Yiyengu, n Yesu a be baran a ya Yiye, a yabi kwa̱rikwa̱ri.
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a le ki̱babba ki̱nu we fi a Yiye, ko, “A bwa̱le ni wuko?”
Bi̱kamu we muraki̱ku a le ki̱fwa ki̱nu we fiko ko, “Nii wu yile, bi̱kamu ko naba di̱buti̱re.”
Aya a ne ni wa chire fi̱lang ki̱ni ya̱me we di̱ne n chi ki̱nwe taiyi bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu.
Ki̱dangu ti̱kalitu a bikanangu, n Yesu a ya Kan Kwamanu a ma miyaku.
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a ya̱r yi, ko nii wa yabu miyaku ki̱duwang, n ki̱n a miyawe a fi̱re?
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Mang miyabu ti̱mi, aya ti̱tu n temi a tum mi̱netu.
Ko wa sutu ka ma chitu n Kwama ki̱ baddite, ka yindu ko chitu mi̱n miyaditu a chire a di̱Kwama n ke ti̱mi.
Wu ki̱miya chitu mang babite, ki̱bau di̱n, wu ki̱fumbwi ko ke ki̱ya wa tum ki̱ne mi̱n di̱ne, naba bi̱yili̱me, a ne di̱buti̱r we di̱ki̱ne.
A mika m Musa a ni chi̱n yili̱nte? Aya ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang ti̱kii yili̱ntu. Ka a newe yuko, a ma yire ti̱badu ta chiye?”
Ni̱bu nabwen a ke ki̱mi̱n we fiko ko, “Ki̱fi̱bti we durmunu, n bi̱wure ki̱baddu ka chi̱nu?”
N Yesu a ke a yi chi ko, “M ma chi ka̱ta̱kiti wiin, aya n ti̱ni ki̱ni kwang ti̱ka̱ta̱n.
M Musa a du chi̱n ko ti̱nang bii laar (Kasi ki̱ku bati̱tukebu a yo n ke Musangu) ta kwiyabu ti̱bitati̱n labitu we Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam.
Ka ta medu ta bii bwe mi̱n laaru we Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame, di̱ne ke ti̱bunti̱ yilang Musangu, yinu a mayire ti̱kai ni̱ru ki̱ni mi̱n di̱ne mang be ki̱ni ni we Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame?
Ti̱kadu ya̱mu we ki̱ni kamaku aya ti̱mwata ya̱mu yinang ka dakanang.”
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu Wurchalima a yiko, “Ni̱bem, nii wu n ke wu no chi ki̱baddu ka chida?
Nang wa ki̱la ki̱fwa ya̱mu a tibe chi kwa̱rikwa̱ri a ne ni kiyi ki̱n ya̱me we. Ka tikaketi kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu a tu a ke ko, n ki̱n m Masiya?
Ni̱n yim finu nii wa chirmi̱ne, ka Masiya wu yile, a benge a ne nii ka yim fi a chirmi̱ne we.”
Yo n Yesu a yaki̱ miyadu we Kan Kwamane, a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Ti̱yim mi̱n, ti̱yinti̱ fi mang chirmi̱ne, mang bebu ki̱ni dukan mi̱n, aya wa twiye, ki̱ni bi̱yili̱m, n ti̱n ta ying ki̱mbu.
Mi̱n n yim di̱ne, n be a bwa a di̱ki̱ne, n ki̱n a tum mi̱ne.”
N chi a ke ka tadu, aya a ne nii a mwiye we, di̱ne ki̱swiko a lambu.
Ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we fiko, a yi ko, “Yo m Masiya ka bede we beka ma chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu ni wa maata?”
Ni̱bu Farisamu a nwe ko ni̱bu ki̱madi kungakunga ki̱ni Yesu, wuduwe fansetiye n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a tum dokariti yiyu a Kan Kwaman ko a ya tau Yesu.
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “A du ki̱swi bayim ma swedu ti chi̱n, a kute ki̱ku ma ki̱la bwa a nii wa tum mi̱ne.
Ta baiyu a ne ta yayu, bwa ma yade, a ne ta yin yadu.”
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a kebu Yesumu, n chi fal a yi ko, “Kano ki̱ya fi̱re wa ne ni yin ya ki̱ne? Ko kano ki̱ya bwana ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a ti̱ran a swe ti ni̱bu Yelenamu,
Wureni a yo n ki̱n a yi ko ta baiyu neta yayu. Ko bwanu mi̱n yade a neta me yake?”
We di swete Yiye, di wu Yiye ki̱rbu ki̱rbu we ni̱bu Yafudam, n Yesu a ti a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Nii ki̱nwe dimwene a be a di̱mi̱ne a no.
Nii ki̱ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne, neti̱bwi yiyu a ti̱kuri ka ni̱n fwadu we ni̱r wu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱me yinang ka mwal we ya̱m Kwamangu.”
N Yesu ki̱fwa ya̱mu a Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam a bi̱bu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ka yiddu a di̱ki̱nemu.
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a tibu beduwe ki̱dang kangu, di̱ne n Yesu a tibu yiu dwiyen kitu.
Kangu ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bu n Yesu a fwamu, n chi a yi ko, “Ki̱kumang, wu nang fa̱ku
Bi̱kamu a yiko, “Wu nang Masiya.” Bi̱kamu a kebu, ko Ka̱lili nang fi Masiya ka chirmi̱nedenga?
N chi a yi ko, “Mare tatti̱ki̱dai yika̱riyu a fwa ko m Masiya ka chiredu a ki̱fi̱ku Daudang, a bwa Beti̱lami, a bebi̱ne n Dauda swemi̱ne.”
Ti̱kuran ni̱bitu a ma dangdang we dur Yesunu.
Bi̱kamu ko chi tau Yesu aya a ne nii a kuku kangu ko ka tadde we.
Yo doka̱ritiya Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu a ki̱lane, ni̱bu Farisamu n ti tikaketi fansetiye a bi̱u chi ko, “A mayire ta bebi̱ ki̱ne?”
Ni̱bu tokumu n ti fanseti a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Wuka nii a fwaangbu ya̱m ki̱mu we.”
Ni̱bu Farisamu a yi doka̱ritiyu ko, “A buti̱ti̱ chi̱na?”
N chi a yi ko, “Bi̱kam we tikaketi kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu, a ke bi̱yili̱mu we ya̱m ki̱ma?
N chi ka ti̱turan ko, aya ki̱ku muraku a yimbu chi we yili̱n Musatu, n chi ka bi̱bwilam.”
N Nikodimu wa yaang we bwa a di̱Yesuwe, wu n chi wetuwe mure, naba Farisam. A yi chi ko,
“We yilang chirengu, n chi̱ni ni newe ki̱ni da ni kaba nii wu mi̱n ya̱mu, ka niyang nwebu chi we di̱ki̱nenge. Nang tiyangu ni swaan chi we murengu.”
N chi a ke ki̱mi̱n a yi ko, “Mun naba Ka̱liliye ti̱nti̱na? Ta̱l tatti̱ki̱dai Kwamayu yinang, fa̱kubu Kwamamu a chirmi̱nebu
[N chi a yaran, n kawure a yika loko.]
N Yesu a yika Kun di̱du ki̱ni tini Setuniye.
Ki̱ni si̱n, n Yesu a ki̱lati̱ Kan Kwamanu we. Ni̱bi kwang a mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe. N ki̱n a sweswe ki̱ miya chi mi̱nu.
Ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musa n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a be ki̱mi̱ne ki̱ni naye wu n chi a taba ti̱kuliye. N chi a yo naye a ti we tibe chi.
A yi Yesu ko, “Naba yungke, ni̱n tau naye wu ki̱ma ti̱kuli.
Yilang Musangu a yung ni̱n ko, ni̱ng kwela dum bi̱bu ki̱ni kali, ni̱n chi̱u, mun fal n fwa ko wule?”
N chi a si la̱n di̱du ko ke chi tang ki̱n, chi yati̱ fi̱li chi mari̱ng keme ko. Aya n Yesu a swa kabu a ti̱m a mwal chitu we ti̱mu ki̱ni bewure ko.
Kangu n chi a chakakku ki̱ni ti̱bi̱di̱ritangu, a kun a yi chi ko, nii wa mambu ki̱le we tibe chi̱ne, a mwe a mabi ki̱ni kale.
N Yesu a sungtu kabu we ti̱mu, a mwal chitu.
Yo n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n kawure ki̱chiri daan, ki̱yikati̱du. A mwetuwe seli̱bu, ki̱ni kwang. N chi a yaran a duka Yesu ti naye we fi a ti mi̱ne.
Yinu n Yesu fal a kun a bi̱u naye ko, “Naye, n chi a bwa̱le? A ne ni a mwata ya̱me wenga?”
Naye a ke ko, “Tewuduwe, a newe ko wiin.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “M mi̱n ti̱n ne mang ya̱n ya̱m, yikan yang du chi ti̱bwilaitu, chadu kakku we ki̱n.”
N Yesu a chakakku ki̱ni ya̱mu ko, “Mi̱n nang yiiku ti̱ti̱niyangu, ka wuwule niye wu ka bumiti̱ne, a ne ya yayu a ki̱liye, aya ka yiiku ki̱ku a ti̱kuriyang.”
Yinu ni̱bu Farisamu a yi Yesu ko, “Mun mwa dur mun, ti̱nti̱ne, di̱mwar munu a ne bi̱yili̱mu we.”
N Yesu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Kono mi̱n mwa dur mi̱n, mi̱n mwa bi̱yili̱m, di̱ne n yim bwa mang bemi̱ne n ti bwa mang yikande, aya n ti̱n, ta yimbu bwa mang yikande.
Kabaku changu ki̱ku a niyang, m mi̱n mang kaba ni mi̱nbu.
Aya kasi no mi̱n kabadu, mi̱n kaba bi̱yili̱m. Mi̱n n newe m mi̱kun mi̱n n we ware ti Te wa twiye.
We yili̱n chi̱ntu a mwal ko, ‘Di̱mwaru a yini ni̱bi burabi̱nu di̱yili̱n.’
Mi̱n, mi̱n ma di̱mwaru a dur mi̱n m mi̱fwan, wu robe nii ki̱ma di̱mware nang Temi.”
N chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “N te mun a fi̱re?”
N Yesu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Ta yimbu mi̱n, ta yim ti̱bu Te. Ka no ti̱yim mi̱ne no ta yim Te.”
N Yesu a fwa ya̱m bi̱bu a ki̱swi wu n ki̱n a yaki̱ ma miyaku ki̱dwan ti fi a kan ka̱mbi̱ri̱ne we Kan Kwamane. A ne nii a tau ki̱ne we di̱ne ki̱swiko a lambu.
N Yesu a ki̱la fwati̱n ki̱da ko, “Mi̱n mi̱n yikadu. Ta baiyu, ta bwaradu ki̱ni ki̱leti chiyu. A ne ta ying ya bwanu mi̱n yade.”
Ya̱m bi̱bu a yo Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱twayadu ko, “Kano yaka chi̱u yikiya? Nang chi a fwa ko, a ne ta ying ya bwanu mi̱n yadea?”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “N chi̱n m bi̱u ti̱m, m mi̱n n chire a bwa diye. N ti̱n bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nim, m mi̱n n ke wa ti̱ti̱niye.
Nang chi mang fwa chimi̱n mi ta bwaradu ki̱ni ki̱leti chiyu, ka ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu ti m mi̱n nang wu mang yi mi mi̱n nangki̱ne.”
N chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mun nang wure?”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Nang chi mang fwa chimi̱n yoko niyang mwe we ya̱me.”
Ya̱m mi̱mu nabwen bi̱bu mang fwadu we di̱chi̱ne mu, bi̱bu ka kau chimi̱n mwataki̱mu.
Ni̱bu a swaanbu ko n Yesu ki̱fwa chimi̱n ya̱ma Temu.
Nang chi a yo n Yesu a yi ko, “Ki̱dangu ta kukku Bwe Nii we ki̱tiyang bwangu, nang ki̱dangu ta swaanu ti mi̱n nangki̱nangu. Ta swaan ti̱du ti ma mabu chi a ki̱ke mi aya kana chi Te a fwa ko m maatu.
N ki̱n wa twiye we ware ti mi̱n. A dubu mi̱n m mi̱kun, di̱ne mi̱n ma chi a ki̱keko kwadu.”
Ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱Yesuwe, we a ki̱twalang ki̱ku n ki̱n a yaki̱ fwa ya̱ma̱ngu.
N Yesu a yi ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱n ki̱nemu ko, “Ta kau miyari̱m mi̱m bi̱yili̱mu, ka ta marbu ya̱m mi̱mu a ti̱me.
Ta yim bi̱yili̱mu, bi̱yili̱mu ka tu chi̱nu.”
N chi a ke ko, “Ni̱n chire a ki̱kuwang Yibrayim, nang mambu ka̱bi we a mayire mwang yidu mwiko bi̱yili̱m ka tu ni̱ne?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Bi̱yili̱mu mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ni wu ki̱ma ki̱letiye, a kau ki̱letitu mi̱n ka̱be.
Ka̱be n ke bwe lo wu ki̱swedu ki̱diya kwade. Aya bwe lo, n we lo ki̱diya kwadu.
Nang chi a yo ma yi mi, ka Bwe a tuune, a tuun ki̱yilang.
We yuko n ti̱n ki̱kuwang Yibrayim, aya ti̱badu ta chiyu di̱ne ta kebu ki̱ni miyaki̱ mangu.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n chi ma ku a Tetu, aya ti̱n ti̱ma chi ta nwe a tebu chimitu.”
N chi a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Te ni̱n n Yibrayim. N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, Ka no te chi̱n n Yibrayime a no ta ma chi n Yibrayim a maatu.”
Da̱ng ti̱badu ta chiyu, mi̱n wu mang fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱mu mang nwe a di̱Kwamamu. N Yibrayim a ma ya?
Ti̱bunti̱ chi tebu chimu a maatu. N chi a yi ko, “Ni̱n n ke dum ki̱kulbi̱m ni̱n ki̱ni Te nang Kwama.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Ka no Kwama nang Te chi̱ne, a no ta mi̱layu, di̱ne n chire a bwa di̱Kwama. Ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n ti chi̱n. Mang bebu a kurki̱ mang, aya n Kwama a twiye.
Wule a yo ta swaanbu ya̱m mi̱me? Ta kebu miyaku mange?

N ti̱n bwesi̱m Setan, nang te chi̱n. Ti̱ke ta ma chi ki̱badditu. We tile bi̱rke n ki̱n naba chike. A kebu bi̱yili̱mu di̱ne n ki̱n a newe ki̱ni bi̱yili̱mu we fur ki̱nu. N ki̱n a mi̱la ti̱kwanitu nang daako. N ki̱n nang te ti̱kwaniye.
Aya m mi̱n wu mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱yili̱me, ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne.
We tibe chi̱n n wure ka yidu ko m mi̱n naba ki̱letiye, ka mi̱n n ke naba ki̱letiye, a mayire ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu a di̱mi̱ne?
Naba Kwama ki̱nwe ti̱kwa̱liyi Kwamatu aya n chi̱n ta nwebu di̱ne n ti̱n n ke ni̱bu Kwama.”
Ni̱bu Yafudamu a yi Yesu ko, “Nang lwebu yinangu nang yidu ko, m mun naba Samariya, m muni ki̱ni ki̱fi̱btiyanga?”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “A ne ki̱fi̱bti we dur mi̱nu. Mi̱n ni Temi dwiyentu aya n ti̱n, ti̱ni mi̱n riye.
Mang babu dur mi̱nu mi̱n dwiyen aya wuka nii we ki̱bamidu. N ki̱n nang wu ki̱mwata ya̱me.
Mi̱n fwa chi mi̱n bi̱yili̱mu, nii wu ki̱da̱u ti̱kwa̱li yii miye, a ne bwaangduwe.”
We bi̱bu fal ni̱bu Yafudam a yi ko, “Ki̱ka̱ngu ni̱n yim ki̱fi̱bti we durmunu. N Yibrayim a bwa ti fa̱kuti Kwamayu, m mun mwiko ni ki̱ma nangangu ki̱ni ti̱kwa̱li yi mwite a ne bwaangduwe ko bayim.
Mun kamadu n la tenu n Yibrayim ma? N ki̱n a bwa ti fa̱kubi̱bu. We kamaku mwangu, m mun n wure?”
N Yesu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Ka mi̱n ni dur mi̱nu dwiyene, dwiyen mitu ti̱kusi. M Temi wu ti̱yalu ko Kwama chi̱ne, nang ni wu ki̱ni mi̱n dwiyente.
Kasi ki̱ku ta yim ki̱mbangu, mi̱n n yim. Ka n yi mi mang yim ki̱m be, mi̱n naba ti̱kwaniye. Aya n yim ki̱n mi̱n ma nangangu ki̱ni ti̱kwa̱li yii kitu.
N te chi̱n n Yibrayim a ma furi mwen ko, ka no we ka ku ki̱dang mange. N ki̱n a mwiti̱n, a ku a ma ti̱mi̱lan.”
Ni̱bu Yafudamu a yi ko, “Swa̱nti mwitu a lam ti̱bu wan tunu nang wu mwang yidu mwiko n ku Yibrayim ma?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱mu, yo a tibu bi̱u Yibrayime, a ya m mi̱n we.”
Kangu n chi a nwe bi̱bangu, a wo kali ko chi kwela Yesu, n Yesu a lai yikiyu, a chir a du Kan Kwamanu.
Yo n Yesu a yaki̱sude, a ku nii wu ni̱bu a bi̱u ki̱duwe.
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Tete, naba yungke, naba ki̱le n wure, yo ni̱bu a bi̱u nii wu ki̱duwe? Kano nang bwenga? Kanang bi̱bu a bi̱u ki̱ni̱ma?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “N ke bwe n keti̱ bi̱bu a bi̱u ki̱ni̱mu. Aya ki̱chitu wa fwe ko ke ni ku dukan Kwaman.
A mwintuwe nang ma nangang wa twiyengu, kangu fi̱la wengu. Kum ki̱bedu. Ka a benge, nii a neka yim ma chi.
Kweru mi̱n we ti̱ti̱ni̱nu, mi̱n nang yiiku ti̱ti̱niyangu.”
Yo n ki̱n a ri ya̱me, a ti̱bu ki̱tuumu a ti̱m, a lu ki̱ti̱mu ki̱ni ki̱tuumu, a wa ni wu mi̱n we nuiyu.
A yi nii wu ko, “Ya, yang nura nuiyu a mwe wa far Si̱lwam ka nang chikiye wutumre.”
Nii wu a yikan, a nura nuiyu, a ki̱lawe ki̱kudi.
Ni̱bu a fi̱lang chiyamu, n ti bi̱ba no yim ki̱n ki̱ka̱la̱ chimu, a bi̱u ko, “Wu n ke wu niyang yim ki̱sweda fi, ki̱ka̱la̱ chiya?”
Bi̱kamu ko, “N nangki̱n, bi̱kamu a yi ko, a chirkachirkane.”
Aya n ki̱n, n ki̱fwan a yi ko, “Mi̱n nangki̱n.”
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “M ma yire, nuyu a wudene?”
A yi chi ko, “Nii wu n chi ki̱yalu ko, Yesu we a lu ki̱ti̱m a wami we nuyu. N ki̱n a ya̱i ko n yika Si̱lwam n yang nura nuyu. N ya, n yang nurawe. N ki̱lawe mi̱n kudi.”
N chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Nii wu a fi̱re?” Nii wu a yi ko, “Mang yimbu.”
N chi a yikan, ki̱ni nii wa no ki̱duwe, a ya ni ni̱bu Farisamu.
N Yesu a lu ki̱ti̱mu a wude nuiyu we nii wu Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudamu.
Ni̱bu Farisamu fal, a bi̱u nii wa be a ti̱duye yinangu chitu a fwengu. Nii wa yi ko, “A lu ki̱ti̱m, a wa mi we nuiyu, a yiko n yang nura nuyu. Kangu mang nuranangu, nuyi miyu a wuden, mi̱n kudi.”
We fiko bi̱kamu ni̱bu Farisamu a yi ko, “Nii wu n ke naba Kwama, yo a ma nangangu Difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame.”
Aya bi̱kamu ko, “Nii ki̱ni ki̱letite ka medu ka ma chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱ta? Ti̱kuran chitu a lakan.”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n chi a ki̱latuwe nii wa no ki̱duwe, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mun yal ki̱nu mwi n wure, yo n ki̱n a wudu mi̱n nuiye?”
Nii wa yi chi ko, “Mi̱n yalu mi fa̱ku Kwama.”
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a kebu bi̱yili̱mu ko ni wa no ki̱du aya ki̱ka̱ngu ki̱kudi. Di̱ne yuko n chi a tum ni̱bu ko a yale ni̱bu bi̱bu a bi̱u ki̱ni̱mu.
N chi a bi̱u chi ko, “Wu nang bwe chi̱na? Wu nang bwe ta bi̱u ki̱duwa? A mayire ki̱kudiye?”
Bi̱ba bi̱bi̱mu a yi ko, “Bwe wuni̱n, ni̱n bi̱u ki̱du.
Aya na yimbu kanga ma ki̱ku diyangu. Na yim ti̱bu ka n wure a be ki̱ne. Ti̱bi̱u ki̱n, n ke bweti̱re, a lwe ka fwa chi n ki̱n a yimitu.”
Bi̱ba bi̱u ki̱ni̱mu a fwa yiko di̱ne, n chi ki̱wul tayi ni̱bu Yafudamu. Ni̱bu Yafudamu a tu a ki̱ka yi ko nii ka yidu ko n Yesu nang Masiya, ni̱bu ka chaki̱du we muraku ni̱bu Yafudame.
Nang chi a yo bi̱ba bi̱u ki̱ni̱mu, a yi ko, “Ti̱bi̱u ki̱n, a wi bweti̱rengatu.”
N chi a ki̱lan ki̱robang a yale ni wa no dwiyene, a yi ki̱n ko, “Fwa bi̱yili̱mu, ni Kwama dwiyantu, ka tiinti̱na di̱ni̱ne ni wa bene naba ki̱letiye.”
N ki̱n a ke chi mi̱n ko, “Ka naba ki̱letiye mang yimbu, chitu mang yimitu a no mi̱n ki̱du, a ya ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n kudi.”
N chi a bi̱ti̱ ki̱da ko, “A ma mi̱n wureni? A wudu mi̱n nuiyu yire?”
A ki̱nta chi ko, “A ma tu ma fwa chimi̱n ta nwebu a mayire? Ti̱badu ta nwe ti̱du ki̱da? Ka ti̱badu ta kau miyari̱m ki̱ma?”
N chi a yi ko, “A tu ki̱du wu nuiyu a wudene ko, m mun nang miyare ko! N ni̱n, m bi̱u Musa.
Ni̱n yim n Kwama a fwa ya̱mu n ti Musa, aya nang yimbu bwa wu nii a chirmi̱ne.”
Nii wu a yi chi ko, “A ti̱ya̱r mi̱n yi. A yi ko, kasi ki̱ku ta yimbu bwanu a chirmi̱nengu, a mwintuwe a wudumi nuiyu.
N ki̱n a chakakku ko, ni̱n yim n Kwama a nwebu twa̱ba̱ku naba ki̱letiyengu, aya ki̱nwe ki̱ka naba bunti̱kengu, wu ki̱ma chi n ki̱n ki̱badde.
Feredi niyang nwengbuwe, ko nii wu ni̱bu a bi̱u ki̱duwe, a ya beku.
Ka no nii wu, n ke wa chire a di̱Kwama, a no neka medu ka ma ki̱chitu wu.”
N chi a kaka ki̱n ko, “Ni̱bu a bi̱u mun, a ki̱leti, be mwang fwa ni mi̱nu ko wule?”
N Yesu a nwe ya̱mu ko, n chi a kaka ni wu. Yo n chi a tekane, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “N ke bi̱yili̱mu we Bwe Nii ya?
Nii wa ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, n ki̱na wure? N fwami ke n ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “A mwang tu mwang kui, m mi̱n nang wu ki̱fwa ya̱mu ti mune.”
Yinu ni wa yi ko, “Tewuduwe, n ke bi̱yili̱m.”
N ki̱n a sung a si Yesu.
N Yesu a yi ko, “N lewe ti̱ti̱nitu di̱ne ke m be, m mwata ya̱mu. Di̱ne ke bi̱bu ki̱kudimu a dwiyen, aya bi̱bu a kubu diimu a kudi.”
Tiyangu ni̱bu Farisamu we fiko, a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, n chi a yiko, “Mu yi ni̱nu mwiko n ni̱n ki̱duba?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ka no ti̱n ki̱dube, a no, ne ki̱leti we. Aya yo ta yi tiko n ti̱n n ke ki̱dube, ki̱leti chiyu a kabi yiko.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Bi̱yili̱m ka nii a fi̱la kwale, a lebu ki̱rana kwa̱re, ti̱kitu kutu n ti wurku.
Aya nii wu a le a kwa̱re, nang naba toku kwanti wu yile.
Nii ki̱to ki̱rane, ki̱wudu naba toku kwantiye mi̱nu. Kwantiyu ki̱nwe ker nii wu ki̱to chidi̱nu, ki̱yal kwantiyu ki̱ni di̱nbi ki̱chiri ki̱n, ki̱yikan tame.
Ka a chaku kwantiyu a chir fi̱lange, ki̱ti kakku. Kwantiyu ki̱nabi̱ ki̱na kuteng, di̱ne a me ker ki̱nu.
Kwantiyu a ne bunti̱ rungko, ka wul ki̱nu di̱ne a mebu ker ki̱nu. Kwantiyu ka yaradu ka du ki̱nu we.”
N Yesu a fwa chimi̱n ki̱ku baltaku aya n chi a swanbu chi n Yesu ki̱fwaditu.
N Yesu fal a ki̱la fwati̱ ki̱da ko, “Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n bi̱yili̱mu, m mi̱n nang kwa̱r ki̱ran kwantinu.
Bi̱ba tuiyimi kwang kana dabi̱kuum ti bi̱wuri̱li̱m. Kwantiyu a nwebu wuka nii we tibe chi.
Mi̱n nang kwa̱ru, nii ki̱ledu a di̱mi̱ne ka ya swiku. We di̱mi̱ne, n chi kani̱ng ledu ki̱chiru ki̱chau cham mu a nachang.
Daaku ki̱bedu di̱ne kuutu n ti chiku n ti wurku. Aya m mi̱n m be di̱ne ke n chi a ya ti̱kuri. Ti̱kuri ti̱ta lwei.”
“Mi̱n nang naba toke wu yile. Naba toke wu yile ki̱ni yikiyu di̱ne kwantiyu.

Naba toke wu ki̱ma nangang surenge, a ne to kwantiyu yinang fangko kwantiye. Ka n ki̱n a ku nam wubare tiyang bawu ki̱bede, ki̱wulu ki̱ du kwantiyu we. Nam wubare beka chi̱be kwantiyu, ka yai ti̱ni yak.
Nii wu ki̱ma nangang surenge, a wul di̱ne kwantiyu n ke yiki. Kwantiyu a bubu ki̱n ni̱r.”
Mi̱n nang naba toke wu yile. N yim kwanti miyu, n chi a yinti̱ mi̱n.
N yim Temi tiyangu n ki̱n a yim mi̱nangu. N ni ti̱kuri mitu di̱ne kwanti miyu.
Mi̱ni ki̱ni yikai kwanti we yiyu a newe ki̱ran di̱di̱nu. A mwintuwe mang bedu ki̱ni chi ti̱n. N chi ka nwe ker mi̱nu. Ki̱ranu kanodi diin, naba toke wiin.
Te ki̱mi̱layu di̱ne mi̱n ni ti̱kuri miye, ti̱kuri ti̱tu mang yiu ti̱nuwei.
A ne nii ka yitiye we, di̱ne mi̱n ni ti̱kuritu m mi̱fwan. Mi̱n ki̱ni dukanu ma ni ti̱kuri, mi̱ni ki̱ni dukanu ma yiti̱duwe. Te a ni mi̱n dukan di̱du.
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a yara yichiyu we fiko, ki̱tuka ya̱m bi̱bu.
Bi̱kamu a yi ko, “Naba fangmiye, naba ki̱fi̱btiye, ti̱wassa ya̱m ki̱mu a bwa.”
Aya bi̱kamu a yi ko, “Bi̱bu ya̱m n ke bi̱bu a naba ki̱fi̱btiyem. N chi a yi ko, naba ki̱fi̱btiye ka wudu ki̱du mi̱n nuiya?”
We chuwang kangu n Yesu a ya Yiye wurku a Wurchalima.
N Yesu a chir ki̱bwa̱lu we yifi̱la Kan Kwamane, a bale ki̱ni ki̱di̱ngu, n chi ki̱yalu ko, “Ki̱di̱ng Solomon.”
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a chire a be mura ki̱mi̱ntuwe a yi ko, “Fwa bi̱yili̱mu, laiyu chiwe, m mun nang Masiya naba yuke a ke ni̱n kamadu chi we?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “A mang fwa chimi̱n ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu. Chi ka̱ta̱kitu mang ma a dukan Teminitu ki̱yungdu ka m mi̱n n wure.”
Aya ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu di̱ne n chi̱n ta bunti̱bu mi̱n.
Kwantimiyu ki̱nwe ker mi̱nu, n yim chi, n chi a yinti̱ mi̱n.
Mi̱n ni chi ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadi, n chi a ne twiyaanduwe. A ne nii ka yitu chi we fa̱la̱ng mangu we.
M temi wa ni mi̱n kwanti yiye, a la chiti kwang. A ne ni a lwe ka yitu kwanti yiyu we fa̱la̱ng kange we.
Mi̱n n ti Temi a fi wine.
“Ni̱bu Yafudam a wote kaliyu ki̱da, ko chi kwela Yesu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, m ma nangi̱n Temitu nabwen ka ti̱yili, ti̱kwelayu a ki̱ki̱le?”
Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudam a yi ki̱n ko “Nang kwelambu di̱ne nangang ki̱yilang ki̱ku mwang mangu. Aya di̱ne mwang swa̱ba ne, m mun nii duri ki̱li, mwang yidu mwiko m mun ti Kwama a fi wiine.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mare a mwal we yilang Musangu ko, ‘N fwami n ti̱n yinang Kwamati.’
Ka a yal bi̱bu a be ki̱ni ya̱m Kwamamu ko kwamatiye, ya̱m bi̱li̱m bi̱bu a ne sute duwe.
A mayire ti̱yidu tiko, n swa̱ba Te, di̱ne ma yi mi, m mi̱n Bwe Kwama?
Ti̱kedu bi̱yili̱mu we ka nangi̱n ti̱tu mi̱n maditu n ke ta Kwamaye.
Aya ka mi̱n ma nangi̱n Kwamaye, kono ta kebi̱ bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne, ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we nangi̱ntu ta kuutu. Di̱ne ke ti̱swaan, ti̱yim tiko Kwama a di̱mi̱ne, m mi̱n a di̱ki̱ne.”
N chi a wituwe ko chi tau Yesu, n Yesu a chirtuwe tibe chi.
N Yesu a ki̱la ki̱ti̱ku la wurdune, a ya swe we fi n Yowana a no ki̱mang batisma.
Ni̱bu nabwen a nabi̱ ki̱ne we fiko ki̱fwadu ko, “Kasi ki̱ku n Yowana a mabu chi ka̱ta̱kitangu, aya kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye, wu n ki̱n a fwa a dur nii wune, bi̱yili̱m.”
We fiko ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yesu we.
Wuka nii we, di̱n ki̱nu n Lasa̱ru, a bubuwe. N ki̱n naba Betani, a bi̱n bi̱u Maryamu ke Marta
Lasa̱ru wa bubuwe, nang ke Maryamu we wu a kur Tewuduwe mi̱n ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱range, yinu a musu ki̱mi̱nti̱ nanikiyu ki̱ni ri durite.
N Yesu a ya di̱tumbi̱r we kebu Lasa̱ri̱m bi̱wuwiye ki̱mu. N chi a tum Yesu mi̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, wu mwang mi̱lane a bubuwe.”
Tiyangu n Yesu a nwengu, a yi ko, “A ne bwadi ki̱n. Burang ki̱ku n Kwama ka yaang dwiyen, yinu Bwe Kwama ka yati̱ ri̱kaku we mure ti̱n.”
N Yesu a mi̱la Marta ti keko wuwiye ti Lasa̱ru.
Yinu yo n ki̱n a nwe ya̱m burame, a ki̱la dati̱ yikai diti yurau.
A kuteng ki̱ku, a yi miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ni ki̱la Yafudiya.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a yi ko, “Tete, mun ki̱latidu we bwanu ni̱bu Yafudam a bau ka kwelanu ki̱ni kaliya?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “We di wiine, n ke awa kub chiri yuraba? Nii ki̱ya yayu ki̱ni kuko, a ne ngau bewure. N chi ki̱kudu ki̱ni yiiku ti̱ti̱niyang.
Aya wu ki̱ya yayu kume, ka ngau bewure, di̱ne n ki̱n a newe ki̱ni yiiku.”
A kuteng ki̱ku a fwaang ya̱m bi̱bangu, a fwati̱ ki̱da ko, “N fati̱ chire Lasa̱ru a da duum. Aya mi̱n yadu yamang kuku ki̱nu.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Tewuduwe, ka ki̱da duume, a ta̱ma̱ngu a ya.”
N chi ko kano n Yesu ki̱fwa duum bi̱bu ni kabadi̱mu. Aya n Yesu ki̱fwa bwa.
Yinu n Yesu a fwa chimi̱n ko, “N Lasa̱ru a lai kabu.”
A chakakku ko, “N nwe ta̱ma̱ng di̱ne mang newe bwa. A yi chi ko, bwa wu ka ni chi̱n wuka da wu ta ken bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne.” A yi chi ko, “Ni yika bwako.”
M Toma wu n chi ki̱yalu ko, ngabi burabe,
Yo n Yesu a lam fiko, a ya ko n Lasa̱ru a bwa. A ma ditiyi yaana we furu.
Betani a kwatuwe Wurchalima, a lambu siriyi yurabiyu.
ni̱bu Yafudam we fiko nabwen, a be ki̱kire Marta ti Maryamu mi̱nu we furi ki̱lina ya chiye we bwa ke chiye.
Kangu Marta a nwe ko n Yesu a lamengu, a chir yaka mwate Yesu a du Maryamu we lo.
M Marta a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe, ka no m mun we fiye, kemi a no bwabu.
N yim n Kwama a ne ko mi̱n chitu mwang bi̱ditu.”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Kemo ka kabati̱nuwe.”
M Marta ko, “N fwa bi̱yili̱m, aya ka kunnu di swan kute.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “M mi̱n nang wu ki̱kukku ni̱be, m mi̱n nang wu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye, nii a ke bi̱yili̱ma di̱mi̱ne, kono a bwa, ka kunnu.
Ka nii wu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye, a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne, a ne bwadu ki̱diya kwad. N ke bi̱yili̱ma?”
M Marta a yi ko, “We yiko Tewuduwe. N ke bi̱yili̱mu mi, m mun nang Masiya naba yuke, Bwe Kwama wu ki̱be ti̱ti̱niye.”
Yo n ki̱n a ri ya̱m bi̱be, a yikan, a ya yale keko wuwiye m Maryamu. A yi ko, “Naba yungke a be ki̱baddu ka ku numo.”
Maryamu a kaibu ki̱swi, a kuni ngi̱rtu a yika bwa a di̱Yesuwe.
N Yesu we finu m Marta a mwati̱n ki̱ne, a tibu le bi̱nu.
Kangu ni̱bu Yafudam a no be siku bwangu, a ku Maryamu a chiri furtu ki̱yikadangu, a bunti̱n ko kano ki̱yika bwa fure, di̱ne furi ki̱lin ki̱nu.
Yo m Maryamu a lam fi n Yesu we mi̱ne, a yari fi̱m we ti̱mu ko “Tewuduwe, ka no mun we fiye, kemi a no neka bwadu.”
Kangu n Yesu a ku Maryamu ti ni̱bu Yafudam a bung ki̱mi̱nte ki̱kira wiiniyangu, ki̱bune a tau ki̱n.
A yi chi ko, “Ti̱fur ki̱n a fi̱re?”
N chi a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, be da̱ng.”
N Yesu a ki wii.
Ni̱bu Yafudam a yi ko, “Ki̱ki wii di̱ne a Mi̱la ki̱ne.”
Bi̱kam a yi ko, “Yo n ki̱n a be ki̱duwe, a mayire n ki̱n a du nii wu a bwange?”
Kangu ni̱r Yesu a kaiyanangu, n ki̱n a yawe furu. Fura wure. N chi a yinge furu ki̱ni wuka ne ti kale.
Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱bi̱li̱n kale.”
M Marta wuwiye ke baki̱ti̱me a yi Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe, ka ma nunang, kangu wudiye yaana we furangu.”
Yinu n Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Mare n ya̱n mi, ka n ke bi̱yili̱me, mwang ku dukan Kwamanu.”
Yo n chi a wum kale we fure, n Yesu a kuku nuyu we di a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, mwang ma be tiyangu mwang nwe twa̱ba̱ki̱ mangu.”
N yim mun nweyi kwadu, aya n fwa ying di̱ne ke ni̱bu bi̱bu n ni̱n waremu a swan ko m mun n twiye.
Yo a ri ya̱me, a yali ki̱ni dukan ko, “Lasa̱ru! Chire.”
Kwa̱me a chire ki̱ni kaniyu ti naniyu a kwabakwabane we furu ki̱ni kulunu ni̱bu a fur mi̱ni̱nu wetuwe kabuko. N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱kwiran, a ya yayu.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam nabwen a no be ki̱si Maryamu, a ku chitu n Yesu a maatu. N chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yesu we.
Aya bi̱kamu a ya fwa ni̱bu Farisamu mi̱n chitu n Yesu a maatu.
Di̱ne yiko, wuduwe fansetiyeyu n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a yal muraku ti kwa̱l yilangi̱n. N chi a yi ko, “Ni ma wureni? Nii wu ki̱ma chi ka̱ta̱kitu nabwen.
N chi ko ka ni du ki̱n a chakakku ki̱ni nangi̱n ti̱te, kuuti ni̱bi kwang ka ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne. Ki̱chitu wu ka yo Roma beka yitu ni ti̱m chi̱remu ti Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu.”
Wuka naba nii we, di̱n ki̱nu n Kayafa. N ki̱n tikake Fanse, a yi chi ko, “Ta yimbu chi ko bayim.
Ka la chi nii wiin ka bwadu di̱ne ti̱m ki̱mu n ti ki̱ku kuuti ni̱bi ki̱ni kwang ka bwadangu.”
Ya̱m bi̱bu n Kaiyafa a ma fa̱kui wemu a kurbu a ni̱r ki̱n, n Kwama a yo, yade n ki̱n nang tikake Fanse we swa̱r di̱ki̱ne, n ki̱n a fwa ya̱mu ki̱yungdu n Yesu beka bwadu di̱ne kuu ni̱bu Yafudam.
Aya n ke di̱ne ni̱bu Yafudam n chikun, aya ke a ki̱bte bwesi̱m Kwamamu a yaran a yikai kuuti mu, ke a be a swe fi wiin.
A mwetuwe diko, n chi a do ya̱mu ko chi chi̱u Yesu.
Di̱ne yiko n Yesu a yati̱bu ki̱da kwa̱rikwa̱ri we nuyi ni̱bu Yafudamu. Aya a du bi̱nu a yika di̱kan bi̱n di̱da kwati̱n a di̱ki̱ri̱n. Ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Yifi̱remu. A swe a bwako n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu.
Yo Yiye yabake wa ni̱bu Yafuda a mwatawe, Kutiyu a ti̱m bi̱ki̱miyu nabwen a yika Wurchalima di̱ne wauwade wa dutu chiye, ka ya mi̱n Yiye.
N chi a le Kan Kwamanu ki̱babba Yesu. N chi a ti̱ran ki̱twaiyadu ko kano we beda?
Aya wuduwe fansetiyeye n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a tu a na yilang ko, “Kanang wuwule niye wa ku fi n Yesu we mi̱ne, a be fwa chi mi̱n ke chi tau.”
Yo Yiye yabake a du ditiyi yurukune, n Yesu a ya Betani, bwanu a di̱Lasa̱ru wa kukku a fure, a swe we.
N ki̱n a chau chabti̱tu we fiko ti ni̱bu n Lasa̱ru wetuwe. Marta nang ni a kera chabti̱te.

M Maryamu a kun a da̱u ki̱nung narding ki̱ni kwalba a wa Yesu mi̱n we naniyu. Ki̱nungu a ma fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng, ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱ru nabwen. N ki̱n a musu Yesu mi̱n naniyu ki̱ni ri dur ki̱nitu. Fi̱rfi̱re ki̱nunge a ri lo chibu.
Yinu n Yafuda Yiskariyoti, miyare ko wu ka kwa̱l ki̱ne a yiko,
“A mayire ni̱bu a ne mi ki̱nung ki̱ku ke ni ya ka̱mbi̱r sureti
N Yafuda a fwa ya̱m bi̱bu n ke di̱ne ki̱kur ti̱lusaniye, ti̱nti̱ne, n ki̱n daaku. N ki̱n nang wu ki̱tau swe ka̱mbi̱re. Ki̱ma kuti̱tu we a ka̱mbi̱ru.
N Yesu a yi ko, “Du ki̱n a yang chi n ki̱ni ki̱ne, ki̱madu di̱ne di furki̱ mange.
N ti̱n we n ti ti̱lusanitui kwadu, aya n ti̱n ti̱newe ti mi̱ni kwadu.”
Kangu ni̱bu Yafudam a nwe ko n Yesu wengu, n chi a be di̱ne ke chi ku Yesu ti Lasa̱ru wu n Yesu a kuku a fure.
Tikake fansetiyu a di̱ka yi ko chi chi̱ti̱ Lasa̱ru ti̱n.
Di̱ne a kuteng ya̱m kuki̱ki̱ kangi̱m, ni̱bu Yafudam nabwen ki̱ duwe chidu, ki̱ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱Yesu we.
Bafi̱nenangeko, nabwe ni̱be a no be Yiye, a nwe ko n Yesu ki̱yika Wurchalima.
N chi a da̱u ti̱kweni dabinotu, a chir ka mwate Yesu, ki̱ni bele. N chi a ma Yesu mi̱n,
“Osana!”
“Ko nii wa be ki̱ni dukan Tewuduwe naba delake.
Ko Mai Yisrela naba delake.”
N Yesu a ya be kurunge a fi̱l ki̱yaduwe, yinanga mwal ko,
“Ti̱wulu chi we, ni̱bu Siyona,
Mai chi̱n nang wu ki̱bedu a be kurunge.”
Miyari̱m ki̱mu a no swaanbu ki̱chitu wu, aya a kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a ya dwiyen we kunku futangu, n chi a kur chitu ni̱ba mwalitu, chitu a be fwe ti̱ni yiko.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a ku ki̱dangu n Yesu a yal Lasa̱ru, a kuku we furangu a chakakku ki̱fwa chi a fwetu.
Ni̱bu nabwen a yikan, ka mwate ki̱nu, di̱ne chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱tu n ki̱n a maatu.
Ni̱bu Farisamu a fwa ya̱m a dutu chi ko, “Kwati̱m, chitu a ma bwar. N chi ko, ti̱ti̱niti kwang ki̱bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱du.”
Bi̱kam we ni̱bu Yelenamu, a be ka sii ki̱nu we Yiye yabake .
Ni̱bu bi̱bu, a ya Filibu naba Betsaida wa Ka̱lili, a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, ni̱n baddu nang ku Yesu.”
N Filibu a ya Andi̱riya a fwa ki̱mi̱n, yinu n chi ki̱ni burako a ya fwa Yesu mi̱n.
N Yesu ko, “Ki̱swi Bwe Nii ka yin dwiyene a lam.”
Bi̱yili̱m mang fwa chimi̱nu, ki̱kwi chame a ne bwidu ka niyang fibu we ti̱mu, a bwabu a fwiti̱be, ka swedu a ne bwi bi̱kam. Aya ka nii a fiye, ka kidu, ni kadu nabwen.
Nii wu a mi̱la ti̱kurikite, ka kwa̱la̱du, aya wa mi̱labu ti̱kurikitu we ti̱ti̱nite, ka ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu.
“Wa ke ka siiye, ka bungadu ti mi̱n, ka̱be mi, ka swedu ti mi̱n kasi no a wuwule fi. Nii ka siiye, n temi ka ni ki̱n dwiyentu.”
“Ki̱ka̱ngu ni̱r mi̱nu a tureng, ma fwadu mi wureni? Kwama chaki we riye, we ki̱swi wu, aya dwi, di̱ne nang chi mang bemi̱ne ti̱ti̱niye.
Te, yiu dwiyen di̱n munitu.”
Ki̱dang kangu, ker a chire a dii ko, “Dwiyentu a tu a ki̱la bwa a di̱mi̱ne, mang yungti̱ dwiyen mitu ki̱da.”
Ni̱bu bi̱bu we fikomu, ko ki̱yale, bi̱kamu ko Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱m.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ker di̱du a be n ke di̱ne mi̱ne, di̱ne chi̱n ke a maka chi̱n n ke mi̱n.
Ki̱ka̱ngu ti̱ti̱nitu ka ya kabaku, ki̱ka̱ngu n Kwama yaka chaku tikake Mai ti̱ti̱niye n Setan.
A kutengu ka kuki̱yangu, yo ma du ti̱ti̱nite, ma yo ni̱bu kwang ka ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne.”
Ya̱m bi̱bu n Yesu a fwamu, ki̱yung ki̱dum bwamu n ki̱n yaka madi̱mu.
Ni̱bu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yilang Musang nangu a yung m Masiya a ne bwaangduwe. A mayire mwang yidu mwi ni̱bu ka kuku Bwe Kwama? N ki̱n Bwe Nii wu n wure?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Yiiki̱ku we ti chi̱n a baki̱swi bayim. Ti̱ya yayu, ti̱fi̱u fi̱la di̱ne ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu ka du chi̱ne. Ni ki̱yada ki̱liye, a yimbu bwa ka ngan dure.
Ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we yiiki̱ku, yo a tibu du chi̱ne, ke ti̱kau bwesi̱m bi̱bu ki̱yiidi̱mu.”
Yo n Yesu a ri ya̱m bi̱be, a yikan, a bau fi a swe we.
Kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n a ma chi ka̱ta̱kitu nabwenangu, bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱ki̱ne.
Ti̱ta fwe ke ya̱m fa̱ku Kwama, n Yichaya fwamu a ri. A yi ko,
“Tewuduwe, n wure a ke
di̱mwar ni̱nu,
A di̱wure wu n Kwama a
yung dukan yuki̱ne?”
Di̱ne yiko, ni̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Yesuwe, di̱ne ya̱m Yichayamu a chir a wuka fi ko,
“Kwama a yo ni̱bu mi̱n ti̱dui
we nui chiyu,
a yo ni̱tu chita bwa.
Ko ke n chi a kuduwe ki̱ni nuiyu,
a swaan ti̱duwe ni̱tu chitu,
wu ka ni chi li̱mbwi, ka wo ki̱ti̱m,
we di̱Kwama wu ka be chide.”
Feredi, n Yichaya a fwa bi̱bu di̱ne a ku dwiyen Yesute. Yinu a mwa ni̱bu we di̱Yesuwe.
A mwintuwe tikaketi kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu a ke bi̱yili̱mu we a di̱Yesuwe, aya a babu ka chiredu, di̱ne n chi ki̱wul tayi ni̱bu Farisamu, ko ke ki̱la a chaki̱ chi we muraku Yafudamu.
Nangki̱n, bi̱duumu ki̱mi̱la delaku ni̱banga la ki̱ka Kwamangu.
N Yesu a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Nii wa ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne a ke bi̱yili̱ma wa twiye.”
Aya wu ki̱bau mi̱ne ki̱bau nii wa twiye.
M be ti̱ti̱nitu, m mi̱n yiiku. Nii wu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne a ne swedu we ki̱liye.
Wa nwe ya̱m mi̱ma konge, mang mwata ki̱mi̱nbu mwataki̱ ti̱ti̱niyang, mang bebu be mang mwata ti̱ti̱ni mi̱nu, aya ke n yu chi.
Wu ka ko mi̱ne, ka koti̱ ti̱kwa̱liyi mite, bi̱yili̱m mi̱mu beka mwata ki̱mi̱nu we di swan kute.
Mang fwabu ya̱mu mang kura ni̱r mi̱ni̱m, aya kana bi̱bu n temi a yi ko n fwaam.
N yim yilang kangu nang wa̱re ti̱kuriye. Di̱ne yiko, chi mang fwaatu nang chi Kwama a yi ko n fwaatu.
Kangu Yiye yabake a mwatawengu, n Yesu a yim ko ki̱swi ko a mwata ki̱riyedu, kano ki̱yika bwa a di̱Te ki̱ne. N ki̱n a mi̱la ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi kwadu, a yung chi yinangu ka mi̱la chi nabwenangu.
Yo n chi a yaki̱ chau chabtu meete, n Setan a le ni̱r Yafuda Yiskariyoti bwe Simun, ko a ya kwa̱l Yesu.
N Yesu a yim ko n Te a du chiti kwang a dukan ki̱n. A yim ko ki̱be a di̱Kwama, ki̱ki̱la bwa a di̱Kwama.
N Yesu a kun we chaku chabtangu, a suku luke ko wu wuduwe, yinu a mu tawul we a taru.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ki̱n a yo mwe a kwa̱se, ki̱nura miyari̱m ki̱mu mi̱n naniyu, ki̱musu ti̱nu ki̱ni tawulu n ki̱na mu a tari̱nu.
N Simun Biti̱r a to n Yesu ki̱bedu ka nura yikiye, a bi̱u ko, “Tewuduwe, be mwang nura nani miya?” A yi ko, “Kwako.”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Mwang yimbu chi mi̱n maditu, aya mwang swaan chi mi̱n maditu we bwa kake.”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, a ne mwang nura yimiyu nani ko bayim.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mang nurabu nani mwiye, a ne mwang ya ki̱ti̱me we di̱ mi̱ne.”
N Simun Biti̱r ko, “Tewuduwe, ka yiko, nurami naniyu ti fa̱liyu ti duri kwang.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Nii a ru mwe, ka bau kana nuraki̱ naniyang,
N Yesu a yim nii wu yaka kwa̱l ki̱ne, nang chi a yo a fwa ya̱m bi̱bu ko, “Wuka we tibe chi̱n ki̱ni dutu.
Yo n ki̱n a nura nani miyari̱m ki̱mu a riye, a doti̱ luke we, a ki̱lan a sweswe. A bi̱u chi ko, ti̱swaan chi mang ma chimi̱na?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱yaliyu ti naba yungke, ti̱yal ti̱nu ti Tewuduwe, a le yiko, m mi̱n nangki̱n.
Ki̱ka̱ngu m mi̱n, n Tewuduwe chi̱n, m mi̱n naba yungke chi̱n, n nura chimi̱n naniyu. N chi̱n ti̱n yati̱maka yichiyu.
N yung chi̱n chitu ta ni̱n maditu, ya ti̱nang madi yiko.
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka̱be a labu Tewuduwe ko. Fandu a ne la ni wa tum ki̱ne.
Ki̱ka̱ngu ta yim bi̱yili̱mangu, ta ya delaku ka ti̱tume.”
“Mang fwabu ya̱m bi̱bu n ti chi̱ni kwang. N yim ni̱bu mang sutumu. Aya chi Ya̱m Kwamam a fwaatu ka ridu. Ya̱m Kwamamu a fwa ko, ‘nii wu mi̱n chau chabtu ware ka suliyu.’ ”
“Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu, ke ti̱siredu chi we yo ki̱chitu wu ka fwede. Ka a fwenge, ta yindu ko, ‘m mi̱n nang Masiya.’
Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka wuwule niye wu ka yiu wu ma tume a yiu mi̱n. Wa yiu mi̱ne, a yiu wa twiye.”
A kuteng ki̱ku a fwa ya̱m bi̱bangu, ni̱r Yesu a ma tureng nabwen. A fwa ko, “Bi̱yili̱m, wukane we tibe chi̱n ki̱yadu ka kwa̱liyu.”
Miyari̱mu n kawure ki̱da̱ng fate wa̱la̱t a yimbu ka n Yesu ki̱fwa ya̱mu a wuwule niye.
Wukane, wu n Yesu a mwan a mi̱lane a kwa ki̱mi̱ntuwe.
N Simun Biti̱r a yung miyare wuko ko, “M bi̱u Yesu, mwi n ki̱n ki̱fwa wure?”
Miyare wuko a ki̱re ki̱dwan n ti Yesu a bi̱u ko, “Tewuduwe, mu fwa wure we tibe nu?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “Ki̱danne wu yamang wulade, mang ni wu mi̱n fwade. N Yesu a dwe a ni Yafuda bwe Simun Yiskariyoti.”
A kuteng ki̱ku Yafuda a chau ki̱dannengu, Setan a le ni̱r ki̱nu. N Yesu a yi Yafuda ko, “Ya daatu, yang ma chi mun baddu mwang maditu.”
Aya we bi̱bu ki̱chau chabtu mu, a ne ni a yim chi, a yo n Yesu a fwa Yafuda mi̱n ya̱m bi̱be we.
Kangu swe ka̱mbi̱re a di̱Yafudangu, bi̱kamu miyari̱m a nwe ko kano n Yesu kiyi Yafuda ko a ta̱ne chabtu, ka ka ni ti̱lusanitu ti̱kan chiye.
N ki̱n fal tiyangu a yiu ki̱danengu, a chir ti̱n. Aya kum a ma ki̱dang kangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Yafuda a yikanangu, n Yesu a yi ko, “Ki̱ka̱ngu Bwe Nii a ya dwiyen, n Kwama a ya ti̱n.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Kwama a yiu dwiyentu di̱ne ki̱nangu, n Kwama ka be ki̱mi̱nedu ki̱ni dwiyentu a ne ti ke.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “Bwesi̱mi̱m, a ne ti ke ma du chi̱nu, ta baiyu a ne ta yayu, m fwa chimi̱n tiyangu ma fwa ni̱bu Yafudam mi̱nangu, a neta ya bwa mi̱n yade.”
“Aya ma ni chi̱n ki̱ku yilang ki̱fwiyang ti̱mi̱la yichiyu, Yinang kangu mang mi̱la chi̱nangu, Ti̱mi̱la yichiyu.
Ka ti̱mi̱la yichiye, ka nang wuwule niye ka yindu ko n ti̱n miyari̱m mi̱m.”
N Simun Biti̱r a bi̱u ko, “Tewuduwe, mun ya fi̱re?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “Ne mwang ying ya bwanu mi̱n yade. Aya we bwa kake mwang yadu.”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Tewuduwe, a mayire ne ma ying bumi̱n ti̱nu ki̱ka̱nge? N ke mang bwadu a kuteng mwang.”
N Yesu a bi̱u ko, “Ki̱kumang, mwang medu mwang bwadu di̱ne mi̱nna?” A yi ki̱n ko, “Bi̱yili̱m ma fwa mi̱nu Biti̱r, kware a ne ta̱ru mwang kwilayu ki̱da yitta, mwiko mwang yimbi̱ mi̱n.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ni̱tu chi̱ntu a kaiyaduwe, ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Kwama, n ti mi̱n.
Bwanu a di̱Temiye, loniyu we nabwen, ka no a newe yikono ma fwa chimi̱nu. Mi̱n yikadu yama ni̱n do chimi̱n fanti yiyu.
Ka n yikan, n do fanti Yiye, mang ki̱ladu be mang da̱u chi̱nu ni yikadu, ta swedu a bwanu m mi̱n we mi̱ne.
Ti̱yim wa̱re wu a bwa mi̱n yikande.”
N Toma a yi ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, nang yimbu bwa mun yade, nang ying wa̱re yire?”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Mi̱n nang wa̱re, mi̱n nang bi̱yili̱mu, mi̱n nang ti̱kuritu. A ne nii ka ya bwa a di̱Temiye we, ka n ke bwa a di̱ mi̱ne.
Ka no ti̱yim mi̱ne, ta yim Temi. Bwa kake fal ti̱yim Temi, ti̱ku ti̱n.”
N Filibu a yi ki̱n ko, “Yung ni̱n Tewuduwe, nang chi ni̱n badde.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mang tau mi̱n swedu ti chi̱ni fere, mwang swani ba Filibu? Wa kuye a ku Temi, a mayire mwang yidu mwiko n yungi̱n Te.
Ta kebu bi̱yili̱mu tiko mi̱n we Te, yinu Te a di̱mi̱nenga? A ya̱mu mi̱n fwa chimi̱ndi̱mu n ke bi̱mi̱m, Te wu we ware a di̱mi̱ne ki̱chake ya̱m bi̱bu.
Ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne. Ti̱ke ya̱mu mang yi chi̱n mi m mi̱n we Te, yinu Te we di̱mi̱ne. Ka ta ke bi̱yili̱mu a chi ka̱ta̱kitu mang tau mi̱n madite.

Bi̱yili̱m, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ka n wure wa ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱mi̱ne, ka mati̱ nangi̱n ti̱tu ma tau mi̱n maditu. N ki̱n ka ma nangi̱n ti̱tu a la ti̱titu we ki̱ka̱ngu, m mi̱n, mi̱n yika bwa a di̱Temi̱yengu.
Kasi no ti̱ti̱le chi ti̱tu ta bi̱du a di̱n mi̱nitu mang madu. Nang kangu n temi ka ya ri̱kaku we bwekongu.
Kanang ti̱ti̱le chi ti̱tu ta bi̱du a di̱n mi̱nite mang madu.”
“Ka ti̱ mi̱la mi̱ne, ta bunti̱ yili̱n mitu,
Mi̱n mang bi̱u Te, ka tume Fi̱ki̱m ki̱mu, wu ka swedu ti chi̱n ki̱diya kwade.
Fi̱ki̱m bi̱bu nang Fi̱ki̱mu ki̱yung bi̱yili̱m mi̱mu. Aya ti̱ti̱nitu a ne kedu di̱ne chi a kubu, a yin ti̱bu. Di̱ne a swe a di̱chine we chik ka ni̱n swedu we ni̱tu chi̱ntu.
A ne mang du chi̱nu a babuni, ma ni̱ng be chimi̱nedu.
Aya a ne tike, ni̱bu a ne kuyu we ti̱ti̱nitu, aya n ti̱n ta kuyu. Ti̱nti̱ne, di̱ne mi̱n wu kure, n ti̱n ta kau bi̱kuri̱m.
We di wuko ta yindu tiko, m mi̱n a di̱temiye, n ti̱n a di̱mi̱ne, m mi̱n a di̱chine.
Nii wu a yiu yilang mangu, yinu a tau ki̱bunti̱ne, nang wu a mi̱laye. N Kwama ka mi̱lati̱ ki̱nu, m mi̱n mang mi̱la ki̱nu mang yung ki̱n yimiyu.”
Yinu n Yafuda (N ke Yafuda Yiskariyoti) a yi ko. “Tewuduwe, na swaanbu ya̱mu mwang yi mwiko mwang yung ni̱n yimwiyu a bwin ti̱ti̱niti̱mu.”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Nii wu a mi̱laye, ka tau ti̱kwa̱liyi mitu, n temi ka mi̱la wuko. Nang bedu na swedu n ti nii wuko.
Aya wu a mi̱laibe, a ne bunti̱ ti̱kwa̱liyi mitu. Aya chi ta nwenge n ke ti̱mi, n ti Temi wu a tum mi̱ne.”
N fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱ka̱ngu m mi̱n we ti chinagu.
Aya naba makare ka nang chikiye, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam bi̱bu n temi ka tumedu di̱ne ke a suteyimu, ka miya chimi̱n chiti kwang, ka kur chimi̱nti̱ ya̱miyu mang fwaran ki̱dangu no chi̱ni wareyu.
N du chi̱n li̱mang, n ni chi̱n li̱mang mangu. A lakan n ti li̱mangu ti̱ti̱ni ki̱nidangu, ni̱tu chi̱ntu a kaiyaduwe, ti̱ka̱ta̱duwe.
Ti̱nwe yinangu ma fwa mi, mi̱n yikadu, mang ki̱late bwa a di̱ chi̱ne we, mang ya chi̱nu. Ka no ti̱mi̱laye, ta ma furi mwen, di̱ne mi̱n yika bwanu a di̱Te. N ki̱n a la mi̱n.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu yo chitu a tibu fwede. Ke yo ti̱chitu ka fwede ta ke bi̱yili̱m.
A ne ki̱swi manni̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱me we, di̱ne tikake Mai ti̱ti̱niye, n Setan a lame, kasi ki̱ku a ne dukan we a dur mi̱nangu.
A dakan ti̱ti̱nitu ka yindu ko mi̱n mi̱la Kwama. Nang chi a yo mi̱n ma chi a ya̱iyitu yinang ka dakange. N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱kun, ni yikan.”
N Yesu a yi ko, “Mi̱n yinang tiyang yinabe ki̱yilang. M temi nang naba toke.”
