Ka wuwule ki̱yange wa tubu chiye, ki̱swidu ki̱mara bwa, aya wu ki̱tu chiye, ki̱dodu ko ke a tu chitu yinang.
N ti̱ni wauwadu ki̱ka̱ngu, di̱ne ya̱mu mang fwa chimi̱ni̱mu.
Ti̱swe a di̱mi̱ne. M mi̱n nang ki̱yange yinab wuyile. Ki̱yange a ne tu chi, ka a ne bwi wenge. N ti̱n a ne ta ma chi, ka ta tibu a di̱mi̱nenge.
“Mi̱n yinang bwi tiyang yinabe n ti̱n yinang ki̱yangti. Wu ki̱sweda di̱mi̱ne yinu m mi̱n a di̱ki̱ne, ka kadu nang ki̱yange wu ki̱tu chitu nabwene. Ka n ke mi̱ne a neta medu ta ma chi.”
Kanang wuwule nii wu a sweba di̱mi̱ne, n ki̱n a lakabu ti ki̱yange a kusu niyang mar a bwa. Yiyu ki̱yangti a kau yimwari a ki̱rang.
Ka n ti̱n we ti mi̱ne yinu ti̱kwa̱li yi mitu a swe a di̱chine, ta bi̱u chitu ti̱baditu, mang ni chi̱nu.
Nang tiyangu n temi ka ya dwiyen tangu, ta tu ti̱kulantu nabwen. Ti̱tu ka yung ni̱bu ko n ti̱n miyari̱m mi̱mitu.
“Yinangu Temi a mi̱layangu, nang tiyangu mang mi̱lang chinagu. Ti̱swe we mi̱laku mi̱n ma chimi̱ndangu.
Ka ti̱bunti̱ yili̱n mite, ta swedu we mi̱laku mangu, yinangu m mi̱n mang bunti̱ yili̱n Tetangu, mang swetuwe a ki̱ke kongu.
N fwa chimi̱n bi̱bu ke furi mwen chi̱nu a dudu chi̱n we, aya ke furi mwen chi̱nu a ri i chibu.
Yilang mangu nang ki̱ku. Ti̱mi̱la yichiyu, yinang ka mang mi̱la chi̱nangu.
Mi̱laku ki̱duwang ki̱ku wuka nii a mangbuwengu nang ki̱ku, nii a ni ti̱kuri kitu di̱ne fati̱bi̱ ki̱m.
N ti̱n fati̱bi̱ mi̱m, ka ti̱ma chi ma yi chi̱ne.
Bwa kake, fal a ne mang yal chi̱nu mi ka̱bi, di̱ne ka̱be a yimbu chi Tewuduwe ko ki̱maditu. A la chi, n yal chi̱n mi fati̱bu. Kanang ti̱ti̱le ti̱tu mang miyawe a di̱Tewuduwe, n fwa chimi̱ni kwang.

Ta sutiyebu, aya m mi̱n n sutu chi̱n. N sutu chi̱n mi yati̱ma nangang ki̱yilang ki̱ku a ne kaiyadu kaiyaneng. Ka ti̱maye, n temi ka ni chi̱n kasi no ti̱bi̱u ti̱ti̱le chi ti̱tu ta bi̱du a di̱n mi̱nitu.
Yilang mangu n ki̱u, ti̱mi̱la yichiyu.”
“Ka ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nitu a ko chi̱ne, ti̱kur ti a mwe a ko mi̱n.
Ka no n ti̱n ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nime, ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu a no mi̱la chi̱nu ko m bi̱u chi. Aya di̱ne n ti̱n n ke bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nime, n ti̱n bi̱suturi̱m mi̱m, a yo ti̱ti̱nitu a ko chi̱n.
Ti̱tabu chitu mang fwa chimi̱nita? Ka̱be a labu Tewuduwe ko. Ka n chi a fuma mi̱ne, ka fumati̱ chi̱nu. Ka a ke ya̱m mi̱me ka keti̱ bi̱chimu.
Aya ta nwe wu riye di̱ne di̱n mi̱ne, n chi ka madi ying, di̱ne n chi a yimbu wa tum mi̱ne.
Ka no ma bebu ma fwa chi mi̱nbe, a no, ne ki̱le we di̱chiye. Aya ki̱ka̱ngu, n chi a ne la̱ta̱yi we a ki̱leti chiyu.
Wu a ko mi̱ne, a koti̱ Temi ti̱n.
N nangi̱ntu nabwen ti̱tu wuka ni a mangbuwetu, ka no mang mabe, a no kau chi mi̱n ki̱leti. Ki̱ka̱ngu n chi a ku chitu mang matu, a mwintuwe n chi a koi a koti̱ Temi.
Ki̱chitu wu a fwe ko ke a ri yili̱ntu a mwal a tatti̱ki̱dai Musatu ko, ‘A koi tuwe ying a ne ti̱kan chi we.’ ”
“Ka Fi̱ki̱m Kwama ma benge, wu mang tumedu we bwa a di̱Tenge, Fi̱ki̱m bi̱yili̱mu bi̱bu ki̱chiredu a di̱Temiyemu, ka ma di̱mwaru we di̱mi̱ne.
N chi̱n ti̱n ta mwayu we ni̱bu, di̱ne n ti̱n, we ware ti mi̱n feredi.”
N Yesu a yiko, “N fwa chimi̱n ki̱chitu di̱ne ke ti ki̱ladu kuteng we ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mang changu.
Ni̱bu ka naba chi̱nu we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamu. Ki̱swi ki̱bedu, wu nii ki̱chi̱u chi̱ne, ka kudu ko ki̱ sii Kwamange.
N chi ka madi yiko, di̱ne n chi a tibu yim Kwama ti Mi̱n.
Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ya̱mi yiyu, di̱ne ka ki̱swi a benge ta yindu ti̱kono n fwa chimi̱n.”
“Aya ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n yika bwa wu a tum mi̱ne, n ti̱n fal, a ne nii ki̱bi̱du ko, mu yadi bwa̱le we?
Di̱ne mang fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱be, ni̱tu chi̱ntu a kaiyan.
Aya ki̱ka̱ngu ma fwa chimi̱nu, a la chi ki̱ku mang yikadangu. Ka mang yika̱be, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a ne bedu, we di̱chine. Aya ka n yikane, ma tum chimi̱nedu.
Ka Fi̱ki̱m bi̱ba benge, ni̱bu ka swaan yile we chi ni yalu ko ki̱letiye ti chi a leitu we kabaku Kwamangu.”
Ki̱le chi nang di̱ne a kebu bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱ne.
Yile Yesuwe ka chakakku ti chi di̱ne mi̱n ya bwa a di̱Te, n ti̱n neta chakakku tani̱n kuyi ti̱nu ki̱da kwadu.
We mwata ki̱ku, di̱ne Kwama a tu a mwata tikake wa tau ti̱ti̱niye mi̱ne.
“Mi̱ni ki̱ni ya̱mu nabwen, a ya ka la chimi̱nu la ki̱ka̱ngu.
Aya yo Fi̱ki̱m bi̱yili̱mu ka bede, be ka maka chi̱nu we swangki̱ bi̱yili̱mangu, beka fwa chi a nwe, n ke bi̱ki̱m ti chi beka fwedu kake.
N ki̱n ka ni mi̱n dwiyentu di̱ne, chi ma fwa ki̱mi̱nitu, nang ti̱tu yaka fwa chimi̱nditu.
Chi n temi ki̱ne, kwang n ti̱ mi̱n nang chi a yo ma yi mi Fi̱ki̱mu ka yiu ya̱mu, ka fwa chi mi̱nde.”
“A ne ti ke, a neta kuyu, a ne ti ke ti̱n ta kuyu.”
Bi̱kamu we miyari̱m ki̱mu ko, “Ki̱bi̱bu ya̱m wurenim bi̱bu ni fwadi yemu ko, A ne ti ke ne ta kuyu, yinu a ne tike ta kuyi di̱ne miya bwa a di̱Temiyemu.”
N chi a chakakku ko, “Ya̱m wulemu ki̱yidu ko, ‘A kutengu baki̱swi bayimangu,’ ko chi a swaanbu bi̱bu ya̱m.”
N Yesu a yim miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱baddu ka bi̱u ki̱n ya̱m bi̱bu. N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ti̱bi̱be yichiyu we ti̱kwa̱li yitu ma fwa mi, A ne tike neta kuyu, a ne tike ta kuyita.”

N Yesu a chakakku ko, bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, ta ki̱wii ki̱ni twa̱ba̱bune, a ya ti̱ti̱nitu kani̱n mi̱la ka ti̱chi. N ti̱n ni̱tu chi̱ntu kanodi ki̱li, aya kaiyan ni̱re chi̱n, ka ki̱ladu, ka kau ti̱mi̱lan.
Yo naye a lam ka bi̱dde, ki̱nwe riye yinang, di̱ne bwe a suten. Aya yo bwe a chire, naye ki̱ma furi mween, ki̱ tabti̱ riye wa nwe, di̱ne n ki̱n a bi̱u bwe we ti̱ti̱nitu.
N ti̱n ki̱ka̱ngu ta nwe riye, aya be ma ku chi̱nu, nang yoko ta ma furi mwen chi̱ne. We ki̱dang kangu a ne wu ka yiti̱ chi̱n furi mwene we.
We diko, a ne ta bi̱i ti̱kan chi we. Bi̱yili̱m mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu, n temi ka ni chi̱n chitu ti̱baditi kwang a di̱n mi̱n.
A lanta ki̱ka̱ng, ta tibu bi̱u chi a di̱n mi̱ne. Ti̱bi̱u, ta yadu, ke furi mwen chi̱nu a lwe.
“M balta chi̱n baltane we ya̱mu ma fwamu. Aya ki̱swi ki̱bedu wu ma fwa chimi̱n ya̱m Temi kwa̱rikwa̱riye, a ne mang balta ti̱chinu we ki̱da.
We diko ta twa̱ba̱ bunitu a di̱n mi̱n. Ta bi̱u Temi n ti̱fwan, nemang bi̱u chimi̱nu.
Ki̱kumang n temi ki̱mi̱la chi̱nu, di̱ne ta mi̱laye, ta keti̱ bi̱yili̱mu tiko m be a di̱Temiye.”
N Yesu a chakakku ko, “N chire a bwa di̱Temiye, yinu n be ti̱ti̱nitu, ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n du ti̱ti̱nitu mi̱n yika bwa a di̱Temiye.”
Miyari̱mu ko, “Angso, ko ki̱ka̱ngu mu fwa ya̱mi kwa̱rikwa̱ri, mwang baltabi̱ chi.
Ki̱kangu ni̱n swaan ko, n yim chiti kwang. Kasi no ni a ya̱nbu ya̱m. Nang chi a yo fal nang ke bi̱yili̱mu ko n mun chire a di̱Kwama.”
N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “Ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu ki̱ka̱nga?”
Yinu a yi ko, “Ki̱swi a lame, a tu ma a lam wu ta yaradu, ta wulu, ta dwiyu we fi n kawure ka yika loko. Kasi ki̱ku mang newe m mi̱kunangu, di̱ne n Temi we wa̱re ti mi̱n.”
“Mi̱n fwa chimi̱n ki̱chitu wu, di̱ne ke ti̱ya li̱mangu a di̱mi̱ne, we ti̱ti̱nitu ta le riye aya ti̱mu ni̱ri kwing, di̱ne m mi̱n n la ti̱ti̱nitu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Yesu a fwa ya̱m bi̱bangu a kukku ka̱be ko a di, a twa̱ba̱ buni a yi ko, “Tete ki̱swi a lam riye a be. Ni bwemo dwiyentu, ke a ni mun ti̱n.”
N ni ki̱n dukanu we a ni̱bi kwang, di̱ne ke n ki̱n a ni bi̱bu a ke ki̱ni̱mu ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu.
Ti̱tu nang ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditu. Ke n chi a swani̱n, ko m mun nang Kwama wuyile ti Yesu Masiya naba yuke wu m mun mwang tume.
N ni mun dwiyentu we ti̱ti̱nitu, di̱ne mang ma nangi̱ntu mwang nii mwiko m maatu.
“Ki̱ka̱ngu Tete, ni mi̱n dwiyen ti̱tu no mi̱ni ki̱n we kakku mwangu fereditu, yo ti̱ti̱nitu a no swebitu.”
N Yesu a chakakku ki̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu ko, “Bi̱bu mwang ni we a ti̱ti̱niti̱mu n yung chi mun. N chi m bi̱u mun, n ni mun chi. N chi a bunti̱ ya̱m mumu.”
N chi a yim fal ko chitu mwang niitu. Kwang a be a di̱mune.
N ni chi ti̱kwa̱li yitu mwang niitu. N chi a ke, a yim ko, m mi̱ni̱n be a bwa di̱mune. N chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu ko, m mun n twiye.
Mi̱n twa̱ba̱du di̱ne chi, n ke di̱ne bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nimu, aya bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱m a di̱ mi̱nemu, di̱ne n chi m bi̱u mun.
Ti̱miti kwang n ti̱mun, ti̱mwitu n ti̱mi̱n. Mi̱n ya dwiyentu we ti̱tu.

A ne mang chakakku ki̱ni fiswe ti̱ti̱nite ki̱ka̱ngu, aya n chi we ti̱ti̱nitu. M mi̱n, mi̱n yika bwa a di̱mune. Tete wu wauwade, to chi bi̱bu mwang niimu ki̱ni dukan munu, di̱nu mwang niinu, ke n chi a kabi wiin yinangu n chi̱ni wiinangu.
Yo mi̱n no we ti̱ti̱nitu ti chiye, n to chi a di̱n mun. N to chi a ne wa laiye we ka n ke wu wiine a laiye. Ke a ri chi ya̱m Kwamam a fwaatu.
“Ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n ya bwa a di̱mune, aya mi̱n bi̱u ki̱chitu wu ki̱ka̱ngu m mi̱n we ti̱ti̱niyangu, ke ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ni̱mu a ri ki̱ni furi mwen.”
N fwa chimi̱n, ya̱m mumu, aya ti̱ti̱nita ko chi di̱ne n chi n ke bi̱ba ti̱ti̱nim, yinangu m mi̱n n ke wa ti̱ti̱niyangu.
Mang twa̱ba̱bu mi n chaki̱ chi we ti̱ti̱nitu, aya mwang to chidu we fakware.
N chi n ke bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nim, yinangu m mi̱n n ke wa ti̱ti̱niyangu.
Do chi wauwadu ki̱ni ya̱m mumu, di̱ne ya̱m mumu bi̱yili̱m.
N tum chi we ti̱ti̱nitu, yinang kangu mwang twiyengu.
N du yimiyi wauwadu ke n chi a ya wauwade. Bi̱yili̱m, n Yesu a twa̱ba̱ ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu mi̱ni kwang.
“Mang mabu twa̱ba̱ki̱ku di̱ne kana miyari̱m mi̱mu aya di̱ne ka wuwule niye wu ka ke bi̱yili̱m we di̱chiye, ti̱nti̱n.”
Tewuduwe, mi̱n wananu, maka chi a swe a fi wiine. Yinangu mun a di̱mi̱ne m mi̱n ti̱n a di̱munengu. Ke n chi a kabi wiin yinu fal ti̱ti̱nitu ka swaanu ko m mun nang wu mwang twiye.
Ni chi dwiyen ti̱tu mwang niitu, ke n chi a kabi wiin yinangu n chi̱ni wiinangu.
M mi̱n a di̱ chiye, m mun a di̱mi̱ne. Ke a dal chi a kabi wiin. Ti̱ti̱nitu fal ka yingdu ko m mun n twiye yinu m mi̱lati̱ chi yinangu mwang mi̱la mi̱nangu.
“Tewuduwe, niye bi̱bu mwang ni mi̱n ke a nang swedu ti mi̱n kasi no fi̱remu. N chi ka ku dwiyen mitu. Dwiyen ti̱tu mwang nii di̱ne mi̱laku mwang feredi we mweku ti̱ti̱niyang.”
“Tete wu wauwade, kasi ki̱ku ti̱ti̱nitu a yimbu munangu, n yim mun, n chi a yim ko m mun n twiye.
N yung chi mi̱n ka m mun n wure, mang chakakku mani̱ng fwa chi mi̱nu ka m mun n wure, ke n chi a ya mi̱laku mwangu a di̱mi̱nengu, yinu m mi̱n mi̱fwan mang swedu ti chi.”
Yo n Yesu a ri twa̱ba̱ki̱ke a kun n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu a yika yiki̱me wu a Kidrone. Lambu we wuka ki̱swi. N ki̱n a le fiko n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu.
Yade nang fi n Yesu n ti miyari̱m ki̱mu ki̱murande, n Yafuda wu a kwa̱l ki̱ne a yim fiko.

Kangu n Yafuda a yiu kwa̱l ni̱bu kuni̱nmu ti tikaketi chiyangu, bi̱bu wuduwe fansetiyeye n ti ni̱bu Farisamu a tumemu, a ya ki̱ni chi we yiki̱me wu. N chi a le fiko ki̱ni kuniti n ti fiti̱lati n ti kuli̱n kuni̱n.
Kangu n Yesu a yim chitu yaka fwedu ti ki̱nangu. A chire we yiki̱me wu, a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱baba wure?”
N chi a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Ni̱n babba Yesu wa Nasa̱rete.” N Yesu a yi chi ko, mi̱n nangki̱n n Yafuda wu a kwa̱l ki̱ne, we ware ti ni̱bu a tituwe fiko.
Kangu n ki̱n a fwa̱n ya̱mu ko, “M mi̱nangu,” n chi a ki̱lani kutengi bi̱nglang a yarana ti̱m.
N Yesu a bi̱ti̱ ki̱da ko, “Ti̱bau wure?”
N chi a yi ko, “N Yesu wa Nasa̱rete.”
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “A mang fwa chimi̱n mi m mi̱n nangki̱n. Ka ti̱baba mi̱ne ti̱du bi̱ba yikan.”
Yesu a ma ying ko ke ya̱m ki̱ma ri. N ki̱n a fwa ko, ma laibu wuka ko wiin we bi̱bu mwang niiyimu.
A ya Simun Biti̱r ki̱ni kul, a chake kuli fud a swi wuka ka̱be tikake Fanse ki̱n, a mwati̱ti̱ ki̱tele wa kang ki̱yilange wad. Ka̱be wu di̱n ki̱nu m malkus.
N Yesu a yi Biti̱r ko, “Di̱ki̱ti̱ kul munu we le. A ne mang no ki̱dang kwa̱sengu n Temi a niiyanga?”
Yinu ni̱bu kuni̱mu n ti bi̱duum fanseti Yafudam bi̱bu ki̱to semu a tau Yesu a kwaban.
N chi a mwe a yikan bwa a di̱Anana. N Anana tela Kayafa, tikake Fanse we swa̱r di̱ki̱nu.
N Kayafa nang wa no yi ni̱bu Yafudamu ko, “A mwintuwe wuka nii ka bwadu di̱ne bi̱kamu ni̱be.”
N Simun Biti̱r a bunti̱ Yesu n ti wuka miyare. Tikake Fanse a yim miyare wuko, n ki̱n a bunti̱ Yesu we bwa a sa̱ngka Fanse Wuduwe.
M Biti̱r a lebu kwa̱ru a ti a fi̱lang. Yinu miyare wu tikake fanse a yime, a ya fwa fwa̱nu ki̱to kwa̱ri̱nu mi̱n ya̱m. Wuko a du Biti̱r a le mure.
Fwa̱n ki̱to kwa̱ru a bi̱u Biti̱r ko, “M mun n newe miyari̱m ki̱ma, ka mun wenga?”
M Biti̱r a yi ko “Mi̱ni̱n newe miyari̱m ki̱mu.”
Ni̱bu tokumu n ti fanseti n ti ka̱bi a kuka ki̱rangu ki̱wullu di̱ne ti̱mu ki̱ni suyi. M Biti̱r a ya ti chimi̱ntuwe, ki̱wul ki̱rangu.
Tikake Fanse a bi̱u Yesu miyari̱m ki̱mu ti chi n ki̱n ki̱miyaditu.

N Yesu a ki̱nta chi ko, “N fwa ti̱ti̱nitu mi̱n ya̱mi̱mi kwa̱rikwa̱ri, kwadu mi̱n miyadu we kanbi muraku ni̱bu Yafudam n ti Kan Kwamanu, fi ni̱bu Yafudam be ki̱murandi kwange.” A yi ko, “Ma fwabu ya̱m bi̱laari̱mu.
A mayire mun bi̱iye? Bi̱u bi̱bu n chi a nweyimu, a yim chi ma fwaatu.”
Kangu n ki̱n a riin ya̱m bi̱bangu, wuka we ni̱bu tokumu a ngau Yesu mwa! A yi ko, “A mayire mwang fwa Tikake Fanseti mi̱n ya̱mi ye?”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka mang lelenge, n fwami fi mang le mi̱ne, ka bi̱yili̱me, a mayire mun ngaiyu we bi̱yili̱me?”
Anana a kwau Yesu chiku a tunga di̱Kayafa, wuduwe fansetiyeye.
Yo n Simun Biti̱r we ki̱wul ki̱range, n chi a yi ki̱n ko, “M mun wetuwe miyari̱m ki̱ma?”
M Biti̱r a yi ko, “Mi̱ni̱n newe miyari̱m ki̱mu.”
Wuka ka̱be tikake Fanse, wu namang we tibe chi ti wu m Biti̱r a mwatu ki̱mi̱n ki̱tele. A kukte ya̱mu we ko, “Ki̱mamidu yinangu ma kuuntuwe yiki̱me n ti Yesungu.”
M Biti̱r a kan ki̱tarangu a riye, kware a ta̱r ti̱n.

Ni̱bu Yafudam a fwiti̱ kunsiin we, a twa̱ku Yesu we kakku Kayafa, a yikan bwanu a kwabna wuduwe Roma. Bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a yikani̱mu, a swe a fi̱lang we sa̱ngka Kwabna, a ko a lebu sa̱ngka kwabna, di̱ne n chi ki̱bau wauwade wu ka chan Yiye yabake.
M Bi̱latu, Mai wuduwe, a ya bwana di̱chiye, a bi̱u chi ko, “Nii wu a ma ki̱le wureni?”
N chi a ke ko, “Ka n ke nii wu kwane a no ne nang be mi̱nedi ki̱n.”
M Bi̱latu a yi ko, “Ti̱yikani ki̱n, yati̱ kaba ki̱mi̱n n ti̱fwan, yinang kangu yili̱n Musatu a fwangu.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam a yi ko, “N ni̱ni̱n newe ki̱ni wuka da na chi̱u nii wu.”
Ti̱ta fwe ke Ya̱mu n Yesu a no fwa a bwakomu a ri yiko.
M Bi̱latu a ki̱lati̱ loko we ki̱da, a yi ni̱bu ko a be ki̱ni Yesu, yinu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “M mun nang Mai ni̱bu Yafuda?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Mun fwa chi mwang yimiya, ka wuka nii a fwa mi̱na?”
M Bi̱latu ko, “M mi̱n naba ni̱bu Yafuda? Kuu ni̱bu chim ti tikaketi fanseti a be ki̱ni mun a di̱ mi̱ne. N kai wureni?”
N Yesu a ke ko, “Mati̱n mita newe ti̱ti̱tnitu, ka no a newe yiko, mi̱n ki̱ni ni̱bu ka ma kuni̱mu, yoko bi̱duum fanseti ni̱bu Yafudamu a taiye. Aya mati̱n mitu n ke ti̱tu a ti̱ti̱ni.”
M mai Bi̱latu fal a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Yoye m mun maiya?”
N Yesu a yi ko, “M fwa bi̱yili̱m. Bi̱bemi ti beku ti̱ti̱niyang mangu di̱ne yiko. Ke n fwa bi̱yili̱mu, wa kwa̱l bi̱yili̱mi̱mu ka nweyu.”
M Bi̱latu a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Bi̱yili̱mu wureni?”
A kuteng ki̱ku a fwa ya̱m bi̱bangu, a chir a yika bwa ni̱bu Yafudam, a yi chi ko, “Ki̱kumang mayabu nii wu ki̱ni ki̱le.
Aya we da chi̱n, mi̱n kwi chimi̱n naba di̱bi̱ntle wiin we Yiye yabake. Ki̱ka̱ngu ti̱ke n kwi chimi̱ne Mai ni̱bu Yafudam?”
N chi a yibi kuuu! Ko, “N ke ki̱n, aya m Barabas.” M Barabas wu n chi ki̱fwade di̱bwilan daaku.
Yinu m Bi̱latu a ni ni̱bu kuni̱mu Yesu ko a twalan.
Ni̱bu kuni̱m mu a mu di̱ki̱ri̱n di̱du a kwa̱da a di̱ku we dur Yesunu, a yau ki̱mi̱nti̱ luke wu wurwure.
N chi ki̱yadu yaki̱sungdu ki̱dati kwang ki̱fita ki̱nu, ki̱siidu ko, Mai Sa̱i, Mai ni̱bu Yafudam ni̱n siinu, ki̱ngati̱ni wa̱b, we kabu ki̱ni fa̱li chiyu.
M Bi̱latu a chirti̱ fi̱langu ki̱da, a yi bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu ko, nang wu mi̱n be chimi̱nedi ki̱n, ke ti̱yim tiko ma kubu ki̱leko.
Yo n Yesu a chire ki̱ni kuli̱n n ti kwa̱da ki̱seli di̱du ni̱bu a yau ki̱mini̱ne. M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Nii nang wu.”
Yinangu tikaketi fanseti n ti bi̱kamu bi̱duumu a kuwangu, a bwe kemiyu ko, “Ti̱kukan, ti̱kukan.” M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱da̱u ki̱n, ti̱kukan. M mi̱n mang yabu ki̱le we di̱ki̱ne.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Ni̱nni ki̱ni yilang. We yili̱n Musatu a dakan ka bwadu. Di̱ne a yi ko, n ki̱n Bwe Kwama.”
M Bi̱latu a ki̱la ka̱ta̱n nabwen yinang ka a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu.
A ki̱latuwe loko, a ya bi̱u Yesu ko, “M mun naba fi̱re? Aya n Yesu a nibu di̱ki̱li̱n yiin.
Yinu n Bi̱latu a yi ko, mu nweyi tuna? Mwang yimbu mwi m mi̱ni ki̱ni dukanu ma yo kukaki̱ mwangu, yinu m mi̱n ti̱n, ki̱ni dukanu ma mari̱na?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “M mun n newe ki̱ni di̱kan dukan we dur mi̱nu ka n ke di̱du n Kwama a ni ni̱ne. Aya wa tungiye a kang mwange, a la chi ki̱ni ki̱letiyu.”
M Bi̱latu fal a no ke ka kwi ki̱nu. Aya bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu a yi ki̱n ko, “Ka m mar nii we, mun n ke fate Kaisare. Nii wu a yung dur ki̱nu ko n ki̱n maiye, kati̱re Mai wuduwe Roma.”
Yo n ki̱n a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a chaku chi mi̱ne Yesu. Yinu m Bi̱latu a swe we kwer kabaki̱nu, di̱da bu kalinu. N chi ki̱yalu ko, “Kabata” ki̱ni yi Yafudame.
Ki̱swi a lam fi a tibe diko, we di doku bwiyan Yiye yabake ni̱bu Yafudame. M Bi̱latu a yi ni̱bu ko, “Mai chi̱n nang wu.”
N chi a bwe kemiyu ko, “Ti̱kukan, ti̱chiu.”
M Bi̱latu a yi chi ko, “Mang chi̱u Mai chi̱na?”
Tikake fansetiye a ke ko, “Ni̱n newe ki̱ni wuka Mai ka n ke Mai wuduwe Roma n Kaisare.”
M Bi̱latu fal kangu chita bwa ki̱nangu, a ni ni̱bu kuni̱mu Yesu ko a ya kukan. N chi a tau Yesu a yikani ki̱n.
Yinu Yesu a da̱u ki̱tiyang bwangu ki̱tosada ki̱n fal, a yikan bwanu n chi ki̱yalu ko kasire, ni̱bu Yafudam ki̱yalu ko Kolkota.
N chi a kuka ki̱n we bwako n ti bi̱kam ni̱bi burau we ba̱li̱n kitu. A di̱ku Yesu a tibe chi.
M Bi̱latu a mwal mwarangu, a ku we di a ki̱tiyang bwang Yesungu. N ki̱n a mwa ni̱bu we chi n ki̱n a mwale ko, “YESU NABA NASA̱RETE, Mai NI̱BU YAFUDAME.”
Ni̱bu Yafudam nabwen a ke di̱mwar di̱du. Di̱ne fi n chi a kukan Yesuwe a kwatuwe bi̱nu, a mwali yii ni̱bu Yibraniyamu n ti yii ni̱bu Yelenamu n ti yii ni̱bu Romame.
Yinu tikaketi fanseti Yafudamu a yi Bi̱latu ko, a mwaluwe ko, Mai ni̱bu Yafudam. Ko n ki̱n ka mwalu ko, wa yiko n ki̱n Mai ni̱bu Yafudam.
M Bi̱latu a yi ko, “Chi mang mwalitu m mwal.”
Yinu ni̱bu kuni̱nmu, kanga ri kukaki̱ Yesungu, a da̱u kuli̱n ki̱nu a keran ti̱nti yana. Ka wuwule naba kune ki̱ni ki̱ti̱me. N chi a da̱uti̱ luke wu swa̱me wa kubu kuwe, wuki̱mari burume.
N chi yi ko, “Wu luke a neni keradu, aya a ma sutuku we, ke nii ka chade ka yiti̱nu.”
A fwa ying ke ya̱m Kwamam bi̱bu ni̱bu a mwal ko,
“A kera kuli̱n mi̱nu a bwiti chi,
a ma sutuku we a luke miye a ri.”
Ni̱bu kuni̱nmu a ma yiko.
Bi̱bu a tituwe ki̱tiyang bwamu, n ne ki̱n n ti wuwiye ke ne ki̱ne n ti Maryamu naye Kilobase. Yinu n ti Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala.
Yo n Yesu a ku ne ki̱n ti miyare ko wu n ki̱n a mi̱lane, a tituwe a ki̱tiyang bwange a yi ne ki̱n ko, “Nene, bwemo n nang wuko.”
Yinu a ki̱la yi miyare ko, “Ne mun nang wuko.”
Miyare a multuwe fiko a yikan lo ki̱ni naye wu.
A kute ki̱ku, n Yesu a yim ki̱ri nangangu, a yi ko, “Mi̱n nwe dimwen. Ke ya̱m Kwama ma fwamu a ri.”
Di̱kan di̱kuur a no we fiko ki̱ni mwe yinabi wu bwangbwange, n chi a da̱u soso yisobi a be di̱ku we mwe wu bwangbwange, yinu a da̱u ki̱kwale yisobang a kuku soso ki̱n a di̱ku ki̱mi̱n we yi.
Yo n Yesu a twaiye, a yi ko a ri. A mar duri kwa̱lba̱ng, a bwa.

Ni̱bu Yafudam a kebu kwa̱me ka lam Difi̱kare, di̱ne a le chi mi̱n ti̱n a diti Yei. Difi̱kare di wuduwe wa Yiye yabake. N chi a ya wana Bi̱latu ko, “A ni ni̱bu da a kiya naniyu we ni̱bu a ki̱tiyang bwamu, a si̱kte kwa̱miyu. Ko a dakabu kwa̱miyu kanodu a ki̱tiyang bwang we di wuduwe.”
Ni̱bu kuni̱mu a be a kiya naniyu we bi̱bu n chi a kukan ti Yesumu.
N chi a be, a ya Yesu a tu, a bwa. N chi a dutu nani kiyu ki̱ni ying, a ki̱yabu.
Aya wuka naba kune a turi ki̱ni yangu we bale kwiye kutubu. Bi̱nabi̱na, ki̱tuum ti mwe a chire we bwiyu.
Nii wu a kuwe a fwa bi̱yili̱m, di̱mwaru di̱yili̱n. A yim ko ki̱fwa bi̱yili̱m. A ma di̱mwar di̱du ko ke ni ke bi̱yili̱mu.
Ki̱chitu wa fwe ke ya̱m Kwamam a ri bi̱bu a fwa ko, a ne ki̱tiyangu ni̱bu ka ki̱da bwi kiyangiyu we.
A wuka fi ya̱m Kwamam a fwa ko, n chi ka da̱ng nii wu n chi a kure.

A kute ki̱ku, n yusufu naba Arimatiya, miyare wa babu ka yung dur ki̱ni kwa̱rikwa̱riye di̱ne ki̱nwe tayi ni̱bu Yafudamu, a bi̱u Bi̱latu kwa̱me Yesuwe ko yaka da̱du. M Bi̱latu a ke ki̱mi̱n. N ki̱n a be da̱u kwa̱me Yesuwe a yikani ki̱n.

N Nikodimu wa be mi̱ne we bwana di̱Yesuwe ki̱ni kume, a bungan ti Yusufu Arimatiya. N ki̱n a tatu kuli̱n furemi̱na fa̱la̱ng. N ki̱n a ya ki̱ni kuli̱n furemi̱n di̱di fi̱rfi̱ri̱n yinang mur ti los wu ni swe tureng kangu ka mwata swe bume.
N chi a dal Yesu ki̱ni yadi wu yile, a ma nangangu ki̱ni kuli̱n furemi̱ni fi̱rfi̱ri̱nu, ki̱ku n Nikodimu a ta̱nengu. N chi a bunti̱ yili̱n furki̱ niyangi ti̱ta ni̱bu Yafudamitu.
Fi n chi a kukan Yesuwe a kwati̱na lambu. Fur di̱fwin we lambu, di̱du a furi̱nbu wuka ni wen.
Yade ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱do bwi yiya Yiye yabake, n chi a yo Yesu we fur di̱du, di̱ne a mabu kutan.
M Maryamu wu a Maka̱dala a be bwa fure ki̱ni kunsin we di wu kake we difi̱kare. A ya ti̱ma worabu, a be a ku furu a wuden.
N ki̱n a wule bwa a di̱Simun Biti̱r ti wukane miyare, wu n Yesu a mi̱lane. A yi chi ko, a ne Tewuduwe we furu, niyang yimbu fi a yo mi̱ne.
M Biti̱r ti wuka miyare a chir a yika bwa fure.
N chi ki̱ni burako a wul. Wuka miyare a wul a suu Biti̱r, a be mwe a lam furu.
N ki̱n a mau nu, a da̱ng mure a ku kana luke ni̱bu a furi̱n Yesuwe we ti̱mu, aya n ki̱n a lebu furu.
N Simun Biti̱r ki̱nabu ki̱nenede, a be su ki̱ni fi̱rbu a le furu a ku luke ni̱ba furi̱n Yesuwe a ti̱m, we mure fure.
A ku yadi a no sala dur Yesu ne, a wuka fi ti luke wuyile a sali̱n bwiye.
Miyare wa no mwe beke, a leti̱ furu, a ku ti̱n, a ke bi̱yili̱m.
Aya ki̱ni yiko, a tibu fwe chimi̱nu ko, ya̱m Kwamam a fwa, ko, a mwintuwe, n Yesu ka kun ti̱nuwe furu.
Miyari̱m bi̱bu a du fiko a ki̱lati̱ lo.
M Maryamu fal a ti we kwa̱r furi̱nu ki̱kira wiini. N ki̱n a sung, a da̱ng furu.
A ki̱la ku ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami burau, ki̱ni kuli̱niti mwe a swe a fi no kwa̱me Yesu wemi̱ne. Wuka a bale naniye, wuka bwa dure.
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, naye, “Mun ki wule?”
N ki̱n a yi ko, “A da̱u Tewuduwe mi, ma yimbu bwa a yo mi̱ne.”
N ki̱n ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ridiye, n Yesu nanti̱ wu, a tiki̱mi̱ntuwe. Aya n ki̱n a swaanbu.
Yinu n Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Naye, mun kii wule? Mu bau wure?”
N ki̱n a da̱u ko kano nang nii ki̱do lambu. A yiko, “Tewuduwe, ka mun nang wu mwang da̱u ki̱ne n fwami fi mwang yo mi̱ne, mi̱n fal yama da̱du we fiko.”
N Yesu a yal ki̱n ko, “Maryamu.”
N ki̱n a sabran a ke ki̱ni yii Yafudame ko, “Rabi!” Ka nang chikiye, naba yungke.
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Tadu bwimiyu we, mang tibu yika bwa di̱ Temiye. Aya yika bwa kebu mi̱me, fwa chi mi̱n mwi mi̱n yika bwa di̱Temiye n ti Te chi̱n ti̱n, ti bwa a di̱Kwamamiye n ti Kwama chi̱n.”
Maryamu wu Maka̱dala a be a fwa miyari̱mu mi̱n ko, “N kuwe Tewuduwe. A fwa miye, ya̱mi yiyu.”

We diwu wine ki̱ni me, di wu kake we difi̱kare, miyari̱m ki̱mu a muran, a yingeti̱ kwa̱ti̱tu di̱ne n chi ki̱nwe tayi bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu. N Yesu a fwe chi mi̱ntuwe fwad, n chi a ku, a tibe chi, a si chitu ko, “Li̱me a be chimi̱ne!”
A kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a siin chitangu, a yung chi fa̱li kiyu ti kulangfwi. Miyari̱m ki̱mu a ma furi mwen kangu n chi a ku Tewuduwe chiyangu.
A kutengu ki̱ku, n Yesu a siiti̱ chi ki̱da ko, “Li̱me a be chimi̱ne.” Yina yi chi ko, “Mi̱n tum chi̱nu yinangu Temi a twiyengu.”
Yo n ki̱n a ri ya̱m bi̱be, a kubu chimi̱n Fi̱ki̱mu, a yi ko, “Ti̱yiu Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.
Ka wuwule nii wu ta du ki̱mi̱n ki̱leti kiye, a ya woki̱ ki̱ti̱mangu. Aya wu tadu ki̱mi̱nbe, ki̱leti kiyu a swe.”
M Toma wu n chi ki̱yalu ko, ngabi burabe, wu n wetuwe miyari̱m ki̱me a newe fiko ki̱dangu n Yesu a yangu.
Bi̱kamu miyari̱m fal a yi ki̱n ko, “Ni̱n ku Tewuduwe.”
Aya n Toma ko, “Ka mang twaibu fi ni̱bu a kuun kusa, ka mang twaiti̱bu fiko ki̱ni bewure ti kulang fwi ko, ko ka ma bwar, ma ke bi̱yili̱mu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku niyang da mi̱ni nari̱bangu, miyari̱mu n ti Toma a muratuwe. N chi a yinge kwa̱ti̱tu yingene. N Yesu a fwe chi mi̱ntuwe tibe chi fwad. A yi ko, “Li̱men a be chimi̱ne.”
A yi Toma ko, “Di̱ku bewuremo we fa̱la̱ng mangu, di̱ki̱tuwe kulan fwi, kamadu chiwe, ke bi̱yili̱mu.”
M Toma we fiko a ke ko, “Tewuduwe, Kwamami.”
N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Toma, mu ke bi̱yili̱m, di̱ne mwang kuya? Ko Kwama a yo delaku we bi̱ba ne kuiyimu aya ka ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mi̱nemu.”
N Yesu a ma chi ka̱ta̱kitu nabwen we a kakku miyari̱m ki̱mangu. Aya ni̱bu a mwalabu we wu.
Aya ni̱bu a mwal ti̱tu ke ti̱ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱Yesu Masiya, Bwe Kwama yinu fal we keku bi̱yili̱mang changu, ta ya ti̱kuri a di̱n ki̱n.
A kuteng ki̱chiti̱ wu, n Yesu a yungti̱ dur ki̱nu we miyari̱mu ki̱da a nabwe far Tiberiya. A yung dur ki̱ni ying:
Ni̱ba fikomu n simun Biti̱r n ti Toma wu n chi ki̱yalu ko, “Ngabi burabe” N ti Nataniyel wa Kana a ya Ka̱lili n ti Bwesi̱m Sa̱badi n ti bi̱kam miyari̱m n chii burau.
We fiko n Simun Biti̱r a yiko, “Ki̱yika taki̱u chi̱ngiyang, bi̱kamu ko chi ya ti̱nu. N chi a chir ware a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe,
Ti̱mu ki̱kwiyadi ba̱la̱ng ba̱la̱ng, n Yesu a fwe chi mi̱ntuwe a ki̱ti̱ku lang. Aya miyari̱ma swaanbu ko nang Yesu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Kal tayon, ti̱ya chi̱ngiya?”
N chi a yi ko, “Ngango.”
Yinu n ki̱n a yi ko, “Ti̱mai dwa̱ka chingiye a bale kang ki̱yilange we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ta yadu.”
N chi a marti̱n, n chi a wo chingiyu we dwa̱ka nabwen. N chi a yabu da yinangu ka wuwedu ka yodu a kwa̱mbi̱re mwengu.
Miyare wu n Yesu a mi̱lane we fiko a yi Simun ko, “Wu n Tewuduwe.”
Kangu Simun Biti̱r a nweeng ya̱m bi̱bangu a da̱u luke ko a yau, a kuna rituwe mwe.
Bi̱kamu miyari̱m a yika ki̱ti̱ku langu kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ki̱wuba dwa̱ka wu n chi a tau mi̱ne chingiye, ki̱ni chingiyi chibu. Ki̱ti̱ku langu a no mabu kutan, kano naniyu kuul.
N chi ki̱chiredu we mwe a kuti̱ ki̱rangu ki̱ni ti̱kobi we fiko. Chi̱ngi ti ki̱danne we a ki̱rangu.
N Yesu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱be ki̱ni yikai chi̱ngi, yiyu ta tau ki̱ka̱ngiyu.”

Yinu n simun Biti̱r a le Kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a siye, a be ki̱ti̱ki̱ ki̱ni chingiyu n chi a tayu we mure. Dwa̱ka chingiye a ri ki̱ni ka chi̱ngi yidui. Chingiyu kuul ki̱ni ti̱wan tuunu chiri yitta. Ki̱ni nabwe chingiye wu dwa̱ka a gi̱rabu.
Yinu n Yesu fal a yi chi ko, “Ti̱be ti̱chiku tumu. We miyari̱m ki̱mu a ne wu, a ru ni̱ru, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, n ki̱n n wure we. Di̱ne n chi a yim ko nang Tewuduwe.”
N chi a yim ko n Yesu.
Yinu fal n Yesu a ya da̱u ki̱danne a ni chi, a da̱u chingiyu a niti̱ chi.
Ki̱ku ki̱dang ki̱tarang yinangu n Yesu ki̱yung dur ki̱nu a kutengu a kun a furangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a si̱kiu tumangu, n Yesu a bi̱u Simun Biti̱r ko, “Simun bwe Yowana m mi̱lai a la ti̱kantu chii kwanga?”
N Simun Biti̱r a ke ko, “Ngo, Tewuduwe a mwang yim kangu mang mi̱lanangu.”
N Yesu yi ki̱n ko, “To kwanti yiti̱riyu.”
N Yesu a bi̱ti̱ ki̱da ko, “Simun bwe Yowana, mun mi̱laya?”
A ke ko, “Ngo, Tewuduwe, a mwang yim mi̱n mi̱lanu.”
N Yesu a yiti̱ ki̱da ko, “To kwantimiyu.”
We ki̱tarangu, n Yesu a bi̱u Biti̱r ko, “Simun bwe Yowana, mun mi̱laya?”
M Biti̱r a kaiyan ni̱ru, di̱ne n Yesu a bi̱u ki̱n ki̱da yitta ko, “Mun mi̱laya?”
N ki̱n fal a ke ko Tewuduwe, “A mwang yim chiti kwang. N yim mwiko mi̱n mi̱lanu.” N Yesu a yi ki̱n ko, “Nangki̱n, tabi̱du kwantimiyu we, tomi.

Mang fwa mi̱n bi̱yili̱mu, yo ni a bwelene, ki̱do kuli̱nu n ki̱fwan, ki̱yati̱ bwa n ki̱n a ku diye. Aya yo ka̱ra̱nta be, mwang kuku fa̱liyu wuka nii ka domi̱n kuli̱nu ka yadi ki̱ni mun a bwa no mwang babbe.”
N Yesu a fwa ya̱m bi̱bu ko ke ki̱yung ki̱dum bwamu n Biti̱r ka madu ke a ni Kwama dwiyeni̱mu. A kuteng ya̱m bi̱bangu. N Yesu a yi Biti̱r ko, bumiti̱n.

M Biti̱r a sabran a da̱ng kutengu, a ku miyare n Yesu a mi̱lane ki̱nabu chidu. Wu nang miyare wa ching bwikiyu a kwiye Yesu we ki̱da̱ng Yiye yabakenge. N nang wu a bi̱u ko, “Wa Tewuduwe, n wure yaka kwa̱li̱nu.”
Kangu m Biti̱r a kuwangu, a bi̱u Yesu ko, “Tewuduwe wu nide?”
N Yesu a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Ka mang ke nii wu, ka dadu ka lami̱nti̱ di ki̱lake miye, lwangang mwang wenga? Muni̱n bumite.”
Ya̱m bi̱bu fal a le ki̱ti̱radu we ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ Yesumu ko, miyare wa ne bwadu. A yi ko, ka mang ke nii wu ka dadu ka lami̱nti̱ di ki̱lake miye, lwangang mwang wenga?
Wu nang miyare wu ki̱ni di̱mwar we dur ti̱chitu wune, wa mwal ti̱chitu wu mwale. Ya̱m ki̱mu ni yim bi̱yili̱m.
Aya ti̱kantu chi ti̱tu n Yesu a maatu nabwen. Ka no ka mwalu ki̱ni kwange, mi̱n kamadu, kono nang ti̱ti̱nitu a no ne ka da̱u tati̱ki̱dayu ni̱bu a no mwa̱liyu.
Tiyofilu, we yo mang mwe mang mwal mi̱ne, m mwal mi̱n ki̱ni kwang chitu n Yesu a mwe ki̱madu, ki̱yung ti̱nitu.
Yinu a lami̱ntu dii a da̱u ki̱n a yikan bwa diye, a kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a ngau fandubu mi̱n ki̱kure we wa̱re Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame.
A kuteng riye kongu, yo a kun we fure, a ma ditiyu wan taana we ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱yung yikiyu we miyari̱mu ko n ki̱n we ki̱ni ti̱kuritu ki̱mwati̱ ya̱m Kwamamu.
Wuka di yo n ki̱n a swe ware ti chiye, a wu chimi̱n ki̱tele ko, “Ti̱dudu Wurchalima we, ka lami̱ntu ki̱swi Tewuduwe ka tume Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu, yinangu mang fwa chimi̱n ferediyangu.”
N Yowana a ma batisma ki̱ni mwe, aya we ditiyu ki̱bediyu, n Kwama ka ma chimi̱n batisma ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
Yo miyari̱mu a muran n ti Yesu we, a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Tewuduwe, ki̱ka̱ngu be mwang ru ni̱mi̱n mati̱n ni̱ntu, n ni̱n Yisrela?”
N Ki̱n a yi chi ko, “A ne lwangang chang we, ditiyu n ti ki̱switiyu ki̱chitu wu ka fweendiyu.
Aya ta ya dukanu yo Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu ka bedu we di̱chi̱ne. Di̱ne yiko, ta kau ni̱bu mwari̱m mi̱m we Wurchalima n ti Yafudiya n ti Samariya n ti ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni kwang,”
A kuteng ki̱ku a fwa bi̱bangu, a da̱u ki̱n we nui chiyu, yinu di̱twin a da̱uki̱n, n chi a kuti̱bi̱ ki̱n ki̱da.
Kangu n chi a kur nuyu ki̱da̱ng twiyengu, bi̱nabi̱na ni̱bi burau a fwe chimi̱ntuwe fiko ki̱ni kuli̱ni mwemwe.
N chi a bi̱u ko, “Ni̱bu Ka̱lili, a mayire ta ti ti̱da̱ng twiye? N Kwama a da̱u Yesu we di̱chine a yika dii, aya wuka di ka ki̱ladu a wa̱re wiine wu ta ku a yikamine.”
Yinu miyari̱m Yesumu a duwe di̱kun Setunu, a ki̱la Wurchalima wu kutanu kilomita wiin we difi̱kare.

Yo n chi a lame, a ya fi̱l kan di̱du a diin we lo n chi a no ki̱ sweende. Di̱mbi chitu m Biti̱r n ti Yowana n ti Yakubu n ti Andi̱riya n ti Filibu n ti Toma n ti Bartolomi n ti Matta n ti Yakubu bwe Alfiyus n ti Simun wu n chi ki̱yidu ko ki̱bau ti̱m chime n ti Yafuda bwe Yakube.
N chi ki̱muradu a fiwiine, ki̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu n ti Maryamu ne Yesuwe n ti bi̱kam nati̱bu nabwen n ti kebu Yesumu.
We diti yikiyu, kebu ni̱bu bunti̱kumu a muran kuul ki̱ni wan turab a fiwiine. M Biti̱r a kun a fwa ya̱m ko,
“Kebu mi̱m, ya̱m Kwamamu a dakan ka ridu bi̱bu Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam a fwa feredi a yii Fa̱ku Dauda we ya̱m Yafuda wu a ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu mi̱ne kakke bi̱bu ka tau Yesumu.
N Yafuda a no we ti chi̱ni, yinu a mati̱ nangang Kwamangu ware n ti chi̱ni.”
[N Yafuda a ta̱n kuu ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱r ni̱r di̱yani̱n ki̱nu, nanti̱ kuu n ki̱n a ya bwa mi̱ne. Yatu kitu a chire fi̱lang di̱ne fur ki̱nu a fwe.
Ya̱m bwa komu a ti̱ran we Wurchalima kwang. N chi a yal fiko ki̱ni yii Aramaya ko, Akaldama ka nang chikiye kuu ki̱tume.]
M Biti̱r a chakakku ko, “A mwal we taki̱da Sabura ko,
‘Ti̱du fiiko a kau kanglo,
ta kebu wuka nii
a swedu we mure.
Wuka nii ka sute ki̱nu.’
“Di̱ne yiko, a dakan ni sutu ni wu ka sute Yafuda. Ni da̱ngdu we bi̱bari̱mu we ware n ti chi̱ni ki̱dangu niyang swe n ti Tewuduwe Yesuwangu.
A mwetuwe ki̱dangu n Yowana a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma a lanta dii a da̱u ki̱n we tibe chire, kasi no n wure ni swadde ka kau naba di̱mware we kungku Yesuwangu.”
Yinu n chi a chake ni̱bi burau. N Yusufu wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko m Barsaba, a wu ki̱yal ti̱nu ko n Yustu n ti Matiya.
Yinu n chi a twa̱ba̱ bunitu ko, “Tewuduwe, mun n yim ni̱tu ni̱nti kwang. Yung ni̱n we bi̱bi burabi̱mu ni mwang swabe.
Wu ka chakakku ki̱ni nangang fandu ki̱ku n Yafuda a mar yinu a yika bwanu a daka ki̱ne.”
Yinu n chi a ma sutuku we bi̱bi burabi̱mu. N chi a sutu Matiya wu a be a rii fandubu kub chiri wiine.
Yo di Fentikos a lame, n chi ki̱ni kwang a muran a fiwiine.
Bi̱nabi̱na di̱kan ker a chire a bwa diye yinang si̱ki̱n di̱dun a ri lo ki̱ni kwang, finu n chi ki̱sweende.
Yinu n chi a ku ti̱kan chi yinang ben ki̱rangin a keran a sub we dur ka nang wuwule niye.
N chi a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu, a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱miyu ki̱ni yikai yiini, yinangu Fi̱ki̱mu a ni kawure ki̱ti̱me ya̱mengu.
Ki̱dang kangu bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu ki̱nwe tayi Kwamamu ki̱swedu we Wurchalima, kuu ni̱be bi̱bu a chire a kasi no a bi̱bi̱le ti̱m we ti̱ti̱niti̱mu.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a be di̱ne ker chi ka̱ta̱kin di̱du n chi a nwenu. N chi a be, a nwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yiini bi̱ntu chi.
Chitu a ya̱r chi yii, n chi ki̱fwadu ko, “Ni̱bu bi̱bu n ke ni̱bu a Ka̱lilima?”
Yinu a ma yire ni nwedu, n kawure ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yii chire?
N chi̱ni ni̱bu Fartiyam n ti Madinam n ti Yelmam n ti ni̱bu Mesofotanam n ti Yafudam n ti Kafadokiyam, n ti Fontum n ti Asiyam,
n ti Firichiyam n ti Famfiliyam n ti Masari̱m n ti bi̱bu a ki̱dire Sayiri̱m wu a ti̱m Libiyame n ti rungko a ti̱m Romamu.
Ni̱bu Yafudam n ti bi̱bu a wo ki̱ti̱m a kau Yafudame. Ki̱retan n ti ni̱bu Larabamu, ki̱nwe chi ya̱r yii ti̱tu a dukan Kwama n chi ki̱fwadu ki̱ni yiinitu.
Chitu a ya̱r chi yii a kwala chi maki, n chi ki̱bi̱bedu ko, “Ti̱tu wureni?”
Aya bi̱kamu a le ki̱fi miyari̱mu fiye ko, “Yim ki̱ma ni̱bu bi̱bu!”

Yinu m Biti̱r a kun we ki̱tuu ni̱be a ti n ti miyari̱mi kub chiri wiini̱mu a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti bi̱bu ki̱swedu a Wurchalimamu, ti̱si ki̱teliyu, ti̱nwe chi mang fwa chimi̱nditu.
Ni̱bu bi̱b u a nobu chi, yinangu ti̱kamadangu, ki̱swi a fi turkube, a ma si̱n.
Aya ti̱tu nang chi fa̱ku Kwama n Yowel a fwaatu.”
N Kwama a yi ko, we diti swan kuteyu,
“Mang kure Fi̱ki̱m
we ni̱bi kwang,
Bi̱bari̱m chimu n ti bi̱wuti̱mu
ka mwa ya̱m mi̱mu.
Kal tayon chi̱nu ka ma dwakam
bi̱bu a chire a di̱Kwamam.
Yinu seli̱bu chimu ka
ma fa̱kui a dwakam.”
Ki̱kumang, kono nang diti yikiyu,
“Mang fwale Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu
we ka̱bi bi̱bari̱mu n ti bi̱wuti̱mu.
Ka ma fa̱kui we chi ka fweditu.”
Mang yung chi ka̱ta̱kitu we twiye,
n ti chi ya̱r yiitu we ti̱ti̱nitu,
Kanang chikiye ki̱tuum n ti ki̱rang,
ti ti̱dali̱ni ywa̱ni.
Yinu dii ka kadi ki̱li
Swangu ka kadi wur yinang ki̱tuum,
Ka lami̱nti̱ di ki̱lake Tewuduwe,
di wuduwe Kwama.
Yinu ka nang wuwule niye wu ka yalu we di̱n Tewuduwe ne, ka ya yuki̱ku.

Ni̱bu Yisrelamu ti̱ nwe, N Yesu naba Nasa̱ret ni wu n Kwama a yung chi̱n ko ki̱ke ki̱ne. N Kwama a yung ti̱tu a nabwe chi ya̱r yii n ti chi ka̱ta̱ki n ti di̱mwalu a yung a di̱Yesuwenu, kangu n ti̱ni ti̱fwan ta yimangu.
N Kwama a ni chi̱n nii wu a ki̱ke ko n ti yingku kang. Ti̱chiu ki̱n, a Fa̱li ni̱bu ki̱leti̱m.
Aya n Kwama a kuki̱ ki̱n we bwa, a yu ki̱n we kwaku tuwang ki̱ku a riyengu, di̱ne a ne wa̱re we bwa ka tau ki̱nu we furu.
Nangki̱n, n Dauda a fwa ya̱m we dur ki̱nu ko,
“Mi̱n ku Tewuduwe
kwadu we kakku mangu.
Di̱ne n ki̱n we kang ki̱yilang
mangu, a ne mang nwe tayi.”
Di̱ne yiko ni̱r mi̱nu ki̱ma ti̱mi̱lan,
ben mi̱nu ki̱kaba teni ti̱mi̱lani,
bwi miyu ka swedu ki̱ni yo ni̱re.
Nangki̱n, ne mwang duiyu we furu, ti̱nti̱ne ne mwang du nimo wu wauwade ka fwidu we furu.
Mun n yungi ki̱swa̱ti wa̱ri ti̱kuriyu, mwang riyu ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan we kakku mwangu.
“Kebu mang fwa chimi̱n ya̱mi kwa̱rikwa̱ri we di̱tuke chire n Dauda. N ki̱n a bwa, ni̱bu a fur ki̱n, yinu fur ki̱nu n we n ti chi̱ni a lanta di.
Aya n ki̱n fa̱ku, yinu a yim ko n Kwama a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱m bwa̱ki̱mu ki̱ni di̱twa̱mbi̱r ko, ka yo wuka nii we ki̱kuwang kangu ka kau Masiya.
Yinangu Dauda a swanangu, a fwa ya̱mu we kunku Masiyangu ko, a ne du ki̱nu we furu yinu bwi kiyu a ne fwidu we furu.
N Kwama a kukku Yesu we bi̱bwari̱mu, n chi̱ni kwang ka ni̱bu mwari̱m ki̱m we ti̱tu.

A ni ki̱n dwiyen we fa̱la̱ng ki̱yilang Kwamangu, yinu n ki̱n a yiu Fi̱ki̱m bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu we Te yinang ka bwa̱bangu. Ki̱ka̱ngu n ki̱n a kure fi̱ki̱mu a di̱ chire. Nang chi a be ki̱ni chi ti̱kuditu n ti ti̱tu ti̱nweditu.”
Di̱ne wu a yika diye n ke Dauda, aya n ki̱n a yi ko,
N Kwama a yi Tewuduwe mi ko,
“Swe a kang ki̱yilang mangu.”
Ka lami̱ti̱ yo ta fau fakwarbu chimu a nani chiye.
Di̱ne yiko, “Ni̱bu Yisrelamu ti̱yim ti n Yesu wu ta kukane, n Kwama a yo ki̱n Tewuduwe n ti Masiya.”
Kangu n chi a nwe bi̱bangu, ya̱mu a twai chi yinu n chi a bi̱u Biti̱r n ti bi̱kamu fandubu Yesumu ko, “Kebu, nang ma wureni?”
M Biti̱r a yi chi ko, “Ti̱wo ki̱ti̱m, n kawure a ma batisma a di̱n Yesu Masiya ke a ya duku ki̱letiyangu. Yinu ta ya ki̱li̱mang Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
Nangki̱n bwa̱ki̱ku ka Kwama di̱ne n chi̱n n ti bwesi̱m chimu n ti bi̱bu kutan n ti chini̱mu ka nang chikiye, bi̱bu n Tewuduwe a yal a di̱ki̱nemu.”
M Biti̱r a chakakku ki̱ni ya̱mu nabwen, ki̱ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure ko, “Ti̱yu dutu chi̱ntu we mwataki̱ku a dutu bi̱bwilamitu.”
Ni̱bu a ke ya̱m Biti̱remu a ma batisma. We diko ni̱bu a sub a lam kuniriti ti̱ta.
N Chi a chakakku ki̱ni yungku fandubu, ki̱chau chitu a fiwiine ki̱ lweka ti̱nu a fiwiine we twa̱ba̱ku.
Tayi a tau ka nang wuwule niye, di̱ne n Kwama ki̱ma chi ka̱ta̱ki n ti di̱mwalu nabwen we fandubi̱bu.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ke bi̱yili̱mi kwang a swe a fi wiine, ki̱kunkadu, ki̱kerati̱ chitu n chi a yaatu a fiwiine.
N chi a feku kuli chitu n ti kuli̱n chi̱nu, a ni ka nang wuwule niiye yinangu kawure ki̱bandangu.
Ka wuwule diye, n chi ki̱muradu we Kan Kwamana Wurchalimanu, ki̱dwa̱ka ki̱danniyu ki̱nikadu we loniyu, ki̱chadu ki̱noti̱nu ki̱ni furi mwen,
n ti delaki̱ Kwama. N chi ki̱ni wule we ni̱bi kwang. Kanang wuwule diye n Tewuduwe ki̱su chimi̱n ni̱bu ka suku bi̱bu ki̱wo ki̱ti̱mi̱mu.
Wuka di m Biti̱r n ti Yowana a ya Kan Kwamanu a ki̱swi twa̱ba̱ku buniyange, yo ki̱swi a yitta wu kukonge.

We kwa̱r di̱du n chi ki̱yalu ko, “A Lelenu” Wuka nii we wu ni̱bu a bi̱u ki̱kube, be ki̱swedu we kwa̱ru. Kanang wuwule diye ni̱bu ki̱da̱a̱du beki̱yodu we kwa̱ru ko ke a ka̱la chitu we ni̱bu a be Kan Kwamani̱mu.
Yo n ki̱n a ku Biti̱r n ti Yowana ki̱dangu a ya ka le Kan Kwamane, a bi̱u chi ka̱mbi̱r.
M Biti̱r n ti Yowana a swati̱ kabuwe ki̱da̱ngdi ri̱i̱ng yinu a yi ki̱kube ko, “Da̱ng ni̱ne!”
Ti̱kuran ki̱kubetu a ki̱la bwa a di̱chiye ko kano yaka ni ki̱n ti̱kan chi.
Aya m Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Bwa ka̱mbi̱re m mi̱n n newe ki̱n. Aya chi mi̱ni ki̱ne mang ni̱nu. We di̱n Yesu Masiya naba Nasa̱rete kun! Ya yayu.”
M Biti̱r a tau ki̱n we fa̱la̱ng ki̱yilangu, a maka ki̱n a kukku. Bi̱nabi̱na nani nii wu we n ti kwabsi̱ri kitu a kwiratuwe.
N ki̱n a kunni ngi̱ri̱t, a tii tas, a mwe ki̱ya yayu ki̱ bungadu n ti chi, a le Kan Kwamanu ki̱ni ti̱rirantu ki̱dela Kwama n ti ni̱bu.
Ni̱bi kwang a ku ki̱n ki̱ya yayu ki̱dela Kwama.
N chi a swaan ki̱n ko n nang ni a no ki̱swedu ki̱ka̱la chi a kwa̱ru a lelenu. Chi a fwetu, a ya̱r chi yii yinang yinang.
Yinangu ni̱bu a ku nii wu a no ki̱ka̱la̱ chiye a tau Biti̱r n ti Yowana a titiyengu, ni̱bu a kiyani ngi̱ti̱bu be ka da̱ng chi ya̱r yiitu a fwe a ki̱di̱ng Solomonangu.

Yo m Biti̱r a ku ni̱be, a yi chi ko, ni̱bu Yisrelamu, a mayire ki̱ya̱r chi̱n yiiye? A mayire ti̱da̱ngdu yinangu na mangi dukan ni̱ne? Ti̱da̱ngdu ti kano di̱ne ni̱n bunti̱n ya̱m Kwamame nang chi a yo nii wu a benga.

N Kwama wu Yibrayime, n ti wu Yichaku n ti wu Yakubu we n ti Kwama tukebu chi̱reme, a ri̱ka bwe nanga ko n Yesu. Nang wu ta kwa̱l ki̱n ta koti̱ ki̱n we kakku Kwabna Bi̱latusange kasi ki̱ku m Bi̱latu a funti̱bwi ko ka marangu.
Tiko wu wauwade n ti wuyile ti̱yi ko a mar chimi̱n naba kakku durange.
Ti̱chiu ni wu nang mweku ti̱kuriyangi siine. Aya n Kwama a kuki̱ ki̱n we bi̱bwari̱mu. N ni̱n, ni̱n ku ki̱ni nuini.

Di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mangu we di̱n Yesunu, a ni nii wu dukan di̱du bwe a yaan beki̱nu. Chi ta ku ta yim a fwe di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mang we di̱n Yesunu. Keku bi̱yili̱mang a di̱n Yesunangu a yo burangu a be we nui chiyu.
Kebu mi̱m, n yim ti̱ma ti̱tu, a kwalan swaanke, yinangu tikaketi chiyu a mangu.
Aya n Kwama a ri chitu a fwa a yii fa̱kubu ti kwang ko, “M Masiya ka nwe riye.”
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱wo ki̱ti̱m, yinu ti̱bunti̱ Kwama ke a nura chi̱n we ki̱letiyu, ka ni chi̱n ni̱r di̱fwin.
Yinu ka tume Masiya, wu n Tewuduwe a sutu chimi̱ne n Yesu.
A mwintuwe n Ki̱n ka swedu a dii ka lami̱nti̱ ki̱swi n Kwama ka marti̱ chitu we kwang ka kau ti̱fwiye, yinangu n ki̱n a fwa fa̱kubu bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu mi̱n ferediyangu.
Di̱ne m Musa a fwa ko, “N Kwama Tewuduwe ka tum chimi̱n wukane fa̱ku yinang mi̱n we kebu chimu, ti̱nwe kasi no bi̱bi̱le ya̱m bi̱bu ka fwa chimi̱ni̱mu.”
Ka kadi yiko, wu a neka nwe ya̱m fa̱ku wume, ni̱bu ka chaku ni wu we tibe kal ki̱ne, ka dudu a twiyang.
Ki̱kumang, yinangu a mwe we di̱faku Samwilangu a lanta fa̱kubu ki̱ka̱ngi̱mu, n kawure a fwa ya̱m we di̱kalan di̱du.
N ti̱n nang bwesi̱m fakubi̱m. N ti̱n ti̱leti̱ bwa̱ki̱ku Kwama a ma n ti tukebi̱ chimangu. N Ki̱n a yi Yibrayim ko, “Ti̱ti̱nitu ka ya delaku a fa̱la̱ng bukebu mumu.
Ki̱dangu Kwama a kuki̱ bwe kongu, a tum ni̱bu Yisrelam mi̱n. Ka dela chi̱nu di̱ne ka yo chi̱nu ta ki̱la we wa̱re dere, ta du ki̱leti chiyu.”
Wuduwe Fansetiye n ti Wusele we ni̱bu toku Kan Kwamani̱mu n ti Sadukiyam a be fi a di̱Biti̱r n ti Yowana we ki̱swi n chi a yaki̱ fwaan ya̱me.
Ni̱tu chitu a kaiyan yinang yinang di̱ne fandubu bi̱bi burabi̱mu ki̱miya ni̱bu mi̱nu ko n Yesu a kaban we furu. Ti̱tu ki̱yungdu bi̱bwari̱mu ka kunti̱nuwe furu.
N chi a tau fandubu bi̱bu a yingen di̱ne di a lenge ka lami̱nti̱ yo ti̱mu ka kwiyade.
Aya ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱mu a ke bi̱yili̱mu. Ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a bwi kunni yunu.
Bafi̱nenangeko ni̱bu toki̱mu n ti seli̱bu n ti tikaketi ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musati̱mu a muran a Wurchalima.
N Anana tikake fanse we fiko n ti Kayafa n ti Yowana n ti Aleksanda n ti bi̱bu ki̱ma namang n ti fanse wuduwemu.
N chi a yo Biti̱r n ti Yowana a ti we tibe chi yinu a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱fwa ni̱mi̱n, ti̱ma ti̱tu ki̱ni dukan wuren, ti̱madu ki̱ni di̱n wuren?”
M Biti̱r wu a ri ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame, a yi chi ko, “Tikaketi ni̱bi n ti seli̱bu ni̱bi̱m.
Ti̱yaliye di̱ne mang ma chi a leletu we ki̱kube wa? Ti̱badu ta yindu yinangu a ya bekanga?
Ti̱nwe mang fwa chimi̱nu ni̱bu Yisrela, ni wu a ti a kakku change wu, a ya beku a di̱n Yesu Masiya naba Nasa̱rete, wu ta kukan n Kwama a kukutuwe fure.”
N ki̱n nang wu ya̱m Kwamamu a fwa ko,
“Kale wu ni̱bu muki̱mu a konge,
A ki̱la kau wu a la chi ki̱ni nangi kwange.”
A ne fi ni ka yaan yuke we ko bayim. We ti̱ti̱niti kwang a ne ni n Kwama a yo wu ni̱bu ka yaan yuke we ka n ke ki̱ne.
Kangu kwa̱l yilangnu n ti seli̱bu a nwe dukan ya̱m Biti̱r n ti Yowanangu, a ya̱r chi yii. N chi a swaan ko ni̱bu bi̱bu a yim chitu. Yinu a fwe chimi̱n fal ko ni̱bu bi̱bu a no ware n ti Yesu.
Yo ni̱bu bi̱bu a ku ni wu a no ki̱ka̱la chiye a ti ware n ti fandubi̱be, a bwa chi kangu ka kwila chidangu.
Yinu n chi a chaku ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱ni ki̱kure ko a yikami̱n a fi, a kuteng ki̱ku n chi a le ki̱twaya ya̱mu we bwiti chiyu ko.
“Ni ma ni̱bu bi̱bi yire? N chi a ma chi ka̱ta̱kitu, ni̱bu a ku a ke ti̱n ki̱ni chi we Wurchalima ne kangu ni kwiladangu we.
Aya di̱ne ke ya̱m bi̱bu a ti̱raduwe, ni wu chimi̱n ki̱tele. N chi a chadu kakku we ki̱ni di̱mwar Yesunu.”
Yinu n chi a yal fandubi̱bu, a wu chimi̱n ki̱tele ko ti̱ chadu kakku we ki̱ni di̱mwar di̱du a di̱n Yesunu.
Aya n Biti̱r n ti Yowana a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ma ti̱kuran we yi chiyu, a le we di̱Kwama nang bunti̱ ya̱m chimu, ni̱n du Kwama?”
A mwintuwe nenang du fwaku chi ya̱r yiitu nang ku nang nwe ti̱ni tu.
A kutengu n chi a wu chimi̱n ki̱telengu a du chi a yikan. Di̱ne ka n chi a yiko chi ma ti̱kan chiye, ka kuke ya̱m. Di̱ne n kawure ki̱dela Kwama.
Ni wu a be a wa̱re chi ka̱ta̱kiye, swa̱tu kitu a la wantaana.
Yinangu ni̱bu a mar chiyangu, m Biti̱r n ti Yowana a ki̱latuwe ni̱bu chimu yinu a fwa chimi̱n chitu a fwetu kwang yinangu tikake fansetiyu n ti seli̱bu a ma ki̱ni chiyangu.
Yo n chi a nwe, a dela Kwama yinang yinang ki̱ni twa̱ba̱ bune ko, Tewuduwe, mun nang wu mwang yo ti̱mu n ti dii n ti lati yiduyu n ti ka ti̱ti̱le chiye ti̱tu we muretu.
N fwa ya̱mu n ti tuke chire n Dauda naba nanganmo a Fi̱ki̱m ko,
Wule yo kuuti ki̱ma
ki̱fwiniye?
Wule yo ni̱bu
ki̱ma ka nangi̱n ti̱kusiye?
Mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu a do bwi ka ma kun yinu. Tikaketi ti̱ti̱niyu a do bwi ka kuladu n ti Tewuduwe yinu n ti Masiya wu suture ko.
“Ki̱kumang we bi̱n di̱du m Mai Yiridu n ti Bi̱latu Babuntu a ngaban a ti a fi wiine n ti yikayu kuuti n ti ni̱bu Yisrelamu a ko naba nanganmo n Yesu wu n Kwama a suti wauwade.
N chi a muran ka ma chitu a dukan mun n ti ki̱ke mo.
Ki̱ka̱ngu Tewuduwe, da̱ng muli̱ni chitu, ni ka̱bi mwiyu runi ke a ya dukan di̱mwari̱nu.
Tarre fa̱la̱ng mwangu ki̱be chiyangu, yo chi ya̱r yiitu n ti chi ka̱ta̱kitu a fwe we di̱n naba nanganmo n Yesu wu wauwade.”
Yo n chi a ri twa̱ba̱ku buniyange, fi n chi a mura mi̱ne a mi̱kan. N kawure we fiko a ri ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam, n chi ki̱ mwa ya̱m Kwamamu a ne tayi we.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱ni kwang ti̱kuran chitu a be a fiwiine. Kanang wuwule niye ki̱ya kuli̱n ki̱nu ki̱keradu n ti kal ki̱nu. A ne wu ki̱ma ti̱kiyane we.
Fandubi̱bu a kun ki̱ni dukan di̱dun, ki̱ma di̱mwaru we kunki̱ Tewuduwe Yesuwangu. N Kwama a dela chi yinang yinang.
Di̱ne ki̱yili̱n kunkake, a ne nii ki̱kwala chiye we kangu ni̱bu a chau kakangu, bi̱bu ki̱feku ku, bi̱bu ki̱feku loni, ki̱be tibe chi ki̱n.
N chi ki̱be fandubi̱bu mi̱nedi ki̱n, bi̱ki̱mu ki̱kera ni̱bu mi̱nu yinangu n kawure ki̱badangu.
Wuka nii we a bi̱ba maka ni̱bi̱mu di̱n ki̱nu n Yusufu a ki̱fi̱ku Lawiyam wu a ti̱m Sayifurus, wu fandubu ki̱yalu ko n Barnaba (ka nang chikiye, wu ki̱kum ni̱bu mi̱n ni̱te)
A feku wukane kuuko, a be ki̱ni kambi̱ru a ni fandubi̱bu.
Aya wuka nii we, di̱n ki̱nu n Ananiya n ti nayeko n Safiratu a mi di̱kan kuli̱n chiin.
N ki̱n a lai bwa wukane laiye, ki̱ni ki̱ke nayeko, a be ki̱ni wuka bale a be ni fandubi̱bu.
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Ananiya, m ma yire mwang ke Setan a le ni̱r munu, mwang mwe Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu mi̱n ti̱kwani n lai ti̱kan chi we ka̱mbi̱r kuune?
Yo no mwang feki̱be, n ke wumonga? A kutengu mwang fekangu a ne ni a yon ko m be ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱re we. M ma yire mwang du ti̱kuran ti̱tu a le ni̱r mune? Ki̱ka̱ngu mwang buti̱bi̱ ni m butu Kwama.”
Kangu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, n Ananiya a yar we ti̱mu a bwa ti̱n. Tayi a tau ni̱bu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bi̱mu.
Yinu bwelemu a be a da̱u kwa̱me a sal ki̱ni lwange luke fureme, a ya, a furte ki̱n.
A kuteng awa yittangu, naye ko a lewe a yimbu chitu a fwetu.
M Biti̱r a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “A ne di̱kan ka̱mbi̱r we chi ta fekitu kana di̱da?” N ki̱n a ke ko, “Ngo, a neti̱ di̱kan we.”
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, a mayire ta ki̱ka yii ti̱swe Fi̱ki̱m Tewuduwe? Da̱ng, ni̱bu bi̱bu a da̱u kwa̱me kwartamomu nang bi̱bu a lame kwa̱r yaka dati̱ wumo.
Bi̱nabi̱na n ki̱n a yar we fiko, a bwa ti̱n. Yinangu bwelemu a lewe a be kuwangu, n chi a da̱u kwa̱me naye a ya fur ti̱n ki̱dwan n ti kwartako.
Tayi a tau ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱ni dukan n ti bi̱bu a nwe chi a fweti̱mu.
Fandubi̱bu a ma chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ti chi ya̱r yiitu nabwen. Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱ni kwang a muran, a ki̱di̱ng Solomon we takamana kan Kwamane.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu a mwibu a le chimi̱n ti̱buwe, a bwin yiko, ni̱bu ki̱ni chi dwiyentu.
Ti̱nti̱ne, kwartabu n ti nati̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱n Tewuduwe, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱suti̱n ka suku.
Di̱ne nangi̱n fandubitu, ni̱bu a chake bi̱bu a bubuwemu a neti̱loi, a yoran we fantiyu ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱ri ko ke ki̱wulang Biti̱r a su we di̱chiye.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a chire we bi̱nti̱tu a ki̱dire Wurchalima ki̱ni ni̱bu a buraburanemu n ti ni̱bu buri̱n ki̱fi̱btimu. N chi a berani ki̱ni kwang.
Di̱ne ti̱te, tikake fansetiye n ti ni̱bu a swe n ti ki̱ni̱mu ka nang chikiye, kwa̱l Sadukiyam, a ma ki̱fwini.
N chi a tau fandubi̱bu a mar a ka̱nge
Aya ki̱ni kum, naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a be wudu kwa̱ti̱tu we ka̱nge, a chaku chi ko,
“Ti̱ya ti̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱n we Kan Kwamanu ya̱m ti̱kuri ti̱fwimu ki̱ni kwang.”
Yo n chi a nwe ya̱me, a le Kan Kwamanu ki̱ni si̱n ki̱miya ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu.
Yinu wuduwe fansetiye n ti bi̱bu a swe waremu a muran, a yale kwa̱l kabaki̱nu n ti tikaketi Yisrelamu, a tum chitu ko ni̱bu a be ki̱ni fandubi̱bu.
Aya yo fansetiyu n ti seli̱bu a ya fikonge, a ya a ne chi we mure ka̱nge, n chi a ki̱lawe a be yi ni̱bu ko,
“Ni̱n ya ka̱nge yi mi̱ti̱bu, yinu ni̱bu ki̱todi̱mu n we fantiyu ni̱bu a yon chiyu, aya yoko nang wude, ni̱n ya a ne ni we mure.”
Yinangu wuduwe fansetiyeyu n ti sele ni̱bu toki̱me a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu a kwala chi ka made di̱ne ki̱kur chi ka nabe kutenge.
A tibu ke, wuka ni a be a fwa chimi̱n ko, “Ni̱bu ta di̱ku a kangemu nang bi̱bu ki̱yung ni̱bu mi̱nu a kan Kwamani̱mu.”
Ni̱bu toki̱ Kan Kwamani̱mu n ti tikaketi fanseti chiyu a yikan a ya ta fandubi̱bu, a ma chimi̱nebu muli̱n di̱ne n chi ki̱wul ni̱bu ko ke ki̱la kwela chi ki̱ni kali.
Yo a be ki̱ni fandubi̱be, a yo chi a ti a kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱n ko ke wuduwe fansetiye a ma chimi̱n ti̱bi̱di̱ri.

Wuko a yiko, “Nang fwa chimi̱nbu ya̱m ki̱ni dukan ko ti̱yungdu ni̱bu mi̱nu ya̱m bi̱bu wenga? Aya ti̱ri Wurchalima ki̱ni yungku changu, ti̱nti̱ne ti̱funti̱ bwi ti̱yi ni̱bu tiko n ni̱n nang ni̱bu nang chi̱u Yesumu.”
M Biti̱r n ti bi̱kamu fandubu a yi chi ko, “A mwintuwe ne nang du ya̱m Kwamamu we nang bunti̱ bi̱chimu.”
N Kwama Te tukebi̱ ni̱me, a kuki̱ Yesu wu ta chi̱u a ki̱tiyang bwange we furu.
N Kwama a ri̱ka ki̱n a yo n ki̱n tikake n ti naba yuke a kang ki̱yilang kang. N ki̱n a ma yiko ko ke a ni Yisrela da a duwe ki̱letiyu a ki̱lawe bwa di̱Kwama ke a ya duku ki̱letiyangu.
Ni̱n ku ti̱chitu ki̱ni nui ni yinu ni̱n fwadu. Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu bi̱bu a ni ni̱bu ki̱ma kwa̱mbi̱ri̱mu ki̱fwa ti̱nu.
Kangu n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, ni̱tu chitu a kaiyan. N chi ki̱bbadu ka chi̱be fandubi̱bu.
Aya wuka naba Farisa we, di̱n ki̱nu n Ka̱maliyel naba yungku yili̱n Musante, wu n chi ki̱ni ki̱n dwiyentu yinange, a kun we kwa̱lu, a yi ni̱bu ko a chaku fandubi̱bu a fi̱lang didiin.
Yinu a yi kwa̱lu ko, kebu mi̱m ni̱bu Yisrelam. Ti̱ma daan ki̱ni chi ti̱badu ta ma ni̱bu bi̱bu mi̱nde.

We swa̱ti̱tu a sutu, wuka nii we di̱n ki̱nu n Tudas, a yung yikiyu yinang ti̱kan chi, ni̱bu kulitu wani taana a nabu ki̱n, aya ni̱bu a chi̱u ki̱n. Yinu ni̱bu ki̱ bungti̱n ki̱ni̱mu a yaran. Bi̱ki̱mu ya̱m a fi̱rti̱n a fiko.
A kuteng kangu, n Yafuda naba Ka̱liliye a kune we ki̱dangu ni̱bu a ma kikangu. A yo ni̱bu a bung ki̱mi̱n ti̱n, n ki̱n ti̱n a be twiyan. Ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱ni̱mi kwang a be yaran.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱du ni̱bu bi̱bu, ka nangi̱n chitu n ti ti̱kuran chitu ka ti̱kusiye, be ka yarati̱nuwe yinangu a fwe n ti bi̱kamangu.
Aya ka nangang ki̱ku, nangang Kwamange, a ne ta medu ki̱ni ni̱bu bi̱bu. Ke fal ti̱ya ti̱ma di̱kulanu n ti Kwama.
N chi a ke ki̱ni ya̱m ki̱mu, a ya, a yale fandubu Yesumu a twalan. N chi a ngau chimi̱nti̱ ki̱kure ki̱da ko a fwadu ya̱m Yesumu we yinu a mar chi ko a yikan.
Bi̱ki̱mu a chir ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan we kakku kwa̱l di̱dangu, di̱ne ni̱bu a ku n chi a lwe ka nwe riye di̱ne di̱n Yesune.
Kanang wuwule diye, n chi ki̱chakakku ki̱ni di̱mwaru, we Kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu n ti loniyu n chi a dubu yungku ya̱m bi̱li̱mu ka nang chikiye n Yesu nang Masiya.

Yinangu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yaki̱ bwidu we diti yikiyangu, Kungakunga a le tibe Yafudame bi̱bu ki̱nwe yii Yelenamu n ti bi̱bu ki̱nwe Aramayamu. Bi̱bu ki̱nwe yii Yelenamu a ki wii ko ni̱bu a kurbu ki̱ni nati̱m buni̱m chimu yo ni̱bu ki̱kera chabti̱te.
Di̱ne yiko, fandububi kubchiri burabi̱mu a yal muraku ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi kwang a yi chi ko, “A ne ledu ni du di̱mwar Kwama di̱du we be niyang kera chabtu.
Yinangu niyang murani yangu kebu, ti̱sutu ni̱bu bi̱bu ni weri̱mu n ti bi̱bu a ri ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu n ti ni̱bu ki̱ni kasani̱mu ka ma nangang ki̱ku.
N ni̱n nang ni dukanu a twa̱ba̱ku n ti yungku ya̱m Kwamamu.”

Chi ni̱bu a dokane a da ni̱bu mi̱n, n chi a sutu Yistifanu we ni̱bu a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam n ti keku bi̱yili̱mang n ti Filibu n ti Burokora n ti Timun n ti Barminas n ti Nikola naba Antakiya. N ki̱n we yikayu kuuti a leti̱ bunti̱kangu.
Ni̱bu a sutu chi a be ki̱ni chi we kakku fandubangu. Bi̱ki̱mu a yo chi mi̱n delaku a twa̱ba̱ chi mi̱nti̱ bunitu.
Ya̱m Kwamamu ki̱ti̱radu ki̱laan fiko. Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱sukasuku we ti̱m Wurchalima yinang yinang. fansetiyu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu.
N Yistifanu di̱ne a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱me, a ma chitu nabwen n ti chi ya̱r yiitu we tibe ni̱be.

Aya wuka di ni̱bu a kan muraki̱n di̱du ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko, “Ka̱bi yiyu ni̱bu a tu we” yinangu n chi ki̱yalangu, a le ki̱kwila Yistifanu. Yafuda wu a be a Sairin n ti Aleksandiriya n ti ti̱m Ki̱likiya n ti Asiya.
Aya n chi a ma a riwe di̱ne ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yingki̱ku n ti Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a di̱ki̱nemu.
N chi a to yiko, a baran a yi bi̱kam ni̱bu ko a ya fwa ying, “Ni̱n nwe n ki̱n ki̱fwa ya̱m bi̱bu a swa̱bani̱m we dur Musanu n ti Kwama.”
Di̱ne yiko, n chi a yo ni̱tu ni̱bitu a kaiyan n ti tikaketi n ti ni̱bu yungku yili̱n Musanti̱mu. N chi a tau Yistifanu a be mi̱ne kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱nu.
Ni̱bu ti̱kwanim bi̱bu a be yi ko, “Naba ni wu ki̱fwa ka ya̱m bi̱kwani̱m we yili̱n Musatu n ti Kan Kwamanu.”
Ni̱n nwe n ki̱n a fwa ko, n Yesu naba Nasa̱ret ka wur kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu ka suteti̱ datiyu m Musa a du nimi̱niyu.
Ni̱bu a swe ki̱nwe ya̱mi̱mu a fi̱rti̱n kwalange we Yistifanuwe ri̱i̱ngangu, n chi a ku kabu ko a suten ki̱yiladu yinang wu a naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama.
Tikake Fansetiye a bi̱u Yistifanu ko, “Ya̱mi yiyu ni̱bu a fwa a dur muniyu bi̱yili̱ma?”
N ki̱n a ki̱nta chi ko, “Kebi̱mi̱m n ti tebi̱mi̱m ti̱nwei. Kwama wu ki̱ni dwiyene a yung dur ki̱nu we tuke chire n Yibrayim a Mesofotamiya yo a tibu yika Aran ne.
N Kwama a yi ki̱n ko, kun we ti̱m chimu, ‘Du kebu mumu, yika ti̱mu mang yungi̱ni̱mu.’
“Tuke chire a du ti̱m Kaldiyamu a yikan a ya swe a Aran. A kuteng ki̱ku n te ki̱n a bwangu, yinu n Kwama a yo ki̱n a be swe we ti̱mu bi̱bu n ti̱n we mi̱ni̱mu.

N Kwama a nibu Yibrayim kula ti̱m bi̱be kasi a no be dungkwale yinang wana na. N Kwama a bwa̱u kana ya̱mu n ti ki̱n ko, ka yo ti̱mu ka kau bi̱ki̱m n ti bukebu ki̱kuti̱ribekom kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n a ne bwe we ki̱dang kangangu.
“N Kwama a yi ki̱n ko, ‘Bukebu ki̱kuti̱ribemomu ka ma ka̱bi a bi̱kam ti̱m. Ni̱bu ti̱mi̱mu ka mar chi yinang ka̱bi, ka ni chi riye swa̱ti̱tu kuliti taana.
Mang wela kuu ni̱bu bi̱bu Yisrela ki̱ma chimi̱n ka̱bimu. A kuteng ki̱ku, bukebu ki̱kuti̱ri̱me Yibrayime ka kunu ka sii ki̱nu we ti̱m bi̱bu.’

Yinu n Kwama a ma bwa̱ki̱ ya̱mu n ti Yibrayim a biku laarang. Yo n Yibrayim a bi̱u Yichakuwe, a bi ki̱mi̱n laaru a di wu nari̱be. N Yichaku a bi̱u Yakubu, n Yakubu a bi̱u tukebu chi̱remi kub chiri burabi̱mu.
“Tukebu chirem bi̱bu, yade ki̱nwe ki̱fwini Yusufuwe, n chi a feku ki̱n, ni̱bu a yikan Masar. Aya n Kwama we ki̱to ki̱nu.
N Kwama a chaku ki̱n we riye. A yo ki̱n a kau naba yingke wu ki̱ni ki̱siyang ki̱duwang we kakku Mai Firauna wu a Masare, n Firauna a yo ki̱n a kau kwabna we Masaru n ti tikaketi ni̱bu a lokomu.
“Yinangu diti ki̱sudangu, chun a bulma ti̱m Masari̱mu n ti Kanana ki̱ni riye nabwen wu a yo tukebu chi̱remu a kwala chabte.
Yo n Yakubu a nwe ko chabti̱tu we Masare, a tum tukebu chi̱remu we. N chi a no yaanbuwe.
We yayu chi wu robe, n Yusufu a yung kebu ki̱mu dur ki̱nu, yinu a yungti̱ Firauna kebu ki̱mu.
“A kuteng ki̱ku n Yusufu a tum chitu ko ki̱baddu ka ku teki̱n Yakubu we n ti kebu ki̱mu. N chi ki̱ni kwang wani ti̱dibin chiri bunu.
N Yakubu a kun a yika Masaru, bwa n ki̱n a ya bwaan ti̱ne n ti tukebu chi̱remu.
Ni̱bu a da̱a̱ kwa̱mi chiyu a be mi̱ne Chekem. A fur chi a fur di̱du n Yibrayim a ta̱ni ka̱mbi̱r a fa̱li bwesi̱m Amor we Chekem.
“Kangu ki̱swi a mwatan wu bwa̱ki̱ Kwamangu n ti Yibrayim ka ridangu, ni̱bu a ki̱la a bwi a ri Masar yinang yinang.
Yinu ni̱bu a sutu wuka Mai, wu a yimbu ka n Yusufu n wure we Masar a be a ma mati̱ntu.
Mai wu a be sul kuu chire, a ni tukebu chi̱remu riye, ki̱yodu ni̱bu ki̱mar bwesi̱m ki̱lwim chimu a bwa ko ke a kaduwe.
“We ki̱dang kangu ni̱bu a bi̱u Musa, n kebu ki̱yili̱n bwe. N chi a bwa̱u a lon teki̱ne swarti ti̱tta.
Kangu n chi a ya mare bwengu, fwa̱n Firaunanu a ya da̱u bwe, a do yinang bweko.
Ni̱bu yungku a Masari̱mu a yung Musami̱n chitu ni̱bu a yim a Masariti kwang. Ya̱m ki̱mu n ti nangi̱n kiti kwang ki̱ni dukan.
“Yo m Musa a lam swa̱ti̱tu wan taanange, a kur ko yaka siiye kebu ki̱mu ni̱bu Yisrelamu.
Yo n ki̱n a ku wuka naba masare ki̱ ni naba Yisrela riyenge, n ki̱n a ya maka keko a chitti̱ naba Masare.
M Musa a kaman ko kano ni̱bu ki̱mu ka swaanu ko n Kwama ki̱ma nangangu ki̱ni ki̱n di̱ne ke a yu chi, aya n chi a swaanbu.
Bafi̱nenangeko m Musa a ki̱la ku kana Yisrela ki̱kuladu n chi burau. Yo n ki̱n a be ka doka chide a yi ko, ‘A mayire n ti̱n kana kebu ti̱badu ta nwe dutu chi̱ntu mi̱n riye?’
“Aya wu a no ki̱ni wukane riyenge a tung Musa kursu a ki̱swi ko, ‘N wure a yo mun tikake n ti naba kabake we dutu ni̱ntu?’
Yoye mun baddu mwan chitti̱ mi̱nu yinangu mwang chi̱u naba Masare darenga?
“Yo m Musa a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a wul ti̱n a yika ti̱m Midiyam, a ya ma rungkoitu we bwako, a bi̱tti̱ bwelemi burau we bwako.
“A kutengu swa̱ti̱tu wani taanangu, wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re a fwe Musa mi̱ntuwe be di̱lukene ki̱tau ki̱range ki̱dwang n ti kun Sinayin.
Yo Musa a kuwe, chitu a ya̱r ki̱n yii. Yo n ki̱n a ya ki̱dwan, a nwe ker Tewuduwe ko,
‘Mi̱n nang Kwama tukebu mume, Kwama Yibrayim n ti Yichaku n ti Yakubu.’ Bwi we di̱Musa ki̱mi̱ka ka mi̱kaku a yabu dukan da̱ngki̱nu.
“Yinu n Tewuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, ‘Suku ki̱wami mwiyu, di̱ne finu mwan timi̱ne yi wauwadu.
N ku riye ni̱bu ki̱ni ni̱bu mi̱mu a Masare. N nwe wi chi, m be mang yu chidu. Di̱ne yiko, do bwiyu mang tunnu a Masar.’

“M Musa nang wu wiine, wu n chi a ko, a yi ko, ‘N wure a yo mun ko n kau ni̱mi̱n wusele n ti naba mwatake?’ N Kwama a tumme naba di̱tumbi̱re a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱mu ki̱ni ben ki̱ran a be di̱lukene ko ka kau tikake n ti wu ka yu chi̱ne.
N ki̱n nang wu a chake chi we Masaru di̱ne chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ki̱n a maatu n ti ti̱mwalantu nabwen a yung a Masar n ti nabwe Laa wu wure
“Wu nang Musa wu a fwa ni̱bu Yisrelamu mi̱n ko, ‘N Kwama ka tum chimi̱ne wuka fa̱ku we kebu chimu yinangu a tume mi̱nangu.’
N Ki̱n nang wu a mur ni̱bu Yisrelamu we di̱kiru n ti Naba di̱tumbi̱re wu a fwa ya̱m n ti ki̱n a Kun Sinayine. N ki̱n nang wu a yuwe di̱kwa̱l ti̱kurinu we di̱Kwama di̱ne ke a be ni chiniye.
“Aya tukebu chi̱remu a ko a bunti̱bu ki̱n, a koti̱ ya̱m ki̱mu, n chi a no ki̱badu ka ki̱la Masar.
N chi a yi Aruna ko, ‘Ma nimi̱n di̱yor di̱du ka twa̱ku ni̱ne. Di̱ne we ti̱kaman ni̱ntu, m Musa wu a chaku ni̱ne a Masare nang yimbu chitu a fweti ki̱nitu.’
We ki̱swi wuko, n chi a mu di̱yor yinang tangka. Yinu a ma di̱yoru mi̱n niku ki̱tumang. N chi ki̱ma ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan di̱ne nangang fa̱li chiyangu.

“Di̱ne yiko n Kwama a ni chi kuteng, a du chi ko a nang sii ki̱switiyu. Ti̱tu a wuran bwi ki̱ni chi fa̱kubu a mwal we tatti̱ki̱dai yika̱riyu ko, ‘N ti̱n ni̱bu Yisrelamu, ti̱bita mi̱mi̱n naiyu n ti niku ki̱tumangu, we swa̱ti̱tu wan taana a di̱kira?
A ta le ti̱ma di̱bwalu n ti di̱yor Moleki̱n, n ti ki̱swi di̱yor Rifan, di̱yor di̱du ta ma di̱ne ke ti̱nang sii ki̱nu. M mi̱n mang chaku chi̱nu ta ya ka̱bi a Babila.’
“Feredi tukebu chi̱remu a no ki̱ni di̱kur di̱du ki̱yungdu Kwama we n ti chi̱nu we di̱kiru. Di̱du nang di̱kuru n Kwama a yi Musa ko a ma tituwe yinangu n ki̱n a kuu mi̱nangu.

Tukebu chi̱remu a be chau kula ti̱kubi ti̱te, n chi a chakakku ki̱ni ti̱kubi ti̱tu we ki̱dang Chosuwangu a kutengu n chi a chau ki̱la ki̱ni yikayu kuuti n Kwama a kaka chi mi̱niyu. Ti̱kubi ti̱tu a kaiyabu a lami̱nti̱ ki̱dang Daudangu.
N Dauda a le ni̱r Kwamanu di̱ne n ki̱n a bau ti̱ni fi ka run di̱kur siiku Kwama tuke chire n Yakubu.
Aya n Solomon nang ni a mu lon Kwama.
“Kasi ki̱ku Te wuduwe a swebu a loni yiyu ni̱bu a mubbi Fa̱liye. Yinangu fa̱ku Yichaya a fwa ko,
‘Dii nang lon mati̱ne mi,
ti̱ti̱nitu nang fi mi̱n tari̱n naniye
N Tewuduwe ko,
Ta mumi bi̱bi̱le ki̱dum lom?
Wuwule ki̱dum lo fi̱kare wu ta domide?
M mi̱n n ke wu a yo kwali̱n chiin di̱da?’
“N ti̱n bi̱bu ta nwebu diimu, bi̱bu ni̱tuti ki̱ngki̱ng, ki̱teli chiyi yi̱si̱ni̱mu, ta bunti̱bu Fi̱ki̱m mi̱mi kwadu yinangu tukebu chimu a mangu, n ti̱n ti̱mati̱di yiko.
We fa̱kubi̱bi, bi̱kam we bi̱bu tukebu chimu a dubi̱ma? N chi a chi̱u ni̱bu bi̱bu a fwa beku nii naba ni̱ri di̱ne wu. N ti̱n ti̱kwa̱l ki̱n ti̱chiti̱ ki̱n.
Ti̱n nang bi̱bu ta yiu yilangu we naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama, aya ta bunti̱bu yili̱ntu.”
Yo n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a ma ki̱fwini n kawure ki̱wu bewure di̱ne kaiyan ni̱re.
Aya di̱ne n Yistifanu a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱me, n ki̱n a fwal nuyi kiyu ki̱da̱ng ka dii. N ki̱n a ku dwiyen Kwamatu n ti Yesu a ti a kang ki̱yilang Kwamang.
We fiko n Yistifanu a yi chi ko, “Ti̱da̱ng, n ku dii a wuden, n ku Bwe Nii a ti a kang ki̱yilang Kwamang.”
N chi a yinge ki̱teli chiyu ki̱ni Fa̱li ki̱bwa̱kati̱ kemiyu, a kiya ki̱mi̱ntuwe ki̱ti̱bu.
N chi a chaku ki̱n a kuteng bi̱nang ki̱kweladu ki̱ni ki̱ni kali. We ki̱swi wuko, ni̱bu di̱mwari̱mu a yo kuli̱n chi̱nu a nani wuka bwele di̱n ki̱nu n Chawulu.
N chi a kwela ki̱n ki̱ni kali. N Yistifanu ki̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu ko, “Tewuduwe Yesu, yiu ti̱kuri mitu.”
N ki̱n a sung a kuku keru ki̱ni dukan ko, “Tewuduwe kuru ki̱leti ni̱bu bi̱biyu we.” Kanga fwa bi̱bangu a bwa ti̱n.

N Chawulu a ke ko ni̱bu a chi̱u Yistifanu, n Chawulu ki̱fuma ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a bwinbu kaang ba̱la̱ng we Wurchalima. Ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yarani yak a le ti̱m Yafudiyam n ti di̱du a Samariyam a du ka fandubu.
Bi̱kam ni̱bu Kwamam bi̱bu a ru ni̱ti̱mu a yikan a fure Yistifanu a siiti̱ bwako.
Aya n Chawulu a chakakku ki̱fuma ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ we kambi Kwamatu, ki̱bunti̱ loni loni, ki̱taba kwartabu n ti nati̱bu ki̱maru a di̱bi̱nti̱l.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yayyani̱mu, a chakakku ki̱mwa ya̱m Kwamamu we bwa n chi a ngan dure.
N Filibu wu a ya di̱kan bi̱n a Samariya, a chakakku ki̱mwa ya̱m bi̱li̱m Masiyamu we bwako.
Yo ki̱tuu ni̱be a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mu we di̱Filibu we a ku di̱mwal chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ki̱n ki̱madite, n chi a swe wudidi ki̱nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mu.
Ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu a chir we ni̱bu nabwen ki̱bwa̱ka kemi, bi̱ngi̱rmani̱mu n ti ki̱kubti nabwen a ya beku.
Di̱ne ti̱te, bi̱n di̱ki̱nu diko a ri ki̱ni ka ti̱mi̱lan.
We ki̱dang kangu, wuka nii we di̱n ki̱nu n Simun. Feredi n ki̱n a no ki̱ma buwang we bi̱n di̱ki̱nu. We kuu ni̱bu Samariyamu kwang, n ki̱n ki̱yung ni̱bu ko n ki̱n ti̱kan chi.
Ti̱tu a yo ni̱bi kwang we bi̱nu, seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱mu ki̱yidu ko, “Nii wu ki̱ni dukan Kwamanu ni yalu ko, dukan di̱duni̱nu.”
N chi ki̱bunti̱ ki̱nu di̱ne chi ya̱r yitu n ki̱n ki̱madu we buwang kangitu.
Aya yo n chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱mwar Filibu di̱du a ya̱m bi̱li̱m yaa Kwamanu a di̱n Yesu Masiya, kwartabu n ti nati̱bi kwang a ma batisma.

N Simun ti̱n a keti̱ bi̱yili̱mu a mati̱ batisma. A kuteng ki̱ku a ma batismangu, a dubu Filibu ki̱nabi̱du kasi no ka ya bwa̱le. Aya n ki̱n a ya̱r yii we chi ki̱yungde n ti chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ki̱n a kuutu.
Yo fandubu a Wurchalimamu a nwe ko ni̱bu a Samariyamu a yiu ya̱m Kwamame, a tung Biti̱r n ti Yowana we di̱chiye.
Ki̱dangu n bi̱u Biti̱r a lam fikongu, a twa̱ba̱ bi̱bu a yiu Kwamamu mi̱n ko ke a ya Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.
Di̱ne Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a tibu be wuka mi̱nedu didine. N chi a ma kana batisma we di̱n Yesu Tewuduwe.
M Biti̱r n ti Yowana a yo chi mi̱n Fa̱liyu we dutu chitu, yinu n chi a ya Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.
Yo n Simun a ku ni̱bu a ya Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu di̱ne Fa̱liyu fandubu a yo chimi̱niye, a ni chi ka̱mbi̱r,
a yi chi ko, “Ti̱ni mi̱n da wu, ke ka nang wuwule niye wu mang yo ki̱mi̱n fa̱liye, ka ya Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.”
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “M mun n ti ka̱mbi̱r munu yati̱kaiyan, di̱ne mun kuru mwi mwang ta̱n Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱r.
A ne lwangang mwang we n ti ni̱n, di̱ne ni̱r munu a newe n ti Kwama.
Wo ki̱ti̱m we nangang ki̱bwilang mwangu, twa̱ba̱ buni a Tewuduwe, Ka we mwang ya duku di̱ne Nangang ki̱bwilang mwange.
Di̱ne n ku ti̱tu ka kati̱n, mun ma chi a lebi.”
N Simun we fiko ko, a twa̱ba̱ ki̱mi̱n buni a di̱Tewuduwe ke chitu ta fwatu a fweduwe n ti mi̱n.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a ri ki̱ni di̱mwar Tewuduwe, a ki̱la Wurchalima, yaki̱ mwa ni̱bu a beti̱ bi̱ni Samariya.
Wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a ya Filibu a yi ko, “Do bwiyu subi Twa̱r wuli̱n, a wa̱re wu a chire a Wurchalima ki̱yika Ka̱sa̱.”

N Filibu a kun, a yika ti̱n. We bwako, wuka ni wu di̱twari̱n a mabu nangange we, wu ki̱tau ka̱mbi̱r di̱du a Mai wuwiye Cheba wu a tau Yitofiyane ki̱ma mati̱n Kandise ki̱ki̱la lo. Nii wu di̱twari̱n ki̱nu a mabu nangange a ya Wurchalima yaki̱ sii Kwama.
Yo n ki̱n a yaki̱ ki̱la lo, a swe ki̱ki taki̱da fa̱ku Yichaya we dii a di̱bi̱l kwere konu.
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a yi Filibu ko, “Ya ki̱dwang, kwatuwe di̱bi̱l kwerenu.”
N Filibu a wul a ya mwatu ni wu, a nwe ki̱ki taki̱da fa̱ku Yichaya. A bi̱u ki̱n ko, “Mwang swaan chi mun kidita?”
Nii wu a yi Filibu ko, n swaan a fi̱re, ka n ke wuka nii ka miya mide? “Yinu n ki̱n a yal Filibu ko, n fi̱le bwa̱le, be swengi ying n miyami.”
Ya̱m Kwamamu n ki̱n a no ki̱kidi̱mi ying:
“A wu ki̱n yinang kwan
di̱du ni̱bu yaka bidu biyen.
Yinang kwan di̱du a fa̱ki̱tabi̱ bwin yo ni̱bu ki̱bi ki̱mi̱n riin,
a fwabu chi.
Ni̱bu a ni ki̱n riye,
a da̱ngti̱ ki̱n bi̱yili̱m ki̱mu.
N wure ka ying ki ni̱bu ki̱dang kangi̱mu?
Di̱ne diti kiyu a ri we ti̱ti̱nitu.”
Nii wu a bi̱u Filibu ko, “Fwami, n wure wu fa̱ku ki̱ twa̱ba̱ ya̱m a dur ki̱ne, a dur ki̱na ka dur wuka ni̱na?”
Yinu n Filibu a mwetuwe fi n ki̱na no ki̱ kide ki̱fwa ki̱mi̱nu, a fwa ki̱mi̱nti̱ ya̱m bi̱li̱m Yesumu.
Yo n chi a yaki̱ yikadu we wa̱re, a lam wuka fi wu ki̱ni mwe, Nii wuduwe wu a yi Filibu ko, “Mwe nang wu, wule ka kadu a ne mwang mami batisma?”
Mwang medu mwang ma batisma ka kwer n ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱n Yesune. Naba ni a yi ko, “N ke mi Yesu Masiya nang Bwe Kwama.”
Nii wu a ti ki̱ni di̱bi̱l kwere ki̱nu, n ki̱n n ti Filibu a le mwe, n Filibu a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma.
Yo n chi a chire we mwe, Fi̱ki̱m Tewuduwe a da̱u Filibu a yikani ki̱n. Nii wu a kuti̱bu Filibu ki̱da, a chakakku ki̱ni yayu ko, ki̱ni furi mwemwen.
N Filibu a ya fwe a Asotu. N ki̱n a chakakku ki̱yika Kaisariya, ki̱mwati̱ ya̱m Kwamamu we wa̱re ka nang di̱di̱le bi̱ne.
N Chawulu a chakakku ki̱ ni miyari̱m Tewuduwemu riye yinang yinang ko ka chi̱be chidu. N ki̱n a ya bwa wuduwe fansetiye.
A bi̱u ko a ni ki̱n lwangi̱n ka yika kambi Kwama ti̱tu a Dimasku ke ki̱tau kwartabu n ti nati̱bu ki̱ma bunti̱ku a bwakomu, ka bemi̱ne Wurchalima ki̱n ke ni̱bu a yingen.
Yo n ki̱n we yayu a mwata bi̱n Dimaskune, bi̱nabi̱na kaang yiiku a chire a dii yinang ki̱yile a yi fi a di̱ki̱ne ki̱chichii.
N ki̱n a yar a ti̱m. A ki̱la nwe di̱kan ker a dii kiyi ki̱nu ko, “Chawulu, a mayire mun ni mi̱n riye?”
N Chawulu a bi̱u ko, “M Mun n wure, Tewuduwe?” N ki̱n a ya di̱ki̱li̱n yiinu ko, “M mi̱n nang Yesu wu mun ni riye,”
Kun n le bi̱nu, ni̱bu we fwami̱n chitu mwang maditu.
Ni̱bu a no ki̱ya yayu n ti Chawulumu a tii wudidi, ki̱nwe keru aya a kubu niko.
Yinu n Chawulu a kun a wudu kwalangi kiyu, aya a kubu di. Bi̱bu n chi waremu a twa̱ku ki̱n a yikan Dimasku.
Diti kiyi yitta a kubu di, a chabu a noti̱bu chi.
We Dimasku wuka naba bunti̱ke
Yinu n Tewuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, “Kun n tau wa̱re wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko wu ti̱re, mwang ya lon Yafuda mwang ledu, mwang ya wuka naba Tarsu we fiko wu di̱n ki̱nu n Chawulu, ki̱twa̱ba̱ buni.
N ki̱n a tu a ku wuka ni di̱n ki̱nu n Ananiya we dwakam bi̱yili̱mu a ya fi a di̱ki̱ne a yo ki̱mi̱n fa̱la̱ng ke n ki̱n a kudi.”
N Ananiya a yi, “Tewuduwe, mi̱n nwe ya̱miyu nabwen we dur naba niwu nu, we chi ti̱bwilai ti̱tu n ki̱n a ma we ni̱bu mumi wauwadi̱m a Wurchalimamu.
N ki̱n a be fi ki̱ni ki̱ke tikake fanseti ke ki̱tau ka nang wuwule niye wu ki̱sii mune.”
Aya n Tewuduwe a yi ki̱n ko. “N ya mi̱n, ya n ma chitu mang fwatu. Di̱ne n sutu ki̱n ka mwa di̱n mi̱nu we yikayu kuuti, n ti mati̱m mu n ti ni̱bu Yisrelamu.
Mang yung ki̱n nabwe riye n ki̱n ka nwedu di̱ne mwaku di̱n mi̱nange.”

Yinu Ananiya a ke a ya, a le lo a kuku fa̱likiyu a twai Chawulu ko. “Kemi n Tewuduwe a tum mi̱ne, nang Yesu wu mwang teka mi̱ne a wa̱re wu mwang bunte. N ki̱n a ke mwang kutudi we ki̱dan, mwang ridu ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.”
Bi̱nabi̱na ti̱kan chi yinang di̱wuli̱n a swiye we nuyi kiyu, nuyu a wuden. Yinu n Ki̱n a kun ni̱bu a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma.
Yo n ki̱n a chau chabti̱te, a ya dukanu.
N Chawulu a ti̱ka yikai diti n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu
Bi̱nabi̱na n Chawulu a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱m we kambi murakitu ko, n Yesu nang Bwe Kwama.

Ni̱bu bi̱bu a nwe ki̱ni̱mu a ka̱ta̱n. N chi ki̱twayadu ko, “Nii wu n ke wu a chi̱be ni̱bu a yaiti̱ ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ Yesumu we Wurchalima? N ki̱n n ke wu a be fi ko beka wo ni̱bu yaka ni tikaketi fansetiyu ka mar chidu a di̱bi̱nti̱la?”
Aya n Chawulu a chakakku ki̱ni dukan mwaki̱nu nabwen wu a yo ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱swedu a Dimasku a yimbu chi ka madite, n ki̱n ki̱tau kwari̱lle ko n Yesu nang Masiya.
A kuteng diti nabwengu, ni̱bu Yafudamu a do ka chi̱u ki̱nu.
Aya n Chawulu a nwe ya̱m bi̱bu. Kum n ti kuko n chi ki̱swedu ki̱dwan we kwa̱r bi̱ni̱nu ki̱del ki̱nu ko ke chi chi̱u.
Aya ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱ni̱mu
Yo n Chawulu a le Wurchalima, n ki̱n a funti̱bwi ka lwekadu n ti miyari̱mu, aya n chi ki̱nwe taikiyu di̱ne n chi a kebu bi̱yili̱mu ko a suten a kau naba bunti̱ke.

M Barnaba a yiu ki̱n a yika fandubu mi̱ni ki̱n. Yinu a fwa chi mi̱n yinangu n Chawulu a tekan n ti Tewuduwe we wa̱re n ti yinangu n Tewuduwe a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱ma̱ngu n ti yinangu n Chawulu a ma di̱mwaru we di̱n Yesu a Dimaskunu.
Yinu fal n Chawulu a swe n ti chi ki̱ledu ka nang file we Wurchalima n ti chi, ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan a ne tayi we di̱n Tewuduwe Yesunu.
Ti̱nti̱ne ki̱fwa ya̱mu n ti ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu ki̱nwe yii Yelenamu, ki̱tukadu n ti chi. N chi a funti̱ bwi ki̱bau wa̱re ka chi̱n ki̱ne.
Yo kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a swaan ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a da̱u ki̱n a yikan Kaisariya yinu we bwako n chi a tung ki̱n a Tarsu.

Yinu ni̱tu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mitu a da buk we ki̱dire Yafudiya n ti Ka̱lili n ti Samariya. Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ya dukanu we Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu kangu n chi a yaki̱ bwidu nabwennangu ki̱swedu ki̱ni tayi Tewuduwe.
Yo m Biti̱r a kana ni̱bu bunti̱kumu kwang we fantiye, yinu a ya a ma siramu we ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a bi̱n Liddanu.
We bwako n ki̱n a ya wuka nii, di̱n ki̱nu n Yiniya, wu a bubuwe a da we kwa̱mbi̱re a lam swa̱ti̱tu narube di̱ne bwi a ngi̱rma a ne ying kunu.
M Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Yiniya, n Yesu Masiya a ben, kun n dal chi ti̱dari mwitu.” Bi̱nabi̱na n ki̱n a kun
Nabwe ni̱be a Lidda n ti Charone a ku Yiniya ki̱ya yayu, ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱n Tewuduwe.
Wuka na bunti̱ke we Yafa di̱n ki̱nu n Tabita, wu a suten we yii ni̱bu Yelename ko n Dorka.
We ki̱swi wuko, burang a tau ki̱n, a bwati̱n. N chi a ru kwa̱me a ya ti̱u a kan diin.
Aya di̱ne Lidda a kwatuwe Yafa, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a nwe ko m Biti̱r n we Lidda. N chi a funti̱ bwi a tum ni̱bu burau ko a yale, “Ti̱wana ki̱n a be dati̱datu.”

M Biti̱r a kun a bunga ware n ti chi. Yo n chi a lam lo, n chi a yikani ki̱ni Biti̱r we kan diinu. Nati̱m buni̱mu a be bwa̱l ki̱ni di̱bi̱l, ki̱kira winiyu ki̱yungti̱ lukei chiyu n ti kuli̱nitu n Dorka a machi mi̱nitu.
M Biti̱r a chaku chi ki̱ni kwang a fi̱lang, yinu a sung a twa̱ba̱ buni. Yo a riye, a sabran a yi kwa̱me ko, “Tabita kun.” Naye a wudu nuiyu, yinangu a ku Biti̱rengu, a kun a sweswe.
M Biti̱r a tar fa̱la̱ngu, a maka ki̱n we kunki̱ku. Yinu a yale nati̱m buni̱mu n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi kwang. A ni chi naye wu no a bwange ki̱ni tukuri.
Ya̱mu a ti̱ran we Yafa. Ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱n Tewuduwenu.
A kuteng ki̱ku m Biti̱r a dati̱ yikai diti we Yafa a lon Simun wu ki̱fu ti̱ba̱li̱ne.
Wuka nii we bi̱n Kaisariya, di̱n ki̱nu n Korneliyu. N ki̱n wuka wuduwe we ni̱bu ki̱rang Romamu, wu a tau kwa̱l ni̱bu ki̱rangmu wu a kwa̱l Yitaliyanu.
N ki̱n n ti loko ki̱wul tayi Kwamayu, ki̱siti̱ Kwama. N ki̱n ki̱funti̱bwi ki̱maka ti̱lusani ni̱bu Yafudamitu ki̱ twa̱ba̱ti̱ bunitu a di̱Kwama kwadu.
Wuka di ki̱ni kuko yo di a awa yitta, n Ki̱n a ku naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a dwakam bi̱yili̱m wu a be fi a di̱ki̱ne a yal ki̱n ko, “Korneliyu!”
Wuko a kur nuyu ki̱ni tayi ko, “Wureni Tewuduwe?” Naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi ki̱n ko, twa̱ba̱ku mwangu n ti makaki̱ babumbangu a lam kakku Kwamang. “A kau chi kurki̱ we kakku Kwamangu.”
Tum ni̱bu ki̱ka̱ng a Yafa a yale Simun wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Biti̱re.
N ki̱n wu ki̱dadu n ti Simun wu ki̱fu ti̱ba̱li̱ne. Loko a ki̱ti̱ku Wimang.
Yo naba di̱tumbi̱re a yikane, n Korneliyu a yale ka̱bi kiyi burau n ti wuka naba ki̱range wu ki̱nwe tayi Kwamai we bi̱bu ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n nangangi kwadi̱mu.
A fwa chi mi̱n chi a fweeti kwang yinu a tum chi we Yafa.
Bafi̱nenangeko ki̱ni kuko, yo ni̱bu bi̱bu a mwata fiko, we ki̱swi wuko a ya m Biti̱r a fi̱l dii a kan ka twa̱ba̱ buni.
Chun a bu ki̱n we fiko ki̱bau chi ka chade, aya yo ni̱bu we ki̱si chabti̱te, n ki̱n a ma dwakam bi̱yili̱m.
N Ki̱n a ku dii a wuden, ti̱kan chi ki̱suwedu we dii yinang si̱re ki̱ni fwiti̱netiyi yaana.
We mure nai we dangtidangti yiyu ki̱ni nani yaanaiyu n ti yiyu yinang sotiyu n ti yiyu yinang ki̱fariyu n ti yiyu yinang ki̱ni̱biyu.
N ki̱n a ki̱la nwe di̱kan ker ko, Biti̱r kun, bi n wu.
M Biti̱r ko, “Tewuduwe, a ne mang medu di̱ne mang chabu chitu n ke wauwaditu, mang wuti̱bu ki̱dum nai a lebiyu.”
Yinu keru a fwate ki̱da ko, “Yidu chi Kwama a do wauwaditu we mwi n ke wauwadumu.”
Ki̱chitu wu a fwe ki̱da yitta, yinu a da̱u a ki̱lati̱ dii we ki̱n.
Ti̱tu a ya̱r Biti̱r yii, yo n ki̱n a le ki̱ kura chi ki̱chitu wu ki̱yungde, ni̱bu n Korneliyu a tumemu a lante di̱ne n chi a tu a bi̱u lon Simune.
N chi a ma di̱siiru a bi̱u chitu ka n Simun wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko m Biti̱r a siku we lo.
Yo m Biti̱r we ki̱ta̱l chitu n ki̱n a ku we dwa̱kwame, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a yi ko, “Ni̱bi bi̱tta
Kun n sub bunti̱ chi we bwati̱be, yan ya chi, kuradu chi we, m mi̱n n tum chiye.
Yinu m Biti̱r a yawe kwa̱ru, a yi ni̱bu bi̱bu ko, “M mi̱n nang ni ti̱badde. Ti̱be wureni?”

N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “N Korneliyu a tum ni̱ne, n ki̱n naba kunne wuduwe we kuu Roma, naba yile wu ki̱nwe tayi Kwamaye, wu ki̱ni ki̱siyange we ni̱bu Yafudami kwange. Naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi ki̱n ko a yali̱n a loko ke a nwe chi mwang fwa ki̱mi̱ne.”
Yinu m Biti̱r a yiu kebu bi̱bu a ni fidare. Bafi̱nenangeko a bunga ware n ti chi n ti bi̱kam ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m bi̱bu a Yafamu.
N chi ya lame Kaisariya bafi̱nenangeko. Yade n Korneliyu a swe ki̱yang chide, a murte kebu ki̱mu n ti fati̱bi̱ ki̱mu.
Kangu m Biti̱r a leen longu, a teka ti̱n n ti Korneliyu, n Korneliyu a sung a ri̱ka Biti̱r.
Aya m Biti̱r a yi ki̱n ko, “Kun, m mi̱n ni, m mi̱n n ke Kwama.”
Yo m Biti̱r yaki̱ fwa ya̱mu n ti ki̱ne, m Biti̱r a kun a le mure a ku ni̱bu nabwen a muran.

N ki̱n a yi chi ko, n ti̱n n ti̱fwan ti̱yim a dakabu naba Yafudiya ka lwekadu, ka ya siram a wukane kuu ni̱be bi̱bu chi a da̱u a newe wauwade. Aya n Kwama a tu a yungi ko n yalu wuka nii we mi n ke wauwadu ka wubwilange
Di̱ne yiko, yo mang ya di̱yale, mang kobu. Ki̱ka̱ngu m be mang nwe di̱yalu.
Yinu n Korneliyu a yi ki̱n ko, we kuten diti yaana a suyu, yo mang le twa̱ba̱ ke, wuka nii a fwetewe kakku mangu, ki̱ni kuli̱n di̱du ki̱yiladu yilanen.
N ki̱n a ya̱i ko, “Korneliyu, n Kwama a yiu twa̱ba̱ku mwangu, a kur yinangu mun maka babumbangu.
Di̱ne yiko, tum ni̱bu a yal mi̱ne Biti̱r a Yafa. N ki̱n ki̱dadu a lon Simune wu ki̱fu ti̱ba̱li̱ne. Wu loko a ki̱ti̱ku wimange.
Nang chi a yo mang yali̱ne, mwang mabe yinangu mwang bengu. Ni̱n nang bi̱bu nang ngaban we kakku Kwamangu, fwa ni̱mi̱n chi n Tewuduwe ki̱baddu mwang fwa ni̱mi̱nde.”
Yinu m Biti̱r a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu ko, “Ki̱kumang n swaan ki̱ka̱ngu, n Kwama a sutubusute.”
Aya ki̱yiu ka nang wuwule niye kasi no a wuwule kuu, bi̱bu ki̱nwe tayi kiyi ki̱tumti̱ yilemu.
A ta yim ya̱mu n Kwama a tum Yisrela mi̱nemu, fwaki̱ya̱m bi̱li̱m Yesu Masiyamu n ki̱n Tewuduwe kwang.
Ti̱yim ne chitu a fwe we ti̱m Yafudiyamitu. Ya̱mu a mwe a Ka̱lili a kuteng di̱mwar batisma n Yowana a manu.

Ti̱yim yinangu Kwama a sutu Yesu wu a Nasa̱rete a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m ki̱mu n ti dukanangu. Di̱ne n Kwama we ware n ti ki̱ne, n ki̱n a le fansetiyu nabwen ki̱maka ni̱bu ki̱beti̱ bi̱bu n Setan a tu a kwabi̱mu.
N ni̱n, ni̱n ku chi n Yesu a maatu we ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti Wurchalima. N chi a chi̱u ki̱n, a yau ki̱n a tiyang.
Aya n Kwama a kukku ki̱n we diwutare, yinu a du ki̱n ke a yung yikiyu ke ni̱bu a ku ki̱n.
Ni̱bu ki̱ni kwang a kuubu ki̱n aya n ni̱n bi̱bu n Kwama a tu a sutu ni̱n feredimu ni̱n ku ki̱n. N ni̱n nang bi̱bu nang chau chitu waremu, nang nokan ware a kutengu a kun we furangu.
N ki̱n a yi ni̱n ko ni̱n ma ni̱bu mi̱n di̱mwaru, ni̱n fwa chimi̱n ti̱n ko n ki̱n nang wu n Kwama a sutu ki̱n ka mwata bi̱kuri̱mu n ti bi̱bwari̱mu mi̱ne.
Fa̱kubu ki̱ni kwang a ma di̱mwaru we di̱ki̱ne ko ni wu a ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱n ki̱ne ka ya dukku ki̱letiyangu.
Yo m Biti̱r we ki̱fwa ya̱me, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a ri ni̱bu a swe ki̱nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱mu.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m a bii laar a Yafudamu a bunga we n ti Biti̱r a ya̱r yii yinangu a ku yikayu kuuti a yati̱ ki̱li̱mang Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamangu.
Di̱ne n chi a nwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yiiniyu dangtidangti, ki̱dela Kwama. Yinu m Biti̱r a yi ko,
“N wure ka yidu ko ni madu ni̱bu bi̱bu mi̱nu batisma wenge? N chi a tu a ya riku Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu yinang chi̱ni.”
Yinu n ki̱n a ni da ko ni̱bu a ma chi mi̱n batisma a di̱n Yesu Masiya. We kuteng ki̱ku n chi a yi Biti̱r ko a ma yikai diti n ti chi.
Fandubi̱bu n ti kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ti̱m Yafudiyami kwang a nwe ko yikayu kuuti a yiti̱ ya̱m Kwamamu.
Yinu yo m Biti̱r a ya Wurchalima, bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudawam bi̱bu a mabu ti̱kali ki̱ni da biku laari̱mu a wela Biti̱r,
“A mayire mwan ya bwanu a ni̱bu a bibu laari̱me? Wu mun chatti̱ chabtu ware n ti chiye?”
Yinu m Biti̱r a fwa chimi̱ni kwa̱rikwa̱ri ko,
“Yo mang ya mi̱n twa̱ba̱ buni a Yafa, m ma dwakam bi̱yili̱m. We dwakamu n ku ti̱kan chi ki̱suwedu a dii yinang si̱re ki̱ku ki̱ni fwiti̱ne yaanang, a be ki̱dwang n ti mi̱n.
Yinangu mang da̱ngangu, n ku yikai beti̱nai yiyu ki̱ni naniyi yaana n ti yiyu ki̱kwa̱kada ti̱miyu n ti yiyu yinang ki̱ni̱biyu.”
Yinu n nwe di̱kan ker di̱du a yi ko, “Biti̱r kun, bi n wu.”
N yi mi kwako, Tewuduwe, a ne mang medu di̱ne ti̱tu a lembu yiimi we, mang wuunti̱bu ki̱dum nai yiyu a lebiyu we.
Yinu keru a fwate ki̱da ko, “Yalu chi n Kwama a do wauwade yidu we mwi a ke wauwadu.”
Ki̱chitu wu a fwe ki̱ da yitta, yinu a da̱u a ki̱lati̱ dii we.
We ki̱swi wuko ni̱bi bi̱tta ki̱yaliyedu a kwa̱r we lo wu mi̱n we mi̱ne. Ni̱bu a tume chi a Kaisariya ko a be ya mi̱n.
Fi̱ki̱m a yi mi̱n ko m bun chimi̱nti̱n n yungdu lakaku we di̱chiye n ti mi̱n. Kebu bi̱bi burukuni̱mu a nabe ni̱n ni̱n le lo nii we ware.
Yinu n ki̱n a fwa ni̱mi̱n yinangu a ku naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a le loko ki̱fwadu ko, tum chi we Yafa, a yalle Simun wu ni̱bu ki̱yallu ko Biti̱re.
N ki̱n ka be mi̱nedu ki̱ni ya̱m ti̱kurim bi̱bu m mun n ti lomo kwang ta swidi̱mu.
Yo mang mwe mi̱n fwa chi mi̱n ya̱me, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a be a ri chi yinangu a wi a fwe n ti chiniyangu.
Yinu n kur ki̱ni ya̱m Tewuduwe a fwa ko, “N Yowana a ma batisma ki̱ni mwe, aya n chi̱n ta madu ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamam.
Ka n Kwama a ni chi ki̱ti̱me a fi wiine n ti wu chire yoko niyan ke bi̱yili̱mu we Tewuduwe Yesu Masiya, m mi̱n n wure mang ko chitu n Kwama a mante?”
Yo ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m Yafudamu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a dela Kwama ko, “N Kwama a ke yikayu kuuti mi̱n ko a woti̱ ki̱ti̱mu ke a ya ti̱kuritu.”

Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m a yayan di̱ne fumaku a kuten ya̱m a dur Yistifanu. Bi̱kamu a yikan a fwe a Finikiya n ti Sayifuru n ti bi̱n di̱dun Antakiya. Ki̱ma di̱mwar ya̱m Kwamamu aya a kana ni̱bu Yafudawam n chikun.
Aya bi̱kam ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m we bi̱bu a chire a Sayifuru n ti Sairin, bi̱bu a yika Antakiya a fwa ni̱bu Yelenamu ya̱m bi̱li̱m Tewuduwe Yesumu.
Dukan Tewuduwe we n ti chi yinang yinang. A yo ni̱bu nabwen a wo ki̱ti̱mu a bunti̱ Tewuduwe.
Ya̱m chimu a fwe a Antakiya a le ki̱teli ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ a Wurchalimamu, yinu n chi a tum Barnaba a yawe Antakiya.
Yo a ya a ku ki̱li̱mang delaku Kwamange, a ma furi mwen. N ki̱n a ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure ko a ti ki̱ri̱ng we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu, a chau kakku ki̱ni ni̱ri diin we bunti̱ku Tewuduwengu.
M Barnaba naba yile wu a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamame n ti keki̱ bi̱li̱mangu. Ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Tewuduwe.
Yinu m Barnaba a du fiko a yika Tarsu bwanu ka yaan Chawulu we.

Yo a ya ki̱ne fal, a ki̱latewe ki̱ni ki̱n a Antakiya. N chi a ma swa̱r we fiko ki̱muradu n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m. Ki̱miya ni̱bu nabwen mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu yinang yinang. Ni̱bu a mwe ki̱yal ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ Masiyamu a Antakiyamu ko krista.
We ki̱dang kangu bi̱kam fa̱kubu a kun we Wurchalima a yika Antakiya.

Wuka we tibe chi di̱n ki̱nu n Aka̱bu, kangu n ki̱n a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a kun a fwa ya̱mu ko chun di̱dun yaka ma ti̱ti̱niti kwang. (Ti̱tu a be a fwe a ki̱dang Kaisar Kalaudiyu wu tau ti̱m Romame)
Miyari̱mu a ke a tum ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ki̱dire Yafudiyamu mi̱n makaku. N kawure a ma chi dukan ki̱nu a meetu.
Ti̱tu nang tiyangu n chi a ma, a tum seli̱bu ni̱bu a ki̱dire Yafudiya mi̱n makakangu. M Barnaba n ti Chawulu a yikani ki̱ni di̱tumbi̱ru.
We ki̱dang kangu, m Mai Yiridu a mwe ki̱tau bi̱kamu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m ka ni riye.
N ki̱n a yo ni̱bu a chi̱u Yakubu, ke Yowana ki̱ni kul.
Kangu n ki̱n a ku ti̱tu a li̱ma bwi Yafudawangu, n ki̱n a suu kakku a tati̱ Biti̱r. Ti̱tu a fwe a ki̱swi yiye ki̱danni ni̱bu Yafudawa wu a ne yis we.

A kuteng ki̱ku n Yiridu a tau Biti̱r, a di̱ku a di̱bi̱nti̱l, yinu a yo ni̱bi kubchiri burukuun ko a nang to ki̱nu. N ki̱n ki̱baddu ka yodu a kakku ni̱bang ke ki̱mwata ki̱mi̱n a kuteng dii yiye yabake.
M Biti̱r we di̱bi̱nti̱le, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ni yichiyu ki̱twa̱ba̱ ki̱mi̱n bunitu we di̱Kwama.

We kum wu n Yiridu a no ki̱baddu ka chake ki̱nu ke ki̱mwata ki̱mi̱ne, ni̱bu toki̱mi burabu ki̱to Biti̱r yinangu a da duumu ki̱ni maki̱lanu ni̱bu a kwaban ki̱ni̱mu. Ni̱bu ki̱to lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liyemu a tituwe kwa̱ru ki̱todu.
