Bi̱nabi̱na wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a fwe we fiko. Kaang yiiku a yii kani kwang. Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re a twai Biti̱r we kulanfwi, a yiko, “Kun!” Maki̱lanu ni̱bu a kwaban Biti̱r ki̱ni̱nu a kwiya ti̱n.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re a yi ki̱n ko, “Mu di̱ki̱ri̱nmunu n ti ki̱wami mwiyu, do lukemo m bumite.”
M Biti̱r a kun a nabu ki̱n a chir we di̱bi̱nti̱lu, a yimbu ko chitu naba di̱tumbi̱re ki̱fwaditu ki̱kumang. N ki̱n a da̱u ko kanodu dwakam bi̱yili̱m.

Yo n chi a su ni̱bu toki̱m bi̱kaki̱mu n ti bi̱robi̱mu a lam kwa̱r ka̱mbi̱ri̱nu ni̱bu ki̱len bi̱ni̱ne, kwa̱ru a wudeni ki̱fwan. N chi a chir ti̱n. Yo n chi a ya kutan we nelo, naba di̱tumbi̱re a duti̱ ki̱n.
Yinu a wora Biti̱r mi̱n fal. N ki̱n a yi ko, “Ki̱kumang n Tewuduwe a tume naba di̱tumbi̱re ko, a be chaki we fa̱la̱ng Yiridu sangu n ti ni̱r di̱yani̱n di̱du ni̱bu Yafudamu a no ki̱badu ka madi̱nu.”
Yo n ki̱n a swaane, a yika lon Maryam ne Yowana wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko n Markuse, finu ni̱bu nabwen a murami̱n ki̱twa̱ba̱ buniye.
Yo m Biti̱r a bu kwa̱re, n Ruda fwa̱n di̱du ki̱ma nanga we lonu a chire beka da̱ngdu ka n wure.
Yinangu a swir ker Biti̱rangu, a ki̱la wul mure ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan, a yi ko m Biti̱r a ti a kwa̱r sa̱ngka̱n.
N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Fangi̱mi ki̱mana?” N ki̱n a tii ki̱ri̱ngching ko nang ki̱n. Bi̱ki̱mu a yi ko kano naba di̱tumbi̱re ko.
Aya m Biti̱r ki̱bu kwa̱ri chik. Yo n chi a wude, aya m Biti̱r. N chi a ya̱r yii.

M Biti̱r a kukku fa̱la̱ngu kiyi chidu ko ti̱le mi̱n. Yinu a le ki̱fwa chimi̱nu yinangu Tewuduwe a chake ki̱n we lo di̱bi̱nti̱langu. Yinu a yi ko, “Ti̱fwa Yakubu n ti bi̱kamu kebu mi̱n.” A yikati̱ wuka fi.
Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane ni̱tu ni̱bu ki̱rangitu a kayan yinang, a bwa ni̱bu chi a fwe ki̱ni Biti̱r.
Yo n Yiridu a yo ni̱bu a babban a yabe, yinu a yo ni̱bu toki̱mu a kakku, a niti̱ ni̱bu da ko a chi̱be ni̱bu toki̱mu. A kuteng ki̱ku n Yiridu a kun we Yafudiya a ya ma yikai diti a Kaisariya.

We ki̱swi wuko, m mai Yiridu ki̱ma ki̱fwini ki̱ni ni̱bu Tayamu n ti bi̱bu a Sidoni̱mu. Ni̱bu bi̱bu a be kwa̱li diin ki̱ni ti̱kuran chitu a fiwiine. N chi a bau wu a kwatuwe di̱Maiye wu di̱kunu n Bilatu a yifi̱la maiye, ko a maka chi, chi baddu chi ku Yiridu. Yo n chi a ya fiko, a bau dokaku di̱ne n chi ki̱da̱ng ti̱m bi̱bu n nang fi n chi ki̱yang chabte.
We di n chi a dokane, n Yiridu, a do kuli̱n mati̱ni̱n ki̱nu, a swe we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu, a fwa chimi̱n ya̱m.
Yo muraki̱ ni̱bangu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a yibi kuuu ko, “Ti̱tu ker wuka kwaman, ti̱tu n ke ker niin.”
Bi̱nabi̱na wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re Tewuduwe a ngau ki̱n a mar a ti̱m di̱ne a nibu Kwama dwiyentu. We fiko rwa̱ti a wu ki̱n a lami̱nti̱ yo a bwa.
Aya ya̱m Kwamamu a chakakku ki̱ti̱radu.
Yo n Barnaba n ti Chawulu a ri nangan chiyange, n chi a ki̱la we Wurchalima, a bunga we n ti Yowana, wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko m Markuse.

We ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a Antakiyamu, fa̱kubu n ti ni̱bu yungki̱mu we. Kanang chikiye m bi̱u Barnaba n ti Simeyon wu n chi ki̱yalu ko Ki̱liye n ti Luchiyo wu a Sairine n ti Manayen (Wu a dwiyen a fa̱la̱ng Mai Yiridu) n ti Chawulu.
Yo n chi a ya ki̱sii Tewuduwe ki̱twa̱ba̱ti̱ bunitu ki̱ni dimwene, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a yi chi ko, “N sutu Barnaba n ti Chawulu di̱ne nangangu mang yal chi ka madangu.”
A kuteng twa̱ba̱ku n ti dimwen, n chi a yo Barnaba n ti Chawulu mi̱n fa̱li delaki ko a ya li̱mang.
M Barnaba n ti Chawulu a yika Salukiya, di̱ne Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a tum chi. We bwako n chi a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika Saiyifuru.
Yo n chi ti fanseti a lam Salamise, a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu we kambi muraku ni̱bu Yafudamitu. N Yowana we ware n ti chi ki̱ma makaku.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a kanang bekune wu a mwe, a yikan a fwe a Fafos. N chi a ya tekami̱n n ti wuka fa̱ku ti̱kwaniye naba Yafudiya, naba buwange wu n chi ki̱yalu ko Bar Chochuuwa.
Wu n ki̱n fate Kwabna Sarsiyu Fulu. N Kwabna Sarsiyu Fulu ki̱ni swaangku nabwen. N Kwabna a yal Barnaba n ti Chawulu di̱ne ki̱baddu ka nwe ya̱m Kwamamu.
Aya naba buwange wu di̱n ki̱nu n Alimada (ki̱ni yii ni̱bu Yelename) a kebu n chi ka fwa Kwabna mi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu ko ke Kwaba a kedu bi̱yili̱mu we.
Aya n Chawulu wu n chi ki̱yal ti̱nu ko m Buluse, a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu. N ki̱n a fi̱r Alima mi̱nti̱ nu we ri̱i̱ng.
Yinu a yi ko, “M mun bwe Setane, m mun wu mwang kebu nangang ki̱yilange, m mun naba ti̱kwani naba muli̱ne. A ne mwang du kaiku wa̱ri Tewuduwe yi deriya?

Da̱ng ki̱ka̱ngu Kwama Tewuduwe yaka welanu ki̱ni dukan, yaka yo mi̱n ti̱dui. Ka da̱u ki̱swi a ne mwang kuu kuko. Bi̱nabi̱na di̱kuun n ti ki̱liye a yinge nui kiyu. N ki̱n a funti̱ bwi a babba nii wu ka twa̱ku ki̱ne.”
Yo Kwabna a ku ki̱chitu we, a ya̱r yii, a ke bi̱yili̱mu we yungku ya̱m Tewuduwe.
M Bulus n ti ni̱bu n chi waremu a chir we Fafos we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika Fa̱rka̱ wu a ti̱m Famfiliyame. N Yowana wu n chi ki̱yalu ko Markus a du chi a ki̱la Wurchalima
N Chi ti̱n a du Fa̱rka̱ a yika Antakiya wu a ti̱m Bisidiyame. N chi a le kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudamu we difi̱kare a swe we.
A kutengu n chi a ki we lwangi̱n yili̱n Musangu n ti taki̱da fa̱kubu, tikaketi kan muraki̱nu a tum chimi̱n ya̱m ko, “Kebu mi̱m, ka ti̱ni ki̱ni bi̱kam ya̱m bi̱bu ta fwa ni̱mi̱ndi̱me, ti̱ fwa ni̱mi̱n.”
M Bulus a kun a kukku fa̱liyu a yi chi ko, “Kebu mi̱m ni̱bu Yisrela n ti yikayu kuuti bi̱bu ki̱nwe tai Kwamamu, ti̱nwe!”
N Kwama ni̱bu Yisrelamu a sutu tukebu chi̱remu, a yo chi a kau kuu wuduwe, we ki̱dangu n chi a swe a Masarangu, Yinu a chake chi ki̱ni dukan we a ti̱m Masarmu.
N Kwama a ma bwakwalange ki̱ni chi swa̱ti̱tu wan taana we di̱si̱lachangi̱nu.
N ki̱n a maka chi a chau ki̱la ki̱ni kuuti yi̱dibiin a ti̱m Kananamu. N chi a yiu ti̱m bi̱bu a kau kula chi. N chi a da̱u swa̱ti̱tu (450) yinu a ri nangang ki̱ku.
A kuteng ki̱ku, n Kwama a ni chi ni̱bu mwataki̱m a lami̱nti̱ ki̱dang Samwila fa̱ku Kwamangu.
Yinu ni̱bu a bau mai, n Kwama a ni chi Saul bwe Kise wu a chire a ki̱fi̱ku Benyami, n ki̱n a ma swa̱ti̱tu wan taana (40).
A kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a chaku Saulangu, a yo Dauda a kau Mai, yinu a fwa ya̱mu ko, “N ya bwe Yesse, ni wu mang mi̱lan yinange, wu mang ku ka ma ki̱ke miye.”
We ki̱fi̱ku niwangu, n Kwama a be Yisrela mi̱ne ki̱ni naba yuke, n Yesu. Yinangu a no fwangu.
Yo no n Yesu a no fwadebe, n Yowana a ma di̱mwaru we ni̱bu Yisrelamu ko a wo ki̱ti̱m, a ma batisma.

Yo n Yowana a mwatan ka ri nangang kange a bi̱u ko “Ti̱kuradu tiko m mi̱n n wure? M mi̱n n ke ki̱n fa. Aya wuka nii ka bedu we kuteng mangu, wu kono nang ki̱dwaku ki̱wami kiyangu mang lwebu mang kwide.”
Kebu mi̱m, n ti̱n bwesi̱m Yibrayim, n ti chi̱n yikayu kuuti ti̱nwe tayi Kwamaye, ni̱bu a tum chi̱ni mi̱ne ya̱m yukumu.
Ni̱bu Wurchalimamu n ti tikaketi chiyu a swaanbu ko n ki̱n nang naba yuke. Kasi ki̱ku yo n chi a maye a ri ya̱m fa̱kubu Kwamamu ni̱bu ki̱ kidu ka nang wuwule difi̱kare Yafudawamu.
Kasi ki̱ku n chi a yabu ki̱ni ki̱le wu a lwe bwa, n chi a yi Bi̱latu ko a chi̱u.
Kangu n chi a ri chitu a mwal a dur ki̱nitangu, n chi a si̱ku ki̱n we ki̱tiyang bwangu, a ya ti̱u ki̱n we furu.
Aya n Kwama a kuki̱ ki̱n we bi̱bwari̱mu.
Ditiyu nabwen ki̱yung dur ki̱nu we ni̱bu a bunga ware n ti ki̱n we ka̱lili yo a yaki̱ yika Wurchalima. Ki̱ka̱ngu ni̱bu bi̱bu n nang bi̱bu ki̱ma ni̱bu mi̱n di̱mwari̱mu.
N ni̱n nam bi̱bu nang fwa chimi̱n ya̱m bi̱li̱mu, chi Kwama a bwa̱u n ti tebu chi̱remu,
a ri chi̱ni mi̱n, n chi̱ni bwesi̱m ki̱mu, we ki̱dangu a kuku Yesu a furangu. Yinangu a mwal we Sa̱bura wurobengu ko,
“M mun bwemi,
n kau Te mun diwu.”
Ya̱mu n Kwama a fwa ko n Yesu a ne bwa ti̱nuwe ki̱da, a ne fwidi̱mu. Ki̱kumang n Kwama a ri di̱kwa̱l di̱du we kunku kangu ko,
“Mang ya delaki̱ki wauwadang
ki̱ku a mwintuwe ka ridang.
Ki̱ku mang bwa̱u Dauda mi̱nangu.”
A fwa a wuka fi we Sa̱bura ko, “A ne mwang du wu wauwade mo ka fwidu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Dauda a ri ki̱ke Kwama we nangangu a du ki̱mi̱nangu, yinu n ki̱n a bwa, n chi a fur ki̱n n ti tukebi̱ ki̱m, bwi kiyu a fwi.
Aya n Yesu wu n Kwama a kuku we bi̱bwari̱me a fwibu.
Di̱ne yiko, kebu mi̱n, a dakan ta yindu tiko ya̱m duku ki̱letimu, m Musa a fwa chimi̱n a di̱n Yesun.
We di̱n ki̱nu, ka nang wuwule niye wu a ke bi̱yili̱me a swi we kasi no ti̱ti̱le aya a bwin yili̱n Musantu.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱mangi daandaan ke ki̱la chitu tatti̱ki̱dai fa̱kubu Kwamamu a fwatu a fweduwe n ti chi̱n, a yi ko,
“Ti̱nwei n ti̱n bi̱bu ti̱swe ni̱bu mu,
ti̱ya̱r yii ti̱twiyan!
Yamang ma kaang nangang we ki̱dang changu
nangang ki̱ku a ne ta ke bi̱yili̱mu
kasi no wuka ni a fwa chimi̱n.”
Yo m Bulus n ti Barnaba yaki̱chiru we kwa̱re, ni̱bu a yi chi ko a be fwa chimi̱nti̱ ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱da we difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudame ki̱kanede.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱ba yaran we murakangu, ni̱bu Yafudamu nabwen n ti yikayu kuuti bi̱bu ki̱sii Kwamamu a nabu Bulus n ti Barnaba, bi̱ki̱mu a ru chimi̱n ni̱tu ko a chakakku we li̱me Kwama.
Yo difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudamu a kanenge, ni̱bu a muran yinangu bi̱nu ki̱ni kwang ka nwe ya̱m Tewuduwemu.
Aya yo ni̱bu Yafudamu a ku muraki̱ ni̱bangu nabwene, a fwiren. N chi a le ki̱kwila ya̱mu m Bulus ki̱fwadi̱mu ki̱ni kaiyan ni̱re ki̱ni swa̱baku n ti ti̱turan.

Aya m Bulus n ti Barnaba a fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu a ne tayi we, n chi a fwa ko, “A kau ni̱bu no ka mwe fwaki̱ya̱m Kwamamu we di̱chi̱ne. Aya yo tako, ti̱kudu tiko ta ya ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwadite, ni̱n ngau ni̱n ti̱ku kabu a kuuti n ke ni̱bu Yafudamu.”
Ti̱tu nang yilang Tewuduwe a yi ko,
“N yoon mwang kau
yiiku we yikayu kuuti.
Ke m be ki̱ni yuku we ti̱ti̱niti kwang.”
Kangu yikayu kuuti a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu; a ma ti̱mi̱lan, a dela ya̱m Tewuduwe. Bi̱bu ni̱bu a do chimi̱n ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwaditi̱mu a ke bi̱yili̱mu.
Ya̱m Tewuduwemu a sub a ti̱ran we ti̱m bi̱ki̱mi kwang.
Aya ni̱bu Yafudamu a suuka nati̱bu bi̱duumu n ti kwartabu ki̱sii Kwamamu a kuki̱ muli̱n we bi̱nu. N chi a yo riye a ya Bulus n ti Barnaba, ni̱bu a naba chi we ti̱m bi̱ki̱mu.
Fandubu a bu kuru we nani chiyu a kau di̱mwar ni̱bu bi̱n di̱ki̱ni̱mu, a kun a yika Yikoniya.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a Antakiyamu a ri ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lantu yinang, n chi a rii ki̱ni Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu.
We Yikoniya, m Bulus n ti Barnaba a ya Kan muraku Yelena yinangu n chi a me ki̱yadi kwadangu. N chi a fwa ya̱m Kwamamu we fiko, ni̱bu Yafudam n ti yikayu kuuti nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu.
Ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱mu, a suuke ni̱bu yikayu kuuti, a yo yaram a le tibe chi n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu.
Yinu m Bulus n ti Barnaba a ma wandi we fiko, ki̱fwa ya̱mu we dukan Tewuduwe ki̱ni ni̱ri diin, n Kwama a yung ni̱bu ko di̱mwar di̱du di̱yili̱n we chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ti chi ya̱r yiitu a li̱mekotu.
Aya ni̱bu we bi̱nu a yaran ba̱lti turau, bi̱kamu ki̱bunti̱ ni̱bu Yafudam, bi̱kamu ki̱bunti̱ fandubu.
Yinu ni̱bu a yikayu kuutimu n ti ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti tikaketi chimu a ke ka ni chi riye ka kwelati̱nu ki̱ni kali.
Yo fandubu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a wul bi̱ntu Likoniyai ka nang chikiye Listi̱ra n ti Darbe n ti bi̱nti̱tu a kwatuwe fikotu,
We bwako n chi a chakakku ki̱ni di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱nu.
We Listi̱ra, wuka nii we ki̱kube, nii wu a yaanbu yayu we kangu ni̱bu a bi̱u mi̱nangu.
Ki̱dangu n ki̱n a yaki̱nwe di̱mwar Bulusangu, m Bulus a da̱ng ki̱ni ri̱i̱ng, a ku keku bi̱yili̱mang kangu, a yim ni wu a ke bi̱yili̱mu ka ya beku.
Yinu a yi ki̱n ko, “Kun n titiye!” Nii wu a kuni ngi̱ri̱tu a mwe ka yayu.
Yo ki̱tuu ni̱be a ku chitu m Bulus a maate, a fwa ki̱ni yii Likniyamu ko, “Beti̱ kwamai a be nimi̱ne yinang ni̱bu.”
N chi ki̱yal Barnaba ko Sayus (kwama wuduwe wu a di̱yore) ki̱yal Bulus ko Yerme di̱ne ki̱n nang naba bwe di̱tumbi̱re wuduwe.

M wuduwe fanseti di̱yor Sayuse, wu kan di̱yor ki̱nu a kuteng bi̱nange, a be ki̱ni tanti̱kai n ti fili̱n ti̱tu ka dosanditu we kwa̱r bi̱ni̱nu. M Mai di̱yore n ti ni̱bu a ke ka ma fandubu mi̱n niku ki̱tuumang.
Aya yo fandubu bi̱bu m Barnaba n ti Bulus a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n chi a ngi̱ran lukei chiyu di̱ne kaiyan ni̱re, yinu a ya bwa ni̱be ki̱ni di̱yal ko,

“Ni̱bu ti̱ma wureniye? N ni̱n ni̱bu yinang chi̱n. Ni̱n be chimene ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱li̱m, ke ti̱du siiku ti̱yobitu a ne yu chinitu, ti̱nang sii Kwama wu ki̱ni ti̱kuriye, wu a yo dii n ti ti̱mu n ti nabwe latiyu n ti chitu we mureti kwange.
Yo ferediye n Kwama a du yikayu kuuti a buntu wa̱riyu n chi a kudiyu,

n ki̱n a yung yikiyu we nangi̱n ti̱yilitu a maatu. Chi niing kuri̱n ki̱ne n we kwadu: Nang mwe twiye ki̱ni nide n ti yinangu ki̱dela ni ki̱ni sa̱na̱ngu. Ki̱ri chimi̱n furu ki̱ni chabti̱tu nabwen yinu ki̱ri ni̱tu chi̱ntu ti̱n ki̱ni ti̱mi̱lan.”
Ki̱ni ya̱m chim bi̱bi kwang, n chi we bobu yinu ni̱bu a du niku ki̱tuumangu n chi no yaka ma chimi̱ndangu.
Aya bi̱kam Yafuda a be a Antakiya n ti Yikoniya a be sute ni̱tu ni̱bitu, a yo ni̱bu a kwela Bulus ki̱ni kali, yinu a wuur ki̱n, a mar, a kuteng bi̱nang ko kanadu a bwa.
Bi̱kam miyari̱m a be, a ya ki̱n we fiko, n ki̱n a kun a ki̱lati̱ bi̱nu we. Bafi̱nenangeko n ki̱n a yika Darbe n ti Barnaba.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a mwa ya̱m bi̱li̱mu a Darbengu, a ya ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu nabwenangu, n chi a ki̱la Listi̱ra, n ti Yikoniya n ti Antakiya wu a Bisidiya.

We ka nang di̱di̱le bi̱ne, n chi ki̱ ru ni̱tu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mitu, ki̱kum chimi̱nti̱ ni̱tu ko a ti ki̱ri̱ng we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu, ki̱kur chimi̱nu ko wu ki̱baddu ka le yaa Kwama ka ya fumaku nabwen.
A kuteng ki̱ku m Bulus n ti Barnaba a sutu chimi̱n seli̱bu ni̱bu we ka nang di̱di̱le kan Kwamane, a twa̱ba̱ chimi̱n bunitu ki̱ni dimwen, a yo chi a kang Tewuduwe wu n chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu we.
Yinu n chi a yikan a tau wa̱re wu a bunti̱ Bisidiya a ya fweti̱na Famfiliya.
Yo n chi a ma di̱mwar ya̱m Kwamanu we Fa̱rka̱ a kun a yikati̱ Atalia.
N chi a bunte kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ki̱la Antakiya, fi ni̱bu a wi a twa̱ba̱ chimi̱n bunitu we ko li̱me Kwama a to nangang ki̱ku n chi ki̱madange.
Yo n chi a lam fiko, a mur ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a fwa chimi̱n chitu ki̱ni kwang ti̱tu Kwama a yaki̱ madu a di̱chiyetu n ti yinangu n ki̱n a wudu yikayu kuuti mi̱n kwa̱ru a ke bi̱yili̱mangu.
N chi a ma wandi we bwako n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu.
Yo m Bulus n ti Barnaba we Antakiya, bi̱kam kebu a be a Yafudiya be ki̱miya ni̱bu mi̱nu ko, “Ka ta biibu laaru yinangu yilang Musangu a fwange, a ne ta ya yuki̱ku.”

Ti̱tu a yo Bulus n ti Barnaba a le tukaku we ya̱m bi̱bu. A kuteng ki̱ku, n chi a tum Bulus n ti Barnaba n ti bi̱kam ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m, ko a ya Wurchalima bwanu a fandubu n ti seli̱bu ya̱m Kwamame, a twaya we ya̱m bi̱bu n ti chi.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yomi̱ne chiyangu, n chi a tau Finikiya n ti Samariya ki̱fwa ni̱bumi̱mu yinangu yikayu kuuti a ke bi̱yili̱mangu. Ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ma ti̱mi̱lan.
Yo n chi a lam Wurchalima, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu n ti fandubu n ti seli̱bu kani̱mu a yiu chi kani yurau. Yinu n chi a fwa chimi̱n yinangu Kwama a maka chi we nangi̱n chitangu.
Yinu bi̱kam ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m bi̱bu a ki̱swi kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu a kun a ti a fwa ko, “Ni̱bu bi̱bu a wo ki̱ti̱m, n chi n ke ni̱bu Yisrelamu, a mwintuwe ka bii laaru yinu ka bunti̱ yilang Musangu.”
Fandubu n ti seli̱bu a muran ka ta̱l ya̱m bi̱bu.

A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a da̱u ki̱swi ki̱tukadu we muraki̱ chiyangu. M Biti̱r a kun a yi chi ko, “Kebi̱mi̱m, ti̱yim n Kwama a suti feredi we tibe chi̱n ko ke ni̱bu a yikayu kuuti a nwe ya̱m bi̱li̱mu a ke bi̱yili̱mu.
N Kwama wu a yim ni̱tu ni̱bite, a yung ki̱yiu bi̱bu n ke ni̱bu Yisrelamu yoko a ni chi Fi̱ki̱m bi̱bi wauwadi̱me, yinangu n ki̱n a ni chiniyangu.
N ki̱n a yungbu lakaku we tibe chire n ti bi̱bu n ke ni̱bu Yisrelamu, di̱ne ni̱tu chitu a nuran we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu.
Di̱ne yiko, a mayire ti̱swe Kwama ti̱yo miyari̱mu mi̱n ki̱daddake, chi a ne dwal da̱kke, ka nang chikiye, yili̱n ti̱tu a bwa tukebi̱ chirem n ti chinitu.
Aya ni̱n ke bi̱yili̱mu, n chi̱ni kwang ni swi a wa̱re wiin, wu nang wa̱re li̱me Tewuduwe n Yesuwe.”
Ni̱bu a murani̱mu a le si̱ng ki̱nwe ya̱mu m Barnaba n ti Bulus ki̱fwa chimi̱ni̱mu we chi ka̱ta̱kitu n ti chi ya̱r yiitu n Kwama a ma chimi̱n we kuuti n ke ni̱bu Yisrelamu.
Yo n chi a riye, n Yakubu a yi chi ko, “Kebu mi̱m ti̱ nwei.
N Simun a fwa chimi̱n yinangu n Kwama a mwe ki̱yung yikayu kuuti mi̱n mi̱laku we yo a da̱u ni̱bu n ke ni̱bu Yisrelamu a kau bi̱ki̱me.”
Bi̱bu fal a wuran bwi ki̱ni ya̱m fa̱ku a mwal ko,
“A kuteng ki̱ku
mang ki̱lawedu be mang
muti̱ lon Dauda a yare we.
Kasi ki̱ku a wurenangu, mang muti̱nuwe
Mang kukuti̱nu we.
N Tewuduwe a yi ko nang
wa̱re yikayu kuuti ka ban mi̱ne,
n chi ka kau bi̱suti̱ri̱m mi̱m.
N Kwama a fwa ying, n ki̱n wu a yung
ni̱bu ya̱m bi̱bu ferediye.”
“M mi̱n n ku a da yiko, a dakabu ni fuma bi̱bu n ke kuu ni̱bu Yafudamu bi̱bu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱Kwamamu.
Chi mang ku ni maditu, ni tum chimi̱nu ko a chadu chabtu ti̱yobitu we n ti yaritu, n ti naiyu ni̱bu ki̱sakkwiru sabeyu n ti ki̱tuum.
Nangki̱n we feredi ka nang di̱di̱le bi̱ne ni̱bu yungki̱mu we n ti yilang Musangu, ni̱bu ki̱kidu we kambi Kwamatu difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudamu.”

Yinu fandubu n ti seli̱bu n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi kwang, a sutu bi̱kam ni̱bu a tum a Antakiya, n chi n ti Bulus n ti Barnabas ke a be fwa chimi̱n chi we muretu. Seli̱bu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a swabi̱mu n Yafuda (wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Barsaba) n ti Sila.
N chi a tum fandubu n ti seli̱bu ki̱ni lwangi̱n ya̱m bi̱bi̱nu we Ki̱likiya n ti yikai kuuti:
N ni̱na kebu chim fandubu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m. Ni̱n mwal chimi̱nu n ti̱n bi̱bu n ke ni̱bu Yafudamu a Antakiyamu n ti ti̱m Suriyamu n ti Kilikiyamu, ni̱n sii chinedu nabwen!
Ni̱n nwe bi̱kam ni̱bu we tibe ni̱n ki̱kwau chi̱nu ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱kusi̱m ki̱miya chimi̱n bi̱kam ya̱m bi̱bu nang yimbu bwana chirmi̱nem.
Nang chi a yo nang ku a da nang sutu ni̱bu nang tum chimi̱nu n ti fati̱bu nanganmu, m bi̱u Barnaba n ti Bulus,
n chi bi̱bu a ni dutu chitu di̱ne di̱n Tewuduwe Yesu Masiya.
Di̱ne yiko ni̱n tum chimi̱ne Yafuda n ti Silas. N chi chifwan ka fwa chimi̱n ya̱m ni̱mu yinangu we mi̱nangu.
“A le yiko we Fi̱ki̱m, n ni̱n ni̱n da̱ng a le ni̱mi̱n ti̱n ta swaan ya̱mu ke a kau chimi̱nuwe ki̱ni tureng,
kanang chikiye, niku ki̱tuum a di̱yorangu n ti chakku ki̱tuumangu, n ti wuku nam wu ni̱bu a sakkwirusabbe n ti yaritu. Ka ti̱ soo yichiyu we ti̱te, ti̱ma chitu a daantu yinange. N du chi̱n li̱mang.”
N chi a kun a yika Antakiya, a ya mur ni̱bu, a ni lwangi̱n di̱du.
Yo ni̱bu a ki lwangi̱n di̱de, a nwe ta̱ma̱ng di̱ne lwangi̱n di̱du a su chimi̱n runi.
N Yafuda n ti Sila, di̱ne n chi fa̱kubu Kwamame, a ngau kebi̱bu mi̱n ki̱kure ki̱ni ya̱miyu a kum chimi̱n ti̱n ni̱tti̱tu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a ma wanditi we bwako, yinu a sikan n ti kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a du chi a ki̱la bwa ni̱bu a tumi̱ne chiye.
[Aya n Sila a ke ka swedu we bwako.]
M Bulus n ti Barnaba a swe we Antakiya ki̱maka ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱yungdi̱mu n ti bi̱bu a fwa ya̱m bi̱li̱m Tewuduwemu.
A kuteng wanditiyangu, m Bulus a yal Barnaba ko chi yika siram a bi̱nti̱tu no n chi a ma mi̱ne di̱mwar di̱kwa̱l ya̱m bi̱li̱m Tewuduwe fereditu, ke chi ku yinangu n chi ki̱madangu.
Aya m Barnaba a no ke ka yikadu n ti Yowana wu n chi ki̱yalu ko m Markuse.
Aya m Bulus a ko di̱ne m Markus a du chi we Famfiliya a ko a yikabu ware n ti chi.
Tukaku chiyangu a ma dukan a mwintuwe n chi a yaran. M Barnaba a yal Markus a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yika Saiyifuru.
Aya m Bulus a sutu Sila, a bunga ware a kutengu kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yo chimi̱n delaku we di̱n Tewuduwenu.
N chi a bunti̱ Suriya n ti Ki̱likiya, ki̱kum ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu mi̱n ni̱tti̱tu.
M Bulus a ya Darbe n ti Listi̱ra. We Listi̱ra wuka naba miyare we di̱n ki̱nu n Timoti. N ki̱n bwe wuka na Yafudiya wu ki̱bunti̱ Kwama. N te ki̱n naba Yelena.
Kebi̱bu a Listi̱ra n ti Yikoniyamu ki̱wer Timoti we nangi̱n kitu.
Di̱ne m Bulus ki̱baddu ka yikadu n ti Timotiye, a bi ki̱mi̱n laaru di̱ne ni̱bu Yafudam a ki̱twalang kange a yim ko n te Timotiye naba Yelena.
We ki̱dangu n chi a chir ki̱bunti̱ bi̱nti̱tu, ki̱fwa ni̱bu mi̱nu chi seli̱bu n ti fandubu we Wurchalima a fwa ya̱m chabti̱mu n ti bi̱bu a yarimu, ke n chi a madu ti̱kali we ki̱ni yilangu.
Di̱ne yiko, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu ki̱sudu ki̱la mi̱n fiko ki̱ni keku bi̱yili̱mangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku m Bulus n ti Sila a kana bi̱ntu Firichiya n ti Ka̱latiya di̱ne Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a dang chi fwaku ya̱m Kwamamu we Asiyange.
Yo n chi a lam ki̱dire wu a ti̱m Misiyame, n chi a funti̱bwi ka bunti̱ Bitiniya, aya Fi̱ki̱m Yesumu a dubu chi ko a ya.
Di̱ne yiko, n chi a bunti̱ ki̱ti̱ku Misiya, a suu bwa Toruwa.
Ki̱ni kum m Bulus a ma dwakam bi̱yili̱m, we dwakamu, n ki̱n a ku naba Makadoniya a titiye ki̱wana ki̱nu ko, “Be Makidoniya, be maka ni̱n.”
A kuteng ki̱ku m Bulus a ku dwakam bi̱yili̱mangu, nang kaibu ki̱swi, ni̱n kun ni̱n yika Makidoniya. Di̱ne ni̱n swaan ko n Kwama a yal ni̱n ko ya ni̱n ma di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱mi̱nu we bwako.
Yinu ni̱n kun we Toruwa ni̱n le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ni̱n yika Samurtakiya. Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, ni̱n yika Niyafoli.
We bwako, ni̱n kun ni̱n yika Filibi wu a wume mati̱n Roma, n nang bi̱n di̱dunu we ti̱m Makidoniyamu. Ni̱n ma wanditi we bwako.

We difi̱kare Yafudame ni̱n chir we kwa̱r bi̱ni̱nu, ni̱n yika ki̱ti̱ku laang fi ni̱n kamadu nang yaan ni̱bu Yafudam ki̱twa̱ba̱ mi̱n buniye, ni̱n swe we fiko ni̱n fwa ya̱mu n ti nati̱bu a muran we fikomu.

N Lidiya we bi̱bu a sii ki̱tele yinang ki̱nwe ni̱ni̱mu, n ki̱n fwa̱n Tiyati̱ra, ki̱feku kuli̱n di̱di bungbungi̱n di̱du a ma ka̱mbi̱ri̱n. N Tewuduwe a wudu ni̱r ki̱nu, n ki̱n a si ki̱tele we ya̱m Kwamamu m Bulus ki̱fwadi̱mu.

A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma n ti ni̱bu lokomu, n ki̱n a wana ni̱n ko, “Ka ta ke bi̱yili̱mu we Tewuduwe, ti̱be Lomi ti̱ si̱ku we. A kutengu n ki̱n a da ni̱mi̱n ki̱ti̱mangu, ni̱n ke ki̱mi̱n.”
Wuka di, yinangu nang chir ni̱n yika twa̱ba̱kungu, ni̱n tekan n ti di̱kan fwa̱n ka̱be di̱du ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti di̱du ki̱ma buwang. Wu tewuduwe ko ki̱ya ka̱mbi̱r we nabwen we buwangu ki̱madangu.
Fwa̱n di̱du a le ki̱bung ni̱mi̱n ti̱nu, n ni̱n n ti Bulus, ki̱fwa ya̱mu dukan ko, “Ni̱bu bi̱bu ni̱bu Kwama Tewuduwe, ki̱ma chimi̱n di̱mwar wa̱re wu a yuke.”
Ditiyu nabwen ki̱fwa ya̱m bi̱bu, ti̱tu a kai Bulus mi̱n ni̱r, n ki̱n a sabran a yi fwa̱nu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti ko, “We di̱n Yesu Masiya, chir mi̱n we fwa̱nu. Bi̱nabi̱na ki̱fi̱btiyu a chirti̱n.”
Yo Tewuduweko a kuu wa̱re yaku ka̱mbi̱re chingu a tale, n chi a tau Bulus n ti Sila, a yikan tikaketi ni̱bu kabaki̱mu mi̱ni ki̱n a bwa kwa̱ma̱re.
Yo n chi a lam fi a kwa̱l kabaki̱ne, a yi chi ko, “Ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu ki̱kai bi̱n chi̱renu.
N chi ki̱miya datiyu a dakabu n chi̱ni ni yiddu ka ni bunti̱ne. Di̱ne n chi̱ni ni̱bu Roma.”
Ni̱bu a kiya chimi̱ntuwe ki̱ti̱bu, kwa̱l kabaki̱nu a ngi̱ra chimi̱n lukeyu, a suku chi a dubi twatwad, yinu a yi ni̱bu ko a twalani kwa̱ntang.
A kuteng ki̱ku ni̱bu a ni chi riyengu, a mar chi a di̱bi̱nti̱l, yinu a yi nii ki̱to lo di̱bi̱nti̱le ko a to yinang.
Nii ki̱to lo di̱bi̱nti̱le a yiu ya̱m bi̱bu kani yurau, a yikani ki̱n a kan di̱du a murenu, a kwau chi a di̱bi̱nti̱l kwali̱mi̱n.
Ki̱ni ki̱tangti̱lang kuma̱ng m Bulus n ti Silas ki̱twa̱ba̱ bunitu ki̱kabati̱ teni delaki Kwamamu, ti̱bi̱nti̱litu ki̱nwe chidu yinangu n chi ki̱kaba teniyangu.
Bi̱nabi̱na ti̱mu a mi̱kan ki̱ni dukan, lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liye a mi̱kan ki̱ni tame kwang. Kanang di̱di̱le kwa̱re a wuden, maki̱lanitu a fa̱li ti̱bi̱nti̱liniti kwang a kwiyan a twaka ti̱n.
Yinangu naba toke a kaban we duumangu a ku kwa̱ti̱tu a wudenangu, a chaku too ki̱baddu ka chi̱u dur ki̱nu, di̱ne we kamaki̱ kangu, ko kano ti̱bi̱nti̱litu a chir.
Aya m Bulus a ngau keru ki̱ni dukan ko, “Chiddu dur munu we, n ni̱n we ki̱ni kwang!”
Yinu nii ki̱to lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liye a bau ki̱rang, a wul we bwa di̱Bulus n ti Sila a ya yar we kakku chiyangu.
A chaku chi a fi̱lang yinu a bi̱u chi ko, “Tewuduwe, mang ma wureni ke n ya yuke?”
N Chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱n Tewuduwe n Yesu, mwang ya yuku, mun n ti lomo kwang.”
We ki̱dang kangu, n chi a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱m Tewuduwe mu n ti bi̱bu we di̱bi̱nti̱li̱m kwang.
We ki̱swi wuko, nii ki̱to lo di̱bi̱nti̱liye a yikani ki̱ni chi a nura chimi̱n bumbitu, yinu n chi a ma ki̱mi̱n batisma, n ki̱n n ti loko kwang.
Nii ki̱to lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liye a be ki̱ni chi a loko, a ni chi chabti̱tu we fiko. N ki̱n n ti loko a ri ki̱ni ka ti̱mi̱lan di̱ne n chi a ke bi̱yili̱mu we di̱Kwama.
Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, kwa̱l kabaki̱nu a tum chitu ko ni̱bu a yi ni ki̱to lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liye ko. “A mar ni̱bu bi̱bu.”
Nii ki̱to lo ti̱bi̱nti̱liye a yi Bulus ko, “Kwa̱l kabaki̱nu a tume chi, ko m mar chi̱n. Di̱ne yiko ti̱chir, ti̱ya li̱mang.”

Aya m Bulus a yi ko, “N chi a twala ni̱n a kakku ni̱bang, yoko n chi a tibu kabade, kasi ki̱ku n ni̱n ni̱bu Romame. N chi a mar ni̱n a di̱bi̱nti̱l. Yinu ki̱chaku ni̱nni daan. A ne nang chiru! N chi a be chifwan, a be chaku ni̱n.”
Ni̱bu nanganmu a ya fwa kwa̱l kabaki̱nu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu. Tayi a tau ni̱bu bi̱bu kangu a nwe ko ni̱bu bi̱bu ni̱bu Romamu.
Yinu n chi a be a ni Bulus n ti Sila bwanu. A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a yo ni̱bu bi̱bu, a wana chi a chir we bi̱nu.
Yo m Bulus n ti Sila a chire we di̱bi̱nti̱le, a yika bwa di̱Lidiya. A kutengu n chi a ku kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mangu, a ru chimi̱n ni̱tti̱tu, yinu a yikan.
M Bulus we yayu chi a bunti̱ Amfibolis n ti Afoloniya, a fwadu a Tasalonika finu ki̱ni kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudame.
Yinangu n ki̱n a meki̱madi kwadangu, m Bulus a ma wandi yitta we kan muraki̱nu, ki̱tukadu n ti chi we difi̱kare ni̱bu Yafudam we ya̱m bi̱mwali̱m Kwamamu.
Ki̱fwa chimi̱nu yinang ya̱mu wemi̱nangu, ki̱yung ti̱nu ko m Masiya ki̱kumang a nwe riye, yinu ki̱kumang a kun we furu. M Bulus a chakakku ko, “N Yesu wu mi̱n fwa chimi̱ne, n nang Masiya.”
Yinu bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti ni̱bu Yelenamu bi̱bu ya̱m Kwamamu a twai chimu a ke bi̱yili̱m ya̱mu m Bulus n ti Silas n ti bi̱kam bi̱duum nati̱bu nabwen a bungan ware n ti chimu ke chi sii ti̱n chi.

Aya ni̱bu Yafudamu a fwiren, a ya babba bwesi̱m ki̱fi̱bti̱m bi̱bu ki̱swedu a kwa̱mari̱m. Yo bi̱ki̱mu a murane, a suki̱tu ni̱tu ni̱bitu ki̱ni kulangkulange we bi̱nu. N chi a wul we lo Yasone wu m Bulus n ti Sila a si̱ki̱mi̱ne ke chi be ni̱bu mi̱ne ki̱ni chi a tibe ni̱be.
Yo n chi a ri we, a ki̱la tau Yason n ti bi̱kamu kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m a yikan kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱nang ki̱ni keme chi ko, “Ni̱bu bi̱bu nang bi̱bu ki̱luku ti̱ti̱nimu, n chi a bete fi.
Nang wu n Yason a yiu chi we loko. N chi ki̱ki yilang Kaisar, ki̱yidu ko wuka Mai we, di̱n ki̱nu n Yesu.”
Yo ni̱bu bi̱ni̱mu n ti kwa̱l kabaki̱nu a nwe bi̱be, ti̱kuran chitu a muten.
N chi a marbu Yason n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu, a yo chi a fe ka̱mbi̱r yinu a mar chi.
Ki̱ni kum, kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yo Bulus n ti Silas ko a yika Biriya. Yo n chi a lam bwako a le kan muraki̱n ni̱bu Yafudamu.
Yade bi̱bu ni̱bu ki̱ni bwanu yinang Tasalonika, a yiu ya̱m chimi kani yurau. N chi ki̱ta̱l ya̱m Kwamamu ni̱bu a mwali̱mu diti ki̱da̱ng. Ki̱baddu ka yindu ka ya̱m Bulusi̱mu bi̱yili̱me.
We Biriya ni̱bu nabwen a ke bi̱yili̱mu. A lanti̱ bi̱duumu nati̱bu Yelena n ti bi̱kam kwartabu Yelena nabwen.
Aya yoko ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a Tasalonikamu a nwe ko m Bulus ki̱ma di̱mwar ya̱m Kwamanu a Biriya, n chi a ya we bwako a ya kuku muli̱nu we bwako ti̱n.
Bi̱nabi̱na kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yo Bulus a yika ki̱ti̱ki̱ laang kasi ki̱ku n Silas n ti Timoti a dubu bi̱nangu.
Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a bungan n ti Bulusi̱mu, a su a yika Atina ki̱ni Bulus. Yo yaka ki̱lade, m Bulus a tume chi we di̱Timotiye n ti Silas ko a be bwa di̱ki̱ne daatu.
Yo m Bulus ki̱yam Timoti n ti Silas we Atina, ni̱r ki̱nu a kaiyan yinangu a ku bi̱ni kwang ka ti̱yobiye.
Diti ki̱da̱ng n ki̱n ki̱tukadu we kan muraki̱ ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti bi̱kamu ni̱bu Yelenam bi̱bu ki̱sii Kwamamu. Kanang wuwule diye ki̱tukadu n ti bi̱bu n ki̱n ki̱yadu a kwa̱ma̱ru.
N ki̱n ki̱tukadu ti̱n n ti Abikuriya n ti ni̱bu Sitokiyam bi̱bu ki̱ni yingku yinangi̱mu. Bi̱kamu a yi ko, “N ki̱n naba didi̱kuni̱ne wu, ki̱fwa chimi̱nu ko wule?”
Bi̱kamu a yi ko, “Yinang nii wu ki̱ma di̱mwar ti̱yobi ki̱fi̱bti a newe bwa̱ka̱nitu.” N chi a fwa ying di̱ne m Bulus ki̱ma di̱mwar Yesunu n ti kunki̱ kwa̱miyang.
N chi a yikani ki̱ni Bulus a kun Arasan nang fi kwa̱l kabaki̱n a bi̱n we mi̱ne. N chi a bi̱u ki̱n ko, “We mwang kedu, mwang fwa ni̱mi̱n ya̱m bi̱fwim bi̱bu mun miyadi̱ma?
Di̱ne nang nwengbu ya̱m bi̱bu we ki̱teli niyu. Ni̱n baddu nang swaan ya̱m bi̱bu yinang.”
Ni̱bu Atinami kwang n ti rungko ki̱ swedu we ti̱m chime, a ke ka nwe ya̱m bi̱fwim ke chi fwa ya̱mu we dur ki̱nu yinang.
Yinu m Bulus a kun a titiye we muraku chiyangu a kun di̱yori̱n a yi chi ko, ni̱bu Atinam! N swaan, n ti̱n ni̱bu bi̱bu ki̱bau ya̱m Kwamamu yinang kasi no wuwule ki̱swi.

Di̱ne yo mang bwa̱l we nelo, n ku kwali̱n chi̱nu ti̱sidi̱nu, n kuti̱ di̱kan kweer di̱du a niku ki̱tuuman ki̱ni di̱mwal di̱du, “Di̱ne Kwama wu niyang yimbe.” Ki̱kumang Kwama wu ti̱siidu niyang yimbe, nang wu mi̱n mwa chi̱ne.
N Kwama wu a yo ti̱ti̱nitu n ti chi we mureti kwange, n Tewuduwe diye n ti ti̱mi kwange, a swebu we fantiyu ni̱bu a ma fa̱la̱ngiyu.
Ti̱nti̱ne a babu ni ka maka ki̱nu, a bati̱bu ti̱kan chi, di̱ne n ki̱n ki̱ni ti̱kuri n ti Fi̱ki̱mi kwang.
We nii wiin n ki̱n a yo, kuuti yiyu a ti̱ti̱niyi kwang a chire we. N ki̱n ki̱yo ki̱dangu n ti fantiyu ka nang wuwule kuuwe ka sweendiyu.
“N Kwama a ma ying ko ke ni̱bu a bau ki̱n, ka we twaya ki̱ku ni̱bu ka ya ki̱ne kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n a newe kutan n ti ka wuwule chirengu.
N ki̱n nang wu ki̱yo ti̱kuri chi̱retu ki̱twa̱du, ni ma bwiyu ki̱ni ti̱kuri.” Yinangu bi̱kamu ni̱bu tenim chim a fwangu, bi̱yili̱m n chi̱ni ti̱n a ki̱kuwang kang.
Yinu yo we yiko, a dakabu ni yidu ko Kwama chire, ni̱bu a ma fa̱la̱ng ki̱ni si̱nariya ka asurfa n ti kali yiyiliye.
Yo ferediye, n Kwama a mwatabu ni̱bu mi̱nbu we ki̱leti kawure ki̱madu a kwalan swaangku chi̱nge. Aya ki̱ka̱ngu, n ki̱n ki̱yal ni̱bu ka bwa̱le ko a wo ki̱ti̱m.
Di̱ne n ki̱n a yo di wu beka mwata ti̱ti̱nitu mi̱nde. N Kwama a yung ni̱bu ko ti̱tu ka fwedu yo a kuku ki̱n we fure.
Yo n chi a nwe ya̱m kunku kwa̱miyange, bi̱kamu a nuranurane, aya bi̱kamu ko chi nweti̱ ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱da.
We ki̱dang kangu, m Bulus a chir we fi a murake.
A kuteng ki̱ku, bi̱kamu a nabu Bulus, a ke bi̱yili̱mu. N Diyonisiyu, bwe kwa̱l kabaki̱ne wuka naye wu di̱n ki̱nu n Damari n ti bi̱kam a nabu Bulus.
A kuteng ki̱ku, m Bulus a chir we Atina a yika Korinti.

We bwako n ki̱n a ngaban n ti wuka naba Yafuda di̱n ki̱nu n Akila, naba bi̱n Fontu. Aya n Akila n ti nayeko m Biriskila a mabu ke yinangu n chi a ki̱lawe Yitaliyangu. Di̱ne n Kalaudiyu a na yilang ko ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱ni kwang a du ti̱m Romamu. Yinu m Bulus a ya bwana di̱chiye.
Yade n chi ka ni̱bu ki̱ti ti̱kubime, n ki̱n a swe n ti chi ki̱ma nangangu ware.
Kanang wuwule difi̱kare ni̱bu Yelenamu, n ki̱n ki̱le kan muraki̱nu ki̱funti̱bwi we tukaku ko ke ki̱wuba we ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti yikayu kuuti.
Ki̱dangu n Silas n ti Timoti a be we Makidoniyangu, m Bulus a da̱u ki̱swi ko, ki̱ma di̱mwaru ki̱fwa ni̱bu Yafudamu mi̱nu we bi̱yili̱m Yesu nang Masiya.

Aya ni̱bu Yafudamu a le swa̱ba Bulus ki̱tura ti̱nu, n ki̱n a ngau kuli̱n ki̱nu fi̱ti̱b ko, “Ni̱bu ka bau ki̱tuum chimu a dutu chi̱n!” Mi̱n n chir we bi̱bu. A mwetuwe diwu mang ki̱ladi bi̱bu n chi n ke kuu ni̱bu Yafudame.
M Bulus a chir we kan muraki̱nu a yika lo Titus, Yustus naba kuu wu ki̱sii Kwama. Loko a kwatuwe kan muraki̱nu.
N Kiribu wuduwe kan muraki̱ne a ke bi̱yili̱mu we Tewuduwe n ki̱n n ti di̱kur lon ki̱nu. Ni̱bu Korintiyam we fikomu a keti̱ bi̱yili̱mu yinangu a nwe ya̱m Bulusi̱mu, n chi a mati̱ batisma.
Ki̱ni kum wuka di, n Tewuduwe a fwa Bulus mi̱n yam a dwakam bi̱yili̱m ko, “Nwedu tayuwe, nang fwa ya̱m Kwamamu dudu we.
Di̱ne m mi̱n we n ti mun, a ne ni ka ma mi̱n ti̱kan chiye we, di̱ne mi̱ni ki̱ni ni̱bu nabwen we bi̱n di̱du.”
M Bulus a ma swa̱r we bi̱n di̱du ki̱ni swarti turukuun, ki̱miya chimi̱n ya̱m Kwamamu.
Yo n Ka̱liyo ki̱ma mati̱n a ti̱m Akayamu we diti yikiyu, ni̱bu Yafudam a ruki̱ yichiyu a bwila Bulus mi̱n, a yikan kwa̱l kabaki̱n.
N chi a yi ko, “Nii wu ki̱funti̱ bwi ki̱yo ni̱bu ki̱sii Kwama a wa̱re wu yilang chirengu a konge.”
Yo m Bulus ki̱funti̱bwi ka fwa ya̱me, n Ka̱liyo a yi ni̱bu Yafudam ko, “N Ki̱n nii wu a no ma wuwule ki̱le, ka ki̱le wuduwe mi̱n baddu mang yindu.
Aya ka nang ya̱mi baskaku ti̱kwa̱liyitu n ti di̱nbitu n ti yili̱n Musante, n ti̱n n ti̱fwan, ti̱nang kusadi ki̱n a ne lwangang mang we, mi̱n mang kababu ki̱dum ya̱m bi̱bumu.”
N ki̱n a kaka chi we kan kabaki̱nu.
N chi a kun a tau Sostanus, wuduwe kan muraki̱ne, a ngau a tanti̱lange kan kabaki̱ne, aya a kubu Ka̱liyo ni̱r.

A kuteng ki̱ku m Bulus a ma yikai diti we Korinti, yinu kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a yi ki̱n ko a ya li̱ma. N ki̱n a le Kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti Biriskila n ti Akila a yika Suriya. Aya yo n chi yaka yikade, m Bulus a kwal dur ki̱nu kwale we Kanki̱riya.
Yo n chi a lam Afisa, m Bulus a du Biriskila n ti Akila, n ki̱n a le kan muraki̱nu ki̱tukadu n ti ni̱bu Yafudamu.
N chi a wana ki̱n ko a dati̱ yikai diti, aya n ki̱n a ko.
Aya yo yaka du chide a yi ko, “Mang ki̱late bwa di̱ chi̱ne we ka n Kwama a ke miye.” Yinu a du Afisa, a le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a yikan ti̱n.
Yo n ki̱n a lam Kaisariya, a sub a si ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu yinu a suu a yika Antakiya.
A kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a da ditiyu nabwen we Atakiyangu, a kun a yika Ka̱latiya n ti ti̱m Firichiya ki̱bunti̱ ka nang di̱di̱le bi̱ne, ki̱ru ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu.
A kutengu niyang dami̱nangu, wuka naba Yafuda di̱n ki̱nu n Afolos a ya Afisa. N ki̱n naba Aleksandiriya, ni wu a me kasi fwaku ya̱ma̱ngu, a yim ya̱m Kwamamu ni̱bu a mwal yinang yinang.
N ki̱n a ya yungku a wa̱re Tewuduwe. N ki̱n ki̱funti̱bwi we bale fwaku ya̱me, ki̱miya kasi bi̱yili̱mu we dur Yesunu. Aya n ki̱n a yim ka ya̱m batisma Yowana.
N Ki̱n a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan yinang we kan muraki̱nu. Yo n Biriskila n ti Akila a nwe ki̱ne, n chi a yal a ki̱swi yinu a su ki̱mi̱n furu ki̱ni ya̱m Kwamamu yinang.

Yo Afolos ki̱baddu ka yabu bale ti̱m Akayame, ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a maka ki̱n. N chi a mwal ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a Akayamu mi̱n lwangi̱n ko ke a yiu ki̱n kaniyi yurau. Yo n ki̱n a lam bwako, a kabi ki̱ni makaku we bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu di̱ne li̱me Kwamamu.
Di̱ne n ki̱n a la ni̱bu Yafudamu nabwen we tibe ni̱be, ki̱yung chidu a ne kamakuwe, we yinangu tatti̱ki̱daiyu a fwa ko n Yesu nang Masiyangu.
Ki̱dangu n Afolos a Korintiyangu, m Bulus a kana fantiyu we bwako a fwadu a Afisa, bwanu a ya tekami̱n n ti bi̱kam miyari̱me.
N ki̱n a bi̱u chi ko, “Ti̱yiu fi̱kumi wauwadi̱mu yoko ta ke bi̱yili̱ma?”
Yinu n chi a ke ki̱mi̱n ko, “Nang yimbu, nang nweenti̱bu ya̱m Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu we.”
Yinu m Bulus a bi̱u chi, “Yoye ti̱ma bi̱bi̱le ki̱dum batisma? N chi a ke ko, ‘Nang dumu n Yowana a mamu.’ ”
M Bulus a yi ko, “Batisma Yowana di̱ne ke ni̱bu a wo ki̱ti̱m. N ki̱n kiyi ni̱bu ko a ke bi̱yili̱mu we nii wu ka bedu a kuteng kange, ka nang chikiye n Yesu.”
Yinangu a nwe bi̱bangu, a ma chimi̱n batisma a di̱n Tewuduwe Yesu.
Ki̱dangu m Bulus a yo fa̱lliyangu, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a be chimi̱ne. N chi a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni yikai yiini yinu a mati̱n fa̱kuitu.
Ni̱bu we fikomu ki̱ni kwang, n chi kubu chiri burau.
Yinu m Bulus a le Kan muraku ni̱bu Yafudamu a ma swarti ti̱ta ki̱fwa ya̱mu a ne tayi we. N ki̱n ki̱tukadu n ti chi ki̱funti̱ bwi ka yo chidu ka swan ya̱m yaa Kwamamu.

Aya bi̱bi kuli̱ni̱mu a ko a kebi̱ bi̱yili̱mu, n chi ki̱fwa ya̱mu a li̱mbi̱li̱mem we ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ wa̱re Tewuduwe mu. Di̱ne yiko, m Bulus a yikan n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a du chi. N ki̱n a ya a swe a fii miyake Tiranus ki̱miya chimi̱nuwe diti ki̱da̱ng.
N ki̱n a chau kakki ki̱n we fiko swa̱ti̱ti turau, ti̱tu a yo ni̱bu Yafudam n ti Yelena a swe a ti̱m Asiyamu a nwe ya̱m Tewuduwe mu.
N Kwama a ma chi ya̱r yiitu nabwen ti̱tu ni̱bu a kuunbuwetu a fa̱la̱ng Bulusang.
Di̱ne kono nang di̱lukten di̱yili̱n ki̱nu ka luke wu a bwi kiye, ni̱bu ki̱ da̱du ki̱ni ni̱bu a bubuwemu ka a twaiye, buri̱n chitu ki̱bedu ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu ki̱chiru.

Bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudam we ki̱bwa̱ladu we bi̱nti̱tu ki̱chaku fi̱ki̱m bi̱bwilamu. N chi a funti̱bwi ka ma nangangu ki̱ni di̱n Tewuduwe Yesunu we bi̱bu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti yibwilai. N chi ki̱fwadu ko, “Mi̱n ya̱nu we di̱n Yesunu, m Bulus ki̱mang di̱mwari̱nu, chirmi̱n!”
Bwesi̱m Sikam wuduwe fansetiyeyu wu a ni̱bu Yafudiyame chi bi̱dibiin ki̱mati̱ ki̱chitu wu.
Wuka di, ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu a ke chi mi̱n ko, “N yim Yesu, n yimti̱ Bulus, aya ti̱n n bi̱wure?”
Yinu nii wu ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti yi̱bwilaye a da chimi̱ntuwe, a la dukan chi̱ni kwang. A ngau chi a nwe chimi̱n burang, a yo n chi a chiri twatwad we lo ki̱ni bwiti susur ka ki̱tum.
Yinangu ni̱bu Yafudamu a swe a Afisa n ti Yelena a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, tayi a tau chi ki̱ni kwang, di̱n Yesu Tewuduwenu ka ya ri̱kaku.
Ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu a chire ki̱fwa ti̱bwilaitu n chi a no ki̱maditu kwa̱rikwa̱ri.
Ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a no ki̱ma buwamu a chake kuli̱ni buwangi chitu a be twi a fiwiine we nuyi ni̱biyu. Kangu n chi a ki ka̱mbi̱r kuli̱ni ti̱tangu, a da̱ng ka lam ka̱mbi̱r suren kuuni wan tunu.
Nang tiyangu ya̱m Tewuduwe a ti̱ran a mati̱ dukanu yinangu.
We kuteng ki̱ku ti̱chituwu a fwengu, m Bulus a nwe Fi̱ki̱mu a twai ni̱r ki̱nu a yi ko ka ya Wurchalima ka bunti̱n Akaya n ti Makidoniya yinu ka yika Roma.
N ki̱n a tum ni̱bu nanganmu n chi burau, ka nang chikiye n Timoti n ti Yeratu ko a ya Makidoniya. N ki̱n a swe we ti̱m Asiyamu.
We ki̱dang kangu, ya̱m bi̱duum a kun we Afisa yinang yinang di̱ne wa̱re Tewuduwe n Yesu.
Di̱ne wuka nii we di̱n ki̱nu n Dimitiriyu, wu ki̱medu ki̱mu di̱yor Artemis ki̱ni asurfa. N ki̱n n ti ni̱bu nanga komu ki̱dii ka̱mbi̱r we nangang ki̱ku yinang.
N ki̱n a yal ni̱bu ki̱ma nangang ki̱ki̱mu n ti bi̱bu nangang chiyangu a fi wiinemu a yi chi ko, “Kal mi̱n, ti̱yim kuli chi̱retu ni yadu a nangang ki̱ku.

Yinu ti̱kudu ti̱nweti̱du n ke ka Asiya, we ti̱m Afisa ti̱nti̱n nii wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko m Buluse, wu a butu ni̱bu nabwene, a sute ni̱tu chitu di̱ne ki̱fwa chimi̱nu ko a siidu kwali̱n chi̱nu ni̱bu a mubbi fa̱linu we.

Ki̱kumang yare we, n ke nangang chirengu yaka kaiyadu, kono nang se wuduwe wuwiye a Artemis, yaka kau ti̱kusi. Ki̱siyang wuwiye wu ni̱bu ki̱sii ki̱nu we ti̱m Asiyamu kwang a lanti̱ ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱siide, ka kwala dwiyen kitu.”
Yo muraku chiyangu a nwe ya̱m Dimitiriyusi̱me, a kuni kulangkulang ki̱ni kemi ko, “Artemis wu a Afisa wuduwe!”
Bi̱nu ki̱ni kwang a muten, ni̱bu a chir a yawe bwana murake, ki̱wuba Ka̱yus n ti Aristakus ni̱bu Makadoniyamu n chi fati̱bi̱ Bulus.
M Bulus a no ke ka le muraki̱ ki̱ku, aya ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ko ki̱mi̱n.
Ko no nang bi̱kamu bi̱duum mati̱m we Asiya bi̱bu ki̱ma fati̱n n ti Bulusi̱mu a ko ki̱mi̱n ko a ledu muraki̱ ki̱ku we.
Ko no nang bi̱bu a ya muraki̱mu a muten, a yimbu chi a yo n chi a murane. Bi̱kamu ni̱bu ki̱kukku keru ki̱fwa ti̱tu, aya bi̱kamu ka kukku kerre ki̱fwa ti̱kan chi dang.
Bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudam a yo Aleksanda a kakku, n ki̱n a kuku fa̱la̱ngu ko ni̱bu a lemi̱n ke ki̱fwa chimi̱n.
Aya yinangu n chi a swaan ko n ki̱n naba ni̱bu Yafudangu, n chi a su keme ko, “Artemis wu a Afisa wuduwe!” N chi a tau ki̱ma ti̱chituwu a lam awa yurau.
Yinu naba mwalke bi̱ne a yo ni̱bu a lemi̱n, n ki̱n a yi chi ko. “Ni̱bu Afisa, n kawure a yimbu ko bi̱n Afisanu nang di̱du ki̱to se wuduwe wuwiye Artemis, n ti kale wu wauwade a swiye a diye.
Yo ya̱m bi̱bu a ne nii ka kwilade we, a dakan tanodi wudidi, ti̱wa̱rtadu chi we.
Ti̱da̱ng ni̱bu ta be ki̱n a fimu, a mabu kutu we se yinu a fwati̱bu bi̱kam ya̱m bi̱bu a swa̱ba ku we dur di̱yor wuwiyenu.
Aya ka n Dimitiriyu n ti fati̱bu nangang kangi̱mu ki̱ni bi̱kam ya̱m n ti wuka niye, kan kabaki̱nu we ki̱ni wuti̱l, ni̱bu kabaki̱mu we, a ya mai keme.
Aya ka ti̱kan chi we ti̱tu ti̱badu ta yindite, kwa̱l ni̱bu kabaki̱nu we ka do ti̱nu.

Ki̱ka̱ngu tayi a tau ni̱n, di̱ne n chi̱ni ni newe ki̱ni kwari̱lle wu niin tiin kakku we chi a yo kusi̱r di̱de. Ki̱ka̱ngu ka bi̱duum Romamu a bi̱u ni ko ni ma kusi̱r di̱du a wureni̱ne, n chi̱ni ni ne di̱ki̱li̱n yiin we.”
A kuteng ki̱ku a fwa ya̱m bi̱bangu, a yai ni̱bu ko a yikan.
A kuteng ki̱ku kusi̱ru a tiyangu, m Bulus a kum ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu mi̱n ni̱tu, yinu a du chi a yika Makidoniya.
Yo n ki̱n a kana bi̱nti̱te, a kum chimi̱n ti̱n ni̱tti̱tu yinu a yika Yellas.

N ki̱n a ma swarti ti̱ta we fiko. A kuteng ki̱ku n ki̱n a no ki̱baddu ka yika Suriya aya n ki̱n a be swaan ko ni̱bu Yafudamu a do ka chi̱u ki̱nu we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe. N ki̱n a to yiko, a sute ti̱kurantu a bunti̱ Makidoniya.
N Sufata bwe Farus wu a Biriya n ti Aristakus n ti Sakundus, ni̱bu Tasalonika n ti Ka̱yus wu a Darbe, n ti Timoti a lanti̱ Tikiku n ti Tarofimu ni̱bu Asiyamu a ya yo ki̱ne.
N chi a chakakku a yan ni̱n a Toruwa.
Yo Yiye Yabake wu a ki̱danniye a suwe, ni̱n kun we filibi wu a Makidoniya ni̱n le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ni̱n ya yayu diti yuunu yinu ni̱n ya chi a Toruwa. Ni̱n ma ditiyi yidibiin we Toruwa.
We difi̱kare Yafudawayu, ni̱n muran ni̱n kera ki̱danniyu. Yinu m Bulus a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱mu di̱ne ki̱baddu ka yikadu ki̱ni si̱n. N ki̱n a fwa ya̱mu a lam ki̱tangti̱lang kuma̱ng.
Fiti̱latiyu nabwen we kanu nang murami̱n a diinu.

Wuka bwele we di̱n ki̱nu n Yutiku wu a swe a wunduwe, yo a yaki̱ nwe ya̱m Bulus a ribidati̱me, duum a da̱u ki̱n we fiko. N ki̱n a yare we wundu we kan di̱din di̱du a diinu ki̱ni ti̱kwa̱li swaniti ti̱tantu, a bwa ti̱n.
Yo m Bulus a su ti̱me, a sung a da̱u ki̱n, a yi ni̱bu ko, “Ti̱kaiyu ni̱r we, n we ki̱ni ti̱kuritu.”
Yo m Bulus a ki̱lati̱ kan diinu we, a kera ki̱danniyu ni̱n chau. A chakakku ki̱ni ya̱mu a lami̱nti̱ yo ti̱mu a kwiyane yinu a yikan.
Ki̱ni yiko, n chi a yikani ki̱ni bwele li̱mang. Ni̱tu ni̱bitu a ribetuwe.
N ni̱n ni̱n chakakku ki̱ni yayu we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ni̱n yika Asus bwanu yana da̱u mi̱ne Buluse. N ki̱n a do yiko di̱ne n ki̱n a ke ka ya yayu ki̱ni nang.
Yo n ki̱n a be ya ni̱n we Asus we, ni̱n da̱u ki̱n we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ni̱n yika Miti̱lene.
Yinu fal ni̱n chakakku ki̱ni yayu we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe. Bafi̱nenangeko, ni̱n lam Kiyos. Wuka di ti̱n ni̱n lam Samon. Wukane ti̱n ni̱n lam Miletus.
M Bulus a no kebu ka si̱ki̱du we Afisa di̱ne a babu ka kai ki̱swi we Asiya, n ki̱n ki̱wa̱rtadu ki̱baddu ka le Wurchalima kuteng yiye fentikose.
We Miletus m Bulus a tum chitu we Afisa ko ni̱bu a yal ki̱mi̱ne seli̱bu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ bi̱duumu.
Yo n chi a be, a yi chi ko, “N ti̱ni̱n ti̱fwan ti̱yim yinangu mang swe n ti chi̱nangu a mwetuwe di mang mwe mang le Asiya.
Mi̱n si Tewuduwe ki̱ni bwanu we riye mi̱n nwede. M mu ni̱ru we swa̱ka̱ku ni̱bu Yafudamu a tau ki̱ma midangu.
Ki̱ni yiko mang yung chi̱n chi ka maka chi̱ne, mi̱n ma chimi̱n di̱mwaru n ti miyaki̱ki kwa̱rikwa̱ri, mi̱n bunti̱ loni loni.
N ngau ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti Yelena mi̱n ki̱kure mi a wo ki̱ti̱m a ke bi̱yili̱mu we Kwama Tewuduwe n Yesuwe.”
Aya ki̱ka̱ngu mang ri ki̱ni fi̱ki̱me mi̱n yika Wurchalima, we bwako mang yimbu chi ka fweditu.
Yinangu mi̱n kana bi̱nti̱tangu, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu ki̱yungiyu we ni̱ru ko riye n ti leku di̱bi̱nti̱lang ki̱yaiyu.
Aya ti̱kuri mitu n ke chi ka no we mang wul banangu mang ri nangangu n Tewuduwe n Yesu a ni ko ke m ma di̱mwar ya̱m ki̱mu n ti li̱me Kwama.
Di̱ne n tu n yim n ti̱ni kwang a ne ta kui ti̱nu ki̱da, di̱ne yiko m bwa̱l we tibe chi̱n mi̱n ma chimi̱n di̱mwar yaa Kwamane.
Di̱ne yiko, mi̱n fwa chimi̱nu mi̱n n newe ki̱ni ki̱le we dur wuka niin.
N tu n fwa chimi̱n chi Kwama ki̱bade kwang.
Ti̱soo yichiyu, ti̱kur ki̱ni kwanti Kwamayu yiyu Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a du a fa̱li chi ko ti̱toyu. Ti̱chakakku ti̱nang to ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱ bi̱bu Kwama we ki̱tum ki̱mu a wuwe chi, n ki̱ni ki̱fwane.
N yim a kutengu mang yikadangu, yikai bawuti ni̱bu ti̱kwanim ka le tibe chi̱n, ka swe ti̱nu we kwanti Kwamayu.
Ko no nang bi̱kam chimu, ka kunnu ka ni̱n mwera ti̱kwanitu di̱ne ke chi butu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a ki̱la ba̱la̱ng chiyang.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱ma ki̱yolang, ti̱kur swa̱ti̱ti ti̱tta mang swe n ti chinitu. Yinangu mi̱n to chi̱nu mi̱n ngau chi̱n mi̱nti̱n ki̱kure kum n ti kukongu n ti riye mi̱n nwedu di̱ne chi̱ne.
Ki̱ka̱ngu n du chi̱n a fa̱la̱ng Kwamangu, li̱me ko a swe n ti chi̱n, nang chi ka mu chi̱nu, ka yodu ta ya kula n ti bi̱bi wauwadi̱me.
Mang kubebu ka̱mbi̱r ka kuli̱n niine.
N ti̱n n ti̱fwan ti̱yim m ma nangangu ki̱ni fa̱li mi ke n ya chi mi̱n badditu, m ma bi̱kamu mi̱nti̱ chi ki̱badditu.
We ti̱ti kwang mi̱n yung chi̱nu yinangu ta maka ti̱lusanitu ka ti̱ni bobu ti̱ma nangange. A dakan ta kur ya̱m Tewuduwe Yesu a fwa ko, “Ni ki̱ku a la yiki̱ku ki̱ni delaki̱ku.”
A kutengu a ri ya̱ma̱ngu, a sung a twa̱ba̱ bunitu n ti chi.
N Chi a ma furi ki̱linu nabwen. N kawure ki̱kwar Bulus ki̱sidu ko a ya li̱mang.
Furi ki̱lin chi̱nu di̱ne ya̱mu a fwa chimi̱n ko ka ma bwar chi teka ti̱nuwemu. N chi a bunti̱ Bulus a yo we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe.
A kuteng ki̱ku nang yo mi̱ne Bulusangu, ni̱n tau wa̱re, ya ni̱n le Kwa̱mbi̱re mwe we nabwe la wu a Kose, bafi̱nenangeko ni̱n yika Rodiyasa, yinu ni̱n kun we fiko ni̱n yika Fatara.
Kangu nang ya kwa̱mbi̱re mwe me wu ki̱yika Finikiya, ni̱n le ni̱n yika ti̱n.
We yayu kangu ni̱n yikadangu, yo nang mwata Saiyifuru, ni̱n mar bi̱nu a kantakwelang ni̱n su ni̱n yika Suriya. Yinu ya ni̱n si̱ku a Taya fi kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ka si̱ki̱n kuli̱n ki̱ne.
Kangu na ya fi ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu wemi̱nengu, ni̱n ma ditiyi yidibiin we fiko. We fiko Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a twai chi we ni̱tu chitu, yinu n chi a yi Bulus ko a yadu Wurchalima we.
Aya yo ki̱swi nang yikande a lame, ni̱n kun ni̱n chakakku ki̱ni yayu. Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu n ti bwesi̱m chimi kwang a yo ni̱ne a kuteng bi̱nang. Yinu ni̱n sung ni̱n twa̱ba̱ bunitu we ki̱ti̱ku laangu.
Yo nang riye, ni̱n le kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n chi a ki̱lati̱ lo.
A kuteng ki̱ku nang du Tayangu, ni̱n chakakku ki̱ni yayu we mwe ni̱n yika Tolemayi, ya ni̱n sikan n ti kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu we fiko, ni̱n datuwe di wiin.
Bafi̱nenange ko ni̱n yika Kaisariya ya ni̱n le lon Filibu wu ki̱ma di̱mware, n ki̱n wetuwe bi̱bi bi̱dibiimu ni̱bu a sutu di̱ne ke a nang kera chabti̱mu.
Nii wu ki̱ni fwa̱niti ti̱dibiin ti̱tu ki̱ma fa̱kuitu.
A kuteng ki̱ku nang ma diti we fikongu, wuka naba fa̱ku, di̱n ki̱nu n Aka̱bu, a be a Yafudiya.

Yo Aka̱bu a be fi a di̱ni̱ne, a yiu chi m Bulus ki̱muun tarre, a mu tar ki̱nu n ti nani kiyi ki̱n, yinu a yi ko, “Chi Fi̱ki̱m a fwa nang wu, bi̱duum ni̱bu Yafudamu ba Wurchalimamu ka kwau naba kuli̱n di̱de ying, ka da̱du ka ni kuu Roma.”
Yo nang nwe ya̱m bi̱be, n ni̱n bi̱bu ni̱n ya yayu n ti ki̱ni̱mu, ni̱n wana ki̱n ko a yadu Wurchalima we.

Aya m Bulus a yi chi ko, “Ti̱fwa wureni ye? A mayire ti̱chimi bwiye, n tu n do bwiyu, n ke di̱ne kana riye mang nwedu a Wurchalima aya kasi no mang bwadu, ka kwer mang bwadu a di̱n Tewuduwe Yesune a lami chi.”
Yinangu nang swan ko m Bulus a ne sute ni̱rangu, ni̱n ma bwanu ni̱n yi ko, “Tewuduwe ma chi mwang ku a letu.”
A tibu ke, ni̱n wo kuli̱nu, ni̱n yika Wurchalima.
Bi̱kamu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m we Kaisariya a ya, a yo ni̱ne. N chi a ya, a yo ni̱n a lon Manasone. Nii wu naba Sayifuru. N ki̱n wetuwe bi̱kaki̱mu a ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi̱mu.
Yo nang lam Wurchalima, kebi̱bu a yiu ni̱n fa̱liyi yurau.
Bafi̱nenangeko m Bulus a yika bwa di̱Yakubu n ti ni̱n. Seli̱bu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mi kwang we fiko.
A kuteng ki̱ku, m Bulus a sikan n ti ni̱bangu, n ki̱n a fwa chimi̱n kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye kwang ti̱tu n Kwama a ma yikayu kuuti mi̱n we nangangu m Bulus a mangu.
Kangu n chi a nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu, a ni Kwama dwiyentu yinu a yi Bulus ko, “Fate, ni̱bu kuniri ni̱bu Yafudamu a ke bi̱yili̱mu, n chi ki̱ni kwang ki̱ni ni̱ru ka bunti̱ yili̱n Musatu.”

Ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a fimu a ya ya̱mu ko m mun, mun miya ni̱bu Yafudamu a swe n ti bi̱bu n ke kuu ni̱bu Yafudame mi̱nu mwiko a ni yilang Musangu kuteng. N chi ko mun yi ni̱bu mwiko a bidu laaru we bwesi̱mu, a bunti̱nu yikayu daati Yafudamu we.
Yoye nang ma bi̱bu ya̱mi yire, yo n chi a nwe ya̱m beku mwange?
Di̱ne yiko, mwang ma chitu nang fwa mi̱nitu. Ni̱nni ki̱ni ni̱bi baana bi̱bu a bwa̱u we ni̱r chini̱mu.

Bungan n ti ni̱bu bi̱bu, ti̱ma yiye nurake ware kwang, yinu mwan fe chi a tabbitu ke dutu chitu a ya kwalku. Yinu ni̱bu ka kedu ko a ne bi̱yili̱m we ya̱m bi̱bu ni̱bu a fwa a dur muni̱mu. Aya n chi ka kedu ko mwang mabu ti̱kali ki̱ni yili̱n Musatu.
Aya ni̱bu yikayu kuuti bi̱bu a ke bi̱yili̱mu, ni̱n tu ni̱n mwal chimi̱n ko, a chadu chabtu di̱yoritu we, n ti yaritu, a wuti̱nu naiyu ni̱bu a bibubiyeyu we, n ti nam wubware.
Yinu m Bulus n ti ni̱bu bi̱bu a ma nuraki̱ku, yinu a le Kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu yaka fwa di nuraki̱ chiyangu ka ride. Di ni̱bu ka ma niku di̱ne kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye.
Yo ditiyi yidibiin a mwatan ka ride, bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudam a Asiya a be ku Bulus we Kan Kwamanu N chi a suke ki̱tuu ni̱be ko a tau Bulus.

N chi a bwe kemi ko, “Kebi̱mi̱m ni̱bu Yisrelamu, ti̱be makaku! Nii wu ki̱ bwa̱lu kasi no bwa̱le ki̱fwa ya̱mu a li̱mbuli̱mem kiyi ni̱bu ko a bunti̱nu yili̱n chi̱retu we nang wu. Ki̱fwa ya̱mu we Kan Kwamanu a li̱mbu a bwin ni̱bu Yelena a wo, a le Kan Kwamani ki̱ni̱mu.”
N chi a fwa ying, di̱ne a no ku m Bulus ki̱bwa̱lu we bi̱nu n ti Tarofimu naba Afisa. Ti̱tu nang chi a yo n chi ki̱kamadu ko kano m Bulus a le Kan Kwamanu ware.
Bi̱nu a kayan, n chi a kunne ki̱ni kaiyan ni̱re a be tau Bulus, a chakku we kan Kwamanu a Wurchalimanu, a yingeti̱ kanu a kutengu n chi a chiri ki̱nangu.
Kangu n chi we ki̱ma ki̱chitu wuwangu, ya̱mu a ya wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me ko bi̱n Wurchalima ki̱ma di̱kulan.
N ki̱n a yal ni̱bu kuni̱m ki̱mu n ti bi̱duum chimu, a ya we bwana di̱kulane. Yo ni̱bu ki̱baska chimu a ku wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱mu n ti ni̱bu ki̱me, n chi a du ngakku Bulusangu.
Wuduwe a be tau Bulus a yo ni̱bu a kwabi maklan. N ki̱n a fwa ki̱tuu ni̱be mi̱n dukan ki̱nu n ti chi n ki̱n a matu.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be a ki̱la le tukaku, bi̱bu ko ying bi̱kamu ko ying. Ya̱mu a ne da we ni swan bi̱yili̱mu. N ki̱n a to yiko, a yi ni̱bu ko a yikan sabi̱r ki̱ni Bulus
Yo n chi a lam ti̱di̱ngri lo diite, n chi a da̱u Bulus di̱ne kulangkulange ki̱lami̱ne fiko.
Ki̱tuu ni̱be ki̱ nabu chide we kutengu ki̱ni kemi ko, “Ti̱chiu.”
Yo ni̱bu kuni̱mu ya ki̱baddu ka yikadu ki̱ni Buluse, n ki̱n a yi wuduwe ko, “We mwang kedu mang fwa ya̱ma?”
Wuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, “A mwang me yii ni̱bu Yelename.”
M mun n ke naba Masare wu a yo ni̱bu a ma kulangkulange we swa̱ti̱tu a sutu, wu a wo ni̱bu a bwarani̱mu kuliti taana a yikan nabwe di̱si̱langchangi̱na?
M Bulus a yi ki̱n ko, “M mi̱n naba Yafudiya, m be a Tarsus wu a ti̱m Ki̱likiyame, m mi̱n bwe bi̱n di̱du a ki̱siyangi̱ne. Mi̱n wananu, dui n fwa ni̱bu bi̱bu mi̱n ya̱m.”
Yo wuduwe a ni ki̱n da ko a fwa ya̱me, m Bulus a ti we ki̱di̱ngu, a kuku fa̱la̱ngu ko ni̱bu a lemi̱n, yo ni̱bu a le wudidiye, a fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu ki̱ni yii Yafuda.
“Tebi̱mi̱m n ti kebi̱mi̱m ti̱nwe ya̱m mi̱mu ke ti̱yim tiko n ke ki̱lemi.”
Yo n chi a nwe ki̱fwa chimi̱n ya̱mu ki̱ni yii Yafudame ka nang chikiye yii chiye, n chi a le si̱ng.
Yinu m Bulus a yi chi ko,

“Mi̱n naba Yafudiya, ni̱bu a bi̱u mi̱n a Tarsus a ti̱m Ki̱likiya, aya n dwiyen we bi̱n di̱du. N Ka̱maliyel nang nii wu a miya miye, n ki̱n a miya mi yili̱n tukebu chi̱reti kwang, n ke mang sii Kwama yinangu n ti̱ni kwang ti̱badu ta siidangu.”
N ni ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ wa̱re wumu riye, n chibeti̱ bi̱kamu. Mi̱n taddu kasi no kwarta ka naye mi̱n di̱ki̱du a di̱bi̱nti̱l.

Tikake Fanseti n ti kwa̱l tikaketinu a yim chi mi̱n fwaditu. N yiu langi̱ntu a di̱chiye ti̱du mang yika kebu chi̱remu ni̱bu Yafudam mi̱ni ki̱n a Dimasku. N ya bwako di̱ne ke n taba ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ wa̱re wumu we bwakomu, ke m bemi̱ne Wurchalima ke ni̱bu a yo a di̱bi̱nti̱l a ni riye.
Yo m mi̱n we wa̱re mang mwata Dimasku, ki̱ni tibe kuko, wuka nabwe ti ki̱yiye a chirengi wa̱liwa̱li a di̱bi̱ri.
We fiko n yar a ti̱m, a kuteng ki̱ku n nwe di̱yal ko, “Chawulu, a mayire mun nimi̱n riye?”
N kemi, “M muna wure Tewuduwe?” N ki̱n a ke ko m mi̱n nang Yesu wu mun ni riye, m mi̱na Yesu naba Nasa̱rete.
Aya bi̱bu we ware n ti mi̱ni̱mu a ku ki̱yiye fiko wa̱liwa̱li aya a nwebu ya̱mu.
Yinu n yi mi, “Mang ma wureni Tewuduwe.” Yinu Tewuduwe a ya̱i ko, “Kun n le Dimasku, we bwako ni̱bu we fwa mi̱n chi mwang maditu.”
Yade ki̱yiye a kwel mi nuyu mang kubu diye, ni̱bu m mi̱n waremu a twa̱ki̱, ni̱n yika Dimasku.
Wuka nii we bwako di̱n ki̱nu n Ananiya a be bwana di̱mi̱ne, n ki̱n naba Kwama wu a mabu ti̱kali ki̱ni yili̱n Musante, n ki̱n ki̱ni ki̱siyang ki̱duwang we ni̱bu Yafudamu a swe we bwako.
A be a timituwe ko, “Kemi Chawulu, wudu nuyu ke n ku ti̱mu.” Nuyi miyu a wude ti̱n.
Yinu n ki̱n a yi ko, “N Kwama wu a tukebi̱ chi̱reme a suti̱n ko ke n yim ki̱ke ko, ke n ku naba yile wu wauwade n nweti̱ ti̱kwa̱li yii kitu.
Di̱ne mwang kau naba di̱mware ko we ni̱bu ki̱ni kwang, mwang fwa chimi̱n chi mwang kuutu n ti ti̱tu mwang nwetu.
Ki̱ka̱ngu mun yam wureni? Kun m ma batisma, nura ki̱leti mwiyu we yalki̱ di̱n ki̱nangu.”
Yo mang ki̱la we Wurchalima, n le mi̱n twa̱ba̱ bunitu a Kan Kwaman. We mure m ma dwakam bi̱yili̱m.
We dwakam bi̱yili̱mu, n ku Yesu ki̱fwami ya̱mu ko, “Ma datu, yikan, du Wurchalima, di̱ne n chi a ne ke di̱mwar munu we dur mi̱nu.”
Yinu n yi mi “Tewuduwe n chi chifwan a yim ko n le ka nang di̱di̱le kan Kwamane n kwaba bi̱bu ki̱ke bi̱yili̱mu a di̱n muni̱mu, n ngau, n ni riye.”
Yinu yo ni̱bu a chi̱u Yistifanu, m mi̱n we fiko n ku ki̱ni numi. N ke ki̱ni chi ni̱bu a maatu, m mi̱n nang ni ki̱to kuli̱n ni̱bu bi̱bu a chi ki̱ni̱mu.
Yinu Tewuduwe a ya̱i ko, kun n yikan, mang tum munu kutan we yikayu kuuti.

Ki̱tuu ni̱be a le wudidi ki̱nwe ya̱m ki̱mu a lami̱nti̱ yo n ki̱n a fwa di̱kwa̱l didde, n chi a yiu ki̱ni kemi ko, “Ti̱chiu! Ti̱dudu duum ni̱bu bi̱bu we ti̱ti̱nitu, a dakabu ni duddu ka chakakku ki̱ni ti̱kuritu.”
N chi a ri fiko ki̱ni kemiyu ki̱kukku lukei chiyu a dii ki̱ni kuri suk.
Yinu wuduwe naba kunne ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a yi ni̱bu ki̱mu ko a yikan sabi̱r
Yo n chi a kwaba ki̱n baddu ka twala ki̱ne, m Bulus a ki̱l yii a bi̱u tikake ni̱bu ki̱rang Romamu a ti ki̱dwan n ki̱ne ko, “A le we yilangu ni̱bu ka twal naba Roma yo ni̱bu a tibu mwa̱ta̱ki̱mi̱na?”
Yo nii wu a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a ki̱la bwanu a wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me, a yi ki̱n ko, “Yamwang ma wureni ye? Nii wu naba Roma sulo.”
Yinu wuduwe a ya, a bi̱u Bulus ko, “Fwa bi̱yili̱m, m mun naba Roma?”
M Bulus ko, “Yi bas.”
Wuduwe ko, “M Mi̱n ti̱n naba Roma, n kai ka̱mbi̱ru nabwen yinu n ya da wu.”
M Bulus a yi ki̱n ko, “Ni̱bu a bi̱u mi̱n we ti̱m bi̱bu.”
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a no ki̱baddu ka ma ki̱mi̱n ti̱bi̱dirimu a ki̱lani kuteng. Tayi a tau wuduwe ti̱n yinanga nwe ya̱m bi̱bangu. Yinu ti̱nti̱ne ki̱kuru n ki̱n a tu a kwau naba Roma.

Bafi̱nenangeko wuduwe a no ki̱baddu ka yim chi a yo ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱ma Bulus mi̱ndi ye, a mar ki̱n yinu a yale tikake Fanseti n ti kwa̱l kabaki̱nu, a muran. Yinu a be ki̱ni Bulus a yo a ti we kakku chiyangu.
M Bulus a da̱ng kwa̱l kabaki̱ni ri̱ng, yinu a yi chi ko, “Kebu mi̱m, mang kamabu chi, n yim m ma da wu yile we kakku Kwamangu.”
We bi̱bu, wuduwe fansetiye wu di̱n ki̱nu n Ananiya a yi bi̱bu a ti we fikomu ko ti̱ngau ki̱n a yii.
Yinu m Bulus a yi ki̱n ko, “M Mun nii wu kuse. N Kwama ka ngati̱ munu! N swe mwi mwang kaba midu yinangu yilanga fwangu, aya mun ki yilangu.”
Aya bi̱bu a tiwe fiko mu a yi Bulus ko, “wuduwe fansetiye Kwama nang wu mun tuda?”
Yinu m Bulus a yi chi ko, “Kebu mi̱m mang yimbu mi nang wuduwe fansetiye. Di̱ne a mwalmwale ko, ‘Tudu tikake ni̱be we.’ ”

Yinangu m Bulus a swaan ko we fiko, bi̱kamu ni̱bu Sadukiya yinu bi̱kamu ni̱bu Farisiyam, a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko, “Kebu, m mi̱n naba Farisa ti̱n, bwe Farisiya. Ti̱da̱ng ni̱bu ki̱mwata mi ya̱m di̱ne mang yo ni̱ru we kunku kwa̱miyange.”
Yo n ki̱n a fwa bi̱be, bi̱ngai a le tibe ni̱bu Farisame n ti ni̱bu Sadukiyamu, ti̱tu a yo muraku ni̱bangu a keran ti̱nti yurau.
Ni̱bu Sadukiyamu ki̱yidu ko a ne kunku kwa̱miyangu we n ti Ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu ka ki̱fi̱btiye, aya ni̱bu Farisamu a ke ki̱ni ya̱m bi̱bu ko we.

Kusi̱ru a kau di̱dun. Bi̱kamu ni̱bu yungkim bi̱bu n chi ni̱bu Farisamu a kun a kwila ya̱m bi̱bu ki̱ni dukan ki̱yidu ko, “Nang kubu ki̱le nii we, ti̱yimi yire ka ki̱fi̱btiye ka ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamam a fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱me.”
Tukaki̱ku a kabi ki̱ni dukan wu a yo wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me a nwe tayi ko kano ni̱bu ka ngi̱ra Bulusi yak. N ki̱n a yi ni̱bu ki̱mu ko, a ya, a chakku Bulus we tibe ni̱be ki̱ni dukan a yikan sabi̱r
Ki̱ni kum wuko, n Tewuduwe a ti a kwatuwe di̱ Buluse, a yi ki̱n ko, “Mu ni̱ri kwing, yinangu mwang ma di̱mwar mi̱nu we Wurchalimangu, mwang mati̱ni yiko we Roma.”
Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, ni̱bu Yafudamu a do ka chi̱u Bulus. N chi a twa̱n chitu ko a ne chi chadu, a ne chi nodu ka chi a chibu Buluse.
Ni̱bu bi̱bu a do ka ma muli̱n di̱di̱mu n chi wani taana.
N chi a ya fi a tikaketi fanseti ti tikake seli̱biyu a yi chi ko, “Ni̱n tu ni̱n twa̱n chi, a ne nang chadu, a ne nang no ti̱nu ka nang chibu Bulus nii we.
Di̱ne yiko n ti̱n n ti kwa̱l kabaki̱nu ti̱yi wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me tiko a be chimi̱ne ki̱n yinangu ti̱badu ta ta̱lti̱ ya̱mu we ki̱dangu. Ni̱n tu ni̱n do bwiyu nang chiddu.”
Yo bwe ke Bulus wuwiye a nwe ya̱m bi̱be, a yawe sabi̱r
Yinu m Bulus a yal wuka wuduwe naba kune Roma a yi ki̱n ko, ti̱bunga bwa wuduwe n ti bwele wu. Yaka fwa ki̱mi̱n bi̱kam ya̱m.
Wuko a ke a yikani ki̱ni bwele we wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me, yinu wuko a yi ko, “Naba di̱bi̱nti̱le wu m Bulus a yali ko m bemi̱ne ki̱ni bwele wu, n ki̱n ki̱ni chi ka fwa mi̱ne.”
Wuduwe wu a tau fa̱la̱ng bwelengu, a yal ki̱n a ki̱ti̱ku a bi̱u ki̱n n ki̱kun ko, “Mwang fwa mi wureni?”
Bwele a yi ko, “Ni̱bu Yafudamu a kekan we bi̱nu ko n yikani ki̱ni Bulus a kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱nang fi̱nenang, kanodu ki̱baddu ka ta̱lti̱ ya̱mu ki̱da.
Aya keduwe, di̱ne ni̱bu a la wani taana bi̱bu a lailaiye mu ki̱baddu ka chi̱u ki̱nu, n chi a tu a twa̱n chi ko a ne chi chadu ka chi node a mwintuwe chi chi̱u ki̱nangu.”
Yinu wuduwe a yi ki̱n ko, “Fwadu wuka nii mi̱nu we mwi n fwami ya̱m bi̱bu. Yinu a yo ki̱n a yikan.”

Yinu wuduwe a yal kwa̱bi ni̱bu ki̱rang Romami burau a yi chi ko, “Ti̱do bwi di̱ne ta kunnu ta yika Kaisariya yo ki̱swi kanodu a fi a turkube wu kume n ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu kuuliti turau n ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ki̱ni kweretimu wan ti̱dibiin n ti ni̱bu kuni̱m yarti̱mu kuuliti turau.”
A yi ti̱n ko, “Ti̱bau kwere wu m Bulus ka fi̱le. Yati̱ yo ki̱ne li̱mang we di̱ Felise.”
Yinu wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me a mwal lwangi̱ni ying.
“M mi̱na Kalaudiya Lisiya, mi̱n mwal mi̱nu Kwabna Felis. Mi̱n siinu.
“Ni̱bu Yafudam a tau nii wu, n chi a mwata ya̱mu ka chi̱u ki̱nu. Yinu n fumbwi m mi̱n n ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ni̱n chaka ki̱n a fa̱li bwai di̱ne mang nwe ko n ki̱n naba Roma.
Yo mang kwer mi̱n baddu mang nwe ki̱le wu n ki̱n a mange, n tung ki̱n a kwa̱l muraki̱n chiin.
N ya chi ki̱turadu a ya̱m yilang chiyang, aya ki̱le n chi a yo ki̱mi̱ne a lambu wu a kwakku niyange ka wu a chikku kange.
Yinangu mang ya di̱mwaru ko ni̱bu a bwa̱u ya̱mu yaka ma ki̱mi̱n muli̱nangu, nang wu mang tum mi̱ne. Yinu n yi ni̱bu a Mai keme komu mi a fwa we kakku mwangu ki̱le n chi a ku a ma.”
Di̱ne yiko, ni̱bu kuni̱mu a da̱u Bulus yinangu ni̱bu a yi chiyangu. N chi a yikan Atifatiri ki̱ni kum.
Bafi̱nenangeko n chi a du ni̱bu ki̱rangmu kweretimu ko a chakakku a yikani ki̱n, bi̱kamu a ki̱lawe sabi̱r
Kangu bi̱kamu ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a lam Kaisariyangu, n chi a ni Kwabna lwangi̱nu, a duti̱ Bulus we fiko.
Yo n Kwabna a ki lwangi̱n di̱de a bi̱u Bulus yaa wu n ki̱n a chir mi̱ne. Yinangu a nwe ko a chire a Ki̱likiyangu,
yinu a yi ko, “Mang kaba ya̱m mumu, ki̱dangu ni̱bu a mar kememu ka bedangu. Yinu n ki̱n a yi ni̱bu ko a yingen a sa̱ngka Yiriduse.”
A kuteng ditiyi yunuwangu, wuduwe fansetiye n Ananiya a ya n ti bi̱kam tikaketi ni̱bi n ti wukane naba yingku yili̱ne, wu di̱n ki̱nu n Taruluse, a ya mar keme Buluse a di̱Kwabna.
Yo kuu ni̱be a lewe ki̱ni Buluse, n Taruluse a mwe a ya ki̱ni keme Bulus we kakku Kwabnange ko:
“Kwabna, ni̱n nwe ta̱ma̱ng mati̱n mwitangu, di̱ne mwang kasane, mun ya̱nti̱la chitu, mun dodu yinangu ka dadangu.
Kasi no bwa̱le, kasi no yire ni̱n weri̱nu ni̱n wananu Felis.
Aya ke ni̱n kai mi̱nu ki̱swi we, ni̱n baddu mwang nwe ni̱nu.
N we yiko, ni wu a ma kulangkulang, ki̱yo bi̱ngaiyu we ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti kasi no bwa̱le we ti̱mu. Ti̱nti̱ne n ki̱n nang wuduwe we kwa̱l di̱du ki̱bunti̱ naba Nasa̱rete.
Ni̱n tau ki̱n di̱ne n ki̱n, a no ki̱baddu ka kai Kan Kwamanu.
“Aya Lisiyas wuduwe ni̱bu kuni̱me a be yiti̱ ki̱n we a fa̱li niiyu ki̱ni dukan.
Ka n ya̱nti̱la ya̱m bi̱bu m mun fwa̱ne, mwang swaanu we di̱ki̱ne chi ni̱n fwadu a dur ki̱nitu.”
Ni̱bu Yafudamu we fiko a ke ko ya̱m bi̱bu we yiko.
Ki̱dangu Kwabna a ni Bulus da ko a fwa ya̱ma̱ngu, m Bulus a kun ko, “Tete Kwabna, n yim m ma swa̱ti̱tu nabwen mun kaba ya̱mi kuu ni̱bu Yafudam, ti̱tu a ni mi̱n dukanu mang kwila ya̱mu a dur mi̱ni̱mu.
Ka n ta̱lle, mwang swaanu ko n ya Wurchalima a labu ditiyi kub chiri yurabiyu ke n sii ki̱n.
Ni̱bu a mar keme mi̱mu a kubu mang mabu di̱kulan yiin n ti wuka ni, mang sukebu ni̱bu kasi no a bwa̱le we bi̱nu.
Ya̱miyu n chi ki̱fwadu a dur mi̱niyu a ne kwa̱l chi we dur mi̱nu.

“Chi mang ketu nang ya̱mu ko mi̱n sii Kwama mi̱n bunti̱ wa̱re bunti̱ke wu a tukebu chi̱reme wu n chi ki̱kodu ko a ne bi̱yili̱m we. Mi̱n n ke bi̱yili̱mu ya̱m bi̱mwali̱li̱mu we ya̱mu Fa̱ku Musa a mwal we tatti̱ki̱dai yika̱rimu.
Mi̱n n yo ni̱ru we Kwama yinang chi, mi kunku kwa̱miyangu n we, di̱ne ni̱bu yilemu n ti bi̱bwilami kwang.
Mi̱n funti̱bwi diti ki̱da̱ng mi̱n do ni̱ri si̱k we kakku Kwamangu n ti ni̱bu.
“A kutengu swa̱ti̱tu a su bayimangu, m be Wurchalima be mang ma kuu ni̱bu mi̱mu mi̱n ki̱li̱mang di̱ne ti̱lusanitu ke m mati̱ niku we se Kwama.
Yo mang le mi̱n ma ti̱te, n chi a be, a tai we se Kwama. A ya n tu n nura bwiyu n ri, n newe n ti wuka nii, mang mati̱bu kulangkulange.
Aya bi̱kam ni̱bu Yafudam bi̱bu a be a Asiya we fiko, n chi no nang ni̱bu ka bedu ki̱ni ya̱m we dur mi̱ni̱mu.
Ka bi̱bu we fimu ka fwa ki̱le n chi a ya, mi̱n madu we kakku kwa̱l kabaki̱ne.
Ya̱mu mang yimi̱mu ka bi̱bu mang kun mang ti a kakku chiyang mang fwa mi, ‘Ni̱bu ki̱kaba midu di a ya̱m kunku kwa̱miyang.’ ”
N Felis wu a yim chitu a lwe chi we wa̱re bunti̱ku Yesuwange, a ti ki̱ni chi we ya̱mu ko, “Ka yam yo n tikake Lisiyas ka bede yinu ka mwata ya̱mu.”
N Felis a yi wuduwe ni̱bu toki̱me ko a yotu Bulus we didiin, a nidu riye we, yinu a du fati̱bu ki̱mu a nang ni chi ki̱badditu.
A kutengu a da diti bayimangu, n Felis a be n ti nayeko n Durusila wu n ki̱n na Yafuda, a ni da ni̱bu a chake Bulus, a si ki̱tele we ya̱m ki̱mu a keku bi̱yili̱mang Yesu Masiyangu.

Yinu m Bulus a fwa ya̱m yilemu n ti yinangu ni ka tau dur ki̱nangu n ti mwataki̱ku ki̱bedangu. We bi̱bu ya̱m, tayi a tau Felis, a yi Bulus ko, “Ki̱latuwe didiin, n we mang yali̱nu yo mang ya ki̱swiye.”
Yade n ki̱n ki̱yo ni̱ru ko kanodu m Bulus ka fu ki̱mi̱n yii ki̱ni ka̱mbi̱re, n ki̱n a le ki̱yal Bulus ki̱dati kwang ki̱fwa ya̱mu ware.
A kuteng swa̱ti̱ti turabangu, n Fokiyu Festu a sute Felis we Kwabnatu. N Felis a du Bulus we di̱bi̱nti̱lu di̱ne ke ni̱bu Yafudamu a wer ki̱n.
Diti yitta a kuteng ki̱ku n Festu a be ke ki̱chakakku ki̱ni Kwabnatangu, A kun we Kaisariya a yika Wurchalima.
We bwako, tikaketi fansetiyu n ti tikaketi ni̱bu Yafudam, a mar keme Buluse a di̱ki̱ne. N chi a wana ki̱n ko,
a ma wa̱re m Bulus ka ki̱lan Wurchalima di̱ne chi a do bi̱kam ni̱bu ka mwatu ki̱nu we wa̱re ka chidu.
N Festu a yi chi ko, “Ni̱bu ka to Bulus a Kaisariya, m mi̱n m mi̱fwan mang ya bwako a ne tike.
Di̱ne yiko, bi̱duum chimu a be ware n ti mi̱n, ka ni wu a ma wuka ki̱le, n chi ka bi̱tti̱nu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Festu a da ditiyi nari̱bu ka kubengu, a kun a ki̱la Kaisariya. Bafi̱nenangeko, a yi ni̱bu ko a chakku ki̱mi̱ne Bulus, n ki̱n a swe a kaba ya̱mu.
Yo m Bulus a lam fiko, ni̱bu Yafudamu a chire we Wurchalima a kun a mu ki̱mi̱ntuwe ki̱ni ya̱miyu we dur ki̱nu nabwen yiyu a mabi̱ duri.
Yinu m Bulus a kun a yu dur ki̱nu ko, “Mang mabu ki̱le we yili̱n ni̱bu Yafudamitu n ti kan di̱dunu a Wurchalimanu ka n Kaisare ko bayim.”
N Festu wu ki̱baddu ni̱bu Yafudamu ka wer ki̱ne, a yi Bulus ko, “We mwang kedu mwang ya Wurchalima ke ni̱bu a kaba mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu we kakku manga?”
M Bulus a yi ki̱n ko “M mi̱n a kakku kan mwataku Kaisar, finu nang kan mwataki̱nu wu a Roma siine, fi nang fi a dakan ni̱bu ka kaba mi ya̱m we. Yo kwer mwang yim mang mabu ki̱lewe ni̱bu Yafudame.

Ka m mi̱n mang ma ki̱le wu a lwe mang bwade, a ne mang kodu mi ni̱bu a chiyuwe. Aya ka a ne bi̱yili̱m we keme chiye, a ne nii a lwe ka ni mi̱nu a fa̱la̱ng chiyange we. N ke ya̱mu ka yika kakku Kaisar.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n Festu a twaya ya̱mu n ti kwa̱l ki̱nangu a ke ko, “Ya̱m mumu a da, ni̱n tung ya̱mu a di̱Kaisare yinangu mwang babbangu.”
A kuteng diti bayimangu, m Mai Aka̱rifa n ti Benis a ya Kaisariya yaka siye Festu.
Yade n chi yaka ma diti we bwako, n Festu a fwa Mai mi̱n ya̱m we dur Bulusi̱nu. N ki̱n a yi Mai ko, wuka ni we wu n Felis a dummi a di̱bi̱nti̱le.
Yo mang ya Wurchalima, tikaketi fanseti n ti tikaketi ni̱bu Yafudamu a mar keme niwe a di̱mi̱ne ko, mwata ki̱mi̱n ya̱m chi̱kki̱m.
N ki̱nta chi mi a dakabu we da wu Roma ni mwata ni mi̱n ya̱mu niyang ya̱nti̱labi̱m. A dakan bi̱bu a mar kememu ka fwa ya̱m, n ti wu n chi a mar keme ko yinu naba ki̱le ka da̱u ki̱le ko.
Yo n chi a be fi a di̱mi̱ne, mang kaibu ki̱swi n yi chi mi a be miye ki̱n, n swe n kaba ya̱mu.
Yo ni̱bu a mar kememu a kun ki̱fwa ya̱me, n chi a chirebu ki̱ni wuka ki̱le wuduwe wu ki̱kamadu kanodu a mange.
Chi mang swaane, n chi a tuka ya̱m a wa̱re bunti̱ke, n chi a kebu n ti bwa wuka niye wu n chi ki̱yalu ko n Yesuwe, wu m Bulus kiyi ni̱bu ko n we ki̱ni ti̱kuriye.
Yinangu mang ku chitu a ma bwarangu, m bi̱u Bulus mi ka n ki̱n ka kedu ka ya Wurchalima ke ni̱bu a kaba ki̱mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu we bwako.
Aya yo m Bulus a bau ya̱m ki̱mu ka yika kakku Kaisarange, n yi ni̱bu mi a nang to ki̱nu a lami̱nti̱ yo mang tung ki̱nu a bwa di̱Kaisare.
Yinu n Aka̱rifa a yi Festu ko, “N ke mang nwe ya̱m ni wumu m mi̱fwan. Wuko ko, ‘Mwang nwe ya̱m bi̱bu fi̱nenang.’ ”
Bafi̱nenangeko n Aka̱rifa n ti Benis a lewe ki̱ni kuli̱n mati̱mi̱n, n chi a be n ti tikaketi ni̱bu kuni̱mu n ti bi̱duumu a bi̱ni̱mu. Yinu n Festu a yi ni̱bu ko a be ki̱ni Bulus.
Yinu n Festu a yi ko “Mai Aka̱rifa n ti ni̱bu we fimu, nii wu ni̱bu Yafudami kwang a mar kemeko a Wurchalima n ti Kaisariya n nang wu. N chi ki̱bwa̱ka ti̱ni kemi ko ni dudu we ki̱ni ti̱kuritu.
Aya m mi̱n mang kubu chi a ma, wu a lwe ka bwade. Aya yo n ki̱n a yi ko ni ya ki̱ni ya̱m ki̱mu a nii wuduwe n Kaisare, n ke mi mang tung ki̱nu we bwako.

“Aya a bwin yiko, m mi̱n mang yabu ki̱kwi tas wu mang mwal Mai Kaisar mi̱nu a dur ki̱ne. Di̱ne yiko m be ki̱ni ki̱n we kakku changu Aka̱rifa mi ka we mang ya chi mang mwalu a dur ki̱n a kutengu ni ta̱l ya̱m ki̱mange.
We di̱mi̱ne ka kadu yinang di̱tu ka ni chaku ni wu we di̱bi̱nti̱lu ni tum, niyang yungbu ki̱le wu a mange.”
Yinu Aka̱rifa a yi Bulus ko, “Ni̱n nin ki̱swi, kwila ya̱mu a dur muni̱mu.” M Bulus a kuku kangu, a mwe ki̱fwa ya̱mu.
“Mai Aka̱rifa, m ma ki̱ti̱me yinangu mang kwila ya̱m bi̱bu ni̱bu Yafudamu a fwaran we dur mi̱ni̱mu diwu we kakki̱ mwangu.
Ti̱nti̱ne, n yim m mun ki̱ni yingku we dati ni̱bu Yafudamu n ti dokaku ni̱bangu a yo yaram a le tibe chiye. Di̱ne yiko, mi̱n wananu, ma bwanu we nweki̱ ya̱m bi̱bangu.”
Yinangu tikaketi ni̱bu Yafudamu a yimangu, a mwetuwe ki̱dangu mi̱n a bwelenangu, yo m mi̱n we kuu bi̱n mi̱ne a lanta Wurchalima.
N chi a yim mi̱n feredi. N chi chifwan ka medu ka fwadu ko m mi̱n a kwa̱l ni̱bu Farisamu. Kwa̱l ni̱bu Yafudam di̱du a mabu ti̱kali ki̱ni bunti̱ki̱mu
Ki̱ka̱ngu n ti we kakku changu ti̱mami kabaki̱ku di̱ne mang yo ni̱ru we riku bwa̱ki̱ Kwamangu a ma tukebi̱ chi̱remu mi̱nangu.

Bwa̱ki̱ Ki̱ku nang ki̱ku ti̱fi̱ki̱ri ni̱nti kub chiri turabitu a yo ni̱ru we ki̱yam riku kangu, a yo n chi ki̱funbwiyu ki̱ sii Kwama kum n ti kuko. Tete Mai, Di̱ne mang yo ni̱ru we riku bwa̱kangu, nang chi a yo ni̱bu Yafudamu ki̱ku ki̱le miye.
Wureni a yo we da̱ngki̱ changu ti̱kudu n Kwama a ne ka medu ka kuku kwa̱miye?
“M mi̱n no m bwa̱u we ni̱r mi̱nu ti̱n mi mang funti̱bwi mang kai chaku kakang di̱n Yesunu naba Nasa̱rete.
Nang chi mang ma a Wurchalima, tikake Fansetiyu a ni mi̱n da n yo ni̱bu nabwen a le di̱bi̱nti̱le we Wurchalima. M mi̱n wetuwe bi̱bu a ke ki̱ni bwa chimu.

Mi̱n bunti̱ kambi Kwamatu mi̱n ni ni̱bu riye, mi̱n funti̱bwi mi̱n yo chidu ki̱fwa ya̱m swa̱ban we di̱n Yesunu. Di̱ne mang kai ni̱re, mi̱n bunti̱ chi we bi̱nti̱tu ka nang bi̱bi̱le ti̱me mi̱n ni chi riye.”
Yinangu mang chakakku ki̱ni nangang ki̱bwilang ki̱kangu, wuka di m mi̱n a wa̱re Dimasku, di̱ne tikaketi fanseti a ni da a niti̱ taki̱da wu ki̱ni dukane.
Ki̱ni tibe kuko Mai, nang daandu we, n ku kaang yiiku ki̱ku a lati̱ wu a kuko a chire a dii, a yingei n ti ni̱bu ni̱n bungadu waremu.
Ni̱nni ki̱ni kwang ni̱n yaran a ti̱m, yinu n nwe di̱kan ker ki̱fwami ya̱m ki̱ni yii ni̱bu Yafudame ko, “Chawulu, a mayire mun ni mi̱n riye? Mun ni dur mun riye we kati̱n ti̱tu mun madu n ti mi̱nitu.”
M mi̱n m bi̱u mi, muna wure, Tewuduwe?
Mi̱n nang Yesu, wu mun ni riye.
Kun, n yungi̱n dur mi̱nu di̱ne mwang kau wuduwe bwe nangangemi mwan mami nangang, mwang ma di̱mwar we chi mwang kuutu a di̱mi̱ne n ti chi yamang yungi̱nu a bwa kake.
Mang yunu we ni̱bu mumu, n ti ni̱bu bi̱bu n ke kuu ni̱bu Yafudamu, bi̱bu man tum munu we di̱chiyemu.

Mwang wudu chimi̱n nuiyu, ka chiredu we ki̱liye n ti fa̱la̱ng Setanangu ka ki̱la bwa di̱Kwama. Ka a ma yiko ka ya duku we ki̱leti chiyu. N chi ka yati̱ kula ware n ti ni̱bu bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu di̱ne keku bi̱yili̱mang a di̱mi̱nengu.
Di̱ne yiko, Tete Mai Aka̱rifa, mang kobu dwakam bi̱yili̱mu mang kuumu.

Di̱ne yiko, m mwe di̱mwaru we Dimasku yinu m mwetuwe Wurchalima n ti ba̱la̱ng Yafudiya kwang n ti yikayu kuuti, mi n chi a duwe chi ti̱bwilaitu a ki̱la bwa di̱Kwama, ti̱nti̱ne nangi̱n ti̱yili chitu ka yungdu n chi a suten.
Nang chi a yo bi̱kamu ni̱bu Yafudamu a tai we Kan di̱dunu a Wurchalimanu ki̱baddu ka chiyitu.
Aya n Kwama a makai a lanta di, nang chi a yo mi̱n ma seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱mu mi̱n di̱mwaritu. Mang fwabu bi̱kam ya̱m aya nang bi̱bu fa̱kubu n ti Musa a fwa ko ka fwedi̱mu.
Mi̱n fwa Masiya wu a mwintuwe ka nwe riye, ka kau wukake we kunki̱ kwa̱miyagu. We yiko, nang ki̱swi ni̱bu nabwen ka kuun diye, ni̱bu Yafudam n ti yikayu kuuti.
Yo m Bulus we ki̱kwila ya̱m ni̱bi̱mu a dur ki̱ni̱me, n Festu a fwa ya̱m ki̱ni dukan ko, “Bulus, dur munu a ribu! Nabwe kiku mwangu a yingle ki̱kwa̱me mo!”
Aya m Bulus ko, Tete Festu, dur mi̱nu a ri. Mi̱n fwa bi̱yili̱mu ki̱ni ni̱r mi̱ni si̱k.
Mare m Mai a yim, mi̱n fwa ki̱mi̱n ya̱mu a ne tayi we. N yim a tabi̱bu bi̱kam we ya̱miyu mi̱n fwadiyu. Di̱ne a fwebu a bura.
Tete Mai Aka̱rifa, “N ke bi̱yili̱mu we fa̱kubu Kwama ma? N yim n ke.”
M Mai Aka̱rifa ko, “Bulus, mwang yodu mang kau naba bunti̱ke we baku swi wu bayi̱ma?”
M Bulus a yi ki̱n ko, “Ki̱swi bayim ka nabwen na, mi̱n twa̱ba̱bunitu we Kwama n ke di̱ne kana mune aya n ti bi̱bu we fi ki̱nweyimu, ka kadu yinang mi̱n aya a bwin kwabaku a maklanangu.”
M Mai a kun, Kwabna a kun ti̱n n ti Benis n ti bi̱bu ware n ti chimu.
Yo n chi a chir we kan kabaki̱ne, n chi a ti ki̱twayadu ko ni wu a mabu chi a lwe yi̱ngeke ka bwange.
N Aka̱rifa a yi Festu ko, “Ka n ke ni wu a tu a yi ko ni̱bu a tung ya̱m ki̱mu a di̱Kaisare, a no mwang maiyu.”
Yo dokaku a ri nang yika Yitaliya, ni̱bu a du Bulus n ti bi̱kam ni̱bu ti̱bi̱nti̱li̱m a kang wuka wuduwe ni̱bu ki̱rangmu, wu di̱n ki̱nu n Yuliyus, n ki̱n wuka we ni̱bu ki̱rang kwa̱l Kaisari̱nu.

Ni̱n kun yayu, ni̱n bunti̱ kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wu a ti̱m Adiramitiya, wu ki̱baddu ka bunti̱ beti̱ bi̱ni yiyu a ki̱ti̱ku Asiya. Wuka naba Tasalonika wu a ti̱m Makadoniya di̱n ki̱nu n Aristakus, n we n ti ni̱n.
Bafi̱nenangeko ni̱n lam Sidon. N Yuliyus a maka Bulus, a du ki̱n a ya bwana fati̱bi̱ ki̱me ke n chi a maka ki̱n.
Yo Nang kun ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, ki̱fi̱be mwe a yingle ni̱n. Di̱ne yiko ni̱n bunti̱ kuteng Saiyifuru ba̱la̱ngu ki̱fi̱be a ne dukan wengu.
A kutengu nang yabu nabwe la ti̱m Ki̱likiya wu a wume Famfiliya, ni̱n yika Mira, wu a wume ti̱m Likiyame.
We fiko wuduwe ni̱bu ki̱rang Romame a bau wuka kwa̱mbi̱re mwe Aleksandiriya wu ki̱yika ti̱m Yitaliyame, a yo ni̱n we.

Ni̱n ma ditiyu nabwen yayu a ku ni̱mi̱nbu, ni̱n mwata Kinidus yi bawi. Di̱ne ki̱fi̱be mwe a du ni̱n be, ni̱n bunti̱ ki̱ti̱ku bale a ne mwe we, ka nang chikiye a kuteng bekune Kirite a kwati̱na Salomiye.
Ni̱n bunti̱n ki̱ti̱ku laang, ni̱n su fiko bawi, yinu ni̱n lam wuka fi wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko yo ni̱re laike ki̱dwan n ti bi̱n Likiyanu.

Yade nang kai ki̱swi we fiko nabwene, yayu a kabbi ki̱ni riye. We ki̱dang kangu ki̱swi a tu a su nabwen, ka nang chikiye di yiye yafudame wu a da̱uku dimwen ki̱letiye a su. Yinu m Bulus a ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure.
N ki̱n a yi chi ko, “Ni̱bu, n ku yayu wu yaka bwiladu, yaka yo chitu nabwen ka twiyadu, chi ka twiyade n ke kana kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti kuli̱n, ti̱kuri chi̱retu n wetuwe.”
Aya n Yuliyus a kebu ki̱ni ya̱m Bulus, n ki̱n a ki̱la a ke ya̱m ni wu ki̱sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n ti wu kwa̱mbi̱re mwe n wu ki̱ne.

Yade fi n chi ka fi̱kande a lebu we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ka sa̱na̱ng wenge, duwe chi kwang a ke ko chi chakakku ki̱ni yayu, ka we chi lam Finikiya ke chi ma sa̱na̱ngu a bwako. Finikiya wuka fi wu kwa̱mbi̱ri mwei ki̱ tiindu a Kirite wu ki̱da̱ng ki̱twale n ti tibe ki̱twale n ti twa̱r wuli̱n.

Yo ki̱fi̱be a mwe ki̱kunedu we twa̱r wuli̱ni bayim bayi̱me, ni̱bu a da̱u ko chitu ka swe bunge. N chi a wuwe ka̱mbi̱ru ki̱tau kwa̱mbi̱re mwenu, a bunti̱ bekune mwe wu a Kirite, ki̱dwan n ti ki̱ti̱ku laangu.
A tibu ke di̱kan di̱bwilan ki̱fi̱ben a chire a bale tibe kir kulane n ti twa̱r a fwale suuu we bekune mwe.
Yinangu ki̱fi̱be a tung kwa̱mbi̱re mwengu, a newe ki̱ni dukan ka mwatu ki̱fi̱benu we. Ni̱n du ki̱fi̱be ki̱ tung ni̱nu a ne chi nang maditu we.
Yinangu nang bunti̱ kuteng wukane bekune mwengu, wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko Kauda, ki̱fi̱be a swe bunge we fiko, ni̱n wuwe be kwa̱mbi̱re mwe bawi ki̱dwan n ti kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wuduwe.

A kuteng ki̱ku n chi a wuwe kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wuti̱re a yo we wuduwengu, n chi a do bwiyu a kwaba dwati̱tu a kana kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wuduwe ki̱n, ko ke a wuladuwe. Di̱ne n chi ki̱wulu ko kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ke a a ngaudu duru we yane Sirtise, n chi a si̱ku si̱kki̱ni ka̱mbi̱ri a no kukunu ko ke ki̱fi̱be a tung kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ya yayu n ki̱fwane.
Di̱ne muli̱n mwenu, ki̱yingle ni̱nu yinang, bafi̱nenangeko, n chi a mwe ki̱ wo kuli̱nu a kwa̱mbi̱re mwenu ki̱kuru a mwe.
We wutare di, n chi a chaku di̱kanu kuli̱n ki̱ni fa̱li chi we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a fwal a fi̱lang.
We yiko, ni̱n ma ditiyu nabwenabwen nang kubu di n ti ki̱switiyu. Di̱bwilan ki̱fi̱ben di̱du ki̱riti̱nu a ka di̱ni̱nne. Di̱ne riye, ni̱n da̱u ko nang twiyadu we mwe laa.
Yade a da̱u ki̱swi n chi a chabu chiye, m Bulus a kun a ti we tibe chi a yi chi ko, ni̱bu, ka no ti̱nwe ya̱m mi̱mu mang yi mi ni kunu we bekune mwe Kirite, a no niyang nwebu riye wu.
Aya ki̱ka̱ngu mi̱n ngau chimi̱n ki̱kure ti̱mu ni̱ri kwing, a ne ni ka kwala ti̱kuri kite we tibe chi̱n aya ni medu ni kwala kwa̱mbi̱re mwe.
Nangki̱n, we kum wu, wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re wu m mi̱n a fa̱la̱ng kange, Kwama wu mi̱n ma ki̱mi̱n nangange, a timituwe.
A yi ko, “Nwedu tayi we Bulus, a mwintuwe mwang tidu we kakku Kaisarangu. Aya di̱ne mune, bi̱bu ti̱bungadu waremu ka swidu we a li̱me Kwama.
Di̱ne yiko, ti̱mu ni̱ru kwing ni̱bu, di̱ne n ke bi̱yili̱mu we Kwamami yinangu a fwamiyangu, ka fwedi yiko.
Aya a mwintuwe di̱bwilan ki̱fi̱benu ka twa̱ki̱ nidu ka yika mi̱n wuka yane bekune mwe.”

We kum wi kub chiri yaana, di̱bwilan ki̱fi̱benu ki̱fi̱ki̱ kwa̱mbi̱re mwe nabwe laa Meditereniyane, ki̱ni ki̱tangti̱lang kuma̱ng, ni̱bu ki̱sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwemu a da̱u ko kano ni̱n mwata ki̱dwan n ti ti̱mu.
N chi a swe swa̱n mwenu, aya a lam naniyu kuul ki̱ni wan turau. A kutengu nang chau kakki bayimangu, a sweti̱ ki̱da. A ya naniyu wan turkubu.
Di̱ne n chi ki̱wul tayu ko ke chi tekaduwe n ti wuka bekune mwe, n chi a kwi ka̱mbi̱ru ki̱ni turenginu n chi yaana a mar we kuteng kwa̱mbi̱re mwengu ko ke kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a kwanti̱duwe.
Aya ni̱bu ki̱sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwemu a swe tali̱mu ka wulu. N chi a si̱iku wuti̱re kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ko kano ni̱bu ka da̱ddu ko chi si̱ku ka̱mbi̱r di̱du ki̱ni turen we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe wuduwe.
Yinu m Bulus a yi wuduwe naba kune Roma n ti ni̱bu ki̱rangmu ko, “Ka ni̱bu bi̱bu a swebu we mure kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a ne da ta swide we.”
Yo n chi a nwe, ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a mwata ti̱dwatu kwa̱mbi̱re mwetu, a du kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ya we mwe.
Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, m Bulus a wana chi ko a chau chitu. A yi chi ko, “Wudiye kub chiri yaana, a kana kamaku di̱ne kabu yayuwe a ma bwar, ta chabu ti̱kan chi.
Di̱ne yiko, mi̱n wana chi̱nu ti̱chau chabti̱tu di̱ne li̱mang bwiyangu. Di̱ne n yim wuka chi̱n a ne kwala kasi no ki̱riyang kangi kiin we dur ki̱nu.”
Yo a fwa bi̱be, a da̱u ki̱danne, a twa̱ba̱bunitu a wana Kwama, yinu a wulan a nika chi.
N chi ki̱ni kwang a ya kungku ni̱rangu, n chi a chatti̱ chabti̱tu.
N ni̱n ki̱ni kwang we kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, kuuliti turau ki̱ni wan ti̱dibiin chiri burukuun.
Yo n chi a chau a lwe, n chi a kaar chaammu a fwala mwe. Ti̱tu a yo kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ma wayang.

Yo ti̱mu a kwiyane, ni̱bu ki̱sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwemu a yimbu bwa chi a ngan dure. Aya n chi a swaan wuka fwiti̱ne ki̱swaiye n chi a bunte. Yinu n chi a funti̱bwi a sii kwa̱mbi̱re mwe ko chi yodu a yane ka we fwede.

N chi a mwata dwa̱ti̱tu a ka̱mbi̱r di̱du ki̱ni turenu, yinu a duwe mwe. We ki̱swi wuko n chi a kwi ki̱lwade we chi ki̱ tung kwa̱mbi̱re mwe. Yinu n chi a kuku ka̱mbi̱ru a kakku kwa̱mbi̱re mwenu yinangu ki̱fi̱be ka medu ka tungdi kakangu. N chi a yo dur kwa̱mbi̱re mwenu a bale mwe.
Aya yo nang lam fi mwe ki̱ngabande, kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a ku yane, a yo dur kwa̱mbi̱re mwenu a le yane ki̱ri̱ng. We bale kutenge, kwa̱mbi̱re mwe a mwe ki̱ngi̱radu di̱ne di̱bwilan labi mwetu.
We fiko ni̱bu ki̱rangmu a kun ki̱baddu ka chi̱be ni̱bu ti̱bi̱nti̱limu, di̱ne ke wuka a wullu a swiduwe.
Aya naba kune wuduwe di̱ne a ke ka yu Buluse, a ko ti̱kuran ti̱tu. Yinu a ni da ko ka nang wuwule niye wu a me mwe, a chir a yu yikiyu a yika ki̱ti̱ku laangu.
Bi̱kamu a fi̱l bwi kwa̱mbi̱re mweyu, bi̱kamu a fi̱l ti̱wulani kwa̱mbi̱re mwetu. Nang tiyangu n chi a chir mi̱n we laa li̱mangu.
A kutengu nang swiyangu, be ni̱n swaan ko di̱n bekune mwenu Malta.
Ni̱bu bi̱n di̱ki̱nu a ma ni̱mi̱n ki̱li̱mangu nabwenabwen. N chi a yiu ni̱n ki̱ni fa̱li yurau, a mwa ni̱mi̱n ki̱rang di̱ne ki̱swiye mwe, ti̱mi ki̱ri̱m.
M Bulus a kare tiniyu ki̱ki̱bu ki̱rangu. Wuka soo wu kwane a chire we tiniyu di̱ne ki̱rangi kwise, a dum Bulus a kwasatuwe fa̱la̱ngu.

Yinangu ni̱bu bi̱ni̱mu a ku soo a yabi yangki̱li̱ng we fa̱la̱ng Bulusangu, a fwa we yichiyu ko, “Nii wu ki̱chi̱be dutu, kasi ki̱ku n ki̱n a swi we muli̱n laanangu, a mwintuwe ka bwadu di̱ne ki̱leti ni̱biyu we dur ki̱nu.”
M Bulus a wasu fa̱la̱ng kangu, soo a swituwe ki̱rangu. N ki̱n a nwebu burang.
N Chi ki̱kamadu ko fa̱la̱ngu ka muddu, m Bulus ka yaru we ti̱mu ka bwa ti̱nu. Aya yo n chi a da̱u ki̱twalang a ku chi a fwebe, n chi swanan ko n ki̱n wuka Kwama.
We fiko kuu we, n wu tikake bekune mwe wuko, wu di̱n ki̱nu n Fubiliyuse. N ki̱n nang wu a yiu ni̱n, a ni ni̱n fi wu yile wu nang fi̱kan we diti yitta.
N te Fubiliyuse n we fi a dami̱ne di̱ne ki̱kwam ki̱sweti̱ ki̱tuum. M Bulus a le a twa̱ba̱ ki̱mi̱n bunitu, ni wu a be we burangu.
A kuteng ti̱tangu, ni̱bu a bubuwemu we bekune mwe a kiyawe ki̱ti̱bu ki̱be bwa a di̱Buluse ki̱ya beku.
N chi a mi̱la ni̱n nabwen. Yo a lam nang kunu ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe, a bau ni̱nmi̱ne chitu ni̱n badditi kwang.
A kuteng swarti ti̱tangu, ni̱n kun ki̱ni kwa̱mbi̱re mwe Aleksandiriya wu a ma sa̱na̱ngu we fiko, ti̱nti̱ne ni̱bu a mu ki̱mi̱n dutu ti̱yobi kwamati turau.
Yo nang lam Si̱rakuse, ni̱n ma diti yitta we fiko.
Ni̱n kun we fiko ni̱n yikan ni̱n fwadu a Rikiyum. A kuteng di wiinangu, ki̱fi̱be a chire a kir kulan, aya bafi̱nenangeko ni̱n fwadu a Futiyoli.
We fiko ni̱n teka mi̱n n ti bi̱kam kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱m. A wana ni̱n ko ni̱n ma ditiyi yidibiin n ti chi. Ki̱ni yiko, ni̱n lam Roma.

Yinangu kebu ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a Roma a nwe beki̱ nangu, n chi a chire beki̱yiu ni̱n a kwa̱ma̱r Afiyus n ti fi ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko lo fi̱kare wu a taban chi yitta. Yo m Bulus a ku chiye a wana Kwama, a sub a yati̱ dukanu.
Yo nang le Roma, ni̱bu a du Bulus n ki̱kun n ti niwu ki̱to ki̱ne.

A kuteng ditiyi yittangu, m Bulus a yal bi̱duumu ni̱bu Yafudamu. Yo a murane a yi chi ko, “Kebu mi̱m, kasi ki̱ku mang mabu ki̱le we ni̱bu chiremangu, ka ki̱le wu a da tukebu chi̱reme, a mwintuwe ni̱bu a tai we Wurchalima, a yi ni̱bu Romamu ko a kwai.
Yo n chi a ya̱nti̱la ya̱m mi̱me, a ke ka mariyu, di̱ne n chi a yaibu ki̱ni wuka ki̱le wu a lwe ni̱bu ka chiye.
Aya kuu ni̱bu Yafudamu a ko, a kammi ki̱ng mang su kakku ki̱ni ya̱mu a di̱ Kaisare kasi ki̱ku n ke ko mi̱n Mai keme ni̱bu chi̱reme.”
Nang chi a yo mang bau mang ku chi̱ne di̱ne ke n twayan n ti chi̱n yo chitu a kau di̱ne n ki̱n wu ni̱bu Yisrelamu ki̱yon ni̱ru we beki̱ kange ni̱bu a kwai ki̱ni maki̱lan.

N chi a yi ki̱n ko, “Nang yabu di̱kan lwangi̱n di̱du a chire a yaa Yafudiya ki̱ni di̱n muni̱n, a neti̱ wuka ke chire we wu a be fi ki̱ni ya̱m mume we, ka ki̱ni bi̱kam ya̱m bi̱bu a li̱mbi̱me we dur mune.
Aya ni̱n baddu nang nwe ti̱kuran mwitu a yiimo, di̱ne chi nang yimitu nang wa̱re wufwiye wu n kawure ki̱fwa ya̱mu we dur ki̱ne.”

Yo n chi a do di ka tekandu n ti Buluse, n chi a be ngaban a fi n ki̱n a si̱ki̱ mi̱ne, n chi nabwenabwen. Kanga mwe mi̱ni sinangu, di li̱ti̱u n ki̱n ki̱ma chimi̱n di̱mwar yaa Kwamanu. Ki̱funti̱bwi ka wuwe chidu a bwa di̱Yesuwe, we miyaki̱ kangu ki̱bunti̱ yili̱n Musaitu n ti tatti̱ki̱dai fa̱kube.
Bi̱kamu a ke chitu n ki̱n a fwatu aya bi̱kamu a ko a kebu bi̱yili̱mu.

Bi̱ngai a ki̱la le tibe chi. N chi a yara ba̱li̱n ti turau. Yo n chi a tibu yarade, m Bulus a mar chimi̱n di̱kwa̱l yiini diin ko, Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a fwa bi̱yili̱m yo a fwa tukebu chi̱remu mi̱n a yii fa̱ku Yichaya ko,
“Ya fi a ni̱bu bi̱be
n yii mwiko,
