“N lwe Tewuduwe ni̱n n ti Kwama ni̱n!
mwang yiu dwiyentu, ri̱kaki̱ku n ti dukanu.
M mun nang wu mwang yo chiti kwange,
yinu a ki̱kemo, n chi kwang mun yo chi.”
N ku takida daalke we kang ki̱yilang wu a swe we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange. A ri ki̱ni ti̱mwalantu kasi no ki̱ki̱le ba̱la̱ng, a tal ki̱ni dukan kale.
Yinu n ku nabwe ti naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama ki̱ma di̱mwar ki̱ni ker di̱dun ko, “N wure a lwe ka wudu kale dukane n ti takida daalke?”
Aya a ne nii we ti̱ti̱nitu ka a bwa diye wu a lwe, ka a ni̱r di̱ti̱ne, ka wudu takida daalke ka ka yidu ko ka da̱ngde.
N ki wii a tiibwi di̱ne a ne ni a lwe wu a dakan ka wudu takida daalke ka ka dangde we.
Yinu wuka we seli̱bu a ya̱i ko, “Kidu wii we.” Turum wu a chire a kuu Yafuda a ki̱fi̱ku Dauda a chau ki̱la, n ki̱n ka wudu kali dukan yidibiniyu yinu ka wuduti̱ takida daalke.

N da̱ng, n ku Kwanu a ti ki̱do n ti fiswe maiye. Bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu a kan ki̱n a tibe n ti seli̱bu. Ki̱ni ki̱sumi yidi̱bin n ti kwa̱langi yidi̱bin, nang fi̱ki̱m Kwamami yidi̱bin a tume we ti̱ti̱nite.
N ki̱n a be a da̱u takida daalke we kang ki̱yilang wu a swe a ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange.

Yo n ki̱n a da̱u takida daalke, bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu n ti Seli̱bu wan taana chiri baanamu, a sungeni kukus we kakku Kwanangu. Kanang wuwule ki̱ni kwa̱l a tabati̱ kutai sinariyai a ri ki̱ni ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng, ka nang chikiye twa̱ba̱ku ni̱bu Kwamam.
N chi ki̱kau te wu fwiye ko,
“N lwe mwang da̱u takida daalke
n lwe mwang wudu kale di̱kwane
di̱ne a no chi̱ne,
n ta̱n ni̱bu Kwamamu we ka nang ki̱ki̱le ki̱kuwange
n ti ka nang wuwule yiiye,
n ti ka nang wuwule kuuti ye
n ti ka nang bi̱bi̱le ni̱be ki̱ni ki̱tuum mum.
M muni̱n yo chi a kau yaa fansetiye a nang sii Kwama
n chi ka ma mati̱n ti̱ti̱nitu.”
Yinu n da̱ng, n ki̱la nwe di̱kan ker di̱da nabwe tuule ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamam, kuniritu a ne kiku we, n chi a di̱bi̱l ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu n ti bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu n ti seli̱bu bi̱bu.
A kau teniyu ki̱ni ker di̱dun ko,
“Kwang di̱du ni̱bu a chi̱bi̱nu a lwe,
ka yiu dukan Kwaman n ti kulitu
n ti kasantu n ti dukanu
n ti ri̱kaki̱ku n ti dwiyentu n ti delaku!”
Yinu n nwe ka nang wuwule wukure we twiye n ti ti̱mu n ti mure ni̱r di̱ti̱ne n ti mweti yiduyu n ti kwali̱n chitu we fanti kwang ki̱kau teniyu ko,
“Ni ki̱n delaku n ti dwiyentu n ti dukanu,
n ki̱n wu a swe we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange
n ti Kwanu ki̱diya kwadu!”
Bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu a yi ko, “Amin,” yinu seli̱bu a sung we ti̱mu a sii ki̱n.
N ku kangu Be Kwanu a wudu wuka kale dukanengu. N nwe wuka we bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu a fwa keru yinang ki̱yale ko, “Be!”
N dang, n ki̱la n ku kwere wi mwe we kakku mangu! Wu a swe we ki̱ni ki̱kaiye, ni̱bu a ni ki̱n di̱ki̱ri̱n. N ki̱n a chir yinang wu ki̱chau ki̱la, keki̱ chakakku ki̱ni chaku ki̱langu.
Yo Be Kwane a wudu wurobe kale dukane, n nwe wurobe wukure a yi ko, “Be!”
Yinu wukane kwere a chire, yi wur, ni̱bu a ni wu a swenga kwere dukanu ka da̱u li̱me we ti̱ti̱nitu ka yo ni̱bu ka chi̱be yichiyu a ne li̱me we. Ni̱bu a ni ki̱n Kul di̱dun.
Yo Be Kwane a wudu wutare kale dukane, n wutare wukure ko, “Be!” N da̱ng, n ku wuka kwere ki̱li we kakku mangu, nii wu a fi̱le, ki̱ni si̱keli ni sween chiye we fa̱la̱ng kangu.

Yinu n nwe ti̱kan chi yinang ker ki̱chiredu we tibe bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baaname ko, sa̱ne chame wu a sure a kubi wiin, yinu sa̱ne yitta wu a cham bali̱me wu a sure a kubi wiin. Aya ti̱kaiyu ki̱nung Saitunangu we n ti mwe yinabiye.
Yo Be Kwane a wudu kale dukane wu yana, n nwe ker wukure wu yana a yi ko, “Be!”

N dang dii, n ku, wuka kwere yi bursi̱n we kakku mangu, wu fi̱lenge, di̱n ki̱nu bwa, fi bi̱bwari̱m ki̱sweende ki̱nabu ki̱nu. Ni̱bu a ni chi dukanu we ti̱me chi wiin a diya yana we ti̱ti̱nitu, ke a chi̱u ki̱ni kul, n ti chuun n ti ki̱kume, yinu n ti nai di̱kir.
Yinu Be Kwane a wudu kale dukane wu yunuwe. We mure se Kwama n ku ti̱kuri bi̱bu ni̱bu a chiben di̱ne ki̱mwa ya̱m Kwamamu ki̱ni ni̱ri diine.
N chi a kuku keru ki̱ni dukan ko, “Wa Tewuduwe naba dukane kwang, wu wauwade n ti wu ki̱fwa bi̱yili̱me, be mwang mwata ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu mi̱nu fere, ki̱tumu n chi a kur we ni̱nangu?”
A ni ka nang wuwule we tibe chi luke wu twenge. Yinu a yi ti̱chi ko a fi̱kani bayim ka lami̱nti̱ yo fati̱bu nangang chimu n ti kebu bi̱bu ni̱bu yaka chidi̱mu yinangu a chi̱u bi̱kamangu.
Yinu fal n ku Be Kwane a wudu kale dukane wu yurukune, ti̱mu a mi̱kan yinangu a fwebuwe. Dii a ki̱la kabi ki̱li yinang luke wu ki̱liye. Swangu a suten yinang ki̱tuum.
Ki̱switiyu we dii ki̱fi̱tadu we ti̱ti̱nitu, yinang ka ti̱kulan tiyang sinang ti̱ta bi̱bi ki̱twakadu ka ki̱fi̱be wu wuduwe a mi̱ke.
Twiye a dalan yinang ka ni dal di̱ba̱la̱ng. Kanang di̱di̱le kunne n ti kuni mwetu a chir we fanti chiyu.
Yinu mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu n ti mati̱m bi̱wuti̱mu n ti bi̱duum ni̱bu kunni̱mu n ti kuli̱mu n ti ni̱bu dukani̱mu n ti bi̱kami kwang ka̱biyu n ti bi̱bu n ke ka̱bimu, a laiyana ti̱kunni n ti wureni.
Ki̱yal kwantiyu ko, “Yar ni̱mi̱ntuwe, ti̱yinge ni̱n we kabu ni wu a swe a ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange yinu n ti kabu Be Kwane.
Ka di ki̱fwini wubwila ko a be, n wure ka medu ka ti̱du?”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ki̱la n ku ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami baana a tiran we fwiti̱neti yana a ti̱ti̱niyu. A tau ki̱fi̱be ti̱ti̱niye ko ke bwila a ledu ti̱ti̱nitu we ka mwetiye ka tiyang.

Yinu n ku wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a chire a twa̱r ki̱fi̱l twiye, ki̱ni kale dukan Kwaman, a yal ni̱bu ti̱tumrim Kwamami baanamu, bi̱bu n Kwama a ni chi dukanu ko a kai ti̱ti̱nitu n ti mwetiyu n ti tiyang:
Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a yi ko, ti̱kaiyu ti̱mu we n ti mwetiyu n ti tiyang, lanta yo nang yo di̱mwal kale dukane we kabi̱ni ni̱bu nanga Kwamamu.
Yinu n nwe nabwe ni̱be a ya di̱mwal kale dukani̱nu, kuniritu kul ki̱ni ti̱wan taana chiri yana bi̱bu we kutiyi kub chiri yurau yiya Yisrela.
We ki̱fi̱ku Yafudangu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Rubenangu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Ka̱d, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Acher, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Nafi̱taliyangu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Manasengu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Simiyonangu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Lawi, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Yisakar, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000),
We ki̱fi̱ku Chabulum, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).
We ki̱fi̱ku Yusufuwangu, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000),
We ki̱fi̱ku Benyami, ni̱bi kuniriti kub chiri yurau (12,000).

A kuteng ki̱ku n da̱ng, ki̱la n ku we kakku mangu, nabwe ki̱tuu ni̱be wu nii a ne yin kide, bi̱bu a chire we ka nang wuwule kuuti ye, n ti ki̱kuwange, n ti ka ki̱ki̱le ki̱fi̱ke, n ti ni̱bu, n ti ka nang wuwule yiiye, a ti we kakku ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu n ti kakku Kwannangu. A dora kuli̱niti wa̱la̱k n kawure ki̱ni lwangi̱n ti̱kweni
N chi a bwe keme ko,
“Yuku chirengu ki̱chiredu a di̱Kwama,
wu a swe a ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange
ti̱nti̱n n ti Be Kwane!”
Ni̱bu di̱tumbi̱ri Kwamamu ki̱ni kwang a tiran a bwal ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangi di̱bi̱l n ti Seli̱bu n ti bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu. N chi a sungen we kakku ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu, ki̱ sii Kwama.
Ki̱fwadu ko,
“Amin, delaku n ti ri̱kaku,
n ti kasantu n ti ti̱wannantu n ti dwiyentu
n ti dukan Kwamanu n ti dukan ni̱nu
a da ti̱bu we di̱Kwama,
a mwintuwe ki̱diya kwadu! Amin!”
Yinu wuka we seli̱bu a bi̱u mi̱n ko, “N bi̱wure bi̱bu ki̱ni kuli̱ni walaki̱m bi̱bu, n chi a chire a fi̱re?”
N yi ki̱n mi, “Tete a mwang yimbu.”
Yinu n ki̱n a yi ko, “Bi̱bu nang ni̱bu a chire we nabwe riye fumake wu a ti̱ti̱niye. Di̱ne ki̱tuum Be Kwani̱mu a nura ki̱leti chiyu a du chi wa̱la̱k.
Di̱ne yiko,
N chi a tiran we kakku ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu,
ki̱ma ki̱mi̱n nangang kum n ti kuko we se ko,
N ki̱n wu a swe we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange,
n ki̱n ka buli̱m chi ki̱ni ti̱kni dwiyeniyu yinang,
ka to ti̱n chidu.
N chi a ne nweti̱ chunu we ki̱da,
a ne nweti̱ dimwenu we ki̱da,
a ne nweti̱ kuko we ki̱da,
a neti̱ wuka balbale ka twi ti̱n chide we.
Be Kwane wu a tibe ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange
n nang naba tore chi.
ka yikadu ki̱ni chi a neti̱bwi mwei.
Yinu n Kwama ka musu chimi̱n ti̱mweni nui chintu.”
Yo Be Kwane a wudu kale dukane yidibine, bwadi a le si̱ng a da̱u ki̱twalangu yinang di̱mwatar awa.
Yinu n ku ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri bi̱bu a kakku Kwamamu, a ni chi sumiyi yi̱di̱bi̱n.

Yinu wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama ki̱ni kwa̱se si̱nariya wu ki̱twing ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ng, a be a ti we se Kwama. Ni̱bu a ni ki̱n ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu nabwen ke n ki̱n a ketuwe twa̱ba̱ku ni̱bu yinang Kwamamu, ka nidu we se Kwama si̱nariya wu a kakku ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange.
Ywa̱nu ki̱twiing ki̱nung ki̱ki fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu n ti twa̱ba̱ku ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mangu a chir we fa̱la̱ng naba di̱tumbi̱ri, a fi̱l a ya kakku Kwamang.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱ri a da̱u kwa̱se ki̱twiing ki̱nung ki̱kii fi̱rfi̱ra̱ngu, a ri ki̱ni ki̱rang a sengu, a kure a ti̱ti̱ni. Ki̱yale a ngau n ti kebi̱ ti̱dui, n ti ki̱yilti, yinu ti̱mu a mi̱ka ti̱n.
Yinu ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami bi̱dibini̱mu ki̱ni sumimu a do bwiyu ka ku sumiyu.

Yo naba di̱tumbi̱re wu kake a ku sum ko, tarangkwai n ti ki̱rang, a se ki̱ni ki̱tum, a fwale we ti̱ti̱nitu. Ki̱rangu a twi ti̱me wiin we yitta wa di̱mbi̱rme ti̱ti̱niye, ti̱me wiin wa yitta we tiyang n ti fili̱nu n ti swa̱ki̱ku ki̱ni kwang.
Wu robe naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a be ku wuko sum, ti̱kan chi yinang kun di̱dun, di̱du ki̱chau ki̱rangi̱n, a mar ki̱n a nabwe ti mwe la. Ti̱me wiin wa yitta we kangu ba̱la̱ng mwe la a kau ki̱tuum.
Ti̱me wiin wa yitta we chitu ki̱ni ti̱kuri a mwetu a bwaran, yinu ti̱me wiin wa yitta we kwa̱mbi̱ri mwenyu a fikoyu a twiyan.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱ri wu tare a ku wuko sum, wuka nabwe ti ki̱swi wu ki̱chau ki̱rang yinang kuniye a chire a bwadi, a yartuwe ti̱me wiine wa yitta a latiye n ti neti̱bwi mweyu.
Di̱n ki̱swi wunu “Kadi” wiin wa yitta wu a mwetiye a suteni kadi, ni̱bu nabwen a no mwe wumu a bwaran, di̱ne kadiye ko.

Wu nare naba di̱tumbi̱ri a ku wu ko sum, a ngau ti̱me wiin wa yitta we kuko a wuren n ti swangu n ti ki̱switiyu a suteni ki̱li a lam ti̱me wiin wa yitta. Ti̱me wiin wa yitta we kuko a ne yiiku we n ti swangu a yibu ki̱ni kum.
N da̱ng n ki̱la ku naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama ki̱bwa̱ladu a dii, a bwe keme ko: “A no chi̱n! A no chi̱n! A no chi̱n! Ki̱kume a ya ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu, di̱ne sum wu ni̱bu di̱tumbi̱rimi bi̱ta yaka kuwede!”
Naba di̱tumbi̱re wu nure a ku wu ko sum, n ku wuka naba di̱tumbi̱re yinang ki̱swi a swiye a ti̱m we dii. A ni ki̱n dukanu ka wudu
Naba di̱tumbi̱re wu a wudu kwa̱ru, di̱kan ywa̱n a chire yinang ka lo nii ki̱tau ki̱rangange. Ywa̱n di̱du a mwinti̱n a yinge twiye ki̱li.
Ki̱kwiti a chire we ywa̱n di̱du, a le ti̱ti̱nitu, a ni chi dukanu teki̱nu yinang ki̱nai.
A yi ko a twaiyu fili̱nu n ti swa̱ki̱ku we n ti tiyang n ti ka ti̱ti̱le ti̱tu ki̱kiyedu a ti̱mite. Ko a ya kana ni̱bu a ne kale dukane Kwama we tikabe chimu.
A yibu chi ko a chi̱u ni̱bu bi̱bu, aya a ni chi riye wu a swari tunuwe. Burang teku kwa̱l ki̱kwitin di̱du a lakanbu n ti yo ki̱na a teniye.
We swa̱r ti̱ti tunutu, ni̱bu ka kedu ko chi bwadu aya a ne yadu, yinu ni̱bu ka bau bwa kwa̱rikwa̱ri aya bwa a ne bedu.
Ki̱kwitiyu yinang kwereti yiyu ni̱bu a do ki̱yaan kunni. Ki̱ni ti̱kan chi yinang tarati si̱nariya yiyu a matti̱ni we dutu chitu. Kabi̱ni chiyu a chirka mi̱n n ti ni̱bu.
Rii chitu yinang ti̱ta dutu nati̱bi (ka nang chikiye ki̱ni swa̱n), nuum chimu yinang bi̱ba a turumi̱m.
A yinge kwini chiyu ki̱ni ti̱kan chi yinang lukei ka̱mbi̱ri, labi chiyu ki̱ngau diru yinang ki̱rang kwereti yiyu ki̱ni ka̱rma di̱bi̱li̱n, a chir ki̱wulu ki̱ya kunni̱n.
N chi ki̱ni yartu kite nii yinang ki̱na, n chi ki̱ni dukan ka nwe ni̱bu mi̱nu ka lam swarti tunu.

N chi ki̱ni Mai ki̱ma mati̱ne. Mai chi nang naba di̱tumbi̱ri ni̱bu a ni ki̱n dukan bwang ki̱swa̱ma̱nge. Di̱n ki̱nu ki̱ni yii Yafudame “Abadon” Ki̱ni yii Yelenamu “Afoliyon” ka nang chikiye, “Naba ki̱yaye.”
Riye wu kake a su, a kuteng ki̱ku tikanti turabitu ki̱bedu.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re wu nukune a ku sum ko, n nwe ker a chire we fwiti̱neti yanayu we se Kwama si̱nariya wu a kakku Kwamange.
Keru a yi naba di̱tumbi̱re wu nukune ko, “Mare ni̱bu di̱tumbi̱ri fakwaremi baana ni̱bu a kwab a nabwe la Yufi̱ritise!”
Yinu a mare ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri fakwarem bi̱bu n chi baanamu, di̱ne ki̱swi wu, di̱ne di wumu, di̱ne swang ki̱ku di̱ne swa̱r di̱du di̱ne ke a chi̱u wu wiin wa yitta we kuu ni̱be kwang.
Yinu n nwe ni̱bu a fwami nabwe ni̱bu kunni̱me, n chi kuniriti kub ki̱da kuniriti kub ki̱da yurau.

We dwakam bi̱yilemu, n ku kwereti n ti ni̱bu ki̱fi̱li̱m, a do lukei ka̱mbi̱ri yiyu ki̱ni di̱mwali wur yinang ki̱rangi, di̱kanu di̱mwali bungbung, di̱kanu yinang fattu. Kanang wuwule kwere ki̱ni duru yinang turum, ki̱rang n ti ywa̱n n ti ki̱rang ki̱ki balbalang ki̱chiredu we yiini chiyu.
A chi̱u ti̱me wiin wa yitta we ku ni̱be ki̱ni riye, ka nang chikiye, ki̱rang n ti ywa̱n n ti balbale ki̱rang ki̱kwanange ki̱ku ki̱chiredu we yini kwereti yiyangu.
Nangki̱n dukan kweretinu a yiini chi n ti yar chitu. Yar chitu yinang soti yiyu ki̱ni duti. Ki̱ma nangangi ki̱n ki̱nwe ni̱bu mi̱n burang.

Bi̱kamu kuu ni̱be bi̱bu a bwabu we riye wumu, bi̱bu a wobu ki̱ti̱m a dubu chitu n chi a ma ki̱ni fa̱li chitu, ka nang chikiye a dubu siiku ki̱fi̱bti yi bwilayu, a dutubu siiku di̱yoru, ni̱bu a mubbi si̱nariya ka asurfa ka takulla ka kale ka tiniye kwali̱n chi̱nu a kubudi, a nwebu a yati̱bu fimu.
N chi a wo ti̱bu ki̱ti̱m we chibeku ni̱bangu n chi ki̱madangu ka yimari chiye ka sulaiye ka kute.
Yinu ki̱la n kuti̱ wuka nabwe ti naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama ki̱ni dukan ki̱suwedu a twiye. A yingen ki̱ni ti̱twini yinu ki̱yang a sal dur ki̱nu. Kabu ko yinang dii, yinu nani kiyu yinang ki̱bni ki̱rangi
N ki̱n a tau be takida daalke wu a wudene we fa̱la̱ngu. N ki̱n a fi̱r nang ki̱yilang kangu a neti la, a fi̱r ki̱ku a kwatakwelangu a ti̱m.
A yal chitu ki̱ni dukan, keru a chir yinang wii turume. A kutengu n ki̱n a yali̱n chiyangu, ki̱yalti yidibiin a nabi̱tu keru ki̱ni keme kuuu!
Yo ki̱yalti yidibiin a ngau kere, n do bwiyu mang mwalu aya n ki̱la nwe ker a chire a bwadi ko, “Chi ki̱yaltiyu a fwaatu, mwaluwe, chi ti̱lairi!”
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama mang ku a ti a nabwe la a kuku kang ki̱yilang kangu a dii,
A twa̱n chitu ki̱ni di̱n wukure ki̱diya kwadi̱nu, wu a yo ti̱ti̱nitu n ti chi a murete n ti ti̱mu n ti chi we muretu n ti mwetiyu n ti chi we muretu ko, “A ne kaang kaiku ki̱swiyang we!
Aya yo naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama wu nibine ka ku sum ko, ti̱lairi Kwamatu ka tidi tas, yinangu a fwa ni̱bu ki̱mu fa̱kubu mi̱nangu.”
Yinu fal n nwe keru no mang wi mang nwenu, di̱du a chire a twiyenu a fwa mi ya̱m ko, “Ya, yang yiu wu a wuden a kang naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama wu a ti a neti la n ti ti̱me.”
Yinu n ya bwa naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama n yi mi a niye be takida dalke. Yinu a ya̱i ko, “Ngang n chau, ka madi kadi we fur munu, aya we yii mo ka madi yili̱m yinang rwi.”
N yiu be taki̱da daalke we fa̱la̱ng naba di̱tumbi̱ri n wu we yii mi a ma yili̱m yinang rwi. Aya yo mang miye, a ma kadi we fur mi̱nu.
Yinu a ya̱i ti̱n ko, “A mwintuwe yan ma fa̱kuitu we ya̱m Kwamamu we kuuti nabwen n ti ka nang bi̱bi̱le ki̱dum ni̱bi me n ti yiiniyu n ti mati̱m mu.”
Yinu a ni ti̱kan chi ti̱sweri yinang swe. A yi ko ya n swe se Kwama n ti ki̱di̱ng se Kwamangu, n ki ni̱bu ki̱ sii Kwama a muremu.

Aya a mwintuwe a ne mwang swe tanti̱lange wu a fi̱lang Kan Kwama di̱duna Wurchalimanu. Di̱ne n ni bwako a bi̱bu a kuuti a kebu bi̱yili̱m we di̱mi̱nemu. Bi̱bu ka ni bi̱ni wauwadi̱mu riye swartu wan taana chiri turau.
Mang tum ni̱bu mi̱mi burau yaka ma fa̱kui di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱yili̱m mi̱mi siini̱mu. N chi ka do kuli̱n furi ki̱lin ka ma di̱mwar mi̱nu we ditiyu kuneng ki̱ni kuuliti turau ki̱ni wan turukun.
Ni̱bu di̱mwari̱m bi̱bu nang tini setuniye yurabiyu n ti fitilati yurau a ti̱ya a kakku Tewuduwe.
Ka bi̱kam ki̱baddu ka nwe chimi̱nde, ki̱rang ki̱chiredu we yii ki̱chati̱ bi̱ki̱mu. Nang tiyangu ni̱bu ki̱baddu ka chi̱u chini̱mu ka bwaradangu.

A ni chi dukanu ka yinge twiye ke a swidu mwe we diti yikiyu n chi ki̱ma di̱mwar mi̱niyu. N chi ki̱ni dukan we neti̱bwiyu, ka sutedu ka kau ki̱tuum. N chi ki̱ni da ka yo di̱kume ka bulma ti̱ti̱nitu we ki̱dangu n chi ki̱badangu.
Ka a ri di̱mwar chi̱ne, wuka nam ka chiredu a bwang ki̱swa̱ma̱nge ka kuladu n ti chi. Nam wu ka la chidu ka chi̱be ti̱n chidu.
Kwa̱mi chiyu ka dudu we wa̱re ne lo a bi̱n di̱dun
Ni̱bu n ti kuuti n ti ti̱fi̱ki̱ritu n ti yiiniyu ka fwal nui chiyu kani̱n da̱ng kwa̱mi yiyu ka lam ditiyi yitta ki̱ni di̱mwatar ka ko ti̱n furku kwa̱miyangu.
Ni̱bu ti̱ti̱nimu ka ma ti̱mi̱lan we bwa ni̱bu di̱mwari̱mi burabi̱m bi̱bu. Ka ma mabwi, kani̱n nika ki̱li̱mang di̱ne fa̱kubi̱bu burabi̱mu a be di̱mwar a ti̱ti̱nitu a ni riyemu.
Aya we kuteng ditiyi yitta ki̱ni di̱mwatariyu, fi̱ki̱m chitu a ki̱latewe bwa di̱Kwama, ka le bwi chiyu, ka kunu ka tidutiye. Tayi yidui ka tau ni̱bu nabwen bi̱bu a ku chimu.
Yinu fa̱kubi̱bi burabi̱mu a nwe di̱kan ker ki̱ni dukan a chire we bwadi ko, “Ti̱fi̱le fi!” N chi fal a fi̱l we ti̱twinitu a yika dii, fakwarbu chimu ki̱da̱ng ti̱ni ying.

Bi̱nabi̱na ni̱bu a nwe ti̱mu a mi̱kan ki̱ni dukan, yinu ti̱me wiin wu a Wurchalima a kiyani ki̱ti̱bu, ni̱bu kuniyi yidibiin a bwaran. Ni̱bu a dubumu a nwe tayi nabwen. N chi a ni Kwama wu a diye dwiyentu yinang yinang.
Di̱kumen di̱robi̱nu a su. Di̱tari̱nu nang wu ki̱funte bwi ki̱bedu.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama wu nibine a ku wuko sum. Ti̱kan kebi̱ ki̱ni dukan a chire we bwadi ki̱fwadu ko,
“Dukan mati̱nu a ti̱ti̱ni ki̱ka̱ngi̱nu
n ti̱u Tewuduwe chire n ti Masiya
ka ma mati̱ntu ki̱diya kwadu!”
Yinu seli̱bu wan turau chiri baana bi̱bu a swe a ki̱di̱ng mati̱ni̱mu a sung we kakku Kwamangu, a sii ki̱n,
ki̱yidu ko,
“Mwang mabe, Kwama Tewuduwe naba dukane kwang,
m mun wu we ferediye n ti ki̱ka̱nge!
Di̱ne mati̱n mwitu mwan
mwe mun maditu ti̱dui ki̱ni dukan.
Kuu ni̱bu a yimbu Kwamamu a ri ki̱ni ki̱fwini,
Aya ki̱ka̱ngu, ki̱swi ki̱fwinimo a lam
Ki̱swi a lam wu mwang kaba bi̱bwari̱mu mi̱nde,
Fa̱kubu mumu ka ya sure chi,
n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu a nwe tayi mwiyumu.
Seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱m
ki̱swi a be wu ka chi̱be
bi̱bu a chi̱u ti̱ti̱nimu!”
Yinu a wudu lo Kwama we bwadi, akwati wu a bwa̱ki̱ we mure lo Kwama. A kuteng ki̱ku, ki̱yile n ti kebi̱ n ti ker ki̱yalti n ti mi̱kaku ti̱mang n ti nabwe tarankwai.
Ti̱kan chi ti̱dui n ti chi ka̱ta̱ki a chire we twiye. N ku wuka Naye
Naye wu ki̱ni lur di̱bwilan, n ki̱n ki̱ki wi di̱ne yaka bi̱dde, n Ki̱n ki̱ma ki̱tine di̱ne yaka bi̱u riye.
Yinu n ki̱la n kuti̱ ti̱kan chi ti̱dui n ti chi ka̱ta̱ki a chire we twiye, n ku neeti soo
Dukan Yangi̱nu a lam twiye a mwate ti̱me wiin wa yitta we ki̱switiyu a fwale a ti̱m. Yinu soo a ti we kakku Nayewu ko ke ki̱wu bwe
Naye a mwinti̱n a bi̱u bwe wubare wu ka ma mati̱n kuu ti̱ti̱niye ki̱ni ki̱twalang makka,
Naye a wul nabwe di̱chilanchangine, finu n Kwama a do ki̱mi̱ne, fi ka yaan toku ka lami̱nti ditiyu kunengi kiin ki̱ni kuliti turau ki̱ni wan turukune (1,260).
Yinu kun a fwe we bwadi. M Makel n ti ni̱bu bi̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mu ki̱makadu n ti neeti soo wuduwe. Soo wu n ti ni̱bu bi̱tumbi̱ri̱m ki̱mu a le kunnu yikul n ti bi̱ki̱m bi̱tumbi̱ri̱m ki̱mu.
Aya ni̱bu a la neeti soo ki̱ni dukanu, yinu a kakati̱ ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rim ki̱mu. A kuteng kun di̱dangu n chi a du bwadiye a newe a ki̱ke chi.

A tunge neeti so wuduwe a ti̱ti̱ni, kanang chikiye so wu n we ferediye. Wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko wubwilla ki̱yalti̱nu ko Setane. Wu a butu ti̱ti̱niti kwange. A tunge ki̱n a ti̱m n ti ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri ki̱mi kwang.
Yinu n nwe di̱kan ker di̱dun we di a twiye ko,
Ki̱ka̱ngu yuku Kwamanuwangu
n ti dukan ki̱nu n ti mati̱n kitu
n ti dukan Masiya a lwe.
Nangki̱n, a tung ni ki̱mai keme kebu ni̱me a ti̱m
n ki̱n wu ki̱mai keme kebu ni̱me
we di̱Kwama kum n ti kukonge.
N chi a chau ki̱la we di̱ki̱ne
Ki̱ni ki̱tuum Be Kwanemu
ti̱nti̱n di̱ne bi̱yili̱mu n chi a mwamu.
Nangki̱n n chi a mi̱labu ti̱kuri chitu yinang
a yo n chi ki̱wul tayi yinangu ka bwadangu.
Di̱ne yiko ti̱ma furi mwen n ti̱n bi̱bu a diimu
n ti bi̱bu a swe we diimu ki̱ni kwang!
aya a no chi̱n ti̱ti̱ni n ti mweti yiduiyu!
N Setan a be bwa di̱chi̱ne,
ki̱ni ki̱fwini
di̱ne a yim ki̱swi ko a dubi bayim.
Yo neeti so wuduwe a swaan ko ni̱bu a tunge ki̱n a ti̱me, a ma nang a bituwe naye wu a bi̱u bwe wubare.
Aya a ni naye wu la̱biyi yurau yinang yiyu a ki̱sung kuduwangi, ko ke a kun a wul nabwe di̱chilanchangi̱nu ni̱bu a do ka toon ki̱nu swa̱ti̱ti ti̱ta ki̱ni di̱mwatare.
Soo wu a toye, a fwale mwe we yiiko yinang wu a laa, ko ke a da̱u naye wu a yikani ki̱n,
Aya ti̱mu a maka naye. Ti̱mu a wuden a no mwe so a fwale.
Yinu so a ma ki̱fwini ki̱ni naye yinang yinang, a kune ka ma di̱kulanu n ti ki̱kuwang nayengu, kanang chikiye bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ yili̱n Kwamatu, bi̱bu a yo ni̱ri diin we ya̱mu n Yesu a fwamu.
Yinu soo wu a ti a ki̱ti̱ku laang.
Yinu n ku wuka nam ki̱chiredu a laa. Ki̱ni ki̱sumiyi kubu
Nam mang kuwe yinang mabi̱li̱m
Di̱kan dur we dutu nam wu tu, yinangu ki̱ni di̱nti̱leng
Kanang wuwule niye ki̱ sii neti soo wuduwe di̱ne dukanu n ki̱n a ni nam wunu. Yo n chi ki̱sii nam wuwe, ki̱fwadu ko, “N wure ki̱ni dukan yinang nam wu? N wure ka medu ka ma kunnu ware?”
Ni̱bu a du nam wu ki̱ri̱kadu ki̱ swa̱ba Kwama. A du ki̱n ko a ma chi n ki̱n a kudiye we swartu wan taana chiri turabitu.
N ki̱n a fwa ya̱mu ki̱ swa̱ba di̱n Kwamanu n ti ki̱di̱ng mati̱nang kangu n ti bi̱bu ki̱swedu ware we bwadimu.
A du ki̱n ko a ma kunnu n ti ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mu, a chau ki̱la we dur chi̱nu. A ni ki̱n dukanu we ka nang ki̱ki̱le ki̱fi̱ke n ti kanang bi̱bi̱le ni̱be n ti kanang wuwule yiiye n ti kuuti.
Ni̱bu we ti̱ti̱nimi kwang ka sii nam wu, ka bwin ka bi̱bu di̱nbi chitu we taki̱da ti̱kuriye, kanang chikiye bi̱bu a bunti̱ Be Kwane wu ni̱bu a bi feredi yo ti̱ti̱nitu a tibu mwede.
Ni ki̱ni ki̱tele a nwe.
Wu a yo ka le di̱bi̱nti̱le, ka leti̱ di̱bi̱nti̱lu. Wu a yo ka bwadu a kulle, ka bwadu a kul. Ti̱tu ki̱bau bwanu n ti keku bi̱yili̱mang we bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ Kwamamu.
Yinu n ku wuka nam a chire a ti̱m ki̱ni ki̱sumiyi yurau yinang ki̱sumi kwani, ki̱fwa ya̱mu yinang neti soo.
A ma nangangu ki̱ni dukan nam wu kakke we kakku nam wukangu. A yo ti̱ti̱nitu n ti ni̱bu we ti̱ti̱nimu ko a sii nam wu kakke, kanang chikiye, wu di̱nti̱le ko a tu a benge.
Nam wu robe a ma chi ka̱ta̱ki ti̱dui we nui ni̱biyu. Ki̱medu ki̱yo ki̱rang ki̱chiredu we twiye ki̱yii ti̱ti̱niti wa̱liwa̱li we nui ni̱biyu.

N ki̱n a butu ni̱bu bi̱bu a bunti̱bu Kwamamu ki̱ni chi ya̱r yii ti̱tu ni̱bu a du ki̱n ko a ma a nui nam wu kakketu. N ki̱n a yi ni̱bu ko a mu di̱kan di̱yor nami̱n di̱dun yinang nam wu kakke, wu ni̱bu a ngau a dub ka di̱fuken, aya n we ki̱ni ti̱kurite.
A du nam wu robe ko a ni di̱yor nam wu kakkenu Fi̱ki̱m ti̱kurim ke a fwa ya̱m, yinu di̱yor nami̱n di̱du a yi ko kanang wuwule niye wu ka kodu a ne sii ki̱ne, ka bwadu.
Nam wu robe a yo ni̱bu ko a kau ki̱kwai a fa̱la̱ng ki̱yilang ka a ti kabenge, we seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱mu, naba kuli n ti di̱lusanu, ka̱be n ti wu n ke ka̱be.
N ki̱n a ma ti̱tu ko ke wuka a yadu da a ta̱nu chiwe ka ka feku chiye ka n ke kana nii wu ki̱ni ki̱kwai nam we.
Ti̱tu ki̱bau swaanku. Nii wu ki̱ni swaanke, ka medu ka fwa chi ki̱kwai nam wu ki̱yungde, di̱ne ki̱kwai wu a di̱n wuka nii, ki̱kwai ko n nang 666.
Yinu n da̱ng, n ku Kwanu a ti a kun Siyona
Yinu n nwe di̱kan ker a chire a twiye, ki̱ngau diru yinang mwe ki̱sudu a la, yinang ki̱yale wu ki̱ni diir nabwene. Keru mang nwenu yinang yo ni̱bu ki̱ngau molotiye.

N chi a kau te wufwiye we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu n ti kakku bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu n ti seli̱bu. A ne nii ka medu ka miya te wuko we ka n ke bi̱bu kuniyu kuul ki̱ni wan taana chiri yaname bi̱bu a ya yuku we ti̱ti̱nimu.

N chi nang ni̱bu bi̱bu n Kwama a so chi a mabu yarimu, bi̱bu a ya yinang Kwamamu. N chi nang bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ Be Kwane kasi no ka yadi bwalemu, bi̱bu a ya yuku we bi̱kamu ni̱bi̱mu, n chi nang bi̱kaki̱mu ka le fa̱la̱ng Kwamang n ti Kwani̱mu.
N chi a mweenbu ti̱kwani we, a neti̱ chi mwang tuun chide we.

N ki̱la, n ku wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama ki̱yadu we twiye yinang ki̱ka̱le, ki̱ni di̱mwar ya̱m bi̱li̱m ki̱diya kwadi̱m, be ka fwa ni̱bu a ti̱ti̱nimu n ti ki̱dum ni̱bi̱mu n ti kuuti, n ti yiiniyu n ti ti̱ntiyu.
A fwa ki̱ni ker di̱dun ko, “Ti̱ni Kwama dwiyentu, dela ki̱n di̱ne ki̱swi mwatake a lam. Ti̱sii ki̱n wu a yo dii n ti ti̱mu n ti nabwe ti laatiyu n ti neti̱bwiye.”
Wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a nabe wukakke ko, “A yar! Babila bi̱n di̱dunu a yar! N ki̱n a yo kuuti a no mwe yinabi a lwe bwitiyu di̱ne nabwe ti̱bwitan yari kite!”
A kuteng ki̱ku wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a bunte bi̱kaki̱mu ki̱fwadu ko, “Ka wuka ni a sii nam wu n ti ki̱wulang kangu yinu a yiuti̱ di̱mwar ki̱nu we ti ka̱be ka fa̱la̱nge,
ni wuko ka le riye ki̱fwini Kwama, di̱ne ki̱fwini ko a kaiyan. N Kwama ka ni chi riye ki̱ni ki̱fi̱bti ben ki̱rangi we kakku ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri bi̱bi wauwadi̱mu n ti Kwanu.
Ywa̱nu ki̱chiredu we fi n chi ki̱nween riyenu a ne riduriye. Riye a ne swe bunge wuka di we bi̱bu a sii nam wu n ti ki̱wulang kangi̱mu n ti bi̱kami kwang bi̱bu a yiu ki̱kwai di̱n ki̱ni̱nu.”
Ti̱tu ki̱yungdu a mwintuwe, ni̱bu Kwamamu, ka mu ni̱ru we ti̱fumantu ki̱ni bwanu. N chi ka bunti̱ yili̱ntu, ka tidi ki̱ri̱ng we keku bi̱yili̱mang chiyangu a di̱n Yesunangu.

Yinu a nwe ker a chire a dii ko, “Mwal mwi ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu a bwamu, bi̱bu ki̱bwadu a di̱n Tewuduwe mu, a tatuwe ki̱ka̱ngu a ne fi̱rufi̱re!” Fi̱ki̱m a fwa ko, “Ki̱kumang, ka fi̱kadu we riye chi, nangi̱n chitu ka bunti̱ chi.”
Yinu n ku chi ya̱r yii yinang di̱twin mwen, we di̱twinu wuka ni a swe we yinang Bwe Nii, ki̱ni di̱ki̱ri̱n si̱nariya we duru n ti yunge wu ki̱ni chamme we fa̱la̱ng kangu.
Yinu wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a chire furtu we Kan Kwama di̱dunu, a yal wu a swe a di̱twine ki̱ni dukan ko, “Chake yungemo
N ki̱n wu a swe a di̱twine, a swi ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni yungeko yinang cham, a mur ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni kwang.
Yinu wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a chire we Kan Kwama di̱dun di̱du a diinu. A tatte wuko yunge.

Yinu wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a chire we se Kwama. N ki̱n nang wu ki̱to ki̱rangu ka twi ti̱ti̱niyangu we se Kwama. A yal wu yunge ki̱ni dukan ko, “Chake yungemo ki̱ni chame n swi yinabe we ti̱ti̱nitu, di̱ne ti̱kulan kitu a bi, di mwatake a lam.”
Naba di̱tumbi̱re a mau yunge ko we ti̱ti̱nitu, a swi yar yinabe we tiyangu, a kur chi a di̱kulen, finu ki̱fwini Kwama ka yammi̱n chide.

Ni̱bu nanga Kwamamu a faba ni̱bu bi̱bwilamu we di̱kulenu a kuteng bi̱nang. Ki̱tuumu ki̱chiredu sibsib we di̱kulen di̱du, ki̱fwadu a fwa laa wuswa̱me wu swa̱n ki̱nu a lam Kilomita kuuliti ti̱ta, ki̱sule ko ni fadu naniyi yurukun.
N ku ti̱kan chi ti̱dui, chi ya̱r yii we di a twiye, ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimi bi̱dibiini̱mu a ti ki̱ni bwini chiyu ka swani̱ndiyu n chi yidibiin. Di̱ne nang fi ni̱bu ka kuun ki̱fwini Kwama wu ka swani̱nde.

N ku ti̱kan chi yinang far ki̱lasi̱n, a se ki̱ni ki̱rang. Yinu n kuti̱ bi̱bu a ma ki̱ti̱me we nam wu n ti ki̱wulang kangu, ki̱ni di̱mwal di̱n ki̱ne, n chi a ti we ki̱ti̱ku nabwe laa ki̱lasi̱nu, ki̱ni sumiyu n Kwama a ni chiyu.
Kuuti ki̱kaba teniyu m Musa naba nanga Kwama a kaban ferediye. N chi a kabi ying ki̱dela Yesu Mai wu yinang Kwane:
“Tewuduwe Kwama naba dukane wu a lachiye,
Nangi̱n mwitu a dwiyen, chi ya̱r yii!
Wa̱ri mwiyu yiyu a ni̱ri diin, yiyu a bi̱yili̱mi
Tewuduwe Kwama dilewenge.
N wure a wulbu tayi mwiye,
Tewuduwe?
N wure a ne ni̱n dwiyen mwite!
Wu wauwade ka mun.
Kuuti kwang be
ka sii ki̱nu,
mwataki̱ mwang ki̱yilangu a chirengi kwa̱rikwa̱ri.”
A kuteng ki̱ku, n ku Kan Kwama di̱dunu a bwadi, kanang chikiye di̱kur Kwaman, a wuden.

Ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwama bi̱bi bi̱dibiin ki̱ni bwini chi yidibiinimu a chire we Kan Kwama di̱du, n kawure a do luke fi̱bi̱ne mwe, wu wusi̱ne, ki̱yila ti̱nu yilane, n kawure a mu di̱ki̱ri̱n si̱nariya we kwiye.
Yinu wuka we bi̱kuri̱mi baanamu a ni ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri bi̱bi bi̱dibiini̱m bi̱bu ki̱ni kutai sinariyayi yidibiin yiyu a ri ki̱ni ki̱fwini Kwama wukure ki̱diya kwade.

Kan Kwama di̱dunu a ri ki̱ni ywa̱n di̱du ki̱yungdu dwiyen Kwamatu n ti dukan ki̱nu we fiko. A ne nii ka medu ka le Kan Kwama di̱dune we, a lami̱nti̱ yo ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami bi̱dibiin a ri ki̱ni bwini chiyi yidibiiniye.
N nwe di̱kan ker di̱dun a chire we se Kwama a bwadiye kiyi ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami bi̱dibini̱mu ko, “Ti̱kur kutai ki̱fwini Kwamayi yidibiniyu a ti̱ti̱ni.”
We ni̱bu bi̱bu, wukakke naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a ya, a kur ki̱fwini Kwama wu a kwa̱se ko a ti̱ti̱ni. Bumbi ti̱tu ki̱ni swa̱le
Wurobe naba di̱tumbi̱re a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se ki̱fwiniye a la wuduwe. Mwe a suten yinang ki̱tum nii wu bwarem. Kwali̱n chi̱nu ki̱ni ti̱kurinu we la wuduwenu a bwaran.
Wutare naba di̱tumbi̱re a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se ki̱fwiniye a laa n ti beti̱ lati, n chi a suten a kau ki̱tuum.
Yinu n nwe naba di̱tumbi̱ri wu dwiyen mwetitu a fa̱la̱ng kange a fwa ko:
“Bale mun mang mwataki̱ mwange a lele,
Kwama wu wauwade,
wu we feredi a ne sutekuwe.
Di̱ne n chi a kur ki̱tuum bi̱suturi̱m mume n ti fa̱kubu Kwamame,
n ni chi ki̱tuumu n chi a chiben ni̱bumu a no,
ke a twai ni̱r chi̱nu. Ti̱tu a wura chimi̱n bwi.”
Yinu n nwe ker we se Kwama ki̱fwadu ko,
“We yiko, Tewuduwe Kwama naba dukane kwange!
Mwataku mwangu a le, a da.”
Wunare naba di̱tumbi̱ri a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se a kuko ki̱yii ti̱me, a ni kuko dukanu a twi bi̱bwilamu ni̱bu ki̱ni ki̱rang kangu.
Ki̱rang ki̱ku ka twi ni̱bu bi̱bwilamu, n chi a fwara ya̱mi swa̱ba ku we dur Kwamang wu a tau bwini chiyi kwange. Aya n chi a wobu ki̱ti̱m, a niti̱bu Kwama dwiyentu.
Wunure naba di̱tumbi̱ri a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se, we fi nam wu ki̱mami̱n mati̱n kiye. Ki̱liye a yinge yaa ko. Ni̱bu bi̱bwilamu a ki̱rtu nuum chimu di̱ne riye n chi ki̱nwede.
N chi a swa̱ba Kwama di̱ne burangu n chi ki̱nwedangu n ti bumbi ti̱tu a bwi chitu. Aya n chi a wobu ki̱ti̱m we chii n chi a matu.

Wunukune naba di̱tumbi̱ri a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se a nabwe laa wuduwe Yufi̱ritise. Ti̱tu a yo mwe la a ku a do wa̱re wu mati̱m bi̱bu a ti̱nti yiyu a twa̱ri̱mu ka sudu ka yikan ki̱twale ki̱ni ni̱bu ki̱rang chime.
Ki̱la n ku ki̱fi̱bti yiyu a lebi̱lei yinang ki̱natatikuli. Wuka ki̱chiredu a yii soo, wuka a yii nam we, wuka a yii fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu.
Ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu nang ki̱fi̱btiyu a ma chi ya̱r yiiyu. N chi a ti̱ran we mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu ki̱ni kwang, ka mur chiyedu di̱ne kunnu a di ki̱fwini wubwila Kwama naba dukane kwange.
“Ti̱da̱ng mi̱n bedu yinang daaku. Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu a swe ki̱ma ki̱yolang beki̱ mangi̱mu. Bi̱bu a yo kuli̱n chi̱nu ki̱dwan ko ke yayu a be kadu wu twatwadu ki̱ni dibwiye we.”
Ki̱fi̱bti yibwilayu a mur mati̱mu ki̱ni kwang n ti ni̱bu ki̱rang chimu a fi ni̱bu Yafudam ki̱yalu ko Amekidon.
Wuni̱bine naba di̱tumbi̱ri a kur chi a wuko kwa̱se a ki̱fi̱be tanti̱lange twiye. Nabwe ker di̱dun a chire we se Kwama a bwadiye, a ki̱di̱ng mati̱nang kangi̱mu ko, “A ri yiko!”

Di̱ne yiko, ki̱yile ki̱yaltiye n ti kebi̱ n ti ki̱yaleti n ti mi̱kaku ti̱mang ki̱duwang. Ki̱ku mi̱kaku ti̱mang a fwenbuwe feredi yinangu a mun mi̱n ni, a yo we ti̱ti̱nitangu, mi̱kaku ti̱mang ki̱ku a bwilan.
Di̱ne mi̱kaku Babilangu, ti̱mu a keran ti̱nti yitta. Bi̱ntu kuuti ti̱tu ki̱ni kwang a wuren. Ti̱kuran Kwamatu a ki̱la Babila ki̱wuki̱mi̱n ki̱tele ko ke a twai ni̱r ki̱nu.
Mi̱kaki̱ku a yo kunni ti̱tu a mwetu a twiyan, kunni ti̱duiti kwang a twiya ti̱n.
Nabwe ti̱ti tarankwai yinang kali yiyu turengu a lam kilo wan tunuyu, ki̱twakadu we di a twiye a dutu ni̱bi. N chi a swa̱ba Kwama di̱ne tarankwaitu ki̱ni chi riyetu a bwilan.

Wuka we ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami bi̱dibini̱mu ki̱ni kutai ki̱fwini Kwamayi yidibiniyu a be fi a di̱mi̱ne ko, “M be, mang yungi̱nu yinangu mang madu ki̱ni naye wu ki̱ma ti̱kuliyengu. Wu ki̱sweda fanti mweti nabweniyu.
Mati̱m bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nimu a ma yaritu n ti ki̱n. A yo ku ti̱ti̱niye ki̱tosadu ki̱ni mwe yinabi wu a yarikiye.”

Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a dai a Fi̱ki̱m a yika di̱chilachangi̱n. We bwako, n ku naye a swe a nam di̱kire wu wure, wu ki̱ni duti̱ti ti̱dibiin n ti ki̱sumiyi kube. A bwal bwikiyu ki̱ni di̱mbiti kwebekwebe ti̱tu a swa̱ba ku we dur Kwamanu.

Naye wu a do kuli̱ni bungbungi̱n n ti di̱di wurwuri̱n. Ki̱yiladu yinang si̱nariya n ti kali yiyu a lelei n ti chi ki̱lbuki̱lbe. N ki̱n a tau kwa̱se wu a si̱nariya we fa̱la̱ngu, kanang chikiye ki̱yung ya̱mi yibwilai n ti dutu ti̱tu a yari kitu.
We tikabe ko a mwal di̱n di̱lairi̱mwu a ne nii ka kide we, “Babila wuduwe, ne ti̱baniye kwang, ne wu a chi ti̱bwilaiye we ti̱ti̱nitu.”
N ku naye wu a ri fur ki̱nu ki̱ni ki̱tuum ni̱bu Kwamam, kanang chikiye, ki̱tuum ni̱bu Kwamam bi̱bu a mibani bobu ki̱mwa di̱n Yesuni̱mu.
Kangu mang ku ki̱nangu a yari yii yinang yinang.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a bi̱u mi̱n ko, “A mayire mun ya̱r yiiye? Mang fwami̱n ya̱m bi̱lairi̱m naye wu mu n ti bi̱bu a nam di̱kiremu wu n ki̱n a fi̱l ki̱ni dututi ti̱dibiin n ti ki̱sumiyi kube.”

Nam di̱kire mwang kuwe, a no wukure, aya a newe ki̱ni ti̱kuri ki̱ka̱ngu. N ki̱n ka chiredu a bwang ki̱swa̱ma̱ng, ka yika bwanu n ki̱n ka twiyande. Aya ni̱bu ki̱bunti̱ da ti̱ti̱ni ti̱ti̱mu, bi̱bu ni̱bu a no a mwalbu di̱nbi chitu we taki̱da ti̱kuriye a yo no a tibu yo ti̱ti̱niye, ka ya̱r yii yo ka ku nam di̱kire wu a no bwa a chirtewe.
Ti̱tu ki̱bau kasn n ti ti̱kuran ti̱yili ti̱dui. Dututi ti̱dibinitu, yinang beti̱ kuni yi̱di̱bi̱n yiyu naye wu ki̱mang mati̱niyu. Ki̱yung mati̱m mi bi̱dibiin.

Ti̱nti̱ne, dutu ti̱ti ti̱dibinitu yinang mati̱m bi̱bi bi̱dibiini̱m, bi̱bi bunu we bi̱bi bi̱dibiini̱m a bwarani̱mu, wuka n we ki̱ma mati̱ntu, wuka a bebu didiin. Ka a benge, a mwintuwe ka ma mati̱n kitu a ne tike.
Nam di̱kire wu a no ki̱ni ti̱kuriye ki̱ka̱ngu a ne ti̱kuri we, nang wu nari̱be, aya a chire we yi yidibiniyu, ti̱nti̱ne a tau wa̱re ki̱yika bwa ka twiyande.
Ki̱sumiyu mwang ku kubiyu, yinang mati̱m mi kubu, bi̱bu a tibu mwe mati̱ni̱mu. Aya n chi beka yiu mati̱ntu ka madu a awa win n ti nam di̱kire wu.
N chi ki̱ni kwang ti̱kuran chitu kanodu a fiwiine, ka kedu ka ni nam di̱kire wu dukan n ti mati̱n chi̱ntu.

N chi ka ma kunnu n ti Be Kwane, aya Be Kwane ka chau ki̱la di̱ne n ki̱n Tewuduwe wu a Tewuduwe n ti Mai wu a mati̱me. N ki̱n kanodu n ti bi̱yali̱li̱mu n ti bi̱suti̱ri̱mu n ti bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ ki̱nu ki̱ni ni̱ri dini̱mu.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re a ya̱i ko, “Mwetiyu mwang kuyu, n nang fanti sweri di̱baniyu we ka nang bi̱bi̱le ni̱bi n ti muraku ni̱bang n ti kuuti n ti kanang wuwule yiiye.
Nam di̱kire wu n ti ki̱sumiyi kubu mwang kuyu ka ko di̱bannu. N chi ka wur ki̱nu, ka wo kuli̱nu ka du ki̱ni twatwadu. N chi ka wu nam ko, ka twidu a ki̱rang.

“Mati̱mi kubumu ka madi ying di̱ne n Kwama a yo chi a kur chi n ki̱n ki̱baddu n chi ka made. Di̱ne yiko n chi ka kekadu ka ni nam di̱kire wu dukan mati̱ni̱nu. N chi kani̱n ma nam di̱kire wumi̱n kwa̱mbi̱r ka lami̱nti̱ yo ya̱m Kwamamu ka ride.
Naye mwang kuwe ki̱yung bi̱n di̱dunu ka ma mati̱n mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu.”
A kuteng ki̱ku n ku wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama ki̱suwedu we bwa diye ki̱ni nabwe dukane, ti̱nti̱ne dwiyen kitu a yii ti̱ti̱niti kwangi wa̱liwa̱li.
A fwa ya̱mu ki̱ni dukan ko,
“A yar, Babila bi̱n di̱dunu a yar!
A kau lo wu a ki̱fi̱bti yibwilaye,
n ti kanang bi̱bi̱le ki̱duum ki̱ni̱bi yibwilai yiyu a lebi̱ da̱ngke.
N ki̱n a yo kuu ti̱ti̱niye kwang a yar di̱ne dwadi ko wu a lebe.
Mati̱m bi̱bu a ti̱ti̱nimu a ma yaritu n ti ki̱n.
Ni̱bu ki̱feku kuli̱ni̱mu a kul we chi n ki̱n ki̱chidu di̱ne nwe ta̱me ko.”
Yinu n nwe di̱kan ker a chire we bwa diye ki̱fwadu ko,
ti̱chir mi̱ne we di̱ki̱ne ni̱bu mi̱m,
ko ke ki̱leti kiyu a bwitadu chi̱n we,
ko ke ni̱bu a weladi̱ chi̱n we ware.
Di̱ne swa̱n ki̱leti ki̱nu a bukan a lam twiye,
n Kwama a tabi̱bu ka wela ki̱nu.
Ti̱ma ki̱mi̱n chi a lebitu yinangu n ki̱n a ma bi̱kamu mi̱nangu.
Ti̱ma ki̱yerangu ki̱da yurau we chi n ki̱n a maatu.
Ti̱ri ki̱mi̱n kwa̱se ki̱ni mwe yinabiye
wu dukan ki̱nu a la wu n ki̱n a niye ni̱be ki̱da yurau.
Ni ki̱n riye n ti kaiyan ni̱re yinang nabwe dwiyentu n ti nwe ta̱me n ki̱n a ni dur ki̱ne.
We ni̱r ki̱nu n ki̱n a kuku duru ko,
M mi̱n Cheba mai naye, m mi̱n n ke nabune
A ne mang mang furi ki̱linu we ki̱diya kwadu.
Di̱ne yiko, di wiin burang
n ti bwa, n ti furi ki̱lin ka lum ki̱nu.
ki̱rang be ka twi ki̱nu,
Di̱ne n Kwama wu a da̱ng yinangu ka wela ki̱nange n nang Tewuduwe kwang.
Mati̱m ti̱ti̱nim bi̱bu a ma yari waremu, bi̱bu a nwe ta̱ma̱ng ware n ti ki̱ni̱mu, ka kira wiini ki̱ni kemi we dur ki̱nu yo n chi ka ku ywa̱n kirangi̱nu ki̱chiredu we fi ki̱twin ki̱ne.
N chi ka tidu kutan di̱ne tayu ko ke chi leti̱nu ki̱rangu we n ti ki̱n kani̱n yidu ko,
A no mun! nabwe bi̱n Babilanu.
Wo, Babila, bi̱n dwiyeni̱nu!
Yaremo a be a awa wiin.
We yiko, ni̱bu ki̱feki̱ chimu ka kirati̱ wiini ki̱ni furi ki̱lin di̱ne a ne ni ka ta̱n chimi̱n kuli̱ne we.
Kuli̱nitu yinang
si̱nariya,
asurfa,
kali yi ki̱lbi̱ki̱lbi n ti yidoriyu kali,
kuli̱n di̱yili̱nu,
di̱di bungbungi̱nu,
fi̱bi̱n di̱di wusi̱ni̱nu n ti di̱di wuri̱nu,
kuli̱n n ti kanang wuwule ki̱dum katakome
n ti kuli̱n num nakami̱n
n ti kuli̱nu a swa̱swa̱be ti̱ti̱niye
n ti kuli̱n ka̱mbi̱r di̱ribi̱nu
n ti di̱kusi̱nu
n ti kuli̱n kaliyu ki̱yiladu yilaneni kwang.
N ti kuli̱n;
sinamon
n ti kuli̱n kwekwen
n ti kuli̱n ki̱rangi̱n di̱di fi̱rfi̱ri̱n
n ti mur
n ti luban
n ti mwe yinabi
n ti ki̱nung
n ti miim alkamam
n ti ki̱nuti alkamam
n ti tanti̱kai
n ti kwanti
n ti siti
n ti keti̱kei kwerei
n ti ka̱bi kanang chikiye ti̱kuri ni̱bi.
Ni̱bu ki̱feki̱ chimu ka yi ki̱nu ko,
“Nabwe ti̱kulan tiyilintu mwang yotu ni̱r we ka twiyadu,
ti̱nti̱ne kuli mwitu n ti kuli̱n leran mwinu a twiyan.
A ne mwang ya ti̱nu we ki̱da.”
Ni̱bu ki̱feki̱ chimu, bi̱bu a ya kuli chitu we kuli̱n di̱du ki̱feku ki̱mi̱ndi̱nu, ka tidu kutan, di̱ne riye naye wu ki̱nwede a ya̱r chi yii.
Kani̱n yidu ko,
“A no mun! Nabwe bi̱n Babila
a no ki̱do ka sa̱ni wu a fi̱bi̱n di̱di wusi̱ne
n ti luke wu ki̱ni di̱mwali wure
ki̱dosa bwi kiyu ki̱ni kuli̱n si̱nariyan,
n ti kali yiyili n ti kali yiyu ni̱bu a swa̱swa̱be.”
A ki̱twalangi kiin, kuli chiti kwang a twiyan.
“Ki̱ni bi̱bu ki̱si kwa̱mbi̱re mwemu n ti bi̱bi kwadu ki̱ya chidu we fikomu,
n ti bi̱bu ki̱ya chabtu chitu we mwemu lamu, ka tidu kutan.”
Yo n chi ka ku ywa̱n ki̱ran di̱du ki̱twi Babilanu ki̱chiri wulakwulake, n chi ka yidu ko, “Nang di̱di̱le bi̱nu a no lam di̱ki̱nu?”
N chi a fwal kur ki̱ti̱n di̱du a furi ki̱lin we bwi chiyu, ki̱kirati̱ wiini ki̱bwa̱kati̱ kemiyu ki̱ni furi ki̱lin ko,
“A no mun! Bi̱n di̱dun,
Bwa ni̱bu kwa̱mbi̱re mweti kwang
ki̱mang kuli di̱ne nabwe kuli̱n ki̱ne.
A awa wiin, kuli̱n di̱di kwang a twiyan.”
Ti̱ma furi mwen, n ti̱n bi̱bu a twiyemu!
Ti̱ma furi mwen,
ni̱bu Kwamam n ti fandubi̱bu n ti fa̱kubu.
N Kwama a ma ki̱mi̱n yinangu n ki̱n a ma chimi̱nangu.
Yinu wuka naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a da̱u nabwe ti kale yinang ner a mar we nabwe ti laa, ki̱yidu ko.
“Nang ki̱swi ni̱bu ka mang Babila ki̱ni dukanu nabwenabwen,
ka twiyadu ki̱diya.”
A ne ti̱kan kwa̱ri̱n ngaki we,
kono bi̱bu ki̱kaba tenim, ka bi̱bu ki̱kura chime,
ka bi̱bu ki̱ku sumimu we di̱mune.
A ne wuka nii we wu ka feku chi a di̱mune.
A ne di̱kan diir di̱du a kwaku chiyan we.
A ne ni ku ti̱n wuka fiti̱la wa di̱mune we.
A ne di̱kan ker bwele ki̱yiu naye,
ka fwa̱n di̱du ki̱ naden we di̱mune.
Di̱ne yo ferediye, ni̱bu di̱bem mumu,
nang bi̱bu ki̱ma mati̱n we ti̱ti̱ni kwangi̱mu,
kuuti kwang a ki̱tan di̱ne yimarichi mwiyu.
Ki̱tuum fa̱kubu Kwamamu n ti ni̱bu Kwamamu n we bi̱n Babilanu.
n ti bi̱bu ni̱bu a chiben we ti̱ti̱nimi kwangi̱mu.
A kuteng ki̱ku n nwe di̱kan ker di̱dun we dii yinang muraku ki̱duwang ki̱ngau keme ki̱fwadu ko,
Dela Kwama!
Yuku n ti dwiyentu n ti dukanu a di̱Kwama.
We bi̱yili̱mu, Kabaku kangu ki̱yilang.
N ki̱n a wela ki̱kule,
wu a kai ti̱ti̱nitu ki̱ni da yariye ko.
N ki̱n a ye ni̱bu Kwamamu mi̱n ki̱tuuntiyu naye wu a kuriyu.
N chi a ki̱la ngauti̱ keme ki̱da ko,
“Dela Kwama
Ywa̱n twiku kangi̱nu ki̱chiru ki̱yika twiye ki̱diya kwadu.”
Seli̱bu wan turau chiri baanamu n ti bi̱kuri̱m bi̱bi baanamu a sungeni kukus a sii Kwama, wu a swe we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange. N chi ki̱yidu ko,
“Amin. Dela Kwama!”
Yinu di̱kan ker a chire we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu ko,
“Dela Kwama chire,
n ti̱n ni̱bu nangang Kwamamu,
n ti̱n bi̱bu ti̱nwe tayi kiyimu,
bi̱ti̱ri̱mu n ti bi̱duumu.”
Yinu n nwe ker di̱ki̱nu yinang tuule, yinang ker mwe ki̱sudu a laanu yinu yinang yo twiye ki̱madi kuurkuur yo ki̱ma twiye, ki̱fwadu ko,
Dela Kwama chire naba dukane!
Di̱ne n Kwama Tewuduwe ki̱ma mati̱nte.
Ni ma furi mwen ni ma ti̱mi̱lan.
Ni ni ki̱n dwiyentu!
Di̱ne ti̱kali ki̱natu a be Kwanetu
fwa̱n ki̱nu a tu a do bwi ti̱kali ki̱nayu.
“A ni ki̱n luke
lili wu ki̱lbi̱ki̱lbu a ne dutu we.”
Luke wu ki̱yung nangi̱n ti̱yili ti̱tu a ni̱bu bunti̱ki̱mitu.

Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re Kwama a yimi̱n ko, “Mwal, ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu n Kwama a yal chiye di̱ne ti̱kali ki̱natu ti̱tu a Kwanitu. N ki̱n a sub ko, bi̱bu nang kasi ti̱kwa̱li ti̱yili ti̱tu a chire a di̱Kwamatu.”

We bi̱bu ya̱m n sung we kakku Kwamangu mi mang si ki̱nu. Aya n ki̱n a yi ko, “Maduwe yiko, di̱ne m mi̱n naba nangange yinang mun n ti kebu mumu, bi̱bu a tau di̱mwar Yesuni ki̱ri̱ngi̱mu. Bi̱yili̱mu n Yesu a kwa̱l ni mi̱ni̱mu nang niku dukan mwaki̱nu.”
Yinu n ku dii a wuden, wuka kwere a ti we bwako mwe. Di̱n nii wu a swe wenu n yile n ti bi̱yili̱m. Ki̱ ma mwataki̱ kangu ki̱ni yile yinu ki̱mati̱ kun di̱du a yilen.
Nuyi kiyu ki̱yidu yinang ben ki̱rangi̱n, ti̱ki̱ri̱ni mati̱nitu we dur ki̱nu nabwen. A mwalati̱ di̱nbi we ti̱tu kana ki̱n ka medu ka kidii.
N ki̱n a do luke wuswa̱bre a ki̱tuume. Di̱n ki̱nu “N di̱kwal Kwaman.”
Ni̱bu kuni̱mu we bwadi ki̱ nabi̱ ki̱nu, n chi a do kuli̱n lilin di̱du a ne dutu we, kuli̱n di̱du yimwemwen, a swe a kwereti mwemwen.
Kul di̱du ki̱ni chami̱n ki̱chiredu we yi ko di̱du ka chau ki̱la ki̱n we kuuti. Ka ma mati̱n chitu ki̱ni ki̱twalang makkang
A mwal di̱n di̱du we luke ko n ti markune ko: “Mai mati̱me n ti Tewuduwe, Tewuduwe tiye.”
Yinu n ku naba di̱tumbi̱ri a ti a kuko, ki̱yale ki̱sungti̱kwasi we twiye ko, “Ti̱be, ti̱chau nabwe chabte Kwama a mar chimi̱ne,

beti̱ wu nam mati̱me n ti wu a tikaketi ni̱bu kuni̱me n ti ki̱kati ni̱bu kunni̱miyu n ti ni̱bu bi̱bu a di a kweretimu n ti bi̱bu ki̱sii chimi̱ndi̱mu n ti ni̱bi kwang n ti ni̱bu bi̱ni̱mu n ti ka̱biyu, seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱m.”
Yinu n ku nam di̱kire n ti mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu n ti ni̱bu kunni̱mu a muran, di̱ne ke chi ma kunnu n ti wu a swe a di a kwere n ti bi̱ki̱mu ni̱bu.

Yinu a tau nam di̱kire n ti fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu wu a ma chi ya̱r yii di̱ne wuka nam di̱kire. We chi ya̱r yiitu a maatu a yo bi̱bu ki̱ni di̱mwal nam wumumi̱n ti̱dui n ti bi̱bu a le bobu ki̱ sii ki̱wulang niyange. A tau nam di̱kire n ti fa̱ku ti̱kwaniye a mar chi ki̱ni ti̱kuri a far ki̱rang di̱du ki̱twidu ki̱ni ben ki̱fi̱bti ki̱rang ki̱kwanang.
A chi̱be ni̱bu kuni̱mu ki̱ni kulu ki̱chiredu we yii ni wu a swe a kwere wu ki̱ni di̱mwali mwenge. Ki̱ni̱btiyu a wu nam chi yinangu n kawure a kudiyang.
Yinu ki̱la n ku naba di̱tumbi̱ri ki̱suwedu a dii ki̱ni masoli wu a bwang ki̱swa̱ma̱nge, a tatte neti maklane we fa̱la̱ng kangu.
N ki̱n a tau neti soo wuduwe, kanang chikiye so wu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko wu bwila ki̱yalti̱nu ko Setane, a kwau ki̱n ka ma swa̱ti̱tu kuneng.
A mar ki̱n we bwang ki̱swa̱ma̱ngu a yinge ti̱n. N ki̱n a ne ya da ka buti̱ti̱ kuu ni̱bu ki̱da ka lami̱nti̱ yo swa̱ti̱tu kuneng ka ride. A kuteng ki̱ku ka mar ki̱nedu a bakswi bayim.

N ku ti̱di̱ngri mati̱ni ki̱ni ni̱bu a ya da ka ma mati̱ni̱mu a swe we. N ki̱la n ku bi̱bu ni̱bu a chi̱be chi di̱ne ki̱ma di̱mwar ya̱m Yesum, ki̱mwati̱ ya̱m Kwamamu, bi̱bu a siibu nam di̱kire ka ki̱wulang kangemu, a yiu ti̱bu di̱mwal ki̱nu we ti ka̱be chi ka fa̱la̱ngemu, n Kwama a yo chi bi̱kuri̱m ka ma mati̱ntu n ti Masiya swa̱ti̱tu kuneng.
(Bi̱kamu a bwarani̱mu a kunbu didin ka lami̱nti yo swa̱ti̱tu kuneng ka ride.) Ki̱ku nang kunku kwa̱miyang ki̱kakkangu.
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu yinang Kwamamu, n chi wetuwe bi̱bu ka mwe kunki̱mu. Bwa wurobe a ne ya da we di̱chiye. Aya n chi kano fanseti Kwamai n ti Masiya n chi ka ma mati̱ntu ware swa̱ti̱tu kuneng.
Ka swa̱ti̱ti kunengitu a suwe, yinu ka mare Setan we kange ko
N ki̱n ka chakakku kani̱n butu kuuti ki̱yalu ko Kok n ti Makok we fwiti̱neti ti̱ti̱niyu ki̱ni yanako. N Setan ka mur chidu ki̱ni kwang a fi n chi ka mang kunne, n chi nabwen yinang yane wu a la.
N chi a ti̱ran we ti̱ti̱nitu, a kana bi̱nu n Kwama a mi̱lani̱nu, kanang chikiye fi ni̱bu Kwamamu wemi̱ne. Aya ki̱rang a chire a bwa diye a be twi fakwarbi̱ bi̱bu.
N Setan wu a buti̱ chiye, ni̱bu a kwaban a mar a far ki̱rang ki̱kwanang. Nang fi nam di̱kire n ti fa̱kubu ti̱kwanimu wemi̱ne. N chi kani̱n nwe riye we fiko kum n ti kuko ki̱diya kwadu.
Yinu n ku nabwe ti ki̱di̱ng mati̱nang n ti wu a swe we kwangi mwe. Ti̱mu n ti twiye a twiyan, a kwala fi ka sweende.

Yinu n ku bi̱bwari̱mu, seli̱bu n ti bwesi̱m a ti we kakku ki̱di̱ng kangu, yinu a wudu tati̱ki̱dayu, a wuduti̱ wuka taki̱da, kanang chikiye taki̱da ti̱kuriye. N ki̱n a mwata bi̱bwari̱mu mi̱n, a bunti̱ chi n kawure a ma a ti̱ti̱niye.
Laa wuduwe a chake bi̱bu a bwaran a di̱ki̱nemu, yinu bwa n ti futi̱tu a chake bi̱bwari̱mu a di̱chiyemu. A mwata kanang wuwule niyemi̱n yinanga dakanangu.
A kuteng ki̱ku, a mar bwa n ti futi̱tu a far ki̱ran. Far ki̱ranu nang bwa wurobe.
Nii wu di̱n ki̱nu a newe taki̱da ti̱kuriye, ka marti̱ ki̱nu we far ki̱ran di̱du.
Yinu n ku dii wufwiye n ti ti̱m bi̱fwim. Di̱ne dii wuka̱re n ti ti̱m bi̱ka̱ri̱mu a twiyan. Laati kwang a twiya ti̱n.
N ku Wurchalima wufwiye, bi̱n Kwamanu a chire we dii ki̱suwedu. A dosan yinang na kwiye wu a do yikiyu keki̱ tekan n ti kwarta ko.

Yinu n nwe ker di̱dun a chire we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nangu ko, “Ki̱ka̱ngu n Kwama ka swedu ware n ti ni̱bu, n ki̱n ka swedu n ti chi, n chi ka kau ni̱bu ki̱m, yinu n ki̱n n ki̱fwan kanodu ware n ti chi, n ki̱n nang Kwama chi.
N ki̱n ka musu chimi̱n ti̱mwenitu we nuiyi chiyi kwang. A ne ya̱m bwamu we n ti wiiniyu n ti furi ki̱linu n ti burangu. Kwa̱li̱n chi̱n di̱du feredinu a su.”
N ki̱n wu a swe a ki̱di̱ng mati̱nange a yi ko, “Mang Mai kanang ti̱ti̱le chiye ti̱fwi! Yinu a yiti̱n ko, mwalmwale, ya̱m bi̱bu bi̱yili̱m ka fwedu.”
Yinu a yiko, “A ri. M mi̱n nang mweki̱ku n ti swangki̱ku
Wu ka chau ki̱la ki̱ni fakware ka chau kula wu, mang kau Teki̱n n ki̱n ka kau bwemi.

Aya bi̱bu a dumi̱n di̱ne tayimu n ti bi̱bu a kebu bi̱yili̱mi̱mu n ti bi̱bu ki̱seta yiimu, n ti bi̱bu ki̱chi̱be ni̱bumu n ti bi̱bu ki̱ma ti̱kulimu n ti ribi̱bu n ti bi̱bu ki̱si di̱yor n ti bi̱bu ki̱mwera ti̱kwanimu n chi kwang ka le ki̱rang ki̱kwanangu. Wu nang bwa wurobe.”
Wuka we ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱ri Kwamami bi̱dibiin bi̱bu a swan kute ki̱ni kutai yiyu a ri ki̱ni ki̱fwini Kwamayi yidibiniyu, a yimi̱n ko, “Be, n yungi̱n na kwiye Be Kwane.”
Fi̱ki̱m Kwamamu a dai, n fwe a di̱kan kun di̱dun n kebi̱ swa̱n, a yungi bi̱n Kwamanu, Wurchalima wufwiye wu a chire a bwadi ki̱suwede.
Bi̱n Kwama di̱di kwangi wa̱liwa̱li ki̱ni dwiyen Kwamatu. Ki̱yiiye ko yinang kali yi wuli̱bi̱wuli̱bi n ti ki̱duum karfemu ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko chasfa yiyu yinang madubiyu.
Yakwale bi̱ne a su, kwa̱ti̱ti kub chiri turau ki̱ni ni̱bu ti̱tumbi̱rimi kub chiri burau we kanang di̱di̱le kwa̱re. A mwal di̱mbi bi̱ntu a Yisrela we kanang di̱di̱le kwa̱re.
Kanang wuwule fwiti̱ne we fwiti̱netiyi yaanangu kanang chikiye, twa̱r n ti twa̱r wuli̱n n ti kir kulanu n ti ki̱twale ki̱ni kwa̱ti̱ti ti̱ta.
A ru tamme yakwale bi̱ne ki̱ni kaliyi kub chiri yurau. A mwal we kanang wuwule kale di̱n fandun we fandubu Be Kwanemi kub chiri burabi̱mu.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re wu a fwa ya̱m n ti mi̱ne ki̱ni ki̱twalang sinariyang ki̱ku ka swe bi̱nu n ti kwa̱tu kitu n ti yakwale bi̱niyu.
Fwiti̱neti bi̱niyu a fi̱rami̱n a fiwiine we swa̱nu ki̱ni kwang. N ki̱n a swe bi̱nu a ya swa̱n bi̱ni̱nu Kilomita kuniriti turau ki̱ni kuliti taana.
Naba di̱tumbi̱re a swe yakwale, a ya swa̱n ki̱nu kuli diin ki̱ni wan taana chiri yaana.
A mu yakwale ki̱ni karfe ni̱bu ki̱yalu ko, “Chasfa.” Wauwade ki̱yiladu yinang si̱nariya, yinang madubi.
A do tamiyu a bi̱n di̱diyu ki̱ni kanang wuwule ki̱dum kale wuyileme. A ma tame mwemi̱ne ki̱ni chasfa, wurobe a ma ki̱ni saffaya, wutare a ma ki̱ni akat, wunare a ma ki̱ni sumurrudu,

wunure a ma ki̱ni onis wunukune a ma ki̱ni karneliyan wuni̱bine a ma ki̱ni kirisolat, wunaribe a ma ki̱ni beril, wuturkube a ma ki̱ni tofas, wukube a ma ki̱ni daimon, wukub chiri wiine a ma ki̱ni chasin yinu wu kub chiri yurabe a ma ki̱ni ametis.
Kwa̱ti̱tu ki̱ni kub chiri turako kana kali yidori, kanang di̱di̱le kware ki̱ni wuko kale. A ma nelo wuduwe we bi̱nu ki̱ni si̱nariya wu a kwa̱ukwa̱be, yinang madubi.
Mang kubu Kan Kwama di̱duna Wurchalimanu we bi̱nu. Nangki̱n n Kwama Tewuduwe naba dukane kwange n ti Be Kwane nang kanu.
Bi̱n di̱du a mabu nangangu ki̱ni kuko ka swange, di̱ne dwiyen Kwamatu a kau ki̱yyiye. Aya Be Kwane a kau kiye ko.
Kuuti ti̱ti̱niyu ka yadu we yiiku kangu, mati̱m ti̱ti̱nimu ka be bi̱n di̱du mi̱nedu ki̱ni kuli chitu.
A ne di kwa̱tu chitu ka yingede we, di̱ne a ne kum we bwako.
Kuuti yiyu a ti̱ti̱niyu be ka ni dwiyentu n ti kuli chitu.
A ne danduritu ka le fikotu we. Ni̱bu ki̱ma chi dibwimu n ti ni̱bu ti̱kwanimu a ne le fiko. Bi̱bu ka ledi̱mu kana ni̱bu bi̱bu di̱nbi chitu we taki̱da Be Kwane wu a ti̱kuri ki̱diya kwade.
Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱re a yungi laa wu a mwe ti̱kuriye ki̱yiladu yinang kali yili, ki̱chiredu we ki̱di̱ng mati̱nang Kwamangu n ti Be Kwane,
we tibe wuduwe nelo. We ki̱ti̱ku kanang wuwule laa, tiyang ti̱kuriyang we ki̱ku ki̱tu ti̱kulantu ki̱da kub chiri yurau we swa̱ra̱ngu. Lwangi̱n tiyangitu ki̱be kuuti mi̱n bumbi riyetu.
A ne ti̱kan chi ti̱tu n Kwama a ma ki̱mi̱n yiitu we, ki̱di̱ng mati̱nang Kwamangu n ti ki̱ku a Be Kwanengu ka swedu we bi̱nu, ni̱bu nanga ki̱mu kani̱n sii ki̱nu.
N chi ka ku kabu ko, yinu di̱n ki̱nu kanodu we kabi̱ni chiyu.
A neti̱ wuka kum we, a ne bakku ki̱yiyen we, ka kuko, di̱ne n Tewuduwe Kwama ka ni chi yiiki̱ku. N chi ka chau mati̱ntu ki̱diya kwadu.

Yinu naba di̱tumbi̱ri Kwama a yi mi̱n ko, “Ya̱m bi̱bu ka bi̱yili̱m, ka fwedu. N Kwama, wu ki̱ma nangang kangu a fi̱ki̱m we fa̱kube, a tume naba di̱tumbi̱re, ke a yung naba nanga ko chi a mwintuwe yaka fwedu a ne tiketu.”
“Da̱ng, mi̱n ki̱ladi daatu! Naba delake ni wu a tau ti̱kwa̱li ti̱tu a chi a yaka fwede we taki̱da.”
M mi̱n n Yowana, m mi̱n wu mang nwe, mang ku ti̱chitu we. Yo mang nwe mang kuti̱ne, n sung kus we nani kiyu mi̱n si naba di̱tumbi̱ri a tau ki̱yungi chite.
Aya n ki̱n a yi mi̱n ko, “Maduwe yiko, m mi̱n naba nangange yinang mun n ti bi̱kamu kebu mumu fa̱kubu n ti kanang wuwule niye wu a tau ti̱kwa̱li yiitu a taki̱da wutu. Sii kana Kwama!”
Yinu a yimi̱n ko, “Laiyu ti̱kwa̱li yiitu a chi yaka fweditu we, di̱ne ki̱swi mwatawe.
N ki̱n wu ki̱ma chi a lebe, n ti wu ki̱mwe ti̱kwaniye, n ti wu ki̱tum bi̱yili̱me, a chakakku. N ki̱n wu ki̱ma fiswe yinang Kwama a chakakku a nang madu.”
“Da̱ng, mi̱n bedi datu, mang bedu ki̱ni ki̱ti̱me, be mang nikadu, mang swe kawuremi̱n ti̱nu we chi n ki̱n a maatu.
M mi̱n nang Alfa n ti Omeka. Kanang chikiye, m mi̱n nang wukakke n ti wu ka ta̱lle, Mweku n ti Swangku.”
Ni̱bu delaki̱m bi̱bu ki̱bunti̱ yili̱n Kwamati̱mu. Di̱ne n chi ka ledu we kwa̱tu bi̱nitu, ka chadu we ti̱kulan tiyang ti̱kuriyangitu.
Ni̱bu bi̱bwilamu kanodu a kuteng bi̱nang kanang chikiye ribi̱bu n ti ki̱kulbi̱bu, bi̱bu ki̱chi̱be ni̱bi̱mu n ti bi̱bu ki̱sii di̱yor n ti bi̱bu a mi̱lan chakku kakku ki̱ni ti̱kwanimu.
“M mi̱n n Yesu, n tum naba di̱tumbi̱ri mi, ko ke a fwa ni̱bu mi̱n ya̱m bi̱bu we kambi Kwamatu. M mi̱n nang buke ki̱kuti̱li̱me Dauda wu yinang ki̱ yinang.”

N Kwama Fi̱ki̱m n ti ni̱bu ki̱mu yinang naye na kwiye we di̱ki̱nemu a yi ko, “Be!” Ti̱nti̱ne n ki̱n wu ki̱nwede a fwa ti̱n ko, “Be!” Kanang wuwule niye wu ki̱bau mwe ti̱kuriye, a be, ti̱nti̱ne, n ki̱n wu a ke kayidde, a yiu mwe ti̱kuriye li̱mang.
M mi̱n n Yesu, mi̱n wu ki̱tele we ni ki̱nwe ti̱kwa̱li yii chi yaka fwede. Ka wuka ni a su chi we ya̱m bi̱be, n Kwama ka su ki̱mi̱n bwini chi yinangu we taki̱da wuwangu.
Aya ka wuka ni a chaku di̱kan di̱kwa̱l yiin we chi yaka fwede, n Kwama ka chaku ki̱ti̱me ko wu a tiyang ti̱kuriyange n ti wu a bi̱n Kwamane, yinangu a swe we taki̱da wuwangu.
N ki̱n wu a fwa ya̱m bi̱be, a yi ko, “Ki̱kumang mi̱n bedi daatu!”
Naba mwalke a ke ko, Amin. Be Yesu Tewuduwe!
Li̱me Tewuduwe Yesu a swe ware n ti ni̱bu Kwamamu. Amin.
